quotes.quote: The Sabbath-day is the savings-bank of humanity.
quotes.author: Arthur Frederick Saunders

quotes.quote: In observing the Sabbath, one is both giving a gift to God and imitating Him.
quotes.author: Lauren Winner

quotes.quote: The gift of the Sabbath must be treasured. Blessed are you who honour this day.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: On the Sabbath- we are reminded that we are not human doings, but human beings.
quotes.author: Rob Bell

quotes.quote: Sabbath is not simply the pause that refreshes. It is the pause that transforms.
quotes.author: Walter Brueggemann

quotes.quote: Anybody can observe the Sabbath, but making it holy surely takes the rest of the week.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: The Sabbath is the link between the paradise which has passed away and the paradise which is yet to come.
quotes.author: Andrew Wylie

quotes.quote: Sabbath is that uncluttered time and space in which we can distance ourselves from our own activities enough to see what God is doing.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: Sabbath observance invites us to stop. It invites us to rest. It asks us to notice that while we rest, the world continues without our help. It invites us to delight in the world's beauty and abundance.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: It is time for us to breathe and build margin into our lives for God. Sabbath was intended as a gift, and it is still a gift to us today. If you are weary, worn out, and exhausted the concept of Sabbath will change your life.
quotes.author: Priscilla Shirer

quotes.quote: Sabbath, in the first instance, is not about worship. It is about work stoppage. It is about withdrawal from the anxiety system of Pharaoh, the refusal to let one's life be defined by production and consumption and the endless pursuit of private well-being.
quotes.author: Walter Brueggemann

quotes.quote: A life built upon Sabbath is contented because in rhythms of rest we discover our time is full of the holiness of God.
quotes.author: Shelly Miller

quotes.quote: Sabbath isn't about resting perfectly; it's about resting in the One who is perfect.
quotes.author: Shelly Miller

quotes.quote: As we keep or break the Sabbath Day we nobly save or meanly lose the last best hope by which man rises.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A world without a Sabbath would be like a man without a smile, like summer without flowers, and like a homestead without a garden. It is the most joyous day of the week.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: You will find rest on Sabbath day for your soul.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Make the Sabbath a delight by rendering service to others.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: Sabbath is the celebration of life beyond and outside productivity.
quotes.author: Walter Brueggemann

quotes.quote: Keeping the Sabbath day holy is much more than just physical rest. It involves spiritual renewal and worship.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Sabbath rest is more than mere abstention from physical work; and, therefore, must include worship and Scripture-reading.
quotes.author: Joseph Hertz

quotes.quote: Sabbath - a weekly festival having its origin in the fact that God made the world in six days and was arrested on the seventh.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Faith in God engenders a love for the Sabbath; faith in the Sabbath engenders a love for God. A sacred Sabbath truly is a delight.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: This is what the Sabbath should feel like. A pause. Not just a minor pause, but a major pause. Not just lowering the volume, but a muting. As the famous rabbi Abraham Joshua Heschel put it, the Sabbath is a sanctuary in time.
quotes.author: A. J. Jacobs

quotes.quote: The sabbath is a time where we put aside all secular work and focus entirely on Jesus and on things holy.
quotes.author: Micheal Stewart

quotes.quote: Sabbath requires surrender. If we only stop when we are finished with all our work, we will never stop, because our work is never completely done. With every accomplishment there arises a new responsibility... Sabbath dissolves the artificial urgency of our days, because it liberates us from the need to be finished.
quotes.author: Wayne Muller

quotes.quote: The Sabbath, as now recognized and enforced, is one of the main pillars of Priestcraft and Superstition, and the stronghold of a merely ceremonial Religion.
quotes.author: William Lloyd Garrison

quotes.quote: If you keep the Sabbath, you start to see creation not as somewhere to get away from your ordinary life, but a place to frame an attentiveness to your life.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: Sacredness inspires respect.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Let every man abide in the calling wherein he is called and his work will be as sacred as the work of the ministry. It is not what a man does that determines whether his work is sacred or secular, it is why he does it.
quotes.author: A. W. Tozer

quotes.quote: The most sacred place in the world is your mind. Guard it ferociously.
quotes.author: Rick Beneteau

quotes.quote: Appreciate the sacred life you have, it is a gift from God.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The most cherished and sacred moments of our lives are those filled with the spirit of love.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: If individuals start to walk on the path of spirit and feel a sense of the sacred connectedness, then social, economic and political problems will also begin to get resolved.
quotes.author: Satish Kumar

quotes.quote: A sacred calling does not entitle us to smooth sailing and a trouble free occupationâ€¦It is also a summons to joy, and life, and most of all, love.
quotes.author: Rev. Alan Eschenbacher

quotes.quote: Man values life as a sacred jewel in such a way that he reveres him most who haughtily scorns it.
quotes.author: Platen

quotes.quote: You can find the sacred in the most ordinary things.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The higher goal of spiritual living is not to amass a welth of information, but to face sacred moments.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: To theology, ... only what it holds sacred is true, whereas to philosophy, only what holds true is sacred.
quotes.author: Ludwig Feuerbach

quotes.quote: Sacred are the lips from which has issued only truth.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Something opens our wings. Something makes boredom and hurt disappear. Someone fills the cup in front of us: We taste only sacredness.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Sacredness binds people together, and then blinds them to the arbitrariness of the practice.
quotes.author: Jonathan Haidt

quotes.quote: Nothing is divine but what is agreeable to reason.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Nothing is a last sacred but the integrity of your own mind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: The mundane and the sacred are one and the same.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: The heart in every human is the sacred love.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Faced with the sacredness of life and of the human person, and before the marvels of the universe, wonder is the only appropriate attitude.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: No belief or idea is sacred, unless it treats all people as sacred.
quotes.author: Bryant H McGill

quotes.quote: You who have received so much love, show your love by protecting the sacredness of life. The sacredness of life is the greatest gifts that God has given us.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Nothing is more noble, nothing more venerable than fidelity. Faithfulness and truth are the most sacred excellences and endowments of the human mind.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Our time on this earth is sacred, and we should celebrate every moment.
quotes.author: Paulo Ccoelho

quotes.quote: When you believe you reflect what is holy and good, you can see more that is good in every stage of your life.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.quote: Non-cooperation with evil is a sacred duty.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: Never violate the sacredness of your individual self-respect.
quotes.author: Theodore Parker

quotes.quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: If we are growing holier, we are growing kinder.
quotes.author: Andrew Bonar

quotes.quote: Awareness of the sacred in life is what holds our world together, and the lack of awareness of the sacred is what is tearing it apart.
quotes.author: Joan D. Chittister

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you sacrifice something precious, you're not really losing it. You're just passing it on to someone else.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: I guess that's just part of loving people: You have to give things up. Sometimes you even have to give them up.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: She taught me all about real sacrifice. That it should be done from love... That it should be done from necessity, not without exhausting all other options. That it should be done for people who need your strength because they don't have enough of their own.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: It's not hard to decide what you want your life to be about. What's hard, she said, is figuring out what you're willing to give up in order to do the things you really care about.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.quote: Nobody knows you as well as our spouse. And that means no one will be quicker to recognize a change when you deliberately start sacrificing your wants and wishes to make sure his or her needs are met.
quotes.author: Stephen Kendrick

quotes.quote: The ultimate test of man's conscience may be his willingness to sacrifice something today for future generations whose words of thanks will not be heard.
quotes.author: Gaylord Nelson

quotes.quote: People who put themselves on the line and sacrifice their own safety for the greater good and for others, and anyone in any profession whose concern is the welfare for other people instead of the individual, are inspiring and important.
quotes.author: Chris Hemsworth

quotes.quote: Some day you will find out that there is far more happiness in another's happiness than in your own.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Doing the right thing for someone else occasionally means doing something that feels wrong to you
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Sometimes we have to step down to help somebody up, not because we failed to go up, but as a humble sacrifice to save a great soul.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: The sacrifice which causes sorrow to the doer of the sacrifice is no sacrifice. Real sacrifice lightens the mind of the doer and gives him a sense of peace and joy. The Buddha gave up the pleasures of life because they had become painful to him.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Whenever you feel compelled to put others first at the expense of yourself, you are denying your own reality, your own identity
quotes.author: David Stafford

quotes.quote: For I was sure of one thing, it wasn't always the hero who saved the world. It was the person most willing to die first.
quotes.author: R.K. Ryals

quotes.quote: Regardless of what the advertising campaigns may tell us, we can't have it all. Sacrifice is not an option, or an anachronism; it's a fact of life. We all cut off our own limbs to burn on some altar. The crucial thing is to choose an altar that's worth it and a limb you can accept losing. To go consenting to the sacrifice.
quotes.author: Tana French

quotes.quote: Sacrifice is a part of life. It's supposed to be. It's not something to regret. It's something to aspire to. Little sacrifices. Big sacrifices. A mother works so her son can go to school. A daughter moves home to take care of her sick father.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: As soon as sacrifice becomes a duty and necessity to mankind. I see no limit to the horizon which opens before him.
quotes.author: Ernest Renan

quotes.quote: One-half of knowing what you want is knowing what you must give up before you get it.
quotes.author: Sidney Howard

quotes.quote: Sacrifice still exists everywhere, and everywhere the elect of each generation suffers for the salvation of the rest.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.
quotes.author: Albert Pine

quotes.quote: Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier.
quotes.author: Zahid Abas

quotes.quote: I am thankful that in the giving we receive, and what we receive is the satisfaction of knowing that whatever we give is always bigger once we've given it away.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Self sacrifice is the real miracle out of which all the reported miracles grow.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: To put others in front of ourselves is to put God in front of everything.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: All great things worth having require great sacrifice worth giving.
quotes.author: Paullina Simons

quotes.quote: Occasionally in this life, we must give up or lose the things that we want in order to gain the things we really need.
quotes.author: David Kreger

quotes.quote: They warn you that you're gonna have to make sacrifices, but i guess that means different things to different people, like giving up something you really want now for something you've wanted your whole life, or spending less time on yourself, so you can spend more time with someone you love. At some point you might even have to give up your own sense of safety and well being, but after a while it doesn't feel like you're giving up anything at all
quotes.author: Scrubs J.D

quotes.quote: Real magic can never be made by offering someone else's liver. You must tear out your own, and not expect to get it back.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish, but have eternal life.
quotes.author: Holy Bible: New International Version

quotes.quote: Brotherhood means laying down your life for somebody, really willing to sacrifice yourself for somebody else.
quotes.author: Tim Hetherington

quotes.quote: The most sublime act is to set another before you.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The tragedy of life is not that it ends so soon, but that we wait so long to begin it.
quotes.author: William Mather Lewis

quotes.quote: Sometimes pain is so unmanageable that the idea of spending another day with it seems impossible. Other times pain acts as a compass to help you through the messier tunnels of growing up. But pain can only help you find happiness if you remember it.
quotes.author: Adam Silvera

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A feeling of sadness and longing, That is not akin to pain, And resembles sorrow only As the mist resembles the rain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Sorrow is knowledge, those that know the most must mourn the deepest, the tree of knowledge is not the tree of life.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: It's easy to cry when you realize that everyone you love will reject you or die.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Sorrow is one of the vibrations that prove the fact of living.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: My feeling is that there is nothing in life but refraining from hurting others, and comforting those who are sad.
quotes.author: Olive Schreiner

quotes.quote: To fall in love is awfully simple, but to fall out of love is simply awful.
quotes.author: Bess Myerson

quotes.quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall in misery the time when we were happy.
quotes.author: Dante

quotes.quote: Sadness is almost never anything but a form of fatigue.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Absence from whom we love is worse than death, and frustrates hope severer than despair.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: As the light begins to intensify, so does my misery, and I wonder how it is possible to hurt so much when nothing is wrong.
quotes.author: Tabitha Suzuma

quotes.quote: I have a thousand reasons to die and many millions of tears to cry.
quotes.author: Draconian

quotes.quote: So much sadness exists in the world that we are all under obligation to contribute as much joy as lies within our powers.
quotes.author: John Sutherland Bonnell

quotes.quote: Behind every sweet smile, there is a bitter sadness that no one can ever see and feel.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: There is no worse sorrow than remembering happiness in the day of sorrow.
quotes.author: Alfred De Musset

quotes.quote: Sadness is a super important thing not to be ashamed about but to include in our lives. One of the bigger problems with sadness or depression is there's so much shame around it. If you have it you're a failure. You are felt as being very unattractive.
quotes.author: Mike Mills

quotes.quote: How sad it is that we give up on people who are just like us.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Tears are words that need to be written.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Sadness usually results from one of the following causes either when a man does not succeed, or is ashamed of his success.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: This is what it felt like to have a broken heart. It felt less like a cracking down the middle and more like she had swallowed it whole and it sat bruised and bleeding in the pit of her stomach.
quotes.author: Wendy Wunder

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foe

quotes.quote: Half of the secular unrest and dismal, profane sadness of modern society comes from the vain ideas that every man is bound to be a critic for life.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Nothing records the effects of a sad life so graphically as the human body.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Man could not live if he were entirely impervious to sadness. Many sorrows can be endured only by being embraced, and the pleasure taken in them naturally has a somewhat melancholy character.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: The beginning and the decline of love are both marked by the embarrassment the lovers feel to be alone together.
quotes.author: Jean de La Bruyère

quotes.quote: You were as kind as you could be, and even though you're gone, you still mean the world to me.
quotes.author: Mark Tremonti

quotes.quote: You are my sweetest downfall. I loved you first, I loved you first.
quotes.author: Regina Spektor

quotes.quote: It's funny how we feel so much but we cannot say a word. We are screaming inside, but we can't be heard.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.quote: Well, I've been afraid of changing 'cause I've built my life around you. But time makes you bolder even children get older and I'm getting older too.
quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

quotes.quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of withering, of tarnishing.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: I will wait for you till the day I can forget you or till the day you realize you cannot forget me
quotes.author: Herryicm

quotes.quote: There is a distinct, awful pain that comes with loving someone more than they love you.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Walking alone is not difficult but when we have walked a mile worth a thousand years with someone then coming back alone is what is difficult.
quotes.author: Faraaz Kazi

quotes.quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
quotes.author: La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Loving can cost a lot but not loving always costs more, and those who fear to love often find that want of love is an emptiness that robs the joy from life.
quotes.author: Merle Shan

quotes.quote: Relationships are like glass. Sometimes it's better to leave them broken than try to hurt yourself putting it back together.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If we must part forever, Give me but one kind word to think upon, And please myself with, while my heart's breaking.
quotes.author: Thomas Otway

quotes.quote: Remember me with smiles and laughs, for that's how I'll remember you. If you can only remember me with sadness and tears, then don't remember me at all.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The magic of first love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is pain.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: To love anything is to realize that it might be lost.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Perhaps a great love is never returned.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjöld

quotes.quote: Falling out of love is very enlightening; for a short while you see the world with new eyes.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: How do you know that love is gone? If you said you would be there by seven, you get there by nine, and he or she has not called the police yet—it’s gone.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: You gave me wings to fly, then took away my sky.
quotes.author: Leonora Speyer

quotes.quote: To fall in love is to create a religion that has a fallible God.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: Love without return is like a question without an answer.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: We must get our hearts broken sometimes. This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: I was never one to patiently pick up broken fragments and glue them together again and tell myself that the mended whole was as good as new. What is broken is broken—and I’d rather remember it as it was at its best than mend it and see the broken places as long as I lived.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: It’s so hard to forget pain, but it’s even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Never love with all your heart, it only ends in breaking.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Everything is temporary if you give it enough time.
quotes.author: Jewel

quotes.quote: We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A deadness occurs in relationships when people are no longer willing to tell each other how they really feel.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Almost all of our sorrows spring out of our relations with other people.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Never place someone so high on a pedestal that if they should fall... you get crushed.
quotes.author: Mark W. Boyer

quotes.quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Relationships fail because people take their own insecurities and try and twist them into their partner's flaws.
quotes.author: Baylor Barbee

quotes.quote: For lack of an occasional expression of love, a relationship strong at the seams can wear thin in the middle.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Remember that no relationship is a total waste of time. You can always learn something about yourself.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: An argument is always about what has been made more important than the relationship.
quotes.author: Hugh Prather

quotes.quote: It hurts the most when the person who made you feel so special yesterday makes you feel so unwanted today.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
It takes longer to build a relationship
than it does to destroy one.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: I could have loved you once And said it But then you went away And when you came back Love was a forgotten word, Remember?
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Relationships end because once the person has you, they stop doing the things it took to get you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Once you lose someone it is never exactly the same person who comes back.
quotes.author: Sharon Olds

quotes.quote: Relationships are worth fighting for, but you can't be the only one fighting.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: Leave someone who hates you as much as you hate yourself.
quotes.author: Michael J. Bennett

quotes.quote: Relationships are like money, Hard to earn and easy to lose.
quotes.author: skumarsinha

quotes.quote: You should not have to rip yourself into pieces to keep others whole.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Not everyone who loves each other needs to be in a relationship. And not everyone who's in a relationship loves each other.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Anybody who does not value what you have does not deserve your relationship.
quotes.author: Matthew Ashimolowo

quotes.quote: The best way to remain in your relationship is to keep other people out of your relationship.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: When a relationship doesn't work anymore, it's terrible to stay with someone that you don't love.
quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

quotes.quote: You lose yourself trying to hold on to someone who doesn't care about losing you.
quotes.author: Tablo

quotes.quote: No partner in a love relationship... should feel that he has to give up an essential part of himself to make it viable.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Relationships based on obligation lack dignity.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: I'm not crying over what you said, it's what you didn't say that hurts the most.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: MOVING ON' sounds easy. But I died a thousand times in pain just to appreciate this phrase.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship's poison.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: You learn more about a person at the end of a relationship than at the beginning.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: So much sadness exists in the world that we are all under obligation to contribute as much joy as lies within our powers.
quotes.author: John Sutherland Bonnel

quotes.quote: Sadness usually results from one of the following causes either when a man does not succeed, or is ashamed of his success.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Sadness does not inhere in things; it does not reach us from the world and through mere contemplation of the world. It is a product of our own thought. We create it out of whole cloth.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: Sadness is a natural reaction to awakening to see the way things are. But we can either become lost in our sadness, or decide to use this awakening to inspire us to work to change things to the way we wish they could be.
quotes.author: Robert Alan Silverstein

quotes.quote: Sadness is a visitor who will enter your home without a key but you have the ability to kick it out when you're ready to.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sadness is a choice - sadness does not exist.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Sadness is nothing more than the absence of joyin the same way that darknessis nothing more than the absence of light.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: The word happiness would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Good humor is the health of the soul,sadness is its poison.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Remember sadness is always temporary. This, too, shall pass.
quotes.author: Chuck T. Falcon

quotes.quote: You cannot prevent the birds of sadness from passing over your head, but you can prevent their making a nest in your hair.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: So much sadness exists in the world that we are all under obligation to contribute as much joy as lies within our powers.
quotes.author: John Sutherland Bonnell

quotes.quote: Sadness gives depth. Happiness gives height. Sadness gives roots. Happiness gives branches. Happiness is like a tree going into the sky, and sadness is like the roots going down into the womb of the earth. Both are needed, and the higher a tree goes, the deeper it goes, simultaneously. The bigger the tree, the bigger will be its roots. In fact, it is always in proportion. That's its balance.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Sadness may be part of life but there is no need to let it dominate your entire life.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Sadness flowers to the next renewing joy.
quotes.author: Jareb Teague

quotes.quote: Sadness is a valuable treasure only discovered in people you love.
quotes.author: Malagasy Proverb

quotes.quote: The best thing for being sad is to learn something.
quotes.author: Theodore White

quotes.quote: By the same token, we can experience joy because we have known sadness.
quotes.author: David Weatherford

quotes.quote: The walls we build around us to keep out the sadness also keep out the joy.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: I do believe that if you haven't learnt about sadness, you cannot appreciate happiness.
quotes.author: Nana Mouskouri

quotes.quote: Sadness does not come from bad circumstances. It comes from bad thoughts.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No society has been able to abolish human sadness, no political system can deliver us from the pain of living, from our fear of death, our thirst for the absolute. It is the human condition that directs the social condition, not vice versa.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: One must not let oneself be overwhelmed by sadness.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.quote: Sorrow is better than laughter: for by the sadness of the countenance the heart is made better.
quotes.author: Ecclesiastes, 7:3.

quotes.quote: Sadness flies on the wings of the morning and out of the heart of darkness comes the light.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Every human walks around with a certain kind of sadness. They may not wear it on their sleeves, but it's there if you look deep.
quotes.author: Taraji P. Henson

quotes.quote: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

quotes.quote: When sadness comes, accept it. Listen to its song. It has something to give to you. It has a gift which no happiness can give to you, only sadness can give it.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: There is something beautiful in reveling in sadness. The proof is how beautiful sad songs can be. I don't think being sad is to be avoided. It's apathy and boredom you want to avoid. But feeling anything is good, I think.
quotes.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quotes.quote: Without a safe haven, one of the most authentic parts of who you are, who you love, felt invisible to the world.
quotes.author: Matt Bomer

quotes.quote: This world can seem marvellously convincing until death collapses the illusion and evicts us from our hiding place. What will happen to us then if we have no clue of any deeper reality?
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: The fear of God is safe haven.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Many experts are concerned that the parents who need safe havens the most are the least likely to use them.
quotes.author: Wil S. Hylton

quotes.quote: The wall, safe haven for what is forbidden, gives a voice to all those who would, without it, be condemned to silence.
quotes.author: Brassai

quotes.quote: With care and protection, with safe havens in the ocean, there is still a good chance that we can turn things around.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: We're in a pretty tumultuous world, and there's a lot of uncertainty. Treasurys are where people go as one of the few safe havens in the world.
quotes.author: Gary Shilling

quotes.quote: Happiness is the greatest hiding place for despair.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best hiding place is the one that's in plain sight.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: To share a hiding place, physical or psychological, is as intimate as love.
quotes.author: Anne Michaels

quotes.quote: Your real secret hiding place is not a dark cave, it is not a dusky forest, it is not a desolate house in the middle of nowhere but your real secret hiding place is always your own mind! Every person ultimately hides himself over there, in his own mind!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Nature is the hiding place of the sensitive souls and the elevated minds!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: God is our great helper, shelter, provider and protector.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: In a storm there is no shelter like the wings of God.
quotes.author: Thomas Brooks

quotes.quote: Home is a shelter from storms - all sorts of storms.
quotes.author: William Bennett

quotes.quote: It is in the shelter of each other that the people live.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Everyone, rich or poor, deserves a shelter for the soul.
quotes.author: Samuel Mockbee

quotes.quote: Earth is the insane asylum of the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: For a goalkeeper, there is no hiding place.
quotes.author: Brad Friedel

quotes.quote: Hiding places there are innumerable, escape is only one, but possibilities of escape, again, are as many as hiding places.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: The battle is lost or won in the secret places of the will before God, never first in the external world.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: There were days when you peered into yourself, into the secret places of your heart, and what you saw there made you faint with horror. And then, next day, you didn't know what to make of it,you couldn't interpret the horror you had glimpsed the day before. Yes, you know what evil costs.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The human heart finds nowhere shelter but in human kind.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: For safety is not a gadget but a state of mind.
quotes.author: Eleanor Everet

quotes.quote: The dangers of life are infinite, and among them is safety.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: Safety is something that happens between your ears, not something you hold in your hands.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: There is always safety in valor.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.quote: Precaution is better than cure.
quotes.author: Edward Coke

quotes.quote: Safety's just danger, out of place.
quotes.author: Harry Connick

quotes.quote: Better a thousand times careful than once dead.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: We must respect the past and mistrust the present if we wish to provide for the safety of the future.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: The desire for safety stands against every great and noble enterprise.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Safety is a common denominator across all aspects of life, hence knowledge should always be shared. It is not a matter for industry it is a matter for humanity.
quotes.author: Doug Bourne

quotes.quote: There's an old saying that if you think safety is expensive, try an accident. Accidents cost a lot of money. And, not only in damage to plant and in claims for injury, but also in the loss of the company's reputation.
quotes.author: Dr Trevor Kletz

quotes.quote: Our insignificance is often the cause of our safety.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Safety from external danger is the most powerful director of national conduct.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: A lot of the people who keep a gun at home for safety are the same ones who refuse to wear a seat belt.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: One could not always put safety up front as the prime goal. Do that, and who would ever achieve anything of note?
quotes.author: Jack Mcdevitt

quotes.quote: Working safely is like breathing - if you don't, you die.
quotes.author: Jerry Smith

quotes.quote: The safety and happiness of society are the objects at which all political institutions aim, and to which all such institutions must be sacrificed.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Insisting on perfect safety is for people who don't have the balls to live in the real world.
quotes.author: Mary Shafer

quotes.quote: Choosing safety is a choice of life over career.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: Out of this nettle, danger, we pluck this flower, safety.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Who can hope to be safe' who sufficiently cautious'Guard himself as he may, every moment's an ambush.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: He that's secure is not safe
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is never safe to look into the future with eyes of fear.
quotes.author: Edward H. Harriman

quotes.quote: One can go back toward safety or forward toward growth.
quotes.author: Abraham H. Maslow

quotes.quote: Safety is from God alone.
quotes.author: Motto

quotes.quote: Safety First is Safety Always.
quotes.author: Charles M. Hayes

quotes.quote: Government's first duty and highest obligation is public safety.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: It is better to be safe than sorry.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: The best safety lies in fear.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The career of a sage is of two kinds: He is either honored by all in the world, Like a flower waving its head, Or else he disappears into the silent forest.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The Sage expects no recognition for what he does; he achieves merit but does not take it to himself; he does not wish to display his worth.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage does not hoard. The more he helps others, the more he benefits himself, The more he gives to others, the more he gets himself. The Way of Heaven does one good but never does one harm. The Way of the sage is to act but not to compete.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The sage belongs to the same obsolete repertory as the virtuous maiden and the enlightened monarch.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: A sage is the instructor of a hundred ages.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A sage steers by the bright light of confusion and doubt.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: The sage has one advantage: he is immortal. If this is not his century, many others will be.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: The sage never seems to know his own merits, for only by not noticing them can you call others' attention to them.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: If the sage wants to stand above people, he must speak to them from below. If he wants to lead people, he must follow them from behind.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The Way of the Sage is to act but not to compete.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: To paraphrase several sages: Nobody can think and hit someone at the same time.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: If the way of the sage is true, that we are all dreaming our world into being, then it has to apply not only to our private, personal universe but to the world at large.
quotes.author: Alberto Villoldo

quotes.quote: The Sage has no thinking mind and therefore there are no ‘others’ for him.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: The Sage expects no recognition for what he does; he achieves merit but does not take it to himself; he does not wish to display his worth.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The Sage embraces similarity of understanding and pays no regard to similarity of form. The world in general is attracted by similarity of form, but remains indifferent to similarity of understanding.
quotes.author: Lie Yukou

quotes.quote: The sage governs by emptying senses and filling bellies.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage's Way is to act and not to contend.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage knows without traveling, perceives without looking, completes without acting.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage never strives for greatness, and can therefore accomplish greatness.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage does not attempt anything very big, and thus achieves greatness.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage attends to the belly, and not to what he sees.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage is one with the world, and lives in harmony with it.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage has no concern for himself, but makes the concerns of others his own.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage knows himself, but does not parade. He cherishes himself, but does not praise himself.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage says that all that is under heaven incurs the same law and the same fate.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The sage does not act and therefore does not fail, does not seize and therefore does not lose.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage desires no desire, does not value rare treasures, learns without learning, recovers what people have left behind.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The true sage is not he who sees, but he who, seeing the furthest, has the deepest love for mankind.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: The sage acts without taking credit. He accomplishes without dwelling on it. He does not want to display his worth.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The sage is sharp but does not cut, pointed but does not pierce, forthright but does not offend, bright but does not dazzle.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Sagittarius have smiles that can brighten any room and will always try to make you feel like you belong.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: As forgiving as they are, Sagittarius doesn't mind distancing themselves from people, so don't test them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: They can be the sweetest person until you piss them off.
quotes.author: Freeda Gillbert

quotes.quote: Sagittarians are aliens disguised as humans
quotes.author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quotes.quote: A Sagittarius hardly holds grudges. If you ask one about it, he or she will tell you it's old news. They've already moved on.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sagittarius have a heart of gold and will have no problem settling down with someone who can keep up with them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A Sagittarius can read people easily, so there's no hiding your feelings from them.
quotes.author: Yolanda

quotes.quote: Count on a Sagittarius to help discover a whole new meaning to life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: They know life is too short to be sweating the petty stuff.
quotes.author: Freeda Gillbert

quotes.quote: Sagittarius are not hot tempered, but when they are, keep your distance.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A Sagittarius can say things to you so bluntly, you won't know if you should be upset or love their honesty.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'm a Sagittarius, and one of our major qualities is that we're blindly optimistic.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: I don't believe in astrology; I'm a Sagittarius and we're skeptical.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: A Sagittarius is that one person you can always act like a fool with and take a long drive nowhere with to escape everyday life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A Sagittarius can look emotionally distant. But in reality, he or she has a big heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing about a Sagittarius-born is boring. They know how to get the party started.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: As a Sagittarius, you don't have time for people who play mind games because you have better things to do with your time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: While a Sagittarian tends to be candid, there's also a part of them that could be described as being more devious than Pisces, more deceptive than Gemini and more carnal than Scorpio.
quotes.author: Rosemary Breen

quotes.quote: Sagittarians have smiles that can brighten any room and will always try to make you feel like you belong.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sagittarius will give you the world if you wanted it. When they fall for someone it's the real deal.
quotes.author: Freeda Gillbert

quotes.quote: If you see a guy with a big grin from one ear to the other, winking in a mischievous way and who still looks like a college kid even though his hair is turning grey, then you've probably run into a Sagittarius man.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvald

quotes.quote: Sagittarius is the juvenile of the Zodiac and at times his behavior can be quite juvenile, no matter what age.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvald

quotes.quote: The Sagittarius man is debonair, footloose and often accused of being a playboy.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvald

quotes.quote: Mr Sagittarius likes to postpone for as long as possible.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvald

quotes.quote: Sagittarians are not normally sentimental, however, they can get really attached to a favorite sweater that has seen better days.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvald

quotes.quote: Average Sagittarius is more interested in contentment and joy than in material gain.
quotes.author: Margarete Beim

quotes.quote: When Sagittarius does get hooked on a venture, he or she is often willing to take risks to secure a profit.
quotes.author: Margarete Beim

quotes.quote: Not all Sagittarius are very interested in home life.
quotes.author: Margarete Beim

quotes.quote: People born under the Sagittarius sign are not keen on luxuries and other displays of wealth.
quotes.author: Margarete Beim

quotes.quote: Even when they settle down, Sagittarius men and women like to keep a small corner of their life just for themselves.
quotes.author: Margarete Beim

quotes.quote: If you live a life of make-believe, your life isn't worth anything until you do something that does challenge your reality. And to me, sailing the open ocean is a real challenge, because it's life or death.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: Sailing a boat calls for quick action, a blending of feeling with the wind and water as well as with the very heart and soul of the boat itself. Sailing teaches alertness and courage, and gives in return a joyousness and peace that but few sports afford.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: Sailing - The fine art of slowly going nowhere at great expense while being cold, wet and miserable.
quotes.author: Irv Heller

quotes.quote: For the most part, a sailboat navigates through its world of wind and water not leaving a single trace of its passage. Nothing is consumed. Nothing is altered. The winds and the water are left in exactly the same condition for the next user. Sailing is forever.
quotes.author: Michael B. McPhee

quotes.quote: The sail, the play of its pulse so like our own lives: so thin and yet so full of life, so noiseless when it labors hardest, so noisy and impatient when least effective.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A man can pretend to be a lot of things in this world; but he can only pretend to be a sailor for as long as it takes to clear the harbour mouth!
quotes.author: Bernard Hayman

quotes.quote: To reach a port we must sail, sometimes with the wind, and sometimes against it. But we must not drift or lie at anchor.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is not the ship so much as the skillful sailing that assures the prosperous voyage.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: Only two sailors, in my experience, never ran aground. One never left port and the other was an atrocious liar.
quotes.author: Don Bamford

quotes.quote: He who goes to sea for pleasure would go to hell to pass the time!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's scary to have a 30 foot wave chasing you. If you are steering, you don't look back. The crew looks back for you, and you watch their faces. When they look straight up, then get ready!
quotes.author: Magnus Olsson

quotes.quote: Wonders are many, and none is more wonderful than the power that crosses the white sea, driven by the stormy wind, making a path under surges that threaten to engulf him
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Success soon palls. The joyous time is when the breeze first strikes your sails, and the waters rustle under your bows.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now, you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than those you did. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from safe harbor. Catch the wind in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A bad day sailing is 100 times better than a good day at work
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The questions that used to bother me at times, do not weigh anything before the immensity of a wake so close to the sky and filled with the wind of the sea
quotes.author: Bernard Moitessier

quotes.quote: There is a rule in sailing where the more maneuverable ship should give way to the less maneuverable craft. I think this is sometimes a good rule to follow in human relationships as well.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: On life's vast ocean diversely we sail. Reasons the card, but passion the gale.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: On a day when the wind is perfect, the sail just needs to open and the world is full of beauty.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Tis the set of the sail that decides the goal, and not the storm of life.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: We are tied to the ocean. And when we go back to the sea, whether it is to sail or to watch, we are going back from whence we came.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Less judgment than wit is more sail than ballast.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails.
quotes.author: Bertha Calloway

quotes.quote: He that will not sail till all dangers are over must never put to sea.
quotes.author: Dr. Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Hoist up sail while gale doth last, Tide and wind stay no man's pleasure
quotes.author: Robert Southwell

quotes.quote: I'd like to be a sailor - a sailor bold and bluff, Calling out, 'Ship ahoy!' in manly tones and gruff. I'd learn to box the compass, and to reef and tack and luff; I'd sniff and sniff the briny breeze and never get enough. Perhaps I'd chew tobacco, or an old black pipe I'd puff, But I wouldn't be a sailor if The sea was very rough.
quotes.author: C J Dennis

quotes.quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Any fool can carry on, but a wise man knows how to shorten sail in time.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Sailing requires the management of all the systems on the boat, plus all the controls on the boat, while assessing the weather and navigation. It's planning everything to a fine level of detail and making the required adjustments all at the same time things are changing
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cleopatra, kidded by Charmian about her old love for Julius Cesar, joked that those were her salad days, when she was 'green in judgement, cold in blood.'
quotes.author: Robert Hendrickson

quotes.quote: Hair...coarse and slightly wavy, with just a trace of oil all over it, like a well-tossed salad.
quotes.author: Ronald Dahl

quotes.quote: A woman is like a salad; much depends on the dressing.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: The embarrassing thing is that the salad dressing is out-grossing my films.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: A woman should never be seen eating or drinking, unless it be lobster salad and champagne, the only true feminine and becoming viands.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: There are three things a woman can make out of almost anything— a salad, a hat, and a quarrel.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: It takes more oil than vinegar to make a good salad.
quotes.author: Jean Pierre Camus

quotes.quote: There's no lettuce in a true Greek salad; it's a mix of vegetables based around large, juicy tomato wedges.
quotes.author: Sonja Overhiser

quotes.quote: The essence of a good salad is simplicity. Clean, bright flavors that, when brought together, bring out the best in one another.
quotes.author: Chuck Williams

quotes.quote: Herbs are appreciated for the complex flavor and refreshing taste they bring to a salad.
quotes.author: Chuck Williams

quotes.quote: Your hands are the best tool for dressing salad greens— tongs or other tools bruise delicate greens and make it difficult to dress them evenly.
quotes.author: Tasha DeSerio

quotes.quote: Making salads is an art. A delicious, healthy art.
quotes.author: Tasha DeSerio

quotes.quote: When schedules are tight and mealtime becomes a rushed affair, salads are often the first thing dropped from the menu, and that's a shame because a salad adds nutrition, texture, color, and taste to even the simplest of meals.
quotes.author: Jean Pare

quotes.quote: A salad at dinner is a necessity, almost a passion with some people; the craving for it may be compared to that of an inveterate smoker for his pipe, of english women for tea, and the Chinese for opium.
quotes.author: Alfred Suzanne

quotes.quote: Salad required so much care in order to retain the essential properties of the plants that they should not be touched except by the delicate fingers of a young girl.
quotes.author: J.J. Rousseau

quotes.quote: A salad is only as good as the ingredients used to crate it.
quotes.author: Pam Powell

quotes.quote: The joy of a salad is that it can be made up from almost anything and it will always provide you with a healthy, colorful, and fun food experience.
quotes.author: Harry Eastwood

quotes.quote: Apart from being delicious, salads are also a way of looking at leaves and vegetables in a fresh, new light.
quotes.author: Harry Eastwood

quotes.quote: To my delight, I have found that eating a salad a day has opened up a world of lunches and dinners that are decadent and satisfying— and usually knocked up in twenty minutes.
quotes.author: Harry Eastwood

quotes.quote: The soul of a great salad lies in the freshness of its ingredients, the imagination with which it comes together, and the vibrancy of the colours, textures, and tastes on your plate.
quotes.author: Harry Eastwood

quotes.quote: Salad 'freshens without enfeebling and fortifies without irritating.'
quotes.author: Jean-Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Bread is the king of the table and all else is merely the court that surrounds the king. The countries are the soup, the meat, the vegetables, the salad but bread is king.
quotes.author: Louis Bromfield

quotes.quote: To remember a successful salad is generally to remember a successful dinner; at all events, the perfect dinner necessarily includes the perfect salad.
quotes.author: George Ellwanger

quotes.quote: It's like a jar of salad dressing sitting on a shelf... most of the seasoning settles to the bottom of the bottle. But when you shake that bottle up, all the ingredients mix together and then the dressing can add flavor to a salad. In the same way, we can stir ourselves up and regain the reverence, respect and awe we once had for the Lord.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: One of the benefits of eating salad is that you can eat tons of it and never be satisfied.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: A well-made salad must have a certain uniformity; it should make perfect sense for those ingredients to share a bowl.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.quote: Knowledge is knowing a tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
quotes.author: Miles Kington

quotes.quote: Many people eat salad dutifully because they feel it is good for them, but more enlightened types eat it happily because it is good.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit. Wisdom is knowing not to put it in a fruit salad.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.quote: What garlic is to salad, insanity is to art.
quotes.author: Augustus Saint-Gaudens

quotes.quote: Salary negotiations shouldn't be limited to just salary. Salary pays your mortgage, but terms build your career.
quotes.author: Christopher Voss

quotes.quote: Salary stories are intrusive. Do you ask your neighbour what they earn for their job?
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: The salary of the chief executive of a large corporation is not a market award for achievement. It is frequently in the nature of a warm personal gesture by the individual to himself.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: It's not your salary that makes you rich, it's your spending habits.
quotes.author: Charles Jaffe

quotes.quote: Try to save something while your salary is small; it's impossible to save after you begin to earn more.
quotes.author: Jack Benny

quotes.quote: A salary does not make a person rich, but only gives him the opportunity to take care of hisneeds. It is not a means of becoming wealthy. It is a means of fulfilling our potential.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The only way to make real wealth is to get rid of your salary. In a salary, by definition, you are creating wealth for others, and you are creating a chain and handcuffs for yourself.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: The reason that man is seldom satisfied with his salary is that when it increases, he increases his expenses.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: To work for salary is to mortgage your life.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Salary is the price you pay to compromise on your dreams.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: A salary is a tax employers pay, every four weeks, for putting an employee’s dream on hold.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Paying good wages is not charity at all-it is the best kind of business.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Wages are determined by the bitter struggle between capitalist and worker.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: The best of wages will not compensate for excessively long working hours which undermine heath.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: Wages cannot be considered as a gift, because they are due to work, but God has given free grace to all men by the justification of faith.
quotes.author: Hilary of Poitiers

quotes.quote: A day’s pay for a day’s work is more than adequate when both the work and the pay are appreciated as much as they are expected.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: Money and salary is not a particularly good motivator in the long term.
quotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

quotes.quote: It is my belief that one's salary is between an individual and the IRS.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: Salary matters shouldn't be told to everyone. It's a matter of respect for my teammates.
quotes.author: Carlos Tevez

quotes.quote: Anybody who makes an outlandish salary obviously attracts attention.
quotes.author: Jerry Buss

quotes.quote: The three most harmful addictions are heroin, carbohydrates, and a monthly salary.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Obscene salaries send the wrong message through a company.
quotes.author: James Sinegal

quotes.quote: Salaries and wages must reflect the reality of the enterprise's economic performance; deviations from the planned performance should be reflected in pay.
quotes.author: Samora Machel

quotes.quote: Salary is no object: I want only enough to keep body and soul apart.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: The fact that somebody is reducing your salary is just telling me they're not satisfied with what you're doing.
quotes.author: Joe Torre

quotes.quote: The first commitment is raise your salary. One of the ways to raise your salary sometimes is to have short-term profits but there are many other ways.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Job and salary is the greatest slavery you can ever set upon yourself.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: It stands to reason: Higher wages means higher loyalty and morale, which means higher productivity, which means a more profitable business.
quotes.author: Tom Perez

quotes.quote: You pay more in wages, get more in in tax, you get people living a higher standard, you get more money. It's a kind of circle.
quotes.author: Jeremy Corbyn

quotes.quote: Paying good wages is not in opposition to good productivity.
quotes.author: James Sinegal

quotes.quote: By 1892, enlightenment had progressed to the point where the Salem trials were simply an embarrassing blot on the history of New England. They were a part of the past that was best forgotten: a reminder of how far the human race had come in two centuries.
quotes.author: Edmund Morgan

quotes.quote: Salem has become this ... Mecca for Wiccans, but no witches died here. Aside from Tituba, no one practiced anything like witchcraft near here in colonial times. It was a bunch of bored Puritans who thought killing their neighbors at the behest of teenage girls was a fine, Christian form of entertainment and land acquisition.
quotes.author: Thomm Quackenbush

quotes.quote: When a small group of people come together to relive the Salem witch hunts, God cries. For if anything is sorrowful to God, it is evil done in his name. When you find out you were not given the truth, how will you live with yourself?
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Salem is in part a story of what happens when a set of unanswerable questions meets a set of unquestioned answers.
quotes.author: Stacy Schiff

quotes.quote: Salem houses present to you a serene and dignified front, gracious yet reserved, not thrusting forward their choicest treasures to the eyes of passing strangers; but behind the walls of the houses, enclosed from public view, lie cherished gardens, full of the beauty of life.
quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

quotes.quote: Though our own hearts break, we cannot flinch; these are new times, sir. There is a misty plot afoot so subtle we should be criminal to cling to old respect and ancient friendships. I have seen too many frightful proofs in court the Devil is alive in Salem, and we dare not quail to follow wherever the accusing finger points!
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: We are what we always were in Salem, but now the little crazy children are jangling the keys of the kingdom, and common vengeance writes the law!
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: I think if I had lived back in Salem, I would have been burned at the stake.
quotes.author: Rose McGowan

quotes.quote: To me there is nothing more fraught with mystery & terror than a remote Massachusetts farmhouse against a lonely hill. Where else could an outbreak like the Salem witchcraft have occurred?
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: With its brutal excesses and reliance on snitches and finks as informants, I don't think it's far off-kilter to describe the modern-day drug war as oddly similar to the Salem witch trials.
quotes.author: Joel Miller

quotes.quote: In the Salem of our peaceful hearts, the name of Jesus is great beyond compare, he has won our love, and He shall wear it.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: If she'd been born at the right time they would have burned her over in Salem.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: There are freaky talking mannequins in the Salem Witch Museum that recite the Lord's Prayer and while they do resemble shrunken apples they nevertheless help the visitor understand how hard it must have been for the condemned to say the line about forgiving those who trespass against us.
quotes.author: Sarah Vowell

quotes.quote: Sales professional is a profession deals with people, it's a people business not a selling job.
quotes.author: Sivaprakash Sidhu

quotes.quote: Numbers of sales do not correspond to numbers of readers.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: The best sales questions have your expertise wrapped into them.
quotes.author: Jill Konrath

quotes.quote: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman, not the attitude of the prospect.
quotes.author: William Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Selling is a person-to-person business. You cannot send the sales manual out to make the sale. Sales manuals have no legs and no voice.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Great sales people are relationship builders who provide value and help their customers win.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Keep your sales pipeline full by prospecting continuously. Always have more people to see than you have time to see them.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: There's no lotion or potion that will make sales faster and easier for you- unless your potion is hard work.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Sales is not about selling anymore, but about building trust and educating.
quotes.author: Siva Devaki

quotes.quote: In the sales profession, the real work begins after the sale is made.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Most people think â€˜selling' is the same as â€˜talking'. But the most effective salespeople know that listening is the most important part of their job.
quotes.author: Roy Bartell

quotes.quote: Sales is this cure all for this problem. Get people to give you their credit card and I guarantee you they're actually interested.
quotes.author: Emmett Shear

quotes.quote: If you are not moving closer to what you want in sales , you probably aren't doing enough asking.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: To succeed in sales, simply talk to lots of people every day. And here's what's exciting: There are lots of people!
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Best way to sell something; don't sell anything. Earn the awareness, respect, and trust of those who might buy.
quotes.author: Rand Fishkin

quotes.quote: A salesperson's ethics and values contribute more to sales success than do techniques or strategies.
quotes.author: Ron Willingham

quotes.quote: Positive, optimistic sales people sell more than pessimistic sales people.
quotes.author: Martin Seligman

quotes.quote: In sales, a referral is the key to the door of resistance.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Sales success comes after you stretch yourself past your limits on a daily dasis.
quotes.author: Omar Periu

quotes.quote: A smart salesperson listens to emotions not fact.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The salesman knows nothing of what he is selling save that he is charging a great deal too much for it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Everything in life is a sale and everything you want is a commision.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sales is a business of relationships, and you must cultivate customers with tenderness and love, like cabbages in winter, even if the customer is an egomaniacal asshole you want to hit with a shovel.
quotes.author: Max Barry

quotes.quote: Sales may lead to advertising as much as advertising leads to sale.
quotes.author: Michael Schudson

quotes.quote: Ninety percent of selling is conviction and 10 percent is persuasion.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: Sales is an outcome, not a goal. It's a function of doing numerous things right, starting from the moment you target a potential prospect until you finalize the deal.
quotes.author: Jill Konrath

quotes.quote: Selling is really about having conversations with people and helping improve their company or their life. If you look at it like that, selling is a very admirable thing to do.
quotes.author: Lori Richardson

quotes.quote: The key to mastering any kind of sales is switching statements about you â€“ how great you are, and what you do â€“ to statements about them.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: In sales, it's not what you say; it's how they perceive what you say
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Sales don't always have anything to do with good or brilliant or original. Sales are about appeal.
quotes.author: M. J. Rose

quotes.quote: For every sale you miss because you're too enthusiastic, you will miss a hundred because you're not enthusiastic enough.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: To succeed in sales, simply talk to lots of people every day. And here's what's exciting- there are lots of people!
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Keep asking until you find the answers. In sales, there are usually four or five no's to before you get a yes.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: The best salespeople know that their expertise can become their enemy in selling. At the moment they are tempted to tell the buyer what â€˜he needs to do,' they instead offer a story about a peer of the buyer.
quotes.author: Mike Bosworth

quotes.quote: Statistics suggest that when customers complain, business owners and managers ought to get excited about it. The complaining customer represents a huge opportunity for more business.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Approach each customer with the idea of helping him or her to solve a problem or achieve a goal, not of selling a product or service.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: In sales, it's not what you say; it's how they perceive what you say.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Become the person who would attract the results you seek.
quotes.author: Jim Cathcar

quotes.quote: Keep Yourself Positive, Cheerful And Goal-Oriented. Sales Success Is 80% Attitude And Only 20% Aptitude.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: In the modern world of business, it is useless to be a creative, original thinker unless you can also sell what you create.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Merely satisfying customers will not be enough to earn their loyalty. Instead, they must experience exceptional service worthy of their repeat business and referral. Understand the factors that drive this customer revolution.
quotes.author: Rick Tate

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Success is the culmination of failures, mistakes, false starts, confusion, and the determination to keep going anyway.
quotes.author: Nick Gleason

quotes.quote: You don't close a sale, you open a relationship if you want to build a long-term, successful enterprise.
quotes.author: Patricia Fripp

quotes.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
quotes.author: Napolean Hill

quotes.quote: Most people think â€˜selling' is the same as â€˜talking'. But the most effective salespeople know that listening is the most important part of their job.
quotes.author: Roy Bartell

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: A smart salesperson listens to emotions not facts.
quotes.author: nominally

quotes.quote: There's no lotion or potion that will make sales faster and easier for you unless your potion is hard work.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: You don't need a big close as many sales Reps believe. you risk losing your customer when you save all the good stuff for the end. Keep the customer actively involved throughout your presentation, And watch your results improve.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: It's not about having the right opportunities. It's about handling the opportunities right.
quotes.author: Mark Hunter

quotes.quote: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman, not the attitude of the prospect.
quotes.author: William Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: 90 percent of selling is conviction and 10 percent is persuasion.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: Sales is not about selling anymore but building trust and educating.
quotes.author: Siva Devaki

quotes.quote: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody's going to know whether you did it or not.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Every sales manager knows they need a solid plan, the right people, and a pipeline to be successful. But successful sales managers learn to balance the three.
quotes.author: Whit Gaither

quotes.quote: Keep your sales pipeline full by prospecting continuously. Always have more people to see than you have time to see them.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Life is more beautiful when you meet the right hair dresser.
quotes.author: Peter Coppola

quotes.quote: To sculpt a head of hair with scissors is an art form. It’s in pursuit of art.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: As stylists we’re ground shakers and and day makers. Setting trends, while fostering that inner connection between a person’s inner and outer self.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gregory

quotes.quote: To me, beauty and makeup and color is like the finishing touch on everything.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Hairdressers are wonderful breed. You work one on one with another human being, and the object it to make them feel so much better, and to look at themselves with a twinkle in their eye.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: I think the most important thing a woman can have – next to her talent, of course, – is her hairdresser.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: Hair that slays starts at the salon.
quotes.author: Redken

quotes.quote: For me, the working of hair is architecture with a human element.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Salon's enough for her / Not to feel so insecure / Ma ma ma manicure / She wanna be take care'n of
quotes.author: Stefanin Germonotta

quotes.quote: So I work in that same beauty salon / I'm chained to the old masquerade / The lipstick, the shadow, the silicone / I follow my father's trade
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: The neighborhood salon is the place I am working for the moment / As I cut their hair, ladies talk and share / Every day, who's doin' who and why
quotes.author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

quotes.quote: Hey, go back to the salon! / What doesn't kill you / Only makes you blonder
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.quote: See, hit the salon get a mani and a pedi / Have a massage, get a sip and then I'm ready / Gotta take time out / And my real ladies know what I'm talking about
quotes.author: Briggs

quotes.quote: You getting ready so I know we gon' be here awhile / In the bathroom flat irons and nail files / Spending hours in salons on your hairstyles
quotes.author: Matthew Samuels

quotes.quote: In and out the hair salon, she got her nail polished / Turn up in tennis shoes, turn up in red bottoms / She turn up in red bottoms, turn up, turn up in red bottoms
quotes.author: Tauheed Epps

quotes.quote: When your girl leave me she need a hair salon / Hair weave killer goin' on a trapathon
quotes.author: Sean Combs

quotes.quote: When the hats are crammed down and a fox is away. / You will find him no centre of salon or crush, / No letters attached to his name may he sign, / But there's no one so eager to handle the Brush
quotes.author: William Henry Ogilvie

quotes.quote: The salon industry is slow to acknowledge the huge role technology plays in hair care and styling.
quotes.author: Ladosha Wright

quotes.quote: Hair remains enigma to many. Everybody does not want to go to hair salon. And hair salons are not for everybody.
quotes.author: Ladosha Wright

quotes.quote: Hair salons are options for hair care and hair styles.
quotes.author: Ladosha Wright

quotes.quote: Salon use is varied. It varies according to the client and her biographical specificity, and with the types and volume of treatments accessed.
quotes.author: Paula Black

quotes.quote: The general feeling was that men did not understand the benefits of beauty salon treatments or the efforts that went into maintaining a feminine appearance.
quotes.author: Paula Black

quotes.quote: The type of work on a health farm is similar to that of a beauty salon, but the hours can be much longer and there is more emphasis on body treatments and weight reduction.
quotes.author: Susan Cressy

quotes.quote: In a salon, hair stylists can take time to make sure customers are satisfied with the results of their work.
quotes.author: Margaret McAlpine

quotes.quote: Arguing along these lines, Weitz (2005:176) claims that the beauty salon is a female space that offers the sense of being in a community.
quotes.author: Rachel Heinrichsmeier

quotes.quote: For older women in particular, who may be more likely to live alone than older men, relationships in the salon.
quotes.author: Rachel Heinrichsmeier

quotes.quote: So hair salon is a place where more than just appearance is attended to.
quotes.author: Rachel Heinrichsmeier

quotes.quote: The hair salon may be a place of laughter, intimacy and trouble-telling; it's a place where older appearances may be repaired - but it's also a place where appropriate older styles may be enforced.
quotes.author: Rachel Heinrichsmeier

quotes.quote: So no matter what the state of the economy and the world we live in, it's till a good time to start a hair salon ad day spa, and the prospects for 'shear' success and excellent.
