quotes.author: The Staff of Entrepreneur Media

quotes.quote: No doubt as a result of their driving desire for a youthful appearance, the hair color segment of the salon industry continues to grow.
quotes.author: The Staff of Entrepreneur Media

quotes.quote: Earnestness is the salt of eloquence.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Disappointment is often the salt of life.
quotes.author: Theodore Parker

quotes.quote: Wit is the salt of conversation, not the food.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The salt of any interesting civilization is mixture.
quotes.author: Antonio Tabucchi

quotes.quote: Salt is born of the purest parents: the sun and the sea.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: The salt blowing off the sea makes the air feel textured and heavy.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Just like salt makes sweet taste sweeter, trials make happy feel happier.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Salt is like good-humor, and nearly every thing is better for a pinch of it.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Be salt, and a little bit of salt keeps the whole society from going rancid.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: Salt is the difference between eating in Technicolor and eating in black and white.
quotes.author: Jay Rayner

quotes.quote: There must be something strangely sacred in salt. It is in our tears and in the sea.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Nobody likes having salt rubbed into their wounds, even if it is the salt of the earth.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: The arts are the salt of the earth; as salt relates to food, the arts relate to technology.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: People don't enjoy salt. They enjoy what is salted. We are the salt of the earth. We do not exist for ourselves.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Salt seasons, purifies, preserves. But somebody ought to remind us that salt also irritates. Real living Christianity rubs this world the wrong way.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Salt is the policeman of taste: it keeps the various flavors of a dish in order and restrains the stronger from tyrannizing over the weaker.
quotes.author: Margaret Visser

quotes.quote: The fact that salt is a powerful emetic as well as a potent laxative should convince the most skeptical that it is not meant to form an important part of the human diet.
quotes.author: John H. Tobe

quotes.quote: Salt is the only product that changes cuisine. There's a big difference between food that has salt and food without it. If you don't believe that, ask people who can't eat salt.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: Salt is the only rock directly consumed by man. It corrodes but preserves, desiccates but is wrested from the water. ... It preserves things from corruption - even as it corrodes other things with its bite. A little of it fertilizes the land; a lot sterilizes it.
quotes.author: Margaret Visser

quotes.quote: The purpose of the salt in the steak is to do its work so quietly that it changes the nature of what it invades without calling attention to itself. Salt must get into something in order to have effect, where it indelibly stamps its own character upon what it invades.
quotes.author: George O. Wood

quotes.quote: I still have highs and lows, maybe I don't cry salty tears as much.
quotes.author: Sarah Silverman

quotes.quote: I try to be mindful of snacking, but salty chips sometimes sneak in.
quotes.author: Tamara Taylor

quotes.quote: The cure for anything is salt water: sweat, tears or the sea.
quotes.author: Karen Blixen

quotes.quote: Both are salty, one will give me carpal tunnel, I'll go with the fries.
quotes.author: Iliza Shlesinger

quotes.quote: Salty. I could just eat a mountain of bacon for breakfast; it's so delicious.
quotes.author: Willie Geist

quotes.quote: If you put butter and salt on it, it tastes like salty butter.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: “[N]obody likes having salt rubbed into their wounds, even if it is the salt of the earth.”
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: “You are the salt of the earth. But remember that salt is useful when in association, but useless in isolation.”
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: “Don't be a pepper on the eyes of people; Rather be the salt on their tongue and make a difference that influences their sense of belonging to the earth.”
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: “The laboratory evidence that carbohydrate-rich diets can cause the body to retain water and so raise blood pressure, just as salt consumption is supposed to do, dates back well over a century”
quotes.author: Gary Taubes

quotes.quote: Salt water is cleansing, be it sweat, the ocean, or tears.
quotes.author: Jennifer Nettles

quotes.quote: Salt is like good-humor, and nearly every thing is better for a pinch of it.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Be salt, and a little bit of salt keeps the whole society from going rancid.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: Salt is the policeman of taste: it keeps the various flavors of a dish in order and restrains the stronger from tyrannizing over the weaker.
quotes.author: Margaret Visser

quotes.quote: Nobody likes having salt rubbed into their wounds, even if it is the salt of the earth.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: There must be something strangely sacred in salt. It is in our tears and in the sea.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Let the salt of your tears be the spice of your success banquet.
quotes.author: Jesse Neo

quotes.quote: Oh salty sea, how much of your salt Is tears from Portugal?
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: The salt blowing off the sea makes the air feel textured and heavy.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Salt seasons, purifies, preserves. But somebody ought to remind us that salt also irritates. Real living Christianity rubs this world the wrong way.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Salt is wholly innutritious; it affords no nourishment to any structure or substance of the human body.
quotes.author: Sylvester Graham

quotes.quote: “If salt isn’t salty, it’s pointless.”
quotes.author: Jeremy Gove

quotes.quote: i miss my brother like the sea would miss salt if that were taken away.
quotes.author: Emma Cameron

quotes.quote: Each year, food companies use an amount of salt that is every bit as staggering as it sounds: 5 billion pounds.
quotes.author: Michael Moss

quotes.quote: In youth, you want someone to build a life with. After fifty, you just want someone who can handle salt.
quotes.author: Rodney Ross

quotes.quote: My desire swollen with hope Will float upon your salty tears
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Like a salty tear You are my aching wound Let me beg and love you and love you.
quotes.author: Saša Milivojev

quotes.quote: The gallows are trembling In the valley of the fallen In the salty tears With our putrescent sores We fall prey to the crows
quotes.author: Sasa Milivojev

quotes.quote: Her eyes shone as she munched with pleasure, relishing every piece of her salty treasure.
quotes.author: Sonia Walker

quotes.quote: it is the taste that enjoys you it is salty and bitter and less than fairly traded it cries in the boiling water before being dipped in butter and designed on a plate	it is the taste that enjoys you it is salty and bitter and less than fairly traded it cries in the boiling water before being dipped in butter and designed on a plate
quotes.author: Brenden Pettingill

quotes.quote: I salute all the nations of the Arab Spring and I salute the heroic people of Syria who are striving for freedom, democracy and reform.
quotes.author: Ismail Haniyeh

quotes.quote: How can we salute - encourage the American spirit? That means many different things to many different people.
quotes.author: Desiree Rogers

quotes.quote: If you can't get them to salute when they should salute and wear the clothes you tell them to wear, how are you going to get them to die for their country?
quotes.author: General George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Many have left their families to defend our freedom. We salute their bravery; we express our appreciation and support to their families. And we pray for their safe return.
quotes.author: Bob Taft

quotes.quote: No government on earth can make men, who have realized freedom in their hearts, salute against their will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I salute and thank all my opponents, from whom, I learned many things, without pushing and searching for that, even sitting at home.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Always give a word or sign of salute when meeting or passing a friend, or even a stranger, if in a lonely place.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.quote: We salute the rank not the man.
quotes.author: Richard Winters

quotes.quote: If God were only mighty, we would salute Him. But since he is Merciful and Mighty, we can approach Him.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Salute the past and give thanks for the lessons and experience it gave. Welcome the future and be ready for new challenges.
quotes.author: Andrew Guzaldo

quotes.quote: Life laughs at you when you are unhappy; Life smiles at you when you are happy; But life salutes you when you make others happy.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: You take it from me, we are losing the war because we can salute too well.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: By all means use some time to be alone, salute thyself, see what thy soul doth wear.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Be not forward, but friendly and courteous; the first to salute, hear and answer; and be not pensive when it is time to converse.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Flag up your courage high and your fears will salute it in humility. Your fears are like walls without foundations; they are afraid to go down and hence pretend to be strong! Exercise Courage!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Christians awake, salute the happy morn whereon the Saviour of the world was born.
quotes.author: John Byrom

quotes.quote: Most Christians salute the sovereignty of God but believe in the sovereignty of man.
quotes.author: R.C. Sproul

quotes.quote: Everybody's after a new morning. What do we have to run up and salute tomorrow?
quotes.author: Robert Stone

quotes.quote: I try not to be superstitious, but, you know, we never put any shoes on the table. That's totally against the law in our house. And I always salute when I see one magpie.
quotes.author: Neneh Cherry

quotes.quote: No one can be saved in virtue of what he can do. Everyone can be saved in virtue of what God can do.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: Salvation is not a reward for the righteous, it is a gift for the guilty.
quotes.author: Steve Lawson

quotes.quote: Every year, if not every day, we have to wager our salvation upon some prophecy based upon imperfect knowledge.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Salvation is a work of God to show His glory. That's why He's not going to let it fail.
quotes.author: Paul Washer

quotes.quote: Saving us is the greatest and most concrete demonstration of God's love, the definitive display of His grace throughout time and eternity.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: Salvation cannot come without revelation. Men of the present time testify of heaven and hell, and have never seen either; and I will say that no man knows these things without this.
quotes.author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

quotes.quote: The salvation of mankind lies only in making everything the concern of all.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: The salvation of this human world lies nowhere else than in the human heart, in the human power to reflect, in human meekness and human responsibility.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: Through salvation our past has been forgiven, our present is given meaning, and out future is secured.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Salvation has absolutely nothing to do with human merit and absolutely everything to do with divine mercy.
quotes.author: David Platt

quotes.quote: None of us can ever save himself; we are the instruments of one another's salvation, and only by the hope that we give to others do we lift ourselves out of the darkness into light.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Salvation is from our side a choice, from the divine side it is a seizing upon, an apprehending, a conquest by the Most High God. Our accepting and willing are reactions rather than actions. The right of determination must always remain with God.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: Saving faith and real converting grace will always produce some conformity to the image of Jesus.
quotes.author: J.C. Ryle

quotes.quote: Salvation was universally considered to be much more becoming in women than in men.
quotes.author: Marilynne Robinson

quotes.quote: Salvation cannot be bought with the currency of obedience; it is purchased by the blood of the Son of God.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: The first step in a person's salvation is knowledge of their sin.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: The salvation of the world lies in the human heart.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: Our salvation is in work, but let us also take delight in that work.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: Our salvation is in striving to achieve what we know we'll never achieve.
quotes.author: Ryszard Kapuscinski

quotes.quote: Human salvation lies in the hands of the creatively maladjusted.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Christ has accomplished your salvation. But He has not yet perfected your circumstances. Do not be confused in the two.
quotes.author: Kristen Heitzmann

quotes.quote: The savior who wants to turn men into angels is as much a hater of human nature as the totalitarian despot who wants to turn them into puppets.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Salvation is free, but discipleship costs everything we have.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The salvation of a single soul is more important than the production or preservation of all the epics and tragedies in the world.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: There is no salvation in becoming adapted to a world which is crazy.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: As long as Christ sits on the mediatorial throne every day is a good day and all days are days of salvation.
quotes.author: A.W Tozer

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the remission of sins. For it is by this that what has been lost, and was found, is saved from being lost again.
quotes.author: Augustine

quotes.quote: Salvation is the entire universe being brought back into harmony with its maker.
quotes.author: Rob Bell

quotes.quote: Not that our salvation should be the effect of our work, but our work should be the evidence of our salvation.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Sword and mind must be united. Technique by itself is insufficient, and spirit alone is not enough.
quotes.author: Yamada Jirokichi

quotes.quote: A samurai will use a toothpick even though he has not eaten. Inside the skin of a dog, outside the hide of a tiger.
quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.quote: The samurai is the first to suffer anxiety for human society, and he is the last to seek personal pleasure.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: A samurai chooses to serve a master and does it out of respect and love, not because they are forced. Service to them is not demeaning; service is an expression of their prowess and their pride; they serve because only they are strong enough to serve with such flawless perfection and such consummate ability. It is a source of pride to them.
quotes.author: Alexei Maxim Russell

quotes.quote: The way of the samurai is found in death. When it comes to either or, there is only the quick choice of death. It is not particularly difficult. Be determined and advance.
quotes.author: Nabeshima Naoshige

quotes.quote: Working on the samurai sword is very different because your body position has to be very still. It's a much quieter way of fighting.
quotes.author: Lucy Liu

quotes.quote: The true meaning of the samurai is one who serves and adheres to the power of love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: The samurai always has to rise and move on, because new challenges will come.
quotes.author: Lyoto Machida

quotes.quote: The sword has to be more than a simple weapon; it has to be an answer to life's questions.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: The sword was a very elegant weapon in the days of the samurai. You had honor and chivalry much like the knights, and yet it was a gruesome and horrific weapon.
quotes.author: Dustin Diamond

quotes.quote: A samurai should always be prepared for death whether his own or someone else's.
quotes.author: Stan Sakai

quotes.quote: As a samurai, I must strengthen my character; as a human being I must perfect my spirit.
quotes.author: Yamaoka Tesshu

quotes.quote: Being a samurai is all about selfless service and if the lord abuses the servant, it is no longer a situation of service; it becomes the situation of a victim. It is never acceptable for a samurai to be a victim. It is never acceptable to allow a lord to abuse you or rob you of your dignity. In such a situation, it is acceptable to walk away.
quotes.author: Alexei Maxim Russell

quotes.quote: A samurai was essentially a man of action.
quotes.author: Inazo Nitobe

quotes.quote: A samurai must remain calm at all times even in the face of danger.
quotes.author: Chris Bradford

quotes.quote: Samurai culture did exist really, for hundreds of years and the notion of people trying to create some sort of a moral code, the idea that there existed certain behaviors that could be celebrated and that could be operative in a life.
quotes.author: Edward Zwick

quotes.quote: Once the will is resolved, one's spirit is strengthened. Even a peasant's will is hard to deny, but a samurai of resolute will can sway ten thou­sand men.
quotes.author: Yoshida Shoin

quotes.quote: The increased influence of Zen Buddhism on the Samurai culture had a great hand in flourishing art forms. As the country has splintered into many inter-conflicting states, the demand of the warriors raised so was that of the Ninja warriors who were experts in unconventional warfare.
quotes.author: Sreechinth C.

quotes.quote: From a mere peasant, Toyotomi Hideyoshi rose to one of the three key men in restoring peace and unity in the country. Though was born out of the noble families of the traditional Samurai bloodline, his tactics and skills on and off the battlefield made him the ruler of major part of Japan.
quotes.author: Sreechinth C.

quotes.quote: Katana, the sword of Samurai too became an integral part of the warriors at that time. As the honor of the Samurai resided in his sword , the craftsmanship or making the perfect Katana grew as an art.
quotes.author: Sreechinth C.

quotes.quote: The word Samurai itself is a synonym as they are the great ferocious aristocratic warriors in the history of the country.
quotes.author: Sreechinth C.

quotes.quote: I look at the Samurai because they were the artists of their time. What i think struck me When I read Bushido is compassion. 'If there's no one there to help, go out and find someone to help.' That hit me, because I try to lead my life like that.
quotes.author: Tom Cruise

quotes.quote: To a great extent, the story of a samurai has been the story of Japan during most of the past millennium, and it is surely premature to relegate the samurai tradition entirely to the past.
quotes.author: Stephen Turnbull

quotes.quote: In addition to its importance in informing us about Japanese behaviour in general, the history of the samurai is enormously colorful and exciting. No one knows exactly when samurai first appeared in the province of Japan.
quotes.author: Stephen Turnbull

quotes.quote: Despite their largely rustic origins, the samurai much admired the social brilliance and classical culture of the courtiers and sought eagerly to emulate their ways.
quotes.author: Stephen Turnbull

quotes.quote: Within a decade, the new samurai rulers had set Japan firmly on the course of modernization, and though they were obliged in the process to dissolve the feudal privileges of their own class, former samurai in fact became leaders in all areas of modern Japanese society.
quotes.author: Stephen Turnbull

quotes.quote: The story of the samurai warriors charts the rise and fall of the most skilled and courageous group of elite combatants the world has ever seen.
quotes.author: Tommy Ito

quotes.quote: Although the samurai are well-known for their use of the sword, they began as skilled mountain archers, and used a variety of weapons, including longbows, spears, and firearms.
quotes.author: Tommy Ito

quotes.quote: Two of the most remarkable aspects of samurai culture are bushido, a strict philosophy which places absolute loyalty to the master above all else, and seppuku— ritual suicide, performed in preference to dishonor.
quotes.author: Tommy Ito

quotes.quote: The way of the Samurai is found in death. When it comes..there is only a quick choice of death...we all want to live...but not having attained our aim and continuing to live is cowardice...If by setting one's heart right every morning and evening, one is able to live as though his body is already dead, he gains freedom in the Way.
quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.quote: In San Francisco, Halloween is redundant.
quotes.author: Will Durst

quotes.quote: San Francisco is poetry. Even the hills rhyme.
quotes.author: Patricia Montandon

quotes.quote: San Francisco is 49 square miles surrounded by reality.
quotes.author: Paul Kantner

quotes.quote: San Francisco isn't what it used to be, and it never was.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: San Francisco is the place where most people were last seen.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The thing about San Francisco is that it has this kind of magical quality.
quotes.author: Muddy Waters

quotes.quote: You know what it is? San Francisco is a golden handcuff with the key thrown away.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: What makes San Francisco work is that high-value people like to live there and cluster.
quotes.author: James Coulter

quotes.quote: San Francisco is a world to explore. It is a place where the heart can go on a delightful adventure.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: Leaving San Francisco is like saying goodbye to an old sweetheart. You want to linger as long as possible.
quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

quotes.quote: San Francisco's winter is a season unto itself. Fleeting, rain-soaked, verdant, a brief period of shadows and renewal.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Dorsky

quotes.quote: San Francisco is a mad city - inhabited for the most part by perfectly insane people whose women are of a remarkable beauty.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: San Francisco leads the world in the category of Most People On The Sidewalk Holding Conversations With Purely Imaginary Companions.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: San Francisco itself is art, above all literary art. Every block is a short story, every hill a novel. Every home a poem, every dweller within immortal. That is the whole truth.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: San Francisco is one of the great cultural plateaus of the world - one of the really urbane communities in the United States - one of the truly cosmopolitan places and for many, many years, it always has had a warm welcome for human beings from all over the world.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: San Francisco is perhaps the most European of all American cities.
quotes.author: Cecil Beaton

quotes.quote: The old San Francisco is under attack to the point where it's disappearing.
quotes.author: Nancy Peters

quotes.quote: San Francisco is a city with the assets of a metropolis without the disadvantages of size and industry.
quotes.author: Jack Kenny

quotes.quote: San Francisco is a breathtakingly beautiful city, with lots of great contrasts between dark and light, often overlapping each other. It's a great setting for a horror story.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: San Francisco is an interesting place. It's always been such a nice culturally diverse environment, which it still is, but there's a lot of money there now and a lot of dot com's so it's a little different than it used to be.
quotes.author: Les Claypool

quotes.quote: May we have communion with God in the secret of our hearts, and find Him to be to us as a little sanctuary.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Each of us has an inner room where we can visit to be cleansed of fear-based thoughts and feelings. This room, the holy of holies, is a sanctuary of light.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: I bought my own home in 2004. It's a sanctuary for my family and a place of peace and calm. It's key for anyone committed to leadership and success to avoid the noise and focus on their best opportunities.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: It never gets boring for me because there's so many different things to explore in the studio. The studio's become the sanctuary that people have come in and found new things out about themselves, as weird as that sounds. But it's true, I'm no different. I've made some crazy hard records, and I've made a jazz album.
quotes.author: Mac Miller

quotes.quote: To say that I loved school would be an understatement. It was my oasis, my sanctuary.
quotes.author: Janet Mock

quotes.quote: My bedroom is my sanctuary. It's like a refuge, and it's where I do a fair amount of designing - at least conceptually, if not literally.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.quote: If we could make our house a home, and then make it a sanctuary, I think we could truly find paradise on Earth.
quotes.author: Alexandra Stoddard

quotes.quote: The gym was my sanctuary. The place where you could forget about all your worries your problems people asking you for money people asking you to do this, do that.
quotes.author: Paul Pierce

quotes.quote: Because my business life is so busy, my home is really my sanctuary. That is where I reflect and spend quality time with my girls.
quotes.author: Rachel Roy

quotes.quote: Food feeds our souls. It is the single great unifier across all cultures. The table offers a sanctuary and a place to come together for unity and understanding.
quotes.author: Lidia Bastianich

quotes.quote: There is no sanctuary of virtue like home.
quotes.author: Edward Everett

quotes.quote: A national park is not a playground. It's a sanctuary for nature and for humans who will accept nature on nature's own terms.
quotes.author: Michael Frome

quotes.quote: Every mind is a clutter of memories, images, inventions and age-old repetitions. It can be a ghetto, too, if a ghetto is a sealed-off, confined place. Or a sanctuary, where one is free to dream and think whatever one wants. For most of us it's both - and a lot more complicated.
quotes.author: Margo Jefferson

quotes.quote: A temple, first of all, is a place of prayer; and prayer is communion with God. It is the 'infinite in man seeking the infinite in God.' Where they find each other, there is holy sanctuary--a temple.
quotes.author: B. H. Roberts

quotes.quote: Home is a sanctuary for me and the place where I can relax. Everyone should have the right to a safe and secure home.
quotes.author: Corinne Bailey Rae

quotes.quote: A true home is one of the most sacred of places. It is a sanctuary into which men flee from the world's perils and alarms. It is a resting-place to which at close of day the weary retire to gather new strength for the battle and toils of tomorrow. It is the place where love learns its lessons, where life is schooled into discipline and strength, where character is molded.
quotes.author: J.R. Miller

quotes.quote: Within you there is a stillness and sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: A home is a kingdom of it's own in the midst of the world, a stronghold amid life's storms and stresses, a refuge, even a sanctuary.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Trees are sanctuaries. Whoever knows how to speak to them, whoever knows how to listen to them, can learn the truth. They do not preach learning and precepts, they preach, undeterred by particulars, the ancient law of life.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Worshipers never leave church...we carry our sanctuary with us wherever we go.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: You need a sanctuary. Somewhere where it doesn't feel like it's being tainted by everybody's opinions and other people's money. I think I'm kind of homesick right now.
quotes.author: Mikky Ekko

quotes.quote: Let us make of our homes sanctuaries of righteousness, places of prayer, and abodes of love, that we might merit the blessings that can come only from our Heavenly Father.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: You can't leave footprints in the sands of time while sitting down.
quotes.author: Nelson Rockefeller

quotes.quote: We take a handful of sand from the endless landscape of awareness around us and call that handful of sand the world.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Nothing is built on stone; all is built on sand, but we must build as if the sand were stone.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: I was sand, I was snow, written on, rewritten, smoothed over.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: They defended the grains of sand in the desert to the last drop of their blood.
quotes.author: Akram Fouad Khater

quotes.quote: I sat down in the sand, breathless with shame and failure. God, I thought, some defender of the weak. Some freedom fighter, Joan of Arc in sunscreen.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: When I opened my eyes I saw nothing but the pool of nocturnal sky, for I was lying on my back with outstretched arms, face to face with that hatchery of stars. Only half awake, still unaware that those depths were sky, having no roof between those depths and me, no branches to screen them, no root to cling to, I was seized with vertigo and felt myself as if flung forth and plunging downward like a diver.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Our doom is, to be sifted in the wind, heaped up, smoothed down like silly sands. We are less permanent than thought.
quotes.author: Basil Bunting

quotes.quote: The sand in the hourglass runs from one compartment to another, marking the passage of moments with something constant and tangible.
quotes.author: Bhavna Karnani Killa

quotes.quote: In the fury of the moment I can see the Master's hand In every leaf that trembles, in every grain of sand.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Even these stars, which seem so numerous, are as sand, as dust or less than dust in the enormity of the space in which there is nothing.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The total number of stars in the Universe is larger than all the grains of sand on all the beaches of the planet Earth.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The divine is everywhere, even in a grain of sand; there I represented it in the reeds.
quotes.author: Caspar David Friedrich

quotes.quote: The whole of the world could be deduced from the smallest grain of sand, if one studied it closely enough.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: From a grain of sand in the Pearl comes.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The passing of armies and the passing of sands in the desert are one.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them! If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand. When I awake, I am still with thee.
quotes.author: David

quotes.quote: A handful of sand is an anthology of the universe.
quotes.author: David McCord

quotes.quote: Like an old gold-panning prospector, you must resign yourself to digging up a lot of sand from which you will later patiently wash out a few minute particles of gold ore.
quotes.author: Dorothy Bryant

quotes.quote: All love that has not friendship for its base is like a mansion built upon the sand.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Technically speaking, you can build anything out of sand it doesn't mean you do it.
quotes.author: Eric Bana

quotes.quote: On vacations. We hit the sunny beaches where we occupy ourselves keeping the sun off our skin, the saltwater off our bodies, and the sand out of our belongings.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: With their souls of patent leather, they come down the road. Hunched and nocturnal, where they breathe they impose, silence of dark rubber, and fear of fine sand.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: When you take your stand along the maker's path, you must remain utterly still. You must think like a patch of sand. Hide beneath your cloak and become a little dune in your very essence.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The sand murmurs that it wants to swallow everything.
quotes.author: Gao Xingjian

quotes.quote: The golden moments in the stream of life rush past us, and we see nothing but sand. The angels come to visit us, and we only know them when they are gone.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: All that mankind has ever learned is nothing more than a single grain of sand on a beach that reaches to infinity.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: I don't know, there's something about you. Say there's an hourglass, the sand's about to run out. Someone like you can always be counted on to turn the thing over.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Time is like a handful of sand the tighter you grasp it, the faster it runs through your fingers.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I always say, if you keep your head in the sand, you don't know where the kick's coming from.
quotes.author: Herbie Mann

quotes.quote: Sanity is an illusion caused by alcohol deficiency.
quotes.author: N. F. Simpson

quotes.quote: Sanity becomes the fantasy that keeps us sane; a rhetorical prop in an unplotted, threatening world.
quotes.author: Adam Phillips

quotes.quote: Sanity, it would seem, was a dangerously contagious disease.
quotes.author: H. Beam Piper

quotes.quote: Sanity that is the great virtue of the ancient literature; the want of that is the great defect of the modern, in spite of its variety and power.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: Sanity calms, but madness is more interesting.
quotes.author: John Russell

quotes.quote: Sanity is not truth. Sanity is conformity to what is socially expected. Truth is sometimes in conformity, sometimes not.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: One of the definitions of sanity is the ability to tell real from unreal. Soon we'll need a new definition.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: Sanity brings pain but madness is a vile thing.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Sanity is not something you find; sanity is something you either have or don't.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Our sanity depends essentially on a narrowness of vision the ability to select the elements vital to survival, while ignoring the great truths.
quotes.author: Josephine Hart

quotes.quote: Sanity is only that which is within the frame of reference of conventional thought.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: One means of sanity is to retain a hold on the natural world, Americans still have that chance, more than many peoples.
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: Sanity remains defined simply by the ability to cope with insane conditions.
quotes.author: Anna Casttilo

quotes.quote: Sanity is a madness put to good uses.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Sanity lies somewhere between the inhibitions of conventional morality and the looseness of the extreme impulse
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Sanity is very rare; every man almost and every woman has a dash of madness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sometimes, to regain sanity, one had to acknowledge and embrace the madness.
quotes.author: Morgan Rhodes

quotes.quote: All sanity depends on this: that it should be a delight to feel the roughness of a carpet under smooth soles, a delight to feel heat strike the skin, a delight to stand upright, knowing the bones are moving easily under the flesh.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Sanity is, in essence, nothing more than the ability to live in harmony with nature's laws.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: Sanity, soundness, and sincerity, of which gleams and strains can still be found in the human brain under powerful microscopes, flourish only in a culture of clarification, which is now becoming harder and harder to detect with the naked eye.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Sanity is a sliding scale for we all hold beliefs that may not correspond to reality.
quotes.author: Julian Gold

quotes.quote: The fight for sanity in our gun safety laws is not by any means over. In many ways it's just beginning.
quotes.author: Michael D. Barnes

quotes.quote: Sanity is to be found in accurate honesty to oneself.
quotes.author: David Bain

quotes.quote: Sanity is sometimes a matter of going on, outwardly, as if everything is all right.
quotes.author: Mary McMullen

quotes.quote: For me, insanity is super sanity. The normal is psychotic. Normal means lack of imagination, lack of creativity.
quotes.author: Jean Dubuffet

quotes.quote: Sanity can take one of only two forms: that of ignorance, or denial.
quotes.author: Derek R. Audette

quotes.quote: Sanity is surely not about normality in the statistical sense: it is about an eternal and natural idea of the healthy personality which indeed may be a rare achievement.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.quote: The sanity of society is a balance of a thousand insanity's.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Too much sanity may be madness and the maddest of all, to see life as it is and not as it should be.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Sanity consists in not being subdued by your means. Fancy prices are paid for position, and for the culture of talent, but to thegrand interests, superficial success is of no account.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Santa Claus has the right idea – visit people only once a year.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: Santa is our culture's only mythic figure truly believed in by a large percentage of the population. It's a fact that most of the true believers are under eight years old, and that's a pity.
quotes.author: Chris Van Allsburg

quotes.quote: Our family was too strange and weird for even Santa Claus to come visit… Santa, who was jolly – but, let’s face it, he was also very judgmental.
quotes.author: Julia Sweeney

quotes.quote: There are three stages of man: he believes in Santa Claus; he does not believe in Santa Claus; he is Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: Here's what we know about Santa. He sees you when you're sleeping. He knows when you're awake. He knows if you've been bad or good. I think he's with the NSA.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: The Santa myth is one of the most effective means ever devised for intimidating children, eroding their self- esteem, twisting their behavior, warping their values, and slowing their development of critical thinking skills.
quotes.author: Tom Flynn

quotes.quote: The greatest thing is not to believe in Santa Claus; it is to be Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Pat Boone

quotes.quote: Once you stop believing in Santa Claus, the whole world just goes downhill.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Everybody has the idea of Santa in their head and in their heart.
quotes.author: Mick Foley

quotes.quote: Everything that you want Santa to be, he is.
quotes.author: Mick Foley

quotes.quote: History is like Santa Claus: a language construction. We have some registers about the existence of Santa and history - the presents under the tree, the archives - but none have really seen them.
quotes.author: Alvaro Enrigue

quotes.quote: All the world is happy when Santa Claus comes.
quotes.author: Maud Lindsay

quotes.quote: Whenever you give someone a present or sing a holiday song, you're helping Santa Claus. To me, that's what Christmas is all about. Helping Santa Claus!
quotes.author: Louis Sachar

quotes.quote: God put Santa Claus on earth to remind us that Christmas is 'sposed to be a happy time.
quotes.author: Bil Keane

quotes.quote: The Santa Claus principle liquidates itself.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Growing up, Santa Claus would cover the presents with a white blanket, so when we'd wake up Christmas morning, we had to wait for my dad to do the big reveal of all the presents Santa brought.
quotes.author: Martina Mcbride

quotes.quote: Maybe Santa Claus is real. Here's the problem: reality.
quotes.author: David Remnick

quotes.quote: Santa Claus has the right idea - visit people only once a year.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: The three stages of man: he believes in Santa Claus; he does not believe in Santa Claus; he is Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Jim Guthrie

quotes.quote: Santa knows Physics: Of all colors, Red Light penetrates fog best. That’s why Benny the Blue-nosed reindeer never got the gig.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Santa Claus is believing in something greater, believing in something magical.
quotes.author: Vanessa Grimaldi

quotes.quote: They err who think Santa Claus enters through the chimney. He enters through the heart.
quotes.author: Charles W. Howard

quotes.quote: Here's what we know about Santa. He sees you when you're sleeping. He knows when you're awake. He knows if you've been bad or good. I think he's with the NSA.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: To say there is no Santa Claus is the most erroneous statement in the world. Santa Claus is a thought that is passed from generation to generation. After time this thought takes on a human form. Maybe if all children and adults understand the symbolism of this thought we can actually attain Peace on Earth and good will to men everywhere.
quotes.author: Charles W. Howard

quotes.quote: Of course there is a Santa Claus. It’s just that no single somebody could do all he has to do. So the Lord has spread the task among us all. That’s why everybody is Santa Claus. I am. You are.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Santa Claus is anyone who loves another and seeks to make them happy; who gives himself by thought or word or deed in every gift that he bestows; who shares his joys with those who are sad; whose hand is never closed against the needy; whose arm is ever outstretched to aid the week; whose sympathy is quick and genuine in time of trouble; who recognizes a comrade and brother in every man he meets upon life's common road; who lives his life throughout the entire year in the Christmas spirit.
quotes.author: Edwin Osgood Grover

quotes.quote: This is, first and last, the real value of Christmas; in so far as the mythology remains at all it is a kind of happy mythology. Personally, of course, I believe in Santa Claus; but it is the season of forgiveness, and I will forgive others for not doing so.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The greatest thing is not to believe in Santa Claus; it is to be Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Pat Boone

quotes.quote: Whenever you give someone a present or sing a holiday song, you're helping Santa Claus. To me, that's what Christmas is all about. Helping Santa Claus!
quotes.author: Louis Sachar

quotes.quote: Our family was too strange and weird for even Santa Claus to come visit... Santa, who was jolly - but, let's face it, he was also very judgmental.
quotes.author: Julia Sweeney

quotes.quote: Alas! How dreary would be the world if there was no Santa Claus!... There would be no childlike faith then, no poetry, no romance to make tolerable this existence.
quotes.author: Francis P. Church

quotes.quote: You can't trick The Universe - it's like Santa Claus that way.
quotes.author: Tracy McMillan

quotes.quote: The reality of loving God is loving him like he's a Superhero who actually saved you from stuff rather than a Santa Claus who merely gave you some stuff.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A good many things go around in the dark besides Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: God put Santa Claus on earth to remind us that Christmas is 'sposed to be a happy time.
quotes.author: Bil Keane

quotes.quote: I think we have to believe in things we don't see. That's really important for all of us, whether it's your religion or Santa Claus, or whatever. That's pretty much what it's about.
quotes.author: James Caan

quotes.quote: Sarcasm: the last refuge of modest and chaste-souled people when the privacy of their soul is coarsely and intrusively invaded.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Sarcasm is weird. Even not in acting, in life I feel like 'sarcastic' is a word that people use to describe me sometimes so when I meet someone, it's almost like they feel like they have to also be sarcastic, but it can sometimes just come off as mean if it's not used in the right way.
quotes.author: Aubrey Plaza

quotes.quote: Sarcasm I now see to be, in general, the language of the devil; for which reason I have long since as good as renounced it.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Some sarcasm is best told simply.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: Neither irony nor sarcasm is argument.
quotes.author: Rufus Choate

quotes.quote: Avoid sarcasm. Don't insist on the last word.
quotes.author: Ford Frick

quotes.quote: A sarcastic person has a superiority complex that can be cured only by the honesty of humility.
quotes.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.quote: What I claim is to live to the full the contradiction of my time, which may well make sarcasm the condition of truth.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: Sarcasm the body's natural defense against stupidity.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sarcasm was usually lost on imbeciles.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Sarcasm is the last refuge of the imaginatively bankrupt.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: The spirit of sarcasm lives and thrives in the midst of universal wreck; its balls are enchanted and itself invulnerable, and it braves retaliations and reprisals because itself is a mere flash, a bodiless and magical nothing.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Blows are sarcasm's turned stupid.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Sarcasm helps me overcome the harshness of the reality we live, eases the pain of scars and makes people smile.
quotes.author: Mahmoud Darwish

quotes.quote: You see, that is the sad, sorry, terrible thing about sarcasm.It's really funny.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: You had to learn at a certain age what sarcasm is, you know?
quotes.author: Penny Marshall

quotes.quote: When dealing with sarcastic people, prescribe them the same course of medicine but with a stronger dosage
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Puns are just another form of sarcasm, which may or may not make you - smile, giggle, or laugh.
quotes.author: Aniruddha Sastikar

quotes.quote: In my opinion, I think sarcasm and humor in a song, without turning it into a novelty song, is really charming.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: This music won't do. There's not enough sarcasm in it.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: We are suffering from too much sarcasm.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: The monkey is an organized Sarcasm upon the human race.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A sarcastic person has a superiority complex that can be cured only by the honesty of humility.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing is more discouraging than unappreciated sarcasm.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sarcasm helps keep you from telling people what you really think of them.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sarcasm: intellect on the offensive
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sarcasm is a Manchester trait.
quotes.author: Peter Hook

quotes.quote: When people are free to do as they please, they usually imitate each other.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: If you can smile when things go wrong, you have someone in mind to blame.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brillant

quotes.quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I'm a damsel, I'm in distress, I can handle this.
quotes.author: Walt Disney Company

quotes.quote: Live. Love. Smile. Hug. Laugh. Dream. Do. Create. Have fun. Be intense. Be audacious. Be unreasonable. Act impeccably. Breathe. Be you. Be different.
quotes.author: Brian Johnson

quotes.quote: If you have something about yourself that's different, you're lucky. It's not a curse.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius, and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: When I'm good, I'm very good. But when I'm bad I'm better.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won't expect it back.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: True courage comes not just from feeling confident and strong, but from being the honest, authentic expression in yourself. Think about how audacious it is to really believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: It is better to be high-spirited even though one makes more mistakes, than to be narrow-minded and all too prudent.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag â€“ you never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Perfect simplicity is unconsciously audacious.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: Never ask a girl with winged eyeliner why she's late.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The wings of one's greatest glory unfold when the heart and body are uninhibited.
quotes.author: Danette Johnson

quotes.quote: I don't care what you think about me; I don't think about you at all!
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I do not want people to be agreeable, as it saves me that trouble of liking them.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Someday I want to be perfect; until then, I'll be happy being incredible.
quotes.author: Maxine

quotes.quote: I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Go wild and let go. Usually the most audacious ideas are the ones that get noticed.
quotes.author: Brian Wong

quotes.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Be an individual, let out the self that hides away at the expense of others approval.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: If you retain nothing else, always remember the most important rule of beauty, which is: who cares?
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: To be audacious with tact, you have to know to what point you can go too far.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The high-spirited man may indeed die, but he will not stoop to meanness. Fire, though it may be quenched, will not become cool.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The art of being sometimes audacious and sometimes very prudent is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: If you're sad, add more lipstick and attack. Men hate women who weep.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The most fearless hearts, the audacious dreamers, have always maintained a sense of optimism that often flies in the face of the available evidence.
quotes.author: Martin O'Malley

quotes.quote: A lot of people are afraid to say what they want. That's why they don't get what they want.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: The greatest evils of society are goods that have refused to go on, but have sat down on the highway, saying to the world, "We stop here; do you stop also."
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: We should be careful to get out of an experience only the wisdom that is in itand stop there; lest we be like the cat that sits down on a hot stove-lid. She will never sit down on a hot stove-lid againand that is well; but also she will never sit down on a cold one anymore.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Facts are ventriloquist's dummies. Sitting on a wise man's knee they may be made to utter words of wisdom; elsewhere, they say nothing, or talk nonsense.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The whole universe sat there, open to the man who could make the right decisions.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Who has not sat, afraid, before his own heart's curtain?
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: A politician is an arse upon which everyone has sat except a man.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: He who feared that he would not succeed sat still.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: No man who has not sat in the assemblies of men can know the light, odd and uncertain ways in which decisions are often arrived at.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: Many kings have sat down upon the ground; and one that was never thought of hath worn the crown.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The greatest gift of all time is that you can make creation infectious because people spend less time being negative... If you log all the time with negativity in the while world, I wonder how much better the world would be if people sat down and did something positive. It spirals.
quotes.author: Skrillex

quotes.quote: People sitting on top of the world, usually arrived there standing up.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: But maybe the best thing I learnt was this: that we cannot know a person's soul and nature until we've sat beside them, and talked.
quotes.author: Susan Fletcher

quotes.quote: Procrastination is illogical from every viewpoint. It is like the man who wanted to cross the stream, so he sat on the bank to wait for all the water to run by.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: There's a kinship among men who have sat by a dying fire and measured the worth of their life by it.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.quote: Prior to the internet, the last technology that had any real effect on the way people sat down and talked together was the table.
quotes.author: Clay Shirky

quotes.quote: Let those who sit know that this world is not a waiting room; it is an arena to struggle, an arena for action! Let the inactive remember that we were born to act, not to sit!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen.
quotes.author: Sarah Brown

quotes.quote: Talent on its own sat gracefully only on the very young. After a certain age it was what you did with it that counted.
quotes.author: Liza Cody

quotes.quote: When the vain speaker has sat down, and the people say 'what a good speech,' it still takes an ounce to balance an ounce.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: On the plains of hesitation bleach the bones of countless millions who, at the dawn of decision, sat down to wait, and waiting died.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: When a man sits with a pretty girl for an hour, it seems like a minute. But let him sit on a hot stove for a minute â€” and it's longer than any hour. That's relativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is like a movie, if you've sat through more than half of it and it's sucked every second so far, it probably isn't going to get great right at the end and make it all worthwhile. None should blame you for walking out early.
quotes.author: Doug Stanhope

quotes.quote: Be sincere; be brief; be seated.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don't sit on the fence; break it and move out! Don't be confined to the little things you do; the sky should be below your limit!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If everyone in the world sat quietly at the same time, closed their eyes and concentrated as hard as they could on peace and goodwill, all the killing and cruelty in the world would continue. And probably increase.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Sometimes two people stay together for the sake of the kids - two kids who sat under a full moon and pledged to be forever true.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: We must remember that Satan has his miracles, too.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: One of Satan's most deceptive and powerful ways of defeating us is to get us to believe a lie. And the biggest lie is that there are no consequences to our own doing. Satan will give you whatever you ask for if it will lead you where he ultimately wants you.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: If Satan wasn't around, churches would go out of business.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Satan tries to counterfeit the work of God, and by doing this, he may deceive many. To make us lose hope, feel miserable like himself, and believe that we are beyond forgiveness, Satan might even misuse words from the scriptures that emphasize the justice of God in order to imply that there is no mercy.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: For Satan always finds some mischief still for idle hands to do.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.quote: Satan wants us to constantly focus on everything that is wrong with us and look at how far we still have to go. But God desires for us to rejoice in how far we have already come.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: God cannot use you as He wishes until you come into the fullness of His Glory. Do not get alarmed, my friend, when doubts creep in. That is old Satan. Pray, pray, pray.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: The devil is an optimist if he thinks he can make people worse than they are.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Satan, our adversary, wants us to fail. He spreads lies as part of his effort to destroy our belief. He slyly suggests that the doubter, the skeptic, the cynic is sophisticated and intelligent, while those who have faith in God and His miracles are naive, blind, or brainwashed.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: The Devil pulls the strings which make us dance; We find delight in the most loathsome things; Some furtherance of Hell each new day brings, And yet we feel no horror in that rank advance.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: God's truth judges created things out of love, and Satan's truth judges them out of envy and hatred.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Satan is wiser now than before, and tempts by making rich instead of poor.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The best way to drive out the devil, if he will not yield to texts of Scripture, is to jeer and flout him, for he cannot bear scorn.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: One of Satan's sharpest tools is alcohol, for it blinds and deafens, numbs and manacles, impoverishes and maims, and kills unfortunate victims.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: People who cease to believe in God or goodness altogether still believe in the devil... Evil is always possible. And goodness is eternally difficult.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: Son, the greatest trick the Devil pulled was convincing the world there was only one of him.
quotes.author: David Wong

quotes.quote: Holy wisdom confounds Satan and all his wickednesses.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Clever as the Devil and twice as pretty.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: When you're in hell, only a devil can point the way out.
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie

quotes.quote: All the cunning of the devil is exercised in trying to tear us away from the word.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Satan will give you a little taste, then he'll move in with rapid speed.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: If Satan ever laughs, it must be at hypocrites; they are the greatest dupes he has.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Satan delights equally in statistics and in quoting scripture.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Satan, the leader or dictator of devils, is the opposite, not of God, but of Michael.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: God is the Creator; Satan is the counterfeiter.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: The devil is merely a fallen angel, and when God lost Satan he lost one of his best lieutenants.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: Satan's successes are the greatest when he appears with the name of God on his lips.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Satan and all his agents, with all their combined strength and subtilty, cannot separate one soul from Christ.
quotes.author: Robert Shaw

quotes.quote: Better the devil you know than the devil you don't.
quotes.author: Jack Heath

quotes.quote: Social satire has been around since people have been around.
quotes.author: David Walliams

quotes.quote: Good humor is the best shield against the darts of satirical raillery.
quotes.author: Charles Simmons

quotes.quote: Satire chooses and knows no objects. It arises by fleeing from them and their forcing themselves upon it.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Satire is dependent on strong beliefs, and on strong beliefs wounded.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: Satire of satire tends to be self-canceling, and deliberate shock tactics soon lose their ability to shock, especially when they're too deliberate.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: You cant be satirical and not be offensive to somebody.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: Satire is a wrapping of exaggeration around a core of reality.
quotes.author: Barbara W. Tuchman

quotes.quote: If you have to explain satire to someone, you might as well give up.
quotes.author: Barry Humphries

quotes.quote: If satire is to be effective, the audience must be aware of the thing satirized.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: Satire is moral outrage transformed into comic art.
quotes.author: Philip Roth

quotes.quote: All satire is blind to the forces liberated by decay. Which is why total decay has absorbed the forces of satire.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Satire, like conscience, reminds us of what we often wish to forget.
quotes.author: Marguerite Gardiner

quotes.quote: Satire, though it may exaggerate the vice it lashes, is not justified in creating it in order that it may be lashed.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: In general satire, every man perceives a slight attack, yet neither fears nor grieves.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: Satire dramatizes better than any other use of it, the inherent contradiction of free speech that it functions best when what is being said is at its most outrageous.
quotes.author: Tony Hendra

quotes.quote: Satire is traditionally the weapon of the powerless against the powerful.
quotes.author: Molly Ivins

quotes.quote: Satire is a kind of poetry in which human vices are reprehended.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: All truth is valuable, and satirical criticism may be considered as useful when it rectifies error and improves judgment; he that refines the public taste is a public benefactor.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Good satire hopefully provides thought-provoking conversation.
quotes.author: Lizz Winstead

quotes.quote: Satire, being levelled at all, is never resented for an offence by any.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: The art of contentment is the recognition that the most satisfying and the most dependably refreshing experiences of life lie not in great things but in little. The rarity of happiness among those who achieved much is evidence that achievement is not in itself the assurance of a happy life. The great, like the humble, may have to find their satisfaction in the same plain things.
quotes.author: Edgar A. Collard

quotes.quote: He who is not satisfied with a little, is satisfied with nothing.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: There are two ways to get enough. One is to continue to accumulate more and more. The other is to desire less.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Simplicity is extremely important for happiness. Having few desires, feeling satisfied with what you have, is very vital.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: What does not satisfy when we find it, was not the thing we were desiring.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Many have too much, but none enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Little minds find satisfaction for their feelings, good or bad, in little things.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life.
quotes.author: Linus Pauling

quotes.quote: There's always a little bit of personal satisfaction when you prove somebody wrong.
quotes.author: Drew Brees

quotes.quote: Neither circumstances nor surroundings can bring contentment. Only by fitting ourselves to meet conditions as they are, calmly and courageously, may we hope to reconcile ourselves to our position and conditions of life.
quotes.author: Fred Van Amburgh

quotes.quote: To be able to look back upon ones life in satisfaction, is to live twice.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a person can enjoy in this world.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: In all our contacts it is probably the sense of being really needed and wanted which gives us the greatest satisfaction and creates the most lasting bond.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A complacent satisfaction with present knowledge is the chief bar to the pursuit of knowledge.
quotes.author: B. H. Liddell Hart

quotes.quote: There is no treasure equal to contentment and no virtue equal to fortitude.
quotes.author: Sarada Devi

quotes.quote: A harvest of peace grows from seeds of contentment.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life.
quotes.author: Linus Pauling

quotes.quote: Content makes poor men rich; discontentment makes rich men poor.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Contentment gives a crown, where fortune hath denied it.
quotes.author: John Ford

quotes.quote: Contentment is the capital which will never diminish.
quotes.author: Ali bin Abu-Talib

quotes.quote: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Whether you find satisfaction in life depends not on your tale of years, but on your will.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: You can never get enough of the things you don't need, because the things you don't need can never satisfy.
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: Enjoy the satisfaction that comes from doing little things well.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: The satisfaction derived from the fleeting things of life is not lasting; and our wants remain unfulfilled. There is thus a general sense of dissatisfaction accompanied by all kinds of worries.
quotes.author: Meher Baba

quotes.quote: Satisfaction does not come with achievement, but with effort. Full effort is full victory.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: No one is satisfied with his fortune, nor dissatisfied with his intellect.
quotes.author: Antoinette Deshoulieres

quotes.quote: When we cannot find contentment in ourselves, it is useless to seek it elsewhere.
quotes.author: Francois La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: If you look for perfection, you'll never be content.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Satisfaction is not always the fulfillment of what you want; it is the realization of how blessed you are for what you have.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: One must never be satisfied with his ability to love. No matter where he is, it is always just a beginning.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: If everyone was satisfied with himself, there would be no heroes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: One interesting thing about greed is that although the underlying motive is to seek satisfaction, the irony is that even after obtaining the object of your desire you are still not satisfied. The true antidote of greed is contentment.
quotes.author: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.quote: You really have to be satisfied with what you are and accept from life what it still very generously offers you - and notice it, and be glad for it.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Be satisfied with nothing but your best.
quotes.author: Edward Rowland Sill

quotes.quote: You can't satisfy everybody; especially if there are those who will be dissatisfied unless not everybody is satisfied.
quotes.author: Robert Nozick

quotes.quote: The easiest thing is to make sure you feel happy and satisfied in this moment. Setting long term goals is much more effort taking, but at the same time much more fulfilling.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Being satisfied with what we already have is a magical golden key to being alive in a full, unrestricted, and inspired way.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: The only prosperity the people can afford to be satisfied with is the kind that lasts.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: He who is not satisfied with a little, is satisfied with nothing.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: No man can be satisfied with his attainment, although he may be satisfied with his circumstances.
quotes.author: Frank Arthur Swinnerton

quotes.quote: You will not be satisfied unless you are contributing something to or for the benefit of others.
quotes.author: Walter Annenberg

quotes.quote: Never be satisfied with a first draft. In fact, never be satisfied with your own stuff at all, until you're certain it's as good as your finite powers can enable it to be.
quotes.author: Rose Tremain

quotes.quote: Love gratified is love satisfied, and love satisfied is indifference begun.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: What ever makes you happy, do it and don't stop till you are satisfied and until you find a new source of happiness!
quotes.author: Christian Olguin

quotes.quote: Being satisfied with little, you can gain much. Seeking much you will go astray. The wise heeds this precept. If it could be so with all people!
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: To be haunted by past failures or satisfied with past successes is to arrest forward motion.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: Whoever is capable of knowing when they have had enough will always be satisfied.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Those who have not more must be satisfied with what they have.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: When you are satisfied, you are successful. For that's all there is to success is satisfaction.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Success means being satisfied with what you do every day. It's being proud of the better person you are becoming.
quotes.author: Dwayne Wade

quotes.quote: The superior man is satisfied and composed; the mean man is always full of distress.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If God is satisfied with the work, the work may be satisfied with itself.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Once you get rid of the idea that you must please other people before you please yourself, and you begin to follow your own instincts only then can you be successful. You become more satisfied, and when you are other people tend to be satisfied by what you do.
quotes.author: Raquel Welch

quotes.quote: Without satisfaction, you cannot have compassion. You have to be satisfied souls, then your compassion will act.
quotes.author: Nirmala Srivastava

quotes.quote: Be happy and be satisfied. Find fulfillment in everything you do.
quotes.author: Marcus Hudson

quotes.quote: Be happy with what you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness.
quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

quotes.quote: A stone that looks satisfied with its position reflects the sense of ease the waller felt when placing it there
quotes.author: Dan Snow

quotes.quote: A person well satisfied with themselves is seldom satisfied with others, and others, rarely are with them.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Be satisfied, and pleased with what thou art, Act cheerfully and well thou allotted part; Enjoy the present hour, be thankful for the past, And neither fear, nor wish, the approaches of the last.
quotes.author: Martial

quotes.quote: The mountains, the forest, and the sea, render men savage; they develop the fierce, but yet do not destroy the human.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The savage in man is never quite eradicated.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The young man who has not wept is a savage, and the older man who will not laugh is a fool.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Of all our infirmities, the most savage is to despise our being.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Spirituality is... the awareness that survival is the savage fight between you and yourself.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing is more curious than the almost savage hostility that humor excites in those who lack it.
quotes.author: George Saintsbury

quotes.quote: Is man a savage at heart, skinned o'er with fragile Manners? Or is savagery but a faint taint in the natural man's gentility, which erupts now and again like pimples on an angel's arse?
quotes.author: John Barth

quotes.quote: Non-violence leads to the highest ethics, which is the goal of all evolution. Until we stop harming all other living beings, we are still savages.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Like gold in the hands of a savage are the sayings of wisdom in the mouth of a fool.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: Beauty was savage. It was as dangerous and lawless as the earth had been eons before man had one single coherent thought in his head or wrote codes of conduct on tablets of clay. Beauty was a Savage Garden.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: There are many humorous things in the world; among them, the white man's notion that he is less savage than the other savages.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There is a savage beast in every man, and when you hand that man a sword or spear and send him forth to war, the beast stirs.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Problem-solving is hunting; it is savage pleasure and we are born to it.
quotes.author: Thomas Harris

quotes.quote: The civilized man is a more experienced and wiser savage.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We are all ready to be savage in some cause. The difference between a good man and a bad one is the choice of the cause.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Grace is savage and must be savage in order to be perfect.
quotes.author: Charles A. Stoddard

quotes.quote: Alone we are savages, together we are civilization.
quotes.author: Ashok K. Banker

quotes.quote: Tears gratify a savage nature, they do not melt it.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Rage and grief are savage companions, but despair is the final undoing.
quotes.author: M.I.A.

quotes.quote: The true savage is a slave, and is always talking about what he must do; the true civilised man is a free man, and is always talking about what he may do.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Just as the savage must wrestle with nature to satisfy his wants, to maintain and reproduce life, so must civilised man, and he must do so in all social formations and under all possible modes of production.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: The savage bows down to idols of wood and stone the civilized man to idols of flesh and blood.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Play by the rules, but be ferocious.
quotes.author: Phil Knight

quotes.quote: Without doubt, ferocious and disordered men are much weaker than timid and ordered ones. For order chases fear from men and disorder lessens ferocity
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The most savage controversies are about matters as to which there is no good evidence either way.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Tame the savageness of man and make gentle the life of this world.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: To savages it would seem preposterous to seek out a place where nothing but learning was going on in order that one might learn.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Breed not a savage dog, nor permit a loose stairway
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: The mere athlete becomes too much of a savage.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Only peace can save the world and only love can create a liveable earth!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Let us go forth with fear and courage and rage to save the world.
quotes.author: Grace Paley

quotes.quote: It's up to us to save the world for tomorrow: it's up to you and me.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: You begin saving the world by saving one man at a time; all else is grandiose romanticism or politics.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: With our love, we could save the world.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: Anytime you try to be a loving person, you're doing your part to save the world.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: To save the world requires faith and courage: faith in reason, and courage to proclaim what reason shows to be true.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The only thing that can save the world is the reclaiming of the awareness of the world. That's what poetry does.
