quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: Tell the world what scares you most. Save the world with some advice from the future.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: To save the world is the simplest thing in the world. All one has to do is think.
quotes.author: Leonard Peikoff

quotes.quote: God always saves the world from the consequences of unintended errors of men who live in fear of Him.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.
quotes.author: Thomas Keneally

quotes.quote: The best way to save the world is to see every plant and every animal you see as the last plant and the last animal in the world!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It isn’t every day that you get to save the world.
quotes.author: Kailin Gow

quotes.quote: We save the world by being alive ourselves.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: We're either going to save the world or no one will be saved.
quotes.author: Maurice Strong

quotes.quote: People can save the world by the way they think and by the way they behave and what they hold to be important.
quotes.author: Cyndi Lauper

quotes.quote: You need to get up in the morning and say, 'Boy, I'm going to - in my own stupid way - save the world today.'
quotes.author: Carol Bellamy

quotes.quote: There's nothing like a mission to save the world to liven up a vacation.
quotes.author: Donita K. Paul

quotes.quote: The safe way to double your money is to fold it over once and put it in your pocket.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Be saving, but not at the cost of all liberality. Have the soul of a king and the hand of a wise economist.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Look everywhere you can to cut a little bit from your expenses. It will all add up to a meaningful sum.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: The quickest way to double your money is to fold it in half and put it in your back pocket.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You must learn to save first and spend afterwards.
quotes.author: John Poole

quotes.quote: Balancing your money is the key to having enough.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.quote: Saving must become a priority, not just a thought. Pay yourself first.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: The habit of saving is itself an education; it fosters every virtue, teaches self-denial, cultivates the sense of order, trains to forethought, and so broadens the mind.
quotes.author: T.T. Munger

quotes.quote: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: It's good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money can't buy.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.quote: By definition, saving for anything requires us to not get things now so that we can get bigger ones later.
quotes.author: Jean Chatzky

quotes.quote: The art is not in making money, but in keeping it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: He who will not economize will have to agonize.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The easiest way to save money is to waste less energy.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
quotes.author: Joe Moore

quotes.quote: Saving is a very fine thing. Especially when your parents have done it for you.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Money looks better in the bank than on your feet.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free. If our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: When a man has learned to live without money, he thought, a few rubles can go a long way.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Spend not where you may save; spare not where you must spend.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: Save a little money each month and at the end of the year you'll be surprised at how little you have.
quotes.author: Ernest Haskins

quotes.quote: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: If you wish to get rich, save what you get. A fool can earn money; but it takes a wise man to save and dispose of it to his own advantage.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: Saving requires us to not get things now so that we can get bigger ones later.
quotes.author: Jean Chatzky

quotes.quote: Our Savior is our true Mother in whom we are endlessly born and out of whom we shall never come.
quotes.author: Julian of Norwich

quotes.quote: The savior who wants to turn men into angels is as much a hater of human nature as the totalitarian despot who wants to turn them into puppets.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: A zealous Savior ought to have zealous disciples.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: The Savior's atonement...is intimate as well as infinite.
quotes.author: Merrill J. Bateman

quotes.quote: Recognizing the Savior's spiritual light begins with our willingness to believe.
quotes.author: L. Whitney Clayton

quotes.quote: With the Savior's power and light we will be enabled to push back the darkness of the world.
quotes.author: Neill F. Marriott

quotes.quote: The Savior empowers us with His grace, not because we've earned it, but because He loves us perfectly.
quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

quotes.quote: You have the Savior of the world on your side. If you seek His help and follow His directions, how can you fail?
quotes.author: Gary E. Stevenson

quotes.quote: The Savior knows the difficulties of the way and can guide us through whatever sorrows and disappointments may come.
quotes.author: Carole M. Stephens

quotes.quote: The Savior taught us to love not only our friends but also those who disagree with us- and even those who repudiate us.
quotes.author: Neil L. Andersen

quotes.quote: The proper task of the Savior is that he is a savior; indeed, for this he came into the world: to seek and save what was lost.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: If the Savior has not sanctified you, renewed you, given you a hatred of sin and a love of holiness, He has nothing in you of a saving character.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The Savior isn't our last chance; He is our only chance. Our only chance to overcome self-doubt and catch a vision of who we may become. Our only chance to repent and have our sins washed clean.
quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

quotes.quote: Our Savior kneels down and gazes upon the darkest acts of our lives. But rather than recoil in horror, he reaches out in kindness and says, "I can clean that if you want." And from the basin of his grace, he scoops a palm full of mercy and washes away our sin.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The Savior can wipe away our tears of regret.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: The Savior knows what it's like to die of cancer.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: A crucified Savior is not well served by self-pleasing, self-indulging people.
quotes.author: R. Kent Hughes

quotes.quote: The Savior accomplished the Atonement, which resolves the most terrible burdens that can occur in this life.
quotes.author: Quentin L. Cook

quotes.quote: The Savior will let you feel the love He feels for those you serve. The call is an invitation to become like Him.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: The Savior was selfless. He viewed himself and his own needs as secondary, and he ministered to others tirelessly, lovingly, effectively.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Our Savior gave Himself in unselfish service. He taught that each of us should follow Him by denying ourselves of selfish interests in order to serve others.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: Recognizing the Savior's spiritual light begins with our willingness to believe.
quotes.author: L. Whitney Clayton

quotes.quote: TheÂ SaviorÂ accomplished the Atonement, which resolves the most terrible burdens that can occur in this life.
quotes.author: Quentin L. Cook

quotes.quote: OurÂ SaviorÂ gave Himself in unselfish service. He taught that each of us should follow Him by denying ourselves of selfish interests in order to serve others.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: The proper task of theÂ SaviorÂ is that he is aÂ savior; indeed, for this he came into the world: to seek and save what was lost.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: TheÂ SaviorÂ can wipe away our tears of regret.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: With theÂ Savior's power and light we will be enabled to push back the darkness of the world.
quotes.author: Neill F. Marriott

quotes.quote: The Savior of all mankind left the ninety and nine to find the one lost. That one who was lost need not have become lost.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: TheÂ SaviorÂ will let you feel the love He feels for those you serve. The call is an invitation to become like Him.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: TheÂ saviorÂ who wants to turn men into angels is as much a hater of human nature as the totalitarian despot who wants to turn them into puppets.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The saxophone is so human. Its tendency is to be rowdy, edgy, talk too loud, bump into people, say the wrong words at the wrong time, but then, you take a breath all the way from the center of the earth and blow. All that heartache is forgiven. All that love we humans carry makes a sweet, deep sound and we fly a little.
quotes.author: Joy Harjo

quotes.quote: When you play a sax, that saxophone is irreverent. It's noisy; it's a trickster... you cannot hide the saxophone in your hands, so it's a good teacher.
quotes.author: Joy Harjo

quotes.quote: The saxophone is actually a translation of the human voice, in my conception. All you can do is play melody. No matter how complicated it gets, it's still a melody.
quotes.author: Stan Getz

quotes.quote: The saxophone is the embodied spirit of beer.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: Don't play the saxophone, let the saxophone play you.
quotes.author: Charlie Parker

quotes.quote: You can make a saxophone into an electric organ; you can do everything with it.
quotes.author: Gerry Mulligan

quotes.quote: The other saxophones, except as solo instruments, really don't have much point in the orchestra.
quotes.author: Gerry Mulligan

quotes.quote: I love the sound of the saxophone. It became my singing voice, and it sounds so human. The saxophone could carry the words past the border of words. It can carry it a little bit farther.
quotes.author: Joy Harjo

quotes.quote: I understood that if I wanted to work, the saxophone was the main instrument. The clarinet was what we call a double.
quotes.author: Lee Konitz

quotes.quote: I am a frustrated saxophone player. If I could, I would abandon all of my books, and I would trade it all if I could play the way people I admire play.
quotes.author: Robert Pinsky

quotes.quote: I like to hear melodies that go from one extreme to the next- saxophone to a bell to a whistle, for instance.
quotes.author: Roscoe Mitchell

quotes.quote: It's great to hear someone really care for the soprano saxophone.
quotes.author: Rufus Reid

quotes.quote: The saxophone is an imperfect instrument, especially the tenor and soprano, as far as intonation goes. The challenge is to sing on an imperfect instrument that is outside of your body.
quotes.author: Stan Getz

quotes.quote: If you like an instrument that sings, play the saxophone. At its best it's like the human voice.
quotes.author: Stan Getz

quotes.quote: Play difficult and interesting things. If you play boring things, you risk losing your appetite. Saxophone can be tedious with too much of the same.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: I wanted to play saxophone, but all I could get were a few squeaks.
quotes.author: Stevie Ray Vaughan

quotes.quote: There's so much music out there & so many possibilities. I like anyone who plays any instrument.
quotes.author: Bill Frisell

quotes.quote: Drum on your drums, batter on your banjos, sob on the long cool winding saxophones. Go to it, O jazzmen.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: I played saxophone for a while when I was a kid.
quotes.author: Flying Lotus

quotes.quote: When I began listening to saxophones, I was first attracted to Coleman Hawkins
quotes.author: Gerry Mulligan

quotes.quote: The drum is the heart of music. The saxophone can play and then rest, as can all of them except the drums; the drummer keeps going - he can't afford to stop.
quotes.author: Jo Jones

quotes.quote: Making a painting is like playing the saxophone. You hit the note and it comes out.
quotes.author: Julian Schnabel

quotes.quote: The worst waste of breath, next to playing a saxophone, is advising a son.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: For me, the saxophone is a way of expression,
quotes.author: M. Thompson

quotes.quote: I don't know why, but I like the saxophone.
quotes.author: Matt Dillon

quotes.quote: The potential for the saxophone is unlimited.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: You can work on the saxophone alone, but ultimately you must perform with others.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: It's time to say goodbye, but I think goodbyes are sad and I'd much rather say hello. Hello to a new adventure.
quotes.author: Ernie Harwell

quotes.quote: A man never knows how to say goodbye; a woman never knows when to say it.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: If you are brave enough to say goodbye life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.author: Paulo Coehlo

quotes.quote: Never say goodbye because goodbye means going away and going away means forgetting.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: It feels right. But it's emotional. Saying goodbye to anything you've done that long is hard.
quotes.author: Angela Ruggiero

quotes.quote: A goodbye isn't painful unless you're never going to say hello again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never part without loving words to think of during your absence. It may be that you will not meet again in this life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Parting is all we know of heaven and all we need to know of hell.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: We only part to meet again.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye to someone' Just means that there's a hello waiting around the corner.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes saying goodbye to the ones you love can be the most appropriate thing to do in order to help them understand there are consequences for each and every choice we make.
quotes.author: Raphael Zernoff

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye is a little like dying.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.quote: Goodbyes make you think. They make you realize what you've had, what you've lost, and what you've taken for granted.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Never say goodbye when you still want to try, never give up when you still feel you can't take it. Never say you don't love the person anymore when you can't let go.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Say goodbye to the oldies, but goodies, because the good old days weren't always good and tomorrow ain't as bad as it seems
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: They who go Feel not the pain of parting; it is they Who stay behind that suffer.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: It takes courage to say goodbye. To stare at a thing lost and know it is gone forever. Some tears are iron forged.
quotes.author: Jay Kristoff

quotes.quote: I don't say goodbye unless I think it's final.
quotes.author: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.quote: Don't be dismayed at good-byes. A farewell is necessary before we can meet again and meeting again, after moments or a lifetime, is certain for those who are friends.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Farewell is a beautiful and a soft word and yet it is a horrible and a heavy thing too!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The last day is way shorter than counting to ten.
quotes.author: Leena Ahmad Almashat

quotes.quote: I find wisdom in the waves. Goodbye is a hello to a life without you.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Goodbyes always make my throat hurt?I need more hellos
quotes.author: Charlie Brown

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye hurts, but knowing it is goodbye kills.
quotes.author: Joel Kennedy

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye to the people you love isn't easy.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: I guess that's what saying goodbye is always like- like jumping off an edge. The worst part is making the choice to do it. Once you're in the air, there's nothing you can do but let go.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: The Most Painful Goodbyes Are The Ones That Are Never Said And Never Explained...
quotes.author: Bilal Nasir Khan

quotes.quote: Learn to say no in situations where saying no can be difficult, where it could mean getting fired. Say no anyway, because it could lead you to greater opportunities.
quotes.author: Samuel Dash

quotes.quote: Saying no can be the ultimate self-care.
quotes.author: Claudia Black

quotes.quote: You don't have to accept things you are not okay with.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Learn to say no without explaining yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Always say no pun intended to draw attention to the intended pun.
quotes.author: Teju Cole

quotes.quote: Tone is the hardest part of saying no.
quotes.author: Jonathan Price

quotes.quote: Learning to "just say no" to emotional reactions isn't repression. Saying no means not engaging the frustration, anger, judgment, or blame. Without engagement, you won't have anything to repress.
quotes.author: Doc Childre

quotes.quote: If you want more time, freedom, and energy, start saying no.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In saying no to progress, it is not the future which they condemn, but themselves. They give themselves a melancholy disease; they inoculate themselves with the past. There is but one way of refusing tomorrow, that is to die.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: You can't improve on saying nothing.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: The ability to say no is a tremendous advantage for an investor.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: There are times in life when language fails us, when everything that needs to be said can be expressed only by saying nothing at all.
quotes.author: Simon Van Booy

quotes.quote: There is nothing worse than doing nothing and saying nothing when your voice is needed.
quotes.author: Soledad O'Brien

quotes.quote: Half of the troubles of this life can be traced to saying yes too quickly and not saying no soon enough.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Learn to say â€œnoâ€ to the good and the advantageous, in order to receive the best.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Saying No gains you respect. When you say No, the other person may feel disappointed. But ultimately, they will respect you for taking good care of yourself. And most of all, you'll respect yourself because you are being true to yourself!
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: The courage to say no, the courage to say yes. Decisions do determine Destiny.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Just saying yes because you can't bear the short-term pain of saying no is not going to help you do the work.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Say no to everything, so you can say yes to the one thing.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: You can say no if that is more truthful than a resentful yes.
quotes.author: Judith Lasater

quotes.quote: Saying no to something is actually much more powerful than saying yes.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.quote: Saying â€˜No' does not always show a lack of generosity and that saying â€˜Yes' is not always a virtue
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: NO is a complete sentence. It does not require an explanation to follow. You can truly answer someone's request with a simple No
quotes.author: Sharon E. Rainey

quotes.quote: It's better to say nothing than spend 1,000 words or an hour speech saying nothing. Get to the point.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: It takes effort to say no when our heart and brains and guts and, most important, pride are yearning to say yes. Practice.
quotes.author: Cole Harmonson

quotes.quote: When you say 'yes' to others, make sure you're not saying 'no' to yourself.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Coffee is a girl who never tells a boy no.
quotes.author: Andrew Smith

quotes.quote: If you must say yes, say it with an open heart. If you must say no, say it without fear.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: It's only by saying no that you can concentrate on the things that really matter.
quotes.author: Scott Belsky

quotes.quote: If you believe that saying no will get you shot, well, what a fine way to go.
quotes.author: Peter Block

quotes.quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: The marks humans leave are too often scars.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The person may have a scar, but it also means they have a story.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: A scar does not form on the dying. A scar means I survived.
quotes.author: Chris Cleave

quotes.quote: What doesn't kill you is gonna leave a scar.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Be proud of every scar on your heart, each one holds a lifetime's worth of lessons.
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: She wears her scars like a warrior, for they're a reminder she's alive.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: To be alive at all is to have scars.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Our scars are a witness to the world. They are a part of our story. Healed wounds that are symbols that God has restored us.
quotes.author: Louie Giglio

quotes.quote: I think scars are like battle wounds - beautiful, in a way. They show what you've been through and how strong you are for coming out of it.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Our scars make us beautiful.
quotes.author: Danielle Orner

quotes.quote: Turn your scars into stars.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Scars. A sign that you had been hurt. A sign that you had healed.
quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

quotes.quote: Wounds turn into scars and scars make you tough.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: Every scar that you have is a reminder not just that you got hurt, but that you survived.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Scars are a warrior's beauty marks.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Scars show us where we have been, they do not dictate where we are going.
quotes.author: David Rossi

quotes.quote: Scars speak more loudly than the sword that caused them.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Don't hide your scars. Wear them as proof that God heals.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A scar nobly got is a good livery of honor.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Scars are tattoos with better stories.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Scars are just a treasure map for pain you've buried too deep to remember.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: What the mind forgets, the scars keep remembering.
quotes.author: Edith L. Tiempo

quotes.quote: Just because the scars have healed, doesn't mean that the pain has.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Even when the wound is healed the scar remains.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: I'm grateful for every scar, some pages turned, some bridges burned, but there were lessons learned.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: Life gives you enough scars, you don't need to manufacture your own.
quotes.author: Andy Biersack

quotes.quote: The best people all have some kind of scar.
quotes.author: Kiera Cass

quotes.quote: Scenery can be a violent stimulant.
quotes.author: Margaret Drabble

quotes.quote: Scenery without solace is meaningless.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Scenery is fine but human nature is finer.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Wilderness without wildlife is just scenery.
quotes.author: Lois Crisler

quotes.quote: The scenery when it is truly seen reacts on the life of the seer.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Drive slow and enjoy the scenery - drive fast and join the scenery.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: The most beautiful scenery in the world is when our friends come into view.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: There's a lot of optimism in changing scenery, in seeing what's down the road.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.quote: The really happy person is the one who can enjoy the scenery, even when they have to take a detour.
quotes.author: Sir James Jeans

quotes.quote: The influence of fine scenery, the presence of mountains, appeases our irritations and elevates our friendships.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The scenery is time bound but the seer is timeless. You are the timeless seer in the midst of time bound scenery.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Gratitude doesn't change the scenery. It merely washes clean the glass you look through so you can clearly see the colors.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Nature is not made after such a fashion as we would have her. We piously exaggerate her wonders, as the scenery around our home.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There is a serene and settled majesty to woodland scenery that enters into the soul and delights and elevates it, and fills it with noble inclinations.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: It would probably astound each of us beyond measure to be let into his neighbors mind and to find how different the scenery was there from that of his own.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: To myself, mountains are the beginning and the end of all natural scenery; in them, and in the forms of inferior landscape that lead to them, my affections are wholly bound up.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The sky is the soul of all scenery. It makes the earth lovely at sunrise and splendid at sunset. In the one it breathes over the earth a crystal-like ether, in the other a liquid gold.
quotes.author: Thomas Cole

quotes.quote: Even the most beautiful scenery is no longer assured of our love after we have lived in it for three months, and some distant coast attracts our avarice: possessions are generally diminished by possession.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Terrestrial scenery is much, but it is not all. Men go in search of it; but the celestial scenery journeys to them; it goes its way round the world. It has no nation, it costs no wearinesss, it knows no bonds.
quotes.author: Alice Meynell

quotes.quote: A good-looking piece of scenery anywhere delights the eye and elevates the spirits. Some of us, crude creatures that we are, are merely excited; finer souls draw ethical and spiritual nutrients from the sight.
quotes.author: Barbara Holland

quotes.quote: The scenery of mountains painted on the ever-changing azure canvas of the sky, the mysterious mechanism of the human body, the rose, the green grass carpet, the magnanimity of souls, the loftiness of minds, the depth of love - all these things remind us of a God who is beautiful and noble.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: The most stupendous scenery ceases to be sublime when it becomes distinct, or in other words limited, and the imagination is no longer encouraged to exaggerate it. The actual height and breadth of a mountain or a waterfall are always ridiculously small; they are the imagined only that content us.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When you're on a merry-go-round, you miss a lot of the scenery.
quotes.author: Neil Diamond

quotes.quote: The primitive style makes nature look like stage scenery.
quotes.author: E. J. Hughes

quotes.quote: An optimist is someone who gets treed by a lion but enjoys the scenery.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Throw open your window and let the scenery of clouds and sky enter your room.
quotes.author: Yosa Buson

quotes.quote: Opera is a musical scenery, a musical atmosphere in which the characters move and talk.
quotes.author: Erik Satie

quotes.quote: My experiences have taught me that things rarely improve with a simple change of scenery.
quotes.author: Pittacus Lore

quotes.quote: The scenery doesn't necessarily improve in proportion to how far you travel or how much you spend.
quotes.author: Ron Lizzi

quotes.quote: Balloonists have an unsurpassed view of the scenery, but there is always the possibility that it may collide with them.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia cannot be understood without understanding despair.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia may be a necessary consequence of literacy.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia is hearing voices, not doing voices.
quotes.author: Maria Bamford

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia beats dining alone.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: Adults with schizophrenia are not attractive in the way that an abandoned baby or abused dog is.
quotes.author: Paula Sellmeyer

quotes.quote: There is no such condition as schizophrenia, but the label is a social fact and the social fact a political event.
quotes.author: Ronald David Laing

quotes.quote: They've always tried to help me, but having schizophrenia it was hard to receive the help.
quotes.author: Robert Lawton

quotes.quote: When it comes to the treatment of patients with chronic schizophrenia, the glass is only half-full.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Lieberman

quotes.quote: Writing is a socially acceptable form of schizophrenia.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: When I talk to someone with schizophrenia, I understand them hearing voices. It puts them at ease to know they're not the only one.
quotes.author: Barbara Lindsay

quotes.quote: There is no difference between acute schizophrenia and a world at war.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia: A psychotic disorder characterized by withdrawal from reality, illogical patters of thinking, delusions, and hallucinations. See also: Nightmare.
quotes.author: Holly Schindler

quotes.quote: There are things that tend to moderate with age. Schizophrenia is somewhat like that.
quotes.author: John Forbes Nash

quotes.quote: As insanity in a higher sense, is the beginning of all wisdom, so is schizophrenia the beginning of all art, all fantasy.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia demons live in my head.
quotes.author: Wesley Willis

quotes.quote: We children of schizophrenics are the great secret keepers, the ones who don't want you to think that anything is wrong.
quotes.author: Mira Bartok

quotes.quote: Labels are for canned goods!
quotes.author: Christine Klaass Smith

quotes.quote: I believe that the human race has developed a form of collective schizophrenia in which we are not only the slaves to this imposed thought behavior, but we are also the police force of it.
quotes.author: David Icke

quotes.quote: Of all the things I've lost, I miss my mind the most.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The schizophrenic mind is not so much split as shattered. I like to say schizophrenia is like a waking nightmare.
quotes.author: Elyn Saks

quotes.quote: There are things that tend to moderate with age. Schizophrenia is somewhat like that.
quotes.author: John Forbes Nash

quotes.quote: After a century of studying schizophrenia, the cause of the disorder remains unknown.
quotes.author: Thomas R. Insel

quotes.quote: Please hear this: There are not 'schizophrenics.' There are people with schizophrenia.
quotes.author: Elyn Saks

quotes.quote: Some people say I'm unique, that there aren't other people with schizophrenia like me. Well, there are people like me out there, but the stigma is so great that they don't come forward.
quotes.author: Elyn Saks

quotes.quote: There are a lot of mental cases [on the streets]. A lot of them have schizophrenia and they tend to use drugs a lot.
quotes.author: David Davis

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia means difficulty in comprehending reality.
quotes.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

quotes.quote: Our society produces schizos the same way it produces Prell Shampoo and Ford cars, the only difference being that the schizos are not salable.
quotes.author: Giles Deleuze

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia rolls in like a slow fog, becoming imperceptibly thicker as time goes on. At first, the day is bright enough, the sky is clear, the sunlight warms your shoulders. But soon, you notice a haze beginning to gather around you, and the air feels not quite so warm. After a while, the sun is a dim lightbulb behind a heavy cloth. The horizon has vanished into a gray mist, and you feel a thick dampness in your lungs as you stand, cold and wet, in the afternoon dark.
quotes.author: Elyn R. Saks

quotes.quote: There was still a grieving period when I first received the diagnosis, because there really are not a lot of success stories in broad circulation about people living with schizoaffective disorder or schizophrenia. Most of what we hear in the news or media are the negative stories about people living with schizophrenia or negative depictions about mental illness in general. So, I no longer was sure where I was going to end up and that added an additional element of fear.
quotes.author: Lauren (owner of the Living Well with Schizophrenia YouTube channel)

quotes.quote: Schizophrenia affects so much of the body and mind. These symptoms come from the condition itself, the medicine, and a little of both. Nothing can prepare you for all that might happen over the lifetime of a psychotic illness. If you know a psychotic person, be kind: they’re going through a lot.
quotes.author: Rose Parker

quotes.quote: A scholar is a candle which the love and desire of all men will light.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A scholar is like a book written in a dead language â€” it is not every one that can read in it.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Iron sharpens iron; scholar, the scholar.
quotes.author: William Drummond

quotes.quote: A scholar does not wish to be always pumping his brains; he wants gossips.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A scholar who cherishes the love of comfort is not fit to be deemed a scholar.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The mind of the scholar, if he would leave it large and liberal, should come in contact with other minds.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: A scholar without diligence is a lover without money.
quotes.author: Muslih-uddin Sadi

quotes.quote: The scholar does not consider gold and jade to be precious treasures, but loyalty and good faith.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The scholar's greatest weakness: calling procrastination research.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The minds of scholars are libraries; those of antiquaries, lumber-rooms; those of sportsmen, kennels; those of epicures, larders and cellars.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: One learns more from a good scholar in a rage than from a score of lucid and laborious drudges.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The humblest painter is a true scholar; and the best of scholars the scholar of nature.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Originality is the essence of true scholarship. Creativity is the soul of the true scholar.
quotes.author: Nnamdi Azikiwe

quotes.quote: There mark what ills the scholar's life assail, toil, envy, want, and patron.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The world's great men have not commonly been scholars, nor its great scholars great men.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: And let a scholar all earth's volumes carry, he will be but a walking dictionary: a mere articulate clock.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.quote: When scholars study a thing, they strive to kill it first, if it's alive; then they have the parts and the'be lost the whole, for the link that's missing was the living soul.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: It is the unknown that excites the ardor of scholars, who, in the known alone, would shrivel up with boredom.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: A scholar must not only be capable of hard, often totally resultless work - he must actually relish it.
quotes.author: Richard D. Altick

quotes.quote: The truth of the scholar, alone in his study, does not always accord with what the world at large considers to be true.
quotes.author: Eiji Yoshikawa

quotes.quote: True scholarship consists in knowing not what things exist, but what they mean; it is not memory but judgement.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: When a scholar goes to seek out a bride he should take along an ignoramus as an expert.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: Each day is the scholar of yesterday.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The greatest scholars are not usually the wisest people.
quotes.author: Chaucer

quotes.quote: The success of great scholars and thinkers is commonly a courtier-like success, not kingly, not manly.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The ink of the scholar is more sacred than the blood of the martyr.
quotes.author: Mohammed

quotes.quote: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: Do you know the secret of the true scholar? In every man there is something wherein I may learn of him; and in that I am his pupil.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If the scholar feels that he must know everything about any topic, he is in trouble - and will not publish with a clear conscience.
quotes.author: Kenneth L. Pike

quotes.quote: You never replace a great scholar who retires. If you try to do that, you end up with burnt-out volcanoes.
quotes.author: Guido Calabresi

quotes.quote: Scholastic learning and polemical divinity retarded the growth of all true knowledge.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: There is more scholarly work on the life-habits of the dung fly than on existential risks [to humanity].
quotes.author: Nick Bostrom

quotes.quote: Academic work is one of those fields which contain a pearl so precious that it is worth while to sell all our possessions, keeping nothing for ourselves, in order to be able to acquire it.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: But I do say that educated and scholarly men, if they're brilliant and creative to begin with "which, unfortunately, is rarely the case" tend to leave infinitely more valuable records behind them than men do who are merely brilliant and creative. They tend to express themselves more clearly, and they usually have a passion for following their thoughts through to the end.
quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Most scholarly books we read for the information or insight they contain. But some we return to simply for the pleasure of the author's company.
quotes.author: Michael Dirda

quotes.quote: The course of every intellectual, if he pursues his journey long and unflinchingly enough, ends in the obvious, from which the non-intellectuals have never stirred.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: An intellectual is a man who takes more words than necessary to tell more than he knows.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: One cannot demand of a scholar that he show himself a scholar everywhere in society, but the whole tenor of his behavior must none the less betray the thinker, he must always be instructive, his way of judging a thing must even in the smallest matters be such that people can see what it will amount to when, quietly and self-collected, he puts this power to scholarly use.
quotes.author: G. C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: In general, when reading a scholarly critic, one profits more from his quotations than from his comments.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Life at university, with its intellectual and inconclusive discussions at a postgraduate level is on the whole a bad training for the real world. Only men of very strong character surmount this handicap.
quotes.author: Paul Chambers

quotes.quote: It's the intellectual who transforms the concept of the world into the problem of meaning.
quotes.author: Max Weber

quotes.quote: Too academic an education can inhibit the workings of the creative mind.
quotes.author: Margaret Drabble

quotes.quote: Academic and aristocratic people live in such an uncommon atmosphere that common sense can rarely reach them.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Scholarly talks and discussion require manner, virtue, and referral. Otherwise, the outcome holds nothing.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: As a scholarly discipline, economics has always suffered from physics envy.
quotes.author: Robert Kuttner

quotes.quote: Almost all scholarly research carries practical and political implications. Better that we should spell these out ourselves than leave that task to people with a vested interest in stressing only some of the implications and falsifying others. The idea that academics should remain "above the fray" only gives ideologues license to misuse our work.
quotes.author: Stephanie Coontz

quotes.quote: The main part of intellectual education is not the acquisition of facts but learning how to make facts live.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: An intellectual is a man who doesn't know how to park a bike.
quotes.author: Spiro T. Agnew

quotes.quote: The intellectual is different from the ordinary man, but only in certain sections of his personality, and even then not all the time.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: All generous minds have a horror of what are commonly called 'Facts'. They are the brute beasts of the intellectual domain.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: An academic dialect is perfected when its terms are hard to understand and refer only to one another.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The usual duty of the â€œintellectualâ€ is to argue for complexity and to insist that phenomena in the world of ideas should not be sloganized or reduced to easily repeated formulae.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: The aim of the scholarly editor is not to produce the the easiest text for the reader, but to get as near as he can to the text of the author.
quotes.author: Frederic G. Kenyon

quotes.quote: The flame of knowledge enkindled in the mind itself can make a person scholarly.
quotes.author: Rig Veda

quotes.quote: Books are the best of things, well used; abused, among the worst...They are for nothing but to inspire.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The scientific and scholarly community is marked by the belief that the truth is to be found in all; none can claim it as their monopoly.
quotes.author: John Charles Polanyi

quotes.quote: A genius is someone who takes a complex thing and makes it look simple. An academic does the opposite.
quotes.author: Robert Fanney

quotes.quote: There is no single truth, but each of the scholarly disciplines has methods which lead one ever closer to the truth.
quotes.author: Howard Gardner

quotes.quote: Don't appear so scholarly, pray. Humanize your talk, and speak to be understood. Do you think a Greek name gives more weight to your reasons?
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Scholarship is polite argument.
quotes.author: Philip Rieff

quotes.quote: Scholarship can find little to say about the obvious.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Scholarship that is indifferent to human suffering is immoral.
quotes.author: Richard Levins

quotes.quote: Scholarship, save by accident, is never the measure of a man's power.
quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.quote: Scholarship hath no fury like that of a language purist faced with sludge.
quotes.author: William Zinsser

quotes.quote: Do not be an arrogant scholar, for scholarship cannot subsist with arrogance.
quotes.author: Umar

quotes.quote: Scholarship is to be created not by compulsion, but by awakening a pure interest in knowledge.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Mainstream economics scholarship produces theory without facts ("pure theory") and facts without theory ("applied economics")
quotes.author: Michel Chossudovsky

quotes.quote: All your scholarship would be in vain if at the same time you do not build your character and attain mastery over your thoughts and your actions.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Scholarship has the same relationship to wisdom as righteousness has to holiness: it is cold and dry, it is loveless and knows nodeep feelings of inadequacy or longing.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The morality of scholarship, as currently practiced, is to encourage everyone to replace difficult pleasures by pleasures universally accessible precisely because they are easier.
quotes.author: Harold Bloom

quotes.quote: Scholarship cannot do without literature.... It needs literature to float it, to set it current, to authenticate it to all the race, to get it out of closets and into the brains of men who stir abroad.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: The riches of scholarship, the benignities of literature, defy fortune and outlive calamity. They are beyond the reach of thief or moth or rust. As they cannot be inherited, so they cannot, be alienated.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: All scholarship, like all science, is an ongoing, open-ended discussion in which all conclusions are tentative forever, the principal value and charm of the game being the discovery of the totally unexpected.
quotes.author: Hugh Nibley

quotes.quote: True scholarship consists in knowing not what things exist, but what they mean; it is not memory but judgment.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: The ceaseless, senseless demand for original scholarship in a number of fields, where only erudition is now possible, has led either to sheer irrelevancy, the famous knowing of more and more about less and less, or to the development of pseudo-scholars.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Originality is the essence of true scholarship. Creativity is the soul of the true scholar.
quotes.author: Nnamdi Azikiwe

quotes.quote: Erudition without pedantry is as a rare as wisdom itself.
quotes.author: George Sarton

quotes.quote: Erudition - dust shaken out of a book into an empty skull.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Erudition, like a bloodhound, is a charming thing when held firmly in leash, but it is not so attractive when turned loose upon a defenseless and unerudite public.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Erudition is the crude residue of wilted harvests; wit: the meddlesome weed that wilts them.
quotes.author: Ashim Shanker

quotes.quote: An athletic scholarship shouldn't be the best opportunity to receive a quality education.
quotes.author: Jalen Rose

quotes.quote: The world of scholarship is much more measured in its appreciation and also its criticism than the world of popular literature.
quotes.author: Deborah Harkness

quotes.quote: For scholarship - if it is to be scholarship - requires, in addition to liberty, that the truth take precedence over all sectarian interests, including self-interest.
quotes.author: John Charles Polanyi

quotes.quote: The higher paranoid scholarship is nothing if not coherent — in fact the paranoid mind is far more coherent than the real world.
quotes.author: Richard Hofstadter

quotes.quote: Erudition can produce foliage without bearing fruit.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: ...there's no reason why scholarship can't be as seriously playful as bubble-blowing.
quotes.author: Jonathon Keats

quotes.quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: School prepares you for the real world... which also bites.
quotes.author: Jim Benton

quotes.quote: What is the most important thing one learns in school? Self-esteem, support, and friendship.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: It is not who you attend school with but who controls the school you attend.
quotes.author: Nick Giovanni

quotes.quote: School is a place that provides education and education is the key to life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The fundamental purpose of school is learning, not teaching.
quotes.author: Richard DuFour

quotes.quote: In school, you learn how to learn.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I think school is a place where thinking should be taught.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: You can't learn in school what the world is going to do next year.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It's a mistake to think that once you're done with school you need never learn anything new.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Jails and prisons are the complement of schools; so many less as you have of the latter, so many more must you have of the former.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: The chief reason for going to school is to get the impression fixed for life that there is a book side for everything.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: If there were no schools to take the children away from home part of the time, the insane asylums would be filled with mothers.
quotes.author: Edgar W. Howe

quotes.quote: In school, you're taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you're given a test that teaches you a lesson.
quotes.author: Tom Bodett

quotes.quote: Cheating in school is a form of self-deception. We go to school to learn. We cheat ourselves when we coast on the efforts and scholarship of someone else.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: What a school thinks about its library is a measure of what it feels about education.
quotes.author: Harold Howe

quotes.quote: School made us 'literate' but did not teach us to read for pleasure.
quotes.author: Ambeth R. Ocampo

quotes.quote: School should be the best party in town.
quotes.author: Peter Kline

quotes.quote: There's no use going to school unless your final destination is the library.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: The things taught in schools and colleges are not an education, but the means of education.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We don't stop going to school when we graduate.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: I'm not going to school just for the academics - I wanted to share ideas, to be around people who are passionate about learning.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: Every time you stop a school, you will have to build a jail. What you gain at one end you lose at the other. It's like feeding a dog on his own tail. It won't fatten the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I never let my schooling interfere with my education.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There is a grave defect in the school where the playground suggests happy and classroom disagreeable thoughts.
quotes.author: John Spalding

quotes.quote: If the school sends out children with a desire for knowledge and some idea of how to acquire and use it, it will have done its work.
quotes.author: Richard Livingstone

quotes.quote: You don't appreciate a lot of stuff in school until you get older. Little things like being spanked every day by a middle aged woman: Stuff you pay good money for in later life.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: We class schools into four grades: leading school, first-rate school, good school and school.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: The pathway to educational excellence lies within each school.
quotes.author: Terrance Deal

quotes.quote: Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Science is one thing, wisdom is another. Science is an edged tool, with which men play like children, and cut their own fingers.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Eddington

quotes.quote: Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Science is a cemetery of dead ideas
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: There is something fascinating about science. One gets such wholesale returns of conjecture out of such a trifling investment of fact.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Science does not know its debt to imagination.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The important thing in science is not so much to obtain new facts as to discover new ways of thinking about them.
quotes.author: William Lawrence Bragg

quotes.quote: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of imagination.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Science has made us gods even before we are worthy of being men.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: Science is built up of facts, as a house is built of stones; but an accumulation of facts is no more a science than a heap of stones is a house.
quotes.author: Henri Poincar

quotes.quote: A science is any discipline in which the fool of this generation can go beyond the point reached by the genius of the last generation.
quotes.author: Max Gluckman

quotes.quote: Science is simply common sense at its best, that is, rigidly accurate in observation, and merciless to fallacy in logic.
quotes.author: Thomas Henry Huxley

quotes.quote: Science is a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one's living at it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To know the history of science is to recognize the mortality of any claim to universal truth.
quotes.author: Evelyn Fox Keller

quotes.quote: The greatest discoveries of science have always been those that forced us to rethink our beliefs about the universe and our place in it.
quotes.author: Robert L. Park

quotes.quote: Science is the topography of ignorance.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Science, like life, feeds on its own decay. New facts burst old rules; then newly divined conceptions bind old and new together into a reconciling law.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Science without conscience is the soul's perdition.
quotes.author: Franois Rabelais

quotes.quote: All science is either physics or stamp collecting.
quotes.author: E. Rutherford

quotes.quote: Science can only ascertain what is, but not what should be, and outside of its domain value judgements of all kinds remain necessary.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Science is all those things which are confirmed to such a degree that it would be unreasonable to withhold one's provisional consent.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: Science is a first-rate piece of furniture for a man's upper chamber, if he has common sense on the ground floor.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: The whole of science is nothing more than a refinement of everyday thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In all science, error precedes the truth, and it is better it should go first than last.
quotes.author: Hugh Walpole

quotes.quote: Science commits suicide when it adopts a creed.
quotes.author: Thomas Henry Huxley

quotes.quote: Science, in the very act of solving problems, creates more of them.
quotes.author: Abraham Flexner

quotes.quote: Science is always wrong. It never solves a problem without creating ten more.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Reason, Observation, and Experience ; The Holy Trinity of Science.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Science, at bottom, is really anti-intellectual. It always distrusts pure reason, and demands the production of objective fact.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Science may set limits to knowledge, but should not set limits to imagination.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Science is nothing but developed perception, interpreted intent, common sense rounded out and minutely articulated.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Scientific thought, then, is not momentary; it is not a static instance; it is a process.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.quote: Scientific theory is a contrived foothold in the chaos of living phenomena.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Reich

quotes.quote: We are the recipients of scientific method. We can each be a creative and active part of it if we so desire.
quotes.author: Kary Mullis

quotes.quote: Scientific research can reduce superstition by encouraging people to think and view things in terms of cause and effect.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: For every scientific or engineering action, there is an equal and opposite social reaction.
quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quotes.quote: Scientific truth is beyond loyalty and disloyalty.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: A scientific approach means knowing what one knows and what one doesn't. Absolute or complete knowledge is unscientific.
quotes.author: Karl Jaspers

quotes.quote: A good scientific theory is one which is falsifiable, which has not been falsified.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Scientific principles and laws do not lie on the surface of nature. They are hidden, and must be wrested from nature by an active and elaborate technique of inquiry.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Theory is the essence of facts. Without theory scientific knowledge would be only worthy of the madhouse.
quotes.author: Oliver Heaviside

quotes.quote: This means that to entrust to science - or to deliberate control according to scientific principles - more than scientific method can achieve may have deplorable effects.
quotes.author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quotes.quote: Scientific research is one of the most exciting and rewarding of occupations.
quotes.author: Frederick Sanger

quotes.quote: Scientific progress consists in the development of new concepts.
quotes.author: Ernst Mayr

quotes.quote: Scientific inquiry shouldn't stop just because a reasonable explanation has apparently been found.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: In scientific thinking are always present elements of poetry. Science and music requires a thought homogeneous.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The scientific imagination always restrains itself within the limits of probability.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Scientific reality is the modern human condition, and you can see that in the symbolic nature of my work.
quotes.author: Thom Mayne

quotes.quote: Scientific beliefs are supported by evidence, and they get results. Myths and faiths are not and do not.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Scientific method is the way to truth, but it affords, even in principle, no unique definition of truth. Any so-called pragmatic definition of truth is doomed to failure equally.
quotes.author: Willard Van Orman Quine

quotes.quote: Great scientific discoveries have been made by men seeking to verify quite erroneous theories about the nature of things.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Scientific knowledge advances haltingly and is stimulated by contention and doubt.
quotes.author: Claude Levi-Strauss

quotes.quote: A new scientific truth does not triumph by convincing opponents and making them see the light, but rather because its opponents eventually die, and a new generation grows up that is familiar with it.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: Scientific knowledge is in perpetual evolution; it finds itself changed from one day to the next.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.quote: The real purpose of the scientific method is to make sure nature hasn't misled you into thinking you know something you actually don't know.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Scientific management promised to replace rules of thumb with accurate measurements.
quotes.author: Jill Lepore

quotes.quote: Scientific thought and its creation is the common and shared heritage of mankind.
quotes.author: Abdus Salam

quotes.quote: Science is what scientists do, and there are as many scientific methods as there are individual scientists.
quotes.author: Percy Williams Bridgman

quotes.quote: Scientific reasoning is a kind of dialogue between the possible and the actual, between what might be and what is in fact the case.
quotes.author: Peter Medawar

quotes.quote: In scientific work, those who refuse to go beyond fact rarely get as far as fact.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: The scientific mind does not so much provide the right answers as ask the right questions.
quotes.author: Claude Levi-Strauss

quotes.quote: A motorcycle functions entirely in accordance with the laws of reason, and a study of the art of motorcycle maintenance is really a miniature study of the art of rationality itself.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: That's all the motorcycle is, a system of concepts worked out in steel.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: If the bike is a building, then the scooter is the foundation.
quotes.author: Chinmay Ranjan Nayak

quotes.quote: It is easy to turn a scooter, but not a train with 40 bogeys. This is such a big country, changes are constant and widespread.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: Scotland is about layering. The weather changes every 10 minutes.
quotes.author: Sam Heughan

quotes.quote: Scotland and England may sometimes be rivals, but by geography, we are also neighbours. By history, allies. By economics, partners. And by fate and fortune, comrades, friends and family.
quotes.author: Douglas Alexander

quotes.quote: Scotland should be nothing less than equal with all the other nations of the world.
quotes.author: Sean Connery

quotes.quote: Scotland is the Canada of England!
quotes.author: Rainn Wilson

quotes.quote: One of Scotland's most important cultural exports - stories.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.quote: Scotland can't afford to take their minds off the gas.
quotes.author: Andy Townsend

quotes.quote: We look to Scotland for all our ideas of civilization.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The religion in Scotland is one of the most patronising things... after the weather.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: In Scotland, when people congregate, they tend to argue and discuss and reason; in Orkney, they tell stories.
quotes.author: George Mackay Brown

quotes.quote: Scotland is a great country and many wonderful things have come out of this country, however England gets the glory.
quotes.author: Joseph Hume

quotes.quote: Scotland by no means escaped the fate ordained for every country which is connected, but not incorporated, with another country of greater resources.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: Scotland is the country above all others that I have seen, in which a man of imagination may carve out his own pleasures; there are so many inhabited solitudes.
quotes.author: Dorothy Wordsworth

quotes.quote: There are two seasons in Scotland: June and Winter.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: In Scotland, there is no such thing as bad weather - only the wrong clothes.
quotes.author: Billy Connelly

quotes.quote: Scotland is a great nation, but its horses are very uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.quote: Scotland cannot be the only 'something for nothing' country in the world.
quotes.author: Johann Lamont

quotes.quote: Scotland has a great deal to offer the world in terms of our approach to key economic and social issues.
quotes.author: Nicola Sturgeon

quotes.quote: ScoutingÂ is a man's job cut down to a boy's size.
quotes.author: Baden Powell de Aquino

quotes.quote: InÂ scoutingÂ you are combating the brooding of selfishness.
quotes.author: Baden Powell de Aquino

quotes.quote: Scouting exposes young men to people and experiences that encourage and nurture positive moral values. But we mustn't take scouting for granted. You can do nothing more important for young people today than to continue, or begin, your support of Scouting. I have never met anyone with devoted Scouting experience who was not a solid citizen, a loyal friend, and a patriot. We need more of them.
quotes.author: Wallace G. Wilkinson

quotes.quote: We shall not cease from exploration, and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: ScoutingÂ teaches a boy to take care of himself and stand on his own two feet.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: WhatÂ scoutingÂ says to people is: Every child has a right to have an adventure. Life is about grabbing opportunities
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.quote: ScoutingÂ is a game with a purpose.
quotes.author: William Hillcourt

quotes.quote: Scouting is not an abstruse or difficult science: rather it is a jolly game if you take it in the right light. In the same time it is educative, and (like Mercy) it is apt to benefit him that giveth as well as him that receives.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Scouting is important. You just want to know whom you are playing against and how to play them well within the team's defense.
quotes.author: Terry Rozier

quotes.quote: ScoutingÂ rises within you and inspires you to put forth your best.
quotes.author: Juliette Gordon Low

quotes.quote: ScoutingÂ is a game for boys under the leadership of boys under the direction of a man.
quotes.author: Baden Powell de Aquino

quotes.quote: The free exploring mind of the individual human is the most valuable thing in the world.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: InÂ scouting, a boy is encouraged to educate himself instead of being instructed.
quotes.author: Robert Powell

quotes.quote: The sport inÂ scoutingÂ is to find the good in every boy and develop it.
quotes.author: Robert Powell

quotes.quote: Scouting is nothing less than applied Christianity.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: The method of instruction in scouting is that of creating in the boy the desire to learn for himself.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Teach scouts not how to get a living, but how to live.Â
quotes.author: Baden Powell de Aquino

quotes.quote: I have over and over again explained that the purpose of the Boy Scout and Girl Guide Movement is to build men and women as citizens endowed with the three H’s namely, Health, Happiness and Helpfulness. The man or woman who succeeds in developing these three attributes has secured the main steps to success this Life.
quotes.author: Lord Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Be Prepared… the meaning of the motto is that a scout must prepare himself by previous thinking out and practicing how to act on any accident or emergency so that he is never taken by surprise.
quotes.author: Lord Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: I was in the Boy Scouts for about four years until my troop disbanded. It is really one of the best activities youths can get involved in and nearly every scout I have known has been a class act due to the discipline the Scouts have instilled in them.
quotes.author: Ted Stevens

quotes.quote: Being in the army is like being in the Boy Scouts, except that the Boy Scouts have adult supervision.
quotes.author: Blake Clark

quotes.quote: The Girl Scouts is an organization that constantly gives you new goals to achieve and that's what life is all about.
quotes.author: Maria Bartiromo

quotes.quote: As a young boy, scouting gave me a confidence and camaraderie that is hard to find in modern life.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.quote: The Boy Scouts of America stands for a set of principles. These principles have a lot of staying power. The values you learn as a Scout are like a compass. They can help you find your way through difficult and sometimes unchartered terrain. The principles of Scouting give you a sense of what's important. I feel I owe the Boy Scouts a great deal, both personally and professionally.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: "On my honor" - what an ennobling phrase! Three short words, nine letters, but the summation of all we call character. From the Boy Scout's Oath.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Being a Boy Scout saved my life. I was a bookish, introverted kid, shy and withdrawn, unhappy and easily bullied. I was also gay, although I didn't know it yet. I should've been miserable. But being a scout got me out of myself and into the world.
quotes.author: Christopher Bram

quotes.quote: Our position has never been that people should be forced out of Scouting. We have always said that the values of Scouting are universal they should be welcome to everyone who is willing to live by the Scout oath and the Scout law.
quotes.author: Gwen Ifill

quotes.quote: To the man who reads 'Scouting for Boys' superficially, there is a disappointing lack of religion in the book. But to him who tries it in practice, the basic religion underlying it soon becomes apparent.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: It is a matter of honor for a Scout to learn to be responsible and honest so that others can trust him no matter what the situation.
quotes.author: Edith Songer

quotes.quote: The basic principles of scouting can be summed up in the Scout Law. Boy Scouts state that they will do their best to be: trustworthy, loyal, helpful, friendly, courteous, kind, obedient, cheerful, thrifty, brave, clean, and reverent.
quotes.author: Patrick Flaherty

quotes.quote: The Holy Scriptures are our letters from home.
quotes.author: Augustine

quotes.quote: Ignorance of the Scriptures is ignorance of Christ.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: The Scriptures were written, not to make us astronomers, but to make us saints.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: The Scriptures were not given to increase our knowledge, but to change our lives.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: We must not only read the Scriptures, but we must make their rules of life our own.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Yet one thing secures us what ever betide, the scriptures assures us that the Lord will provide.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: The Scriptures of God are my only foundation and substance in all matters of weight and importance.
quotes.author: John Knox

quotes.quote: When you read the sacred Scriptures, or any other book, never think how you read, but what you read.
quotes.author: John Philip Kemble

quotes.quote: We were given the Scriptures to humble us into realizing that God is right, and the rest of us are just guessing.
quotes.author: Rich Mullins

quotes.quote: Any manipulation of the Scriptures to make them speak peace to the natural man is evil and can only lead to ruin.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: The Scriptures teach us the best way of living, the noblest way of suffering, and the most comfortable way of dying.
quotes.author: John Flavel

quotes.quote: The scriptures say to wake up from the deep sleep of ignorance, remain fully awake, remain conscious, & go on learning.
quotes.author: Rama Swami

quotes.quote: Scriptures are like packets of light that illuminate our minds and give place to guidance and inspiration from on high.
quotes.author: Richard G. Scott

quotes.quote: The truths of the Scriptures are so marked and inimitable, that the inventor would be more of a miraculous character than the hero.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: In the divine Scriptures, there are shallows and there are deeps; shallows where the lamb may wade, and deeps where the elephant may swim.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: The Scriptures obtain full authority among believers only when men regard them as having sprung from heaven, as if there the living words of God were heard.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: The Scriptures are shallow enough for a babe to come and drink without fear of drowning and deep enough for theologians to swim in without ever reaching the bottom.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: The Holy Scriptures are that divine instrument by which we are taught what to believe, concerning God, ourselves, and all things, and how to please God unto eternal life.
quotes.author: John Robinson

quotes.quote: The scriptures make the danger of delay clear. It is that we may discover that we have run out of time. The God who gives us each day as a treasure will require an accounting.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: The inspired Scriptures make the clear distinction between false and true riches and make plain the reason why happiness is gained and fully enjoyed only by those who find true riches.
quotes.author: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quotes.quote: The scriptures offer us so many doctrinal diamonds. And when the light of the Spirit plays upon their several facets, they sparkle with celestial sense and illuminate the path we are to follow.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The Scriptures should be read with the aim of finding Christ in them. Whoever turns aside from this object, even though he wears himself out all his life in learning, he will never reach the knowledge of the truth.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: The Holy Scriptures surpass in efficaciousness all the arts and all the sciences of the philosophers and jurists; these, though good and necessary to life here below, are vain and of no effect as to what concerns the life eternal.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The scriptures bid us to send forth our light and our truth and when children carry within their hearts the torch of hope, they learn the darkness yields not only to man-made fire, but to starlight, to the rising sun, and to the light of the soul.
quotes.author: Dennis Kucinich

quotes.quote: And that the Scriptures, though not everywhere Free from corruption, or entire, or clear, Are uncorrupt, sufficient, clear, entire In all things which our needful faith require.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Scripture indicates that heaven is not distant but rather… heaven is near—in another realm.
quotes.author: Paul Enns

quotes.quote: Holy Scriptures; the precious promise of God.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The scriptures are in print what Christ is in person.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: The scriptures hold the keys to spiritual protection.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: The Holy Scriptures lead us to God and open the path to the knowledge of God.
quotes.author: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: There are men whose manners have the same essential splendor as the simple and awful sculpture on the friezes of the Parthenon, and the remains of the earliest Greek art.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sculpture occupies real space like we do... you walk around it and relate to it almost as another person or another object.
quotes.author: Chuck Close

quotes.quote: I think that any sculpture is a response to its environment. It can be brought to life or put to sleep by the environment.
quotes.author: Andy Goldsworthy

quotes.quote: Sculpture is more than painting. It is greater To raise the dead to life than to create Phantoms that seem to live.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The sculpture is already complete within the marble block, before I start my work. It is already there, I just have to chisel away the superfluous material.
quotes.author: Michaelangelo

quotes.quote: Where did I learn to understand sculpture? In the woods by looking at the trees, along roads by observing the formation of clouds, in the studio by studying the model, everywhere except in the schools.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.quote: Sculpture is the best comment that a painter can make on painting.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: A sculpture is just a painting cut out and stood up somewhere.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It is not hard to understand modern art. If it hangs on a wall it's a painting, and if you can walk around it it's a sculpture.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Painting is so poetic, while sculpture is more logical and scientific and makes you worry about gravity.
quotes.author: Damien Hirst

quotes.quote: You have to create your life. You have to carve it, like a sculpture.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: Sculpture is not the mere cutting of the form of anything in stone; it is the cutting of the effect of it. Very often the true form, in the marble, would not be in the least like itself.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: It is a great privilege to be able to work with, and I suppose work off, my feelings through sculpture.
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.quote: The picture that approaches sculpture nearest Is the best picture.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Sculpture is like archaeology: You dig in and you find something.
quotes.author: Georg Baselitz

quotes.quote: The art of sculpture is long ago perished to any real effect... it is the game of a rude and youthful people, and not the manly labour of a wise and spiritual nation.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Painting and sculpture are very archaic forms. It's the only thing left in our industrial society where an individual alone can make something with not just his own hands, but brains, imagination, heart maybe.
quotes.author: Philip Guston

quotes.quote: I really don't have a theme when I start a sculpture. The rock guides me to the final sculpture. I think that is true for many creative sculpture artists.
