quotes.author: Jimmy Carl Black

quotes.quote: Sculpture is the essence of things, the essence of nature, that which is perpetually human.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Lehmbruck

quotes.quote: I did my sculpture as a painter. I did not work as a sculptor.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Painting and sculpture help other people to see what a wonderful world we live in.
quotes.author: Henry Moore

quotes.quote: Sculpture is made by taking away, while painting is made by adding.
quotes.author: Michaelangelo

quotes.quote: Sculpture is what you bump into when you back up to see a painting.
quotes.author: Barnett Newman

quotes.quote: A piece of sculpture can have a hole through it and not be weakened if the hole is of a studied size, shape, and direction.
quotes.author: Henry Moore

quotes.quote: Sardinia has to have some of the best seafood on the planet. I'm a sea urchin freak, and Sardinia's are some of the best I've had.
quotes.author: Andrew Zimmern

quotes.quote: The only kind of seafood I trust is the fish stick, a totally featureless fish that doesn't have eyeballs or fins.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I have trouble with seafood because it tastes like a dock.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Seafood is one of the easiest things to digest - a bratwurst is really hard on the body.
quotes.author: Joey Chestnut

quotes.quote: Fresh seafood reminds me of Hawaii and eating raw ahi fish on the beach with a little soy sauce - instant sashimi.
quotes.author: Marie Helvin

quotes.quote: One of the first jobs I ever had was opening clams in a seafood restaurant, so I'm pretty quick at it.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.quote: Portugal has amazing seafood with all the eyeballs staring back at you.
quotes.author: Annie Wersching

quotes.quote: I grew up in the Philippines and we had all this amazing fresh seafood, but uni was something that I was weirded out by. It wasn't until I was an adult that I was like, 'Let me just go ahead and try this.'
quotes.author: Nico Santos

quotes.quote: Mobile is a seaport town, and we ate a lot of seafood. We'd go fishing, we'd catch our fish and we'd eat our fish. It was a ritual on Saturday morning for all my family - my grandfather, my brothers, my uncles, my father - to go fishing, and then the ladies of the family would clean the fish and fry them up.
quotes.author: Billy Williams

quotes.quote: I love seafood. Whenever I'm in Las Vegas, I love going to the Bellagio buffet because they have these great king crab legs.
quotes.author: Harland Williams

quotes.quote: I love seafood. I'm not a vegetarian but I'm probably a pescatarian.
quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

quotes.quote: Most seafoods should be simply threatened with heat and then celebrated with joy.
quotes.author: Jeff Smith

quotes.quote: You can put the greatest seafood restaurant next to an average steak house in an urban area, and that steak house will do more business than the seafood place. If you go to the water, you can put an average seafood place next to the greatest steak house, and people are going to eat seafood.
quotes.author: Tilman J. Fertitta

quotes.quote: To save the seas, we can eat sustainably and be conscious of the seafood we eat.
quotes.author: Carl Safina

quotes.quote: Remember that a very good sardine is always preferable to a not that good lobster.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: Why does Sea World have a seafood restaurant? I'm halfway through my fishburger and I realize, Oh my God. I could be eating a slow learner.
quotes.author: Lynda Montgomery

quotes.quote: The treaty has to be concocted to satisfy all tastes. One prepares the seafood, the meat, the chicken, and the rice, but they are just as assortment of separate dishes until they are blended into perfect unity, and the result is paella—or a treaty for all.
quotes.author: Bernardo Zuleta

quotes.quote: If I had the choice between smoked salmon and tinned salmon, I'd have it tinned. With vinegar.
quotes.author: Harold Wilson

quotes.quote: To bring to gaff a salmon than a bluefin tuna I would suna.
quotes.author: Ed Zern

quotes.quote: As to salmon, Walton scarcely speaks a true word about their habits, except by accident.
quotes.author: Andrew Lang

quotes.quote: Seafood makes you live 10 years more.
quotes.author: Kevin Steele

quotes.quote: Nothing is more exhilarating than fresh fish simply cooked.
quotes.author: Rick Stein

quotes.quote: Seafood is one of the last wild foods left that we eat regularly.
quotes.author: Exec Chef Bradley

quotes.quote: When chefs consider seafood, they don't consider trout seafood at all.
quotes.author: Brian Malarkey

quotes.quote: Yes... fish all bathe together. Although they do tend to eat one another. I often think... fish must get awfully tired of seafood. What are you thoughts, Hobson?
quotes.author: Arthur

quotes.quote: Want some sea food, Mama / Shrimps and rice they're very nice / Hold tight, hold tight, hold tight, hold tight / I like oysters, lobsters too / I like my tasty butter fish, foo / When I come home late at night / I get my favorite dish, fish.
quotes.author: Dick Brandow

quotes.quote: Well I'm the one-eyed cat / Peeping in a seafood store / I'm like the one-eyed cat / Peeping in a seafood store / I can tell by lookin' / You ain't no child no more.
quotes.author: Charles Calhoun

quotes.quote: Oh, I can cook, too, on top of the rest, / My seafood's the best in the town. / And I can cook, too. / My fish can't be beat, / My sugar's the sweetest around. / I'm a man's ideal of a perfect meal / Right down to the demi-tasse. / I'm a pot of joy for a hungry boy, / Baby, I'm cookin' with gas. / Oh, I'm a gumdrop, / A sweet lollipop, / A brook trout right out of the brook, / And what's more, baby, I can cook!
quotes.author: Fred Ebb

quotes.quote: Saint Johners are not rich folk in a fancy dining car, / Come sit around our table & put your belly to the bar, / Its where the lobsters crawl up King Street, / The Seafood Can't be beat / When you drink that Moosehead Beverage / You'll say... Ain't she so sweet!
quotes.author: Burt Green

quotes.quote: Seafood has always been a huge part of Massachusetts. I feel that the farm-to-table movement has highlighted the efforts put out by the fishermen and all their hard work. Fish is very seasonal, too, so it plays a big part not only getting the best, but the first of the seasonal catch. Customers are becoming very well educated about the product, so they understand and read menus that highlight that great product. As long as the chefs have a close relationship with their fishermen, it can only help to continue innovation and the ability for chefs to show off the best.
quotes.author: James Hackney

quotes.quote: When a man marries a whore, it is like trying to keep a seagull from the water.
quotes.author: Gengxin Li

quotes.quote: Seagulls that live near airports damage aeroplanes by flying into them. People use spikes and nets to stop seagulls roosting or to scare them away.
quotes.author: Isabel Thomas

quotes.quote: I must fly home to the Flock and be content as I am, as a poor limited seagull.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Seagulls, as you know, never falter, never stall. To stall in the air is for them disgrace and it is dishonor.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Most gulls don't bother to learn more than the simplest facts of flight— how to get from shore to food and back again. For most gulls, it is not flying that matters, but eating.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Seagull loves to fly. It makes her heart sing. But when she gets caught in a tangle of fishing line on the beach, Seagull can only watch as other birds fly effortlessly above.
quotes.author: Danny Snell

quotes.quote: I made that vow,/ Swore that two lives should be like one / As long as the seagull loved the sea, / As long as the sunflower sought the sun,/ It shall be, I said, for eternity,/ 'Twixt you and me!
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Seabirds evoke the spirit of the earth's wildest places. They spend large portions of their lives at sea, often far from land, and nest on beautiful remote islands that humans rarely visit.
quotes.author: Michael Brooke

quotes.quote: Life itself could never have been sustainable without seabirds. They are bringers of fertility, the deliverers of life from ocean to land.
quotes.author: Adam Nicolson

quotes.quote: Only the poets in the past would have thought of seabirds as creatures riding the ripples and current of the entire planet, but that is what the scientists are seeing now today.
quotes.author: Adam Nicolson

quotes.quote: Flight of my mind rises beneath the seagull’s wings …then ocean is my motherland I feel.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Freedom can be forgotten in the repressive countries. To remember freedom, it will be enough to watch a happy seagull flying in the sky!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The hard part's waiting for the seagulls to attack when you have a chip on your shoulder.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Do you also see every day what the seagull sees every day? Infinite gleams of the sea? Then, you are a seagull too!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Seagulls are a landfill nuisance because they fly away with food scraps and, as is their reputation, fight each other over them midflight, often losing them, and soon a lady has a half-eaten hamburger splashing into her backyard pool.
quotes.author: Jeanne Marie Laskas

quotes.quote: When the seagulls follow the trawler, it is because they think sardines will be thrown into the sea.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.quote: The gull sees farthest who flies highest.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: A seagull flying beautifully is heaven; a seagull hunting an innocent fish is hell! Existence is heaven and hell, joy and horror!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A seagull manager is one who periodically flies into the area, makes a lot of noise, dumps on the people, maybe eats their lunch, and flies away.
quotes.author: James Hunter

quotes.quote: Seahorses mate during the full moon. And they are great examples of role reversals— it is the male that bears the children.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: All seahorses live in saltwater; you'll never find one in freshwater.
quotes.author: Mark Schick

quotes.quote: Baby seahorses are tiny replicas of adults, and once they're out the pouch, they receive no parental assistance at all.
quotes.author: Mark Schick

quotes.quote: Absolutely captivating creatures, seahorses seem like a product of myth and imagination rather than of nature.
quotes.author: Sara A. Lourie

quotes.quote: They are so unlike typical fishes that they were once considered to be marine insects. With their upright posture, strange body-shape and features, and incredible camouflage, it is no wonder that people used to think that seahorses were mythological beings and assigned them such roles as bering sea nymphs and pulling Poseidon's chariot.
quotes.author: Sara A. Lourie

quotes.quote: In Chinese cultures, seahorses were believed to be some kind of sea dragon. They were revered as symbols of power and good luck.
quotes.author: Sara A. Lourie

quotes.quote: Like several other marine creatures and the chameleon, seahorses are able to very rapidly change colour.
quotes.author: Edward Edlington

quotes.quote: With a head like a horse, a tail like a monkey, and a pouch like a kangaroo, the seahorse acts like a chameleon, changing color to ward off danger, or to show that he and his mate are a lifelong pair
quotes.author: Chris Buttterworth

quotes.quote: Linger for a while and discover the secrets of the seahorse— one of the shyest fish in the sea.
quotes.author: Chris Buttterworth

quotes.quote: In the warm, salty water,a baby seahorse swirls and somersaults like a tiny gymnast performing on an invisible mat
quotes.author: Jennifer Keats Curtis

quotes.quote: Seahorses look mythical, like dragons, but these magnificent shy creatures are real.
quotes.author: Jennifer Keats Curtis

quotes.quote: The baby seahorse's hard-plated, spiny body tumbles alongside those of his three hundred brothers and sisters.
quotes.author: Jennifer Keats Curtis

quotes.quote: No bigger than eyelashes, the babies— called small fry— spin and whirl away from one another like deflating balloons in the ocean's gentle current.
quotes.author: Jennifer Keats Curtis

quotes.quote: Seahorses have a single mate for the whole life. Each morning, they come together, dance, change their colour, twist around with linked tails and then separate for the rest of the day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sea horses mate for life, are completely faithful and travel together by holding on to each others tails.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When sea horse find a mate, they wrap their tail around each other so the tide doesn't drift them apart. They have that one mate for the rest of their lives. when the mate dies they do too.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: He perches peacefully in this secret spot, perfectly camouflaged, eagerly looking for food.
quotes.author: Jennifer Keats Curtis

quotes.quote: The seahorse is crafted as if God hammered it from the most beautiful molten metal. every part of it is flat and angular, yet it makes to most heavenly organic shape.
quotes.author: Angela Abraham

quotes.quote: In the playground of the universe, the seahorse is sewn joy into matter.
quotes.author: Angela Abraham

quotes.quote: The seahorse is one of the ocean's most intriguing, delightful creatures. With their coiling tails and equine features, they decorate and adorn the sea as few animals do.
quotes.author: Mind Fuel Daily

quotes.quote: Exceptionally, fresh or live seahorses were used in traditional medicine preparations, as exemplified by the use of fresh seahorse boiled with pork and ginger and the addition of live seahorses to alcoholic beverages.
quotes.author: Romulo Romeu Nobrega Alves

quotes.quote: Never mind searching for who you are. Search for the person you aspire to be.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: You'll never find peace of mind until you listen to your heart.
quotes.author: George Michael

quotes.quote: I have been and still am a seeker, but I have ceased to question stars and books; I have begun to listen to the teaching my blood whispers to me.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: The voyage of discovery is not in looking for new landscapes, but in looking with new eyes
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: For most men life is a search for the proper manila envelope in which to get themselves filed.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: All the wonders you seek are within yourself.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: One of the greatest joys known to man is to take a flight into ignorance in search of knowledge.
quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quotes.quote: Look within. Within is the fountain of good, and it will ever bubble up, if thou wilt ever dig.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: I think you travel to search and you come back home to find yourself there.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: When you go in search of honey you must expect to be stung by bees.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: And if you find everything as soon as you look for it, you find it in vain, you look for it in vain.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: The only journey is the journey within.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: If we're missing life it's probably because we're expecting it to reveal itself to us, rather than realizing that life is revealed by us looking for it.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The way to find a needle in a haystack is to sit down.
quotes.author: Beryl Markham

quotes.quote: The centre of me is always and eternally in terrible pain ... A searching for something beyond what the world contains, something transï¬guring and inï¬nite.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The greatest explorer on this earth never takes voyages as long as those of the man who descends to the depth of his heart.
quotes.author: Julien Green

quotes.quote: What you discover on your own is always more exciting than what someone else discovers for you â€“ it's like the marriage between romantic love and an arranged marriage.
quotes.author: Terrence Rafferty

quotes.quote: We are often taught to look for the beauty in all things, so in finding it, the layman asks the philosopher while the philosopher asks the photographer.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Truth waits to be found. It searches for no one.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Where you come from is gone, where you thought you were going to was never there, and where you are is no good unless you can get away from it. Where is there a place for you to be? No place... Nothing outside you can give you any place... In yourself right now is all the place you've got.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: He did not waste time in a vain search for a place in history.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: Go where you will, if a shilling can there be procured, you may expect to meet with individuals in search of it.
quotes.author: John James Audubon

quotes.quote: Better you don't search for who you are until you know who it is you want to find.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Between truth and the search for it, I choose the second.
quotes.author: Bernard Berenson

quotes.quote: Man is eminently a storyteller. His search for a purpose, a cause, an ideal, a mission and the like is largely a search for a plot and a pattern in the development of his life story -- a story that is basically without meaning or pattern.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The greater the step forward in knowledge, the greater is the one taken backward in search of wisdom.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.quote: The reason why we have never found measure of wealth. We never sought it.
quotes.author: George S. Clason

quotes.quote: I have the world's largest collection of seashells. I keep it on all the beaches of the world... perhaps you've seen it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you want to hear the distant voice of the ocean put your ear to the lips of a seashell.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: Never venture and risk a seashell for a pearl; conversely, one can choose and select it in an open field, without risk.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: I take the seashell from my jeans pocket and rub my fingers across its silken, indented surface, shallow as my own open hand. This chalice, subtly shaped by some divine intelligence to allow water to flow in and out with ease, is what I aspire to become: a vessel through which feelings can pour in and spill right out again, without all the grasping and holding that obstructs the flow. Can I be as serene and simple as this bleached shell, rubbed smooth by wind and water, receiving and releasing, filling and emptying and filling again, eternally receptive to the currents of life?
quotes.author: Katrina Kenison

quotes.quote: Everybody needs a seashell in her bathroom to remind her the ocean is her home.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: I am a tiny seashell that has secretly drifted ashore and carries the sound of the ocean surging through its body.
quotes.author: Edward Hirsch

quotes.quote: I have paid as much as $300 a night to throw up in a sink shaped like a seashell.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I don't know what I may seem to the world, but as to myself, I seem to have been only like a boy playing on the sea-shore and diverting myself in now and then finding a smoother pebble or a prettier shell than ordinary, whilst the great ocean of truth lay all undiscovered before me.
quotes.author: Joseph Spence

quotes.quote: Give me my scallop-shell of quiet, / My staff of faith to walk upon, / My scrip of joy, immortal diet, / My bottle of salvation, / My gown of glory, hope's true gage, / And thus I'll take my pilgrimage.
quotes.author: Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: May the British Lion have his talons eradicated by the noble bill of the American Eagle, and be taught to play upon the Irish Harp and the Scotch Fiddle that music which is breathed by every empty shell that lies upon the shore of green Columbia.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: We must not trust the translation whose words are entirely 'unbroken.' As with a seashell, the translator can listen strenuously but mistake the rumour of his own pulse for the beat of the alien sea.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: How did these beautiful rainbow tints get into the shell of the freshwater clam buried in the mud at the bottom of our dark river? Even the sea-bottom tells of the upper skies.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There is not a single colour hidden away in the chalice of a flower, or the curve of a shell, to which, by some subtle sympathy with the very soul of things, my nature does not answer.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Don't let the waves of others drown out your own ocean song. Hold your heart as though it was a seashell. And listen to it. Listen to its music. To the whispers of your ocean within. And then swim. Swim to your ocean music.
quotes.author: S.C. Lourie

quotes.quote: When I lean my ear up against your seashell heart, I can hear an ocean of love roaring inside.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: Like seashells, we are beautiful and unique, each with a story to tell.
quotes.author: Soma

quotes.quote: Never trust anyone to find your treasures for you. Find your own! Children know that. That's why they treasure seashells and little stones.
quotes.author: Mrs. Frankweiler

quotes.quote: I'm collecting seashells, putting them in a plastic bag, taking them home, putting them in the garage and never ever looking at them ever again.
quotes.author: Frank

quotes.quote: To live in an old shack by the sea; breathe the sweet salt air. To live with the dawn and the dusk; the new moon, and the full moon. The tides, the winds, and the rain. To surf and comb the beach and gather seashells and driftwood, and know the thrill of loneliness and lose all sense of time and be free.
quotes.author: Narrator

quotes.quote: If you shine, I shine. / My dear, my life / Is washed up like a seashell longing to be dry / So please shine, please shine.
quotes.author: Jonathan Jones

quotes.quote: I see her pearly decks, my love / Set in with twinkling specks, my love / I see her pearly mast, my love / Far from her seashell past / And gently does she sway, all on her starry way.
quotes.author: Donovan Leitch

quotes.quote: Oh, stranger / You came and entered / such a way / In a depth of my heart / As stays a drop of rain / In the seashell / And becomes the pearl / And shines / I feel scared / So I keep silent / The world may rob that / And deprive me / Now you come yourself / And with your perfumed words / Of love / Give the life / To break the spirit / Of my silence / Show the truth and reality / And fetch out / Your credit treasure / To relieve me.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: One turns the thing over / in his hand and looks / at it from the rear: brownedged, / green and pointed scales / armor his yellow. / But turn and turn, / the crisp petals remain / brief, translucent, greenfastened, / barely touching at the edges: / blades of limpid seashell.
quotes.author: William Carlos Williams

quotes.quote: Sea Shell, Sea Shell, / Sing me a song, O Please! / A song of ships, and sailor men, / And parrots, and tropical trees, / Of islands lost in the Spanish Main / Which no man ever may find again, / Of fishes and corals under the waves, / And seahorses stabled in great green caves. / Sea Shell, Sea Shell, / Sing of the things you know so well.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: What says the sea, little shell? / What says the sea? / Long has our brother been silent to us, / Kept his message for the ships, / Awkward ships, stupid ships.
quotes.author: Stephen Crane

quotes.quote: Friend of my chamber--O thou spiral shell / That murmurest of the ever-murmuring sea! / Repeating with eternal constancy / Whatever memories the wave can tell; / Whatever harmonies may rise and swell, / Whatever sadness in the deep may be-- / They are the ocean's, and desired of thee; / Thou treasurest what thou dost love so well. / So all my heart is one voluted fold, / Shielding one face, and evermore it seems / Upon the threshold of the prying day, / Hid in the tangle of reluctant dreams; / And in the noontide, and the evening grey, / Its light illumines secrecies untold.
quotes.author: Hubert Church

quotes.quote: In fact, we started off with two or three different shells and the shell had life of its own.
quotes.author: Ken Thompson

quotes.quote:
The flood subsides, and the body, like a worn sea-shell
emerges strange and lovely.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: By listening to certain words as a child listens to the sea in a seashell, a word dreamer hears the murmur of a world of dreams.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: The roar that we hear when we place a seashell next to our ear is not the ocean, but rather the sound of blood surging through the veins in the ear.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Yet sunshine brightens after rain, The darkness comes and goes again, So solace follows bitter pain, As seasons wax and wane.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Chase Akers Allen

quotes.quote: I think that to one in sympathy with nature, each season, in turn, seems the loveliest.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To be interested in the changing seasons is a happier state of mind than to be hopelessly in love with spring.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: The seasons are what a symphony ought to be: four perfect movements in harmony with each other.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quotes.quote: Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The sun shines different ways in winter and summer. We shine different ways in the seasons of our lives.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: I know I am but summer to your heart, And not the full four seasons of the year...
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: Nature gives to every time and season some beauties of its own; and from morning to night, as from the cradle to the grave, it is but a succession of changes so gentle and easy that we can scarcely mark their progress.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Some people plant in the spring and leave in the summer. If you're signed up for a season, see it through. You don't have to stay forever, but at least stay until you see it through.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Self-discipline is an act of cultivation. It requires you to connect today's actions to tomorrow's results. There's a season for sowing a season for reaping. Self-discipline helps you know which is which.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Farmers only worry during the growing season, but townspeople worry all the time.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: The seasons alter: hoary-headed frosts Fall in the fresh lap of the crimson rose.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under heaven: A time to be born, and a time to die.
quotes.author: Ecclesiastes 3:1

quotes.quote: God has a plan for every season of your life. We must trust that He knows what the right time is for changing every season in our lives and learn to rejoice in each of them.
quotes.author: Barbara J. Doll

quotes.quote: When you’re young you prefer the vulgar months, the fullness of the seasons. As you grow older you learn to like the in-between times, the months that can’t make up their minds. Perhaps it’s a way of admitting that things can’t ever bear the same certainty again.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.quote: Except. What is normal at any given time? We change just as the seasons change, and each spring brings new growth. So nothing is ever quite the same.
quotes.author: Sherwood Smith

quotes.quote: If people were seasons, she'd be monsoon. After every downpour, the garden laughed like her, wild and free.
quotes.author: Meeta Ahluwahlia

quotes.quote: Every season has a reason. Summer cannot do the works of winter, nor winter the works of summer. Each season is unique yet so important, so cherish the seasons in your life.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: A person with a positive attitude is like a fruit of all seasons.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: Not everyone takes action to harvest the experiences of the seasons of life in order to enjoy their bounty.
quotes.author: Andrea Goeglein

quotes.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: We are born at a given moment, in a given place and, like vintage years of wine, we have the qualities of the year and of the season of which we are born. Astrology does not lay claim to anything more.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The holiday season can be an especially trying time for our service men, women, and families. Military service and deployment create empty seats at holiday tables, religious services, and celebrations.
quotes.author: Geoff Stults

quotes.quote: As with most fine things, chocolate has its season. There is a simple memory aid that you can use to determine whether it is the correct time to order chocolate dishes: any month whose name contains the letter A, E, or U is the proper time for chocolate.
quotes.author: Sandra Boynton

quotes.quote: And I'm lost behind The words I'll never find And I'm left behind As seasons roll on by.
quotes.author: Chris Cornell

quotes.quote: It makes no sense to try to extend a friendship that was only meant to be a season into a lifetime.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I have a fond place in my heart for Seattle.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: Unfortunately Seattle is my muse, for the better or worse of Seattle – I’m not sure.
quotes.author: Maria Semple

quotes.quote: All those ninnies have it wrong. The best thing about Seattle is the weather. The world over, people have ocean views. But across our ocean is Bainbridge Island, an evergreen curb, and over it the exploding, craggy, snow-scraped Olympics. I guess what I'm saying: I miss it, the mountains and the water.
quotes.author: Maria Semple

quotes.quote: Seattle, the mild green queen: wet and willing, cedar-scented, and crowned with slough grass, her toadstool scepter tilted toward Asia, her face turned ever upward in the rain; the sovereign who washes her hands more persistently than the most fastidious proctologist.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: You know you're from Seattle when even amid perhaps the worst crisis you've ever faced, you can still appreciate a sunny day.
quotes.author: Melanie A. Smith

quotes.quote: Seattle has ferryboats. Seattle is surrounded by water on three sides.
quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes

quotes.quote: Seattle is known for the grunge musicians. Lots of hair, lots of sweat. That word, "grunge" just turns me on, something fierce.
quotes.author: Alice in Chains

quotes.quote: Get this straight, Mr. Kolchak. No carnival or hoopla tactics on this paper. This isn't Fun Town, USA. This is Seattle.
quotes.author: Richard Matheson

quotes.quote: They hit us, we hit 'em back... harder. That's the Seattle way.
quotes.author: Dan Schneider

quotes.quote: The bluest skies you've ever seen in Seattle / And the hills the greenest green in Seattle / Like a beautiful child growing up free and wild
quotes.author: Jack Keller

quotes.quote: Full of hopes and full of fears / Full of laughter full of tears / Full of dreams to last the years in Seattle / In Seattle
quotes.author: Jack Keller

quotes.quote: Seattle tides / This storm isn't letting up / The currents too strong for us / All that I need is you / It's pulling me out too far, now I got left to starve
quotes.author: Aaron Carter

quotes.quote: Viva Seattle Tacoma, viva viva Sea-Tac / Long live everything in Washington state / Including everybody / May they live to a million years
quotes.author: Robyn Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Came here to find me a place in the sun / Once was a scene now it's already done / Thinking of leaving, it's no longer fun in Seattle / In Seattle
quotes.author: The Smithereens

quotes.quote: Seattle, I don't know why / You stand under the clouds expecting to stay dry / Can't you see the day you'll ever win / That battle / Is the day they'll take the rain out of Seattle
quotes.author: Courtney Dashe

quotes.quote: Hello Seattle, I am a mountaineer / In the hills and highlands / I fall asleep in hospital parking lots / And awake in your mouth
quotes.author: Adam R Young

quotes.quote: Seattle's where the music scene at, Seattle's has the industry rats, how do you plan to compete with all that?
quotes.author: Mr. 425

quotes.quote: But every time I try it it won't turn for me / Seattle - you've got to love the rain / And we both love rain / We both love rain
quotes.author: Mark Knopfler

quotes.quote: See, now yesterday I was feeling down / When I came to Seattle / And y'all turned me around / I said, oh, Seattle, do you know what you do? / Hey, yeah, ever all that you've done for me
quotes.author: Alicia Augello-Cook

quotes.quote: A blue collared man in Seattle never lives on white collared street / But there was food on the table for my Washington woman and me
quotes.author: Frazier

quotes.quote: That Arkensal woman hurt me / As we crossed the Arkensal line / But the arms of Seattle / Are the arms that kept huggin' mine
quotes.author: Frazier

quotes.quote: In Seattle we live among the trees and the waterways, and we feel we are rocked gently in the cradle of life. Our winters are not cold and our summers are not hot and we congratulate ourselves for choosing such a spectacular place to rest our heads.
quotes.author: Garth Stein

quotes.quote: We all came to Seattle in hopes of building better lives. No one said we wouldn't have to struggle first.
quotes.author: Regina Scott

quotes.quote: Everyone in Seattle is a total pussy when it comes to snow. The whole city shut down, the place looked like an apocalyptic movie.
quotes.author: Hamilton Leithauser

quotes.quote: Seattle is like a global gumbo, a melting pot with all kinds of people the rich, the poor, white people, some Chinese, Filipino, Jewish and black people they're all here.
quotes.author: Quincy Jones

quotes.quote: Seattle is not an overly friendly city. It is a civil city, but not altogether friendly. People from outside mistake the civility for friendliness. Seattle is full of people who have their own lives to live. They won't waste their time being friendly. But they are civil.
quotes.author: Jonathan Raban

quotes.quote: Seattle is for people who love culture, but refuse to sacrifice their wild nature to attain it.
quotes.author: Kimberly Kinrade

quotes.quote: In Seattle you haven't had enough coffee until you can thread a sewing machine while it's running.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: To some extent, Seattle remains a frontier metropolis, a place where people can experiment with their lives, and change and grow and make things happen.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Seattle was built out on pilings over the sea, and at high tide the whole city seemed to come afloat like a ship lifting free from a mud berth and swaying in its chains.
quotes.author: Jonathan Raban

quotes.quote: Sometimes life gives you a second chance, or even two! Not always, but sometimes. It's what you do with those second chances that counts.
quotes.author: Dave Wilson

quotes.quote: In case you never get a second chance: don't be afraid! And what if you do get a second chance? You take it!
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Second chances do come your way. Like trains, they arrive and depart regularly. Recognizing the ones that matter is the trick.
quotes.author: Jill A. Davis

quotes.quote: There are no second chances in life, except to feel remorse.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafn

quotes.quote: [When it comes to God] We can't run out of second chances...only time.
quotes.author: Robin Jones Gunn

quotes.quote: We're given second chances every day of our life. We don't usually take them, but they're there for the taking.
quotes.author: Andrew M. Greeley

quotes.quote: A second chance doesn't mean anything if you didn't learn from your first.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Having a second chance makes you want to work even harder.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.quote: If somebody is gracious enough to give me a second chance, I won't need a third.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: Sometimes giving someone a second chance,Is like giving them an extra bullet for their gun..cause they missed you the first time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Because this is what I believe - that second chances are stronger than secrets. You can let secrets go. But a second chance? You don't let that pass you by.
quotes.author: Daisy Whitney

quotes.quote: Every moment of your life is a second chance.
quotes.author: Rick Price

quotes.quote: We all deserve second chances, but not for the same mistake.
quotes.author: Thabiso Owethu Xabanisa

quotes.quote: If you ever get a second chance in life for something, you've got to go all the way.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: A man deserves a second chance, but keep an eye on him.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: God always offers us a second chance in life.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If you are still breathing, you have a second chance.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Don't think there are no second chances. Life always offers you a SECOND CHANCE... It's called TOMORROW.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I believe in second chances, but I don't believe in third or fourth chances.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: People do make mistakes and I think they should be punished. But they should be forgiven and given the opportunity for a second chance. We are human beings.
quotes.author: David Millar

quotes.quote: Every second a seeker can start over,For his life's mistakesAre initial draftsAnd not the final version.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: You don't get second chances in the real world.
quotes.author: Gail Simmons

quotes.quote: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: Life always offers us a second chance. It's called tomorrow. So don't give up against adverse circumstances and keep fighting.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: I don't buy idea of second chance.With hope we make a lot of chances.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Thank God you are still alive for many have died and are dying as I speak. You still have the opportunity to change and make things right whilst those that have died wish for that second chance.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Sebryakov

quotes.quote: Our GOD is a GOD of second chances - Yes, God does these things again and again for people.
quotes.author: Job 33:29

quotes.quote: I will forever believe in second chances and forgiveness, because if it weren't for those two things I would and should be dead.
quotes.author: Dedrick D. L. Pitter

quotes.quote: Every second we have a second chance to do something we haven't done yet. That's why it's called a second and not a first.
quotes.author: Robert J. Braathe

quotes.quote: They say everyone needs a second chance, I am willing to give you one provided you are ready to accept it.
quotes.author: Nidhi Saini

quotes.quote: Secrets press inside a person. They press the way water presses at a dam. The secrets and the water, they both want to get out.
quotes.author: Franny Billingsley

quotes.quote: If you would wish another to keep your secret, first keep it yourself.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Secrecy is the enemy of efficiency, but don't let anyone know it.
quotes.author: Ric Ocasek

quotes.quote: A secret's worth depends on the people from whom it must be kept.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Secrecy is a vacuum and nothing fills a vacuum like paranoid speculation.
quotes.author: Max Brooks

quotes.quote: In the mind and nature of a man a secret is an ugly thing, like a hidden physical defect.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: Some secrets are like fossils and the stone has become too heavy to turn over.
quotes.author: Delphine de Vigan

quotes.quote: Secrets tend to get revealed when you're feeling most loved and when you're feeling most betrayed.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Secrecy can spring from the best motives; but as it grows it begins to exist only for itself, only for its own sake, only to cover its own abuses.
quotes.author: Christopher Dodd

quotes.quote: Secrecy is the soul of all great designs. Perhaps more has been effected by concealing our own intentions than by discovering those of our enemy.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Privacy is something that we maintain for the good of ourselves and others. Secrecy we keep to separate ourselves from others, even those we love.
quotes.author: Mary Alice Monroe

quotes.quote: Secrets are things we give to others to keep for us.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Secrecy has many advantages, for when you tell someone the purpose of any object right away, they often think there is nothing to it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Secrecy is the element of all goodness; even virtue, even beauty is mysterious.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Our secrets are the walls that separate us and the bridges that connect us with others and who we truly are.
quotes.author: Frank Warren

quotes.quote: Secrecy sets barriers between men, but at the same time offers the seductive temptation to break through the barriers by gossip or confession.
quotes.author: Georg Simmel

quotes.quote: Privacy seems not an illusion for those who want to believe in secrecy principle.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: People addicted to secrecy are so without knowing why; they are not so for cause, but for secrecy's sake.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Secrecy is best taught by starting with ourselves.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: Secrecy, being an instrument of conspiracy, ought never to be the system of a regular government.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: Our secrets are what keep us sick and as soon as we are able to expose them to another person, that is when the healing begins.
quotes.author: Phillip L. Smith

quotes.quote: Secret enmities are more to be feared than open ones.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: A secret is most valuable when it remains a secret.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.quote: Secrets are pleasant to each child of Eve.
quotes.author: Hannah Cowley

quotes.quote: The man who can keep a secret may be wise, but he is not half as wise as the man with no secrets to keep.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Secrecy is the chastity of friendship.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: A secret is seldom safe in more than one breast.
quotes.author: Swift

quotes.quote: Secrecy involves a tension which, at the moment of revelation, finds its release.
quotes.author: Georg Simmel

quotes.quote: Secrets have a way of making themselves felt, even before you know there's a secret.
quotes.author: Jean Ferris

quotes.quote: To keep your secret is wisdom; but to expect others to keep it is folly.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Love ceases to be a pleasure, when it ceases to be a secret.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.quote: I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: I love you with all my life, but its not like you will ever know
quotes.author: Amber Hope

quotes.quote: If you love someone, tell them. For hearts are often broken by words left unspoken.
quotes.author: Stephanie Roogle

quotes.quote: I have so much that I want to say to you, but I can't say a word.
quotes.author: Michelle Burns

quotes.quote: A secret love is beautiful, sweet and sacred when it's just a light infatuation; but when that person reaches over and touches you in the heart, making it alive in a way it has never known, that secret love becomes frightening, because you can never make them love you, you would never want to make them love you...but all the same, no matter which way you view it, they don't love you...and your heart doesn't know how to beat the same.
quotes.author: Stefanie Schneider

quotes.quote: I hid my love in field and town Till een the breeze would knock me down, The bees seemed singing ballads oer, The fly's bass turned a lion's roar; And even silence found a tongue, To haunt me all the summer long; The riddle nature could not prove Was nothing else but secret love.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: He wanted her. She'd never tell. Secretly she wanted him as well.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: There is no secret left in the fact that I am madly in love with you. My happiness glows on my face and my smile gives it away. I have tried hard but now I can't do that anymore.
quotes.author: Sheila Johns

quotes.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We've all at some point in our life encountered that feeling of secretly liking someone, secretly having your eyes on them, secretly wishing they knew, but deep inside you were afraid of what the outcome would be. So you kept it unnoticed. Kept it hidden, locked inside, just hoping that maybe one day that moment would finally come when they would notice you!
quotes.author: Telisa McLaughlin

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing secret love. You would change yourself and your whole world just to be with them; just to hear them talk to you makes you feel as though you're experiencing an epiphany. Just to see them look at you makes you feel as though every speck of what you are is valuable; and to watch them walk in the room, the ordinary, dark boring room and watch it change when they walk in as if they carry a piece of the sun itself in their being, as if now that they've arrived the whole world will be okay again. As if having them near would be the nearest thing to heaven you've ever known. But they don't love you and they walk on by each time with a smile, a nod and vanish away from your hungry sight.
quotes.author: Stephanie Schneider

quotes.quote: Love never grows when its secretly kept locked in our hearts. Love will only find its fulfillment when it finds it's way out and dwells in the heart of that person destined to keep it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One sweet, sad secret holds my heart in thrall; A mighty love within my breast has grown, Unseen, unspoken, and of no one known; And of my sweet, who gave it, least of all.
quotes.author: Felix Arvers

quotes.quote: It does good to no woman to be flattered [by a man] who does not intend to marry her; and it is madness in all women to let a secret love kindle within them, which, if unreturned and unknown, must devour the life that feeds it; and, if discovered and responded to, must lead, ignis-fatuus-like, into miry wilds whence there is no extrication.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: How flippantly we all treat a secret love, like a joke, something cute, as if it's just a sweet little thing to pat. But when we are the secret lover, we hold our breath with each word they speak, we long so desperately for their touch, even just brief, we could almost bleed we long for it so. And when they find a lover, we feel like a shadow, longing to be seen as real, until we finally learn we have nothing more to do than to fade away from their light.
quotes.author: Stephanie Schneider

quotes.quote: Its hard to go on living while loving someone secretly, it hurts to see the one you love so happy with someone else, but the most painful thing about hiding love is that it never fades away
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are worse things than a broken heart. Like the love that you don't explore.
quotes.author: Dawson'S Creek

quotes.quote: What if the person you secretly love tells you he already found the one he could spend forever with would you be brave enough to ask who she is? Or bear the pain inside not knowing it was you after all?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I want him to see the flowers in my eyes and hear the songs in my hands.
quotes.author: Francesca Lia Block

quotes.quote: To burn with desire and keep quiet about it is the greatest punishment we can bring on ourselves.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: But my deepest and most secret love belongs to the fair-haired and the blue-eyed, the bright children of life, the happy, the charming and the ordinary.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: I pretend to look around, but I was actually looking at you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The extreme form of passionate love is secret love.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: There is a name hidden in the shadow of my soul, where I read it night and day and no other eye sees it.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: Some of us will never know we'd owned someone's heart for a season.
quotes.author: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.quote: I had deluded myself throughout by the idea of reviving a secret love which did not exist at all.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Some relationships hurt but secret relationships hurt more than that where you don't confess even to yourself that you're in a relationship.
quotes.author: Gaurav S Kaintura

quotes.quote: Better to live with the guilty secret than the open truth of their life together - that they were bound by the habit of illicit lust, mutual degradation.
quotes.author: Fay Weldon

quotes.quote: In the bottom of my heart lies a secret which I have never told a soul in the world. There is an image of this person who is dearest to me and closer than anything else.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: Secrets have a way of making themselves felt, even before you know there's a secret.
quotes.author: Jean Ferris

quotes.quote: All secrets become deep. All secrets become dark. That's in the nature of secrets.
quotes.author: Cory Doctorow

quotes.quote: The secret to life is meaningless unless you discover it yourself.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The best way of keeping a secret is to pretend there isn't one.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: The secret to strong security: less reliance on secrets.
quotes.author: Whitfield Diffie

quotes.quote: Secrets bind and separate in strict accordance with who's in them .
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: Secrets have power, and that power diminishes when they are shared, so they are best kept and kept well. Sharing secrets, real secrets, important ones, with even one other person, will change them.
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: I thought about how there are two types of secrets: the kind you want to keep in, and the kind you don't dare to let out.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: Secrets are made to be found out with time.
quotes.author: Charles Sanford

quotes.quote: Some secrets are meant to stay secret forever.
quotes.author: Liane Moriarty

quotes.quote: Every virtuous act has some Dark secret in its heart; every risk we take contains a mystery that can't be solved.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: A real secret is something which only one person knows.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Some secrets are better left at that as secrets.
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.quote: Secrets are the kind of adventure she needs. Secrets are safe, and they do much to make you different. On the inside where it counts.
quotes.author: E.L. Konigsburg

quotes.quote: Secrets are like pregnancies hereabouts. You can hide them for a while but then they will start screaming.
quotes.author: Jim Crace

quotes.quote: Keeping secrets will always lead to unhappiness and communication is the key to love.
quotes.author: Laura Esquivel

quotes.quote: The first rule in keeping secrets is nothing on paper.
quotes.author: Thomas Powers

quotes.quote: A secret is too little for one, enough for two, and too much for three.
quotes.author: James Howell

quotes.quote: The only secrets are the secrets that keep themselves.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: For every secret hangs in greater fear between the speaker's mouth and hearer's ear than any peril between cup and lip.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: We keep secrets from ourselves that all along we know.
quotes.author: Susan Griffin

quotes.quote: The greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: A secret is most valuable when it remains a secret.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.quote: But some secrets are too delicious not to share.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: A good friend keeps your secrets for you. A best friend helps you keep your own secrets.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Secrets are a part of life. Their mysteries make our world beautiful. Their depths inspire our hearts, intrigue our minds, and embrace our very souls.
quotes.author: Imania Margria

quotes.quote: Some secrets are like fossils and the stone has become too heavy to turn over.
quotes.author: Delphine de Vigan

quotes.quote: There are no secrets better kept than the secrets everybody guesses.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The man who can keep a secret may be wise, but he is not half as wise as the man with no secrets to keep.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: A secret remains a secret until you make someone promise never to reveal it.
quotes.author: Fausto Cercignani

quotes.quote: In our rampantly secular world, biography is now the only form of life after death.
quotes.author: David Cannadine

quotes.quote: The public school has become the established church of secular society.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.quote: Half of the secular unrest and dismal, profane sadness of modern society comes from the vain ideas that every man is bound to be a critic for life.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: To say that authority, whether secular or religious, supplies no ground for morality is not to deny the obvious fact that it supplies a sanction.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Religious moderation is the product of secular knowledge and scriptural ignorance.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: Secularism is not only indifferent to alternative religious systems, but as a religious ideology it is opposed to any other religious systems. It is therefore a closed system.
quotes.author: Harvey Cox

quotes.quote: Moral capitalism is possible; if not, its strictures are only a kind of misleading vanity, the rhetoric of a secular piety.
quotes.author: Stephen Young

quotes.quote: In our hyper-secular world, worship is still inevitable. But it is vital to remember that our gods don't choose us, we choose them.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Positive secularism is not tolerance of all religions, but it is the total denial of religious beliefs: it is the emergence of homogeneous human outlook which is based upon verifiable facts of life.
quotes.author: Goparaju Ramachandra Rao

quotes.quote: The road to the sacred leads through the secular.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: There is nothing so secular that it cannot be sacred, and that is one of the deepest messages of the Incarnation.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Secular humanists can sit around and talk about their love of humanity, but it doesn't stack up against a two-millennium-old funeral high mass.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: In our secular society, school has become the replacement for church, and like church it requires that its teachings must be taken on faith.
quotes.author: John Taylor Gatto

quotes.quote: The church is only a secular institution in which the half-educated speak to the half-converted.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: The secular world looks to the church and to its chagrin, finds no love, no life, no laughter, no hope and no happiness.
quotes.author: Rod Parsley

quotes.quote: Secularism denounces supernaturalism and promotes a nonreligious or antireligious basis of social organization and morality.
quotes.author: Carl F. H. Henry

quotes.quote: The secular world is more spiritual than it thinks, just as the ecclesiastical world is more materialist than it cares to acknowledge.
quotes.author: Lionel Blue

quotes.quote: Within the field of a secular society, which is a sort of neutral frame that allows individuals to develop their own lives, so long as they don't annoy their neighbors too much, each of us has an individual myth that's driving us, which we may or may not know.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: People in the secular world have too much to live with, too little to live for.
quotes.author: Os Guinness

quotes.quote: Math . . . music .. . starry nights . . . These are secular ways of achieving transcendence, of feeling lifted into a grand perspective. It's a sense of being awed by existence that almost obliterates the self. Religious people think of it as an essentially religious experience but it's not. It's an essentially human experience.
quotes.author: Rebecca Newberger Goldstein

quotes.quote: In a secular age, an authentic miracle must purport to be a hoax, in order to gain credit in the world.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: The line between sacred and secular is man-made.
quotes.author: Sarah Bessey

quotes.quote: The basic assumption of the secular society is that modernity overcomes religion.
quotes.author: Ulrich Beck

quotes.quote: The process of secularisation arises not from the loss of faith but from the loss of social interest in the world of faith. It begins the moment men feel that religion is irrelevant to the common way of life and that society as such has nothing to do with the truths of faith.
quotes.author: Christopher Henry Dawson

quotes.quote: Today secular faith is ebbing, and it is the apostles of unbelief who are left stranded on the beach.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Secularism breeds narcissism. There is nothing higher to live for, so you live for you.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Secular humanists suspect there is something more gloriously human about resisting the religious impulse; about accepting the cold truth, even if that truth is only that the universe is as indifferent to us as we are to it.
quotes.author: Tom Flynn

quotes.quote: The tendency of our time is wholly oriented toward the secular. The efforts of the mystics will remain episodes. Despite a deepening of our conceptions of life, we will build no cathedrals.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies Van Der Rohe

quotes.quote: Secular humanism debases the human.
quotes.author: Sinclair B. Ferguson

quotes.quote: The car has become a secular sanctuary for the individual, his shrine to the self, his mobile Walden Pond.
quotes.author: Edward McDonagh

quotes.quote: We live in a world that has walls and those walls need to be guarded by men with guns.
quotes.author: Aaron Sorkin

quotes.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Security is the chief enemy of mortals.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Security and safety were the reward of dullness.
quotes.author: Hanif Kureishi

quotes.quote: Security is not the absence of danger, but the presence of God,no matter what the danger.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Security is always excessive until it's not enough.
quotes.author: Robbie Sinclair

quotes.quote: The opposite of security is insecurity, and the only way to overcome insecurity is to take risks.
quotes.author: Theodore Forstmann

quotes.quote: True individual freedom cannot exist without economic security and independence. People who are hungry and out of a job are the stuff of which dictatorships are made.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Human security depends on a system where each rational individual calculates that it is more profitable not to rebel.
quotes.author: Mark Gough

quotes.quote: We have an illusion of security, we don't have security.
quotes.author: Isaac Yeffet

quotes.quote: Only the insecure strive for security.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Security represents your sense of worth, your identity, your emotional anchorage, your self-esteem, your basic personal strength or lack of it.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Security is when everything is settled, when nothing can happen to you; security is the denial of life.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: It is possible to provide security against other ills, but as far as death is concerned, we men live in a city without walls.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Security is no replacement for liberty.
quotes.author: Martin Firrell

quotes.quote: Security depends not so much upon how much you have, as upon how much you can do without.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: There is no real security except for whatever you build inside yourself.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: The balance between freedom and security is a delicate one.
quotes.author: Mark Udall

quotes.quote: We must plan for freedom, and not only for security, if for no other reason than that only freedom can make security secure.
quotes.author: Karl Popper

quotes.quote: The good we secure for ourselves is precarious and uncertain until it is secured for all of us and incorporated into our common life.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: It isn't for the moment you are struck that you need courage, but for that long uphill climb back to sanity and faith and security.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: The ultimate security is your understanding of reality.
quotes.author: H. Stanley Judd

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, the goals are simple: safety and security.
quotes.author: Jodi Rell

quotes.quote: They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: No one can build his security upon the nobleness of another person.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: For a people who are free, and who mean to remain so, a well-organized and armed militia is their best security.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Seduction was both a science and art, a blend of skill, discipline, proximity, and opportunity. Mostly proximity.
quotes.author: Dan Simmons

quotes.quote: It is your work in life that is the ultimate seduction.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Man proposes, woman forecloses.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: Seduction is merely encouraging a man to do something he already wants to do.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: The climax of seduction is to give the illusion that you're not trying to seduce.
quotes.author: Mathias Malzieu

quotes.quote: Saints and Sinners may be separated by their actions, but they are united by their reaction to passion.
quotes.author: Gaiven Clairmont

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Seduction but in a slightly medicinal way.
quotes.author: James Morris

quotes.quote: A modest demeanor arouses thoughts of seduction.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: I suppose that romantic love was invented as a brilliant means of seduction.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: His eyes have made love to me all evening.
quotes.author: Marguerite Gautier

quotes.quote: Seduction brings fourth death.
quotes.author: Monaluna

quotes.quote: The resistance of a woman to a mans advances is not always a sign of virtue. Sometimes its just a sign of experience.
quotes.author: Ninon de Lenclos

quotes.quote: Sexuality is extremely disruptive. The insecurities and emotions it stirs up can often cut short a relationship that would otherwise be deeper and longer lasting.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: The seduction of safety is always more dangerous than the illusion of uncertainty.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: When a woman wants a man and lusts after him, the lover need not bother to conjure up opportunities, for she will find more in an hour than we men could think of in a century.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You turn me on from across the room, and I'll completely melt if you come any closer.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: Everything you do seduces me. All you need to do is breathe and I would do anything for you.
quotes.author: Ashley March

quotes.quote: If you find someone attractive, you try to make them find you attractive. That is called seduction. And seduction is a bit ugly. You could say it's a bit ugly to use your charisma.
quotes.author: Jonathan King

quotes.quote: Seduce my mind and you can have my body, find my soul and I'm yours forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Seduction isn't making someone do what they don't want to do; seduction is enticing someone into doing what they secretly want to do already.
quotes.author: Benjamin T. Russell

quotes.quote: You have had me spinning for days, for I am drunk off the words that flow endlessly from your deep red lips that taste of wine.
quotes.author: Karen Quan

quotes.quote: Pursuit and seduction are the essence of sexuality. It's part of the sizzle.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: This is a place full of seduction and coquetry, rich in eroticism.
quotes.author: Catherine Deneuve

quotes.quote: You can seduce a man without taking anything off, without even touching him.
quotes.author: Rae Dawn Chong

quotes.quote: You have to penetrate a woman's defenses. Getting into her head is a prerequisite to getting into her body.
quotes.author: Bob Guccione

quotes.quote: Anyone can be passionate, but it takes real lovers to be silly.
quotes.author: Rose Franken

quotes.quote: Common good girl, be bad.
quotes.author: Nicki Elson

quotes.quote: Teach me to stop loving you. Teach me to hate you. Otherwise I fear will never leave me.
quotes.author: Elisia Blade

quotes.quote: There's always truth in seduction. That's why it works.
quotes.author: Zoe Archer

quotes.quote: Seek respect, not attention. It lasts longer.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Seek the miracles in sacred moment.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Seek first to understand, then to be understood.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: What we seek we shall find; what we flee from flees from us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Do not seek to bring things to pass in accordance with your wishes, but wish for them as they are, and you will find them.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Seek not the favor of the multitude; it is seldom got by honest and lawful means. But seek the testimony of few; and number not voices, but weigh them.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: If we seek things that are virtuous and lovely, we surely will find them. Conversely, if we seek for evil, we will find that also.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: We should not seek to tune out the realists' whines or taunts, as they may provide good instruction.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: Most people seek after what they do not possess and are enslaved by the very things they want to acquire.
quotes.author: Anwar el Sadat

quotes.quote: Seek that which within lies waiting to begin the fight of your life that is everyday.
quotes.author: Ian Anderson

quotes.quote: Seek always for the answer within. Be not influenced by those around you, by their thoughts or their words.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: Seek happiness for its own sake, and you will not find it; seek for duty, and happiness will follow as the shadow comes with the sunshine.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Who seeks shall find.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Seek truth from facts.
quotes.author: Deng Xiaoping

quotes.quote: Never seek illicit wealth.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Seek freedom within action.
quotes.author: Paul Caponigro

quotes.quote: What we seek is what we are.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Seek people who seek solutions.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Seek for good, but expect evil.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Seek simplicity but distrust it.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Don't seek the water; get thirst.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Don't seek permission to be happy.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: He who seeks equity must do equity.
quotes.author: Joseph Story

quotes.quote: Do not seek praise. Seek criticism.
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: Seek to give much—expect nothing.
quotes.author: Jonathan Goforth

quotes.quote: Do not seek death, seek destruction.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: To seek the highest good is to live well.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: If you seek truth you will not seek victory by dishonorable means, and if you find truth you will become invincible.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Segregation and lock-downs haven't worked.
quotes.author: Lita Herron

quotes.quote: Segregation is the adultery of an illicit intercourse between injustice and immorality.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Segregation now, segregation tomorrow and segregation forever!
quotes.author: George C. Wallace

quotes.quote: Segregation is evil; there is no pattern of life which can dehumanize men as can the way of segregation.
quotes.author: Lillian Smith

quotes.quote: Segregation or separation is thus a basic principle of Biblical Law with respect to religion and morality. Every attempt to destroy this principle is an effort to reduce society to its lowest common denominator.
quotes.author: R.J. Rushdoony

quotes.quote: Segregation is not humiliating but a benefit, and ought to be so regarded by you gentlemen.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Segregation was a burden for many blacks, because the end of the civil war and the amendments added to the constitution elevated expectations beyond reality in some respects.
quotes.author: Ed Smith

quotes.quote: Segregation has no place in the education system.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Supporting segregation need not be racist. One can believe in segregation and believe in equality of the races.
quotes.author: Ward Connerly

quotes.quote: To accept injustice or segregation passively is to say to the oppressor that his actions are morally right.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Segregation is a word of the past. Unity is the key to a peaceful future.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: This whole segregation between famous people and other people is complete rubbish.
quotes.author: Maisie Williams

quotes.quote: Racial segregation has come back to public education with a vengeance.
quotes.author: Jonathan Kozol

quotes.quote: The technological segregation known as the digital divide must be narrowed.
quotes.author: Kweisi Mfume

quotes.quote: Segregation is that which is forced upon an inferior by a superior. Separation is done voluntarily by two equals.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Segregation never brought anyone anything except trouble.
quotes.author: Paul Harris

quotes.quote: We stand for the segregation of the races and the racial integrity of each race.
quotes.author: Strom Thurmond

quotes.quote: Segregation not only harms one physically but injures one spiritually. It scars the soul It is a system which forever stares the segregated in the face, saying you are less than. You are not equal to.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Segregation, in a sense, helped create and maintain black solidarity.
quotes.author: Randall Kennedy

quotes.quote: When you live under the power of terror and segregation, you can't ever start a work of art.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: There is no scriptural basis for segregation. The ground at the foot of the cross is level, and it touches my heart when I see whites standing shoulder to shoulder with blacks at the cross.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Segregation was wrong when it was forced by white people, and I believe it is still wrong when it is requested by black people.
quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

quotes.quote: Be true. Be beautiful. Be free. In the midst of segregation and racism Mamma raised us to be independent and free. We saw ourselves as citizens of the world, not of a block.
quotes.author: Debbie Allen

quotes.quote: When you live under the power of terror and segregation, you can't ever start a work of art.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: When you live under the power of terror and segregation, you can't ever start a work of art.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: When you live under the power of terror and segregation, you can't ever start a work of art.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: Black is not a vice. Nor is segregation a virtue.
quotes.author: Kiese Laymon

quotes.quote: I believe in human beings, and that all human beings should be respected as such, regardless of their color.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: I feel that segregation is totally unchristian and that it is against everything the Christian religion stands for.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says I'm possible!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Get rid of all the hesitation, it's time for you to seize the day.
quotes.author: Greyson Chance

quotes.quote: You may feel powerless as a child, but the world will one day be yours. And you're responsible for it. So, seize the day and take charge of it.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Carpe Dium, I say. Seize the day. Grab it by the throat and rattle its bollocks.
quotes.author: Liz Jensen

quotes.quote: As we speak cruel time is fleeing. Seize the day, believing as little as possible in tomorrow.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no help at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: If you listen real close, you can hear them whisper their legacy to you. Go on, lean in. Listen, you hear it? Carpe diem, seize the day boys, make your lives extraordinary.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Today is the only day in which we have any power.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: One can make a day of any size.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Seize the day, and put the least possible trust in tomorrow.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Seize the day, trusting as little as possible in the future.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Those who seize the day become seriously rich.
quotes.author: Richard Koch

quotes.quote: Seize the day. Because, believe it or not, each and every one of us in this room is one day going to stop breathing, turn cold, and die.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Today is the day you've been waiting for.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Seize the day, whatever's in it to seize, before something comes along and seizes you.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: Begin doing what you want to do now.
quotes.author: Marie Beynon Lyons Ray

quotes.quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Seize the day or die regretting the time you lostIt's empty and cold without you here, too many people to ache overI see my vision burn, I feel my memories fade with timeBut I'm too young to worryThese's streets we traveled on will undergo our same lost past.
quotes.author: Avenged Sevenfold

quotes.quote: Your dream is a reality that is waiting for you to materialize. Today is a new day! Don't let your history interfere with your destiny! Learn from your past so that it can empower your present and propel you to greatness.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Seize the day, take hold of it, and make it whatever you want.
quotes.author: Jessica Sorensen

quotes.quote: To do anything truly worth doing, I must not stand back shivering and thinking of the cold and danger, but jump in with gusto and scramble through as well as I can.
