quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: For a salesman, there is no rock bottom to the life...A salesman is got to dream, boy. It comes with a territory.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: In the factory we make cosmetics; in the store we sell hope.
quotes.author: Charles Revson

quotes.quote: I have heard of a man who had a mind to sell his house, and therefore carried a piece of brick in his pocket, which he showed as a pattern to encourage purchasers.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: The buyer has need of a hundred eyes, the seller of but one.
quotes.author: English Proverbs

quotes.quote: When buying and selling are controlled by civilization, the first things to be bought and sold are legislators.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to ask for too much when selling or offer too little when buying.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Once negotiations begin, you can come down in your selling price or up in your buying price. But it's impossible to do the opposite.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Simply stated, in the world of business, how much money you get from a sale or how much you have to pay when making a purchase determines whether you make or lose money and how rich you ultimately become.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Business relationships are just like personal relationships— they are best started showing an interest in the other person, and in finding out what that person needs are, because ultimately we are selling to those needs.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Who buys a minute's mirth to wail a week? / Or sells eternity to get a toy? / For one sweet grape who will the vine destroy?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: `Don't call it blamed; there isn't anything / More blameless in the sense of being less / A weapon in our human fight,' he said. / `I'll have one if I sell my farm to buy it.'
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Ho! You there, selling daffodils along the windy street, / Poor drooping, dusty daffodils - but oh! so Summer sweet! / Green stems that stab with loveliness, rich petal-cups to hold / The wine of Spring to lips that cling like bees about their gold!
quotes.author: William Henry Ogilvie

quotes.quote: I was selling holy trinkets / I was dressing kind of sharp / Had a pussy in the kitchen / And a panther in the yard / In the prison of the gifted / I was friendly with the guard / So I never had to witness / What happens to the Heart.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: What differentiates sellers today is their ability to bring fresh ideas.
quotes.author: Jill Konrath

quotes.quote: I have never worked a day in my life without selling. If I believe in something, I sell it, and I sell it hard.
quotes.author: Estée Lauder

quotes.quote: Approach each customer with the idea of helping him or her to solve a problem or achieve a goal, not of selling a product or service.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Make a customer, not a sale.
quotes.author: Katherine Barchetti

quotes.quote: Many a man thinks he is buying pleasure, when he is really selling himself to it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry Truman

quotes.quote: Everyone lives by selling something.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Selling is the icing on the cake. It's the making of the work that matters; an experience is incomplete - life is incomplete, in fact - unless and until I've done something with it in the form of a drawing or a painting.
quotes.author: Frank Gordon

quotes.quote: Selling well is not selling out.
quotes.author: Bob Ragland

quotes.quote: Selling out is doing something you don't really want to do for money. That's what selling out is.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: Don't sell life insurance. Sell what life insurance can do.
quotes.author: Ben Feldman

quotes.quote: Selling is something we do for our clients - not to our clients.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: By the time you're eighty years old you've learned everything. You only have to remember it.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: The man who is too old to learn was probably always too old to learn.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: As we grow old, the beauty steals inward.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The best people are the good old wrinkled people with a sparkle in their eye, a wink when you walk by or a toothless smile saying you are doing just fine.
quotes.author: Robert Wesley Miller

quotes.quote: When she smiles, the lines in her face become epic narratives that trace the stories of generations that no book can replace.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: The great secret that all old people share is that you really haven't changed in 70 or 80 years. Your body changes, but you don't change at all.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: I don't see anything so wrong with a wrinkle. It's kind of a badge of courage.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: Beautiful young people are accidents of nature, but beautiful old people are works of art.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If I'd known I was going to live this long, I'd have taken better care of myself.
quotes.author: Eubie Blake

quotes.quote: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living.Â
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Being a senior doesn't automatically make one wise but the wise & foolish alike have things to teach us.
quotes.author: Allan Lokos

quotes.quote: Seniors love getting junk mail. It's sometimes their only way of communicating or feeling like they're part of the real world.
quotes.author: Harry Reid

quotes.quote: We are never old with the strength of the spirit, although the body may fail.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Gray hair is a crown of splendor.
quotes.author: Proverbs 16:31

quotes.quote: The oldest trees often bear the sweetest fruit.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Too many people, when they get old, think that they have to live by the calendar.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.quote: To be seventy years young is sometimes far more cheerful and hopeful than to be forty years old.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable.Â  There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Our seniors have worked long and hard to better the economy, raise families and serve their communities. They deserve to live independent and active lives in their golden years.
quotes.author: Christopher Dodd

quotes.quote: Some people, no matter how old they get, never lose their beauty â€“ they merely move it from their faces into their hearts.
quotes.author: Martin Buxbaum

quotes.quote: Choose old people for enemies. They die. You win.
quotes.author: Jacob M. Appel

quotes.quote: What you do today will determine your future.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Those who love deeply never grow old they may die of old age, but they die young.
quotes.author: Arthur Wing Pinero

quotes.quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: By the time you're eighty years old you've learned everything. You only have to remember it.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Memories are the key not to the past, but to the future.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: If I had no sense of humor, I would long ago have committed suicide.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It is the ability to take a joke, not make one, that proves you have a sense of humor.
quotes.author: Max Eastman

quotes.quote: The world is a tragedy to those who feel, but a comedy to those who think.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: A sense of humor is a major defense against minor troubles.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The overwhelming majority of americans are possessed of two great qualities a sense of humor and a sense of proportion.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over.
quotes.author: Danny McBride

quotes.quote: It's good to be able to laugh at yourself and the problems you face in life. Sense of humor can save you.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: The first step towards true enlightenment is to lighten up on yourself.
quotes.author: Bashar

quotes.quote: Any man who has had the job I've had and didn't have a sense of humor wouldn't still be here.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: I think the next best thing to solving a problem is finding some humor in it.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: A sense of humor is just common sense dancing.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Humor is perhaps a sense of intellectual perspective: an awareness that some things are really important, others not; and that the two kinds are most oddly jumbled in everyday affairs
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The first prerequisite of an advanced being is a sense of humor.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: There is hope for the future because God has a sense of humor and we are funny to God.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: A sense of humor is the best indicator that you will recover; it is often the best indicator that people will love you. Sustain that and you have hope.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: I think the scariest person in the world is the person with no sense of humor.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: So long as you have courage and a sense of humor, it is never too late to start life afresh.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: I don't trust anyone who doesn't laugh.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Most preachers say the nature of God is unknowable, but I'm certain of one thing at least. God almighty has a sense of humor.
quotes.author: Robert Ferrigno

quotes.quote: A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs. It's jolted by every pebble on the road.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs, jolted by every pebble in the road.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: If I had a sense of humor, I'd be laughing right now.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.quote: Humor is a reminder that no matter how high the throne one sits on, one sits on one's bottom
quotes.author: Taki

quotes.quote: When a chick has a sense of humor, there's nothing more attractive.
quotes.author: Dylan O'Brien

quotes.quote: A sense of humor is part of the art of leadership, of getting along with people, of getting things done.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: To succeed in this world, it is not enough to be stupid, you must be well-mannered.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Comedy is the art of making people laugh without making them puke
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: The problem with having a sense of humor is often that people you use it on aren't in a very good mood.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: People who are sensible about love are incapable of it.
quotes.author: Douglas Yates

quotes.quote: All sensible men are of the same religion, but no sensible man ever tells.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The people sensible enough to give good advice are usually sensible enough to give none.
quotes.author: Eden Phillpotts

quotes.quote: We try to make sensible decisions with the facts in front of us. The problem with sensible decisions is that so is everyone else.
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: No sensible person ever made an apology.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No sensible author wants anything but praise.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: A sensible woman can never be happy with a fool.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: To sensible men, every day is a day of reckoning.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: A sensible man ought to find sufficient company in himself.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: The only sensible way to live in this world is without rules!
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: No really sensible person ever remembers enough poetry to recite it.
quotes.author: E.W. Howe

quotes.quote: Be sensible of your wants, that you maybe sensible of your treasures.
quotes.author: Thomas Traherne

quotes.quote: We are more sensible of what is done against custom than against nature.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: No sensible man ever imputes inconsistency to another for changing his minds.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: What is common becomes sense, but what is sensible doesn't always become common.
quotes.author: CrimethInc.

quotes.quote: Every sensible man, every honorable man, must hold the Christian sect in horror.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Every sane and sensible and quiet thing we do is absolutely ignored by the press.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: No sensible man ever engages, unprepared, in a fencing match of words with a woman.
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.quote: No sensible person ever opens the door of his house without knowing who is knocking.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: In a very ugly and sensible age, the arts borrow, not from life, but from each other.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Honest criticism and sensible appreciation are directed not upon the poet but upon the poetry.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: As human beings, our only sensible scale of values is one based on lessening the agony of existence.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: The most delicate, the most sensible of all pleasures, consists in promoting the pleasure of others.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Sensible fathers and mothers, when their children marry, go back to the old days and renew their youth.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Goudge

quotes.quote: A sensible woman should be guided by her head when taking a husband, and by her heart when taking a lover.
quotes.author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quotes.quote: Who is the most sensible person? The one who finds what is to their own advantage in all that happens to them.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: No sensible decision can be made any longer without taking into account not only the world as it is, but the world as it will be.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Anybody who has something sensible or worthwhile to say should be able to say it calmly and soberly, relying on the words themselves to convey his meaning, without resorting to yelling.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: The more sensible a woman is, supposing her not to be masculine, the more attractive she is in her proportionate power to entertain.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: It is much more sensible to be an optimist instead of a pessimist, for if one is doomed to disappointment, why experience it in advance?
quotes.author: Barbara Mertz

quotes.quote: For a highly sensitive person, a drizzle feels like a monsoon.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Before you say something, stop and think how you'd feel if someone said it to you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Everybody is so terribly sensitive about the things they know best.
quotes.author: Norton Juster

quotes.quote: Never apologize for being sensitive or emotional. It's a sign that you have a big heart, and that you aren't afraid to let others see it. Showing your emotions is a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Brigitte Nicole

quotes.quote: You cannot make everyone think and feel as deeply as you do. This is your tragedy, because you understand them but they do not understand you.
quotes.author: Daniel Saint

quotes.quote: Sensitive people either love deeply or they regret deeply. There really is no middle ground because they live in passionate extremes.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: All sensitive people agree that there is a peculiar emotion provoked by works of art.
quotes.author: Clive Bell

quotes.quote: Being overly sensitive to rejection can become a destructive virus.
quotes.author: Robert Herjavec

quotes.quote: Sensitive people faced with the prospect of a camera portrait put on a face they think is the one they would like to show to the world. Every so often what lies behind the facade is rare and more wonderful than the subject knows or dares to believe.
quotes.author: Irving Penn

quotes.quote: Women are sensitive, they over think every little thing and they care way more than they should, but that's what makes their love so strong.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People need to learn that their actions do affect other people. So be careful what you say and do, it's not always just about you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not give in too much to feelings. A overly sensitive heart is an unhappy possession on this shaky earth.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Manners are a sensitive awareness of the feelings of others. If you have that awareness, you have good manners, no matter what fork you use.
quotes.author: Emily Post

quotes.quote: As we let our light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence actually liberates others.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Always try to be more sensitive about people's feelings. Because there are times that a tear means happiness and a smile means hurt.
quotes.author: Rani Waghule

quotes.quote: When a person tells you that you hurt them, you don't get to decide that you didn't.
quotes.author: Louis C.K

quotes.quote: Rather than fearfully shutting down your sensitivity, dive in deeper into all possible feeling. As you expand, keep only those who are not afraid of oceans.
quotes.author: Victoria Erickson

quotes.quote: Sensitive to symptoms could enhance security.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Sensitive people suffer more, but they love more and dream more.
quotes.author: Augusto Cury

quotes.quote: Be sensitive and try to understand other people's pain. Sometimes that's all they need to heal.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sensitive souls draw in the negativity of others because they are so open.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Sensitive person is like an ice; if you warm him, he'll melt.
quotes.author: Kozma Prutkov

quotes.quote: Exaggerated sensitiveness is an expression of the feeling of inferiority.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: People who are much too sensitive to demand of cripples that they run races ask of the poor that they get up and act just like everyone else in the society.
quotes.author: Michael Harrington

quotes.quote: A sensitive soul sees the world through the lens of love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To a sensitive being, pity is not seldom pain.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: People that are really very weird can get into sensitive positions and have a tremendous impact on history.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Sensitive people never like the fatigue of justifying their instincts.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Intellectual passion drives out sensuality.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Sensuality is the total mobilization of the senses: an individual observes his partner intently, straining to catch every sound.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The profoundest of all sensualities is the sense of truth and the next deepest sensual experience is the sense of justice.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Sensual pleasures have the fleeting brilliance of a comet; a happy marriage has the tranquillity of a lovely sunset.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Sensuality often makes love grow too quickly, so that the root remains weak and is easy to pull out.
quotes.author: Friedricich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Sensual pleasures are like soap bubbles, sparkling, effervescent. The pleasures of intellect are calm, beautiful, sublime, ever enduring and climbing upward to the borders of the unseen world.
quotes.author: John H Aughey

quotes.quote: Sensuality is death of the soul.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Sensuality without love is a sin; love without sensuality is worse than a sin.
quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

quotes.quote: Sensuality, too, which used to show itself course, smiling, unmasked, and unmistakable, is now serious, analytic, and so burdened with a sense of its responsibilities that it passes muster half the time as a new type of asceticism.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Physical pleasure is a sensual experience no different from pure seeing or the pure sensation with which a fine fruit fills the tongue; it is a great unending experience, which is given us, a knowing of the world, the fullness and the glory of all knowing. And not our acceptance of it is bad; the bad thing is that most people misuse and squander this experience and apply it as a stimulant at the tired spots of their lives and as distraction instead of a rallying toward exalted moments.
quotes.author: Reiner Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Sensuality does not wear a watch but she always gets to the essential places on time.
quotes.author: J.Ruth Gendler

quotes.quote: Sensuality is the highest form of authenticity.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: Sensuality is not a sexual invitation, it’s a depth invitation.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: All have senses, but not all have sensuality because sensuality is predicated on one’s soul journey to self awareness.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: Sensuality is the hustle to always be at the leading edge of your glamour and enchantment.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: Sensual love deceives one as to the nature of heavenly love; it could not do so alone, but since it unconsciously has the element of heavenly love within it, it can do so.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Beauty is to recognize how full of Love you are. Sensuality is to let some of that Love shine through your body.
quotes.author: Nityananda Das

quotes.quote: Sensuality isn't worth a hair more than spirituality, and it's the same the other way around. It's all one, everything is equally good. Whether you embrace a woman or make a poem, it's the same. So long as the main thing is there, the love, the burning, the emotion, it doesn't matter whether you are a monk on Mount Athos or a man about town in Paris.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Sensuality disappears when we stop exploring curiously and fall into the trap of playing out roles. We start to see ourselves through our partner's eyes and believe that is all we can be.
quotes.author: Adèle Green

quotes.quote: Sensuality relates to how we can move, shake, and beguile our (desired) beloved into a deeper sense of communion. It’s a well-timed wink, the hug of cashmere on subtle curves, or the undulation of aromatherapy for sensual living sensuality and our senses hips on a dance floor. It’s salacious confidence seen in the way we hold ourselves in our bodies and in our lives.
quotes.author: Elana Millman

quotes.quote: Sensuality is essentially our souls speaking on our behalf, articulating and expressing our deepest desires .
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: A sensual lifestyle flourished more where there is refinement, creative thought and/or peace of mind.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: The truth is that from birth on we are, to one extent or another, a fairly sensual species.
quotes.author: Jock Stu

quotes.quote: Sensuality is wonderful, it can keep you awake all night and make you happy all day.
quotes.author: Alain Bremond-Torrent,

quotes.quote: Sensuality is beautiful, and dominance and submission in the right context is a passionate art. A muse which ignites the flame of femininity, enrapturing both partners in complete euphoria, magnifying both the masculine and the feminine in one tantalizing unit.
quotes.author: Sai Marie Johnson

quotes.quote: Delight in your sensuality, in the dance of your desires. Don't be ashamed of it.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: If sensuality be our only happiness we ought to envy the brutes, for instinct is a surer, shorter, safer guide to such happiness than reason.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Sensuality is a woman's prerogative and a man's pleasure.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: The wisest one-word sentence? Breathe.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: For a sentence is not complete unless each word, once its syllables have been pronounced, gives way to make room for the next.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: The death sentence is a barbaric act . . . It is a reflection of the animal instinct still in human beings.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: To sentence a man of true genius, to the drudgery of a school is to put a racehorse on a treadmill.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: A picture might be worth a thousand words but a good sentence is worth a thousand windows.
quotes.author: Mati Klarwein

quotes.quote: The way you live each day is a sentence in the story of your life. Every day, you make the choice whether the sentence ends with a period, question mark, or exclamation point.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: In all pointed sentences, some degree of accuracy must be sacrificed to conciseness.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Ending a sentence with a preposition is something up with which I will not put.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It makes a great difference in the force of a sentence, whether a man be behind it or no.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A sentence always means more. Even a single word, within the weave of incommensurable connotation, can, and usually does.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: A sentence is born into this world neither good nor bad, and that to establish its character is a question of the subtlest possible adjustments, a process of intuition to which exaggeration and force are fatal.
quotes.author: Rachel Cusk

quotes.quote: If you want to know who your friends are, get yourself a jail sentence.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Marriage is not a word, it's a sentence--a life sentence.
quotes.author: David Minkoff

quotes.quote: The first sentence of a book is a handshake, perhaps an embrace.
quotes.author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quotes.quote: Words create sentences; sentences create paragraphs; sometimes paragraphs quicken and begin to breathe.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A thousand cups of wine do not suffice when true friends meet, but half a sentence is too much when there is no meeting of minds.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Certain brief sentences are peerless in their ability to give one the feeling that nothing remains to be said.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: A proverb is a short sentence based on long experience.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Sentence making is an act of questing into unexplored regions, probing the anarchy of daylight, and exploring the troubling confusion and turmoil of the night.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: Every sentence has a truth waiting at the end of it and the writer learns how to know it when he finally gets there.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: We're all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: To hurry through the rise and fall of a fine, full sentence is like defying the role of time in human life.
quotes.author: Kenneth Clark

quotes.quote: Never resist a sentence you like, in which language takes its own pleasure and in which, after having abused it for so long, you are stupefied by its innocence.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: A perfectly healthy sentence, it is true, is extremely rare. For the most part we miss the hue and fragrance of the thought; as if we could be satisfied with the dews of the morning or evening without their colors, or the heavens without their azure.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We are all serving a life sentence, and good behavior is our only hope for a pardon.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: The sentence is the greatest human invention of civilization.
quotes.author: John Banville

quotes.quote: The longest sentence you can form with two words is: I do.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: The sentence must also contain its own apology for being spoken.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sentences are like sharp nails, which force truth upon our memories.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Segregation is that which is forced upon an inferior by a superior. Separation is done voluntarily by two equals.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: In a separation it is the one who is not really in love who says the more tender things.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: There is no separation between mind and body... Self and other co-arise and fall away all the time.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Separation penetrates the disappearing person like a pigment and steeps him in gentle radiance.
quotes.author: Boy George

quotes.quote: Death is the separation of soul from body.
quotes.author: Chrysippus

quotes.quote: For when two beings who are not friends are near each other there is no meeting, and when friends are far apart there is no separation.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: The separation of church and state is a suburban, not an urban, issue.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: Nothing hath separated us from God but our own will, or rather our own will is our separation from God.
quotes.author: William Law

quotes.quote: But separation of church and state was never meant to separate God and government.
quotes.author: Roy Moore

quotes.quote: The only solid and lasting peace between a man and his wife is, doubtless, a separation.
quotes.author: Philip Stanhope

quotes.quote: In the separation of the human species from nature, life goes awry.
quotes.author: Michael Frome

quotes.quote: Separation of church and state should never mean separation of God and right.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: Death is not more certainly a separation of our souls from our bodies than the Christian life is a separation of our souls from worldly tempers, vain indulgences, and unnecessary cares.
quotes.author: William Law

quotes.quote: Equality and separation cannot exist in the same space.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.quote: Many a witty inspiration is like the surprising reunion of befriended thoughts after a long separation.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: There's no separation between electronic music and acoustic music. It's all one thing. Each song has its own heartbeat. Each song has its own soul.
quotes.author: Banks

quotes.quote: Those reflective moments for me usually come from loneliness and separation from people.
quotes.author: Soccer Mommy

quotes.quote: In nature, there is no separation between design, engineering, and fabrication; the bone does it all.
quotes.author: Neri Oxman

quotes.quote: The act of exploring what the men are, and moreover the separation of the good from the evil, is visitation; and the good are then removed, and the evil are left behind.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote: People don't seem to understand that the separation of powers is not about the power of these branches; it's there to protect individual liberty - it's there to protect us from the concentration of power.
quotes.author: Jonathan Turley

quotes.quote: The false separation between living and giving must end.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: There is not a lot of separation between work and home life.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.quote: The 'niche' effect of charter schools guarantees a swift and vicious deepening of class and racial separation.
quotes.author: Jonathan Kozol

quotes.quote: For some Chicago expats, food is the medicine that blunts the pain of separation.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: The tenet of the separation of church and state is an unconstitutional doctrine.
quotes.author: Sharron Angle

quotes.quote: Orchestras have become used to the emphasis on the separation of layers, of the ultimate precision and clarity.
quotes.author: Esa-Pekka Salonen

quotes.quote: The marriage didn't work out but the separation is great.
quotes.author: Liz Smith

quotes.quote: We know that in September, we will wander through the warm winds of summer's wreckage. We will welcome summer's ghost.
quotes.author: Heny Rollins

quotes.quote: But now in September the garden has cooled, and with it my possessiveness. The sun warms my back instead of beating on my head ... The harvest has dwindled, and I have grown apart from the intense midsummer relationship that brought it on.
quotes.author: Robert Finch

quotes.quote: September: it was the most beautiful of words, he'd always felt, evoking orange-flowers, swallows, and regret.
quotes.author: Alexander Theroux

quotes.quote: In short, a bad Sunday of September, in September of that traitor who let you go a big wave passed upon him, like a gunshot between the prickly pears.
quotes.author: Giovanni Verga

quotes.quote: We awoke one morning in September, and the world lurched on its axis.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: A little-known Irish festival called Garland Sunday was observed on the first Sunday in September, and still is celebrated in some parts of western rural Ireland.
quotes.author: Edain McCoy

quotes.quote: Wiccans celebrate Mabon (pronounced may-bun or mah-bon) on the actual date of the fall equinox. The date differs year to year, and falls around September 22.
quotes.author: Diane Smith

quotes.quote: On September 17, 1787, the United States Constitution was signed.
quotes.author: Gale

quotes.quote: President George W. Bush wanted to set aside a day to remember the people who died in the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001.
quotes.author: Gale

quotes.quote: On October 25, 2001, Congress passed a law to set aside September 11 as Patriot Day, and President Bush signed it on December 18, 2001.
quotes.author: Gale

quotes.quote: In the Roman calendar there were only ten months - the 7th to 10th being September to December as their names suggest. It was only later when July and August (Julius and Augustus Caesar) were added that they became out of sequence.
quotes.author: Chris Woods

quotes.quote: September comes from the Latin word septem, meaning “seven,” because it was the seventh month of the early Roman calendar.
quotes.author: Janice Stillman

quotes.quote: But when fall comes, kicking summer out on its treacherous ass as it always does one day sometime after the midpoint of September, it stays awhile like an old friend that you have missed. It settles in the way an old friend will settle into your favorite chair and take out his pipe and light it and then fill the afternoon with stories of places he has been and things he has done since last he saw you.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: That old September feeling, left over from school days, of summer passing, vacation nearly done, obligations gathering, books and football in the air ... Another fall, another turned page: there was something of jubilee in that annual autumnal beginning, as if last year's mistakes had been wiped clean by summer.
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: I used to love September, but now it just rhymes with remember.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: September was a thirty-days long goodbye to summer, to the season that left everybody both happy and weary of the warm, humid weather and the exhausting but thrilling adventures. It didn't feel like fresh air either, it made me suffocate. It was like the days would be dragging some kind of sickness, one that we knew wouldn't last, but made us uncomfortable anyway. The atmosphere felt dusty and stifling.
quotes.author: Lea Malot

quotes.quote: Ah, September! You are the doorway to the season that awakens my soul... but I must confess that I love you only because you are a prelude to my beloved October.
quotes.author: Peggy Toney Horton

quotes.quote: Late September holds onto the summer / like that promise you made / you can never forget.
quotes.author: Kurt Philiop Behm

quotes.quote: I remember one September / Light as thistledown or feather / Long with love we strayed together.
quotes.author: Roderic Quinn

quotes.quote: Though September blows no ember / Into flame for you this season / Yet 'tis neither rhyme nor reason.
quotes.author: Roderic Quinn

quotes.quote: Some crimson poppy of a late delight / Atoning in its splendor for the flight / Of summer blooms and joys / This is September.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: To sighs of morning air, that froze / (With her lips opened for a say) / How curiously has smiled the rose / On a September fleeting day!
quotes.author: Afanasy Afanasyevich Fet

quotes.quote: Like my fathers come to pass / Seven years has gone so fast / Wake me up when September ends.
quotes.author: Michael Pritchard

quotes.quote: As my memory rest / But never forgets what I lost / Wake me up when September ends.
quotes.author: Michael Pritchard

quotes.quote: Hail, kind September, friend whose grace / Renews the bland year's bounteous face.
quotes.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.quote: The leaves of brown came tumbling down, remember / In September, in the rain.
quotes.author: Harry Warren

quotes.quote: That old sun went out just like a dying ember / September, in the cold, cold rain.
quotes.author: Harry Warren

quotes.quote: September morn / We danced until the night / Became a brand new day.
quotes.author: Gilbert Becaud

quotes.quote: Two lovers playing scenes / From some romantic play / September morning / Still can make me feel that way.
quotes.author: Gilbert Becaud

quotes.quote: Do you remember / The 21st night of September / Love was changing the minds of pretenders / While chasing the clouds away.
quotes.author: Al McKay

quotes.quote: In reality, serendipity accounts for one percent of the blessings we receive in life, work and love. The other 99 percent is due to our efforts.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Serendipity is looking in a haystack for a needle and discovering a farmer's daughter.
quotes.author: Julius Comroe Jr.

quotes.quote: Serendipity is the faculty of finding things we did not know we were looking for.
quotes.author: Glauco Ortolano

quotes.quote: Serendipity. Look for something, find something else, and realize that what you've found is more suited to your needs than what you thought you were looking for.
quotes.author: Lawrence Block

quotes.quote: Sometimes serendipity is just intention unmasked.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.quote: Serendipity is the way to make discoveries, by accident but also by sagacity, of things one is not in quest of. Based on experience, knowledge, it is the creative exploitation of the unforeseen.
quotes.author: Adrian Bejan

quotes.quote: Serendipity is when you find things you weren't looking for because finding what you are looking for is so damned difficult.
quotes.author: Erin Mckean

quotes.quote: Serendipity is putting a quarter in the gumball machine and having three pieces come rattling out instead of one all red.
quotes.author: Tobi Tobias

quotes.quote: One aspect of serendipity to bear in mind is that you have to be looking for something in order to find something else.
quotes.author: Lawrence Block

quotes.quote: Serendipity... You will understand it better by the derivation than by the definition. I once read a silly fairy tale, called 'The Three Princes of Serendip': as their Highnesses traveled, they were always making discoveries, by accidents and sagacity, of things which they were not in quest of.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: ...maximize the serendipity around you.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Serendipity always rewards the prepared.
quotes.author: Katori Hall

quotes.quote: What people call serendipity sometimes is just having your eyes open.
quotes.author: Jose Manuel Barroso

quotes.quote: The history of discovery is full of creative serendipity.
quotes.author: Tom Kelley

quotes.quote: Fact is, inventing an innovative business model is often mostly a matter of serendipity.
quotes.author: Gary Hamel

quotes.quote: Serendipity is the art of making an unsought finding.
quotes.author: Pek Van Andel

quotes.quote: You don't reach Serendib by plotting a course for it. You have to set out in good faith for elsewhere and lose your bearings serendipitously.
quotes.author: John Barth

quotes.quote: Synergy and serendipity often play a big part in medical and scientific advances.
quotes.author: Julie Bishop

quotes.quote: I think a lot more decisions are made on serendipity than people think. Things come across their radar screens and they jump at them.
quotes.author: Jay W. Lorsch

quotes.quote: There'll always be serendipity involved in discovery.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: I always leave room for serendipity and chance.
quotes.author: Ken Stott

quotes.quote: Serendipity favors the believing.
quotes.author: Krystl Campos

quotes.quote: There's always going to be the circumstances you can't plan for. There's always the unexpected relevance and the serendipity.
quotes.author: Jason Silva

quotes.quote: Some of the greatest things, as I understand, they have come about by serendipity, the greatest discoveries.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: Serendipity is nice, but hoping for luck and the magic of happenstance shouldn't be an excuse for a lack of proactivity. I had to learn for myself that waiting isn't a life plan.
quotes.author: Karen Finerman

quotes.quote: I am a firm believer in serendipity- all the random pieces coming together in one wonderful moment, when suddenly you see what their purpose was all along.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: There is a fine line between serendipity and stalking.
quotes.author: David Coleman

quotes.quote: Serendipity is the gift of finding things we didn't know we were already unconsciously looking for.
quotes.author: Glauco Ortolano

quotes.quote: Serendipity is the gift of finding agreeable or valuable things not sought for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Most of us have one big idea at some point in our lives. That Eureka! moment. It comes to us all in different ways, often by chance of serendipity.
quotes.author: Peter James

quotes.quote: Let us accept the invitation, ever-open, from the Stillness, taste its exquisite sweetness, and heed its silent instruction.
quotes.author: Paul Brunton

quotes.quote: While you are proclaiming peace with your lips, be careful to have it even more fully in your heart.
quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: You can't calm the storm, so stop trying. What you can do is calm yourself. The storm will pass.
quotes.author: Timber Hawkeye

quotes.quote: Serenity is knowing that your worst shot is still pretty good.
quotes.author: Johnny Miller

quotes.quote: Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeback, even if he deserves it...Don't allow his anger to become your anger.
quotes.author: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.quote: Do your work, then step back. The only path to serenity.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Serenity is not freedom from the storm, but peace amid the storm.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Like water, we are truest to our nature in repose.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness keeps up a kind of daylight in the mind, filling it with a steady and perpetual serenity.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: And you would accept the seasons of your heart just as you have always accepted that seasons pass over your fields and you would watch with serenity through the winters of your grief.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: In struggling against anguish one never produces serenity; the struggle against anguish only produces new forms of anguish.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Only when one is connected to one's own core is one connected to others, I am beginning to discover. And, for me, the core, the inner spring, can best be refound through solitude.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Everything you do can be done better from a place of relaxation.
quotes.author: Stephen C. Paul

quotes.quote: The poor long for riches, the rich long for heaven, but the wise long for a state of tranquility.
quotes.author: Swami Rama

quotes.quote: Clarity brings Serenity.
quotes.author: Teodomila

quotes.quote: You find peace by coming to terms with what you don't know.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could; some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day; you shall begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Quietude, which some men cannot abide because it reveals their inward poverty, is as a palace of cedar to the wise, for along its hallowed courts the King in his beauty deigns to walk.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: We think a happy life consists in tranquility of mind.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: It is vain to say human beings ought to be satisfied with tranquillity: they must have action; and they will make it if they cannot find it.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: The fruit of silence is tranquillity.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: Periods of tranquillity are seldom prolific of creative achievement. Mankind has to be stirred up.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Tranquility is nothing else than the good ordering of the mind.
quotes.author: Marcus Antoninus Aurelius

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as perpetual tranquillity of mind while we live here; because life itself is but motion, and can never be without desire, nor without fear, no more than without sense.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: The pursuit, even of the best things, ought to be calm and tranquil.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Learn to be quiet enough to hear the sound of the geniune within yourself so that you can hear it in others.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: Where there is peace and meditation, there is neither anxiety nor doubt.
quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself. Nothing can bring you peace but the triumph of principles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There are things that are so serious that you can only joke about them.
quotes.author: Werner Heisenberg

quotes.quote: Those who are serious in ridiculous matters will be ridiculous in serious matters.”
quotes.author: Cato the Elder

quotes.quote: Serious affairs and history are carefully laid snares for the uninformed.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Nothing is more comical than seriousness understood as a virtue that has to precede all important literature
quotes.author: Julio Cortazar

quotes.quote: We take life so serious at times, worrying about the little things, until we get to the end of our lives and wonder why we did.
quotes.author: Ron Baratono

quotes.quote: So we won't take ourselves too seriously. Because taking something serious doesn't make it go away any faster. In fact, it keeps making it a little bit worse.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Men should learn to live with the same seriousness with which children play.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It is not so important to be serious as it is to be serious about the important things. The monkey wears an expression of seriousness which would do credit to any college student, but the monkey is serious because he itches.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hutchins

quotes.quote: Man's maturity: to have regained the seriousness that he had as a child at play.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Over-seriousness is a warning sign for mediocrity and bureaucratic thinking. People who are seriously committed to mastery and high performance are secure enough to lighten up.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: No human thing is of serious importance.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Seriousness is the only refuge of the shallow.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Humor and seriousness are not in opposition to each other.
quotes.author: Al Franken

quotes.quote: When the situation is serious, don’t be funny; and when the situation is funny, don’t be serious!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Serious people are not easily distracted!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: A person should neither serious nor curious, to the thing which will not profitable for him/her life
quotes.author: Rashid Jorvee

quotes.quote: When we laugh at the joy in everyday life we realise that the world is not such a serious place after all.
quotes.author: Dee Waldeck

quotes.quote: Ultimate seriousness in not without a dose of humor.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: It is not so important to be serious as it is to be serious about the important things.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hutchins

quotes.quote: The one serious conviction that a man should have is that nothing is to be taken too seriously.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: There are some things so serious you have to laugh at them.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Seriousness is the deepest pleasure we have.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Those base men who speak of the secret faults of others destroy themselves like serpents that stray onto anthills.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Pain is always a fanged serpent, but to the fearful it has a hundred heads.
quotes.author: Dagobert D. Runes

quotes.quote: The crookedness of the serpent is still straight enough to slide through the snake hole.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: Those who give you a serpent when you ask for a fish, may have nothing but serpents to give.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Be wise as a serpent and wary as a dove!
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The mediation by the serpent was necessary. Evil can seduce man, but cannot become man.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: The serpent is helpless unless he finds an apple to work with.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: A serpent is a serpent, and none the less a viper, because it is nestled in the bosom of an honest-hearted man.
quotes.author: Martin Delany

quotes.quote: Adam blamed Eve, Eve blamed the serpent and the serpent didn't have a leg to stand on.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: If a man is as wise as a serpent, he can afford to be as harmless as a dove.
quotes.author: American Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: Eternity is a circle, a serpent that swallows its own tail.
quotes.author: Elsa Barker

quotes.quote: An arrow may fly through the air and leave no trace; but an ill thought leaves a trail like a serpent.
quotes.author: Charles Mackay

quotes.quote: That crafty kindness which inveigles me to sacrifice principle is the serpent in the grass -- deadly to the incautious wayfarer.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The fiercest serpent may be overcome by a swarm of ants.
quotes.author: Isoroku Yamamoto

quotes.quote: To fight the raven you may make alliance with the serpent until the battle is done.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Look like the innocent flower, But be the serpent under it.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We must combine the toughness of the serpent with the softness of the dove, a tough mind and a tender heart.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Unless a serpent devour a serpent it will not become a dragon. Unless one power absorb another, it will not become great.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Knowledge hath in it somewhat of the serpent, and therefore where it entereth into a man it makes him swell.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Still anyone who trusts a serpent deserves its bite. The wise see a creature for what it is, not what it says it may be.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: Judge nothing by the appearance. The more beautiful the serpent, the more fatal its sting.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: The trail of the human serpent is thus over everything.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Do not trust a malicious man because you have long been intimate with him. A serpent will still bite, though it may have been kept and tended a long time.
quotes.author: Panchatantra

quotes.quote: If a man wishes to become a hero, then the serpent must first become a dragon: otherwise he lacks his proper enemy.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Beware the serpent, slyly hid, which stings; The soul with poison of Prosperity.
quotes.author: Edward Robeson Taylor

quotes.quote: Better a serpent than a stepmother!
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: We were ensnared by the wisdom of the serpent; we are set free by the foolishness of God.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: How sharper than a serpent's tooth it is to have a thankless child!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Those who tread among serpents, and along a tortuous path, must use the cunning of the serpent.
quotes.author: Thomas Becket

quotes.quote: The infernal serpent; he it was, whose guile, Stirr'd up with envy and revenge, deceiv'd the mother of mankind.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Let us beÂ servants in order to be leaders.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: After a time, civilÂ servants tend to become no longerÂ servants and no longer civil.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: GoodÂ servants frequently make good masters.
quotes.author: Jupiter Hammon

quotes.quote: AÂ servantÂ church must have as its priority solidarity with the poor.
quotes.author: Claudio Hummes

quotes.quote: We are allÂ servants. The only question is whom we will serve.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: If there's anything a publicÂ servantÂ hates to do it's something for the public.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: PerfectÂ servants would be the worst of all for certain masters, whose happiness consists in finding fault with them.
quotes.author: Jean Antoine Petit-Senn

quotes.quote: Servants must be big people. Big enough to go on, remembering the right and forgetting the wrong.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Being aÂ servantÂ will take you places where your talent will never take you.
quotes.author: Tommy Tenney

quotes.quote: PublicÂ servant: Persons chosen by the people to distribute the graft.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The chief use ofÂ servants is the evidence they afford of the master's ability to pay.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.quote: Every goodÂ servantÂ does not all commands.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If aÂ servantÂ strives to please his master and studies and takes pains to do it, I believe there are but few masters who would use such aÂ servantÂ cruelly.
quotes.author: Jupiter Hammon

quotes.quote: FaithfulÂ servants have a way of knowing answered prayer when they see it, and a way of not giving up when they don't.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: If we are trueÂ servants of the masses, we would take pride in spinning for their sake.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It's incumbent on good publicÂ servants to maintain their voices and originality of thinking.
quotes.author: Ronan Farrow

quotes.quote: Your bestÂ servantÂ is the person who does not attend so much to hearing what he himself wants as to willing what he has heard from you.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: The civilÂ servantÂ is primarily the master of the short-term solution.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: In a mature society, 'civilÂ servant' is semantically equal to 'civil master'.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Servants, when their lords no longer sway, Their minds no more to righteous courses bend.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: AÂ servantÂ wants to be rewarded for what he does. A lover wants only to be in love's presence, that ocean whose depth will never be known.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If you would have a faithfulÂ servant, and one that you like, serve yourself.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Some civilÂ servants are neitherÂ servants nor civil.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Those who choose to beÂ servants know the most about being free.
quotes.author: Janette Oke

quotes.quote: RealÂ servants don't try to use God for their purposes. They let God use them for His purposes.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Test aÂ servantÂ while in the discharge of his duty, a relative in difficulty, a friend in adversity, and a wife in misfortune.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: FaithfulÂ servants never retire. You can retire from your career, but you will never retire from serving God.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: AÂ servantÂ of the Lord stands bodily before men, but mentally he is knocking at the gates of heaven with prayer.
quotes.author: John Climacus

quotes.quote: A goodÂ servantÂ is a real godsend, but truly this is a rare bird in the land.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: TheÂ servantÂ may not look to be in better case than his master.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: It is to serve others that trees bear fruits. It is to serve others that rivers flow. It is to serve others that cows give milk. Similarly, our body is meant to serve others.
quotes.author: Trishatee Vyakhya Neeti

quotes.quote: The service we render to others is really the rent we pay for our room on this earth.
quotes.author: Wilfred Grenfell

quotes.quote: To help others is a great form of righteous deed, to work for others is excellence in working. To give in charity to deserving people is real desire To have no desires is real salvation.
quotes.author: Subhashita Manjari

quotes.quote: I will say what many cores of scriptures have said, in just half a verse; to serve others is meritorious, and to harm others is sinful.
quotes.author: Samayochita Padya Malika

quotes.quote: True heroism is remarkably sober, very undramatic. It is not the urge to surpass all others at whatever cost, but the urge to serve others at whatever cost.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The desire to serve others is the highest impulse of the human heart and the rewards of such service are beyond measure.
quotes.author: Ganga Stone

quotes.quote: There is nothing to make you like other human beings as much as doing things for them.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Ilurston

quotes.quote: The race of mankind would perish did they cease to aid each other. We cannot exist without mutual help. All, therefore, that need aid have a right to ask it from their fellow men, and no one who has the power of granting can refuse it without guilt.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: It is one of the most beautiful conversations of this life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself...Serve and thou shall be served. If you love and serve men, you cannot, by any hiding or stratagem, escape the remuneration.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our duty to others means helping others; doing good to the world. Why should we do good to the world? Apparently to help the world, but really to help ourselves.
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Serve others. Put it into action by loving and serving others, and you will get past the fear of what others may think of you and dare to be grateful.
quotes.author: Nina Lesowitz, Mary Beth Sammons

quotes.quote: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Take us on the quest of service, / Kingly servant of man's needs. / Lat us work with Thee for others. / Anywhere Thy purpose leads.
quotes.author: Eleanor B. Stock

quotes.quote: Well-being is not found in isolation, possessions, or power itself; it usually appears while serving others.
quotes.author: Manuel Arango

quotes.quote: Each one should use whatever gift he has received to serve others.
quotes.author: 1 Peter 4:10

quotes.quote: The ultimate aim of the quest must be neither release nor ecstasy for oneself, but the wisdom and the power to serve others.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Serving others has even been cited as a social necessity.
quotes.author: Dean Nealson

quotes.quote: For even the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve others and to give his life as a ransom for many.
quotes.author: Matthew 20:28

quotes.quote: Part of being a person is about helping others.
quotes.author: Regis Murayi

quotes.quote: He who serves the most reaps the most.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Life's most urgent question is: What are you doing for others?
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves are far better than mere giving.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: As we lose ourselves in the service of others we discover our own lives and our own happiness.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.
quotes.author: Albert Pine

quotes.quote: There is nothing more beautiful than someone who goes out of their way to make life beautiful for others.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: You have two hands. One to help yourself, the second to help others.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If you're not making someone else’s life better, then you're wasting your time. Your life will become better by making other lives better.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Remember that setbacks are only challenges in disguise. Look at them as lessons don't waste time beating yourself up. Just get back on track and focus on what you want. It's up to you, and you will do it!
quotes.author: Jorge Cruise

quotes.quote: A setback is never a bad experience, just another one of life's lessons.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Understand and accept the cycles of money. The setbacks you may have today or next year will not keep you from financial freedom. If you hold on to your goals and dreams, you will get there.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Setbacks are just learning experiences.
quotes.author: Beth Brooke

quotes.quote: Your setback is just a setup for your comeback.
quotes.author: Steve Harvey

quotes.quote: We all have setbacks in our yesterdays, but your past doesn't define your future. Today is a new day, you may slip, but God isn't going to let you fall. His loving arms will always be there to catch you and put you in a right direction.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: If you have a setback, and you're not doing well and then you overcome it somehow, it always sticks with you. You know it could happen again.
quotes.author: Sam Donaldson

quotes.quote: Setbacks in life are opportunities to perform at a new level.
quotes.author: William Cranch Bond

quotes.quote: Sometimes what appears to be a setback is God's mode of elevation.
quotes.author: Roderick L. Evans

quotes.quote: The ability to bounce back after a setback is the single most important trait an entrepreneurial venture can possess.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The beautiful thing about setbacks is they introduce us to our strengths.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Sometimes small setbacks are just blessings in disguise. They enhance your determination and whole-hearted dedication to achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: You know, everybody has setbacks in their life, and everybody falls short of whatever goals they might set for themselves. That's part of living and coming to terms with who you are as a person.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: When you look back at your life, look forward, have no regrets and know, that through all the mistakes and setbacks you've experienced, God isn't finished with you yet.
quotes.author: Carniel Dunlop

quotes.quote: Every setback means you're one step closer to seeing the dream come to pass.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: This is a real setback, coming just in the moment when things were starting to go so well.
quotes.author: Luciano Figueroa

quotes.quote: Without setbacks and mistakes, no experience. Without experience, no learning. And without learning, you'll never truly understand the awakening of your heart's desires.
quotes.author: Robbie Vorhaus

quotes.quote: A setback could be a surprise on the conversion charge that's the largest issue tomorrow.
quotes.author: Selwyn Jones

quotes.quote: Setbacks allow us to take a step back and look at the view from a whole.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: One of the secrets to be a success is to refuse to let temporary setbacks defeat you and put you down.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Enduring setbacks while maintaining the ability to show others the way to go forward is a true test of leadership.
quotes.author: Nitin Nohria

quotes.quote: Every setback might be the very thing that makes you carry on and fight all the harder and become much better.
quotes.author: Les Paul

quotes.quote: Give yourself a break. Stop beating yourself up! Everyone makes mistakes, has setbacks and failures. You don't come with a book on how to get it right all the time. You will fail sometimes, not because you planned to, but simply because you're human. Failure is a part of creating a great life. Stand up to it and handle it with grace. Because, you can.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: This temporary setback can and must be overcome.
quotes.author: Bud Perrone

quotes.quote: Setbacks in trying to realize the ideal do not prove that the ideal is at fault.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Within every setback or obstacle or disadvantage there is the seed of an equal or opposite or greater advantage or benefit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The setback is not enough on Mechanic Street. We have the opportunity here to make this more amenable to pedestrians.
quotes.author: Louis DiMento

quotes.quote: Nothing is ever a setback. If anything, it just motivates you for what's next.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.quote: A great champion deals with setback with a comeback.
quotes.author: Donna de Varona

quotes.quote: Anytime you suffer a setback or disappointment, put your head down and plow ahead.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: It's exciting setting goals and moving forward with them.
quotes.author: Amber Frey

quotes.quote: Setting goals for your game is an art. The trick is in setting them at the right level neither too low nor too high.
quotes.author: Greg Norman

quotes.quote: You cannot afford to wait for perfect conditions. Goal setting is often a matter of balancing timing against available resources. Opportunities are easily lost while waiting for perfect conditions.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: The major reason for setting a goal is for what it makes of you to accomplish it. What it makes of you will always be the far greater value than what you get.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: You have to be the one setting your own goals, trying to achieve those goals.
quotes.author: Johnny Bench

quotes.quote: Setting a goal is not the main thing. It is deciding how you will go about achieving it and staying with that plan.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: You should set goals beyond your reach so you always have something to live for.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: When you set goals, something inside of you starts saying, "Let's go, let's go," and ceilings start to move up.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Set short-term goals that you can reach. Set goals that are well balanced, not too many nor too few, and not too high nor too low. Write down your attainable goals, and work on them according to their importance. Pray for divine guidance in your goal setting.
quotes.author: M. Russell Ballard

quotes.quote: Set goals - high goals for you and your organization. When your organization has a goal to shoot for, you create teamwork, people working for a common good.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: Exercise to stimulate, not to annihilate. The world wasn't formed in a day, and neither were we. Set small goals and build upon them.
quotes.author: Lee Haney

quotes.quote: I believe in goals, but I believe that the individual should set his own. Goal setting should cause us to stretch as we make our way.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: The most important thing to do is to set goals. Training is a waste of time if you don't have goals.
quotes.author: Samantha Riley

quotes.quote: If you don't set goals, you can't regret not reaching them.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Without some goals and some efforts to reach it, no man can live.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Set goals so big that unless God helps you, you will be a miserable failure.
quotes.author: Bill Bright

quotes.quote: Set goals that are achievable. Bring about meaningful change one step at a time. Raising awareness is not enough.
quotes.author: Henry Spira

quotes.quote: I'm a firm believer in goal setting. Step by step. I can't see any other way of accomplishing anything.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Setting goals helps bring your future into your present and the present is the only time we can take action.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Goal setting has traditionally been based on past performance. This practice has tended to perpetuate the sins of the past.
quotes.author: Joseph Juran

quotes.quote: All goal setting must be immediately followed by both the development of a plan, and massive and consistent action toward its fulfillment.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Stop setting goals. Goals are pure fantasy unless you have a specific plan to achieve them.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Most people know how to set goals; few know how to achieve them.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Your ability to set goals and to make plans for their accomplishment is the master skill of success.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first important step in achieving success in an activity. It's a reminder of what you are working towards.
quotes.author: Peter Vanderkaay

quotes.quote: Unless you have definite precise, clearly set goals, you are not going to realize the maximum potential that lies within you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It would be so good to settle down and become part of somewhere again, instead of constantly passing through.
quotes.author: Paul Torday

quotes.quote: The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.
quotes.author: Maureen Dowd

quotes.quote: The biggest human temptation is to settle for too little.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Take your victories, whatever they may be, cherish them, use them, but don't settle for them.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: A champion is someone who does not settle for that day's practice, that day's competition, that day's performance. They are always striving to be better. They don't live in the past.
quotes.author: Briana Scurry

quotes.quote: It's time to stop complying with the system and draw your own map. Stop settling for what's good enough and start creating art that matters.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Until you find something to fight for, you settle for something to fight against.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The Enemy of the best is the good. If you're always settling with what's good, you'll never be the best.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.quote: I think the secret is to just settle for the shape of your life takes. Instead of you know, always waiting and wishing for what might make you happy.
quotes.author: Wally Lamb

quotes.quote: Don't settle for anybody just to have someone. Set your standards. What kind of love do you want to attract? List the qualities you really want in the relationship. Develop those qualities in yourself and you will attract a person who has them.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Imagine settling for a life you can have because you don't have the courage to go after the life you really want.
quotes.author: Jill Davis

quotes.quote: If you let cloudy water settle, it will become clear. If you let your upset mind settle, your course will also become clear.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: One key to success is demanding more than adequacy, never settling for good enough and always doing a little bit more.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Instead of doing the best thing, we sometimes have to settle for the rightest thing.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Some people are settling down, some people are settling and some people refuse to settle for anything less than butterflies.
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.quote: If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it. And, like any great relationship, it just gets better and better as the years roll on.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Let us not settle for what is simply 'OK' when we have full information on what can create lasting change.
quotes.author: Rinku Sen

quotes.quote:
Every man has to settle down eventually. You know why you gotta settle
down eventually? Because you don't want to be the old guy in the club.
You know what I'm talking about. Every club you go into, there's always
some old guy. He ain't really old, just a little too old to be in the
club.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Why settle for so little in life when you can have so much just by daring to be different in your thinking.
quotes.author: Catherine Ponder

quotes.quote: Warfare is an utterly stupid method of settling differences of interest between different nations.
quotes.author: George H. Mead

quotes.quote: Where we're not wrong or where the cost of settling is so much that it is totally disproportionate to the harm or the error that we made, we're not going to settle.
quotes.author: Lee Scott

quotes.quote: Healing cannot be done by settling a score.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: We won't figure out what's sacred in life if we settle for what's safe.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: I always believed that when you follow your heart or your gut, when you really follow the things that feel great to you, you can never lose, because settling is the worst feeling in the world.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: Don't tolerate any form of average. Don't accept Dis-excellence. Don't stand for mediocre. If you're going to settle, then please settle for the absolute best.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: I find sewing by hand extremely rewarding. The pleasure of both making and wearing beautifully constructed garments far exceeds the time and effort required to complete them.
quotes.author: Claire B. Schaeffer

quotes.quote: There is not the slightest reason why the spinning wheel may not co-exist with the spinning mill even as the domestic kitchen co-exists with the hotels. Indeed, typewriters and sewing machines may go, but the needle and the reed pen will survive.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Men build bridges and thow railroads across deserts, yet they contend successfully that the job of sewing on a button is beyond them. Accordingly, they don't have to sew buttons.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun
