quotes.quote: A fair little girl sat under a tree, / Sewing as long as her eyes could see; / She smoothed her work, and folded it right, / And said, 'Dear work, good night, good night.'
quotes.author: Jo Petty

quotes.quote: When I was a little girl, you used to learn to sew all holes in things, darning socks, but nobody mends things anymore.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: Fame is like a crop of Canada thistles, very easy to sew but hard to reap.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: The sewing machine sews what the scissors have cut asunder, plus whatever else comes in its path.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A family stitched together with love seldom unravels.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: A tranquil woman can go on sewing longer than an angry man can go on fuming.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Take your needle, my child, and work at your pattern; it will come out a rose by and by. Life is like that - one stitch at a time taken patiently and the pattern will come out all right like the embroidery.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Sew much fabric, sew little time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you don't have experience sewing, start with that, because that will inform what you are able to design.
quotes.author: Tim Gunn

quotes.quote: Sewing mends the soul.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Stitch your stress away.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sewing: A creative mess is better than tidy idleness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sewing forever, housework whenever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She sewed pants, shirts, and jackets in the style of the trends she could not afford, and that's about what a lot of us think of when we think about sewing: cute clothes. But Audrey knew more, something many of us forget: the strength of the stitch.
quotes.author: Victoria Loustalot

quotes.quote: Couture sewing for the home sewer means being able to build into wonderful fashions comfort and fit, bringing with it confidence, self-assurance and security in self.
quotes.author: Patricia Houser

quotes.quote: The joy of stitching is knowing that no one else in the world has the same outfit as you.
quotes.author: Tilly Walnes

quotes.quote: The joy of stitching is taking pleasure in the experience of making something with your own hands.
quotes.author: Tilly Walnes

quotes.quote: Custom tailoring was once the only technique for creating a professionally tailored garment, but now the machine and fusible methods are natural choices when faster, easier construction is desired.
quotes.author: Editors of Creative Fashion International

quotes.quote: Sewing is not always easy, in fact, sewing can quite often be hard and frustrating.
quotes.author: Assembil Books

quotes.quote: The challenges are part of the reason why it is so rewarding to sew a garment and be able to say 'I made that.'
quotes.author: Assembil Books

quotes.quote: All day long you sit and sew, / Stitch life down for fear it grow, / Stitch life down for fear we guess / At the hidden ugliness.
quotes.author: Dame Edith Luisa Sitwell

quotes.quote: God love her! how it cheered me then / To see her there so brave and pretty; / So she with needle, I with pen, / We slaved and sang above the city. / And as across my streams of ink / I watched her from a poet's distance, / She stitched and sang . . . I scarcely think / She was aware of my existence.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: I go to the shop every morning; / I work with my needle and thread; / Silk, satin and velvet adorning, / Then luncheon on coffee and bread. / Then sewing and sewing till seven; / Or else, if the order I get, / I toil and I toil till eleven -- / And such is the day of Babette.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: I am certain that a Sewing Machine would relieve as much human suffering as a hundred Lunatic Asylums, and possibly a good deal more.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Sewing small pieces together gives me a peaceful heart and a quilt to wrap you with, my love.
quotes.author: Benita Skinner

quotes.quote: You can sew your own curtain to remain hidden from the dark side of the world.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Sex is like having dinner: sometimes you joke about the dishes, sometimes you take the meal seriously.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: When a person has sex, they're not just having it with that partner, they're having it with everybody that partner has had it with for the past ten years.
quotes.author: Otis Ray Bowen

quotes.quote: Sex can be fun after eighty, after ninety, and after lunch!
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Sex: the thing that takes up the least amount of time and causes the most amount of trouble.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: Women complain about sex more often than men. Their gripes fall into two major categories: (1) Not enough (2) Too much.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: My wife is a sex object. Every time I ask for sex, she objects.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: Ultimately, love is much more important than sex and sex becomes greater when you're really in love.
quotes.author: Calvin Klein

quotes.quote: Sex is like snow; you never know how many inches you are going to get or how long it is going to last.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sex is the most wonderful thing on this earth, as long as God is in it. When the Devil gets in it, it's the most terrible thing on this earth.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Food is like sex. When you abstain, even the worst stuff begins to look good.
quotes.author: Beth McColliste

quotes.quote: Women need a reason to have sex. Men just need a place.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.quote: Sex is emotion in motion.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Fast sex, like fast food, is cheap, but it doesn't nourish the body â€“ or the soul.
quotes.author: Suzanne Fields

quotes.quote: Physics is like sex: sure, it may give some practical results,but that's not why we do it.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.quote: Is sex dirty? Only if it's done right.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: If two people loved, they slept together; it was a mathematical formula, tested and proved by human experience.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Among men, sex sometimes results in intimacy; among women, intimacy sometimes results in sex.
quotes.author: Barbara Cartland

quotes.quote: Sex is like washing your faceâ€”just something you do because you have to. Sex without love is absolutely ridiculous. Sex follows love, it never precedes it.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Sex is funny and love is serious.
quotes.author: Stephan Jenkins

quotes.quote: Sex is not sinful, but sin has perverted it.
quotes.author: Walter Lang

quotes.quote: Some things are better than sex, and some are worse, but there's nothing exactly like it.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Anybody who believes that the way to a man's heart is through his stomach flunked geography.
quotes.author: Robert Byrne

quotes.quote: The price of shallow sex may be a corresponding loss of capacity for deep love.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: The main thing to remember is that making love is at once the silliest and the most sacred act humans can perform.
quotes.author: Patricia Briggs

quotes.quote: Don't do it behind the garden gate. Love is blind but the neighbors ain't!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every time you have sex, you give away a little piece of your heart, and you give that away too many times and there's just nothing left and you've given away the most important part of yourself.
quotes.author: Daren Kagasoff

quotes.quote: Sex is like pizza, even if it's done bad, it's still good.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The worst sex I've ever had has always been great.
quotes.author: Vince McMahon

quotes.quote: Kids in back seats cause accidents, accidents in back seats cause kids.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sex divorced from love is the thief of personal dignity.
quotes.author: Caitlin Thomas

quotes.quote: The word love has by no means the same sense for both sexes, and this is one cause of the serious misunderstandings that divide them.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Let us stop pathologizing masculinity. Instead, let us appreciate the endless ways by which men and women are similar to one another, as well as the important ways in which the two sexes differ.
quotes.author: Gad Saad

quotes.quote: At a time when efforts are being made to eradicate discrimination between the sexes in the search for social equality and justice, the differences between the sexes are being rediscovered.
quotes.author: Carol Gilligan

quotes.quote: The differences between the two sexes is one of the important conditions upon which we have built the many varieties of human culture that give human beings dignity and stature.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: The sexes if we distinguish have only one purpose.To be one with each other.
quotes.author: sense n sensical

quotes.quote: The sexes in each species of being... are always true equivalents - equals but not identical.
quotes.author: Antoinette Brown Blackwell

quotes.quote: In the battle between the sexes, men and women will go practically to the end of the earth in illogical, irrational ways to give each other pain.
quotes.author: Karen DeCrow

quotes.quote: Nobody will ever win the battle of the sexes.There's too much fraternizing with the enemy.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: We are people, individuals comprising a variety of sexes, races, shifting sexualities and all the rest of it. Every convention that tries to reinforce this difference is a step back. Notions of gender pointlessly separate men from women, but also mothers from daughters and fathers from sons.
quotes.author: Robert Webb

quotes.quote: All women's issues are to some degree men's issues and all men's issues are to some degree women's issues because when either sex wins unilaterally both sexes lose.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: Equal rights for the sexes will be achieved only when mediocre women occupy high positions.
quotes.author: Francoise Giroud

quotes.quote: Human kind is made up of two sexes, women and men. Is it possible that a mass is improved by the improvement of only one part and the other part is ignored? Is it possible that if half of a mass is tied to earth with chains and the other half can soar into skies?
quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

quotes.quote: True equality of the sexes comes when a psychological unity of the masculine and feminine force's of one's own mind has been made.
quotes.author: Serena Jade

quotes.quote: It's a great shame that the world was organized with two sexes. It makes for a lot of trouble.
quotes.author: Margaret Ayer Barnes

quotes.quote: The point of the feminist movement wasn't simply to set our underwear on fire and muscle into small spaces in the male-dominated workplace, but to create a world where the contribution of both sexes was equally valued and no one's worth was judged on their take-home salary.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.quote: Women are never disarmed by compliments. Men always are. That is the difference between the sexes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Legal discrimination between the sexes is, in almost every instance, founded on outmoded views of society and the pre-scientific beliefs about psychology and physiology. It is time to sweep away these relics of the past and set further generations free of them.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: Numerically, half of our high-ranking government officials should be women, and half should be men. And yet the division between the sexes is highly disproportionate in favour of men.
quotes.author: Miriam Defensor-Santiago

quotes.quote: And we reduce almost all male-female problems by working on both the female and the male. And that usually means having both sexes take responsibility.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: This world belongs to all of us, and all sexes should be able to live in respect and harmony.
quotes.author: Michelle Yeoh

quotes.quote: We need everyone to be a feminist. Feminism is the fight for the equality of sexes, not for the domination of one sex over another.
quotes.author: Najat Vallaud-Belkacem

quotes.quote: I definitely agree with choices for women, but I do not agree with choices for women when they eliminate choices for men. Rather, I think that the sexes need to make choices that lead to the maximum amount of win-win for both sexes.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: We may add that it is not an act of justice but of foolish injustice to pretend the sexes are the same. Justice is exercised in respectfully providing for the due needs of each.
quotes.author: J. Budziszewski

quotes.quote: The battle of the sexes will never be won as long as we keep sleeping with the enemy.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: Women and men are divided by gender, made into the sexes as we know them, by the social requirements of heterosexuality, which institutionalizes male sexual dominance and female sexual submission.
quotes.author: Catharine MacKinnon

quotes.quote: Equality of sexes does not mean equality of occupations.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: That is the great distinction between the sexes. Men see objects, women see the relationships between objects.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: Let there be then no coercion established in society, and the common law of gravity prevailing, the sexes will fall into their proper places.
quotes.author: Judith Sargent Murray

quotes.quote: There will always be a battle between the sexes because men and women want different things. Men want women and women want men.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Genuine equality between the sexes can only be realized in the process of the socialist transformation of society as a whole.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Sexism and racism are parallel problems. You can compare them in some ways, but they're not at all the same. But they're both symptoms inside the white male power structure.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: The emotional, sexual, and psychological stereotyping of females begins when the doctor says: It's a girl.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: Sexism has never rendered women powerless. It has either suppressed their strength or exploited it.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Sexism is discounting the female experience of powerlessness; the new sexism is discounting the male experience of powerlessness.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: No woman is required to build the world by destroying herself.
quotes.author: Rabbi Sofer

quotes.quote: Sexism is the foundation on which all tyranny is built. Every social form of hierarchy and abuse is modeled on male-over-female domination.
quotes.author: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.quote: Sexism is a social disease.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Gender equality is more than a goal in itself. It is a precondition for meeting the challenge of reducing poverty, promoting sustainable development and building good governance.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: We have not the slightest. idea that women are made of such light material that the breath of any fool or knave may blow them on the rocks of ruin.
quotes.author: Jane Swisshelm

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as sexism against men. That's because sexism is prejudice + power. Men are the dominant gender with power in society.
quotes.author: Anita Sarkeesian

quotes.quote: Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: Human rights are women's rights, and women's rights are human rights.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Sexism is not inevitable. It's only about controlling reproduction and therefore controlling women.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: It may be a man's world, but men are easily controlled by women.
quotes.author: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.quote: Sexism isn't a woman's problem, it's a man's problem.
quotes.author: Jack Ryan

quotes.quote: Sexism goes so deep that at first it's hard to see; you think it's just reality.
quotes.author: Alix Kates Shulman

quotes.quote: Women have been taught that, for us, the earth is flat, and that if we venture out, we will fall off the edge.
quotes.author: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.quote: A gender-equal society would be one where the word gender does not exist: where everyone can be themselves.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: There is more sexism in a year's worth of movies than actually exists in a woman's entire lifetime.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: You can't beat women anyhow and that if you are wise or dislike trouble and uproar you don't even try to.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Protesting against sexism doesn't mean saying that all men are actively sexist.
quotes.author: Laura Bates

quotes.quote: The rules of sexism do not free men from the terror of violence; they only keep men from complaining about it.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Women's liberation is the liberation of the feminine in the man and the masculine in the woman.
quotes.author: Corita Kent

quotes.quote: Most men fear getting laughed at or humiliated by a romantic prospect while most women fear rape and death.
quotes.author: Gavin de Becker

quotes.quote: You don't have to be anti-man to be pro-woman.
quotes.author: Jane Galvin Lewis

quotes.quote: Nobody will ever win the battle of the sexes. There is too much fraternizing with the enemy.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: Racism, sexism, drug and alcohol abuse, mental illness, unemployment homelessness encompasses pretty much every social problem.
quotes.author: Jena Desai

quotes.quote: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Every time we liberate a woman, we liberate a man.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Sexuality and gender don't change anyone's performance on the court.
quotes.author: Sheryl Swoopes

quotes.quote: Sexualization is the performance of sexuality, the performance of sexiness. Girls are super good at that now.
quotes.author: Peggy Orenstein

quotes.quote: Sexuality throws no light upon love, but only through love can we learn to understand sexuality.
quotes.author: Eugen Rosenstock-Huessy

quotes.quote: Sexuality is, of course, a great way of having a conversation between people.
quotes.author: Tilda Swinton

quotes.quote: Sexuality is the lyricism of the masses.
quotes.author: Charles Pierre Baudelaire

quotes.quote: A person's sexuality is so much more than one word gay. No one refers to anyone as just hetero because that doesn't say anything. Sexual identity is broader than a label.
quotes.author: Gus Van Sant

quotes.quote: Sexuality itself means mortality - equally for both man and woman.
quotes.author: Leon Kass

quotes.quote: Sexuality is who you are personally attracted to. But gender identity is who you are in your soul.
quotes.author: Caitlyn Jenner

quotes.quote: All men are homosexual, some turn straight. It must be very odd to be a straight man because your sexuality is hopelessly defensive. It's like an ideal of racial purity.
quotes.author: Derek Jarman

quotes.quote: Sexuality should not be seen as dualistic all good or all bad but as a good part of our created nature that is constantly in need of repair.
quotes.author: David Kinnaman

quotes.quote: Sexuality is one of the biggest parts of who we are.
quotes.author: Carla Gugino

quotes.quote: In matters of sexuality we are at present, every one of us, ill or well, nothing but hypocrites.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Sexuality is not a leisure or part-time activity. It is a way of being.
quotes.author: Alexander Lowen

quotes.quote: Sexuality is a private matter; some believe that broadcasting it destroys the very things that make it sacred.
quotes.author: Lance Loud

quotes.quote: Sexuality is not meant to be this way an honest, consensual expression in which a girl might take an active role when she feels good and ready and not one minute before. No. Sexual desire is meant to sell soap. And cars. And beer. And religion.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: There is no sexuality that is greater or lesser than another.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guy

quotes.quote: Sexuality is one of the ways that we become enlightened, actually, because it leads us to self-knowledge.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Sexuality is such a small part of the make-up of someone; it's not who they are.
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.quote: If sexuality means saying yes to life, then you should be able to remain sexual until the day you die.
quotes.author: Susan Sarandon

quotes.quote: A sexuality does not make our lives any worse or any better, we just face a different set of challenges than most sexual people.
quotes.author: Mallory Ortberg

quotes.quote: Love between women is seen as a paradigm of love between equals, and that is perhaps its greatest attraction.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Janeway

quotes.quote: Sexuality is the key to the problem of the psychoneuroses and of the neuroses in general. No one who disdains the key will ever be able to unlock the door.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Sexuality is a big issue, but there are others - how much you commit to a relationship, to social obligation, to honesty and being honest with yourself.
quotes.author: Ang Lee

quotes.quote: Sexuality is an expression of our spirituality. Sex makes you get real.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.quote: If sexuality is one dimension of our ability to live passionately in the world then in cutting off our sexual feelings we diminish our overall power to feel know and value deeply.
quotes.author: Judith Plaskow

quotes.quote: Sexuality is part of being a woman, it's part of what empowers us when we're smart enough to know how to use it.
quotes.author: Halle Berry

quotes.quote: Sexuality shouldn't define anyone. It doesn't define me. Love should be at the core of what you do.
quotes.author: Jessie J

quotes.quote: Sexuality poorly repressed unsettles some families; well repressed, it unsettles the whole world.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: In a sense, sexuality is the built-in psychedelic experience that only a very few people manage to evade.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Sexuality has always been for humans a form of communication, a way we express love and caring and bonding, not only a way we have children if we choose to.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Confidence is the sexiest thing a woman can have. It's much sexier than any body part.
quotes.author: Aimee Mullins

quotes.quote: Elegance and smartness is the sexiest thing woman can have, not just the flesh.
quotes.author: Baris Gencel

quotes.quote: Sexiness is all about your personality, being genuine and confident, and being a good person.
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.quote: Power is sexy, not simply in its own right, but because it inspires self-confidence in its owner and a shiver of subservience on the part of those who approach it.
quotes.author: Barbara Amiel

quotes.quote: You can be fat and still be sexy. It all depends on how you feel about yourself.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Being sexy is something inside, and not everybody has it.
quotes.author: Lara Stone

quotes.quote: The sexiest thing in the entire world is being really smart. And being thoughtful. And being generous. Everything else is crap! I promise you! It's just crap that people try to sell to you to make you feel like less. So don't buy it. Be smart, be thoughtful, and be generous.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.quote: 'Sexy' doesn't have to come with the price tag of being dumb.
quotes.author: Pink

quotes.quote: Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind.
quotes.author: Amisha Patel

quotes.quote: Sex appeal is 50% what you've got and 50% what people think you've got.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: You can be covered and be very sexy. It's not what you show; it's what you have in mind, the way you cross your legs, the way you talk to people.
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: A great figure or physique is nice, but it's self-confidence that makes someone really sexy.
quotes.author: Vivica A. Fox

quotes.quote: Being sexy is something inside, and not everybody has it.
quotes.author: Lara Stone

quotes.quote: Sexy is kind of like an aura around someone.
quotes.author: Shane West

quotes.quote: Sexy is the attraction that is given as an encomium to women or men, or the capacity to attract the attention of the opposite sex because of their physical attributes.
quotes.author: Miriam Defensor-Santiago

quotes.quote: No matter what a woman looks like, if she's confident, she's sexy.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: Sexiness should not be overt. Something shapeless that drapes across your hip, hangs off the shoulder; something that cowls in the front, drapes low in the back, that's sexy.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: You don't have to be naked to be sexy.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Confidence is the sexiest attribute a woman can have. If you feel good, you'll look good.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fashion cannot make you sexy. Experience makes you sexy. Imagination makes people sexy. You have to train yourself, you have to study, and you have to live your life.
quotes.author: Yohji Yamamoto

quotes.quote: Being sexy is not about what's on show, it's all about suggestion, or insinuation. I'm interested in the way a garment hangs on a woman's body and the way it moves when she moves.
quotes.author: Francisco Costa

quotes.quote: Don't be scared to be intelligent. Knowledge is sexy and powerful.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Sexiness is about being an individual and having conviction about what that is.
quotes.author: Christina Hendricks

quotes.quote: Confidence is sexy!
quotes.author: Tracy Allen

quotes.quote: Intelligence is enormously sexy.
quotes.author: Frank Langella

quotes.quote: 'Sexy' is being independent, being confident and having fun.
quotes.author: Mollie King

quotes.quote: Nothing is sexier than confidence. Nothing.
quotes.author: Alan Walansky

quotes.quote: My idea of sexy is that less is more. The less you reveal the more people can wonder.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: Sexiness comes with maturity.
quotes.author: Andie MacDowell

quotes.quote: Eccentricity is what's sexy in people.
quotes.author: Rachel Weisz

quotes.quote: On Shabbat something happens to the world - the world becomes infinite again.
quotes.author: Shlomo Carlebach

quotes.quote: Shabbat is a day of rest, of mental scrutiny and of balance. Without it the workdays are insipid.
quotes.author: Hayim Nahman Bialik

quotes.quote: Make the Sabbath a delight by rendering service to others.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: In observing the Sabbath, one is both giving a gift to God and imitating Him.
quotes.author: Lauren F. Winner

quotes.quote: The gift of the Sabbath must be treasured. Blessed are you who honour this day.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: On the Sabbath- we are reminded that we are not human doings, but human beings.
quotes.author: Rob Bell

quotes.quote: Sabbath is not simply the pause that refreshes. It is the pause that transforms.
quotes.author: Walter Brueggemann

quotes.quote: Without a Sabbath, no worship; without worship, no religion; and without religion, no permanent freedom.
quotes.author: Charles Forbes Rene de Montalembert

quotes.quote: The Sabbath is the link between the paradise which has passed away and the paradise which is yet to come.
quotes.author: Andrew Wylie

quotes.quote: Sabbath is that uncluttered time and space in which we can distance ourselves from our own activities enough to see what God is doing.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: The Sabbath is not for the sake of the weekdays; the weekdays are for the sake of Sabbath. It is not an interlude but the climax of living.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: If you keep the Sabbath, you start to see creation not as somewhere to get away from your ordinary life, but a place to frame an attentiveness to your life.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: Sabbath observance invites us to stop. It invites us to rest. It asks us to notice that while we rest, the world continues without our help. It invites us to delight in the world's beauty and abundance.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The sabbath is God's special present to the working man, and one of its chief objects is to prolong his life, and preserve efficient his working tone. The savings bank of human existence is the weekly sabbath.
quotes.author: William Blaikie

quotes.quote: The Sabbath is not a day to feast our bodies, but to feed our souls.
quotes.author: Marie Josephine

quotes.quote: Anybody can observe the Sabbath, but making it holy surely takes the rest of the week.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Sabbath is the celebration of life beyond and outside productivity.
quotes.author: Walter Brueggemann

quotes.quote: Sabbath's golden rule: Cease from what is necessary. Embrace that which gives life.
quotes.author: Mark Buchanan

quotes.quote: Keeping the Sabbath day holy is much more than just physical rest. It involves spiritual renewal and worship.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: The [Jewish] Sabbath was not intended to be simply a desert of prohibitions, but rather an oasis for moral restoration and seemly pleasure-one was to eat, drink, even be merry.
quotes.author: Israel Shenker

quotes.quote: We make the Sabbath a delight when we teach the gospel to our children.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: The Sabbath provides a wonderful opportunity to strengthen family ties.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: The Sabbath is not simply a time to rest, to recuperate. We should look at our work from the outside, not just from within.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Sabbath rest is more than mere abstention from physical work; and, therefore, must include worship and Scripture-reading.
quotes.author: Joseph H. Hertz

quotes.quote: One is but a shade of the other.
quotes.author: Danielle Trussoni

quotes.quote: You make different colors by combining those colors that already exist.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: Sunglasses are like eye shadow. They make everything look younger and pretty.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: We all have these shades in our nature, it's a spectrum within all of us.
quotes.author: Johnny Flynn

quotes.quote: Manipulating shadows and tonality is like writing music or a poem.
quotes.author: Conrad Hall

quotes.quote: To ground a character in reality, you have to use shades of gray.
quotes.author: Brian Azzarello

quotes.quote: Metal shades only give directional lighting, which is great for a desk or work area, but not for ambient lighting. Fabric shades are much softer.
quotes.author: Emily Henderson

quotes.quote: Anyone can wear any color. The question is about finding the right shade. There is a momentary trend to dark colors because when the financials are not that great, people go for black, navy and grey.
quotes.author: Ozwald Boateng

quotes.quote: Were it not for shadows, there would be no beauty.
quotes.author: Junichiro Tanizaki

quotes.quote: To see in color is a delight for the eye but to see in black and white is a delight for the soul.
quotes.author: Andri Cauldwell

quotes.quote: Some colors reconcile themselves to one another, others just clash.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Different shades of life make the painting more beautiful.
quotes.author: Mike Dolan

quotes.quote: Shadows are in reality, when the sun is shining, the most conspicuous thing in a landscape, next to the highest lights.
quotes.author: Bayard Ruskin

quotes.quote: You don't simply want a shade that complements your lamp, but one that also improves upon it.
quotes.author: Elle Daniel

quotes.quote: There are certain shades of limelight that can wreck a girl's complexion.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Sunglasses are like eyeshadow, they make everything look younger and prettier.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: You must try to match your colors as nearly as you can to those you see before you, and you must study the effects of light and shade on nature's own hues and tints.
quotes.author: William Merritt Chase

quotes.quote: We are not afraid to be a bit different, to make shades that are bold.
quotes.author: Francois Nars

quotes.quote: Shadow is a colour as light is, but less brilliant; light and shadow are only the relation of two tones.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: The lights and shades, whose well-accorded strife gives all the strength and color of our life.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of the shadows, it only means there's a light nearby.
quotes.author: Amy Lee

quotes.quote: When all you can feel are the shadows, turn your face towards the sun.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: A lamp shade is often a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Elle Daniel

quotes.quote: All colors are the friends of their neighbors and the lovers of their opposites.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: We all have dark shadows in our self that come out every now and then.
quotes.author: Jessie Buckley

quotes.quote: Mere color, unspoiled by meaning, and unallied with definite form, can speak to the soul in a thousand different ways.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Pull down the shades on the windows of your soul, and gaze into your mind and watch the wisdom unfold.
quotes.author: Beanie Sigel

quotes.quote: Shadows cannot see themselves in the mirror of the sun.
quotes.author: Evita Peron

quotes.quote: Soon as the evening shades prevail, the moon takes up the wondrous tale, and nightly to the listening earth Repeats the story of her birth.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: There is a shade of red for every woman.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: It is only through shadows that one comes to know the light.
quotes.author: St. Catherine of Siena

quotes.quote: Most of the shadows of this life are caused by standing in one's own sunshine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Even the purest cast a black shadow.
quotes.author: Kaitlyn Jones

quotes.quote: The shadow that hidden, repressed, for the most part inferior and guilt - laden personality whose ultimate ramifications reach back into the realm of our annual ancestors.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: Unless you learn to face your own shadows, you will continue to see them in others, because the world outside you is only a reflection of the world inside you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you don't have any shadows you're not in the light.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Everyone carries a shadow, and the less it is embodied in the individual's conscious life, the blacker and denser it is.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: To confront a person with his shadow is to show him his own light.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The brightest flame casts the darkest shadow.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: We are linked by our shadows, not by our light.
quotes.author: Jun Mochizuki

quotes.quote: Everything that we see is a shadow cast by that which we do not see.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Light and shadow are opposite sides of the same coin. We can illuminate our paths or darken our way. It is a matter of choice.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: There is strong shadow where there is much light.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Befriend your shadow and life will be easier.
quotes.author: Robert Jabert

quotes.quote: I like my shadow; it reminds me that I exist.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is no light without shadow, just as there is no happiness without pain.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Somethings can only be seen in the shadows.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Character is like a tree and reputation like a shadow. The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Every light has its shadow, and every shadow hath a succeeding morning.
quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quotes.quote: We think not in words but in shadows of words.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Shadow owes its birth to light.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: To light a candle is to cast a shadow.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Shadow is a colour as light is, but less brilliant; light and shadow are only the relation of two tones.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Glory follows virtue as if it were its shadow.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: One can live in the shadow of an idea without grasping it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: The brighter the light, the deeper the shadow.
quotes.author: Jay Kristoff

quotes.quote: The heyday of woman's life is the shady side of fifty.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: Love of honor is a very shady sort of possession.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Locked up from mortal eye in shady leaves of destiny.
quotes.author: Richard Crashaw

quotes.quote: The economic game is not supposed to be rigged like some shady ring toss on a carnival midway.
quotes.author: Arriana Huffington

quotes.quote: Beautiful, delightful, noble, memorable, as is the world you and yours frequent, I yet am well content in my shady crevice.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: The Riviera isn't only a sunny place for shady people.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: It's easier to hide your light under a bushel than to keep your shady side dark.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Do not fear the shadowy places. You will never be the first one there. Another went ahead and down until He came out the other side.
quotes.author: N.D. Wilson

quotes.quote: A shady business never yields a sunny life.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: If you were a shadowy, anonymous figure, it made sense to pretend everything had gone according to some diabolical plan. Never mind if it hadn't.
quotes.author: Courtney Milan

quotes.quote: Beginnings are apt to be shadowy.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: Everywhere we see shadowy minds, cloudy brains! World needs more light of wisdom!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Once dishonesty is introduced, distrust becomes the hallmark of future dealings or associations.
quotes.author: Jon M. Huntsman Sr.

quotes.quote: The cave is a dark, shadowy place. It's a place that's very close and yet distant at the same time, and it's a place of revelation and isolation. Your form, your body, your writing is your confinement.
quotes.author: Gerald Stern

quotes.quote: There is no greater dishonesty than man effecting his own private gains at the expense of others.
quotes.author: Leonard Read

quotes.quote: A shady friend for torrid days Is easier to find than one of higher temperature for frigid hour of mind.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Shallow understanding from people of good will is more frustrating than absolute misunderstanding from people of ill will.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: It's a shallow life that doesn't give a person a few scars.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Our culture is all about shallow relationships. But that doesn't mean we should stop looking each other in the eye and having deep conversations.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: It is only shallow people who do not judge by appearances. The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible....
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Shallow understanding accompanies poor compassion; great understanding goes with great compassion
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: No one is shallow and vulgar forever; sooner or later the whole species likes to be profound.
quotes.author: Carol Bly

quotes.quote: To live only for some future goal is shallow. It's the sides of the mountain that sustain life, not the top.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I'm not happy all the time, and I wouldn't want to be because that would make me a shallow person. But I do try to find the good in everybody.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: I don't want people in China to have deep pockets but shallow minds.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: As a rule, I am very careful to be shallow and conventional where depth and originality are wasted.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Women on the whole are often not as shallow as men are. They can be, but they cut through things a little more easily than men do in terms of that superficial stuff.
quotes.author: Peter Dinklage

quotes.quote: When you meet a shallow person, you will see both his body and his soul! When you meet a deep person, you will see only his body! To see his soul, go down to the depths!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It is easy to identify a shallow person by the attention he gives to what will do him absolutely no good.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Don’t spend most of your time on the voices that don’t count. Tune out the shallow voices so that you will have more time to tune in the valuable ones.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: I would say our social relationships are relatively shallow. We are actually afraid to be intimate, with people - many people even with their wives and husbands.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: People who love only once in their lives are... Shallow people. What they call their loyalty, and their fidelity, I call either the lethargy of custom or their lack of imagination
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The mass of men lead lives of shallow happiness; the superior man exults in his gloom
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Loving a thing is shallow, only if you don't deeply appreciate its emotional value
quotes.author: Valerie Estelle Frankel

quotes.quote: It's hard to tell a shallow person that they should care more about the feelings of the awkward and the alienated
quotes.author: John Flansburgh

quotes.quote: You know you are shallow when all you can do is talk badly about others
quotes.author: miss Ga

quotes.quote: A person cannot grow up through happiness. Happiness makes a person shallow. It is only through suffering that we grow up, transform, and come to a better understanding of life.
quotes.author: Leslie T. Chang

quotes.quote: Shamanic healing is a journey. It involves stepping out of our habitual roles, our conventional scripts, and improvising a dancing path.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.quote: One of the things that's so striking about shamanism in the native context is the absence of mental illness.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Shamanism is a kind of universal spiritual practice with indigenous cultures around the world, and one important element of it is taking care of spirits.
quotes.author: Daniel Pinchbeck

quotes.quote: Any priest or shaman must be presumed guilty until proved innocent.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Shamanism is the oldest form of communicating and healing. It probably resides in all of us.
quotes.author: Amy Hardie

quotes.quote: Shamanism is essentially a living tradition of alchemy that is not seeking the stone but has found the stone.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Shamanism is about shape shifting. Shamanism is about doing phenomenology with a tool kit that works.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: A man without persistence will never make a good shaman or a good physician.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The true shaman, the true naturalist, works to reconnect conscious human life with Nature and Spirit through totems and ritual
quotes.author: Ted Andrews

quotes.quote: A shaman is someone who has a wound that will not heal. He sits by the side of the road with his open wound exposed.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: Shamanism is not a course, but a life journey.
quotes.author: Alberto Villoldo

quotes.quote: Life lived in the absence of the psychedelic experience that primordial shamanism is based on is life trivialized, life denied, life enslaved to the ego
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Shamanism is not a religion. It's a method. And when this method is practiced with humility, reverence and self-discipline, the shaman's path can become a way of life.
quotes.author: Hank Wesselman

quotes.quote: Humans are a part of creation and shamanism is our way of connecting with the whole.
quotes.author: Will Adcock

quotes.quote: The shaman is the figure at the beginning of human history that unites the doctor, the scientist and the artist into a single notion of care-giving and creativity.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Shaman is a spiritual shuttle between three realms of existence: Heaven, Mankind and Earth. He pierces through inter-dimensional veils in order to heal the parts and unite the whole.
quotes.author: Lada Ray

quotes.quote: The shaman is a self-realized person. She discovers the ways of Spirit through her inner awakening.
quotes.author: Alberto Villoldo

quotes.quote: Shamanism is a great metal and emotional adventure, one in which the patient as well as the shaman-healer are involved.
quotes.author: Michael Harner

quotes.quote: True shamans live in a world that is alive with what is to rationalist sight unseen, a world pulsing with intelligence.
quotes.author: Paula Gunn Allen

quotes.quote: Shamanism is a path of knowledge, not of faith, and that knowledge cannot come from me or anyone else in this reality. To acquire that knowledge, including the knowledge of the reality of the spirits, it is necessary to step through the shaman's doorway and acquire empirical evidence.
quotes.author: Michael Harner

quotes.quote: The shaman has access to a superhuman dimension and a superhuman condition, and by being able to do that he affirms the potential for transcendence in all people. He is an exemplar, if you will.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Remember that drumming opens portals to the spirit world, draws spirit in, and opens you up to receive it.
quotes.author: Michael Drake

quotes.quote: Becoming a shaman is a fate that can strike anyone. Even you.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley Robinson

quotes.quote: Man has not really vanquished Shamanism and its spooks till he possesses the strength to lay aside not only the belief in ghosts or in spirits, but also the belief in the spirit.
quotes.author: Max Stirner

quotes.quote: I become like a tuning fork to the information that is coming through me, in shamanism they call it being the hollow reed.
quotes.author: Tom Kenyon

quotes.quote: Consciousness is naturally shamanic.
quotes.author: Joy Manne

quotes.quote: Every time a shaman dies, it is as if a library burned down.
quotes.author: Mark Plotkin

quotes.quote: It's been important to cultures throughout history with the court jester and the witch doctor and the shaman - all preach the same thing.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: The knowledge of the realm of death makes it possible for the shaman to move freely back and forth and mediate these journeys for other people.
quotes.author: Stanislav Grof

quotes.quote: For shamans the world over, illness has always been seen as a spiritual predicament: a loss of soul or a diminishment of essential spiritual energy. If the soul totally vacates the patient, the patient will die. It follows that, if the shaman can retrieve the lost soul parts, the individual can be restored to harmony and well-being. This retrieval is done by the shaman in an altered state of consciousness.
quotes.author: Sandra Ingerman

quotes.quote: Shame is an ornament of the young; a disgrace of the old.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The shame that arises from praise which we do not deserve often makes us do things we should otherwise never have attempted.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Shame is like everything else; live with it for long enough and it becomes part of the furniture.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Where there is no shame, there is no honor.
quotes.author: Martin Opitz

quotes.quote: Shame is always easier to handle if you have someone to share it with.
quotes.author: Craig Thompson

quotes.quote: There is no shame in beginning again, for you get a chance to build bigger and better than before.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: Shame was an emotion he had abandoned years earlier. Addicts know no shame. You disgrace yourself so many times you become immune to it.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: You can't give up shame without giving up pride.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Shame should be reserved for the things we choose to do, not the circumstances that life puts on us.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.quote: Shame occurs when you haven't been able to get away with the who you want people to think you are.
quotes.author: Carl Whitaker

quotes.quote: There's no shame in admitting what you don't know. The only shame is pretending you know all the answers.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: If you are proud for bad reasons, shame waits around the corner.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Shame without repentance doesn't lose power when it is spoken, it only seeks approval.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Shame and guilt are noble emotions essential in the maintenance of civilized society, and vital for the development of some of the most refined and elegant qualities of human potential.
quotes.author: Willard Gaylen

quotes.quote: Shame is a soul eating emotion.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Being ignorant is not so much a shame, as being unwilling to learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Nothing more unqualified the man to act with prudence than a misfortune that is attended with shame and guilt.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: It is the false shame of fools to try to conceal wounds that have not healed.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: There's something liberating about not pretending. Dare to embarrass yourself. Risk.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Unlike guilt, which is the feeling of doing something wrong shame is the feeling of being something wrong.
quotes.author: Marilyn J. Sorensen

quotes.quote: Your shame hides in many places-in anger, blame, denial, workaholism, perfectionism, drinking, and anything else you compulsively engage in to make yourself feel better. But if you could just learn to be vulnerable for one second, and open up to the pain, you would find there's no place left for your shame to hide.
quotes.author: Adam Appleson

quotes.quote: Shame is an unhappy emotion invented by pietists in order to exploit the human race.
quotes.author: Blake Edwards

quotes.quote: Shame is not your friend. It depletes your power. Let go of shame and embrace your magnificence.
quotes.author: Judith Orloff

quotes.quote: Shame is the lie someone told you about yourself.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Nothing is truly infamous, but what is wicked; and therefore, shame can never disturb an innocent and virtuous mind.
quotes.author: William Sherlock

quotes.quote: Let us not be ashamed to speak what we shame not to think.
quotes.author: Michel Eyquem De Montaigne

quotes.quote: Shame may restrain what law does not prohibit.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Shame is the most powerful, master emotion. It's the fear that we're not good enough.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: The basis of shame is not some personal mistake of ours, but the ignominy, the humiliation we feel that we must be what we are without any choice in the matter, and that this humiliation is seen by everyone.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Never feel shame for trying and failing for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: You cannot disgrace a disgraceful man; you cannot make a shameless man feel ashamed; you cannot make a cockroach a cockroach, because it is already a cockroach!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It's outrageous to line your pockets off the misery of the poor; It's outrageous, the crimes some human beings must endure.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: There is a virtue in shamelessness.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.quote: The truth about injustice always sounds outrageous.
quotes.author: James Hal Cone

quotes.quote: Most of the humor comes from how outrageous the situations and circumstances are.
quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

quotes.quote: Person who is aimless, is actually a shameless.
quotes.author: Sandip Bagal

quotes.quote: We have always been shameless about stealing great ideas.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: There is something outrageous about such a huge body of evidence being put together, then being confirmed in all kinds of other scientific disciplines, particularly genetics, and having other people just sort of deny it for reasons that have nothing to do with truth.
quotes.author: Matthew Chapman

quotes.quote: It takes a strong person to apologize, to admit mistakes openly and to ask for forgiveness. It takes an even stronger person to take that failure, recognize the importance of that mistake and learn from it.
quotes.author: Rebekah Thornburg

quotes.quote: In a world where the outrageous has become the norm, stable organizations make no sense.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be shameless. Experiment. This is the only way to identify your true passion.
quotes.author: Vishwas Mudagal

quotes.quote: Outrageous behavior, also known as the lunatic fringe, is the seed bed of innovation and creativity.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.quote: Out of some little thing, too free a tongue can make an outrageous wrangle.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: To disregard what the world thinks of us is not only arrogant but utterly shameless.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: A perfect democracy is therefore the most shameless thing in the world.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Shameless is a rough show, and it's not for everyone, but it's also beautiful.
quotes.author: William H. Macy

quotes.quote: Shameless actually good since it gives a kind of freedom. We consider the old, functionless shame destructive. Today, if you have a strong sense of shame you also have a strong desire to overcome it. And that's when you can write.
quotes.author: Karl Ove Knausgard

quotes.quote: There is nothing more dread and more shameless than a woman who plans such deeds in her heart as the foul deed which she plotted when she contrived her husband's murder.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: The most outrageous thing we can do in this world is to accept what happens and fly with it.
quotes.author: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.quote: When a certain shameless fellow mockingly asked a pious old man what God had done before the creation of the world the latter aptly countered that he had been building hell for the curious.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Self-centered indulgence, pride and a lack of shame over sin are now emblems of the American lifestyle.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The most outrageous lies that can be invented will find believers if a person only tells them with all his might.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You cannot really shame a man who sincerely does not care what others think of him.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Your beliefs don't make you a better person your behavior does.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Such an egregious piece of special interest legislation, it is almost shameless.
quotes.author: Dennis Henigan

quotes.quote: Be outrageous, ridicule the fraidy cats, rejoice in all the oddities that freedom can produce.
quotes.author: Molly Ivins

quotes.quote: Every form of talent involves a certain shameless-ness.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Great things are only possible with outrageous requests.
quotes.author: Thea Alexander

quotes.quote: If outrageous imagination is the wine of madness, then come fill my cup.
quotes.author: Sheldon B. Kopp

quotes.quote: It is outrageous that is oppressing a powerless citizen in this way.
quotes.author: Joe Higgins

quotes.quote: Sharing is a much better way to communicate than proving.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: Sharing information with employees makes them feel invested.
quotes.author: Glen Mazzara

quotes.quote: Sharing is the most precious religious experience. Sharing is good.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The pleasure of all reading is doubled when one lives with another who shares the same books.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: They're sharing a drink they call loneliness But it's better than drinking alone.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: Once you find your positive vision, then share the victory of your loving attitudes with everyone.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Share your life with others. You will have a joyful life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your inspiration with others.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Share your knowledge. It is a way to achieve immortality.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The sharing of joy, whether physical, emotional, psychic, or intellectual, forms a bridge between the sharers which can be the basis for understanding much of what is not shared between them, and lessens the threat of their difference.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: By sharing we stand prepared to build relationships and give wings to humanity.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: Sharing an idea you care about is a generous way to change your world for the better.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: If people truly cared and shared equally the world would have no poverty at all.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: Share your opinions with those who appreciate your views.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinher

quotes.quote: Sharing makes you bigger than you are. The more you pour out, the more life will be able to pour in.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Love has its own color, Share it with someone before it fades away.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Sharing knowledge is the most fundamental act of friendship. Because it is a way you can give something without loosing something.
quotes.author: Richard Stallman

quotes.quote: Sharing laughter is a way of casting delight to the wind so it blows everywhere and to everyone.
quotes.author: Paul Pearsall

quotes.quote: Sharing your life with someone will have much more meaning coming from a place of independence rather than co-dependence.
quotes.author: Gary Hopkins

quotes.quote: It's about sharing. You just give what you have to give wherever you go, and you let God handle the rest.
quotes.author: Lindsay Wagner

quotes.quote: Sharing a bit of yourself, opening a window into your own world, is a good place to begin.
quotes.author: Jeff Greenwald

quotes.quote: Infinitely more important than sharing one's material wealth is sharing the wealth of ourselves our time and energy, our passion and commitment, and, above all, our love.
quotes.author: William Simon

quotes.quote: Share everything. Don't take things that aren't yours. Put things back where you found them.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Pull up a chair. Take a taste. Come join us. Life is so endlessly delicious.
quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

quotes.quote: All who joy would win must share it. Happiness was born a Twin.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Sharing the little you have with those in need can turn around a life without you realizing it.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: Sharing a triumph with someone you love is an incredible high.
quotes.author: Cynthia Weil

quotes.quote: Listen, sharing my life with people is just part of my daily routine.
quotes.author: Rita Ora

quotes.quote: The time you shared today is the time you will remember tomorrow.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Sharing is sometimes more demanding than giving.
quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

quotes.quote: I think a relationship is like a shark. It has to constantly move forward or it dies.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Many people continue to think of sharks as man eating beasts. Sharks are enormously powerful and wild creatures, but you're more likely to be killed by your kitchen toaster than a shark!
quotes.author: Ted Danson

quotes.quote: The shark has its head to the west and tail to the east, very much the way the Indians would put a human in the ground.
quotes.author: Bob Carr

quotes.quote: We provoke a shark every time we enter the water where sharks happen to be, for we forget: The ocean is not our territory it's theirs.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.quote: Sharks are like dogs. They only bite when you touch their private parts.
quotes.author: Rob Schneider

quotes.quote: The shark is the apex predator in the sea. Sharks have molded evolution for 450 million years. All fish species that are prey to the sharks have had their behavior, their speed, their camouflage, their defense mechanisms molded by the shark.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: Interesting fact: a shark will only attack you if you're wet.
quotes.author: Sean Lock

quotes.quote: But as they say about sharks, it's not the ones you see that you have to worry about, it's the ones you don't see.
quotes.author: David Blaine

quotes.quote: Remove the predators, and the whole ecosystem begins to crash like a house of cards. As the sharks disappear, the predator prey balance dramatically shifts, and the health of our oceans declines.
quotes.author: Brian Skerry

quotes.quote: Sharks are being driven to extinction because people want to eat their fins and their flesh.
quotes.author: Barbara Block

quotes.quote: The only thing on the mind of a shark is to eat.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: Oh, the shark has pretty teeth, dear, And he shows them pearly white. Just a jackknife has Macheath, dear, And he keeps them out of sight.
quotes.author: Kurt Weill

quotes.quote: Somewhere in the ocean, a shark was missing its cold eyes because this man had them.
quotes.author: Steve Hamilton

quotes.quote: Sharks are among the most perfectly constructed creatures in nature. Some forms have survived for two hundred million years.
quotes.author: Eugenie Clark

quotes.quote: Sharks are beautiful animals, and if you're lucky enough to see lots of them, that means that you're in a healthy ocean. You should be afraid if you are in the ocean and don't see sharks.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: I am a shark, the ground is my ocean, and most people can't even swim.
quotes.author: Rickson Gracie

quotes.quote: There's nothing in the sea this fish would fear. Other fish run from bigger things. That's their instinct. But this fish doesn't run from anything. He doesn't fear.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.quote: Sharks aren't the monsters we make them out to be.
quotes.author: Yasmine Hamdi

quotes.quote: I think sharks are beautiful creatures, and I don't think we should stop going in the ocean because of them. You drive down the road and you get in an accident, but most people end up driving down the road again. Surfing is you're going into their home and it's just a natural part of life.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilto

quotes.quote: Sharks are the criminals of the sea. Dolphins are the outlaws.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Almost any shark, three or four feet long, could kill a human being if it chose to do it. It could make you bleed to death. But they don't.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.quote: Without sharks, you take away the apex predator of the ocean, and you destroy the entire food chain.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.quote: Sharks have been swimming the oceans unchallenged for thousands of years; chances are, the species that roams corporate waters will prove just as hardy.
quotes.author: Eric Gelman

quotes.quote: The shark heart slows down in the cold, just as our own heart would. But what sets it apart is where our heart would simply stop, the salmon shark keeps on ticking.
quotes.author: Barbara Block

quotes.quote: All sharks were born swimming.
quotes.author: Rebecca McNutt

quotes.quote: When the shark begins to emerge within your reflection, don’t be afraid, let it completely devour your big head, as you have also taught the beast to consume others. Fear not! You will no longer need it on your odyssey.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: Humans are a much greater threat to sharks than sharks are to humans.
quotes.author: Nicholas Boxer

quotes.quote: About the Shark, phlegmatical one,Pale sot of the Maldive sea. The sleek little pilot-fish, azure and slim, how alert in attendance be.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Sharks are naturally peaceful.
quotes.author: George Wing

quotes.quote: Sharks are intelligent creatures.
quotes.author: Ronnie Christensen

quotes.quote: Sharp are the arrows of a broken heart.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: The sharp thorn often produces delicate roses.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: A sharp tongue is the only edge tool that grows keener with constant use.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: A sharp spear needs no polish.
quotes.author: H. Rider Haggard

quotes.quote: Sharp is the kiss of the falcon's beak.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: A sharp knife cuts the quickest and hurts the least.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: The more sharp weapons people have in a country, the bigger the disorder will be.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: You have to have sharp elbows if you want to change something.
quotes.author: James Carville

quotes.quote: A sharp-tempered woman, or, for that matter, a man, Is easier to deal with than the clever type who holds her tongue.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: ... the greatest weapon against big stupid men was a sharp mind.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: To some an extremely sharp picture may be positively painful, for it will perhaps disturb and break the train of thought, whereas a less-defined one would allow the mind to wander at its own sweet will.
quotes.author: Francis Meadow Sutcliffe

quotes.quote: If you want to be a sharp thinker, be around sharp people.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The sharp employ the sharp.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: Keep a sharp eye on your journey to self-leadership and make it a point not to stop before you achieve your milestones.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: You will never know how sharp a sword is unless it's drawn from its sheath.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There is a sharp distinction between what is remembered, what is told and what is true.
quotes.author: Kevin Powers

quotes.quote: The only way to stay sharp is to do live shows. There is no part-time comedy.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.quote: The sharpest criticism often goes hand in hand with the deepest idealism and love of country.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Anyone with gumption and a sharp mind will take the measure of two things: what's said and what's done.
quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

quotes.quote: A sharp sense of the ironic can be the equivalent of the faith that moves mountains. Far more quicky than reason or logic, irony can penetrate rage and puncture self-pity.
quotes.author: Moss Hart

quotes.quote: There isn't a sharp line dividing humans from the rest of the animal kingdom. All the time, we find animals doing things that, in our arrogance, we thought were just human.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: The sharp experiences of belief in the supposititious life of matter, as well as our disappointments and ceaseless woes, turn us like tired children to the arms of divine Love.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Always stay sharp on railways and cruise ships for transit has a way of making everything clear.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: The beauty of being shattered is how the shards become our character and our marks of distinction.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: It shattered something inside me that hadn't been broken before.
quotes.author: E. Lockhart

quotes.quote: Upon your shattered ruins where This vine will flourish still, as rare, As fresh, as fragrant as of old. Love will not crumble.
quotes.author: Eleanor Farjeon

quotes.quote: When it seems that someone has shattered your dreams....pick up even the smallest of pieces and use them to build bigger and better dreams.
quotes.author: Jeremy Irons

quotes.quote: When your heart is shattered into a million pieces, all you can do is try to keep holding on. You breathe. You try to fall asleep. You try to not think about him.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: It's what's buried deep inside that frightens me because it's broken, like a shattered mirror.
quotes.author: Jessica Sorensen

quotes.quote: Shattered people are best represented by bits and pieces.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: But those with shattered souls find it very difficult to speak.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Smart

quotes.quote: Shattered legs may heal in time, but some betrayals fester and poison the soul.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: A shattered illusion is a sorrowful experience; but a life without illusion is a sorrowful life.
quotes.author: José Narosky

quotes.quote: You can be broken into a dozen shattered pieces and still heal the world because service has its own medicine--hope.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Your heart will be shattered by sorrow if you force it to live in tomorrow's ephemeral imagination - world instead of in today's eternal reality - now.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: The eye, like a shattered mirror, multiplies the images of sorrow.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The only thing a boyfriend was good for was a shattered heart.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: There is always more surface to a shattered object than a whole.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: Every time he left, I shattered apart.
quotes.author: Rachel Higginson

quotes.quote: When your world has shattered, ain't nothing else matters. It ain't over, it's only love and that's all.
quotes.author: Bryan Adams

quotes.quote: When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It's like death.
quotes.author: Dennis Quaid

quotes.quote: It can take years to mold a dream. It takes only a fraction of a second for it to be shattered.
quotes.author: Mary E. Pearson

quotes.quote: Shaving your head is acceptable. It's when you start wearing toupees and brushing your hair over that things go wrong.
quotes.author: Moby

quotes.quote: Experience has taught me, when I am shaving of a morning, to keep watch over my thoughts, because, if a line of poetry strays into my memory, my skin bristles so that the razor ceases to act.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: Shaving may help you look good but shaving your ego may help you look even better.
quotes.author: Sonal Vohra

quotes.quote: Upon shaving off one's beard. The scissors cut the long-grown hair; the razor scrapes the remnant fuzz. Small-jawed, weak-chinned, bug-eyed, I stare at the forgotten boy I was.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Shaving is a way to start the workday by ritually not cutting your throat when you’ve the chance.
quotes.author: Ben Lerner

quotes.quote: If it's a pain in the ass, you're shaving the wrong place.
quotes.author: Kerry Jackson

quotes.quote: The punishment of shaving a woman's head had biblical origins. In Europe, the practice dated back to the Dark Ages with the Visigoths.
quotes.author: Antony Beevor

quotes.quote: One should refrain from contempt for the baser specimens of humanity, for whom liberation amounts to shaving the heads of women who have slept with Germans.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Though it's a small price to pay, shaving my head has opened more doors than I ever thought possible.
quotes.author: Michael Rosenbaum

quotes.quote: Since I have dealt in suds, I could never discover more than two reasons for shaving; the one is to get a beard, the other is to get rid of one.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: I hate shaving. It's much easier to just do a little stubble, but my wife and daughter like it when I'm clean-shaven. If you see me with a clean face, then you know I'm in the kissing mode!
quotes.author: Patrick Dempsey

quotes.quote: The secret of a long marriage is shaving your legs every day . . because it shows you still care.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.quote: Now the Earth's face is lathered white with shaving soap. It's a long time till the razor once more makes its face smooth and fresh and green.
quotes.author: Gunvor Hofmo

quotes.quote: You know, I would date, if I could find a man worth shaving my legs for.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Winning is like shaving - you do it every day or you wind up looking like a bum.
quotes.author: Jack Kem

quotes.quote: Getting ideas is like shaving; if you don't do it every day, you're a bum.
quotes.author: Alexander Kroll

quotes.quote: I thoroughly believe that shaving is the best way of hair removal, as it's the most convenient and hassle free of all the methods.
quotes.author: Kriti Sanon

quotes.quote: The thing about breaking up when you get older, you just don't have the steam anymore. 'Oh, that's it. I can't start shaving my legs above the knee again.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: She is a rare soul, she has this infectious energy that makes you want to run next to her, she belonged to no one but herself & to anyone that was yet understand themselves, found the missing pieces in her presence.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
quotes.author: Nicole Lyons

quotes.quote: She was a mystery, personal in her journey but social in her seek; you wouldn't believe the depth in her heart until the day you felt her essence, for the very first time.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: She always had that about her, the sparkle in her eye, she was unshakeable and what made her so admirable was; her ability to shine bright when no one knew of her pain.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: She was chaos and beauty intertwined. A tornado of roses from divine.
quotes.author: Shakieb Orgunwall

quotes.quote:
Who is She? She is your power, your Feminine source. Big Mama. The Goddess. The Great Mystery. The web-weaver. The life force. The first time, the twentieth time you may not recognize her. Or pretend not to hear. As she fills your body with ripples of terror and delight.
But when she calls you will know you’ve been called. Then it is up to you to decide if you will answer.
quotes.author: Lucy H. Pearce

quotes.quote: She was an abandoned paradise. Wrecked and scary. The silence she held around her pierced even the darkest nights and the toughest hearts. But the moment you entered inside, she was utterly beautiful. She had the stars hanging from the roof with her dreams spilt all over the floor. The realms she ruled had no boundaries and walking through her was always bliss.
quotes.author: Akshay Vasu

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: She had the kind of eyes that predisposed you to supporting her every endeavor.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Though she be but little, she is fierce.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: She’s not a girl. She’s been through hurricanes of emotions, she fought the armies of fears, she passed the trickiest life’s trials. She matured like wine through humid darkness, cold and time. She came out fizzy and sweet.
quotes.author: Tatsiana

quotes.quote: She loves relentlessly. It’s the way of her being. She is love and it’s her mightiest strength.
quotes.author: Tatsiana

quotes.quote: She is dream of tears of stone of dark meroë water lapping at the centre of the world…
quotes.author: Kamau Brathwaite

quotes.quote: She is a rarer creature than you dare to dream. She is a myth, a memory, a will-o’-the-wish.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: She’s as light as any fairy; she’s as pretty as a peach; She’s mistress of the witchcraft to beguile; There’s sunshine in her manner, there is music in her speech, And there’s concentrated honey in her smile.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: And one day she discovered that she was fierce, and strong, and full of fire, and that not even she could hold herself back because her passion burned brighter than her fears.
quotes.author: Mark Anthony

quotes.quote: She wore her scars as her best attire. A stunning dress made of hellfire.
quotes.author: Daniel Saint

quotes.quote: She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: When she laughs the world stops for a while...
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: She was his favorite sin. She was not a habit for him anymore, she was an obsession.
quotes.author: Akshay Vasu

quotes.quote: A really strong woman accepts the war she went through and is ennobled by her scars.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.quote: She is clothed in strength and dignity, and she laughs without fear of the future.
quotes.author: Proverbs 31:25

quotes.quote: She’s a simple woman, made to look complicated by a man who isn’t man enough to provide the things she deserves.
quotes.author: R.H. Sin

quotes.quote: There’s fire in her. If loved correctly she will warm your entire home. If abused she will burn it down.
quotes.author: Anonymous
