quotes.quote: She’s badass with a good heart, soft but strong. Unapologetic and honest. She’s the type of women you go to war beside, the type of woman you marry.
quotes.author: R.H. Sin

quotes.quote: Sheep, like people, are ungovernable when hungry.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: If the freedom of speech is taken away then dumb and silent we may be led, like sheep to the slaughter.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
quotes.author: Alexander The Great

quotes.quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kenny

quotes.quote: Ideas are easy. It's the execution of ideas that really separates the sheep from the goats.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton

quotes.quote: The shepherd always tries to persuade the sheep that their interests and his own are the same.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: It is madness for sheep to talk peace with a wolf.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: It is the duty of a good shepherd to shear his sheep, not to skin them.
quotes.author: Tiberius

quotes.quote: Rich people without wisdom and learning are but sheep with golden fleeces.
quotes.author: Solon

quotes.quote: A nation of sheep will beget a government of wolves.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: A lion doesn't concern itself with the opinion of sheep.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: Do exactly the opposite of what the sheep are doing in order to become the shepherd.
quotes.author: Marshall Sylver

quotes.quote: If a wolf attacks his sheep, the shepard kills the wolf, but he eats the sheep when he's hungry.
quotes.author: Charlie Higson

quotes.quote: Freedom for the wolves has often meant death to the sheep.
quotes.author: Isaiah Berlin

quotes.quote: Only a sheep with lion's heart can attack wolf, not the sheep with lion's teeth or with lion's claw.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Make yourself sheep and the wolves will eat you.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It never troubles the wolf how many the sheep may be.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: The race of man, while sheep in credulity, are wolves for conformity.
quotes.author: Carl Van Doren

quotes.quote: The shepherd drives the wolf from the sheep's throat, for which the sheep thanks the shepherd as his liberator, while the wolf denounces him for the same act as the destroyer of liberty
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: No sheep wants to be first through the gate, but every sheep will be second.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: Men are like sheep, of which a flock is more easily driven than a single one.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: To create man was a quaint and original idea, but to add the sheep was tautology.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The vain should be wise, for a giant is sometimes strangled by a fly, and there are times when towering giants stumble into pitfalls, and lions fear sheep.
quotes.author: Berechiah ben Natronai ha-Nakdan

quotes.quote: Like sheep that get lost nibbling away at the grass because they never look up, we often focus so much on ourselves and our problems that we get lost.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: Every man can tell how many goats or sheep he possesses, but not how many friends.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Blaming the wolf would not help the sheep much. The sheep must learn not to fall in the clutches of the wolf.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: In order to be a perfect member of a flock of sheep, one has to be, foremost, a sheep.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You are human, so stop acting as if though you are a sheep and start thinking for yourself.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Don't keep forever on the public road, going only where others have gone and following one after the other like a flock of sheep. Leave the beaten track occasionally and dive into the woods.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Inside each of us are memories, fantasies and desires for home - a shelter waiting to be built, a place of peace to be revisited.
quotes.author: Louisa Thomsen Brits

quotes.quote: Each evening, I ached for the shelter of my tent, for the smallest sense that something was shielding me from the entire rest of the world, keeping me safe not from danger, but from vastness itself. I loved the dim, clammy dark of my tent, the cozy familiarity of the way I arranged my few belongings all around me each night.
quotes.author: Cheryl Strayed

quotes.quote: A home is not a mere transient shelter: its essence lies in the personalities of the people who live in it.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: A home should be a stockade, a refuge from the flaming arrows of anxiety, tension and worry.
quotes.author: Wilfred Peterson

quotes.quote: People have been saying shelter, shelter, shelter but there is no point having a tent if you are cold and hungry inside.
quotes.author: David Orr

quotes.quote: Our houses are such unwieldy property that we are often imprisoned rather than housed in them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Everyone is in need of a shelter from the storm ,be the shelter, be kind.
quotes.author: Luffina Lourduraj

quotes.quote: A house is a home when it shelters the body and comforts the soul.
quotes.author: Phillip Moffitt

quotes.quote: Home wasn't a set house, or a single town on a map. It was wherever the people who loved you were, whenever you were together. Not a place, but a moment, and then another, building on each other like bricks to create a solid shelter that you take with you for your entire life, wherever you may go.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Home is a shelter from storms - all sorts of storms.
quotes.author: William Bennett

quotes.quote: Houses mean a creation, something new, a shelter freed from the idea of a cave.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.quote: Home is people. Not a place. If you go back there after the people are gone, then all you can see is what is not there any more.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: Your home is a physical and perhaps emotional comfort zone where you can heal and recover enough to address all your work problems the next morning.
quotes.author: Zak Khan

quotes.quote: If I were asked to name the chief benefit of the house, I should say: the house shelters day-dreaming, the house protects the dreamer, the house allows one to dream in peace.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: Home is any four walls that enclose the right person.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: A house means a family house, a place specially meant for putting children and men in so as to restrict their waywardness and distract them from the longing for adventure and escape they've had since time began.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Houses are built to live in, and not to look on: therefore let use be preferred before uniformity.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A comfortable house is a great source of happiness. It ranks immediately after health and a good conscience.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: A man's home may seem to be his castle on the outside; inside, it is more often his nursery.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.quote: All architecture is shelter, all great architecture is the design of space that contains, cuddles, exalts, or stimulates the persons in that space.
quotes.author: Philip Johnson

quotes.quote: Happy is the house that shelters a friend.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A house is more than just a shelter; that it is a way of improving your way of life.
quotes.author: William Krisel

quotes.quote: The purpose of architecture is to shelter and enhance man's life on earth and to fulfill his belief in the nobility of his existence.
quotes.author: Eero Saarinen

quotes.quote: A house is made of bricks and beams. A home is made of hopes and dreams.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A house is no home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as for the body.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Happy will that house be in which the relationships are formed from character.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It’s not about how big the house is. It’s how happy the home is.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It didn’t matter how big our house was; it mattered that there was love in it.
quotes.author: Peter Buffett

quotes.quote: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I don’t think that architecture is only about shelter, is only about a very simple enclosure. It should be able to excite you, to calm you, to make you think.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.quote: Go to any Shinto temple in Japan and you'll see it: a simple stand from which hang hundreds of wooden postcard-size plaques with a colorful image on one side and, on the other, densely scribbled Japanese characters in black felt-tip pen, pleas to the gods for help or succor.
quotes.author: Hanya Yanagihara

quotes.quote: Shinto is still, in a manner of speaking, the soul of Japan, and even young Westernised Japanese who take no part in its manifold ritual, are conditioned, as their parents and grandparents were, by its fundamental characteristics.
quotes.author: Shinichi Nagai

quotes.quote: Shinto is essentially a religion of gratitude and love.
quotes.author: W.G. Aston

quotes.quote: Sincerity is the single virtue that binds divinity and man in one.
quotes.author: Shinto. Jingishoju

quotes.quote: Shinto is a way that is practised every morning and evening, in the acts of daily life, by every individual from the emperor to the common peopleâ€¦ there is nothing within human life that does not belong to Shinto.
quotes.author: Watarai Nobuyoshi

quotes.quote: The inside of a house or apartment after decluttering has much in common with a Shinto shrine... a place where there are no unnecessary things, and our thoughts become clear.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: Shinto lies at the root of the whole of Japanese culture.
quotes.author: Rene Grousset

quotes.quote: The heart of the person before you is a mirror. See there your own form.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Japanese mind is synonymous with Shinto mind.
quotes.author: William Gleason

quotes.quote: A mirror has a clean light that reflects everything as it is. It symbolizes the stainless mind of the kami, and at the same time is regarded as a sacred symbolic embodiment of the fidelity of the worshipper towards the kami.
quotes.author: Sokyo Ono

quotes.quote: The nature of Shinto speaks to our human natureâ€¦. Shinto speaks to us, to something in us which is deep and permanent.
quotes.author: Donald Richie

quotes.quote: To be fully alive is to have an aesthetic perception of life because a major part of the world's goodness lies in its often unspeakable beauty.
quotes.author: Yukitaka Yamamoto

quotes.quote: Even the wishes of a small ant reach heaven.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: For Shinto, at root, is a religion not of sermons but of awe: which is a sentiment that may or may not produce words, but in either case goes beyond them.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Retribution for good or ill is as sure as the shadow after substance.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Many Japanese weddings are performed in the Shinto tradition in which the ceremony is held in a Shinto shrine.
quotes.author: Deborah A. Levine

quotes.quote: Instead of reacting against Buddhism, Shinto raised its prestige by identifying itself more closely than ever with the interests of the central government, co-operating with Buddhism in that respect. The identity of the Sun-goddess with the Buddha Locana was formally proclaimed in connection with the foundation of Central cathedral.
quotes.author: Masaharu Anesaki

quotes.quote: In the past, Shinto has generally been translated as the 'Way of Gods.'
quotes.author: William P. Woodard

quotes.quote: Shinto, the indigenous faith of the Japanese people, is relatively unknown among the religions of the world.
quotes.author: Sokyo Ono

quotes.quote: Shinto is more than religious faith. It is an amalgam of attitudes, ideas, and ways of doing things that through two milleniums and more have become an integral part of the way of Japanese people.
quotes.author: Sokyo Ono

quotes.quote: The western understanding of Buddhism as atheistic explains the statement of a Sinhalese estate clerk that Buddhism is 'not a religion but a practice.'.
quotes.author: Richard F. Gombrich

quotes.quote: Buddhism differs from agnosticism in that it asserts an innate transcendental faculty in man in which by elimination of all elements of 'defilement' may contemplate Reality and attain perfect knowledge and enlightenment—Nirvana.
quotes.author: Christmas Humphreys

quotes.quote: It is Buddhism that has woken me up to my imperfections and given me the ability to chuckle at my needy little ego's constant attempt to find security and self-aggrandizement in an ever-shifting, largely indifferent world.
quotes.author: Jeff Wilson

quotes.quote: The meditation practice in Buddhism is all about training one's own mind.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.quote: Just study Buddhism. Don't follow the sentiments of the world.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: In Buddhism, there's no room even for righteous anger—as I sometimes have to remind myself.
quotes.author: Bodhipaksa

quotes.quote: One of the things that attracted me to explore Buddhism in the first place was its uncompromising nonviolence.
quotes.author: Bodhipaksa

quotes.quote: In China, Buddhism was rooted in scriptures and not in meditation.
quotes.author: Liu Liang Ji

quotes.quote: If there is any religion that could respond to the needs of modern science, it would be Buddhism.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is impossible to build one's own happiness on the unhappiness of others. This perspective is at the heart of Buddhist teachings.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: If you want to have clean ideas, change them as often as your shirt.
quotes.author: Francis Picabia

quotes.quote: You start out giving your hat, then you give your coat, then your shirt, then your skin and finally your soul.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Beware of the naked man who offers you his shirt.
quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quotes.quote: The loss of wealth is loss of dirt, as sages in all times assert; The happy man's without a shirt.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Wearing the same shirts doesn't make a team.
quotes.author: Clay Buchholz

quotes.quote: Mediocrity's like a spot on a shirt—it never comes off.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Anyone who has two shirts when someone has none is not a christian.
quotes.author: Lenny Bruce

quotes.quote: I find that a shirt is most similar to a napkin when I don't have a napkin.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: We need to be just before we are generous, as we need shirts before ruffles.
quotes.author: Sebastien Chamfort

quotes.quote: Put yourself in their shoes before you decide on the best way to take their shirts.
quotes.author: David Sklansky

quotes.quote: Surrealism is the magical surprise of finding a lion in a wardrobe, where you were 'sure' of finding shirts.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Fortunes made in no time are like shirts made in no time; it's ten to one if they hang long together.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: There are other measures of self-respect for a man, than the number of clean shirts he puts on every day.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The person who is waiting for something to turn up might start with their shirt sleeves.
quotes.author: Garth Henrichs

quotes.quote: Pride is the shirt of the soul, put on first and put off last.
quotes.author: George Swinnock

quotes.quote: To treat a poor wretch with a bottle of Burgundy, and fill his snuffbox, is like giving a pair of laced ruffles to a man that has never a shirt on his back.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: A habit is a shirt made of iron.
quotes.author: Czech Proverb

quotes.quote: A shirt's not just a shirt. It's the experience of what goes into that shirt.
quotes.author: Michael Bastian

quotes.quote: If you have two shirts in your closet, one belongs to you and the other to the man with no shirt.
quotes.author: St. Ambrose

quotes.quote: The laundry has its hands on my dirty shirts, sheets, towels and tablecloths, and who knows what tales they tell.
quotes.author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

quotes.quote: The man who rolls up his sleeves seldom loses his shirt.
quotes.author: Thomas Cowan

quotes.quote: If everyone gives one thread, the poor person will have a shirt.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: It always gives me a shiver when I see a cat seeing what I can't see.
quotes.author: Eleanor Farjeon

quotes.quote: A shiver runs down your spine when you realize it is not our imagination. Something is watching us out there.
quotes.author: Sophy Burnham

quotes.quote: It is folly to shiver over last year's snow.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: He is simply a shiver looking for a spine to run up
quotes.author: Paul Keating

quotes.quote: In the cold, shivering twilight, preceding the daybreak of civilization, the dominating emotion of man was fear.
quotes.author: Paul Harris

quotes.quote: To tremble before anticipated evils is to bemoan what thou hast never lost.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Find someone who will tremble for your touch, someone whose fingers are a poem.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: If you tremble with indignation at every injustice then you are a comrade of mine.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.quote: We tremble at the feelings we experience as our sense of wholeness is reorganized by what we see.
quotes.author: Emmet Gowin

quotes.quote: Though we tremble before uncertain futures may we meet illness, death and adversity with strength may we dance in the face of our fears.
quotes.author: Gloria Evangelina Anzaldúa

quotes.quote: One trembles to think of that mysterious thing in the soul, which seems to acknowledge no human jurisdiction, but in spite of the individual's own innocent self, will still dream horrid dreams, and mutter unmentionable thoughts.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just; that his justice cannot sleep forever.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: I tremble for my country when I hear of confidence expressed in me. I know too well my weakness, that our only hope is in God.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Does anyone ever shudder with the crap that you pulled off and didn't die?
quotes.author: Christopher Titus

quotes.quote: Not without a shudder may the human hand reach into the mysterious urn of destiny.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: The shudder of awe is humanity's highest faculty, Even though this world is forever altering its values.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Who would not shudder if he were given the choice of eternal death or life again as a child? Who would not choose to die?
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: I shudder to think of an eternity spend without books. I have hopes that every book that was ever lost is somewhere waiting for me when my life here finally ends.
quotes.author: Mel Odom

quotes.quote: I used to get a shiver if I thought about holding balloons, because I was scared of floating away.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: The universe shivers with wonder in the depths of the human.
quotes.author: Brian Swimme

quotes.quote: Whenever I'm making music I'm always waiting for the shivers to happen - that's an important thing for me.
quotes.author: Grimes

quotes.quote: she was just that shiver that makes you walk faster at night. You don't know why you do it, but some part of you remembers that the dark is never really empty. ~Anita
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: When innocence trembles, it condemns the judge.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The devil smiles when we make plans. He laughs when we get too busy. But he trembles when we pray-especially when we pray together.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Love is quivering happiness.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Beauty is terror. Whatever we call beautiful, we quiver before it.
quotes.author: Donna Tart

quotes.quote: The limbs will quiver and move after the soul is gone.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Wind moving through grass so that the grass quivers. This moves me with an emotion I don't even understand.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: Forcing yourself to shiver is one of the hardest things on your muscles and isometrics.
quotes.author: Daryl Hannah

quotes.quote: The shivering birds beneath the eaves have sheltered for the night.
quotes.author: Claude Mckay

quotes.quote: There is only one kind of shock worse than the totally unexpected: the expected for which one has refused to prepare.
quotes.author: Mary Renault

quotes.quote: Shock is a funny thing. Things get both sharp and fuzzy. Time stretches and distorts. Things come rushing into focus and seem larger than they are. Other things vanish to a single point.
quotes.author: Maureen Johnson

quotes.quote: Hope for the best, be prepared for the worse. Life is shocking, but you must never appear to be shocked. For no matter how bad it is it could be worse and no matter how good it is it could be better.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Nobody sets out to offend or shock for the sake of shocking. You set out to get laughs.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: Your spirit must be strong to survive a shock.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Don't worry, keep at it, you will soon shock the world”
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only way to make palatable that which is appalling and apprehensive is to season it with some humor.
quotes.author: Terrence Howard

quotes.quote: What is this life but the sound of an appalling love.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: There is nothing more shocking than to see assertion and approval dashing ahead of cognition and perception.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: You will be old-fashioned one day. It's more shocking than getting old.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.quote: The fact that people are shocked is the best proof that they need shocking.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: That's what art is, shocking people. Sometimes shocking yourself.
quotes.author: Willow Smith

quotes.quote: Every new truth begins in a shocking heresy.
quotes.author: Margaret Deland

quotes.quote: Every moment is a new and shocking transvaluation of all we have ever been.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: The waste of life occasioned by trying to do too many things at once is appalling.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: It's sometimes shocking to find out what people really believe in.
quotes.author: Tracey Ullman

quotes.quote: Being comfortable with the norm can make changes come as a shock.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: When two people unite, kindness must be mutual, or shocking things will happen.
quotes.author: Rosamond Lehmann

quotes.quote: A shoe is not only a design, but it's a part of your body language, the way you walk. The way you're going to move is quite dictated by your shoes.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: Shoes make an outfit. You can throw on a crazy shirt and crazy pants but you add those shoes - done.
quotes.author: Russell Westbrook

quotes.quote: You can never take too much care over the choice of your shoes. Too many women think that they are unimportant, but the real proof of an elegant woman is what is on her feet.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: Shoes must have very high heels and platforms to put women's beauty on a pedestal.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: Shoes are like friends, they can support you, or take you down
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Unshined shoes are the end of civilization.
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland

quotes.quote: Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: For women, shoes are the most important. Good shoes take you good places.
quotes.author: Seo Min Hyun

quotes.quote: Always wear expensive shoes. People notice.
quotes.author: Brian Koslow

quotes.quote: Shoes transform your body language and attitude. They lift you physically and emotionally.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: A woman with good shoes is never ugly.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: A shoe without sex appeal is as barren as a tree without leaves.
quotes.author: Rita De Acosta Lydig

quotes.quote: I can be naked as long as I'm wearing the right pair of shoes.
quotes.author: Anna Dello Russo

quotes.quote: A naked woman in heels is a beautiful thing. A naked man in shoes looks like a fool.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: Putting on fierce boots is an instant pick-me-up.
quotes.author: Nina Garcia

quotes.quote: You cannot put the same shoe on every foot.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Shoes are the quickest way for women to achieve instant metamorphosis.
quotes.author: Manolo Blahnik

quotes.quote: Shoes are the first adult machines we are given to master.
quotes.author: Nicholson Baker

quotes.quote: It's easier to put on a pair of shoes than to wrap the earth in leather.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: You want to fall in love with a shoe, go ahead. A shoe can't love you back, but, on the other hand, a shoe can't hurt you too deeply either. And there are so many nice-looking shoes.
quotes.author: Allan Sherman

quotes.quote: Shoes are the finishing touch on any outfit and it is important to complete a look with the perfect pair!
quotes.author: Tracy Reese

quotes.quote: I've always looked at shoes as being immensely beautiful things.
quotes.author: Graham Coxon

quotes.quote: Shoes are a big part of your look. I think that if your outfit isn't really something special, then fun footwear is a great way to jazz it up and make your ensemble more interesting.
quotes.author: Christian Siriano

quotes.quote: I don't know who invented high heels, but all women owe him a lot.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of a shoe.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Zanotti

quotes.quote: The right shoe can make everything different.
quotes.author: Jimmy Choo

quotes.quote: My shoes are special shoes for discerning feet.
quotes.author: Manolo Blahnik

quotes.quote: If the shoe fits it's too expensive.
quotes.author: Adrienne Gusoff

quotes.quote: You can wear anything as long as you put a nice pair of shoes with it.
quotes.author: Taylor Momsen

quotes.quote: What do women want? Shoes.
quotes.author: Mimi Pond

quotes.quote: Men go shopping just as men go out fishing or hunting, to see how large a fish may be caught with the smallest hook.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The odds of going to the store for a loaf of bread and coming out with only a loaf of bread are three billion to one.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Recreational shopping is the shortest distance between two points: you and broke.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.quote: Shopping is a woman thing. It's a contact sport like football. Women enjoy the scrimmage, the noisy crowds, the danger of being trampled to death, and the ecstasy of the purchase.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: A bargain is something you can't use at a price you can't resist.
quotes.author: Franklin Jones

quotes.quote: A bargain ain't a bargain unless it's something you need.
quotes.author: Sidney Carroll

quotes.quote: I rationalize shopping. I buy a dress because I need change for gum.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: I love vintage shopping, I think it's really fun. And I love the feeling of finding the most amazing piece for less.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.quote: I could lie and pretend that I hunt and camp, but that wouldn't be me. Clothes? Shopping? That's stuff I like!
quotes.author: Ryan Seacrest

quotes.quote: The quickest way to know a woman is to go shopping with her.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: I went to a general store but they wouldn't let me buy anything specific.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping.
quotes.author: Bo Derek

quotes.quote: I don't shop because I need something, I just shop for shopping's sake.
quotes.author: Cat Deeley

quotes.quote: Buy, buy, says the sign in the shop window; Why, why, says the junk in the yard.
quotes.author: Paul Mccartney

quotes.quote: Women usually love what they buy, yet hate two-thirds of what is in their closets.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: I've been shopping all my life and still have nothing to wear.
quotes.author: Sally Poplin

quotes.quote: I love shopping. There is a little bit of magic found in buying something new. It is instant gratification, a quick fix.
quotes.author: Rebecca Bloom

quotes.quote: I will go out of my way to avoid the shopping crowds and the extreme consumerism - I hate all that.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: It's time to shop high heels if your fiance kisses you on the forehead.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: I bought two items to get a third free, and then I returned the two. I should be Shopper of the Year.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: If men liked shopping, they'd call it research.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nelms

quotes.quote: On the one hand, shopping is dependable: You can do it alone, if you lose your heart to something that is wrong for you, you can return it; it's instant gratification and yet something you buy may well last for years.
quotes.author: Judith Krantz

quotes.quote: I always say shopping is cheaper than a psychiatrist.
quotes.author: Tammy Faye Bakker

quotes.quote: I like my money right where I can see it: hanging in my closet.
quotes.author: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.quote: It's crowded, which pleases me. Salesladies intimidate me, I don't like to be caught shopping.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: The secret idea she was forming of an afterlife gave her the foothold she needed to endure the agonies to come, a newfound courage and optimism which found instant expression through shopping.
quotes.author: Lucy Ellmann

quotes.quote: Shopping at any level is a bit of therapy for my medulla oblongata.
quotes.author: Theophilus London

quotes.quote: For some, shopping is an art; for others, it's a sport. It can be a vice and it can be a cause. Some love it. Some hate it. Rarely is someone indifferent.
quotes.author: Pamela Klaffke

quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: When I shop, the world gets better, and the world is better, but then it's not, and I need to do it again.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: Shared joys make a friend, not shared sufferings.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: A friendship that can end never really began.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Friendship happens when the distance between the hearts tends to zero.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.
quotes.author: Donna Roberts

quotes.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A true friend is not angry when you insult. Instead they think of more insulting words to you.
quotes.author: Sphencer Perales

quotes.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote:
A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world
walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: To like and dislike the same things, that is indeed true friendship.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Real friendship is shown in times of trouble; prosperity is full of friends.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Friendship consists in forgetting what one gives and remembering what one receives.
quotes.author: Alexander Dumas

quotes.quote:
Friendship is the golden thread that ties the heart of all the
world.
quotes.author: John Evelyn

quotes.quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: One of the things you can give and will not cost you any money = friendship.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Never take friendship for granted, you never know what tomorrow holds.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Friends are the family you choose.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: A friend is one of the nicest things you can have, and one of the best things you can be.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If you live to be 100, I hope I live to be 100 minus 1 day, so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, ‘What! You too? I thought I was the only one.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: David Tyson

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: There’s not a word yet for old friends who’ve just met.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: A single rose can be my garden… a single friend, my world.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says ‘I’m possible.’
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: You cannot tailor-make the situations in life but you can tailor-make the attitudes to fit those situations.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
quotes.author: Wilson Kanadi

quotes.quote: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: Let us read and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world.
quotes.author: Francois Voltaire

quotes.quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: We will either find a way, or make one.
quotes.author: Hannibal

quotes.quote: Man doesn’t know what he is capable of until he is asked.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: With our thoughts, we make the world.
quotes.author: Buddhist proverb

quotes.quote: Change your life today.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Don’t just follow your dreams—chase them down, grab hold, and don’t let go.
quotes.author: Kellie Elmore

quotes.quote: Short people: God only lets things grow until they're perfect. Some of us didn't take as long as others!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I was told I would never make it because I'm too short. Well, I'm still too short. It doesn't matter what your height is, it's what's in your heart.
quotes.author: Kirby Puckett

quotes.quote: Women short in height tend to be more ambitious, independent, feisty and achieve more financially.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: And though she be but little, she is fierce.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Short men are happy, for they can pass easily through the door. Tall men are happy, for they can stand erect and pluck oranges with their hands. Again, short men are angry, for they cannot stand erect and pluck oranges with their hands. Again, tall men are angry, for they cannot pass easily through the door.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: A dwarf standing on the shoulders of a giant may see farther than a giant himself.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: I'm not short,' Daisy muttered. 'Short women are never mysterious, or elegant, or pursued by handsome men. And they're always treated like children. I refuse to be short.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: What?! I'm not small! It's the world that's too big!!
quotes.author: Hiromu Arakawa

quotes.quote: Tall men come down to my height when I hit 'em in the body.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, It's the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future
quotes.author: J.R.R Tolkien

quotes.quote: I'm not short. I'm fun-sized!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My favorite part of my appearance is my height. I'm five foot one and I feel feminine being small.
quotes.author: Alanna Ubach

quotes.quote: Size, weight, height, looks, shouldn't matter. I'm tall, you're short, I'm willing to risk the teasing and weirdness to be with you.
quotes.author: Nessa

quotes.quote: If I'm not so large as you,You are not so small as I,And not half so spry.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Height doesn't mean a thing. Coach always says: Small and fast always beats fast and strong.
quotes.author: Mike Nardi

quotes.quote: You can measure height. But you can't measure heart.
quotes.author: Howie Dickenman

quotes.quote: God blessed me with a lot of heart and no height, and I'll take that any day.
quotes.author: Nate Robinson

quotes.quote: The best things come in small packages.
quotes.author: Amirah

quotes.quote: A person's a person, no matter how small.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: We short people have a great perspective on life; we are always looking up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The true way to be humble is not to stoop until you are smaller than yourself, but to stand at your real height against some higher nature that will show you what the real smallness of your greatness is.
quotes.author: Phillip Brooks

quotes.quote: Dynimate comes in small packages.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes, said Pooh, the smallest things take up the most room in your heart
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: I never wear flats. My shoes are so high that sometimes when I step out of them, people look around in confusion and ask, 'Where'd she go?' and I have to say, 'I'm down here.'
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.quote: Keep it up, wise guy. I'm always going to be taller than you once you're lying unconscious on the ground.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Sometimes all I want is to be a few inches taller so the world does not look like a dense collection of torsos.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Short people do not like to be picked up.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: It's funny how much of the miseries of this world are caused by short people –they are so much more quick-tempered and difficult to get on than the tall ones.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: Great people talk about ideas, average people talk about things, and small people talk about wine.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Travel around the world is amazing. New people. New-found family, really.
quotes.author: Dhani Jones

quotes.quote: The ideal is to feel at home anywhere, everywhere.
quotes.author: Geoff Dyer

quotes.quote: Traveling tends to magnify all human emotions.
quotes.author: Peter Hoeg

quotes.quote: Travel brings wisdom only to the wise. It renders the ignorant more ignorant than ever.
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie

quotes.quote: Whenever you go on a trip to visit foreign lands or distant places, remember that they are all someone's home and backyard.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Traveling is a fool's paradise. Our first journeys discover to us the indifference of places.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Traveling is like flirting with life. It's like saying, I would stay and love you, but I have to go; this is my station.
quotes.author: Lisa St. Aubin de Teran

quotes.quote: One of the great things about travel is you find out how many good, kind people there are.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: You lose sight of things and when you travel, everything balances out.
quotes.author: Daranna Gidel

quotes.quote: Travel is the frivolous part of serious lives, and the serious part of frivolous ones.
quotes.author: Anne Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.
quotes.author: Erol Ozan

quotes.quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: One recognizes one's course by discovering the paths that stray from it.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: See the world. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories. Ask for no guarantees, ask for no security.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: Travelling expands the mind rarely.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Traveling it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.
quotes.author: Ibn Battuta

quotes.quote: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Traveling outgrows its motives. It soon proves sufficient in itself. You think you are making a trip, but soon it is making you or unmaking you.
quotes.author: Nicolas Bouvier

quotes.quote: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: It is not the destination where you end up but the mishaps and memories you create along the way!
quotes.author: Penelope Riley

quotes.quote: Experience, travel these are as education in themselves
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Frank Borman

quotes.quote: It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Travel and change of place impart new vigor to the mind.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts to victory. We must commit ourselves to the slow, painstaking work of foreign policy day by day and year by year.
quotes.author: Richard Lugar

quotes.quote: Those that spend the most effort in search of shortcuts are often the most disappointed and the least successful.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: There are many shortcuts to failure, but there are no shortcuts to true success.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Yesterday's shortcuts are today's nightmares. The race is quicker when we're stricter. Keep your eyes on today, and declare what you may.
quotes.author: Mark O'Brien

quotes.quote: We all naturally want to become successful... we also want to take shortcuts. And it's easy to do so, but you can never take away the effort of hard work and discipline and sacrifice.
quotes.author: Apolo Ohno

quotes.quote: I've found that taking shortcuts will get you to the place you don't want to be much quicker than they get u to the place u want to be.
quotes.author: Lennox Lewis

quotes.quote: I think my secret is that there's no shortcuts for hard work, determination and having that don't give up attitude.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.quote: The one thing in life you can control is your effort. Are there any shortcuts in the beauty business? No. That was the first lesson I learned. You can't just rocket to the top.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Champions know there are no shortcuts to the top. They climb the mountain one step at a time. They have no use for helicopters!
quotes.author: Judi Adler

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts. I approached practices the same way I approached games. You can't turn it on and off like a faucet. I couldn't dog it during practice and then, when I needed that extra push late in the game, expect it to be there. Very few people get anywhere by taking shortcuts.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts to knowledge, especially knowledge gained from personal experience. Following conventional wisdom and relying on shortcuts can be worse than knowing nothing at all.
quotes.author: Ben Horowitz

quotes.quote: But shortcuts are dangerous; we cannot delude ourselves that our knowledge is further along than it actually is.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: The problem with making an extrinsic reward the only destination that matters is that some people will choose the quickest route there, even if it means taking the low road. Indeed, most of the scandals and misbehavior that have seemed endemic to modern life involve shortcuts.
quotes.author: Daniel Pink

quotes.quote: In life, most short cuts end up taking longer than taking the longer route.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Crying makes problems seem longer, and laughing makes problems seem shorter. Therefore in life if you cannot find a way out of your problems just take a short cut through them: that shortcut is laughter.
quotes.author: Moffat Machingura

quotes.quote: Success has no other shortcuts apart from the ones that tell you; control thoughts, delete negativity, alternate actions and shift attitudes to become positive! Click on passion, it opens a new window for you to sign in on time!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The shortcut way can save your time, but that deprives you of the sufficient knowledge and scoop.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: To be willing to succeed greatly in life, is to clearly understand that massive success comes with no shortcut.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: We learned about honesty and integrity - that the truth matters... that you don't take shortcuts or play by your own set of rules... and success doesn't count unless you earn it fair and square.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: I always tell people that this is a really simple deal: Work hard. If you work hard, follow what’s required and set your priorities right, then you can really perform without taking shortcuts. If you’re taking shortcuts, you can’t be free.
quotes.author: Eliud Kipchoge

quotes.quote: Give yourself permission to get the most out of your life. If you're spending all your time scrubbing corners with a toothbrush, you're kind of missing the point. Taking shortcuts doesn't mean shortcutting the end result.
quotes.author: Sandra Lee

quotes.quote: If it doesn't challenge you, it won't change you! There are no shortcuts to success, vision, hard work and determination to reach the top!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I learned the hard way that taking shortcuts and living for free is not really living free.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: Passion and persistence are what matter. Dreams are achievable and you can make your fantasy come true, but there are no shortcuts. Nothing happens without hard work.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: Be honest and work hard to get what you want. Don't take shortcuts; you only cheat yourself in the long run. Success is not measured by money or fame, but by how you feel about your own goals and accomplishments and the time and effort you put into them.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: Playing it safe and taking no risks is a shortcut to poverty.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.quote: If you spend too much time learning the 'tricks' of the trade, you may not learn the trade. There are no shortcuts. If you're working on finding a short cut, the easy way, you're not working hard enough on the fundamentals. You may get away with it for a spell, but there is no substitute for the basics. And the first basic is good, old fashioned hard work.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: We weren't trying to just go public and get rich. There was no near-term thing. It always was this many-decades thing where there were no shortcuts and we'd sort of put one foot in front of the other.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: To me it's not worth just a little shortcuts just to get ahead of someone else. I rather do it the right way.
quotes.author: Jennifer Kretak

quotes.quote: The belief that we can rely on shortcuts to happiness, joy, rapture, comfort, and ecstasy, rather than be entitled to these feelings by the exercise of personal strengths and virtues, leads to legions of people who, in the middle of great wealth, are starving spiritually.
quotes.author: Martin Seligman

quotes.quote: Show me someone who has done something worthwhile, and I'll show you someone who has overcome adversity.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: You cannot show people only the petals and not the thorns. It's not fair to them.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.quote: There's something which impels us to show our inner souls. The more courageous we are, the more we succeed in explaining what we know.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Show me a hero and I'll write you a tragedy.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Show me a good loser and I'll show you an idiot.
quotes.author: Leo Durocher

quotes.quote: Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Outside show is a poor substitute for inner worth.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Show me an elitist, and I'll show you a loser.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Those who show off do not shine.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: You show your worth by what you seek.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: To show that you truly care, you listen.
quotes.author: Adora Svitak

quotes.quote: A show of daring oft conceals great fear.
quotes.author: Lucan

quotes.quote: Show me a sane man and I will cure him for you.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Show the readers everything, tell them nothing.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Show a little faith, there's magic in the night.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Show more interest in their story than your own.
quotes.author: Johnny Hunt

quotes.quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back.
quotes.author: Vanilla Ice

quotes.quote: When you show deep empathy toward others, their defensive energy goes down, and positive energy replaces it. That's when you can get more creative in solving problems.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: When people show loyalty to you, you take care of those who are with you. It's how it goes with everything. If you have a small circle of friends, and one of those friends doesn't stay loyal to you, they don't stay your friend for very long.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: Show class, have pride, and display character. If you do, winning takes care of itself.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: Show people a positive path that enables them to make progress on their own terms. Give them options and alternatives that empower them.
quotes.author: Mark Goulston

quotes.quote: Show me a poorly uniformed troop and I'll show you a poorly uniformed leader.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Why not show off if you've got something to show?
quotes.author: January Jones

quotes.quote: I don't have to show anything to anyone. There is nothing to prove.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quote: Every show could be the last one.
quotes.author: GG Allin

quotes.quote: Show me a liar, and I'll show you a thief.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Show no love, cause love will get you killed.
quotes.author: Curtis Jackson

quotes.quote: Show true religion, cause words don't relieve
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: Show my head to the people. It is worth seeing.
quotes.author: Georges Danton

quotes.quote: Why not show off if you've got something to show?
quotes.author: January Jones

quotes.quote: Don't show off every day, or you'll stop surprising people. There must always be some novelty left over. The person who displays a little more of it each day keeps up expectations, and no one ever discovers the limits of his talent.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: You should encourage a child to show off. You can say to a child, 'Stop being rude,' 'Stop shouting,' 'Stop jumping around on the furniture.' But 'Stop showing off'? That's awful.
quotes.author: Charles Dance

quotes.quote: He (the Sage) does not show off, therefore he shines.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: If you do something too good, then, after a while, if you don't watch it, you start showing off. And then you're not as good any more.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: A kung fu man lives without being dependant on the opinions of others, and a master, unlike the beginner, holds himself in reserve. He is quiet and unassuming, with no desire to show off.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Power doesn't have to show off. Power is confident, self-assuring, self-starting and self-stopping, self-warming and self-justifying. When you have it, you know it.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Showing off is the fool's idea of glory.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: You know the bad thing about being a survivor... You keep having to get into difficult situations in order to show off your gift.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: Knowledge is like underwear. It is useful to have it, but not necessary to show it off.
quotes.author: Nicky Gumbel

quotes.quote: Vanity, showing off, is an attitude that reduces spirituality to a worldly thing, which is the worst sin that could be committed in the church.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The disease that knowledge brings is arrogance, and the disease that worship brings is showing off.
quotes.author: Ibn Taymiyyah

quotes.quote: He's a shy man. Life has taught him not to show off what is most precious to him.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: It is no use to keep private information which you can't show off.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Knowledge and ability were tools, not things to show off.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: The church is never a place to show off. Do your good deeds quietly. Serve; don't seek to be seen
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The better you feel about yourself, the less you feel the need to show off.
quotes.author: Robert Hand

quotes.quote: My mother helped me understand how not to show off what I knew, but how to use it so that others might benefit.
quotes.author: Dorothy Height

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be set to show me off as intelligent, the fool I always keep hidden takes over all that I say.”
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Don't pretend to be a great master and don't try to show off your strength.
quotes.author: Gichin Funakoshi

quotes.quote: The man that shows off, to that one who wants to convince of his value is to himself.
quotes.author: Domenico Cieri

quotes.quote: It takes guts to praise someone's nobility, instead of show off or self-praise.
quotes.author: Chetan Patel

quotes.quote: Let your personality speak louder than the show off.
quotes.author: Upasana Gupta

quotes.quote: There's no half-singing in the shower, you're either a rock star or an opera diva.
quotes.author: Josh Groban

quotes.quote: There were some sprinkles or light drizzle but nothing of importance.
quotes.author: Barry Goldsmith

quotes.quote: If the water doesnt evaporate, Your shower isn't hot enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sweat cleanses from the inside. It comes from places a shower will never reach.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: Taking 30 minutes to shower because you like to stand there, under the hot water, just thinking about life..
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What's more awkward than doing a shower scene? Rehearsing a shower scene.
quotes.author: Cobie Smulders

quotes.quote: Information gently but relentlessly drizzles down on us in an invisible, impalpable electric rain.
quotes.author: Hans Christian von Baeyer

quotes.quote: People who claim that they don't pee in the shower can't be trusted.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you take a shower in space, you have to press the water onto your body to clean yourself, and then you gotta vacuum it off.
quotes.author: Ace Frehley

quotes.quote: Love is like the rain. It comes in a drizzle sometimes. Then it starts pouring and if you're not careful it will drown you.
quotes.author: Edwidge Danticat

quotes.quote: Don't ever take a shower with a woman, because you'll probably end up proposing to her.
quotes.author: Scott Baio

quotes.quote: Everyone who's ever taken a shower has an idea. It's the person who gets out of the shower, dries off and does something about it that makes a difference.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote: Drizzle happiness wherever you go.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: A drainless shower of light is poesy: 'tis the supreme of power; Tis might half slumbering on its own right arm.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Such is our need to shower blame on some distant entity when it is we who lack the courage to face up to what is there before us.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: Taking a shower is awesome, it makes you feel nice and clean, makes you sound like a great singer, and helps you make all of life's decisions.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One cold shower in morning, is a great and unexpected from you.
quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.quote: Violent exercise is like a cold shower: you think it does you good because you feel better when you stop.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.quote: April showers bring may flowers. Also headaches to mother from kids indoors for hours.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A shower isn't the only place where if you make one wrong turn you find yourself in hot water .
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Shower the people you love with love .
quotes.author: Brian Hall

quotes.quote: God's hill and the places round about it receive showers of blessing in order that they may be made a blessing.
quotes.author: William Landels

quotes.quote: Tears are summer showers to the soul.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: Woman didn't get the short end of every stick. At least God gave us handheld massaging shower heads.
quotes.author: Rhann Morgan

quotes.quote: Should we grieve over a little misplaced charity, when an all knowing, all wise being showers down every day his benefits on the unthankful and undeserving.
quotes.author: Francis Atterbury

quotes.quote: To find someone who will love you for no reason, and to shower that person with reasons, that is the ultiate happiness.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, in the privacy of your own rain shower, is your own business.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: Just as you wouldn't leave the house without taking a shower, you shouldn't start the day without at least 10 minutes of sacred practice: prayer, meditation, inspirational reading.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: It is not light that we need, but fire; it is not the gentle shower, but thunder. We need the storm, the whirlwind, and the earthquake.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: God seeks to shower blessings on His people.
quotes.author: Psalm 144:15

quotes.quote: I wish I could shut up, but I can't, and I won't.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: If you have something to say then you want someone to pay attention or at least to have the opportunity for them to tell you to shut up and go away.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: I feel that if a person has problems communicating the very least he can do is to shut up.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: If you shut up truth, and bury it underground, it will but grow.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: I'm trying to shut up and let my angels speak to me and tell me what I'm supposed to do.
quotes.author: Patrick Swayze

quotes.quote: We need to stop telling each other to shut up. We need to get comfortable with the reality that no one is going to shut up.
quotes.author: Jon Lovett

quotes.quote: There is a time to speak and a time to listen, and sometimes people need to shut up.
quotes.author: David Hope

quotes.quote: I shut up and keep my ears and eyes open.
quotes.author: Kieran Culkin

quotes.quote: My best advice to you: Shut up.
quotes.author: Jim Calhoun

quotes.quote: If you can't keep quiet, shut up!
quotes.author: Gregory Ratoff

quotes.quote: Indeed, at times it's best to shut up.
quotes.author: Phillip Lopate

quotes.quote: I learned that you actually have more power when you shut up.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: You're playing or you're not playing. If you're playing, so just shut up and play.
quotes.author: Marat Safin

quotes.quote: Shut up. Just shut up. You had me at 'hello'.
quotes.author: Renee Zellweger

quotes.quote: Much talking is the cause of danger. Silence is the means of avoiding misfortune. The talkative parrot is shut up in a cage. Other birds, without speech, fly freely about.
quotes.author: Sakya Pandita

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: If you don't shut up, how can I answer your questions!
quotes.author: Lucero Isaac

quotes.quote: Shut up and say something.
quotes.author: Moe Howard

quotes.quote: Shut up, if you talking 'bout me I'm talking to you
quotes.author: R. Kelly

quotes.quote: Shut up and sleep with me come on, why don't you sleep with me?
quotes.author: Sin with Sebastian

quotes.quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: If you can't do, you'd best shut up about it.
quotes.author: Esther Forbes

quotes.quote: Whenever you're wrong, admit it; Whenever you're right, shut up.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: If you have any problems at all, don't hesitate to shut up.
quotes.author: Robert Mankoff

quotes.quote: If you shut up truth, and bury it underground, it will but grow.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: It's very important in life to know when to shut up. You should not be afraid of silence.
quotes.author: Alex Trebek

quotes.quote: Before you can make good music, you just have to shut up. Then the music can say what it has to say.
quotes.author: Kristin Hersh

quotes.quote: Smart is knowing if you're dumb. Knowing when to shut up and to listen to people that are smarter than you.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: Do not shut up the young people against their will in a pew, and force the children to ask them questions for an hour against their will.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Shut up and do not think. All the theorists agree: shut up and keep the words from being said. And all of the scars will remain invisible; and all of the scars will remain under the skin. Where they belong.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: I'm so shy now I wear sunglasses everywhere I go.
quotes.author: Al Pacino

quotes.quote: Nothing is as irritating to a shy man as a confident girl.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: There is a certain delightful sort of hope which the introvert can receive only by having company over...the hope that they will leave soon.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I have reason to be shy. I've been hurt plenty.
quotes.author: Ethel Waters

quotes.quote: A shy failure is nobler than an immodest success.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I've gotten better at not making people feel uncomfortable with my shyness.
quotes.author: Clea Duvall

quotes.quote: The shell must break before the bird can fly.
quotes.author: Tennyson

quotes.quote: Humility is so shy. If you begin talking about it, it leaves.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: Shyness has a strange element of narcissism, a belief that how we look, how we perform, is truly important to other people.
quotes.author: Andre Dubus

quotes.quote: When a shy person smiles, it's like the sun coming out.
quotes.author: Anita Diament

quotes.quote: My feelings are too loud for words and too shy for the world.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: There is nothing that makes us feel more lonely than our shyness.
quotes.author: Maduwa Livhuwani

quotes.quote: The introvert's anthem for not wanting to hang out is 'It's not you; it's me.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The shy man does have some slight revenge upon society for the torture it inflicts upon him.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: Timidity is the silent acceptance of bondage.
quotes.author: Constance Friday

quotes.quote: Everyone is shy it is the inborn modesty that makes us able to live in harmony with other creatures and our fellows. Achievement comes not by denying shyness but, occasionally, by setting it aside and letting pride and perspiration come first.
quotes.author: Kirkpatrick Sale

quotes.quote: Social taboos are shy like virtue; once lost, there is no remedy.
quotes.author: Gunnar Myrdal

quotes.quote: It is only through timidity that states are lost.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: One is always half mad when one is shy of people.
quotes.author: Robert Walser

quotes.quote: Shyness is just egotism out of its depth.
quotes.author: Penelope Kieth

quotes.quote: A shy face is better than a forward heart.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: There is safety in reserve, but no attraction. One cannot love a reserved person.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The way you overcome shyness is to become so wrapped up in something that you forget to be afraid.
quotes.author: Claudia Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: Maybe shy is when you're lonely and you don't think anybody can help you.
quotes.author: C.K. Williams

quotes.quote: I live in a shell, so I can't blame people when they don't want to crack me. But people like you are the reason I left the nest.
quotes.author: Maria Elena

quotes.quote: I felt suddenly shy. I was not used to shy. I was used to shame. Shyness is when you turn your head away from something you want. Shame is when you turn your head away from something you do not want.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Just because you don't say much doesn't mean people don't notice you. It's actually the quiet ones who often draw the most attention. There's this constant whirlwind of motion and sound all around, and then there's the quiet one, the eye of the storm.
quotes.author: Amy Efaw

quotes.quote: Introductions are hard to come by when your natural state is shyness.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: The flower that smells the sweetest is shy and lowly.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: One must not be shy where language is concerned.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.quote: There's no other love like the love for a brother. There's no other love like the love from a brother.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Sweet is the voice of a sister in the season of sorrow, and wise is the counsel of those who love us.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Whatever you do they will love you; even if they don't love you they are connected to you till you die. You can be boring and tedious with sisters, whereas you have to put on a good face with friends.
quotes.author: Deborah Moggach

quotes.quote: If you don't understand how a woman could both love her sister dearly and want to wring her neck at the same time, then you were probably an only child.
quotes.author: Linda Sunshine

quotes.quote: Sisterly love is, of all sentiments, the most abstract. Nature does not grant it any functions.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: Power, that's one thing, but love of family and of siblings is more important, is more powerful than any other power - at least earthly power, at least earthly power.
quotes.author: Sander Levin

quotes.quote: To have a loving relationship with a sister is not simply to have a buddy or a confident... it is to have a soulmate for life.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: If you have a brother or sister, tell them you love them every day-that's the most beautiful thing. I told my sister how much I loved her every day. That's the only reason I'm OK right now.
quotes.author: Amaury Nolasco

quotes.quote: Sisters and brothers are the truest, purest forms of love, family and friendship, knowing when to hold you and when to challenge you, but always being a part of you.
quotes.author: Carol Ann Albright Eastman

quotes.quote: He is my most beloved friend and my bitterest rival, my confidant and my betrayer, my sustainer and my dependent, and scariest of all, my equal.
quotes.author: Gregg Levoy

quotes.quote: I love you, you were there for me, you protected me, and most of all, you loved me. We'd fight, scream, and argue, but, under it all, is a love. That only exists, in a brother, and a sister.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A sister is someone,who loves you from the heart. No matter how much you argue, you cannot be drawn apart.
quotes.author: Shiv Sharma

quotes.quote: They love each other. They're brother and sister. It's one for all and all for one.
quotes.author: Joe Ziemba

quotes.quote: My sister accommodates me, never reproaches me with her doctrine, never tries to change me. She accepts and loves me, despite our differences.
quotes.author: Joy Harjo

quotes.quote: Being a big sister is to love your brother, even if he does not want it or love you in return.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I know my older sister loves me because she gives me all her old clothes and has to go out and buy new ones.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sibling love is crucially important and a failure to be loved by or to love peers and siblings can emotionally distort later relationships.
quotes.author: Klein

quotes.quote: Once a brother or a sister comes into your life, they will always be a part of your life from that moment on. They will bring joy into your life, they will make your life miserable, and they will give you someone to confide in, they will stab you in the back, but they will always love you.
quotes.author: Avidan Milevsky

quotes.quote: The sibling relations of girls have been reported to be more intimate and more supportive than the sibling relations of boys.
quotes.author: Buhrmester

quotes.quote: Within a family there is also sibling love which is the dedicated love between brothers and sisters. This love develops via the experience of growing up together and partaking in the ups and downs of daily family life.
quotes.author: John W. Newton

quotes.quote: When a sibling dies, it increases the surviving child's sense of vulnerability to death. His emotions run the gamut from being sad to being worried about who will care for him and watch over him to being pleased that he could be the center of attention now.
quotes.author: H. Norman DMin Wright

quotes.quote: In the midst of sibling rivalry, no one can touch the other sibling, because one would meet the other sibling's wrath.
quotes.author: Reece Phatudi

quotes.quote: Sisters are wonderful and sisters are terrible. Depending on the day, the mood, the weather, or the time of the day, a sister can be a companion, an adversary, an enemy, or a soulmate.
quotes.author: Bonnie Louis Kuchler

quotes.quote: A young lady's most natural ally is her sister.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: Our siblings...resemble us just enough to make all their differences confusing. We are cast in relation to them our whole lives long.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: But the influence brothers and sisters have on each other's lives goes far beyond their own interaction.
quotes.author: Karen Gail Lewis

quotes.quote: No matter how close or distant your relationship with your siblings is now, they are a part of who you are.
quotes.author: Karen Gail Lewis

quotes.quote: Being sisters means you always have back up.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: Is solace anywhere more comforting than that in the arms of a sister?
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: You can kid the world, but not your sister.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: To the outside world, we all grow old. But not to brothers and sisters. We know each other as we always were. We know each other's hearts. We share private family jokes. We remember family feuds and secrets, family griefs and joys. We live outside the touch of time
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: I don't believe an accident of birth makes people sisters or brothers. It makes them siblings, gives them mutuality of parentage. Sisterhood and brotherhood is a condition people have to work at.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Our siblings. They resemble us just enough to make all their differences confusing, and no matter what we choose to make of this, we are cast in relation to them our whole lives long.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters are as close as hands and feet.
quotes.author: Vietnamese Proverb

quotes.quote: Siblings are the people we practice on, the people who teach us about fairness and cooperation and kindness and caring - quite often the hard way.
quotes.author: Pamela Dugdale

quotes.quote: Siblings: children of the same parents, each of whom is perfectly normal until they get together.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: A sibling may be the keeper of one's identity, the only person with the keys to one's unfettered, more fundamental self.
quotes.author: Marian Sandmaier

quotes.quote: Our brothers and sisters are there with us from the dawn of our personal stories to the inevitable dusk.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: The Rule of Sibs: If your sibling gets something you want, you (1) try to take it; (2) break it; or (3) say it's no good.
quotes.author: Patricia Fleming

quotes.quote: Be nice to your siblings, they're your best link to your past and the most likely to stay with you in the future.
quotes.author: Baz Lurhmann

quotes.quote: Our siblings push buttons that cast us in roles we felt sure we had let go of long ago - the baby, the peacekeeper, the caretaker, the avoider...It doesn't seem to matter how much time has elapsed or how far we've traveled.
quotes.author: Jane Mersky Leder

quotes.quote: Sibling relationships...outlast marriages, survive the death of parents, resurface after quarrels that would sink any friendship. They flourish in a thousand incarnations of closeness and distance, warmth, loyalty and distrust.
quotes.author: Erica E. Goode

quotes.quote: They say that not matter how old you become, when you are with your siblings, you revert back to childhood.
quotes.author: Karen White

quotes.quote: Children of the same family, the same blood, with the same first associations and habits, have some means of enjoyment in their power, which no subsequent connections can supply
quotes.author: Jane Austen
