quotes.quote: Siblings are branches of a tree some stay close some go in different directions they fruit, grow bigger till they die and fall.
quotes.author: The Omani Shed

quotes.quote: I, who have no sisters or brothers, look with some degree of innocent envy on those who may be said to be born to friends.
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: As siblings we were inextricably bound, even though our connections were loose and frayed.... And each time we met, we discovered to our surprise and dismay how quickly the intensity of childhood feelings reappeared.... No matter how old we got or how often we tried to show another face, reality was filtered through yesterday's memories.
quotes.author: Jane Mersky Leder

quotes.quote: Born within five minutes of each other, alike as two peas in a pod, they had a connection beyond words.
quotes.author: Alex and Marcus Lewis

quotes.quote: Today we are adults, with adult lives. Yet, when the world seems so much more than I can handle, I long for the rainy days that imprisoned my brothers and me in our imaginations — those days when a glass of ‘super strong’ could make any of us conquer all that was in our way.
quotes.author: Michelle L. McCormick

quotes.quote: No matter how many years passed or how much responsibility each assumed, they still managed to bicker like bitchy teenagers on a regular basis. In some way, though, each found it comforting; it reminded them how close they really were: Acquaintances were always on their best behavior, but sisters loved each other enough to say anything.
quotes.author: Lauren Weisberger

quotes.quote: Siblings: your only enemy you can't live without.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Your siblings are the only people in the world who know what it's like to have been brought up the way you were.
quotes.author: Betsy Cohen

quotes.quote: A bond as important as that of a husband and wife, is the bond between siblings.
quotes.author: Lee Dong-Wook

quotes.quote: A sibling represents a person's past, present, and future.
quotes.author: John Corey Whaley

quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters can say things to one another that no one else can.
quotes.author: Gregory E. Lang

quotes.quote: Siblings-the definition that comprises love, strife, competition and forever friends.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Brother and sister, together as friends, ready to face whatever life sends. Joy and laughter or tears and strife, holding hands tightly as we dance through life.
quotes.author: Suzie Huitt

quotes.quote: Having lots of siblings is like having built-in best friends.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.quote: My siblings are my best friends.
quotes.author: America Ferrera

quotes.quote: The mildest, drowsiest sister has been known to turn tiger if her sibling is in trouble.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: Life should not be a journey to the grave with the intention of arriving safely in a pretty and well preserved body, but rather to skid in broadside in a cloud of smoke, thoroughly used up, totally worn out, and loudly proclaiming 'Wow! What a Ride!”
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: She was forever tilted sideways by the notion that pain was inevitable, chance was cruel, and all human ingenuity should go towards the making of a good cup of tea.
quotes.author: Colum Mccann

quotes.quote: The difference between a hero and a coward is one step sideways.
quotes.author: Gene Hackman

quotes.quote: Progression is going forwards. Going backwards is regression. Going sideways is just gression.
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.quote: There is no straight path from your seat today to where you are going. Don't try to draw that line. You will not just get it wrong, you'll miss big opportunities. And I mean big-like the Internet. Careers are not ladders, those days are long gone, but jungle gyms. Don't just move up and down, don't just look up, look backwards, sideways around corners. Your career and your life will have starts and stops and zigs and zags. Don't stress out about the white space-the path you can't draw- because there in lies both the surprises and the opportunities.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: In the age of networked everything, life moves sideways and covers lots of ground while barely touching the earth.
quotes.author: Walter Kirn

quotes.quote: Not every relationship is forever, but it's easy to forget that until your own happily-ever-after goes sideways.
quotes.author: Lauren Layne

quotes.quote: Change is non-linear and can go backwards, forwards and sideways.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: Try not to look sideways to see how others are viewing our lives but to look up to see how heavenly father sees us.
quotes.author: Carl B. Cook

quotes.quote: But things worked out. Everything works out. Though sometimes they work out sideways.
quotes.author: Knut Hamsun

quotes.quote: I may have no notion of what's in the beans for me now, with everything upside down and sideways. But one thing I know is that I belong in this moment.
quotes.author: Stacey Lee

quotes.quote: Sideways thinking is that way of approaching a problem from a new direction not evolving a solution from something that already exists and not looking down upon it and breaking it up into smaller parts but actually backing off, looking at in different than normal ways and thinking from the side.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: 'Sideways' thinking [is] the cross classifying habit of mind that comes from learning many different ways to look at things.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One of my rules is never to look sideways at what other people are doing but instead, do what I feel is right.
quotes.author: Annie Bryant

quotes.quote: Tread gently on anyone who looks at you sideways.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: The successful people seem to have blinders on. Everything is straight ahead. They go forward and know exactly what they're going to do once they've made up their mind to do it, and by God they don't look sideways.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: As a parent who raised his children in dysfunction, I know the parental wounds my children received were not intentional; often they were my best expression of love, sometimes coming out sideways, not as I intended.
quotes.author: David W. Earle

quotes.quote: Beginnings are sudden, but also insidious. They creep up on you sideways, they keep to the shadows, they lurk unrecognized. Then, later, they spring.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: The most important thing for old guys is never start going down the stairs sideways.
quotes.author: Dick Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Success.. is no longer a simple ascension of steps. You need to climb sideways and sometimes down, and sometimes you need to swing from the jungle gym and establish your own turf somewhere else on the playground.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: When you lose your parents, the sadness doesn't go away. It just changes. It hits you sideways sometimes instead of head-on. Like now.
quotes.author: Jude Watson

quotes.quote: Did you ever observe that immoderate laughter always ends in a sigh?
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: A sigh is an amplifier for people who suffer in silence.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Humour allows people to exhale a little.
quotes.author: Zach Anner

quotes.quote: Many persons sigh for death when it seems far off, but the inclination vanishes when the boat upsets, or the locomotive runs off the track, or the measles set it.
quotes.author: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quotes.quote: Sighs and silences and avoided conversations are just as important as the things you do talk about.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: Open your mouth wide a universal sigh.
quotes.author: Thom Yorke

quotes.quote: When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: There is a chord in every heart that has a sigh in it if touched aright.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.
quotes.author: Thomas Shadwell

quotes.quote: If you begin the day with a laugh, you may, nevertheless, end it with a sob and a sigh.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: A woman can say more in a sigh than a man can say in a sermon.
quotes.author: Arnold Haultain

quotes.quote: That sort of half sigh, which, accompanied by two or three slight nods of the head, is pity's small change in general society.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The drama of life begins with a wail and ends with a sigh.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: The human heart has a sigh lonelier than the cry of the bittern.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.quote: All the world knows how to cry but not all the world knows how to sigh. Sighing is extra.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: A sigh isn't just a sigh. We inhale the world and breathe out meaning. While we can. While we can.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Occasionally we sigh for an earlier day when we could just look at the stars without worrying whether they were theirs or ours.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Novels teach the youthful mind to sigh after happiness that never existed.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: We make too much of that long groan which underlines the past.
quotes.author: Derek Walcott

quotes.quote: A sigh can shatter a castle in the air.
quotes.author: William Rounseville Alger

quotes.quote: A laugh is the loud echo of a sigh; a sigh the faint echo of a laugh.
quotes.author: Sean O'Casey

quotes.quote: Life is like a story, when all the resolution is resolved, you heave a sigh of relief.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: There is no sadder sight than a young pessimist.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A man willing to work, and unable to find work, is perhaps the saddest sight that fortune's inequality exhibits under this sun.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The few wonders of the world only exist while there are those with the sight to see them.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: The greatest talents often lie buried out of sight.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Sight is something you take for granted until you think you might lose it.
quotes.author: Paul Coffey

quotes.quote: When a man is out of sight, it is not too long before he is out of mind.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: To examine oneself makes good use of sight.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Your goal should be out of reach but not out of sight.
quotes.author: Anita DeFrantz

quotes.quote: Set your sights on a place higher than your eyes can see.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Sight is about what lies right in front of us. Vision is what lies ahead.
quotes.author: Thomas Haden Church

quotes.quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: The man who views the world at 50 the same he did at 20 has wasted thirty years of his life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Those things that nature denied to human sight, she revealed to the eyes of the soul.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: As a rule, what is out of sight disturbs men's minds more seriously than what they see.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: It is a darned sight easier to find six men who can tell exactly how a thing ought to be did than to find one who will do it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Eyes of youth have sharp sight, but commonly not so deep as those of elder age.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.quote: The sight of a cage is only frightening to the bird that has once been caught.
quotes.author: Rachel Field

quotes.quote: When a nation goes down, or a society perishes, one condition may always be found; they forgot where they came from. They lost sight of what had brought them along.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: There is no better way to thank God for your sight than by giving a helping hand to someone in the dark.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: I don't ask for the sights in front of me to change, only the depth of my seeing.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: In time of difficulties, we must not lose sight of our achievements.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Failure is where success likes to hide in plain sight.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Never lose sight of the fact that the most important yardstick of your success will be how you treat other people - your family, friends, and coworkers, and even strangers you meet along the way.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: We may run, walk, stumble. drive, or fly, but let us never lose sight of the reason for the journey, or miss a chance to see a rainbow on the way.
quotes.author: Gloria Gaither

quotes.quote: Friendship is a word, the very sight of which in print makes the heart warm.
quotes.author: Augustine BIRRELL

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Charms strike the sight, but merit wins the soul.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Anger and jealousy can no more bear to lose sight of their objects than love.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Compassion and tolerance are not a sign of weakness, but a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Love, hope, fear, faith - these make humanity; These are its sign and note and character.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: The greatness of a man is measured by the way he treats the little man. Compassion for the weak is a sign of greatness.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: The tendency to whining and complaining may be taken as the surest sign symptom of little souls and inferior intellects.
quotes.author: Francis Jeffrey

quotes.quote: When two people decide to get a divorce, it isn't a sign that they "don't understand" one another, but a sign that they have, at last, begun to.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Racism is a sign of ignorance, in my opinion. It's people who haven't been anywhere, haven't seen the world.
quotes.author: Tyson Fury

quotes.quote: Numeracy isn't a sign of geekiness, but a basic requirement for intelligent discussions of public policy.
quotes.author: Nicholas Kristof

quotes.quote: The greatest sign of success for a teacher... is to be able to say, "The children are now working as if I did not exist.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Conservation may be a sign of personal virtue, but it is not a sufficient basis for a sound, comprehensive energy policy.
quotes.author: Dick Cheney

quotes.quote: There is no surer sign of decay in a country than to see the rites of religion held in contempt.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: When suffering comes, we yearn for some sign from God, forgetting we have just had one.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Frustration is a sign I am acting independently. The more you try your own way, the tighter the doors will stay closed.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: You can be stern and forthright, and that's my management style, but when you lose it totally, that's a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: Jon Huntsman, Jr.

quotes.quote: We must interpret a bad temper as a sign of inferiority.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: A great many people think that polysyllables are a sign of intelligence and refinement so they think they will impress others with their command of obscure words.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: Genius worship is the inevitable sign of an uncreative age.
quotes.author: Clive Bell

quotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Sanctions are a sign of irritation; they are not the instrument of serious policies.
quotes.author: Sergei Lavrov

quotes.quote: A dark cloud is no sign that the sun has lost his light; and dark black convictions are no arguments that God has laid aside His mercy.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Responsibilities are given to him on whom trust rests. Responsibility is always a sign of trust.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Factions are a sign of illness in a party.
quotes.author: Ernest Mandel

quotes.quote: Contradiction is not a sign of falsity, nor the lack of contradiction a sign of truth.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Errors of taste are very often the outward sign of a deep fault of sensibility.
quotes.author: Jonathan Miller

quotes.quote: Respect for another man's opinion is worthy. It is the realization that any opinion is valuable, for it is the sign of a rational being.
quotes.author: Sargent Shriver

quotes.quote: The triumph of persuasion over force is the sign of a civilized society.
quotes.author: Mark Skousen

quotes.quote: When a man fell into his anecdotage it was a sign for him to retire from the world.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: It is a sign of contraction of the mind when it is content, or of weariness. A spirited mind never stops within itself; it is always aspiring and going beyond its strength.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: It is the sign of a great mind to dislike greatness, and to prefer things in measure to things in excess.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: If a cluttered desk is a sign of a cluttered mind, of what, then, is an empty desk a sign?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Every thought you produce, anything you say, any action you do, it bears your signature.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: A signature always reveals a man's character - and sometimes even his name.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: You had only one chance for a signature in life, but most people left no impression.
quotes.author: Meg Wolitzer

quotes.quote: Every person has a signature. Just some people don't know it yet.
quotes.author: Rita Ora

quotes.quote: If you want to have a golden signature, create a good art!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The difference between a signature and an autograph is that the second one has higher face value on a plain paper than the first one even on a cheque.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: The signature of our eyes, in other words, the way we look never changes even at the age of hundred!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The signature of mediocrity is chronic inconsistency.
quotes.author: James C. Collins

quotes.quote: The signature of a truly enviable woman is the tenacity and continuity of her women friends.
quotes.author: Wendy Wasserstein

quotes.quote: We always search for the signature of God to prove His existence. And now I say unto you that Art is His very signature!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When you wear your signature scent, you feel something special from within.
quotes.author: Bianca Balti

quotes.quote: Smiling face of every little girl is the signature of God’s presence.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: One of the trademarks of a champion is that he can outlast you.
quotes.author: Lou Brock

quotes.quote: You don’t need a significant other to lead a significant life.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Connecting with someone is not necessarily a bond with a significant other, or even a friend, but can be the indefinable - perhaps the rarest and most precious thing in life to find at all.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: If you make your best friend and your significant other the same person, you don't have to disconnect to go tell your girlfriend everything.
quotes.author: Niecy Nash

quotes.quote: I don't think I need a significant other to be happy because I always like to find that for myself, but I think that it makes me a lot happier when I'm sharing my life with somebody.
quotes.author: Kylie Jenner

quotes.quote: Once you move in with your significant other, you have to become a combination of each other.
quotes.author: Chaz Bundick

quotes.quote: Sometimes love burns so hot in your veins that it consumes all rational thought. You become a walking shell that can no longer function without your significant other whispering into your soul, telling your heart to beat.
quotes.author: Teresa Mummert

quotes.quote: You always want your significant other to think that you hung the moon, but when you're working in music you also want them to be honest with you.
quotes.author: Stacey King

quotes.quote: My significant other right now is myself, which is what happens when you suffer from multiple personality disorder and self-obsession.
quotes.author: Joaquin Phoenix

quotes.quote: We need to give credence to the nonsexual relationships...the idea of having significant others instead of a significant other.
quotes.author: Sasha Cagen

quotes.quote: The older you get the more realistic it is that your significant other is your significant other. I mean, you'll always have your girlfriends or your guy friends, but the person you're married to is usually your No. 1
quotes.author: Ellen Pompeo

quotes.quote: The older you get, the more you realize you're drifting toward a direction, and sometimes your significant other drifts into an opposite direction. You can't blame anybody for it.
quotes.author: Dido Armstrong

quotes.quote: I think your significant other should be way more important than your work. Personally, I love working. I don't know that I'd say I'm a workaholic because I also love maxing and relaxing.
quotes.author: Kristen Bell

quotes.quote: Never put your family, friends, or significant other low on your priority list. Prefer a handful of truly close friends to a hundred acquaintances.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: Women tend to be preservers of the social structure, of marriage. They don't want to upset their husbands or their significant others. They don't want to hurt people
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: A good litmus test is that you should be comfortable with your significant other being present when you hang out with your friend.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: It's very different than it used to be. I think everybody has a lot more experience in how to be in a relationship - whether it's a marriage or a significant other or a business or a friend.
quotes.author: Kathy Valentine

quotes.quote: Everybody wants what feels good; and if we wish a symphony of attention from a bunch of caring people and a harmony of happy sounds during our lifetime, we must not act like dark horses, saving up our emotions, but be bountiful to all significant others.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Well-timed silence is the most commanding expression.
quotes.author: Mark Helprin

quotes.quote: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Silence is argument carried on by other means.
quotes.author: Ernesto Guevara

quotes.quote: Silence is not only never thirsty, but also never brings pain or sorrow.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Your silence will not protect you.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Silence is a source of Great Strength.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Silence is pure and holy. It draws people together because only those who are comfortable with each other can sit without speaking.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Silence is the universal refuge, the sequel to all dull discourses and all foolish acts, a balm to our every chagrin, as welcome after satiety as after disappointment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The silence depressed me.? It wasn't the silence of silence.? It was my own silence.?
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Silence is the sanctuary of prudence.
quotes.author: Balthasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Silence is the language of God, all else is poor translation.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Silence is golden when you can't think of a good answer.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Silence is the most perfect expression of scorn.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Choose silence of all virtues, for by it you hear other men's imperfections, and conceal your own.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Silence is the great teacher, and to learn its lessons you must pay attention to it. There is no substitute for the creative inspiration, knowledge, and stability that come from knowing how to contact your core of inner silence
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: n the attitude of silence the soul finds the path in an clearer light, and what is elusive and deceptive resolves itself into crystal clearness. Our life is a long and arduous quest after Truth.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Silence propagates itself, and the longer talk has been suspended, the more difficult it is to find anything to say.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Silence is the speech of love, The music of the spheres above.
quotes.author: Richard Henry Stoddard

quotes.quote: If silence is good for the wise, how much better is it for the foolish!
quotes.author: Ivan Panin

quotes.quote: The silence that accepts merit as the most natural thing in the world, is the highest applause.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Silence is a learned practice that requires far more than just not talking. Not talking is not silence; it's just not talking.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Silence is the mother of truth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Silence is as full of potential wisdom and wit as the unshown marble of great sculpture. The silent bear no witness against themselves.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Silence is true wisdom's best reply.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: There is an eloquent silence: it serves sometimes to approve, sometimes to condemn; there is a mocking silence; there is a respectful silence.
quotes.author: Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Silence is foolish if we are wise, but wise if we are foolish.
quotes.author: Charles Colton

quotes.quote: A judicious silence is always better than truth spoken without charity.
quotes.author: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: Silence is only frightening to people who are compulsively verbalizing.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Her silhouette never has regrets.
quotes.author: Delano Johnson

quotes.quote: When a silhouette or shape is as beautiful as it is functional and relevant, that's true luxury.
quotes.author: Reed Krakoff

quotes.quote: The silhouette says a lot with very little information, but that's also what the stereotype does.
quotes.author: Kara Walker

quotes.quote: Enhancing a woman's silhouette and enhancing a woman's beauty - both contribute to enhancing her confidence, so they're synonymous, really.
quotes.author: L'Wren Scott

quotes.quote: That's what I'll be. A silhouette, rarely seen, and yet believed in.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: There are not many original shapes or silhouettes -- only a million variations.
quotes.author: Charles James

quotes.quote: When walking through the 'valley of shadows,' remember, a shadow is cast by a Light.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: You cannot do silhouettes in fantasy. Ah, no, you must be faithful. It is, the art, a, what you call, paradox. It is always that you must be simple, and then, if you are simple, you will stimulate the imagination of the observer.
quotes.author: Ugo Mochi

quotes.quote: We pack the physical outline of the creature we see with all the ideas we have already formed about him, and in the complete picture of him we compose in our minds those ideas have certainly the principal place.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Silhouettes are reductions, and racial stereotypes are also reductions of actual human beings.
quotes.author: Kara Walker

quotes.quote: The silhouette is the most important thing in clothes. Every French girl knows that. High-waisted trousers give you long legs and a pretty bum which, after all, is what we all want.
quotes.author: Lou Doillon

quotes.quote: The hardest thing in fashion is not to be known for a logo, but to be known for a silhouette.
quotes.author: Giambattista Valli

quotes.quote: A good cover has a distinct silhouette.
quotes.author: J. C. Leyendecker

quotes.quote: A good pump is a silhouette, like the bone structure of the face. It's like a beautiful face with no make-up. You can cover a not-so-beautiful face with make-up, but it is just a mask - it is the same with shoes.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: There are not many original shapes or silhouettes. Only a million variations.
quotes.author: Charles James

quotes.quote: I have my mantra about silhouette, proportion, and fit. I believe that when they are in harmony and balance, you’ll look great in anything.
quotes.author: Tim Gunn

quotes.quote: I would love to do orange and lemon trees silhouetted against the blue sea, but I cannot find them the way I want them.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: For Silicon Valley and its idols, innovation is the new selfishness.
quotes.author: Evgeny Morozov

quotes.quote: What created Silicon Valley was a culture of openness, and there is no future to Silicon Valley without it.
quotes.author: Sarah Lacy

quotes.quote: You want failures to be small and informational. Silicon Valley does very well. It knows how to use failure as a tool for improvement.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Two million people live in Silicon Valley and one million of them believe they've discovered the next big thing.
quotes.author: Ben Smith

quotes.quote: The natives of Silicon Valley learned long ago that when you share your knowledge with someone else, one plus one usually equals three. You both learn each other's ideas, and you come up with new ones.
quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.quote: Being in Silicon Valley is like playing for the Yankees. You get knocked around more than anywhere else, the glare of the media spotlight is more brutal, and the expectations are higher than they'd be in any other city.
quotes.author: Sarah Lacy

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley is a mindset, not a location.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: At the core of Silicon Valley is a passion for 'yes.'
quotes.author: Steven Levy

quotes.quote: Look at what Silicon Valley has done - the advance of computers.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: The real secret of Silicon Valley is that it's really all about the people.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: In Silicon Valley, when you're a private company, the entrepreneur can do no wrong.
quotes.author: Ben Horowitz

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley wouldn't exist without massive government spending and in fact initiative.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley has some of the smartest engineers and technology business people in the world.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Everyone knows that Silicon Valley is chock full of fabulous people who do good while doing well.
quotes.author: Ron Gutman

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley's success comes from the way its companies build alliances with their employees.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: A remarkable thing about the Silicon Valley culture is that its status structure is so based on technical accomplishment and prowess.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.quote: We don't celebrate failure in Silicon Valley. We celebrate learning.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: In Silicon Valley, if you spend a lot of time thinking about the obstacles, you'll talk yourself out of everything, because the more you look at it, the less logical something sounds, since no one has done it yet.
quotes.author: Dan Rosensweig

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley is like Wall Street in that it will fill and pursue market opportunities to their logical extremes.
quotes.author: Andrew Yang

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley tends to be very myopic - to be focused on one or two things - which has some strengths as well as weaknesses.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: Part of the beauty of Silicon Valley is that people generally encourage you to think crazy. It's the hypothesis that there's nothing sacred that can't be changed.
quotes.author: Anne Wojcicki

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley does not breed great technology. Instead, the smartest people from around the world tend to move to Silicon Valley.
quotes.author: Patrick Collison

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley tends to believe in the individual who creates a small group and does something big.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley is the best place to start a tech company in so many ways.
quotes.author: Niklas Zennstrom

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley tends to fall in love with the new new thing.
quotes.author: Adam Lashinsky

quotes.quote: In Silicon Valley, you want things done instantly.
quotes.author: Anne Wojcicki

quotes.quote: Silicon Valley has infinite access to capital and can lose money indefinitely.
quotes.author: John Landgraf

quotes.quote: Love is unselfishly choosing for another's highest good.
quotes.author: CS Lewis

quotes.quote: Love is a lot like a backache, it doesn't show up on X-rays, but you know it's there.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: Love is a state of mind which has nothing to do with the mind.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: The most effective way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
quotes.author: Woody Allen2

quotes.quote: Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby- awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: First love is a kind of vaccination which saves man from catching the complaint the second time.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Love is like the measles; we all have to go through it.
quotes.author: Jerome K Jerome

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: I thought I was promiscuous, but it turns out I was just thorough.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: Love is like jumping out of an airplane knowing that someone else has packed your chute. You pull the cord hoping that a canopy opens up, but it could very well be packed full of dirty laundry and a half eaten cheese sandwich.
quotes.author: Jared Turner

quotes.quote: Women marry men hoping they will change. Men marry women hoping they will not. So each is inevitably disappointed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The only true love is love at first sight; second sight dispels it.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: To love someone as much as you love yourself, that is the ideal. Especially if that someone is your clone.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: You can't make someone love you, all you can do is stalk them and hope they panic and give in.
quotes.author: Caleb Followill

quotes.quote: Love is like any other luxury. You have no right to it unless you can afford it.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: I think men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage. They've experienced pain and bought jewelry.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: There is a place you can touch a woman that will drive her crazy. Her heart.
quotes.author: Melanie Griffith

quotes.quote: People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: How sweet it is to love, and to be dissolved, and as it were to bathe myself in thy love.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: A woman has got to love a bad man once or twice in her life, to be thankful for a good one.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: What a silly thing love is! It is not half as useful as logic, for it does not prove anything and it is always telling one things that are not going to happen, and making one believe things that are not true.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If loving someone is putting them in a straitjacket and kicking them down a flight of stairs, then yes, I have loved a few people.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: The activity of love and faith is what makes heaven.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote: In love, somehow, a man's heart is always either exceeding the speed limit, or getting parked in the wrong place.
quotes.author: Rowland

quotes.quote: A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Romantic love is mental illness. But it's a pleasurable one.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: In love, you have loosened yourself like seawater.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Love is telling someone their hair extensions are showing.
quotes.author: Natasha Leggero

quotes.quote: Every silver lining has a cloud.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Too many people miss the silver lining because they're expecting gold.
quotes.author: Maurice Setter

quotes.quote: Every cloud has its silver lining but it is sometimes a little difficult to get it to the mint
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: But you have no silver linings without a cloud.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: Every silver lining's got a touch of grey.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Look at the bright side of life and choose to be happy. Yes, it is a matter of choice. When negative thoughts enter your mind, just refuse to look at them, substitute them with happy thoughts.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: You got to look on the bright side, even if there ain't one.
quotes.author: Dashiell Hammett

quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase. Just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Be willing to take the first step, no matter how small it is. Concentrate on the fact that you are willing to learn. Absolute miracles will happen.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When things go wrong, don't go with them.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: When you fail, that is when you get closer to success.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Always look on the bright side of life. Otherwise it'll be too dark to read.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Of course I look at the glass half full. The only time I would look at it half empty is when I think about how good the first half tasted.
quotes.author: Drew Deyoung

quotes.quote: The average pencil is seven inches long, with just a half-inch eraser in case you thought optimism was dead.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Nothing is predestined: The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.
quotes.author: Ralph Blum

quotes.quote: All misfortune is but a stepping stone to fortune.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Every calamity is a spur and a valuable hint.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There are always flowers for those who want to see them.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Life is a shipwreck but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Your circumstances may be uncongenial, but they shall not remain so if you only perceive an ideal and strive to reach it. You cannot travel within and stand still without.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses, we must plant more roses.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Look at the sparrows; they do not know what they will do in the next moment. Let us literally live from moment to moment.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The great thing in this world is not so much where you stand, as in what direction you are moving.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.author: Carl Bard

quotes.quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road unless you fail to make the turn.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Birds sing after a storm; why shouldn't people feel as free to delight in whatever remains to them?
quotes.author: Rose F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A girl without braids is like a city without bridges.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: Worrying is like paying a debt you don't owe.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: An anxious heart is like a string that's out of tune.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.quote: Anxiety's like a rocking chair. It gives you something to do, but it doesn't get you very far.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: A simile is like a pair of eyeglasses, one side sees this, one side sees that, the device brings them together.
quotes.author: George McWhirter

quotes.quote: The sun rose like a stripper, keeping its glory well covered by cloud till it seemed there'd be no show at all.
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Love is like a booger, you pick and pick at it. Then when you get it you wonder how to get rid of it.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: People are like music, some speak the truth and others are just noise.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Life is like a box of chocolate. Taste every bit of it, and you will realise, each chocolate has different taste.
quotes.author: Ghazala Tasneem

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: A house without books is like a room without windows.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Life is like the river, sometimes it sweeps you gently along and sometimes the rapids come out of nowhere.
quotes.author: Emma Smith

quotes.quote: Life is like an onion; you peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Character is like a tree and reputation its shadow. The shadow is what we think it is and the tree is the real thing.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Humans are so much like bubbles. Vivid and pretty to look at, But prick them once and they burst.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: A simple life is not seeing how little we can get by with that's poverty but how efficiently we can put first things first. . . . When you're clear about your purpose and your priorities, you can painlessly discard whatever does not support these, whether it's clutter in your cabinets or commitments on your calendar.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.quote: Live a simple life; you will own the most beautiful treasures of the world!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The complexity of your earthly array is not a guarantee for a truimphant eternity. The fact is that you need a simple life to go to heaven; not an excessively glittering body, shiny lips and charming face.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The simple life on the farm was everything to me. Nothing was more relaxing after a long plane flight than to reach the winding driveway that led up to my house. The quiet of the night was more soothing than a sleeping pill.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: I began to realize how simple life could be if one had a regular routine to follow with fixed hours, a fixed salary, and very little original thinking to do.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Simplicity is making the journey of this life with just baggage enough.
quotes.author: Charles Warner

quotes.quote: The trouble with simple living is that, though it can be joyful, rich, and creative, it isn't simple.
quotes.author: Doris Janzen Longacre

quotes.quote: Live simply that others might simply live.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ann Seton

quotes.quote: I want to live simply, to work honestly, to love completely and to dare mightily, so that when I die, my children, and their children, will know that I died empty, and well satisfied.
quotes.author: Doug Robinson

quotes.quote: The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Live simply so that others may simply live.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Simplicity is making the journey of this life with just baggage enough.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Lead a simple life. First reduce your greeds. Then reduce your needs.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Best rule for a simple life... Care with no reason, Love with no expectation
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: It's the simple things in life that are the most extraordinary.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I found the simple life, ain't so simple.
quotes.author: Van Halen

quotes.quote: Simplicity of living, if deliberately chosen, implies a compassionate approach to life. It means that we are choosing to live our daily lives with some degree of conscious appreciation of the condition of the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Duane Elgin

quotes.quote: Live simply so that others may simply live.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Simplicity, simplicity, simplicity! I say, let your affairs be as two or three, and not a hundred or a thousand.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Manifest plainness, embrace simplicity, reduce selfishness, have few desires.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the final achievement. After one has played a vast quantity of notes and more notes, it is simplicity that emerges as the crowning reward of art.
quotes.author: Frederic Chopin

quotes.quote: Simplicity of character is no hindrance to the subtlety of intellect.
quotes.author: John Morley

quotes.quote: A vocabulary of truth and simplicity will be of service throughout your life.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A little simplicity would be the first step toward rational living, I think.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is very hard to be simple enough to be good.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Only great minds can afford a simple style.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Reduce the complexity of life by eliminating the needless wants of life, and the labors of life reduce themselves.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: In character, in manner, in style, in all things, the supreme excellence is simplicity.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the glory of expression.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Simplicity is not the goal. It is the by-product of a good idea and modest expectations.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: Nothing is more simple than greatness; indeed, to be simple is to be great.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the final achievement. After one has played a vast quantity of notes and more notes, it is simplicity that emerges as the crowning reward of art.
quotes.author: Frederic Chopin

quotes.quote: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Live simply, so that others may simply live.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Our life is frittered away by detail simplify, simplify, simplify!
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the keynote of all true elegance.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Simplicity embarks not on what is seen by the naked eye, but dwelling on what is in the heart.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The most complicated skill is to be simple.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Simplicity is an exact medium between too little and too much.
quotes.author: Sir Joshua Reynolds

quotes.quote: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
quotes.author: Hans Hofman

quotes.quote: Simplicity is making the journey of this life with just baggage enough.
quotes.author: Charles Warner

quotes.quote: The trouble with simple living is that, though it can be joyful, rich, and creative, it isn't simple.
quotes.author: Doris Janzen Longacre

quotes.quote: The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Simplicity is indeed often the sign of truth and a criterion of beauty.
quotes.author: Mahlon Hoagland

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the shortest path to a solution.
quotes.author: Ward Cunningham

quotes.quote: Simplicity is prerequisite for reliability.
quotes.author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Simplicity the art of maximizing the amount of work not done is essential.
quotes.author: Principles Behind The Agile Manifesto

quotes.quote: Simplicity is a state of mind.
quotes.author: Charles Wagner

quotes.quote: A little simplification would be the first step toward rational living, I think.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A taste for simplicity cannot last for long.
quotes.author: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.quote: As beautiful as simplicity is, it can become a tradition that stands in the way of exploration.
quotes.author: Laura Nyro

quotes.quote: I despise simplicity. It is the negation of all that is beautiful.
quotes.author: Norman Hartnell

quotes.quote: I don't need a lot of money. Simplicity is the answer for me.
quotes.author: Linda McCartney

quotes.quote: It is simplicity that makes the uneducated more effective than the educated when addressing popular audiences.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Seek simplicity but distrust it.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Plain question and plain answer make the shortest road out of most perplexities.Â
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best way to simplfy life is to set your priorities straight.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nothing is easier than to simplify life and them make a philosophy about it. The trouble is that the resulting philosophy is true only of that simplified life.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: Simple in actions and in thoughts, you return to the source of being.Â
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: People want very much to simplify their lives enough so that they can control the things that make it possible to sleep at night.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: I make myself rich by making my wants few.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When you consciously choose to be ordinary, you become extraordinary.Â
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: The more you try to simplify things the more you complicate them. You create rules, build walls, push people away, lie to yourself and ignore true feelings. That is not simplifying things.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: The best way to find out what we really need is to get rid of what we don't.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: The whole idea of a stereotype is toÂ simplify. Instead of going through the problem of all this great diversity - that it's this or maybe that - you have just one large statement; it is this.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Have nothing in your home that you do not know to be useful and believe to be beautiful.Â
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: Segmenting your sample is one of the easiest ways to simplify.
quotes.author: Bobby Bragan

quotes.quote: Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote: Minimalism is the intentional promotion of the things we most value and the removal of anything that distracts us from it.Â
quotes.author: Joshua Becker

quotes.quote: Order andÂ simplificationÂ are the first steps toward the mastery of a subject â€” the actual enemy is the unknown.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Simplification is one of the most difficult things to do.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote: SimplifyÂ your life. You don't grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.Â
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: TheÂ simplificationÂ ofÂ lifeÂ isÂ oneÂ of theÂ stepsÂ toÂ inner peace. AÂ persistent simplification will createanÂ innerÂ andÂ outer well-beingÂ thatÂ places harmonyÂ inÂ one's life.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Simplification establishes an unspoken emphasis on relationship.
quotes.author: Kim John Payne

quotes.quote: As you simplify your life, the laws of the universe will be simpler; solitude will not be solitude, poverty will not be poverty, nor weakness weakness.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: What's really important is toÂ simplify. The work of most photographers would be improved immensely if they could do one thing: get rid of the extraneous. If you strive for simplicity, you are more likely to reach the viewer.
quotes.author: William Albert Allard

quotes.quote: Reduce the complexity of life by eliminating the needless wants of life, and the labors of life reduce themselves.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: Don't use a lot where a little will do.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Besides the noble art of getting things done, there is the noble art of leaving things undone. The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of non-essentials.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Simplify your life. Don't waste the years struggling for things that are unimportant. Don't burden yourself with possessions. Keep your needs and wants simple and enjoy what you have. Don't destroy your peace of mind by looking back, worrying about the past. Live in the present. Simplify!
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Simplifying isn't meant to leave your life empty, it's meant to leave space in your life for what you really want to do. Know what those things are before you start.
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.quote: When you forget about the how, go back to the why.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Be killing sin or it will be killing you.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: Sin is absence of God. Nothing more, nothing less.
quotes.author: Simon Mawer

quotes.quote: The wages of sin are death, but by the time taxes are taken out, it's just sort of a tired feeling.
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.quote: Sin is its own punishment, devouring you from the inside.
quotes.author: William P. Young

quotes.quote: Hate the sin, love the sinner.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A large part of mankind is angry not with the sins, but with the sinners.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Love the sinner and hate the sin.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: There is no original sin. You don't have to pay repentance to anything or anybody.
quotes.author: Desmond Harrington

quotes.quote: The Lord does not forgive excuses, He forgives sin.
quotes.author: Rick Joyner

quotes.quote: The first sin in our universe was Lucifer's self conceit.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: It is perilously easy to have amazing sympathy with God's truth and remain in sin.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Sin is too stupid to see beyond itself.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Personal sin reflected upon breeds compassion.
quotes.author: John M. Shanahan

quotes.quote: I'd rather laugh with the sinners than cry with the saints.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: Every sin is the distortion of an energy breathed into us.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Few love to hear the sins they love to act.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Sin is looking for the right thing in the wrong place.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Sin is the failure of a fallible creature, and reversible by repentance.
quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.quote: Counting other people's sins does not make you a saint.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be a sinner and sin boldly, but believe and rejoice in Christ even more boldly.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: We sinned for no reason but an incomprehensible lack of love, and He saved us for no reason but an incomprehensible excess of love.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: If you are going to sin, sin against God, not the bureaucracy. God will forgive you but the bureaucracy won't.
quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

quotes.quote: Sin brought death, and death will disappear with the disappearance of sin.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: And sin, young man, is when you treat people like things.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: No one was ever scolded out of their sins.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: For any sin, we all suffer. That is why our suffering is endless.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: A sin is wrong not because it makes you feel bad though it should but because it is wrong.
quotes.author: S. M. Stirling

quotes.quote: Sin cannot tear you away from him (Christ) even though you commit adultery a hundred times a day and commit as many murders.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: There is magic in sincere forgiveness - magic to heal.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: You can play a shoestring if you're sincere.
quotes.author: John Coltrane

quotes.quote: Sincere repentance is continual. Believers repent until their dying day. This dropping well is not intermittent.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: God is not looking for repayment, but repentance. What heals a broken relationship is sincere love and contrition.
quotes.author: Frederica Mathewes-Green

quotes.quote: Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made. Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: The one condition for spiritual progress is that we remain sincere and humble.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: To be sincere means to be the same person when one is with oneself; that is to say, alone - but that is all it means.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: You are only pretentious if you are not sincere.
quotes.author: John Hodgman

quotes.quote: Sincere compliments cost nothing and can accomplish much. In any relationship, they are the applause that refreshes.
quotes.author: Steve Goodier

quotes.quote: You don't have to be fearless. Just be sincere.
quotes.author: Danielle LaPorte

quotes.quote: Malice is always authentic and sincere.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Never regret anything you have done with a sincere affection; nothing is lost that is born of the heart.
quotes.author: Basil Rathbone

quotes.quote: As for methods of prayer, all are good, as long as they are sincere

quotes.quote: Sincerity doesn't mean anything. A person can be sincere and be more destructive than a person who is insincere.
quotes.author: Edward Albee

quotes.quote: We find it easy to believe that praise is sincere: why should anyone lie in telling us the truth?
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: The most sincere compliment we can pay is attention.
quotes.author: Walter Inglis Anderson

quotes.quote: If you're sincere, praise is effective. If you're insincere, it's manipulative.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what you believe just so long as you're sincere.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: It is with sincere affection or friendship as with ghosts and apparitions,--a thing that everybody talks of, and scarce any hath seen.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: An insincere critic of a sincere person never wins.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Men are always sincere. They change sincerities, that's all.
quotes.author: Tristan Bernard

quotes.quote: Every man alone is sincere. At the entrance of a second person, hypocrisy begins. We parry and fend the approach of our fellow-man by compliments, by gossip, by amusements, by affairs. We cover up our thought from him under a hundred folds.

quotes.quote: Sincere words are not fine; fine words are not sincere.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: With sincerity and earnestness one can realize God through all religions. The Vaishnavas will realize God, and so will the Saktas, the Vedantists, and the Brahmos. The Mussalmans and Christians will realize Him too. All will certainly realize God if they are earnest and sincere.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: Martyrs have been sincere. And so have tyrants. Wise men have been sincere. And so have fools.
quotes.author: E. Haldeman-Julius

quotes.quote: Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: Sincere love is not as a result of emotional surges - it's a result of obedience to the Truth.
quotes.author: Alistair Begg

quotes.quote: The sincere alone can recognize sincerity.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Everyone says he's sincere, but everyone isn't sincere. If everyone was sincere who says he's sincere there wouldn't be half so many insincere ones in the world and there would be lots, lots, lots more really sincere ones!
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Sincerity is the way to heaven; to think how to be sincere is the way of man.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Singapore is what your city could become if everyone obeyed the rules, did their jobs diligently, and just shut up. When your city gets to be this paragon of efficiency and discipline, would you still want to live there? Singapore is a model city, which is terrific if you happen to be a model human.
quotes.author: Jessica Zafra

quotes.quote: It has to be good to live in Singapore because otherwise, nobody will stand for it.
quotes.author: Lee Hsien Loong

quotes.quote: Singapore's not a very big country. They speak with one voice, and they have a clear idea of what their regulatory environment should look like.
quotes.author: Karl Iagnemma

quotes.quote: Nobody in Singapore drinks Singapore Slings. It's one of the first things you find out there. What you do in Singapore is eat. It's a really food-crazy culture, where all of this great food is available in a kind of hawker-stand environment.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: If Singapore is a nanny state, then I am proud to have fostered one.
quotes.author: Lee Kuan Yew

quotes.quote: Singapore is the happiest place in Asia.
quotes.author: Dan Buettner

quotes.quote: Singapore is a pretty special race with it being held at night; it makes a great show for the fans.
quotes.author: Romain Grosjean

quotes.quote: Singapore is a natural gateway for international firms looking to access Asia and for Asian businesses to access the world.
quotes.author: Tony Tan

quotes.quote: Getting to places like Bangkok or Singapore was a hell of a sweat. But when you got there it was the back of beyond. It was just a series of small tin sheds.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.quote: You have to understand that Singapore is quite different from Mauritius.
quotes.author: Lee Hsien Loong

quotes.quote: Singapore has been incredibly well-managed. It was created out of the swamp, with a strong emotional idea: a safe place for mostly Chinese, but accepting other cultures and other races.
quotes.author: Nicolas Berggruen

quotes.quote: Perhaps Singapore could learn from us a more relaxed way of life.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: Singapore is an international city, and it would be a grave mistake to close our doors.
quotes.author: Tony Tan

quotes.quote: In Singapore, there may be 50 old-money families, but you wouldn't know them to look at them.
quotes.author: Kevin Kwan

quotes.quote: In Singapore, Malcolm X type of activity would be extremely difficult because the government can be very harsh on lawbreakers.
quotes.author: Ian Mckellen

quotes.quote: At least when it comes to food, there's no snobbery in Singapore.
quotes.author: Kevin Kwan

quotes.quote: Singapore is a pretty fantastic place, and the race is always a challenge.
quotes.author: Romain Grosjean

quotes.quote: Those who wish to sing always find a song.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Since the days of slavery, if you were a good singer or dancer, it was your job to perform for the master after dinner.
quotes.author: Spike Lee

quotes.quote: A singer ... is no more than an actor set to music.
quotes.author: Kay Starr

quotes.quote: Singers provide all the proof that we have souls.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: It's easy for a singer to sometimes pick up on another singer's sound, but that's just copying.
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.quote: When you make your living as a singer, you have to go where the gigs are.
quotes.author: Natalie Cole

quotes.quote: You can cage the singer but not the song.
quotes.author: Harry Belafonte

quotes.quote: Popular culture is a place where pity is called compassion, flattery is called love, propaganda is called knowledge, tension is called peace, gossip is called news, and auto-tune is called singing.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The activity of a singer that sings opera is similar to that of an athlete.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: The singer has everything within him. The notes come out from his very life. They are not materials gathered from outside.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: I don't sing because I'm happy; I'm happy because I sing.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: There is delight in singing, though none hear beside the singer.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: It's better if a singer disconnects from the original and brings something new to the version.
quotes.author: Armaan Malik

quotes.quote: He who sings scares away his woes.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quotes.quote: If I cannot fly, let me sing.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: A song should stand on its own and on what a singer does with it. It shouldn't need a lot of extra help to be good.
quotes.author: Oliver

quotes.quote: Your voice is like a very serious instrument that you have to tame if you want to be an amazing singer - Marvin Gaye or Michael Jackson.
quotes.author: Theophilus London

quotes.quote: A great song can make a terrible singer sound good, but a good singer - you put a great song on top of that, you're really in great shape!
quotes.author: Quincy Jones

quotes.quote: All the intelligence and talent in the world can't make a singer. The voice is a wild thing. It can't be bred in captivity. It is a sport, like the silver.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: In the life of a singer, it's not all triumphs and happy memories; there are days you have to go out there when it's the last thing you feel like doing.
quotes.author: Mireille Mathieu

quotes.quote: I'm not only a SINGER, I'm an ENTERTAINER... I make people dance away their sorrow and I put smiles on people face
quotes.author: GoalsRider

quotes.quote: Life is too short to sing music you don't love.
quotes.author: Kathy Coneys Alexander

quotes.quote: If I'm going to sing like someone else, then I don't need to sing at all.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.quote: A singer starts by having his instrument as a gift from God... When you have been given something in a moment of grace, it is sacrilegious to be greedy.
quotes.author: Marian Anderson

quotes.quote: When you have your own identity as a singer, you don't have competition.
quotes.author: Armaan Malik

quotes.quote: There's no half-singing in the shower, you're either a rock star or an opera diva.
quotes.author: Josh Groban

quotes.quote: He who sings frightens away his ills.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Some days there won't be a song in your heart. Sing anyway.
quotes.author: Emory Austin

quotes.quote: There's no half-singing in the shower, you're either a rock star or an opera diva.
quotes.author: Josh Groban

quotes.quote: Those who wish to sing always find a song.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: As long as we live, there is never enough singing.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: For me, singing is the most natural thing in the world. I've grown up with it and I know I've got that gift.
quotes.author: Stella Mccartney

quotes.quote: Let us go singing as far as we go: the road will be less tedious.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: The only thing better than singing is more singing.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Singing is a way of escaping. It's another world. I'm no longer on earth.
quotes.author: Edith Piaf

quotes.quote: A lot of work. A lot of vocal coaching, a lot of instrument training.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: It is the best of all trades, to make songs, and the second best to sing them.
quotes.author: Hillaire Belloc

quotes.quote: You chose the toughest song to sing tonight . . . and you worked it out.
quotes.author: Randy Jackson

quotes.quote: Singing is just a feeling set to music.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: Singing provides a true sense of lightheartedness. If I sing when I am alone, I feel wonderful. It's freedom.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: When a singer truly feels and experiences what the music is all about, the words will automatically ring true.
quotes.author: Monserrat Caball

quotes.quote: I don't know what happens to me on stage. Something else seems to take over.
quotes.author: Maria Callas

quotes.quote: Sing again, with your dear voice revealing A tone Of some world far from ours, Where music and moonlight and feeling Are one.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: On singing in the swimming pool: "If I can move the water, I can move the people."
quotes.author: Michael Bolton

quotes.quote: If they're singing about heartbreak, they've lived it.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: We sing because we can't speak anymore.
quotes.author: Kristen Chenoweth

quotes.quote: You can cage the singer but not the song.
quotes.author: Harry Belafonte

quotes.quote: The total person sings not just the vocal chords.
quotes.author: Esther Broner

quotes.quote: Singing allowed me to express myself in ways that I wouldn't be able to do otherwise.
quotes.author: Josh Turner

quotes.quote: Singing is my life. It has always been my life. It will always be my life.
quotes.author: Celia Cruz

quotes.quote: If you're gonna sing, sing loud.
quotes.author: Travis Tritt

quotes.quote: Singing is such an excellent thing, that I wish all people would sing.
quotes.author: Richard E. Byrd

quotes.quote: There is delight in singing, though none hear beside the singer.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: A song can be more than words and music ... when sung with soul a song carries you to another world, to a place where no matter how much pain you feel, you are never alone.
quotes.author: Clay Aiken

quotes.quote: He who sings prays twice.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Singing evokes the temple of the soul.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Single is no longer a lack of options â€“ but a choice. A choice to refuse to let your life be defined by your relationship status but to live every day Happily and let your Ever After work itself out.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Learning to enjoy being single involves the ability to experience everything through your own essence, instead of living vicariously through a spouse or partner.
quotes.author: Ernie Zelinski

quotes.quote: â€œSingle" is not a status, it is a word that describes a person who is strong enough to live and enjoy life without depending on others.
quotes.author: Prixie

quotes.quote: A busy, vibrant, goal-oriented woman is so much more attractive than a woman who waits around for a man to validate her existence.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: â€œSingleâ€ is an opportunity to live life on your own terms and not apologize.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Individualism is rather like innocence: There must be something unconscious about it.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.quote: It's very fun to be single, because you know what happens? You find yourself. You understand what it means to love yourself, instead of putting all this energy into give-and-tug in a relationship.
quotes.author: Keke Palmer

quotes.quote: You do not need to be loved, not at the cost of yourself. The single relationship that is truly central and crucial in a life is the relationship to the self. Of all the people you will know in a lifetime, you are the only one you will never lose.Â Â Â
quotes.author: Jo Coudert

quotes.quote: I think it's very healthy to spend time alone. You need to know how to be alone and not defined by another person.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you really are going to be a happy single, you have to stop treating being single as the annoying time that you pass between relationships and embrace it. Rather than focusing on what you lack, focus on what you have: You.Â
quotes.author: Natalie Lue

quotes.quote: Some people are severely lonely, all they can do is accept the single life as an example of being free and happy.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Think about it this way: While being married is about becoming the wife you are meant to be, being single allows you to focus on becoming the woman you were born to be.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Being single is about celebrating and appreciating your own space that you're in.
quotes.author: Kelly Rowland

quotes.quote: If we seek paradise outside ourselves, we cannot have paradise in our hearts.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Even when it seems that there is no one else, always remember there's one person who never ceased to love you - yourself.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: It is good to be lonely, for being alone is not easy. The fact that something is difficult must be one more reason to do it.
quotes.author: Rilke

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to stand alone to prove that you can still stand.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Being single is definitely better than being with the wrong person.
quotes.author: Hassan Choughari

quotes.quote: I don't need a man to rectify my existence. The most profound relationship we'll ever have is the one with ourselves.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: There are some places in life where you can only go alone. Embrace the beauty of your solo journey.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: You're single not because you are not good enough for one, it's that you're too good for the wrong one.
quotes.author: Chris Burkmenn

quotes.quote: Better to be quirky alone than unhappy together.
quotes.author: Anita Hamilton

quotes.quote: Being single used to mean that nobody wanted you. Now it means you're pretty sexy and you're taking your time deciding how you want your life to be and who you want to spend it with.
quotes.author: Sex and the City

quotes.quote: If you are single, eliminate the thought that something is lacking, and just live each day joyfully.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Being single doesn't mean that you know nothing about love. Sometimes being solo is wiser than being in a false relationship.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One can be happy without being married. It might be a rougher path to take, but certainly not the wrong one.
quotes.author: Chang

quotes.quote: Being single doesn't necessarily mean you're available. Sometimes you have to put up a sign that says, "Do Not Disturb" on your heart.Â
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: Being single means you're strong enough to wait for what you deserve.
quotes.author: Niall Horan

quotes.quote: It's when you're not looking for anything that something winds up coming along. It's about learning how to be just with yourself and that you don't need to be in a relationship. You don't need anyone to fulfill you.
quotes.author: Hayden Panettiere

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I'm a single father, does that mean I can celebrate mothers day too?
quotes.author: Anonymous
