quotes.quote: I can make the bacon, fry it up, braid some hair and catch the football game. All at the same time. I'm superman because I have to be. And it's the highest honor of my life. I'm proud to be a single dad.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is a widespread assumption that when a relationship breaks down, it's a man's instinct to run off and abandon his duties. But that's not the case.
quotes.author: Kevin Brazant

quotes.quote: I didn't want to be the dad that just didn't know how to do my daughter's hair.
quotes.author: Greg Wickherst

quotes.quote: Nothing I've ever done has given me more joys and rewards than being a father to my children.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: When your daughter sees other girls having mother-daughter time and she's wondering where hers is, it can break even the manliest men.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Fishing is much less about the fishing, and much more about the time alone with your kid, away from the hustle and bustle of the everyday.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: My father didn't tell me how to live; he lived, and let me watch him do it.
quotes.author: Clarence Budington Kelland

quotes.quote: Every father should remember that one day his son will follow his example instead of his advice.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: The experience deepened my empathy and understanding of what it is to be a man and a feminist.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is much easier to become a father than to be one.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: If I didn't spend a few years as a single dad, my son and I probably wouldn't be as close as we are now.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's hard being a single father, but even harder being a child without a father.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You are the everything parent. You get all the tears, the joy, the tantrums, the hugs, the disappointments.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Shout out to the single father's that have also taken the role of the mother. They don't get appreciated enough for what they do.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Loving my son, building my son, touching my son, playing with my son, being with my son, these aren't tasks that only super dads can perform. These are tasks that every dad should perform. Always. Without fail.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: The greatest mark of a father is how he treats his children when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: Any man can be a Father, but it takes someone special to be a dad.
quotes.author: Anne Geddes

quotes.quote: Sometimes the poorest man leaves his children the richest inheritance.
quotes.author: Ruth E. Renkel

quotes.quote: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Being a single dad to a son is generally thought to be easier than being a single dad to a daughter.
quotes.author: Craig W. Baird

quotes.quote: Single fathers need to find ways to adapt to their new circumstances, and they need to adapt fast.
quotes.author: Craig W. Baird

quotes.quote: Many of the single fathers don't get to see their kids often, as more moms have primary custody.
quotes.author: Craig W. Baird

quotes.quote: Many single fathers also want to give back, tell their stories, and help others.
quotes.author: Craig W. Baird

quotes.quote: It is important for a single father to ensure there is some sort of female mentoring his daughter's life if her mother is deceased.
quotes.author: Craig W. Baird

quotes.quote: A single dad needs to be much more than just a father to his kids.
quotes.author: Michael A. Klumpp

quotes.quote: A single dad has to lead, provide, instruct, and discipline.
quotes.author: Michael A. Klumpp

quotes.quote: Growing up with a single parent is just one among many factors that put children at risk of failure.
quotes.author: Sarah McLanahan

quotes.quote: There’s no way I can care properly for my children if I don’t first care for myself.
quotes.author: Tex Brooks

quotes.quote: Children are gifts. They are not ours for the breaking. They are ours for the making.
quotes.author: Dr Purushothaman

quotes.quote: Single is no longer a lack of options - but a choice. A choice to refuse to let your life be defined by your relationship status but to live every day Happily and let your Ever After work itself out.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Being single doesn't necessarily mean you're available. Sometimes you have to put up a sign that says, "Do Not Disturb" on your heart.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: If you really are going to be a happy single, you have to stop treating being single as the annoying time that you pass between relationships and embrace it. Rather than focusing on what you lack, focus on what you have: You.
quotes.author: Natalie Lue

quotes.quote: My alone feels so good, I'll only have you if you're sweeter than my solitude.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: I never found a companion that was so companionable as solitude.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A busy, vibrant, goal-oriented woman is so much more attractive than a woman who waits around for a man to validate her existence.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I think it's very healthy to spend time alone. You need to know how to be alone and not defined by another person.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You do not need to be loved, not at the cost of yourself. The single relationship that is truly central and crucial in a life is the relationship to the self. Of all the people you will know in a lifetime, you are the only one you will never lose.
quotes.author: Jo Coudert

quotes.quote: Yes, it’s a virtue to grow and improve, but it’s important to remember that being single does not mean you’re flawed and in need of fixing. Your relationship or lack thereof has little to do with your worth.
quotes.author: Jennifer Taitz

quotes.quote: I am happy every day, regardless of my relationship status, because I understand that my happiness doesn’t come from a relationship, it comes from within.
quotes.author: Gregg Michaelsen

quotes.quote: It’s high time we stopped thinking of families only in terms of couples, considering singles to be an anomaly (something must be wrong when you get into your thirties and aren’t married!) or undeveloped appendages which need to be nurtured and brought into maturity in marriage.
quotes.author: Harold J. Sala

quotes.quote: If you can't take care of yourself, you can't take care of someone else.
quotes.author: Sahithi Setikam

quotes.quote: I love being single. I can come and go as I please and stay out as late as I want to.
quotes.author: Eric Dickerson

quotes.quote: Single is not a status. It is a word that best describes a person who is strong enough to live and enjoy life without depending on others.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If we seek paradise outside ourselves, we cannot have paradise in our hearts.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Single is an opportunity to live life on your own terms and not apologize.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: He sleeps fastest who sleeps alone.
quotes.author: Richard Avedond

quotes.quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: I don't like to be labeled as lonely just because I am alone.
quotes.author: Delta Burke

quotes.quote: I like being single, I'm always there when I need me.
quotes.author: Art Leo

quotes.quote: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Being single doesn't mean that you know nothing about love. Sometimes being solo is wiser than being in a false relationship.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you aren't good at loving yourself, you will have a difficult time loving anyone, since you'll resent the time and energy you give another person that you aren't even giving to yourself.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: When we cannot bear to be alone, it means we do not properly value the only companion we will have from birth to death-ourselves.
quotes.author: Eda Leshan

quotes.quote: Being single entitles you to not ask someone's opinion before you do something to mess up your own room, your credit report or even your life.
quotes.author: Sayali Patil

quotes.quote: I think, therefore I'm single.
quotes.author: Liz Winston

quotes.quote: Some people think it's wrong, being single isn't right. But you hurt the right person you'll be wrong all your life.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: Being single is about celebrating and appreciating your own space that you're in.
quotes.author: Kelly Rowland

quotes.quote: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: Solitude is the place of purification.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: A single man is minority, a leader is the majority.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The normal is what you find but rarely. The normal is an ideal. It is a picture that one fabricates of the average characteristics of men, and to find them all in a single man is hardly to be expected.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: A single man has not nearly the value he would have in a state of union. He is an incomplete animal. He resembles the odd half of a pair of scissors.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The fate of a single man can be rich with significance, that of a few hundred less so, but the history of thousands and millions of men does not mean anything at all, in any adequate sense of the word.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: Being single is not always a curse. Sometimes it is a blessing because you don't have to worry about being disappointed.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to stand alone to prove to others and yourself that you can still stand
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Such a lot is won when even a single man gets to his feet and says No
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Thus the skilful general conducts his army just as though he were leading a single man, willy-nilly, by the hand.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: A single man of one, only pebbles can be moved, but many men together, stands no mountain that can't move.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.quote: If the single man plant himself indomitably on his instincts, and there abide, the huge world will come round to him.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No single man can be taken as a model for a perfect figure, for no man lives on earth who is endowed with the whole of beauty.
quotes.author: Albrecht Durer

quotes.quote: There is no book so poor that it would not be a prodigy if wholly made by a single man.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: If a single man demanded as much as a man with a wife and four children, then that would be a violation of the concept of economic equality.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I believe that as long as a single man may try, any unjustifiable barrier against his efforts is a barrier against mankind.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.quote: A rock pile ceases to be a rock pile the moment a single man contemplates it, bearing within him the image of a cathedral.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The high courage of a single man is an army all by itself!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If a wise man behaves prudently, how can he be overcome by his enemies? Even a single man, by right action, can overcome a host of foes.
quotes.author: Sakya Pandita

quotes.quote: The genius of any single man can no more equal learning, than a private purse hold way with the exchequer.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A bachelor's life is no life for a single man.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: The notion of the single man began in the 1950's. The idea of the bachelor as a separate life was new and obscure.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.quote: Single men in barricks don't grow into plaster saints.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: There is nothing more deceptive, more grandeur, than the delusion of a single man
quotes.author: Craig Stone

quotes.quote: I am an unmarried man, as opposed to a single man. A bachelor, according to the dictionary, is a man who has never been married. An unmarried man is not married at the moment. Many of these terms have fallen into disuse.
quotes.author: Raymond Burr

quotes.quote: A married man is just a single man who couldn't say no.
quotes.author: Coling Tegerdine

quotes.quote: Not a single man on earth knows from his own experience the how and where of his birth, only from tradition, which is often very uncertain.
quotes.author: E. T. A. Hoffmann

quotes.quote: A man is never more his single separate self than when he sets out on a journey.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: Being single is getting over the illusion that there is somebody out there to complete you and taking charge of your own life.
quotes.author: Omkar Phatakc

quotes.quote: No single man makes history. History cannot be seen just as one cannot see grass growing.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: There exists in nature a force which is immeasurably more powerful than steam, and by means of which a single man, who knows how to adapt and direct it, might upset and alter the face of the world.
quotes.author: Eliphas Levi

quotes.quote: Being a single parent is twice the work, twice the stress and twice the tears but also twice the hugs, twice the love and twice the pride.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Raising a family is difficult enough. But it's even more difficult for single parents struggling to make ends meet. They don't need more obstacles. They need more opportunities.
quotes.author: Bill Richardson

quotes.quote: Single moms: You are a doctor, a teacher, a nurse, a maid, a cook, a referee, a heroine, a provider, a defender, a protector, a true Superwoman. Wear your cape proudly.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: A single mom tries when things are hard. She never gives up. She believes in her family, even when things are tough. She knows that above all things... a mother's love is more than enough.
quotes.author: Deniece Williams

quotes.quote: I've been a single parent for a long time. It reminds me of being a waitress. As you walk back to the kitchen, requests come at you from all sides. You're doing the job of two - you have to be highly organised.
quotes.author: Cherie Lunghi

quotes.quote: Mothers - especially single mothers - are heroic in their efforts to raise our nation's children, but men must also take responsibility for their children and recognize the impact they have on their families' well-being.
quotes.author: Evan Bayh

quotes.quote: I didn't plan on being a single mom, but you have to deal with the cards you are dealt the best way you can.
quotes.author: Tichina Arnold

quotes.quote: It was tough being a single mom. It was tough being in a divorce with children. Very, very hard.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: You know, I don't think any mother aims to be a single mom. I didn't wish for that, but it happened.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.quote: The most difficult part of dating as a single parent is deciding how much risk your own child's heart is worth.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: As a single mom, I'm juggling a lot and working long hours. Yes, it costs them a little, but what my children get in return is a mother who is energized and content.
quotes.author: Edie Falco

quotes.quote: What is free time? I'm a single mother. My free moments are filled with loving my little girl.
quotes.author: Roma Downey

quotes.quote: Remember that a single mom is just like any other mom and that our number one priority is still our kids. Any parent does whatever it takes for their kids and a single mother is no different.
quotes.author: Paula Miranda

quotes.quote: She has to have four arms, four legs, four eyes, two hearts, and double the love. There is nothing single about a single mom.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I don't think I realised how stressed I was, being a single parent. It was really, really stressful. It's not easy on anybody.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: If you are a single parent, make friends with others in similar situations and develop friendships with married couples. Counsel with your priesthood leaders. Let them know of your needs and wants. Single parenthood is understood by the Lord.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: I am a single mom and I'm the breadwinner and I have to work and I have to do these things and that's just the way it is. I don't think my son even knows any different.
quotes.author: Charisma Carpenter

quotes.quote: Just because a single-mom usually can't be bothered to spend much time on her make-up doesn't mean that she has given up on romance.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: I can understand why a single parent, working two jobs, would find it easier to stop at McDonald's with the kids rather than cook something from scratch at home.
quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

quotes.quote: When you are a mother, you are never really alone in your thoughts. A mother always has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Only mothers can think of the future - because they give birth to it in their children.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: Before becoming a mom, I never knew how good I had it to just spend time at a spa for a few hours. Now, those days are far and between. So when I have an hour, it's all about the mani and pedi.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.quote: I know how to do anything, I'm a mom.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Single parent situations drive poverty and often lead to unsupervised kids. Many boys growing up without fathers often feel angry and abandoned. Thus, they seek comfort in all the wrong places.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Single mothers bright, attractive, available women, thousands of them all over London they were the best invention Will had ever heard of.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: I love being a single mom. But it's definitely different when you're dating.
quotes.author: Brooke Burns

quotes.quote: Mothers are the necessity of invention.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Being a mother is hard and it wasn't a subject I ever studied.
quotes.author: Ruby Wax

quotes.quote: The best part of being a mom to me is the unconditional love. I have never felt alove as pure, a love that's as rewarding.
quotes.author: Monica Denise Brown

quotes.quote: Nothing you do for children is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Being single means you're strong enough to wait for what you deserve.
quotes.author: Niall Horan

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Don't be a woman that needs a man. Be a woman a man needs.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Too many women throw themselves into romance because they're afraid of being single, then start making compromises and losing their identity.
quotes.author: Julie Delpy

quotes.quote: Happily Single is holding out for the best and letting go of the rest. It's saying I will and I can to yourself before you say I do to someone else.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: A woman without a man is like a fish without a bicycle.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Being single used to mean that nobody wanted you. Now it means you're pretty sexy and you're taking your time deciding how you want your life to be and who you want to spend it with.
quotes.author: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.quote: Single women have a dreadful propensity for being poor. Which is one very strong argument in favor of matrimony.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: How wrong it is for a woman to expect the man to build the world she wants, rather than to create it herself.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: A single woman, of good fortune, is always respectable, and may be as sensible and pleasant as any body else.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: A woman should be like a single flower, not a whole bouquet.
quotes.author: Anna Held

quotes.quote: Being single is getting over the illusion that there is somebody out there to complete you and taking charge of your own life.
quotes.author: Omkar Phatakc

quotes.quote: The most profound relationship we'll ever have is the one with ourselves.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: Single is not a status. It's a word that best describes a person who is strong enough to live and enjoy life without depending on others.
quotes.author: Prixie

quotes.quote: The success of every single woman is the inspiration for another.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: Being single is definitely better than being with the wrong person.
quotes.author: Hassan Choughari

quotes.quote: Single ladies, the only thing we need to be rescued from is the notion that we need to be rescued.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: It's not very hip to consider the plight of single women who yearn for something so old-fashioned as men.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Stay single until someone actually complements your life in a way that makes it better to not be single. If not, it's not worth it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Single is an opportunity to live life on your own terms and not apologize.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: It takes a strong person to remain single in a world that is accustomed to settling with anything just to say they have something.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Appreciate being single because that's when you grow the most & with that growth, you come to know what you're looking for.
quotes.author: Daniel Goddard

quotes.quote: A single woman with a narrow income must be a ridiculous, disagreeable old maid, the proper sport of boys and girls, but a single woman of fortune is always respectable, and may be as sensible and pleasant as anybody else.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Being a single woman is like going off to war.
quotes.author: Zoe Lister-Jones

quotes.quote: Most men don't know how to deal with a woman who doesn't need anyone to validate her existence.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Our very best friends have a tincture of jealousy even in their friendship; and when they hear us praised by others, will ascribe it to sinister and interested motives if they can.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The note I wanted; that of the strange and sinister embroidered on the very type of the normal and easy.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: The cudgel of the people’s war was lifted with all its menacing and majestic might, and caring nothing for good taste and procedure, with dull-witted simplicity but sound judgement it rose and fell, making no distinctions.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: To speak and to offend, with some people, are but one and the same thing; their words are fraught with gall and wormwood, from a proud, splenetic, and malevolent disposition; it had been well for them, had they been born stupid or mute; the little vivacity and wit they have, prejudice them more than dulness does others. They are not always satisfied with giving sharp answers; they insolently attack the present, and wound the character of the absent; they bristle up and butt on all sides like rams; and impudence being as natural to them as horns to a ram, no ridicule, no satire, can work upon these untractable savages; we had better at first sight betake ourselves to our heels, and by a prudent flight avoid their molestations.
quotes.author: Jean de La Bruyère

quotes.quote: These men are looked upon as the most malevolent, the most dangerous, and generally as the most unbelieving of all human beings, and yet they are the only men of our time believing in the Gospel doctrine, if not as a whole, at least in part.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The greatest dangers to liberty lurk in insidious encroachment by men of zeal, well-meaning but without understanding.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: Between two evils, I generally like to pick the one I never tried before.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: In morals what begins in fear usually ends in wickedness; in religion what begins in fear usually ends in fanaticism. Fear, either as a principle or a motive, is the beginning of all evil.
quotes.author: Anna Jameson

quotes.quote: Most of the evil in this world is done by people with good intentions.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Most of the greatest evils that man has inflicted upon man have come through people feeling quite certain about something which, in fact, was false.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: For the imagination of man's heart is evil from his youth.
quotes.author: Bible (Genesis 8:21)

quotes.quote: Anarchy, anarchy! Show me a greater evil! / This is why cities tumble and the great houses rain down, / This is what scatters armies!
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: I know indeed what evil I intend to do, but stronger than all my afterthoughts is my fury, fury that brings upon mortals the greatest evils.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Evils draw men together.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: He who is bent on doing evil can never want occasion.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: For what is that which we call evil but the absence of good?
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Since love and fear can hardly exist together, if we must choose between them, it is far safer to be feared than loved.
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Evil is easy, and has infinite forms.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: 'Prophet!' said I, 'thing of evil! — prophet still, if bird or devil!'
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The snake stood up for evil in the Garden.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A bad cause will ever be supported by bad means and bad men.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: I couldn't claim that I have never felt the urge to explore evil, but when you descend Into hell you have to be very careful.
quotes.author: Kathleen Raine

quotes.quote: Remember that the Devil doesn’t sleep, but seeks our ruin in a thousand different ways.
quotes.author: Angela Merici

quotes.quote: It is easy — terribly easy — to shake a man’s faith in himself. To take advantage of that, to break a man’s spirit is devil's work.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: She was sinister but she was happy / With a cheery smile and poison blowpipe / Sinister but she was happy / Like a kind of spider half-inclined to free you
quotes.author: Robin Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Sinister eyes / Deciphering the prophecy / Sinister eyes / The warning of catastrophe
quotes.author: Rolf Kasparek

quotes.quote: But if you are feeling sinister / Go off and see a minister / He'll try in vain to take away the pain of being a hopeless unbeliever
quotes.author: Christopher Geddes; Isobel Campbell; Michael Cooke; Richard Colburn

quotes.quote: Something sinister to it / Pendulum swinging slow, a degenerate moving / Through the city with criminals, stealth, welcome to enemy turf / Harder than immigrants work, 'Golf' is stitched into my shirt / Get up off the pavement brush the dirt up off my psyche / Psyche, psyche
quotes.author: Thebe Kgositsile; Kehinde Hassan; Taiwo Hassan; Charles Edward Hugo

quotes.quote: When a sinister person means to be your enemy / They always start by becoming your friend
quotes.author: Lil Ithy

quotes.quote: Something sinister in the tone / Told me my secret my be known: / Word I was in the house alone / Somehow must have gotten abroad, / Word I was in my life alone, / Word I had no one left but God.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: God will hold sinners with one hand over the pit of hell, while He torments them with the other.
quotes.author: Thomas Boston

quotes.quote: He who doesn't sin, is the greatest sinner of all.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: One leak will sink a ship: and one sin will destroy a sinner.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: The worst sinner has a future, even as the greatest saint has had a past. No one is so good or bad as he imagines.
quotes.author: Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan

quotes.quote: We're all sinners. Everybody you meet all over the world is a sinner.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: It is right to hate sin, but not to hate the sinner.
quotes.author: Giovanni Guareschi

quotes.quote: There is no sinner like a young saint.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.quote: The sinner will not confess, nor will the priest receive his confession, if the veil of secrecy is removed.
quotes.author: DeWitt Clinton

quotes.quote: If you're going to be a sinner, be the best sinner on the block.
quotes.author: Anton Szandor LaVey

quotes.quote: Even the righteous man is just a sinner living in between sins.
quotes.author: Eric Jerome Dickey

quotes.quote: Sinners cannot obey the gospel, any more than the law, without renewal of heart.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: The tear of the sinner is more beloved to God than the arrogance of the righteous man.
quotes.author: Ibn Ataâ€™illah

quotes.quote: Be a sinner and sin strongly, but more strongly have faith and rejoice in Christ.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A sinner can no more repent and believe without the Holy Spirit's aid than he can create a world.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Sinners are attractive because they are loved; they are not loved because they are attractive.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: More sinners are cursed at not because we despise their sins but because we envy their success at sinning.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: The only difference between the saint and the sinner is that every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Sinners think they are saints, but saints know they are sinners.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: When a sinner has any just sense of his condition, as alienated from a holy God, he will not be apt to think of the unpardonable sin.
quotes.author: Ichabod Spencer

quotes.quote: We're all just a bunch of sinners, but we do the best we can.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Better to be known as a sinner than a hypocrite.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Only the sinner has the right to preach.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: No sinner is ever saved after the first twenty minutes of a sermon.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of men: the righteous who think they are sinners and the sinners who think they are righteous.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: There is no sin, no crime, no evil, God cannot forgive.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Wherever there are sinners, the weak, the sorrowful, the poor in the world, that is where God goes.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: The sinner sins against himself; the wrongdoer wrongs himself, becoming the worse by his own action.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The first and greatest punishment of the sinner is the conscience of sin.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: The only thing different between sinners and saints is one is forgiven and the other ain't.
quotes.author: George Jones

quotes.quote: Only the sinner has a right to preach.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Our friendship grows, yet stays the same, For sisters-in-law we became. Yet she is so much more, For she has become a sister that I adore.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Even though we live miles apart, You will always be dear to my heart. So, to you a special love I send, To not just my sister-in-law, but also my friend.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The day of the wedding our families will blend, you'll be my sister and also my friend.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I am so thankful that you are my sister-in-law. I have learned so much from you and I can honestly say that you are a blessing to our family.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sister in law by chance friends by choice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are more than a sister-in-law, you are my sister.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your sister isn’t always your blood relation, sometimes it’s that close friends who understands you, love you, and has always got your back.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sister-in-Law, you are someone that I can talk to, someone I can lean on, and someone that understands me. You are much more than just my brother’s wife, you are my friend.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I have nothing against undertakers personally. It's just that I wouldn't want one to bury my sister.
quotes.author: Jessica Mitford

quotes.quote: Of two sisters one is always the watcher, one the dancer.
quotes.author: Louise Gluck

quotes.quote: If the marriage were valid, she'd be your sister-in-law.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: And not only my own brothers and sisters agreed so but my brothers and sisters in law; and their children, although but young, had the like agreeable natures and affectionate dispositions.
quotes.author: Margaret Cavendish

quotes.quote: Sisters, as you know, also have a unique relationship. This is the person who has known you your entire life, who should love you and stand by you no matter what, and yet it's your sister who knows exactly where to drive the knife to hurt you the most.
quotes.author: Lisa See

quotes.quote: There comes a time in your life when you have to choose to turn the page, write another book or simply close it.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: You may be as different as the sun and the moon, but the same blood flows through both your hearts. You need her, as she needs you.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: To steal from a brother or sister is evil. To not steal from the institutions that are the pillars of the Pig Empire is equally immoral.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: For there is no friend like a sister in calm or stormy weather; To cheer one on the tedious way, to fetch one if one goes astray, to lift one if one totters down, To strengthen whilst one stands.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Sweet, crazy conversations full of half sentences, daydreams and misunderstandings more thrilling than understanding could ever be.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: We know one another's faults, virtues, catastrophes, mortifications, triumphs, rivalries, desires, and how long we can each hang by our hands to a bar. We have been banded together under pack codes and tribal laws.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: So many vows... they make you swear and swear. Defend the king. Obey the king. Keep his secrets. Do his bidding. Your life for his. But obey your father. Love your sister. Protect the innocent. Defend the weak. Respect the gods. Obey the laws. It’s too much. No matter what you do, you’re forsaking one vow or the other.
quotes.author: Valerie Estelle Frankel

quotes.quote: Sister is probably the most competitive relationship within the family, but once the sisters are grown, it becomes the strongest relationship.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: If you have a sister and she dies, do you stop saying you have one? Or are you always a sister, even when the other half of the equation is gone?
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: You can either give negativity power over your life or you can choose happiness instead.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Sister. She is your mirror, shining back at you with a world of possibilities. She is your witness, who sees you at your worst and best, and loves you anyway. She is your partner in crime, your midnight companion, someone who knows when you are smiling, even in the dark. She is your teacher, your defense attorney, your personal press agent, even your shrink. Some days, she's the reason you wish you were an only child.
quotes.author: Barbara Alpert

quotes.quote: I started walking at night with my sister in law which has been amazing. It really does something for you. It just kind of clears the mind, it just makes you feel better, things start to tighten a little bit.
quotes.author: Ashley Scott

quotes.quote: Well, I've seen a bunch of acupuncturists and one of my sister-in-laws is an herbalist. So I know a lot about alternative medicine. I don't know a lot about the practice but I know about the world.
quotes.author: Tim Daly

quotes.quote: Whoopi and I have been friends ever since she claimed she couldn't sing on the set of Sister Act.
quotes.author: Jenifer Lewis

quotes.quote: Is solace anywhere more comforting than in the arms of a sister.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: To lose a brother is to lose someone with whom you can share the experience of growing old, who is supposed to bring you a sister-in-law and nieces and nephews, creatures who people the tree of your life and give it new branches. To lose your father is to lose the one whose guidance and help you seek, who supports you like a tree trunk supports its branches. To lose your mother, well, that is like losing the sun above you. It is like losing--I'm sorry, I would rather not go on.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: Giggles Secrets Sometimes Tears Sisters And Friends Through The Years.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sweet is the voice of a sister in the season of sorrow.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Sisters annoy, interfere, criticize. Indulge in monumental sulks, in huffs, in snide remarks. Borrow. Break. Monopolize the bathroom. Are always underfoot. But if catastrophe should strike, sisters are there. Defending you against all comers.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: A sister can be seen as someone who is both ourselves and very much not ourselves a special kind of double.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: A sister is a gift to the heart, a friend to the spirit, a golden thread to the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Isadora James

quotes.quote: An older sister is a friend and defender - a listener, conspirator, a counselor and a sharer of delights. And sorrows too.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Is solace anywhere more comforting than that in the arms of a sister.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Sisterly love is, of all sentiments, the most abstract. Nature does not grant it any functions.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: Sisterhood is powerful. Woman can support each other as women, in their pursuit for enlightenment or anything else, without fear. But as long as she's still in the commodities exchange market, buying and selling, she must fear the competition.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: There is space within sisterhood for likeness and difference, for the subtle differences that challenge and delight; there is space for disappointment-and surprise.
quotes.author: Christine Downing

quotes.quote: Having a sister is like having a best friend you can't get rid of. You know whatever you do, they'll still be there.
quotes.author: Amy Li

quotes.quote: Women are going to form a chain, a greater sisterhood than the world has ever known.
quotes.author: Nellie L. McClung

quotes.quote: Storm Sister--a friend who sticks close when storms hit her friend's life.
quotes.author: Afton Rorvik

quotes.quote: Sisterhood means if you happen to be in Burma and I happen to be in San Diego and I'm married to someone who is very jealous and you're married to somebody who is very possessive, if you call me in the middle of the night, I have to come.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I would like more sisters, that the taking out of one, might not leave such stillness.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: We can have unity in diversity and diversity in unity. We don't have to be like one another to enjoy sisterhood.
quotes.author: Barbara W. Winder

quotes.quote: Sisterhood is a funny thing. It's easy to recognize, but hard to define.
quotes.author: Pearl Cleage

quotes.quote: You can kid the world, but not your sister.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: Maybe we tried so hard to be like the Sisterhood because it was easy for them and we wanted it to be easy for us. Because they were lucky and we wanted to be lucky too. They had wonder, and we didn't have any. We looked for the magic, but we didn't fine it. We waited for the magic, but it didn't find us.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: For there is no friend like a sister in calm or stormy weather.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: There can be no situation in life in which the conversation of my dear sister will not administer some comfort to me.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: Participating in a sisterhood with other women is hugely important in my life and a source of joy.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.quote: A sister is both your mirror and your opposite.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

quotes.quote: Long before feminism made fashion a guilty pleasure, my first experience of the sisterhood among strangers took place in a communal dressing room.
quotes.author: Judith Thurman

quotes.quote: You keep your past by having sisters. As you get older, they're the only ones who don't get bored if you talk about your memories.
quotes.author: Deborah Moggach

quotes.quote: Because there's one thing stronger than magic: sisterhood.
quotes.author: Robin Benway

quotes.quote: It was not just friendship that we are attached to each other, it was sisterhood that made that bonding between us, but now that love doesn't exist anymore as people changes with time- that's reality.
quotes.author: Debolina

quotes.quote: Sister is probably the most competitive relationship within the family, but once the sisters are grown, it becomes the strongest relationship.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: For some reason, I have better luck when I work with women. I guess I have a good sense of sisterhood.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Help one another is part of the religion of our sisterhood.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: I think women are amazing and women's friendships are like a sisterhood and we should see more of it in television and film.
quotes.author: Laurie Holden

quotes.quote: A sister can be seen as someone who is both ourselves and very much not ourselves - a special kind of double.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: A sister is a gift to the heart, a friend to the spirit, a golden thread to the meaning of life
quotes.author: Isadora James

quotes.quote: A sister is your family. a sister takes in pride with you. a sister is your respectability. A sister is like a bra in your closet. She is like a girl you can trust with all of your secrets. A sister is always by your side.
quotes.author: Kortney Cobbley

quotes.quote: A sister smiles when one tells stories - for she knows where the decoration has been added.
quotes.author: Chris Montaigne

quotes.quote: A younger sister is someone to use as a guinea-pigin trying sledges and experimental go-carts.Someone to send on messages to Mum.But someone who needs you-who comes to you with bumped heads, grazed knees, tales of persecution.Someone who trusts you to defend her.Someone who thinks you know the answers to almost everything.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: For there is no friend like a sister, in calm or stormy weather, to cheer one on the tedious way, to fetch one if one goes astray, to lift one if one totters down, to strengthen whilst one stands
quotes.author: Christina G. Rossetti

quotes.quote: How the hell do you sum up your sister in three minutes? She's your twin and your polar opposite. She's your constant companion and your competition. She's your best friend and the biggest bitch in the world. She's everything you wish you could be and everything you wish you weren't.
quotes.author: M. Molly Backes

quotes.quote: If you don't understand how a woman could both love her sister dearly and want to wring her neck at the same time, then you were probably an only child.
quotes.author: Linda Sunshine

quotes.quote: Sister. She is your mirror, shining back at you with a world of possibilities. She is your witness, who sees you at your worst and best, and loves you anyway. She is your partner in crime, your midnight companion, someone who knows when you are smiling, even in the dark. She is your teacher, your defense attorney, your personal press agent, even your shrink. Some days, she's the reason you wish you were an only child.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sisters annoy, interfere, criticize. Indulge in monumental sulks, in huffs, in snide remarks. Borrow. Break. Monopolize the bathroom. Are always underfoot. But if catastrophe should strike, sisters are there. Defending you against all comers.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Sisters are different. They heard the sobbing in the darkness.They lived through all your triumphs, all your favorites,all your loves and losses. They have no delusions.They lived with you too long.And so, when you achieve some victory, friends are delighted -but sisters hold your hands in silence and shine with happiness.For they know the cost.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Sisters don't need words. They have perfected a language of snarls and smiles and frowns and winks - expressions of shocked surprise and incredulity and disbelief. Sniffs and snorts and gasps and sighs - that can undermine any tale you're telling
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: A sister is a little bit of childhood that can never be lost.
quotes.author: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.quote: A sister is both your mirror - and your opposite.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

quotes.quote: A Sister is God's way of proving He doesn't want us to walk alone
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A sister is one who reaches for your hand and touches your heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Having a sister is like having a best friend you can't get rid of. You know whatever you do, they'll still be there.
quotes.author: Amy Li

quotes.quote: Husbands come and go; children come and eventually they go.Friends grow up and move away.But the one thing that's never lost is your sister.
quotes.author: Gail Sheeny

quotes.quote: Is solace anywhere more comforting than in the arms of a sister.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: More than Santa Claus, your sister knows when you've been bad and good.
quotes.author: Linda Sunshine

quotes.quote: Of two sisters one is always the watcher, one the dancer.
quotes.author: Louise Gluck

quotes.quote: Sister is our first friend and second mother
quotes.author: Sunny Gupta

quotes.quote: Sisters are always drying their hair. Locked into rooms, alone, they pose at the mirror, shoulders bare, trying this way and that their hair, or fly importunate down the stair to answer the telephone.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: Sisters are best friends, they are advisors, they are teachers, and best of all they are people with whom you can talk with about anything - someone you have a special bond with
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Sisters are splendid and incredible siblings who tower our life with exuberance and responsiveness at all times!
quotes.author: JD Ghai

quotes.quote: Sisters share the scent and smells - the feel of a common childhood.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Sisters touch your heart in ways no other could. Sisters share... their hopes, their fears, their love, everything they have. Real friendship springs from their special bonds.
quotes.author: Carrie Bagwell

quotes.quote: Sisters, as you know, also have a unique relationship. This is the person who has known you your entire life, who should love you and stand by you no matter what, and yet it's your sister who knows exactly where to drive the knife to hurt you the most.
quotes.author: Lisa See

quotes.quote: Sweet is the voice of a sister in the season of sorrow.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The mildest, drowsiest sister has been known to turn tiger if her sibling is in trouble
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: Whether pleasure or pain; every situation in your life serves a purpose. It is up to us to recognize what that purpose could be.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Sometimes, it takes a painful experience to make us change our ways.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every roller coaster situation in your life is there to sculpt your heart into it's best form.
quotes.author: Princess Njongo

quotes.quote: In any situation, there is a sacred solution.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Whatever your situation, God wants to heal you, strengthen you, and lead you to a place where you can enjoy life again.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: There is something in even the darkest situations that we can make a positive in our lives.
quotes.author: Deborah Norville

quotes.quote: If in a tense or nervous situation, take a moment to center and ground yourself and make a thoughtful decision. Remember that nothing is as important as it first seems.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: We need to have an understanding that no matter how difficult the situation is, the victory is ours.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Be careful before leaving someone in a sorrowing situation. Say a word of prayer with them and share even a brief word of encouragement from the Scriptures.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: No matter how messy your situation is, God can still have mercy upon your life.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: A person, who no matter how desperate the situation, gives others hope, is a true leader.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: Never make a permanent decision about a temporary situation.
quotes.author: T.D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Life is full of temporary situations, ultimately ending in a permanent solution.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: There are no desperate situations, there are only desperate people.
quotes.author: Heinz Guderian

quotes.quote: No matter how bad the situation, do not lose heart.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Your current situation is no indication of your ultimate potential
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: What's right for most people in most situations isn't right for everyone in every situation. Real morality lies in following one's own heart.
quotes.author: Embeth Davidtz

quotes.quote: Always remember that your present situation is not your final destination. The best is yet to come.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: God sends you into a situation not so that He can show He is God; but rather for you to show who you are!
quotes.author: Chris Oyakhilome

quotes.quote: Determination and willingness can change the situation when we are distructed.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: The struggle is part of your story but Everything will be in place in the right situation at a perfect time.
quotes.author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

quotes.quote: Situations pass that make our life difficult, it's the worry that stay's with us that makes us ultimately unhappy.
quotes.author: Garrison Wynn

quotes.quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Strong characters are brought out by change of situation, and gentle ones by permanence.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: Everything begins in thought and the reality is only our interpretation of the situation.
quotes.author: Marshall Sylver

quotes.quote: God always makes a way of escape from complicated situations.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Situation seems to be the mould in which men's characters are formed.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: The greatest influence you can have in any situation is to be the presence of love.
quotes.author: Robert Holden

quotes.quote: Nothing can bring you happiness but yourself especially how you choose to think about your situation.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Skate for fun, not for fame.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is a poetry of motion.
quotes.author: Stevie Williams

quotes.quote: Once you pick up a skateboard, you'll find out that it's not a hobby, it's not a sport, it's a lifestyle.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: If you skateboard, you cant be afraid to have people laugh at you.
quotes.author: Mark Gonzales

quotes.quote: We're skateboarders, and nothing big or small can stop us. Except pebbles. Pebbles are like kryptonite to us.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All skateboarding is, is putting ideas into action.
quotes.author: Marc Johnson

quotes.quote: Think about how much skateboarding opens your eyes to see the world differently.
quotes.author: Jon Humphries

quotes.quote: If skateboarding ever gets too scary for you, then you were never meant to skate in the first place.
quotes.author: Jake Phelps

quotes.quote: You can't be careful on a skateboard.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Life is a lot like skateboarding.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: In skateboarding, you're never bigger than the streets.
quotes.author: Rob Dyrdek

quotes.quote: Just skate for fun, don't pick up a skateboard because you want to be a pro one day. Don't forget why you started skating in the first place.
quotes.author: Steve Caballero

quotes.quote: When in doubt, skate it out.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You didn't quit skateboarding because you got old, you got old because you quit skateboarding.
quotes.author: Jay Adams

quotes.quote: One thing about a skater, they never quit, so a skater to sum it up is awesome.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: Skateboarding doesn't make you a skateboarder. Not being able to stop skateboarding make you a skateboarder.
quotes.author: Lance Mountain

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is a way to let your body control the mind.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Early skateboard culture had a lot of skulls.
quotes.author: Tim Robinson

quotes.quote: Skateboarding has taught me two things - that symbolise a meaning of life. How to keep a balance and how to pick yourself up when you've fallen.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: When skateboarding and punk merged, it really became a large teen subculture.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Deitch

quotes.quote: Think about how much skateboarding opens your eyes to see the world differently.
quotes.author: John Humphrys

quotes.quote: How to fool yourself into feeling younger: When you go to restaurants, always check a coat and a skateboard.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Like skateboarders, writers live by rejection; like writers, any skater worth his salt must have the single-minded tenacity of a wiener dog.
quotes.author: Bret Anthony Johnston

quotes.quote: And skateboarding, you get in trouble everywhere you go.
quotes.author: Gabe Cruz

quotes.quote: As a professional skateboarder, I can't look at anyone getting hurt - it freaks me out.
quotes.author: Rob Dyrdek

quotes.quote: Skateboarding was everything to us growing up. It changes the way you see the world you spend all day looking for ditches.
quotes.author: Harmony Korine

quotes.quote: The skateboarders are snobbier - their look is much cleaner than ravers.
quotes.author: James Jebbia

quotes.quote: Snowboarding’s tough, because you’ve got to go to the mountains. For me, I love the skateboard season because I get to hangout at home and still be skating. I don’t have to travel to Norway or Japan or these crazy places to be snowboarding.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: I like skateboarding. I'm here on this planet to skateboard; I feel this is what God wants me to do. I just live it. I get hurt all the time. I break bones. It's just all part of the process.
quotes.author: Ryan Sheckler

quotes.quote: What led me to build the first snowboard was not being able to skateboard on an icy street. So after that, it was just twelve months a year of boarding, whether it be skateboarding, snowboarding, or surfing.
quotes.author: Tom Sims

quotes.quote: Skateboarding has taught me two things - that symbolise a meaning of life. How to keep a balance and how to pick yourself up when you've fallen.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: For me skateboarding is a lifestyle, I dont really know anything different, my life revolves around skating, if I wasn't a pro skater, I'd still be skating everyday.
quotes.author: Ryan Sheckler

quotes.quote: If you skateboard, you cant be afraid to have people laugh at you.
quotes.author: Mark Gonzales

quotes.quote: I was a real skateboarder, not a gifted skateboarder. I represented that skateboarding was fun to do by being terrible at it.
quotes.author: Lance Mountain

quotes.quote: Skateboarding doesn't make you a skateboarder; not being able to stop skateboarding makes you a skateboarder.
quotes.author: Lance Mountain

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is not a hobby. And it is not a sport. Skateboarding is a way of learning how to redefine the world around you. For most people, when they saw a swimming pool, they thought, â€˜Let's take a swim.' But I thought, â€˜Let's ride it.' When they saw the curb or a street, they would think about driving on it. I would think about the texture. I slowly developed the ability to look at the world through totally different means.
quotes.author: Ian MacKaye

quotes.quote: I'll tell you one of the great activities is skateboarding. To learn to do a skateboard trick, how many times do you gotta get something wrong til you get it right? ...And you hurt yourself, and you learn to do that trick, now you got a life lesson. Every time I see those skateboard kids, I think 'those kids'll be alright.'
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: I feel like skateboarding is as much of a sport as a lifestyle, and an art form, so there's so much that that transcends in terms of music, fashion, and entertainment.
quotes.author: Tony Hawk

quotes.quote: In skateboarding, you're never bigger than the streets.
quotes.author: Rob Dyrdek

quotes.quote: All skateboarding is, is putting ideas into action.â€
quotes.author: Marc Johnson

quotes.quote: Skateboarding and that whole industry just became so far away. I was trying to find that ultimate place, that place of contentment but I couldn't. I didn't find it in pushing the dark things of life to the limit either.
quotes.author: Christian Hosoi

quotes.quote: If skateboarding ever gets too scary for you, then you were never meant to skate in the first place.
quotes.author: Jake Phelps

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is not for girls at all.
quotes.author: Nyjah Huston

quotes.quote: Skateboarding has nothing to do with competition or sport. It has to do with trying to stay as immature as you can for the rest of your life. It's kind of a lame thing to say, but it really is.
quotes.author: Lance Mountain

quotes.quote: I personally think skateboarding is harder because it has so many moving parts. With snowboarding, your feet are strapped to your board.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is training, but I don't think of it as training. It's fun.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Skateboarding was everything to us growing up. It changes the way you see the world: you spend all day looking for ditches.
quotes.author: Harmony Korine

quotes.quote: As skateboarding evolved, it evolved away from competition. Having a best-trick contest doesn't work.
quotes.author: Rob Dyrdek

quotes.quote: Think about how much skateboarding opens your eyes to see the world differently.
quotes.author: Jon Humphries

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is the best thing that ever happened to me, but it ruined my life.
quotes.author: Mike Leslie

quotes.quote: Skateboarding has a lot to offer a kid. It includes gifted athletes who work hard and take the sport seriously.
quotes.author: Todd Jett

quotes.quote: If you really want a career in professional skateboarding,you really got to stop pushing mongo.
quotes.author: Jamie Thomas

quotes.quote: Skateboarding helps a ton with balance, precision, with air awareness... it gets your senses to be spot-on and it's also a great way to take my mind off things.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is as much, or more, an art of mode of expression than it is a sport. What skateboarding has given me is precisely that: a form of expression that drew me to it, and, in so doing, I was able to express and be who I wanted to be through it, in a sense.
quotes.author: Rodney Mullen

quotes.quote: One of the interesting things about skateboarding and graffiti is that skateboarding exists in the documentation of an act.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Deitch

quotes.quote: I think skateboarding is hugely challenging - it teaches you self-confidence, it teaches you self-motivation, and it can be something that helps you throughout your life.
quotes.author: Tony Hawk

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is a way to let your body control the mind.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Skateboarding is a poetry of motion.
quotes.author: Stevie Williams

quotes.quote: When skateboarding hit, I wanted to be best skateboarder in the world, and I fought for it, there was nothing that was going to get in my way.
quotes.author: Christian Hosoi

quotes.quote: Skateboarding was the only thing I was ever good at. Growing up, I was doing that from, like, dusk till dawn.
quotes.author: D.J. Cotrona

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what happens in life, the ice is always there. It is our life, our sanctuary, and our passion.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In skating there's always another jump or another spin variation or another thing to learn, and that's what I liked about it.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.quote: If skating got into the Olympics, I would be tempted to hold off on shredding for a year and just skate, to make that my new goal. In that sport, I'm still the underdog.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Skating everywhere is unpredictable, no amount of money or facilities is going to create a skating star. You have to have a skater who is dedicated, passionate, and willing to learn.
quotes.author: Robin Cousins

quotes.quote: Skating is an amazing form of self expression. It's like my soul at play.
quotes.author: Josee Chouinard

quotes.quote: Ice skating is very difficult. It takes a lot of discipline and a lot of hard work. It's fun, but you are there on the ice every morning freezing and trying to do these moves and these tricks.
quotes.author: Michelle Trachtenberg

quotes.quote: Half of figure skating is opinion, convincing judges.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: We don't get any marks for effort like in ice-skating.
quotes.author: Kevin Keegan

quotes.quote: Figure skating is theatrical. It's artistic. It's elegant. It's extremely athletic. And there's a very specific audience for that.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.quote: When I was skating you had to participate in every thing.
quotes.author: Eric Heiden

quotes.quote: It hurts to walk but it feels pretty good to skate.
quotes.author: Chris Pronger

quotes.quote: Pairs skating and singles are two different things. Although some skaters have achieved this successfully, it is a very difficult transition. You're looking at double work.
quotes.author: Oksana Baiul

quotes.quote: Skating is in my heart, not my head.
quotes.author: Michelle Kwan

quotes.quote: In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Skating is one of those sports you unfortunately see people get stuck in.
quotes.author: Ashley Wagner

quotes.quote: Without strength and courage it's really hard to perform at the highest levels of international figure skating, because you're alone on the ice and you only have seven minutes over two nights to prove yourself.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: People think skating would translate very easily to dancing, but it really doesn't. Dancing is a lot of fun and not as dangerous as being on the ice.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.quote: Skating was put on the map, supposedly from me Everybody made a life and a livelihood, um, except me.
quotes.author: Tonya Harding

quotes.quote: Skating can make you feel athletic, graceful, beautiful.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.quote: Learn to dance in the storm so when life hands you a stormy weather, you just glide through it.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: Skating isn't about the medals or the results. I love what I do. It's much more fun to win, but you cannot every time.
quotes.author: Carolina Kostner

quotes.quote: Skating is now retro and hip.
quotes.author: Robin Cousins

quotes.quote: Ice dance should not be seen as a rigid conformist form of figure skating. There is a great deal of freedom and originality to be had.
quotes.author: Robin Cousins

quotes.quote: The mind skating circles around itself as it moves forward.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Skating was the vessel into which I could pour my heart and soul.
quotes.author: Peggy Fleming

quotes.quote: There's always that first step in skating, from dry ground to slick ice, when it just seems impossible. Impossible that two thin blades of metal will support you, impossible that because its molecules have begun to dance a little slower water will hold you up.
quotes.author: Carol Goodman

quotes.quote: A man learns to skate by staggering about and making a fool of himself. Indeed he progresses in all things by resolutely making a fool of himself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The most important thing about skating is that it teaches you to do the things you should do before you do the things you want to do.
quotes.author: Barbara Ann Scott

quotes.quote: Skating is tough to pick up when you are a grown up.
quotes.author: D. B. Sweeney

quotes.quote: Figure skating is an unlikely Olympic event but its good television. It's sort of a combination of gymnastics and ballet. A little sexy too which doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: The skeleton of success is self-discipline.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The skeleton picked up the second skull, so worn as to barely be recognisable as such. The vertebrae fell and rolled like beads from a string.
quotes.author: J.A. Clement

quotes.quote: The skeleton was as happy as a madman whose straitjacket had been taken off.
quotes.author: Leonora Carrington

quotes.quote: We turn skeletons into goddesses and look to them as if they might teach us how not to need.
quotes.author: Marya Hornbacher

quotes.quote: The skeletons of the past must not hold back the dream of a new life, even though fear and regret, guilt and remorse may unsettle us during the effort to give our future a new home.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: Everybody's got skeletons in the closets. Every once in a while, you've got to open up the closet and the let the skeletons breathe. Half the time, the very thing you think is gonna destroy you or ruin you is the very thing that nobody cares about.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.quote: It is better to have ten skeletons in your closet, than walk with no bones.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: You must befriend a few skeletons before you'll find your deepest self.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: One would think it would be most unwise in a man to be afraid of a skeleton, since Nature has set curious and quite insuperable obstacles to his running away from it.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: We need the skeletons of other stories to understand our own, sometimes.
quotes.author: Lauren Groff

quotes.quote: The world dies over and over again, but the skeleton always gets up and walks.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: There is something about a closet that makes a skeleton terribly restless.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Once we get to know where and why the skeletons of the past are buried, we can start wading across our muddled memories into the open plains of a new horizon.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: A search for the truth may unearth skeletons that were better off staying buried.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: You don't know that you'll ever have to talk about the skeleton in your closet.
quotes.author: Mark McGwire

quotes.quote: It's early days. A few skeletons are bound to keep jumping out of the closet.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: None of us is perfect. Everyone has got a skeleton in the closet that they don't want people to find out. I just let it go, with a bit of humor.
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: There is a skeleton in every house.
quotes.author: William Makepeace

quotes.quote: What can be asserted without evidence can also be dismissed without evidence.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: A skeptic is one who knows too much for a fool, and too little for a wise man.
quotes.author: H. W. SHAW

quotes.quote: Ignorance more frequently begets confidence than does knowledge: It is those who know little, not those who know much, who so positively assert that this or that problem will never be solved by science.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: The path of sound credence is through the thick forest of skepticism.
quotes.author: Geoge Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: Great intellects are skeptical.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Skepticism, riddling the faith of yesterday, prepared the way for the faith of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland

quotes.quote: I would rather have a mind opened by wonder than one closed by belief.
quotes.author: Gerry Spence

quotes.quote: It's a most distressing affliction to have a sentimental heart and a skeptical mind.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.quote: Being a skeptic doesn't just mean refraining from automatic acceptance. It includes refraining from automatic rejection as well.
quotes.author: David Smalley

quotes.quote: Skeptics always stumble at the truth.
quotes.author: Pierre Bizot

quotes.quote: Every person who has mastered a profession is a skeptic concerning it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Large skepticism leads to large understanding. Small skepticism leads to small understanding. No skepticism leads to no understanding.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I mean, you could claim that anything's real if the only basis for believing in it is that nobody's proved it doesn't exist!
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Profound skepticism is favorable to conventions, because it doubts that the criticism of conventions is any truer than they are.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Skepticism literally means a thoughtful inquiry, the looking at a problem in a disinterested spirit, the surveying of a question from many sides. In this sense it is the very essence of philosophy and science.
quotes.author: Joseph Alexander Leighton

quotes.quote: Not knowing the answer to a question is not a valid excuse for making up a fairytale to explain it.
quotes.author: Armin Navabi

quotes.quote: Inquiry and doubt are essential checks against deception, self-deception, & error.
quotes.author: Richard Carrier

quotes.quote: Skepticism is the first step on the road to philosophy.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Tell people there's an invisible man in the sky who created the universe, and the vast majority will believe you. Tell them the paint is wet, and they have to touch it to be sure.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Skepticism is the chastity of the intellect.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Skepticism is not a position that you stake out ahead of time and stick to no matter what.
quotes.author: Michael Shermer

quotes.quote: Skepticism is the agent of reason against organized irrationalism - and is therefore one of the keys to human social and civic decency.
quotes.author: Michael Shermer

quotes.quote: Skeptics, like dolphins, change when dying.
quotes.author: Lady Blessington

quotes.quote: Blind belief in authority is the greatest enemy of truth.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Even the most vaunted experts are susceptible to wishful thinking and can be blinded to a truth by a conviction that is supported more by emotional attachment than reason.
quotes.author: Daniel Dennett

quotes.quote: Skepticism is the father of freedom. It is like the pry that holds open the door for truth to slip in.
quotes.author: Gerry Spence

quotes.quote: The skeptic dows not mean him who doubts, but him who investigates or researches, as opposed to him who asserts and thinks that he has found.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Profound skepticism is favorable to conventions, because it doubts that the criticism of conventions is any truer than they are.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Skepticism can keep us from blessing, can keep us trapped in two minds.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Skepticism is an important historical tool. It is the starting point of all revision of hitherto accepted history.
quotes.author: Samuel E. Morison

quotes.quote: Skepticism is always a wise default position to start one's inquiry, but if no knowledge is being acquired, skepticism quickly morphs into stubborn ignorance.
quotes.author: Charles Hugh Smith

quotes.quote: Healthy scepticism is the basis of all accurate observation.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Skepticism must go hand in hand with rationality. When theories are shown to be false, the correct thing to do is to move on.
quotes.author: Brian Cox

quotes.quote: Skepticism precludes one from believing many things, but not from loving many things.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Skepticism literally means a thoughtful inquiry, the looking at a problem in a disinterested spirit, the surveying of a question from many sides. In this sense it is the very essence of philosophy and science.
quotes.author: Joseph Alexander Leighton

quotes.quote: Skepticism enables us to distinguish fancy from fact, to test our speculations.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Skepticism is in fact the wholly self-abrogating contradiction.
quotes.author: Michael N. Forster

quotes.quote: Skepticism about the potential to achieve the kinds of breakthroughs we need has been a self-fulfilling prophecy.
quotes.author: Ted Nordhaus

quotes.quote: In order to seek truth, it is necessary once in the course of our life to doubt, as far as possible, of all things.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Skepticism is the elegance of anxiety.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Skepticism is the chastity of the intellect.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: A universal skepticism is limited by its own criteria. If we assume it to be true, then it is false.
quotes.author: Paul Kurtz

quotes.quote: It is evident that skepticism, while it makes no actual change in man, always makes him feel better.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The key to wisdom is this constant and frequent questioning for by doubting we are led to question and by questioning we arrive at the truth.
quotes.author: Peter Abelard

quotes.quote: Skepticism is a way of freeing the dogmatic mind, and that's where its value lies.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Scepticism does not abolish the world, it turns it into questions.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Skepticism means, not intellectual doubt alone, but moral doubt.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Always doubtful is the one who always looks for certainty.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: Skepticism is the first step on the road to philosophy.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Skepticism is like a microscope whose magnification is constantly increased: the sharp image that one begins with finally dissolves, because it is not possible to see ultimate things: their existence is only to be inferred.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: Scepticism is an ability, or mental attitude, which opposes appearances to judgments in any way whatsoever, with the result that,owing to the equipollence of the objects and reasons thus opposed we are brought firstly to a state of mental suspense and next to a state of unperturbedness or quietude.
quotes.author: Sextus Empiricus

quotes.quote: Skepticism is a discipline fit to purify the mind of prejudice and render it all the more apt, when the time comes, to believe and to act wisely.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Skepticism: the mark and even the pose of the educated mind.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Scepticism is the first step towards truth.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: There is no harm in doubt and skepticism, for it is through these that new discoveries are made.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.quote: A wise skepticism is the first attribute of a good critic.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Skepticism is a useful tool of the inquisitive mind, but it is scarcely a method of investigation.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: And, as an adult, I tried skiing, and I ended up in tears.
quotes.author: Sutton Foster

quotes.quote: It's like swimming in a lake your whole life and then someone taking you to the ocean.
quotes.author: Kitt Redhead

quotes.quote: The sport of skiing consists of wearing three thousand dollars' worth of clothes and equipment and driving two hundred miles in the snow in order to stand around at a bar and get drunk.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Skiing is the pleasurable part of alpinism, way more pleasurable and fun than alpine climbing.
quotes.author: Michael Kennedy

quotes.quote: Skiing is the best way in the world to waste time.
quotes.author: Glen Plake

quotes.quote: They've been working really hard, and they've really changed their style of skiing from when they started.
quotes.author: A.J. Jones
