quotes.quote: Kids today, all they talk about is big air. I say, stay on the mountain, that's where the action is. If you want big air, pull my finger.
quotes.author: Smooth Johnson

quotes.quote: There are really only three things to learn in skiing: how to put on your skis, how to slide downhill, and how to walk along the hospital corridor.
quotes.author: Lord Mancroft

quotes.quote: I'm never tired of winning, and I'm never tired of skiing.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.quote: Skiing is the only sport where you spend an arm and a leg to break an arm and a leg.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Powder snow skiing is not fun. It's life, fully lived, life lived in a blaze of reality.
quotes.author: Dolores LaChapelle

quotes.quote: I'm looking forward to free skiing the most. Just groomers, big wide groomers making nice big turns.
quotes.author: Picabo Street

quotes.quote: When you're skiing, if you're not falling you're not trying.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as too much snow.
quotes.author: Doug Coombs

quotes.quote: Skiing makes me feel great, and it gives my legs such an incredible workout.
quotes.author: Joely Fisher

quotes.quote: There are many skiers who have chosen tele for a more compact, streamlined skiing system.
quotes.author: Paul Parker

quotes.quote: The problem with winter sports is that follow me closely here they generally take place in winter.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: The sensual caress of waist deep cold smoke, glory in skiing virgin snow, in being the first to mark the powder with the signature of their run.
quotes.author: Tim Cahill

quotes.quote: We can't control what the ratings will be. It's like, if you're going to go skiing, do you hope you'll have a good day of skiing? Yes. Do you hope you won't break your leg? Yes.
quotes.author: David Hyde Pierce

quotes.quote: Some people can never learn to ski powder snow without exerting tremendous effort and strength because they allow their rational, left-brain hemisphere to control the entire situation.
quotes.author: Delores LaChapelle

quotes.quote: Challenging snow is one of my favorite kinds of skiing, and I like being able to switch techniques at liberty.
quotes.author: Paul Parker

quotes.quote: It is better to go skiing and think of God, than go to church and think of sport.
quotes.author: Fridtjof Nansen

quotes.quote: Skiing is the conquest of the useless.
quotes.author: Glen Plake

quotes.quote: I do not participate in any sport with ambulances at the bottom of the hill.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Skiing can be thought of as a control and guidance activity, sliding down on a varying surface.
quotes.author: David W. Murrie

quotes.quote: Skiing is the next best thing to having wings.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: A person should have wings to carry them where their dreams go, but sometimes a pair of skis makes a good substitute.
quotes.author: Hans Gmoser

quotes.quote: Skiing is a dance, and the mountain always leads.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: That feeling is the same whether you're on either side of the hundredths. Obviously, it's great to win the world championship, but if you put down that kind of skiing, it's awesome either way.
quotes.author: Bode Miller

quotes.quote: I think the most important thing in skiing is you have to be having fun. If you're having fun, then everything else will come easy to you.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.quote: Talent you have naturally. Skill is only developed by hours and hours and hours of beating on your craft.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: All skills are perfected through the process of failure. Embrace loss as a necessary part of improvement.
quotes.author: Jerry Lynch

quotes.quote: Build your skills, not your resume.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Reading is the gateway skill that makes all other learning possible.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: There is great skill in knowing how to conceal one's skill.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Skills are common. Talent is rare.
quotes.author: Colin Clark

quotes.quote: Lack of skill dictates economy of style.
quotes.author: Joey Ramone

quotes.quote: The highest skill is the true judgment of values.
quotes.author: Francois Alexandre Frederic

quotes.quote: Happiness is a skill. It requires effort and time.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.quote: Leadership is a skill learned through many venues.
quotes.author: Todd Stocker

quotes.quote: Skills rest in your mind, not in the props you make use of.
quotes.author: Luke Jermay

quotes.quote: The greatest communication skill is paying value to others.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The most important skill to acquire now is learning how to learn.
quotes.author: John Naisbitt

quotes.quote: Skill is the unified force of experience, intellect and passion in their operation.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Technical skill is mastery of complexity, while creativity is mastery of simplicity.
quotes.author: Christopher Zeeman

quotes.quote: You can increase your problem-solving skills by honing your question-asking ability.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: Drawing need not be the bones of art, but skill must always be the skeleton of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Adam Gopnik

quotes.quote: All skills are learnable.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Skills make you rich, not theories.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Skill is less important than awareness.
quotes.author: Graham Collier

quotes.quote: Confidence without skill is just emptiness.
quotes.author: Erik Weihenmayer

quotes.quote: Skill and confidence are an unconquered army.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Skills are really just circuits in your brain.
quotes.author: Daniel Coyle

quotes.quote: Service skills are the foundation for your success.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: Art is skill; that is the first meaning of the word.
quotes.author: Eric Gill

quotes.quote: Motivation is a skill. It can be learned and practiced.
quotes.author: Amby Burfoot

quotes.quote: Your number one skill as a leader is the ability to influence.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Skills do not qualify or disqualify any of us from our purpose.
quotes.author: Ricky Maye

quotes.quote: Relational skills are the most important abilities in leadership.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Skills can be taught. Character you either have or you don't have.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Beauty is in the skin! Take care of it, oil it, clean it, scrub it, perfume it, and put on your best clothes, even if there is no special occasion, and you'll feel like a queen. If society is hard on you, fight back by pampering your skin. Skin is political. Otherwise why would the imams order us to hide it?
quotes.author: Fatema Mernissi

quotes.quote: Skin care is like dieting. You have to invest time and effort. There is no instant miracle cure.
quotes.author: Karen Grant

quotes.quote: Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it is up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Your skin is the fingerprint of what is going on inside your body, and all skin conditions, from psoriasis to acne to aging, are the manifestations of your body's internal needs, including its nutritional needs.
quotes.author: Dr. Georgiana Donadio

quotes.quote: Invest in your skin. It is going to represent you for a very long time.
quotes.author: Linden Tyler

quotes.quote: Be good to your skin. You'll wear it every day for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Renee Rouleau

quotes.quote: Your skin has a memory. In ten, twenty, thirty years from now, your skin will show the results of how it was treated today. So treat it kindly and with respect.
quotes.author: Jana Elston

quotes.quote: Healthy skin is crucial for providing the right canvas for applying make up, to enhance natural beauty and create natural healthy looking skin.
quotes.author: Caroline Frazer

quotes.quote: In a polite society, a well maintained skincare routine is one of life's great successes.
quotes.author: Violet Grey

quotes.quote: If you want sweeter-looking skin, sidestep the sugar. Sugar and highly refined carbohydrates, including white bread, white rice, French fries, and sugar-laded soda, can increase acne and speed aging by causing glycation-the result of sugar breaking down and bonding with protein molecules-which reduces the elasticity of collagen in your skin.
quotes.author: Leslie Baumann

quotes.quote: I'm a big believer in that if you focus on good skincare, you really won't need a lot of make-up.
quotes.author: Demi Moore

quotes.quote: The trick is to age honestly and gracefully and make it look great, so that everyone looks forward to it.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: Your skin is a reflection of how well your body is eliminating the toxins that build up on a daily basis. Chronic skin conditions such as acne, eczema and psoriasis stem from a combination of genetic factors, immune stress, dietary deficiencies or sensitivities, and the accumulation of toxins in the body. For our skin to be radiant and clear, it is very important that the other organs of elimination (kidneys, liver, lungs, and colon) are cleansing the body effectively. If not, the skin will be overtaxed, pores will become clogged, and eruptions of one sort or another will result.
quotes.author: Judyth Reichenberg-Ullman N.D.

quotes.quote: Glowing skin is a result of proper skin care. It means you can wear less make up and let skin shine through.
quotes.author: Michael Coulombe

quotes.quote: Beautiful skin requires commitment, not a miracle.
quotes.author: Erno Laszlo

quotes.quote: Take good care of your skin and hydrate. If you have good skin, everything else will fall into place.
quotes.author: Liya Kebede

quotes.quote: What is your skin trying to tell you? Often the skin is a metaphor for deeper issues and a way for your body to send up a red flag to warn you that all is not well underneath. When our skin is unhealthy it is usually a reflection of the internal state of our bodies, and is often a sign of poor elimination of toxins and waste products.
quotes.author: Judyth Reichenberg-Ullman N.D.

quotes.quote: It's not just what substances you put on your skin. Inappropriate inflammation is rooted in diet, how you handle stress, how you rest and your exposure to environmental toxins.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.quote: You're never too old to become younger.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Healthy skin is a reflection of overall wellness.
quotes.author: Dr. Murad

quotes.quote: The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural.
quotes.author: Calvin Klein

quotes.quote: Beauty is an experience, nothing else. It is not a fixed pattern or an arrangement of features. It is something felt, a glow or a communicated sense of fineness.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: There are no ugly women, only lazy ones.
quotes.author: Helena Rubinstein

quotes.quote: You must never underestimate the power of the eyebrow.
quotes.author: Jack Black

quotes.quote: I’m tired of all this nonsense about beauty being only skin-deep. That’s deep enough. What do you want, an adorable pancreas?
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Be patient. Your skin took a while to deteriorate. Give it some time to reflect a calmer inner state. As one of my friends states on his Facebook profile: "The true Losers in Life, are not those who Try and Fail, but those who Fail to Try.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: I think that the most important thing a woman can have next to talent, of course, is her hairdresser.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: As long as I don't end up hosting a skin care commercial with Cher, I'm happy.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: I don't like standard beauty - there is no beauty without strangeness
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: I chose a man slender and skinny.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: A skinny, starving stray; it looked so pitifully small, a fluff of silver grey.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Little skinny shoulder-blades sticking through your clothes! And where you'll get a jacket from God above knows.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: To see the skinny hag in black who boosts you up the curb.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: People who are skinny-fat may be thin, but they have no muscle tone and a high percentage of body fat.
quotes.author: Danielle Milano

quotes.quote: Skinny legs like I always wanted sister look at me again. You'd love me if I were as skinny as him.
quotes.author: Lyle Lovett

quotes.quote: I don't get fat, I get skinny.
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: You want to be skinny and have a good body? You have to work out every day and say no to certain foods.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.quote: Rising like gulls. Then, with a finger skinny.
quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quotes.quote: We'll all stay skinny 'cause we just won't eat.
quotes.author: Nickelback

quotes.quote: It's important to be fit, but you shouldn't get too skinny. You need to have curves.
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.quote: Most of us are either too thin to enjoy eating. or too fat to enjoy walking.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If you want to get fat, don't eat fast; if you want to get thin. don't eat fast.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If you are a skinny, baby-faced teenager, the last thing you want to hear is that you're cute.
quotes.author: Jamie Dornan

quotes.quote: Statistically, skinny women die younger than fat women. Why? Because fat women are killing them.
quotes.author: Joy Behar

quotes.quote: Thin people are beautiful, but fat people are adorable.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: If you want to be skinny, do what skinny people do.
quotes.author: Brian Wansink

quotes.quote: Skinny jeans were only good if you had skinny genes.
quotes.author: Matt Dunn

quotes.quote: Being slim is the new elitism. Thinness today says that you are richer, smarter, and more successful than the overweight masses.
quotes.author: David Zinczenko

quotes.quote: Skinny women don't enjoy being told they're skinny nowadays. They enjoy telling you how they got that way, as though starvation were an achievement.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: Skinny guys fight till they're burger.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: You want to be skinny and have a good body? You have to work out every day and say no to certain foods.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.quote: Me being a skinny guy, I could crawl into the steel pit.
quotes.author: Luther Allison

quotes.quote: Skinny is only one body type.
quotes.author: Susie Orbach

quotes.quote: If we're talking about being skinny or losing weight, I don't have that problem; it's genetics.
quotes.author: Natalia Vodianova

quotes.quote: Life's true face is the skull.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Your skull encloses your brains. But never forget that anytime you open your mouth to talk, you have opened your mind for the entire world to see what is hidden in there!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Nothing is tough but your skull so think out of the skull box and let the thoughts fly.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: Skulls, are being empty skulls / Filling their empty lungs / With the wrong kind of drugs / Baby what have we become / Are being empty skulls
quotes.author: Arejay Hale

quotes.quote: And when you're gone there won't be anything behind / Except a skull, a suitcase and a long red bottle of wine / A skull, a suitcase, and a long red bottle of wine
quotes.author: Robyn Hitchcock

quotes.quote: The skull has had a place in the history of art since the earliest dawning of human expression, as a reminder to appreciate the gift of life.
quotes.author: Noah Scalin

quotes.quote: Skull bones are strong to protect you brain. You can't move these bones.
quotes.author: Jody Sullivan Rake

quotes.quote: The skull is the most complex portion of the skeleton and is of major importance in human osteology.
quotes.author: Tim D. White

quotes.quote: The complexity of the human skull can best be understood by recognizing the widely differing functions it performs. It forms the bony foundation for the senses of sight, smell, taste, and hearing. It houses and protects the brain.
quotes.author: Tim D. White

quotes.quote: The skull protects the brain, eyes and ears. It is made from twenty two bones most of which are fused together.
quotes.author: David B. Wright

quotes.quote: Modern human skulls are characterized by a relatively small vertically set face, a high forehead, and a large braincase.
quotes.author: Esteban E. Sarmiento

quotes.quote: People in modern Western society perceive the human skull as a symbol of death.
quotes.author: Jaap van Etten

quotes.quote: But in other cultures, especially those that do not fear death, a skull is celebrated because it is a symbol of rebirth, of transitioning into another life.
quotes.author: Jaap van Etten

quotes.quote: Start not—nor deem my spirit fled: / In me behold the only skull / From which, unlike a living head, / Whatever flows is never dull.
quotes.author: George Gordon Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Fleshless skull from fleshless skull, / Arrogant from beautiful; / Nameless relics of a name:- / I alone abide the same.'
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: People are fascinated by skulls. Perhaps this is because the skull defines the seeing-smelling-bitting-eating end of a creature and, therefore, its 'personality.'
quotes.author: Glenn Searfoss

quotes.quote: Moe than any other skeletal feature, the skull is a great source of information about an animal's environment lifestyle.
quotes.author: Glenn Searfoss

quotes.quote: The skull--mortality unmasked. The opposite of the mask is the skull.
quotes.author: Antony C. Sutton

quotes.quote: The skull protects our brain and forms the framework for our head and face.
quotes.author: Kirti Behal

quotes.quote: The skull plays an important role in the body. The skull protects the delicate sense organs.
quotes.author: Lina Sequeira

quotes.quote: The skull is nature's sculpture.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.quote: The interior of our skulls contains a portal to infinity.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: Sometimes skulls are thick. Sometimes hearts are vacant. Sometimes words don't work.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: I don't mind if my skull ends up on a shelf as long as it's got my name on it.
quotes.author: Debbie Harry

quotes.quote: Why is the human skull as dense as it is? Nowadays we can send a message around the world in one-seventh of a second, but it takes years to drive an idea through a quarter-inch of human skull.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: There is great treasure there behind our skull and this is true about all of us. This little treasure has great great powers and I would say we only have learnt a very very small part of what it can do.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: In our skulls, we carry around 3 pounds of slimy, wet, greyish tissue, corrugated like crumpled toilet paper. You wouldn't think, to look at the unappetizing lump, that it was some of the most powerful stuff in the known universe.
quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quotes.quote: My skull is crammed with quotations.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: There are two dilemmas that rattle the human skull: How do you hang on to someone who won't stay? And how do you get rid of someone who won't go?
quotes.author: Danny DeVito

quotes.quote: Man's skull represents the same infinity for the movement of conceptions. It is equal to the universe, for in it is contained all that sees in it.
quotes.author: Kazimir Malevich

quotes.quote: If I could stand in an open airplane doorway two-and-a-half miles above the ground and will myself to step into empty space, then I could do anything.
quotes.author: Dave Stein

quotes.quote: To those that jump, no explanation is necessary. To those that don't jump, no explanation is possible.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Any idiot can fly a plane, but it takes a special kind of idiot to jump out of one.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Some guy once told me that skydiving is like cutting your throat and seeing if you can get to the doctor before you bleed to death.
quotes.author: Brock Yates

quotes.quote: If you surrender to the wind, you can ride it.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Once you have tasted the taste of sky, you will forever look up.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Sometimes we have to get really high to see how small we are.
quotes.author: Felix Baumgartner

quotes.quote: You do not need a parachute to skydive. You need a parachute to skydive twice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If skydiving were safe, the parachute center would not require you to sign a waiver.
quotes.author: Dan Poynter

quotes.quote: When the people look like ants pull! When the ants look like people, pray.
quotes.author: Frosty Woolridge

quotes.quote: Some people need to skydive without a parachute.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Skydivers are people who enjoy falling down.
quotes.author: Allen Roulston

quotes.quote: Only skydivers know why the birds sing. They never have to pack a parachute
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Skydiving is a rather safe affair, provided you have a parachute.
quotes.author: Nicholas J. Nigro

quotes.quote: Those who don't jump will never fly.
quotes.author: Leena Ahmad Almashat

quotes.quote: Skydivers: good to the last drop.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I've never been skydiving, but I have zoomed-in on Google Earth really fast.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To the skydiver, 'flying' in a plane is akin to 'swimming' in a boat; they live for the wind whipping past as they plummet toward the earth during free fall, and the thrill of floating on the air currents once their 'chutes are safely open. They live on the edge, though not in danger -- amid the elements, but not at their mercy.
quotes.author: Ray Bangs

quotes.quote: You should read the skydiving waiver before you sign, if only to see how many different ways there are to describe 'death by falling.' If anything will convince you not to skydive, it's that waiver.
quotes.author: Dan Oshinsky

quotes.quote: Out of ten thousand feet of fall, always remember that the last half inch hurts the most.
quotes.author: Charles W.Purcell

quotes.quote: All I can say that I felt freedom. Skydiving is intoxicating more than marijuana/alcohol or any drug on this planet. It's enough to mess with your mind!
quotes.author: Anamika Ojha

quotes.quote: There is an art ... or rather, a knack to flying. The knack lies in learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: More than a sport, skydiving is a lifestyle, a communal activity like scuba diving or surfing -- one that attracts people of all walks of life with one thing: the kind of freedom you just can't find in cubicles or workstations.
quotes.author: Ray Bangs

quotes.quote: In skydiving, it is the fear response that gradually weakens. During the precipitous descent, the amply tested parachutist can savor the thrill rather than endure the panic.
quotes.author: Dean Keith Simonton

quotes.quote: People always ask me if skydiving is safe and all that. People die skydiving. Everybody knows that. It's not a secret. People have died skydiving. We try to take out the risk as much as we can and we have done it safely for seven years on this island. Of 7,000 people I have taken up, three people rode the airplane down.
quotes.author: Frank Shisler

quotes.quote: Skydiving is like making love to the world.
quotes.author: Fausto Brizzi

quotes.quote: By the time you reach your skydiving height, you will actually be excited to leave that airplane for the safety of a parachute.
quotes.author: Dan Oshinsky

quotes.quote: You oughta try it. You might learn something. You know, I was skydiving once and my main chute, it didn't open. I pulled my reserve and it didn't open either. There I was, plunging to the earth. Just as I hit the treetops I discovered the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Valerie Curtin

quotes.quote: Skydiving. Apparently, it's all about the landing.
quotes.author: Jeff Davis

quotes.quote: Parenthood is like skydiving. You just gotta jump out of the old plane.
quotes.author: Chuck Lorre

quotes.quote: Because everyone is the same distance from the sun. Does it really lessen the distance if you live on top of a skyscraper?
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: By night the skyscraper looms in the smoke and the stars and has a soul.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: From torched skyscrapers, men grew wings.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: Our concern is not how to worship in the catacombs but how to remain human in the skyscrapers.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: The skyscraper and the twentieth century are synonymous; the tall building is the landmark of our age. ... Shaper of cities and fortunes, it is the dream, past and present, acknowledged or unacknowledged, of almost every architect.
quotes.author: Ada Louise Huxtable

quotes.quote: Manhattan has no choice but the skyward extrusion of the Grid itself; only the Skyscraper offers business the wide-open spaces of a man-made Wild West, a frontier in the sky.
quotes.author: Rem Koolhaas

quotes.quote: Manhattan, one of the most moneyed spots on the planet, also has one of the greatest concentrations of people in its skyscrapers. Its also, of course, the place where every architect wants to build his tower.
quotes.author: Norman Foster

quotes.quote: Doing a house is so much harder than doing a skyscraper.
quotes.author: Philip Johnson

quotes.quote: Behind every skyscraper is a woman. You dress them up and make them beautiful.
quotes.author: Polan Banks

quotes.quote: They're knocking down buildings all over New York, and for what? More skyscrapers!
quotes.author: Peter S. Fischer

quotes.quote: It's engraved in our souls. But we've traded the wilderness for pavement, trees, for skyscrapers. We've lost touch with our instincts, with what we are. We have fallen from nature's grace.
quotes.author: James Manos Jr.

quotes.quote: Skyscrapers like this all over the country! You design 'em, I'll build 'em.
quotes.author: Richard Martin Stern

quotes.quote: When wind on an earthquake hits the skyscraper, it starts to move back and forth. This cause the pendulum to oscillate as well - but in opposite direction to the tower.
quotes.author: Roma Agrawal

quotes.quote: Cause even then I was infatuated with just sitting at the top / And I don't owe nobody in the world no favors / I started from the basement, made it to the skyscrapers
quotes.author: Big Sean

quotes.quote: Skyscraper / You define the skyline / Opposite the grapevine / Where crows and rumors fly
quotes.author: Train

quotes.quote: Skyscrapers… remote, unpartisan / Turning neither to the right nor left / Your imperturbable fronts… / Austerely greeting the sun / With one chilly finger of stone….
quotes.author: Lola Ridge

quotes.quote: Of course the ambitions behind the construction of a skyscraper and the desire for its possession are generally as out sized as the building itself.
quotes.author: Elise Lemire

quotes.quote: The skyscraper continues to serve as a global barometer of urbanized and the accumulation of wealth and power.
quotes.author: Elise Lemire

quotes.quote: Indeed, whether the shifts in wealth, corporate structure, architecture taste, technological innovation, and developments in urbanization take us, they take us to the skyscraper.
quotes.author: Elise Lemire

quotes.quote: The beauty of a great skyscraper comes from resolving seemingly contradictory problems. It must be sturdy, yet it must be economical to build; it must be beautiful, but it must also be suitable for use by thousands of people over many decades.
quotes.author: Leonard Joseph

quotes.quote: We often think of skyscrapers when we think of cities because modern cities are defined by skyscrapers.
quotes.author: Leonard Joseph

quotes.quote: A skyscraper uses more vertical space, or air space, than it does space on the ground, by stacking floors on top of each other.
quotes.author: Leonard Joseph

quotes.quote: The leading 'real' asset owned by many financial institutions, along with gold, is buildings.
quotes.author: David Crichton

quotes.quote: Tall buildings are among the most forceful and defining characteristics of the American urban landscape.
quotes.author: George H. Douglas

quotes.quote: The skyscraper has made an indelible impression on the civilization that created it; it is every bit as much a part of American culture as the great cathedrals were a part of the Middle Ages.
quotes.author: George H. Douglas

quotes.quote: Skyscrapers, as they have been called for the better part of the century, are a distinctly modern style of architecture, and an American style in their origin.
quotes.author: George H. Douglas

quotes.quote: The skyscraper is essentially an intensive tall building on a small foot-print site that optimizes on its unusually small land area.
quotes.author: The concrete Society

quotes.quote: Because of its hugeness and intensiveness, the skyscraper is analogues to the city itself. It is virtually a city in itself, that is a 'city-in-the-sky.'
quotes.author: The concrete Society

quotes.quote: Tall buildings and cities are inseparable and complement each other.
quotes.author: Kheir Al-Kodmany

quotes.quote: Undoubtedly, tall buildings and cities need to be sustainable. Unsustainability has become outdated in every sphere of our life, and cities where we live are no exception.
quotes.author: Kheir Al-Kodmany

quotes.quote: The tongue of slander is too prompt with wanton malice to wound the stranger.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: It is not wise to keep the fire going under a slander unless you can get some large advantage out of keeping it alive. Few slanders can stand the wear of silence.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Slander meets no regard from noble minds; only the base believe what the base only utter.
quotes.author: John Bellers

quotes.quote: Slander is the tool of cowards.Â
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: Slander by the stream will be heard by the frogs.
quotes.author: Mozambican Proverb

quotes.quote: Slander, whose whisper over the world's diameter, as level as the cannon to its blank, transports its poisoned shot.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Slander piles itself before the door of a widow.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: If slander be a snake, it is a winged one, it flies as well as creeps.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: The proper way to check slander is to despise it; attempt to overtake and refute it, and it will outrun you.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: Slander is an admission that you don't have anything else worthwhile to say. It is a clear indication of both your personal emotional bankruptcy and the paucity of whatever arguments you are advancing.
quotes.author: Rebecca Hamilton

quotes.quote: If you think you can slander a woman into loving you, or a man into voting for you, try it till you are satisfied.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Remember, when incited to slander, that it is only he among you who is without sin that may cast the first stone.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: A slander is like a hornet; if you can't kill it dead the first time, better not strike at it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Slander, in the strict meaning of the term, comes under the head of lying; but it is a kind of lying which, like its antithesis flattery, ought to be set apart for special censure.
quotes.author: Washington Gladden

quotes.quote: Slander is more deadly than weapons; weapons wound from close range, slander hurts from a distance.
quotes.author: Hebrew Proverb

quotes.quote: Slander is the revenge of a coward, and dissimulation of his defense.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Slander is a secret propensity of the mind to think ill of men, and afterwards to utter such sentiments in scandalous expressions.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: Slanders issuing from red and beautiful lips, are like foul and ugly spiders crawling from the blushing heart of a rose.
quotes.author: George Denison Prentice

quotes.quote: Whoever listens to slander is himself a slanderer.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Slander is a most serious evil; it implies two who do wrong, and one who is doubly wronged.
quotes.author: Herod the Great

quotes.quote: TheÂ slandersÂ of the pen pierce to the heart; they rankle longest in the noblest spirits; they dwell ever present in the mind and render it morbidly sensitive to the most trifling collision.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Slander cannot destroy an honest man, when the flood recedes the rock is there.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Quick-circulating slanders mirth afford; and reputation bleeds in every word.Â
quotes.author: Charles Churchill

quotes.quote: Slander is a poison which kills charity, both in the slanderer and the one who listens.Â
quotes.author: Bernard of Clairvaux

quotes.quote: Slander slays three people: the speaker, the spoken to, and the spoken of.
quotes.author: Hebrew Proverb

quotes.quote: When the debate is lost, slander becomes the tool of the loser.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Slander lives upon succession, for ever housed where it gets possession.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Slander-mongers and those who listen to slander, if I had my way, would all be strung up, the talkers by the tongue, the listeners by the ears.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Have patience awhile; slanders are not long-lived. Truth is the child of time; erelong she shall appear to vindicate thee.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Slander is a vice that strikes a double blow; wounding both him that commits, and him against whom it is committed.
quotes.author: Bernard-Joseph Saurin

quotes.quote: A slap in the face is more effective than ten lectures. It makes you understand very quickly.
quotes.author: Leopold Von Sacher-Masoch

quotes.quote: Every time we get slapped down, we can say, 'Thank you Mother Nature,' because it means we’re about to learn something important.
quotes.author: John N. Bahcall

quotes.quote: Sometimes, life slaps you in the face with beauty, screaming at you to take notice. Other times, it whispers in your ear and just suggests that you stop, look up, and take a deep breath.
quotes.author: Tyler Knot Gregson

quotes.quote: Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it twenty-four hours a day.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: Those who were so long imprisoned in ice and darkness seem to find the sunlight jarring, painful. The longer I walk around with this grief inside me, the more I understand that. It's as if sunshine is a slap in the face that says, Look, the world's all bright and shiny! Too bad you're not.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: It slaps your dignity just right. I loved the idea of these proud, dignified black men, and I saw the older ones wounded, and it wounded me ten times as much because I couldn't stand seeing them hurt like this.
quotes.author: Quincy Jones

quotes.quote: When life slaps you upside the head, it's time to make a change.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When life slaps you in the face, fall over and pretend you are dead so it won't kick you.
quotes.author: Alex Craige

quotes.quote: Embrace change, even when the change slaps you in the face.
quotes.author: Walter Breuning

quotes.quote: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Many times life will hit you hard, knock you down, and hurt you. Persevere, never give up, and do your best to get up and keep going.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: Life will hit you hard in the face, wait for you to get back up just so it can kick you in the stomach. But getting the wind knocked out of you is the only way to remind your lungs how much they like the taste of air.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: You have right to be angry, insult and slap. But later you have to forgive.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: I've seen ‘karma' slap people in the face. You have to be good to people. It really does come around
quotes.author: Kirsten Dunst

quotes.quote: Sometimes, life slaps me on my face. I try not to loose my balance, or stay overwhelmed for long..For life might proceed to kick me.
quotes.author: Mrinmayee Bagwe

quotes.quote: Sometimes those fears creep into the back of your head, but then you slap yourself and think, 'Oh, woe is me! People actually like me.' What a silly thing to worry about. This is a huge opportunity, and I'm excited.
quotes.author: Ben McKenzie

quotes.quote: Awkwardness is a warning against complacency. A connection with the incomprehensible achieved only through immersion in contemporary life, a moment of awareness of the gap between your perception and understanding. It is the urbane corollary to the antique sublime: the social vista that slaps you in the face with the breadth of what you still don't understand.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A difficult time can be more readily endured if we retain the conviction that our existence holds a purpose – a cause to pursue, a person to love, a goal to achieve.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: Life’s challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they’re supposed to help you discover who you are.
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

quotes.quote: I'll tell you something about tough times. They just about kill you, but if you decide to keep working at them, you'll find your way through.
quotes.author: Joan Bauer

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: Willingly no one chooses the yoke of slavery.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Slavery is what slavery's always been: About one person controlling another person using violence and then exploiting them economically, paying them nothing. That's what slavery's about.
quotes.author: Kevin Bales

quotes.quote: Slavery is theft -- theft of a life, theft of work, theft of any property or produce, theft even of the children a slave might have borne.
quotes.author: Kevin Bales

quotes.quote: Those who deny freedom to others, deserve it not for themselves
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Today as always, men fall into two groups: slaves and free men. Whoever does not have two-thirds of his day for himself, is a slave, whatever he may be: a statesman, a businessman, an official, or a scholar.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To be given dominion over another is a hard thing; to wrest dominion over another is a wrong thing; to give dominion of yourself to another is a wicked thing.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Slavery is so intolerable a condition that the slave can hardly escape deluding himself into thinking that he is choosing to obey his master's commands when, in fact, he is obliged to. Most slaves of habit suffer from this delusion and so do some writers, enslaved by an all too personal style.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Men would rather be starving and free than fed in bonds.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: Slavery is a weed that grows on every soil.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Slavery is founded in the selfishness of man's nature - opposition to it, is his love of justice. These principles are an eternal antagonism; and when brought into collision so fiercely, as slavery extension brings them, shocks, and throes, and convulsions must ceaselessly follow.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Free labor has the inspiration of hope; pure slavery has no hope.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Slavery is founded in the selfishness of man's nature - opposition to it, is his love of justice. These principles are an eternal antagonism; and when brought into collision so fiercely, as slavery extension brings them, shocks, and throes, and convulsions must ceaselessly follow.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Captivity is the greatest of all evils that can befall one.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Most people seek after what they do not possess and are enslaved by the very things they want to acquire.
quotes.author: Anwar El-Sadat

quotes.quote: Slavery can only be abolished by raising the character of the people who compose the nation; and that can be done only by showing them a higher one.
quotes.author: Maria Weston Chapman

quotes.quote: Some slaves are scoured to their work by whips, others by their restlessness and ambition.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The slave is doomed to worship time and fate and death, because they are greater than anything he finds in himself, and because all his thoughts are of things which they devour.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Some slaves are scoured to their work by whips, others by their restlessness and ambition.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: There is a kind of sluggish resignation, as well as poorness and degeneracy of spirit, in a state of slavery, that very few will recover themselves out of it.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Slavery is a state so improper, so degrading, and so ruinous to the feelings and capacities of human nature, that it ought not to be suffered to exist.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Death is natural to a man, but slavery unnatural; and the moment you strip a man of his liberty you strip him of all his virtues: you convert his heart into a dark hole, in which all the vices conspire against you.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: I didn't know I was a slave until I found out I couldn't do the things I wanted.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Better to starve free than be a fat slave.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The moment the slave resolves that he will no longer be a slave, his fetters fall. Freedom and slavery are mental states.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The good man, though a slave, is free; the wicked, though he reigns, is a slave, and not the slave of a single man, but what is worse the slave of as many masters as he has vices.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Man is free; yet we must not suppose that he is at liberty to do everything he pleases, for he becomes a slave the moment he allows his actions to be ruled bypassion.
quotes.author: Giacomo Casanova

quotes.quote: No man can put a chain about the ankle of his fellow man without at last finding the other end fastened about his own neck.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: There is no king who has not had a slave among his ancestors, and no slave who has not had a king among his.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The man who does not do his own thinking is a slave, and is a traitor to himself and his fellow men.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Mental slavery is mental death, and every man who has given up his intellectual freedom is the living coffin of his dead soul.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Smile and Slay. You have to slay it in life or life will slay you.
quotes.author: Janna Cachola

quotes.quote: Man's greatest joy is to slay his enemy, plunder his riches, ride his steeds, see the tears of his loved ones and embrace his women
quotes.author: Genghis Khan

quotes.quote: Stress is an important dragon to slay - or at least tame - in your life.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.quote: THE ART OF PEACE is not easy. It is a fight to the finish, the slaying of evil desires and all falsehood within. On occasion the voice of peace resounds like thunder, jolting human beings out of their stupor.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: It was beyond embarrassing or humiliating or even mortifying. It was ego-slaying!
quotes.author: Wendelin Van Draanen

quotes.quote: Life is too short to occupy oneself with the slaying of the slain more than once.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: A sword by itself does not slay; it is merely the weapon used by the slayer.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Treasures are not won by care and forethought but by swift slaying and reckless attack.
quotes.author: Michael Moorcock

quotes.quote: Anyone can slay a dragon, he told me, but try waking up every morning and loving the world all over again. That's what takes a real hero.
quotes.author: Brian Andreas

quotes.quote: Now that you've reached everything, you must slay this illusion without slaying it - without becoming caught up in the illusion of slaying illusions.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Only with absolute fearlessness can we slay the dragons of mediocrity that invade our gardens.
quotes.author: George Lois

quotes.quote: Mistrust all men, and slay him whom thou mistrustest overmuch; and as for women, flee from them, for they are evil, and in the end will destroy thee.
quotes.author: H. Rider Haggard

quotes.quote: Once you slay one fear, you can conquer many fears.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Let not our longing slay the appetite of our living.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.quote: The mind is the slayer of the real, let the disciples slay the slayer.
quotes.author: H. P. Blavatsky

quotes.quote: Praise a fool, and slay him; for the canvas of his vanity is spread;
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Until we have met the monsters in ourselves, we keep trying to slay them in the outer world.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Boredom slays more of existence than war.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Help means ruin and saving means slaying.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Slaying the dragon of delay is no sport for the short-winded.
quotes.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

quotes.quote: Every addiction is an attempt to slay hope.
quotes.author: Dan B. Allender

quotes.quote: Let necessity, and not your will, slay the enemy who fights against you.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Where's the point in fighting and slaying if you can make a friend out of anybeast instead of a foe?
quotes.author: Brian Jacques

quotes.quote: A poet can write about a man slaying a dragon, but not about a man pushing a button that releases a bomb.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Face the giants in your life, slay them, and move on. Do not be daunted by the mistakes and failures in your life.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Slay that dragon once, and he will never have power over you again.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: The star player must slay his ego and learn teamwork and communication skills before he can achieve the ultimate in sport.
quotes.author: Walt Frazier

quotes.quote: The great tragedy of science - the slaying of a beautiful hypothesis by an ugly fact.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: There were dragons to slay in the old days.
quotes.author: Pat Oliphant

quotes.quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Sleep, those little slices of death - how I loathe them.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: I've always envied people who sleep easily. Their brains must be cleaner, the floorboards of the skull well swept, all the little monsters closed up in a steamer trunk at the foot of the bed.
quotes.author: David Benioff

quotes.quote: I want to go to sleep in my time machine and wake up eight hours in the future.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Sleeping is no mean art: for its sake one must stay awake all day.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There is more refreshment and stimulation in a nap, even of the briefest, than in all the alcohol ever distilled.
quotes.author: Edward Lucas

quotes.quote: The repose of sleep refreshes only the body. It rarely sets the soul at rest. The repose of the night does not belong to us. It is not the possession of our being. Sleep opens within us an inn for phantoms. In the morning we must sweep out the shadows.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: Sleep is perverse as human nature,Sleep is perverse as legislature....So people who go to bed to sleepMust count French premiers or sheep,And people who ought to arise from bedYawn and go back to sleep instead.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Sleep is the interest we have to pay on the capital which is called in at death; and the higher the rate of interest and the more regularly it is paid, the further the date of redemption is postponed.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Sleep is the golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.quote: The worst thing in the world is to try to sleep and not to.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Sleep lingers all our lifetime about our eyes, as night hovers all day in the boughs of the fir-tree.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sleep, that deplorable curtailment of the joy of life.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Not being able to sleep is terrible. You have the misery of having partied all night... without the satisfaction.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: The feeling of sleepiness when you are not in bed, and can't get there, is the meanest feeling in the world.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Sleep is the most moronic fraternity in the world, with the heaviest dues and the crudest rituals.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: And if tonight my soul may find her peacein sleep, and sink in good oblivion,and in the morning wake like a new-opened flowerthen I have been dipped again in God, and new-created.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Early to bed and early to rise probably indicates unskilled labor.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: Sleep: a poor substitute for caffeine!
quotes.author: Wally Shawn

quotes.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you; snore, and you sleep alone!
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: To achieve the impossible dream, try going to sleep.
quotes.author: Joan Klempner

quotes.quote: To sleep is an act of faith.
quotes.author: Barbara G. Harrison

quotes.quote: He who sleeps half a day has won half a life.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Sleep is a symptom of caffeine deprivation.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't fight with the pillow, but lay down your head and kick every worriment out of the bed.
quotes.author: Edmund Vance Cooke

quotes.quote: I love to sleep. Do you? Isn't it great? It really is the best of both worlds. You get to be alive and unconscious.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Saturday's night sleep is the best sleep according to me because not any tension for the work of Sunday.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People who say they sleep like a baby usually don't have one.
quotes.author: Leo J. Burke

quotes.quote: Being slim is the new elitism. Thinness today says that you are richer, smarter and more successful than the overweight masses.
quotes.author: David Zinczenko

quotes.quote: My advice if you insist on slimming: Eat as much as you like — just don't swallow it.
quotes.author: Harry Secombe

quotes.quote: Even overweight cats instinctively know the cardinal rule: when fat, arrange yourself in slim poses.
quotes.author: John Weitz

quotes.quote: Skeletons of mice are often to be found in coconuts, for it is easier to get in, slim and greedy, than to get out, appeased but fat.
quotes.author: Viktor Korchnoi

quotes.quote: Some people can eat anything they want and stay slim. I put on weight just by reading the recipe.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Slim, a term to be used only when you want to judge the chances of you getting away from the onset of feminism; not her figure. Fat, a term to be used only when you want to discuss the nutrition content; not to bully another.
quotes.author: Jhelum Anikhindi

quotes.quote: I don't have slim children. I have hearty ones.
quotes.author: Jessica Capshaw

quotes.quote: I know I don't look like the skinny slender model. I know I look a little different but people like to watch me for some reason. It feels good and I'm humbled by it.
quotes.author: Gina Carano

quotes.quote: She ran her hands over her body as if to bid it good-bye. The hipbones rising from a shrunken stomach were razor-sharp. Would they be lost in a sea of fat? She counted her ribs bone by bone. Where would they go?
quotes.author: Steven Levenkron

quotes.quote: The media made the masses to find not-so-skinny women appear not-so-beautiful … in the eyes of the remote holder.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Many of us are tethered to bodies that sabotage us in our struggle to keep from getting fat, or to slim down when we do.
quotes.author: Robin Marantz Henig

quotes.quote: How come “fat chance” and “slim chance” mean the same thing?
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: Soon I'll be thinner than all of you, she swore to herself. And then I'll be the winner. The thinner is the winner.
quotes.author: Steven Levenkron

quotes.quote: It's easier to put on slippers than to carpet the whole world.
quotes.author: Al Franken

quotes.quote: He's really a pipe-and-slippers kind of guy — lead pipe and hobnail slippers.
quotes.author: Mark Russell

quotes.quote: Affections are like slippers; they will wear out.
quotes.author: Edgar Saltus

quotes.quote: Your slippers last a lot longer in your bedroom. On a film set, they do get very scuffed up.
quotes.author: Martin Freeman

quotes.quote: One of the shining moments of my day is that when, having returned a little weary form an afternoon walk, I exchange boots for slippers, out-of-doors coat for easy, familiar, shabby jacket, and, in my deep, soft-elbowed chair, await the tea-tray.
quotes.author: George Gissing

quotes.quote: God never promises us an easy journey in carpet slippers
quotes.author: David Bentley

quotes.quote: As the sky prepares to settle its tired, aching feet into the night’s velvet slippers I settle, into my armchair, soaking the teabag, of my thoughts, into warm liquidy stars.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: If it weren't for you, mornings wouldn't be so comforting - slippers wouldn't scrape through the rooms of my heart
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: Closets held shoes, handbags, silk stockings and secrets. Of course, they also held slippers. Comfortable slippers, fuzzy slippers, pink slippers, sexy slippers and somewhere in every woman’s closet was the glass slipper. That ideal. That box of old letters, that memory tucked away, that secret wish. That inner need to satisfy what was commonly known as the Cinderella Syndrome.
quotes.author: Tracy Crudup

quotes.quote: In the original story, Cinderella didn’t wear glass slippers (which makes sense–glass would break). She wore squirrel fur slippers. But the person who translated the tale from French to English confused pantouffles en vair with pantouffles en verre, and glass it became.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Not every woman in old slippers can manage to look like Cinderella.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: If we have not quiet in our minds, outward comfort will do no more for us than a golden slipper on a gouty foot.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: History is filled with the sound of silken slippers going downstairs and wooden shoes coming up.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Don't you stay at home of evenings? Don you love a cushioned seat in a corner, by the fireside, with your slippers on your feet?
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Shoes are funny beasts. You think they're just clothes, but really, they're alive. They want things. Fancy ones with gems want to go to balls, big boots want to go to work, slippers want to dance. Or sleep. Shoes make the path you're on. Change your shoes, change the path.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: No glass slippers, just a glass heart shattering into a million slivers of regret.
quotes.author: Donna Cooner

quotes.quote: The key to your happiness is to own your slippers, own who you are, own how you look, own your family, own the talents you have, and own the ones you don't. If you keep saying your slippers aren't yours, then you'll die searching, you'll die bitter, always feeling you were promised more. Not only our actions, but also our omissions, become our destiny.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: It's better to ask Santa Claus for a pair of slippers for Christmas rather than peace on earth. You might actually get it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Slow down and everything you are chasing will come around and catch you.
quotes.author: John De Paola

quotes.quote: You can't slow down intense people. They have to burn at their own rate.
quotes.author: Gerald Nicosia

quotes.quote: You can go slow. Allow your dreams and goals to change, but live an intentional life.
quotes.author: Kumail Nanjiani

quotes.quote: Slow down and make building relationships as important as building projects.
quotes.author: Greg Mortenson

quotes.quote: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
quotes.author: Walter Hagen

quotes.quote: Time will not slow down when something unpleasant lies ahead.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Slow but steady wins the race.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: Slow down, simplify and be kind.
quotes.author: Naomi Judd

quotes.quote: Stop rushing. Slow down and enjoy the beauty of life.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Drive slow and enjoy the scenery - drive fast and join the scenery.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Always remember to slow down in life; live, breathe, and learn; take a look around you whenever you have time and never forget everything and every person that has the least place within your heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: For fast acting relief, try slowing down.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: Let thy step be slow and steady, that thou stumble not.
quotes.author: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quotes.quote: Slow down and enjoy the journey right now. Take time for the people in your life. They won't always be there.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Slow down, totally. You have to slow down and pay attention to everything.
quotes.author: Norman Reedus

quotes.quote: If you must be in a hurry, then let it be according to the old adage, and hasten slowly.
quotes.author: Saint Vincent de Paul

quotes.quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: It is important from time to time to slow down, to go away by yourself, and simply be.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: Slow down. Life is crossing the road.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: If you complain about the world moving too fast, slow down.
quotes.author: Mike Dolan

quotes.quote: Slow down you're doing fine You can't be everything you want to be before your time.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: Slowing down is sometimes the best way to speed up.
quotes.author: Mike Vance

quotes.quote: To slow down is to be taken into the soul of things.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Taking time to do nothing often brings everything into perspective.
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: Talk low, talk slow and don't say too much.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Slow and steady wins the race.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Slow but sure moves the might of the gods.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Wisely and slow; they stumble that run fast.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: ln the examination of a great and important question, everyone should be serene, slow-pulsed and calm.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Laziness never arrived at the attainment of a good wish.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Laziness is not a personality disorder. It's just a habit. Lazy thinking and lazy behavior, like any other habits, can be broken. Laziness isn't something we're born with. It's a behavior we learned along the way.
quotes.author: Jason Selk

quotes.quote: A life of leisure and a life of laziness are two things. There will be sleeping enough in the grave.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you are lazy, and accept your lot, you may live in it. If you are willing to work, you can write your name anywhere you choose.
quotes.author: Gene Stratton-Porter

quotes.quote: Progress is made by lazy men looking for easier ways to do things.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Laziness grows on people; it begins in cobwebs and ends in iron chains. The more one has to do the more he is able to accomplish.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Buxton

quotes.quote: Laziness is in tune with transitory time.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: True laziness is the commitment to decrease work and increase efficiency; reduce burden and boost creativity; expand your knowledge and avoid complications; minimize effort and still get it done.
quotes.author: Alan Rios

quotes.quote: Lazy folks take the most pains.
quotes.author: J W Monette

quotes.quote: The sluggard is wiser in his own conceit than seven men that can render a reason.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The lazy man aims at nothing, and generally hits it.
quotes.author: James Ellis

quotes.quote: Laziness travels so slowly that poverty soon overtakes him.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The lazy are always wanting to do something.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Lazy people live lonely lives.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: Lazy people tend not to take chances, but express themselves by tearing down other's work.
quotes.author: Ann Rule

quotes.quote: Laziness prevents more crimes than morality.
quotes.author: Abraham H. Miller

quotes.quote: Laziness is the enemy of virtue, and the very train of all wickedness.
quotes.author: Patrick Fleming

quotes.quote: Laziness is the first big step towards efficiency.
quotes.author: Patrick Bennett

quotes.quote: Lazy people are always anxious to be doing something.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Laziness is a killer of our time.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: A lot of people are lazy when it comes to making up their own mind about something, you know? If you're labelled one way then they think thats how you are. It takes too much time to really look into things.
quotes.author: Rashad Evans

quotes.quote: Laziness is the one common deficiency in mankind that blocks the establishment of a perfect world in which everyone leads a happy life.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: The laziness of adolescence is a rehearsal for the incapacity of old age.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Laziness builds walls and fences that keep the mind under control.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Laziness is a secret ingredient that goes into failure. But it's only kept a secret from the person who fails.
quotes.author: Robert Half

quotes.quote: Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The sluggard craves and gets nothing, but the desires of the diligent are fully satisfied.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: A slug is always on its own. It's a lonely insect.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: Laziness is a secret ingredient that goes into failure. But it's only kept a secret from the person who fails.
quotes.author: Robert Half

quotes.quote: It was a sly trick of God's to give a man work to do - it kept him from asking questions that God couldn't answer.
quotes.author: Martha Ostenso

quotes.quote: Cunning is strength withheld.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Cunning and treachery are the offspring of incapacity.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The crafty person is always in danger; and when they think they walk in the dark, all their pretenses are transparent.
quotes.author: John Tillotson

quotes.quote: A clever mind is not a heart. Knowledge doesn't really care, wisdom does.
quotes.author: Benjamin Hoff

quotes.quote: A sly old fish, too cunning for the hook.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: A sly piece of good luck, which nobody knows of is delightful.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Cunning is the dwarf of wisdom.
quotes.author: William Rounseville Alger

quotes.quote: The greatest cunning is to have none at all.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Love is a cunning weaver of fantasies and fables.
quotes.author: Sappho

quotes.quote: Cunning differs from wisdom as twilight from open day
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It would seem that the more irresponsible and crafty one is, the more likely one is to have a talent for storytelling.
quotes.author: Osamu Dazai

quotes.quote: Clever tyrants are never punished.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: A clever man commits no minor blunders.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The desire to seem clever often keeps us from being so.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is easy to be clever if you leave something important out.
quotes.author: Peter Redgrove

quotes.quote: To be clever in argument is not rationality but rationalization.
quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quotes.quote: Everybody is clever, just in their own ways.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: It is the small things in life which count; it is the inconsequential leak which empties the biggest reservoir.
quotes.author: Charles Comiskey

quotes.quote: A dwarf on a giant's shoulders sees further of the two.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The spark from a tiny star can ignite the plains.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Notice the small things. The rewards are inversely proportional.
quotes.author: Liz Vassey

quotes.quote: A man isn't tiny or giant enough to defeat anything.
quotes.author: Yukio Mishima

quotes.quote: A small unkindness is a great offence.
quotes.author: Hannah More

quotes.quote: Never be intimidated by what seems ominous, for big is only an accumulation of many smalls.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: The smaller the creature, the bolder its spirit.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Lots of small steps equates to a giant leap.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: A tiny step of courage is always a good place to start.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Tiny steps will get you to your goal months and months sooner. A little is better than a lot.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: If you cannnot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The smallest task, well done, becomes a miracle of achievement.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: No matter how tiny you look, you can lead huge men if you have what the huge men don't have.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Small is the number of people who see with their eyes and think with their minds.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Small things amuse small minds.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: R. Collier

quotes.quote: However big the whale may be, the tiny harpoon can rob him of life.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Do not forget that small daily actions do or undo character.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Big things often have small beginnings.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The day you stop doing the small things is the day you think you're above everybody else.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Small is big for the smaller!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A great man is always willing to be little.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Even the largest avalanche is triggered by small things.
quotes.author: Vernor Vinge

quotes.quote: Where talent is a dwarf, self-esteem is a giant.
quotes.author: Jean Antoine Petit-Senn

quotes.quote: As a small business or startup, one of the factors you should always consider when looking at a potential partnership is the incremental potential reach. Note that wider reach doesn't always mean a better partnership opportunity. Instead of sheer scale, take a look at which communities your potential partner can open up for you.
quotes.author: Leah Busque

quotes.quote: For small businesses to thrive, they require an environment that is conducive for growth.
quotes.author: Nydia Velazquez

quotes.quote: Every small business has to become a publisher, a publisher of marketing messages and customer resources, and a publisher of stories.
quotes.author: Jim Blasingame

quotes.quote: Many small businesses would rather face an angry barbarian horde than tackle their cash flow statement or price a new product.
quotes.author: Nicole Fende

quotes.quote: The most important thing for small businesses is getting the economy back on its feet. That the key driver of small business activity is demand for their product, and that is what we are trying to do, getting the economy back on its feet. That's far more important than other factors.
quotes.author: Peter Orszag

quotes.quote: For small business people, less paperwork means higher profits, boosted sales and more time with the family.
quotes.author: Tony Abbott

quotes.quote: We are going through tough economic times but things are looking up, and the indicators are improving not only for large corporations but also for small business.
quotes.author: George Pataki

quotes.quote: If you're going to run a small business, you need to know what everyone is doing, be the first one in and the last one out, and work weekends.
quotes.author: Glen Mazzara

quotes.quote: Small business people are people with goals and values that can't be calculated on a profit and loss statement.
quotes.author: Linda McMahon

quotes.quote: It's not government that creates jobs, it's small business. Our job is to make sure they have the access to capital, the access to contracting opportunities, and the help, advice and mentoring that they need to go out and be successful.
quotes.author: Karen Mills

quotes.quote: In almost every profession whether it's law or journalism, finance or medicine or academia or running a small business people rely on confidential communications to do their jobs. We count on the space of trust that confidentiality provides. When someone breaches that trust, we are all worse off for it.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Small businesses have played an important role in fueling past economic recoveries.
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.quote: In the marketplace, small businesses are the face and voice of humanity, which provides them with a great advantage in the Age of the Customer.
quotes.author: Jim Blasingame

quotes.quote: Any small business that's predicated on technological innovation and is differentiated and superior can expand globally very effectively using the Internet as a vehicle for promotion.
quotes.author: John Quelch

quotes.quote: And what most people don't understand is the bulk of business in this country is small business.
quotes.author: Alphonso Jackson

quotes.quote: The value of small business contracting is indisputable. These firms bring healthy competition to the federal market to drive down prices. They are our nation's innovators and job creators, and securing a federal contract helps them grow and offers more benefit to the economy.
quotes.author: Sam Graves

quotes.quote: Behind every small business, there's a story worth knowing. All the corner shops in our towns and cities, the restaurants, cleaners, gyms, hair salons, hardware stores these didn't come out of nowhere.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: Legitimate small businesses are put at a huge competitive disadvantage when bad actors lie about their small business status and don't play by the rules.
quotes.author: Sam Graves

quotes.quote: Small business creates more jobs than large corporations.
quotes.author: Kevin McCarthy

quotes.quote: Small businesses are the economic drivers of our country, providing the stimulus our communities need
quotes.author: Melissa Bean

quotes.quote: The road to recovery is to stimulate small business and innovation by reducing taxation, regulation, and litigation.
quotes.author: Sandy Adams

quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: While it may seem small, the ripple effects of small things is extraordinary.
quotes.author: Matt Bevin

quotes.quote: Notice the small things. The rewards are inversely proportional.
quotes.author: Liz Vassey

quotes.quote: If small things have the power to disturb you, then who you think you are is exactly that: small.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: It is the small things in life which count; it is the inconsequential leak which empties the biggest reservoir.
quotes.author: Charles Comiskey

quotes.quote: The day you stop doing the small things is the day you think you're above everybody else.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: Small things have a way of overmastering the great. This small press can destroy a kingdom.
quotes.author: Sonya Levien

quotes.quote: It's through the small things that we develop our moral imagination, so that we can understand the sufferings of others.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: Doing small things with love is the atom of bravery.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: Small things done with great love will change the world.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If you do enough small things right, big things can happen.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The way we do small things determines the way we do EVERYTHING.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The great arises out of small things that are honored and cared for.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: If you appreciate the small things, you're likely to get the big ones.
quotes.author: Jonas Eriksson

quotes.quote: Small things done consistently, in strategic places, create major impact.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: In all small things be honest and the big ones will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Rolf Margenau

quotes.quote: Small things done consistently, though undramatic, yield more than the large and sporadic.
quotes.author: Stephen Mansfield

quotes.quote: it is the sum of small things successfully done that lifts a life out of bondage to the humdrum.
quotes.author: Dorothea Brande

quotes.quote: Do the small stuff. A consistent little will earn you a lot.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Do not let the endless succession of small things crowd great ideals out of sight and out of mind.
quotes.author: Charlotte M. Mason

quotes.quote: Neglecting small things under the pretext of wanting to accomplish large ones is the excuse of a coward.
quotes.author: Alexandra David-Neel

quotes.quote: Begin to do small things in a great way...You must put the whole power of your great soul into every act.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: Don't look for big things, just do small things with great love...the smaller the thing, the greater must be our love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The habit of attending to small things and of appreciating small courtesies is one of the important marks of a good person.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Small things are best: Grief and unrest To rank and wealth are given; But little things On little wings Bear little souls to Heaven.
quotes.author: Frederick William Faber

quotes.quote: Little things console us because little things afflict us.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: It's the small things that will make you successful.
quotes.author: The Great Khali

quotes.quote: Small things amuse small minds.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: I think it's the small things, the smaller episodes and details that I linger on and try to draw meaning from, just personally.
quotes.author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quotes.quote: Small things become small folks.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: In those days, at least in my small town, parents didn't seem to worry so much about what their kids were doing as long as they made it home in time for dinner.
quotes.author: K. Martin Beckner

quotes.quote: A small town is a place where there's no place to go where you shouldn't.
quotes.author: Burt Bacharach

quotes.quote: That's one nice thing about growing up in a small town. You get a chance to do a lot of different things.
quotes.author: Mitch Kosht

quotes.quote: I'm all about small towns. I think it's a great place to grow up.
quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves

quotes.quote: The nice thing about living in a small town is that when you don't know what you're doing, someone else does.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Small towns harbor small imaginations.
quotes.author: Stephen King
