quotes.quote: A soulmate is the one person whose love is powerful enough to motivate you to meet your soul, to do the emotional work of self-discovery, of awakening.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.quote: There can be only two questions that are asked with regard to human relationships: Where am I going Who is going with me Do not invert the order of the questions.Do not under any circumstances - invert the order of the questions. Is that clear
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: When will I meet him? We meet our soulmates when we're on our soul path.
quotes.author: Karen M. Black

quotes.quote: Friendship is a single soul dwelling in two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: What we find in a soulmate is not something wild to tame but something wild to run with.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: To say that one waits a lifetime for his soulmate to come around is a paradox. People eventually get sick of waiting, take a chance on someone, and by the art of commitment become soulmates, which takes a lifetime to perfect.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Inhale when I inhale. Exhale when I exhale. Breathe with me,for two beating hearts breathing one breath together become one.
quotes.author: Christina Westover

quotes.quote: Lovers are easy to find and easy to forget but finding an authentic connection is exceptional and limited. It rarely happens, which is why there are so many unhappy people out there.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: Soul mate romance dissolves the superficial and touches your deepest heart with the delightful power of love.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Deep thinking in the ranks leads only to drinking.
quotes.author: William Overgard

quotes.quote: Deep in the fundamental heart of mind and Universe there is a reason.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Deep breaths are very helpful at shallow parties.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: The emotional qualities are antagonistic to clear reasoning.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Every day is deeper and richer and more soulful.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Emotional pain of any kind is a reminder to stop and look inside.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Deep within each one of us lies a garden.
quotes.author: Julie Moir Messervy

quotes.quote: Let each Soulful insight, encourage you to joyfully partake of Christmas in your own way.
quotes.author: Eleesha

quotes.quote: By bringing a soulful consciousness to gardening sacred space can be created outdoors.
quotes.author: S. Kelley Harrell

quotes.quote: Our emotional symptoms are precious sources of life and individuality.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: To be a soulful person means to go against all the pervasive, prove-yourself values of our culture and instead treasure what is unique and internal and valuable in yourself and your own personal evolution.
quotes.author: Jean Shinoda Bolen

quotes.quote: And that's the soulful thing about playing: you offer something to somebody. You don't know if they'll like it, but you offer it.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: Emotional troubles are like landfill. Get them outside, and the air disintegrates them.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Nothing soulful is birthed from force.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: You are on a soulful path that asks you to step into the greatest version of yourself. It is a sacred gift to shine your brightest light, not just in your moments of glory, but each day.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Deep in their roots, all flowers keep the light.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: The action of a soulful person covertly makes many people brave and bold without the need for them to be advised or told.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: Deep meaning lies often in childish play.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Music and imagination are made of the same substance -they contain soulful substances that are more real than reality.
quotes.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.quote: Dance your Soulful path and you shall know the magic of your mind & heart and all the beauty laughing to fill your rising self.
quotes.author: Jay Woodman

quotes.quote: That deep emotional conviction of the presence of a superior reasoning power, which is revealed in the incomprehensible universe, forms my idea of God.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Deep at the center of my being there is an infinite well of love.
quotes.author: Louise L. Hay

quotes.quote: A deep distress has humanised my soul.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Deep in every heart slumbers a dream, and the couturier knows it: every woman is a princess.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: What we find in a soulmate is not something wild to tame but something wild to run with.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Our soulmate is the one who makes life come to life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The idea of a soulmate is beautiful and very romantic to talk about it in a movie or a song, but in reality, I find it scary.
quotes.author: Vanessa Paradis

quotes.quote: Someone who loves you will reveal beautiful things within yourself... things you had never noticed before... things nobody else cared to.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Our souls already know each other, don't they?' he whispered. 'It's our bodies that are new.
quotes.author: Karen Ross

quotes.quote: Your soulmate will always find you, be it in this life or the next.
quotes.author: Faye Hall

quotes.quote: Have you ever felt really close to someone? So close that you can't understand why you and the other person have two separate bodies, two separate skins?
quotes.author: Nancy Garden

quotes.quote: In a soulmate we find not company but a completed solitude.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: A soulmate is the person who makes your soul grow the most.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: A bond between souls is ancient-older than the planet.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.quote: You have half our gifts. I the other. Together we make a whole. Together we are much more powerful.
quotes.author: Joss Stirling

quotes.quote: A soulmate is the one person whose love is powerful enough to motivate you to meet your soul, to do the emotional work of self-discovery, of awakening.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: A soulmate is someone to whom we feel profoundly connected, as though the communicating and communing that take place between us were not the product of intentional efforts, but rather a divine grace.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Your soulmate doesn't just mean your husband or your boyfriend. I have friends in my life who I believe I was meant to meet and be a part of.
quotes.author: Louise Nurding

quotes.quote: Our soulmate is someone who shares our deepest longings, our sense of direction. When we're two balloons, and together our direction is up, chances are we've found the right person.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: There is a special bond between twin soul mates--unconditional love, respect for each other, bringing out the best in each other, and highly compatible.
quotes.author: Mettrie L.

quotes.quote: the soul mate doesn't have to be in a romantic relationship. Sometimes in life, you meet people when you need them, and there is an immediate connection.
quotes.author: Alison G. Bailey

quotes.quote: One does not find soulmates.. soulmates happen' unannounced in some turn of this deliciously unpredictable journey called life, often when we are not even groomed for the occasion.
quotes.author: Sourabh Mukherjee

quotes.quote: Sometimes, soulmates may meet, stay together until a task or life lesson is completed, and then move on. This is not a tragedy, only a matter of learning.
quotes.author: Brian L. Weiss

quotes.quote: You will not find a soulmate in the quiet of your room. You must go to a noisy place and look in the quiet corners.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The first thing you should know is that soulmates are real. They are not just some romantic idea. We are made for one person and one person alone.
quotes.author: Ashley Stoyanoff

quotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: A soul mate is... someone whose way of viewing life is not necessarily the same as yours but complements yours... there is not a compromise, there is a complement.
quotes.author: Paul Robear

quotes.quote: The soulmate is what we aspire to and like to understand about ourself, is what we deem to be perfection, purity, and endless love.
quotes.author: Sorin Cerin

quotes.quote: When deep down in the core of your being you believe that your soulmate exists, there is no limit to the ways he or she can enter your life.
quotes.author: Arielle Ford

quotes.quote: The soulmate bond goes beyond 'Til death do us part': for true love never dies.
quotes.author: Richard Webster

quotes.quote: Our soulmates seldom appeal to our personality our ego. That's why they are called soulmates rather than egomates.
quotes.author: Carolyn Miller

quotes.quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Grow old with me, the best is yet to be.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Sound is the vocabulary of nature.
quotes.author: Pierre Schaeffer

quotes.quote: A sound like a sound of thunder rolled, and the heart of a nation stirred
quotes.author: William Ross Wallace

quotes.quote: All the sounds of the earth are like music.
quotes.author: Oscar Hammerstein

quotes.quote: The sound of the orchestra is one of the most magnificent musical sounds that has ever existed.
quotes.author: Chick Corea

quotes.quote: The sound of laughter is like the vaulted dome of a temple of happiness.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Sound unbound by nature becomes bounded by art.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Sound is the most absorbent medium of all, soaking up histories and philosophical systems and physical surroundings and encoding them in something so slight as a single vocal quaver or icy harpsichord interjection.
quotes.author: Geoffrey O'Brien

quotes.quote: The sound circulated like an autonomous being whose tentacles needed to experience a sensitive awareness of the terrain
quotes.author: Ondjaki

quotes.quote: Sound is the force of creation, the true whole. Music then, becomes the voice of the great cosmic oneness and therefore the optimal way to reach this final state of healing.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Rhythm and sounds are born with syllables.
quotes.author: Jean Philippe Rameau

quotes.quote: Sound strategy starts with having the right goal.
quotes.author: Michael Porter

quotes.quote: Music or sound in a film is a character as important as another character.
quotes.author: Melvin Van Peebles

quotes.quote: Sound is a movement which is handed on from atom to atom in a gas through which the sound is passing, just as a chain of workers pass buckets of water to a fire. The quicker the workers move their hands and arms, the quicker the water moves.
quotes.author: William Henry Bragg

quotes.quote: Sound is a huge influence on people's attention.
quotes.author: Walter Murch

quotes.quote: Sound will be the medicine of the future.
quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

quotes.quote: The sound is the key; audiences will accept visual discontinuity much more easily than they'll accept jumps in the sound. If the track makes sense, you can do almost anything visually.
quotes.author: Paul Hirsch

quotes.quote: Sound is one of the best most powerful tools. All the ancient traditions confirm that in the beginning was the word. Sound sort of predates form.
quotes.author: MC Yogi

quotes.quote: The three great elemental sounds in nature are the sound of rain, the sound of wind in a primeval wood, and the sound of outer ocean on a beach.
quotes.author: Henry Beston

quotes.quote: Nature is sound in many forms and states of existence.
quotes.author: Joao Mendes

quotes.quote: Sound travels farthest as music; the most telling form of truth is poetry.
quotes.author: George Iles

quotes.quote: Sound intelligence promises victory in every battle.
quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

quotes.quote: Divine sound is the cause of all manifestation. The knower of the mystery of sound knows the mystery of the whole universe.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Sounds mean nothing without music.
quotes.author: Jerry Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Every mood of the wind, every change in the day's weather, every phase of the tide—all these have subtle sea musics all their own.
quotes.author: Henry Beston

quotes.quote: The sound of the sea is the most time-effacing sound there is. The centuries reroll in a cloud and the earth becomes green again when you listen, with eyes shut, to the sea.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: The sound of the windlass pawls always thrills me— it's the sound of getting underway; maybe to far places, adventure, what the whole thing is about.
quotes.author: R.D. Culler

quotes.quote: Sound works enormously, deeply, and it doesn't always travel through the intellect. It's a poetic way to speak to someone.
quotes.author: Yves Yersin

quotes.quote: Sound is only an element of the spectator's regard. But the sound, paradoxically, has a rapport with the regard.
quotes.author: Benoit Jacquot

quotes.quote: Sounds are bubbles on the surface of silence.
quotes.author: Trinh T. Minh-ha

quotes.quote: Soup is cuisines kindest course.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Eating soup with a fork: slow and messy.
quotes.author: Peter Schoomaker

quotes.quote: Soup is the song of the hearth and the home.
quotes.author: Louis Pullig De Gouy

quotes.quote: Soup is just a way of screwing you out of a meal.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Real soup is to the body what peace is to the soul.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Hungry and thirsty? Soup solves both problems at once.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: A first-rate soup is more creative than a second-rate painting.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: To feel safe and warm on a cold wet night, all you really need is soup.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: A soup so thick you could shake its hand and stroll with it before dinner.
quotes.author: Robert L. Crawford Jr.

quotes.quote: A little spoon for a cup of soup teaches to be patient; and the big one, to be greedy!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is nothing like soup. It is by nature eccentric: no two are ever alike, unless of course you get your soup in a can.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: There ain't no point in making soup unless others eat it. Soup needs another mouth to taste it, another heart to be warmed by it.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: In taking soup, it is necessary to avoid lifting too much in the spoon, or filling the mouth so full as almost to stop the breath.
quotes.author: Jean-Baptiste de La Salle

quotes.quote: Soup puts the heart at ease, calms down the violence of hunger, eliminates the tension of the day, and awakens and refines the appetite.
quotes.author: Auguste Escoffier

quotes.quote: At birth, we emerge from dream soup. At death, we sink back into dream soup. In between soups, there is a crossing of dry land. Life is a portage.
quotes.author: Tom Robbirs

quotes.quote: Soup is a lot like a family. Each ingredient enhances the others; each batch has its own characteristics; and it needs time to simmer to reach full flavor.
quotes.author: Marge Kennedy

quotes.quote: A soup like this is not the work of one man. It is the result of a constantly refined tradition. There are nearly a thousand years of history in this soup.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: A home is a place where a pot of fresh soup simmers gently on the hob, filling the kitchen with soft aromas and filling your heart, and later your tummy, with joy.
quotes.author: Keith Floyd

quotes.quote: Soup is cuisine's kindest course. It breathes reassurance; it steams consolation; after a weary day it promotes sociability, as the five o'clock cup of tea or the cocktail hour.
quotes.author: Louis Pullig De Gouy

quotes.quote: Cold soup is a very tricky thing and it is a rare hostess who can carry it off. More often than not the dinner guest is left with the impression that had he only come a little earlier he could have gotten it while it was still hot.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: One whiff of a savory aromatic soup and appetites come to attention. The steaming fragrance of a tempting soup is a prelude to the goodness to come. An inspired soup puts family and guests in a receptive mood for enjoying the rest of the menu.
quotes.author: Louis Pullig De Gouy

quotes.quote: No dish changes quite so much from season to season as soup. Summer's soups come chilled, in pastel colors strewn with herbs. If hot they are sheer insubstantial broths afloat with seafood. In winter they turn steaming and thick to serve with slabs of rustic, crusty bread.
quotes.author: Florence Fabricant

quotes.quote: The modern day soup line is a check in the mail.
quotes.author: David I. Rozenberg

quotes.quote: The best kind of onion soup is the simplest kind.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Gravitas is the soup bone in the stew of television news.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: If any one element of French cooking can be called important, basic and essential, that element is soup.
quotes.author: Louis Diat

quotes.quote: Of all the items on the menu, soup is that which exacts the most delicate perfection and the strictest attention.
quotes.author: Auguste Escoffier

quotes.quote: We can drink soup with a fork, it will only take long time! As long as we are patient, we can drink it even with a tiny pin!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Soup not only warms you and is easy to swallow and to digest, it also creates the illusion in the back of your mind that Mother is there.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Hot soup at table is very vulgar; it either leads to an unseemly mode of taking it, or keeps people waiting too long whilst it cools. Soup should be brought to table only moderately warm.
quotes.author: Charlie Day

quotes.quote: The dorp felt like another planet; an accidental seed that never received enough water or sunlight to reach its full potential.
quotes.author: Bianca Bowers

quotes.quote: For you in the West to hear the phrase ‘All men are created equal’ is to draw a yawn. For us, it’s a miracle. We’re starting out at rock bottom, man. But South Africa does have soul.
quotes.author: Athol Fugard

quotes.quote: I will not leave South Africa, nor will I surrender. Only through hardship, sacrifice and militant action can freedom be won. The struggle is my life. I will continue fighting for freedom until the end of my days.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is God's will to lead the people of South Africa through defeat and humiliation to a better future and a brighter day.
quotes.author: Jan Smuts

quotes.quote: If there are dreams about a beautiful South Africa, there are also roads that lead to their goal. Two of these roads could be named Goodness and Forgiveness.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It is not my questions that embarrass South Africa – it is your answers.
quotes.author: Helen Suzman

quotes.quote: For all its problems, I found South Africa a beautiful country, interesting and inspiring.
quotes.author: David Harewood

quotes.quote: When a pile of cups is tottering on the edge of the table and you warn that they will crash to the ground, in South Africa you are blamed when that happens.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Traffic in Joburg is like the democratic process. Every time you think it's going to get moving and take you somewhere, you hit another jam.
quotes.author: Lauren Beukes

quotes.quote: There is no more apartheid in South Africa than in the United States.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: South Africa is blessed to have women and men like yourselves who have little to give but give what you have with open hands and open hearts.
quotes.author: Mangosuthu Buthelezi

quotes.quote: My heart is in South Africa, through my mum. My mum being from here, me spending a lot of time here as well, I feel most connected to this part of the world.
quotes.author: Roger Federer

quotes.quote: In time, we shall be in a position to bestow on South Africa the greatest possible gift - a more human face.
quotes.author: Steven Biko

quotes.quote: In dancing with the enemy one follows his steps even if counting under one’s breath.
quotes.author: Breyten Breytenbach

quotes.quote: If you want peace, you don’t talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Power is something of which I am convinced there is no innocence this side of the womb.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
quotes.author: Desmund Tutu

quotes.quote: We are not being arrogant or complacent when we say that our country, as a united nation, has never in its entire history, enjoyed such a confluence of encouraging possibilities.
quotes.author: Thabo Mbeki

quotes.quote: The wide world is all about you: you can fence yourselves in, but you cannot forever fence it out.
quotes.author: J.R.R.Tolkien

quotes.quote: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: A big part of willpower is having something to aspire to, something to live for.
quotes.author: Mark Shuttleworth

quotes.quote: We learn from history that we don't learn from history!
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Every time you are in doubt, you are actually killing yourself. Decide!
quotes.author: Meir Ezra

quotes.quote: A country can’t love you. At most it may need you. It’s much the same as people.
quotes.author: Andre Brink

quotes.quote: Age is getting to know all the ways the world turns, so that if you cannot turn the world the way you want, you can at least get out of the way so you won’t get run over.
quotes.author: Miriam Makeba

quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: A culture of secrecy is like the bad stench created by cat pee—it is very difficult to get rid of.
quotes.author: Pierre De Vos

quotes.quote: After climbing a great hill, one only finds that there are many more hills to climb.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Whoever we may be, whatever our immediate interest, however much we carry baggage from our past, however much we have been caught by the fashion of cynicism and loss of faith in the capacity of the people, let us err today and say – nothing can stop us now!
quotes.author: Thabo Mbeki

quotes.quote: South Carolina is in the spring a paradise, in the summer a hell, and in the autumn a hospital.
quotes.author: Eliza Lucas Pinckney

quotes.quote: Even today, the state of South Carolina bows its head, bends it knee and begins the search for reconciliation.
quotes.author: Jim Hodges

quotes.quote: South Carolina is too small for a republic and too large for an insane asylum.
quotes.author: James L. Petigru

quotes.quote: The people of South Carolina support conservatives who are trying to push real change, and the people of South Carolina expect their presidential candidates to back them up when they show courage.
quotes.author: Nikki Haley

quotes.quote: It is a matter of common knowledge that the government of South Carolina is under domination of a small ring of cunning, conniving men.
quotes.author: Strom Thurmond

quotes.quote: I have campaigned all over the state of South Carolina. It is the friendliest state in the country. And truly here people judge you by the content of your character not the color of your skin.
quotes.author: Tim Scott

quotes.quote: In South Carolina, the Confederate flag flies high on countless flagpoles. Those who defend this practice by saying it is part of Southern culture are lying to themselves.
quotes.author: Jack Schlossberg

quotes.quote: I'm from South Carolina, so I know what it's like to be accused of being a conservative from the South. And I know that to some people that means more than you're a conservative from the South.
quotes.author: Lindsey Graham

quotes.quote: Returning to South Carolina meant getting a normal job in a normal town with normal people and marrying a normal person. I wanted the glamour and opportunity of the world.
quotes.author: Donna Rice Hughes

quotes.quote: I never know what South Carolina thinks of a measure. I never consult her. I act to the best of my judgment, and according to my conscience. If she approves, well and good. If she does not, or wishes any one to take my place, I am ready to vacate. We are even.
quotes.author: John C. Calhoun

quotes.quote: South Carolina is a 'right to work' state - a misnomer of a phrase, as the laws limits union representation of workers. It does does not guarantee workers a job or fair wages and conditions.
quotes.author: Sharan Burrow

quotes.quote: Back home in South Carolina, you have a lot of little soul food restaurants you can run to and get some quick, decent food.
quotes.author: Gaines Adams

quotes.quote: Protests are fine. But in South Carolina we believe in the rule of law, and the people of this state should never doubt that as governor, I will enforce it.
quotes.author: Nikki Haley

quotes.quote: We simply have to become more competitive as a state if we're going to be successful in creating jobs, bringing capital investment and raising income levels here in South Carolina.
quotes.author: Mark Sanford

quotes.quote: I can't see this world unless I go outside my southern comfort zone.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: Southern women see no contradiction in mixing strength with gentleness.
quotes.author: Sharon McKern

quotes.quote: The SouthÂ­Â­where roots, place, family, and tradition are the essence of identity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only place in the world that nothing has to be explained to me is the South.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Because I was born in the South, I'm a Southerner. If I had been born in the North, the West or the Central Plains, I would be just a human being.
quotes.author: Clyde Edgerton

quotes.quote: In the North, he discoverd, courtesy was considered a barometer of genuine esteem; for any decently brought up Southerner, good manners were simply habitual.
quotes.author: Mary Doria Russell

quotes.quote: Southerners smile more than other Americans.
quotes.author: John Shelton Reed

quotes.quote: When life hands you lemons... squeeze them into some sweet iced tea and thank God you were born a southern girl!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In the South, perhaps more than any other region, we go back to our home in dreams and memories, hoping it remains what it was on a lazy, still summer's day twenty years ago.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's not a common thing for a Southern white family to go out and seek their black cousins.
quotes.author: Edward Ball

quotes.quote: Southerners can claim kin with anybody. It's one of our most dextrous talents.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'll have you know Southern isn't a synonym for stupid.
quotes.author: Janice Lane Palko

quotes.quote: Southerners have never been afraid of seasoning. It's kind of the other way around; our seasoning is afraid of us.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.quote: Being a Southern person and a blonde, it's not a good combination. Immediately, when people meet you, they think of you as not being smart.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: From the mountains of Virginia to the Texas Plains there is a Southern way of life and it begins with hospitality and a proper emphasis on good cooking.
quotes.author: Winifred G. Cheney

quotes.quote: The Southerner always tended to believe with his blood rather than his intellect.
quotes.author: Marshall Frady

quotes.quote: Southern women like their men religious and a little mad.
quotes.author: Michael Shaara

quotes.quote: I like the South because it is so much warmer on the sidelines than it is up North.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: Southerners know you can't be considered a serious Southern cook if you don't know how to make peach cobbler.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.quote: Nobody but a Southerner knows the wrenching rinsing sadness of the cities of the North.
quotes.author: Walker Percy

quotes.quote: The South is a region that history has happened to.
quotes.author: Richard Weaver

quotes.quote: The most beautiful voice in the world is that of an educated Southern woman.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Southerners make such good novelists; they have so many good stories because they have so much family.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: The Southerner is usually tolerant of those weaknesses that proceed from innocence.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: People may think of Southern humor in terms of missing teeth and outhouse accidents, but the best of it is a rich vein running through the best of Southern literature.
quotes.author: Roy Blount Jr.

quotes.quote: A true Southerner will never say in 2-3 words what can better be said in 10-12.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: Southern women can say more with a cut of their eyes than a whole debate club's worth of speeches.
quotes.author: Allison Glock

quotes.quote: Storytelling and copulation are the two chief forms of amusement in the South. They are inexpensive and easy to procure.
quotes.author: Robert Penn Warren

quotes.quote: Southerners have a genius for psychological alchemy. If something intolerable simply cannot be changed, driven away or shot they will not only tolerate it but take pride in it as well
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: We Southerners live at a leisurely pace and sharing our hospitality with our family, friends, and the stranger within our gate is one of our greatest joys.
quotes.author: Winifred G. Cheney

quotes.quote: If growing up is painful for the southern black girl, being aware of her displacement is the rust on the razor that threatens the throat.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Southern women like their men religious and a little mad.
quotes.author: Michael Shaara

quotes.quote: She was so southern that she cried tears that came straight from the mississippi, and she always smelled faintly of cottonwood and peaches.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: Southern women often marry a man knowing that he is the father of many little slaves. They do not trouble themselves about it.
quotes.author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quotes.quote: Southern women are impossible to live with because they will never find a man who treats them like their daddy did.
quotes.author: Maryln Schwartz

quotes.quote: Hold it right there. The only agreement we ever had was that you intended to make me as miserable as possible, and I intended to courageously make the best of an intolerable situation like valiant southern women have always done.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: The real me is a southern girl with her Levis on and an open heart. Wish I could save the world, like I was super girl.
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.quote: There's something about southern women that is so unique yet so universal. Strong southern women are allowed to be soft and feminine and have a sense of humor. But what I love about southern women in particular is their universality.
quotes.author: Connie Britton

quotes.quote: You have to understand that women in the south, women of southern blood, just don't partake in scandalous adventures and when we do, it's in a discreet manner. We have reputations to consider, after all.
quotes.author: Beth Albright

quotes.quote: I realized early on that it was important to have those values, a morality and ethics that come with being southern girl. The way you treat people, little things, the niceties like hellos, like courtesy. They mean something.
quotes.author: Sarah Shahi

quotes.quote: I feel so fortunate. I was brought up along the beaches in southern california, and then got to have horses.
quotes.author: Bo Derek

quotes.quote: Southern women can say more with a cut of their eyes than a whole debate club's worth of speeches.
quotes.author: Allison Glock

quotes.quote: For breakfast I have grits, because I'm a southern girl!
quotes.author: Shanola Hampton

quotes.quote: In the beginning of the war, southern women wanted their men to leave in droves, and as quickly as possible. They were the confederate army's most persuasive and effective recruitment officers, shaming anyone who shirked his duty to fight.
quotes.author: Karen Abbott

quotes.quote: I'm a southern girl. I like when they open the door and pull out a chair. I'm really into a man's man.
quotes.author: Brooke Burns

quotes.quote: Southern girls are God's gift to the entire male population. There is absolutely no woman finer than one raised below the mason-dixon line and once you go southern may the good Lord help you never go back.
quotes.author: Kenny Chesney

quotes.quote: There is nothing like Southern hospitality. It's such a beautiful and genuine thing.
quotes.author: Abigail Spencer

quotes.quote: That sinuous southern life, that oblique and slow and complicated old beauty, that warm thick air and blood warm sea, that place of mists and languor and fragrant richness.
quotes.author: Anne Rivers Siddons

quotes.quote: You have to understand that women in the South, women of Southern blood, just don't partake in scandalous adventures, and when we do, it's in a discreet manner. We have reputations to consider, after all.
quotes.author: Blake O'Hara Heart

quotes.quote: I'm still the little southern girl from the wrong side of the tracks who really didn't feel like she belonged.
quotes.author: Faye Dunaway

quotes.quote: You know what southern women are? Whiskey in a teacup. We're strong in the inside but ornate on the outside.
quotes.author: Hannah Brown

quotes.quote: I don't know how it is up North, of course, but down South, there are times when Southern women feel a need for privacy.
quotes.author: John Lee Mahin

quotes.quote: Southern hospitality and Amish cooking Y'all Come Back, Danki.
quotes.author: Karen Harper

quotes.quote: Southern girls are God's gift to the entire male population. There is absolutely no woman finer than one raised below the Mason-Dixon line and once you go southern may the good Lord help you never go back.
quotes.author: Kenny Chesney

quotes.quote: There are not many female role models to guide voters, and the tradition that a Southern woman's place is in the home still lingers in some quarters.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.quote: I like southern girls. They talk so slow that by the time they say no, I made it already.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Southern Mamas are known for being subtle, like a freight train.
quotes.author: Shellie Rushing Tomlinson

quotes.quote: All Southern women wished of their menfolk was simply to be 'like Paris handsome and like Hector brave'.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: The most beautiful voice in the world is that of an educated Southern woman.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Sovereignty is no longer achievable.
quotes.author: Lucien Bouchard

quotes.quote: Sovereignty is as necessary as ever.
quotes.author: Pauline Marois

quotes.quote: If Absolute Sovereignty be not necessary in a State, how comes it to be so in a family?
quotes.author: Mary Astell

quotes.quote: Sovereignty is not given, it is taken.
quotes.author: Kemal Ataturk

quotes.quote: In sovereignty there are no gradations.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The sovereignty of the people is inalienable.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Sovereignty over any foreign land is insecure.
quotes.author: Seneca (Seneca the Elder)

quotes.quote: The sovereignty of one's self over one's self is called Liberty.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: Sovereignty must be redefined if states are to cope with globalisation.
quotes.author: Richard N. Haass

quotes.quote: The attributes of sovereignty are now enjoyed by every state in the Union.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: The sovereignty of God is the only foundation for worship in the midst of tragedy.
quotes.author: David Platt

quotes.quote: To damage the sovereignty of the individual is to replace a community inspired by love, benevolence, and beauty by another based solely on power.
quotes.author: Anwar Sadat

quotes.quote: In the age of globalisation, pooled sovereignty means more power, not less.
quotes.author: Jose Manuel Barroso

quotes.quote: Liberty is the sovereignty of the individual.
quotes.author: Josiah Warren

quotes.quote: To say that God's sovereignty is limited by man's freedom is to make man sovereign.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: Sovereignty must not be used for inflicting harm on anyone, whether citizen or foreigner.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: When you go through a trial, the sovereignty of God is the pillow upon which you lay your head.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Food sovereignty... is most of all characterized by it's conversations around how to end hunger and poverty.
quotes.author: Raj Patel

quotes.quote: Popular sovereignty has to be given by a people to itself, and this is the important meaning of self-determination.
quotes.author: Judith Butler

quotes.quote: God's sovereignty does not negate our responsibility to pray, but rather makes it possible for us to pray with confidence.
quotes.author: Jerry Bridges

quotes.quote: Sovereignty is a question of principle. We must tell the Iraqis: you are a sovereign people. And you are in charge of your own future.
quotes.author: Jacques Chirac

quotes.quote: Sovereignty is not negotiated in exchange for anything; to maintain the achievements of the revolution does not depend on a foreign power.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: National sovereignty is an obligation as well as an entitlement. A government that will not perform the role of a government forfeits the rights of a government.
quotes.author: Richard Perle

quotes.quote: The sovereignty of God is that golden sceptre in his hand by which he will make all bow, either by his word or by his works, by his mercies or by his judgements.
quotes.author: Thomas Brooks

quotes.quote: Keep in mind that God's sovereignty allows Him to even use that which is not cooperating with Him (the bad) in order to move things to where He wants them to go.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: Political sovereignty is but a mockery without the means of meeting poverty and illiteracy and disease. Self-determination is but a slogan if the future holds no hope.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Food sovereignty is an affirmation of who we are as indigenous peoples and a way, one of the most surefooted ways, to restore our relationship with the world around us.
quotes.author: Winona LaDuke

quotes.quote: To the one who delights in the sovereignty of God the clouds not only have a 'silver lining' but they are silver all through, the darkness only serving to offset the light!
quotes.author: Arthur W. Pink

quotes.quote: Sovereignty and the right to rule cannot be conferred on anyone no matter who ... as a result of an academic discussion. Sovereignty is acquired by force and power and violence.
quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

quotes.quote: Respecting the sovereignty means preventing coups, unconstitutional actions and illegitimate overthrowing of the legitimate government. All these things should be totally prevented.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Sink not into oblivion, but sink into a nice hot spa.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: A morning contrast shower works as a gym, sauna and spa in your bathroom.
quotes.author: Stan Jacobs

quotes.quote: A massage is just like a movie, really relaxing and a total escape, except in a massage you're the star. And you don't miss anything by falling asleep!
quotes.author: Elizabeth Jane Howard

quotes.quote: Elizabeth lay face-down on the massage table, and allowed Marco to relieve the stress of the business day with firm and knowing fingers. Success, she decided, was often a matter of knowing when to relax.
quotes.author: Barbara Taylor Bradford

quotes.quote: Relaxing brings weakness, when done by a muscle; but brings strength, when done by a person.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Indulgence comes in all varieties: a mouthful of gourmet chocolate, a hot stone massage, a week in Paris or 20 uninterrupted minutes to get
quotes.author: Gina Greenlee

quotes.quote: Relaxing after intense effort not only provides an opportunity to rejuvenate, but also to metabolize and embed learning.
quotes.author: Malti Bhojwani

quotes.quote: Many hotels and vacation resorts have added spas and is considered a vital part of a resort or hotel.
quotes.author: Hannelore R. Leavy

quotes.quote: As people become more stressed and rushed for time spas will provide virtual instant gratification for clients.
quotes.author: Preethi Burkholder

quotes.quote: More and more people are going to be working like machines in the decades to come. They are going to want something quick to relax their hectic lifestyles. You are likely to see drive-thru spas in the future.
quotes.author: Preethi Burkholder

quotes.quote: Spa is an international word-one whose meaning is the same in any language
quotes.author: Jo Foley

quotes.quote: A different kind of spa can be experienced wherever else you can go in the world. The premise is still the same-to help people look and feel better.
quotes.author: Jo Foley

quotes.quote: For this more than anything accounts for the great growth of spas-the real need people have to escape the strains of modern life to chill-out and relax.
quotes.author: Jo Foley

quotes.quote: Spas and salons offer spa therapies, treatments and products that are part of a framework of principles and practices that has relatively recently been defined and utilized in the beauty and spa industries.
quotes.author: Lorraine Nordmann

quotes.quote: So I go to this spa, and it was weird. They had pillows all over the floor, Zamfir music playing, water flowing over rocks, supposed to relax you. Made me have to go pee!
quotes.author: Bill Engvall

quotes.quote: Hot springs spas use the natural thermal waters from hot springs in the springs in their spa regimen or treatments.
quotes.author: Anne Williams

quotes.quote: Spas for women can take many forms. A spa for women might offer expensive high-tech skin care or detoxification, vegetarian cuisine, and yoga.
quotes.author: Anne Williams

quotes.quote: It's a good idea always to do something relaxing prior to making an important decision in your life.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Make no mistake, most women are well aware that they've never had it so good; when they enter a spa or salon, it is purely a hair/nails thing, a prelude to an evening of guilt-free fun.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.quote: Massage is very important for relaxing.
quotes.author: Andrew Tan

quotes.quote: Massage is the only form of physical pleasure to which nature forgot to attach consequences.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Saturday is a day for the spa. relax, indulge, enjoy, and love yourself, too.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: Massage therapy has been shown to relieve depression, especially in people who have chronic fatigue syndrome; other studies also suggest benefit for other populations.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.quote: God is a spa-bath of water and we are all individual bubbles.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.quote: Rest and your energy will be restored.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Mobile spas bring day spa services directly to clients at their home, office, hotel room, or at a parry.
quotes.author: Anne Williams

quotes.quote: Spa is the Millennium buzzword for health, beauty and relaxation; it is hip in holiday-speak and a mantra for the growing band of worshipers at the altar of self-preservation.
quotes.author: Sophie Benge

quotes.quote: Although spas are still often considered just luxuries, it is likely that spa services will come to be viewed as necessary for thriving in a fast-paced contemporary lifestyle.
quotes.author: Anne Williams

quotes.quote: Many early civilizations had a version of the spa bath that combined some form of social interaction with cleanliness.
quotes.author: Anne Williams

quotes.quote: Yet despite its current popularity in the lives of trendsetters, jet setters and health fanatics everywhere, the 'spa' is not a new stop on the road to well being. It is a concept as old as the hills it spring from, rewritten for the contemporary scene.
quotes.author: Sophie Benge

quotes.quote: The exploration of space will go ahead, whether we join in it or not, and it is one of the great adventures of all time, and no nation which expects to be the leader of other nations can expect to stay behind in the race for space.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: We must never confuse space colonization with the conquest of space. The world beyond ours is unimaginably vast; it will be what it has always been. When humankind begins to make its home in space, it is we who will change.
quotes.author: Cameron M. Smith

quotes.quote: Returning to Earth, that was the challenging part.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: The time will come when man will know even what is going on in the other planets and perhaps be able to visit them.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: In the long run, a single-planet species will not survive. One day, I don't know when, but one day, there will be more humans living off the Earth than on it.
quotes.author: Mike Griffin

quotes.quote: It's beyond imagination until you actually get up and see it and experience it and feel it.
quotes.author: Willie McCool

quotes.quote: I'm sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It's just been too intelligent to come here.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: As I hurtled through space, one thought kept crossing my mind: Every part of this rocket was supplied by the lowest bidder.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.quote: Space is for everybody. It's not just for a few people in science or math, or for a select group of astronauts. That's our new frontier out there, and it's everybody's business to know about space.
quotes.author: Christa McAuliffe

quotes.quote: The Universe, so far as we can observe it, is a wonderful and immense engine; its extent, its order, its beauty, its cruelty, makes it alike impressive.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Just as the pioneer travelers of the Conestoga wagon days kept personal journals, I, as a pioneer space traveler, would do the same.
quotes.author: Christa McAuliffe

quotes.quote: God has no intention of setting a limit to the efforts of man to conquer space.
quotes.author: Pope Pius XII

quotes.quote: Our passionate preoccupation with the sky, the stars, and a God some where in outer space is a homing impulse. We are drawn back to where we came from.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Astronomy compels the soul to look upward, and leads us from this world to another.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Across the sea of space, the stars are other suns.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: All civilizations become either spacefaring or extinct.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The Universe is a pretty big place. If it's just us, seems like an awful waste of space.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: I cannot join the space program and restart my life as an astronaut, but this opportunity to connect my abilities as an educator with my interest in history and space is a unique opportunity.
quotes.author: Christa McAuliffe

quotes.quote: If I'd been born in space, I would desire to visit the beautiful Earth more than to visit space. It's a wonderful planet.
quotes.author: David Brown

quotes.quote: We go into space because whatever mankind must undertake, free men must fully share.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: It may take endless wars and unbearable population pressure to force-feed a technology to the point where it can cope with space. In the universe, space travel may be the normal birth pangs of an otherwise dying race. A test. Some races pass, some fail.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: The sun, with all those planets revolving around it and dependent on it, can still ripen a bunch of grapes as if it had nothing else in the universe to do.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: If God wanted man to become a space faring species, He would have given man a moon.
quotes.author: Krafft Ehricke

quotes.quote: The view of the moon that we've been having recently is really spectacular. It fills about three-quarters of the hatch window, and of course we can see the entire circumference even though part of it is in complete shadow and part of it is in earthshine. It's a view worth the price of the trip.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: A man who has been in another world does not come back unchanged. One can't put the difference into words. When the man is a friend it may become painful: the old footing is not easy to recover.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: We can lick gravity, but sometimes the paperwork is overwhelming.
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: Not just beautiful, though--the stars are like the trees in the forest, alive and breathing. And they're watching me.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Every cubic inch of space is a miracle.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The mass gross absence of sound in space is more than just silence.
quotes.author: Eugene Cernan

quotes.quote: It will free man from the remaining chains, the chains of gravity which still tie him to this planet.
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: Labor to keep alive in your breast that little spark of celestial fire, called conscience.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: To learn to read is to light a fire; every syllable that is spelled out is a spark.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A mighty flame followeth a tiny spark.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: A spark is a little thing, yet it may kindle the world.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Imagination is the spark that ignites the fire of creativity.
quotes.author: Richard L. Peterson

quotes.quote: Darkness, no matter how powerful it may seem, can be driven back by the tiniest spark.
quotes.author: Brian Rathbone

quotes.quote: Life is a spark between two identical voids, the darkness before birth and the one after death.
quotes.author: Irvin D. Yalom

quotes.quote: The work of the individual still remains the spark that moves mankind ahead even more than teamwork.
quotes.author: Igor Sikorsky

quotes.quote: The difference between passion and addiction is that between a divine spark and a flame that incinerates.
quotes.author: Gabor Mate

quotes.quote: All of us contain a divine, expressive spark, a creative candle intended to light our path and that of our fellows.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: The proper work of man, the grand drift of human life, is to follow reason, that noble spark kindled in us from heaven.
quotes.author: Isaac Barrow

quotes.quote: He that blows the coals in quarrels that he has nothing to do with, has no right to complain if the sparks fly in his face.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Our brightest blazes of gladness are commonly kindled by unexpected sparks.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Without inspiration the best powers of the mind remain dormant. There is a fuel in us which needs to be ignited with sparks.
quotes.author: Johann Gottfried Herder

quotes.quote: Wisdom is a blaze, kindled by a leaping spark.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: A single word even may be a spark of inextinguishable thought.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: A spark neglected has often raised a conflagration.
quotes.author: Quintus Curtius Rufus

quotes.quote: Changing the world doesn't happen all at once. It isn't a big bang. It's an evolution, the sum of a billion tiny sparks. And some of those sparks will have to come from you.
quotes.author: Katie Couric

quotes.quote: The spark of liberty in the mind and spirit of man cannot be long extinguished; it will break into flames that will destroy every coercion which seems to limit it.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Decision is the spark that ignites action. Until a decision is made nothing happens.
quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.quote: The lightning spark of thought generated in the solitary mind awakens its likeness in another mind.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: There is a spark of idealism within every individual which can be fanned into flame and bring forth extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: Motivation is the spark that lights the fire of knowledge and fuels the engine of accomplishment, it maximizes and maintains momentum.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: While in the process of executing an idea, creativity happens not with one brilliant flash but in a chain reaction of many tiny sparks.
quotes.author: R. Keith Sawyer

quotes.quote: When sparks fly, some truly great ideas come to light.
quotes.author: David Heinemeier Hansson

quotes.quote: There is within each of us a divine spark of greatness. Who knows of what we are capable if we only try?
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Hope is the only thing stronger than fear. A little hope is effective. A lot of hope is dangerous. A spark is just fine as long as its contained.
quotes.author: Robert Ludlum

quotes.quote: Each of us carries a unique spark of the divine, and each of us is also an inseparable part of the web of life.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: A man without passion is only a latent force, only a possibility, like a stone waiting for the blow from the iron to give forth sparks.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Every woman in this world wears a little sparkle, some in their dress, and some in their eyes.
quotes.author: Shahla Khan

quotes.quote: Use each moment to make another's eyes sparkle and to warm a heart.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone or anything to dull your sparkle.
quotes.author: Pradeepa Pandiyan

quotes.quote: Don't let the insecurities of others dull your sparkle. Shine like the star you are born to be.
quotes.author: Karen Civil

quotes.quote: Consider the fact that maybe…just maybe…beauty and worth aren’t found in a makeup bottle, or a salon-fresh hairstyle, or a fabulous outfit. Maybe our sparkle comes from somewhere deeper inside, somewhere so pure and authentic and REAL, it doesn’t need gloss or polish or glitter to shine.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: People are like stained glass windows, they sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when darkness sets in their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: You have to look for the joy. Look for the light of God that is hitting your life, and you will find sparkles you didn't know were there.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: Your mind sparks, your soul sparkles, your peace is counterpoint to the clamor of life, you are a magnificent gift to the world.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: When you sparkle you inspire everyone around you.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: Every day is a great day to give love, spread joy, and SPARKLE!
quotes.author: Sheri Fink

quotes.quote: You sparkle with larceny.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: You musn’t be afraid to sparkle a little brighter darling
quotes.author: Kirsten Kaeln

quotes.quote: Leave a little sparkle wherever you go.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Waiting for the spark from heaven to fall.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: If we will concentrate on the best, that element will grow until it sparkles.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Do more of what makes you sparkle
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Even when muddy your wings sparkle bright wonders that heal broken worlds.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Shed not for her a bitter tear, Nor give the heart to vain regret. This but the casket that lies here; the gem that fills it sparkles yet.
quotes.author: Belle Starr

quotes.quote: The dew seemed to sparkle more brightly on the green leaves the air to rustle among them with sweeter music and the sky itself to look more blue and bright. Such is the influence which the condition of our own thoughts, exercise, even over the appearance of external objects.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Forget the suffering You caused others. Forget the suffering Others caused you. The waters run and run, Springs sparkle and are done, You walk the earth you are forgetting.
quotes.author: Czeslaw Milosz

quotes.quote: Love doesn't work that way. You don't meet one day and kiss and see sparkles the next. Real love takes time. They need to get to know each other, and when they do, then they might fall in love. They know next to nothing about each other now.
quotes.author: E.D. Baker

quotes.quote: Love doesn't work that way. You don't meet one day and kiss and see sparkles the next. Real love takes time. They need to get to know each other, and when they do, then they might fall in love. They know next to nothing about each other now.
quotes.author: E.D. Baker

quotes.quote: How beautiful the water is! To me 'tis wondrous fair. No spot can ever lonely be If water sparkle there It hath a thousand tongues of mirth, Of grandeur, or delight, And every heart is gladder made When water greets the sight.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Oakes Smith

quotes.quote: She was beautiful, but not like those girls in the magazines. She was beautiful, for the way she thought. She was beautiful, for the sparkle in her eyes when she talked about something she loved. She was beautiful, for her ability to make other people smile, even if she was sad. No, she wasn't beautiful for something as temporary as her looks. She was beautiful, deep down to her soul. She is beautiful.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the yeast that makes your hopes shine to the stars. Enthusiasm is the sparkle in your eyes, the swing in your gait. The grip of your hand, the irresistible surge of will and energy to execute your ideas.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The world is full of poetry. The air is living with its spirit; and the waves dance to the music of its melodies, and sparkle in its brightness.
quotes.author: James Gates Percival

quotes.quote: Boundless love always manages somehow to sparkle through your limited form.
quotes.author: John Welwood

quotes.quote: It's always darkest before the ultimate sparkle.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: Charisma is a sparkle in people that money can't buy. It's invisible energy with visible effects.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: A diamond, though set in horns, is still a diamond, and sparkles in purest gold.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: In this world of ours, the sparrow must live like a hawk if he is to fly at all.
quotes.author: Hayao Miyazaki

quotes.quote: A sparrow in the hand is better than a pigeon on the branch.
quotes.author: Siberian Proverb

quotes.quote: Look at the sparrows; they do not know what they will do in the next moment. Let us literally live from moment to moment.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Better a sparrow, living or dead, than no birdsong at all.
quotes.author: Catullus

quotes.quote: A certain traveler who knew many continents was asked what he found most remarkable of all. He replied: the ubiquity of sparrows.
quotes.author: Adam Zagajewski

quotes.quote: He that doth the ravens feed, yea, providently caters for the sparrow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: To become a sparrow you don't have to be a crow.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Somewhere, a sparrow is singing in B minor.
quotes.author: Heather O'Neill

quotes.quote: The sparrows jumped before they knew how to fly, and they learned to fly only because they had jumped.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: If you are a sparrow, don't attack the eagle; be wise! If you are an eagle, don't attack the sparrow; be just!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: One hundred sparrow does not make one eagle.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: One sparrow is worth a thousand gulls, When it sings. The gull sits on chimney-tops. He mocks the guinea, challenges The crow, inciting various modes. The sparrow requites one, without intent.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: There is special providence in the fall of a sparrow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The sparrow is sorry for the peacock at the burden of its tail.
quotes.author: Amitendranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The League is very well when sparrows shout, but no good at all when eagles fall out.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: A spoken word is not a sparrow. Once it flies out, you can't catch it.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.
quotes.author: Eric Berne

quotes.quote: On a soft snow, even a sparrow leaves a trace; the important thing is to leave a trace on a steel plate.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The sparrow still falls.
quotes.author: Mary Doria Russell

quotes.quote: It doesn't hurt. Nothing hurts except the small smiles and blushes that flash across the room like tiny sparrows.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: One cannot bring up boys to be eagles and then expect them to be sparrows.
quotes.author: Edith Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The sparrow flies south for the winter.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.quote: When the sparrow sings its final refrain, the hush is felt nowhere more deeply than in the heart of man.
quotes.author: Don Williams

quotes.quote: Because nothing should be wasted In a world where sparrows work hard to prove there is enough.
quotes.author: Gary Soto

quotes.quote: Can a sparrow know how a stork feels?
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Who would attempt to fly with the tiny wings of a sparrow when the mighty power of an eagle has been given him.
quotes.author: Kenneth Wapnick

quotes.quote: To the seeing eye life is mostly Sparrows.
quotes.author: Will Cuppy

quotes.quote: If you're going to care about the fall of the sparrow you can't pick and choose who's going to be the sparrow. It's everybody.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: The average sparrow is somethiing of a bore and the trouble is that all sparrows are average.
quotes.author: Will Cuppy

quotes.quote: Shakespeare said: "There's a special providence in the fall of a sparrow." Everything happens perfectly.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The Spartans do not ask how many are the enemy but where are they.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Spartans, eat well, for tonight we dine in Hades.
quotes.author: King Leonidas

quotes.quote: The walls of Sparta were its young men, and its borders the points of their spears.
quotes.author: King Agesilaos

quotes.quote: Being asked where in Greece he saw good men, he replied, "Good men nowhere, but good boys at Sparta."
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: Give them nothing, but take from them everything.
quotes.author: King Leonidas

quotes.quote: Come back with your shield - or on it.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: He who sweats more in training bleeds less in war.
quotes.author: Spartan Warrior Creed

quotes.quote: The daughters of Sparta are never at home! They mingle with the young men in wrestling matches.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: After invading Greece and receiving the submission of other key city-states, Philip II of Macedon sent a message to Spart: "If I invade Laconia you will be destroyed, never to rise again." The Spartan ephors replied with a single word: "If".
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The Spartans were a paradoxical people. They were the biggest slave owners in Greece. But at the same time, Spartan women had an unusual level of rights. It's a paradox that they were a bunch of people who in many ways were fascist, but they were the bulwark against the fall of democracy.
quotes.author: Frank Miller

quotes.quote: No retreat, no surrender; that is Spartan law. And by Spartan law, we will stand and fight, and die.
quotes.author: King Leonidas

quotes.quote: That city is well fortified which has a wall of men instead of brick.
quotes.author: Lycurgus of Sparta

quotes.quote: A Spartan woman, as she handed her son his shield, exhorted him saying, "As a warrior of Sparta come back with your shield or on it."
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Only Spartan women give birth to real men.
quotes.author: Gorgo, Queen of Sparta

quotes.quote: The Spartans are the equal of any men when they fight as individuals; fighting together as a collective, they surpass all other men.
quotes.author: Damaratus

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is spartanism with qualities of sacrifice, self-denial, dedication. It is fearlessness, and it is love.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: There's no room for softness... not in Sparta. No place for weakness. Only the hard and strong may call themselves Spartans. Only the hard, only the strong.
quotes.author: Dilios

quotes.quote: Talking is still cheap. You need to express youself, speak your mind, say what you mean, and mean what you said.
quotes.author: Nurudeen Ushawu

quotes.quote: When you are balanced and when you listen and attend to the needs of your body, mind, and spirit, your natural beauty comes out.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.quote: The audience changes every night. You're the same person. You have to speak your mind and do the stuff that you think is funny and makes you laugh.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: It's better to speak your mind and tell the truth, than to stay quiet and lie to yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never store the negative energy and emotions such as fear, anger within you. Be open and always speak your mind.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kumar Sinha

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to speak your mind, you have one for a reason.
quotes.author: Sarah Moores

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to be unique or speak your mind, because that's what makes you different from everyone else.
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: You can go through life and actually speak your mind and do it in an articulate fashion and with a really intelligent point of view.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.quote: Leave safety behind. Put your body on the line. Stand before the people you fear and speak your mind even if your voice shakes. When you least expect it, someone may actually listen to what you have to say. Well-aimed slingshots can topple giants.
quotes.author: Maggie Kuhn

quotes.quote: Speak out your mind and your heart, you wo' be bored.
quotes.author: Lights

quotes.quote: You have to speak your mind, but without being cruel.
quotes.author: Len Goodman

quotes.quote: Speak your mind, but ride a fast horse.
quotes.author: Texas Bix Bender

quotes.quote: If you think your body and mind are two, that is wrong; if you think that they are one, that is also wrong. Our body and mind are both two and one.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: You should always speak your mind, and be bold, and be obnoxious, and do whatever you want and don't let anybody tell you to stop it.
quotes.author: Chelsea Handler

quotes.quote: Speak from your mind and people will hear you with their mind. Speak from your heart and people will hear you with their heart.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Just remember to always be yourself and don't be afraid to speak your mind or to dream out loud
quotes.author: J.A. Redmerski

quotes.quote: Know when to speak your mind and when to let others put their foot in their mouth.
quotes.author: Mark Hook

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quotes.quote: Be yourself and speak your mind today. though it contradicts all you have said before.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: To say what you think will certainly damage you in society, but a free tongue is worth more than a thousand invitations.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: When anyone announces that he is going to speak his mind freely, everyone is frightened. This shows that there is no such thing as freedom of speech. No one can afford to let his neighbors know what he is thinking about them. Society can exist only on the basis that there is some amount of polished lying and that no one says exactly what he thinks.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Follow the path of the unsafe, independent thinker. Expose your ideas to the dangers of controversy. Speak your mind and fear less the label of 'crackpot' than the stigma of conformity. And on issues that seem important to you, stand up and be counted at any cost.
quotes.author: Thomas John Watson Jr

quotes.quote: Always be ready to speak your mind, and a base man will avoid you.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Often your utterances and expressions of your face leak out the secrets of your hidden thoughts.
quotes.author: Hazrat Ali

quotes.quote: A man must not always tell all, for that were folly; but what a man says should be what he thinks.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The mouth is the portal of the mind. If not carefully guarded, it leaks true intents and motives. Feelings are the feet of the mind. If not carefully watched, they will take you onto all kinds of wayward paths.
quotes.author: Hong Zicheng

quotes.quote: Wherever you are in the world, you need to be a citizen; you need to speak your mind, speak the truth, be critical when you need to be, and help if necessary.
quotes.author: Zackie Achmat

quotes.quote: Don't hesitate to speak your mind, you have nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: Speak your mind, even if your voice shakes.
quotes.author: Maggie Kuhn

quotes.quote: In order to speak your mind, you need to have a pretty good idea of who you are.
quotes.author: Halley Bondy

quotes.quote: The universe is always speaking to us... sending us little messages, causing coincidences and serendipities, reminding us to stop, to look around, to believe in something else, something more.
quotes.author: Nancy Thayer

quotes.quote: The manner of your speaking is full as important as the matter, as more people have ears to be tickled than understandings to judge.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: A good portion of speaking will consist in knowing how to lie.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: When in doubt, just spit it out. That all challenges can be overcome by speaking the truth, no matter how it comes out.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Prayer is you speaking to God. Meditation is allowing the spirit to speak to you.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Let's acknowledge the difference between speaking up with intention and speaking up for attention.
quotes.author: Monica Lewinsky

quotes.quote: Speaking truth will rarely earn you friends, but it will reveal who your true friends are and who are true friends of Christ.
quotes.author: Mark Hart

quotes.quote: Speaking kind words starts a wave of love in motion that brings more love upon your shores.
quotes.author: Molly Friedenfeld

quotes.quote: A man speaking sense to himself is no madder than a man speaking nonsense not to himself.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: We rarely repent of speaking little, but often of speaking too much.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Speaking is what most people work on. They forget the thinking and the breathing and instead try to occupy space with sound.
quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.quote: In speaking, it is best to be clear and say just enough to convey the meaning.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A talent for speaking differently, rather than for arguing well is the chief instrument of cultural change.
quotes.author: Richard Rorty

quotes.quote: Everything in life is speaking in spite of its apparent silence.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Nothing in this world is harder than speaking the truth, nothing easier than flattery.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Broadly speaking, the short words are the best, and the old words best of all.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Public speaking is the art of diluting a two-minute idea with a two-hour vocabulary.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Man does not speak because he thinks; he thinks because he speaks. Or rather, speaking is no different than thinking: to speak is to think.
quotes.author: Octavio Paz

quotes.quote: If you make yourself understood, you're always speaking well.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Silence is ever speaking; it is the perennial flow of language.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: One must turn the tongue seven times in the mouth before speaking.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: The act of speaking our intentions aloud shifts them from wishful thinking into action.
quotes.author: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg

quotes.quote: Use words to please, to instruct, to soothe. Then stop speaking.
quotes.author: Kate Horsley

quotes.quote: Speaking with passion born of your own authentic experience and belief is always persuasive.
quotes.author: Charlotte Beers

quotes.quote: Good public speaking is based on good private thinking.
quotes.author: Scott Berkun

quotes.quote: If you re not speaking your own truth, you will never be able to be all you are meant to be. You cannot be pretending to be somebody else.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Only one thing is more frightening than speaking your truth, and that is not speaking.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: One open way of speaking introduces another open way of speaking, and draws out discoveries, like wine and love.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Speaking the truth, once you have started it, is too exhilarating to draw back.
quotes.author: Storm Jameson

quotes.quote: The most powerful speaking you can do is the speaking that comes from your heart and your love.
quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

quotes.quote: We have a responsibility to ensure that every individual has the opportunity to receive a high-quality education, from prekindergarten to elementary and secondary, to special education, to technical and higher education and beyond.
quotes.author: Jim Jeffords

quotes.quote: For those with learning disabilities, today's tools for differentiation no longer hold the stigma they used to nor highlight disabilities, but provide opportunities to find success in the classroom.
quotes.author: Sharon LePage Plante

quotes.quote: In special education, there's too much emphasis placed on the deficit and not enough on the strength.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not: nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not: the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: The secret in education lies in respecting the student.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No child left behind requires states and school districts to ensure that all students are learning and are reaching their highest potential. Special education students should not be left out of these accountability.
quotes.author: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.quote: If a child can't learn the way we teach, maybe we should teach the way they learn.
quotes.author: Ignacio Estrada

quotes.quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And you are the one who'll decide where to go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Much education today is monumentally ineffective. All too often we are giving young people cut flowers when we should be teaching them to grow their own plants.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: A good special education teacher is hard to find and even harder to hang on to.
quotes.author: Lourdes Garcia-Navarro

quotes.quote: It is different than in special education where you have no alternative. For the gifted, it is an issue that is not absolutely required.
quotes.author: Arthur Allen

quotes.quote: Generally speaking, and not in all instances, those schools that have higher percentages of students receiving special education services are going to tend to do less well on the tests. It's the nature of an education disability that it makes it more difficult for you to learn in some respect or another.
quotes.author: David Ernst

quotes.quote: Without question, a diagnosis of an attention deficit disorder does not necessarily equate to a need for special education.
quotes.author: James Whittemore
