quotes.quote: When you judge someone based on a diagnosis, you miss out on their abilities, beauty, and uniqueness.
quotes.author: Sevenly

quotes.quote: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
quotes.author: Sidney Harris

quotes.quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his own language, that goes to his heart.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: We can teach our children to flap their wings, but conditions have to be just right for them to fly
quotes.author: Annie Campbell

quotes.quote: Every student can learn, just not on the same day, or in the same way.
quotes.author: John Evans

quotes.quote: Never discourage anyone who continually makes progress, no matter how slow.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: What most people don't know is that most Special Education teachers are really angels disguised as extraordinary humans.
quotes.author: Joe Martin

quotes.quote: The educator must believe in the potential power of his pupil, and he must employ all his art in seeking to bring his pupil to experience this power.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Great education is a combination of a supporting environment, dedicated teachers and students who take joy in learning.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: Education is a shared commitment between dedicated teachers, motivated students and enthusiastic parents with high expectations.
quotes.author: Bob Beauprez

quotes.quote: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.
quotes.author: Robert M Hutchins

quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Xunzi

quotes.quote: One of the reasons why it needs no special education to be a Christian is that Christianity is an education itself.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Children are not a distraction from more important work. They are the most important work
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: If you want your children to improve, let them overhear the nice things you say about them to others.
quotes.author: Dr. Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: All kids need is a little help, a little hope, and someone who believes in them
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: It shouldn’t matter how slowly a child learns. What matters is that we encourage them to never stop trying
quotes.author: Robert John Meehan

quotes.quote: Just because I can’t walk, doesn’t mean I can’t play!
quotes.author: InclusivePlay

quotes.quote: Some of the most wonderful people are the ones who don’t fit into boxes.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: The past haunts and the future taunts. This is particularly true if you love a child with special needs.
quotes.author: Lisa Thornbury

quotes.quote: he central struggle of parenthood is to let our hopes for our children outweigh our fears.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: The siblings of special needs children are quite special. Absolutely accepting and totally loving, from birth, someone who is different mentally, and has a different way of seeing the world, is a wonderful trait. It’s a trait I wish there was another way of getting, but there isn’t. And it does involve a degree of not having it fantastically easy.
quotes.author: Sally Phillips

quotes.quote: Never let anyone dis your ability to make the right choices regarding your child’s disabilities.
quotes.author: Lisa Thornbury

quotes.quote: My heroes are the parents of people with intellectual disabilities. They fight this fight 365 days a year, 7 days a week, all day, all night. Parents of kids with special needs are never done
quotes.author: Jennifer Camota Luebke

quotes.quote: I'll say this: It takes a special person to see the special needs of a complicated kid.
quotes.author: James Duff

quotes.quote: Children with special educational needs may need extra help because of a range of needs, such as in thinking and understanding, physical or sensory difficulties, emotional and behavioural difficulties, or difficulties with speech and language or how they relate to and behave with other people.
quotes.author: M.L Dhawan

quotes.quote: Children with special needs are unique individuals.
quotes.author: Neena Dash

quotes.quote: Special needs children deviate from from the normal children either in the positive direction or in the negative direction.
quotes.author: Neena Dash

quotes.quote: Gifted children are in some way superior in intellectual ability to other children of the same age.
quotes.author: Neena Dash

quotes.quote: Becoming familiar with special needs issues and caring for children with special needs reduces anxieties and fears and leads to an understanding and appreciation of different abilities.
quotes.author: Angela Dare

quotes.quote: The earlier a child's special need is recognized and assessed, the sooner effective and ongoing help and family-centered support can be provided.
quotes.author: Angela Dare

quotes.quote: The term 'special needs' is used by childcare and educational professional in relation to children whose development is atypical, that is, not following the recognized pattern seen in most children.
quotes.author: Angela Dare

quotes.quote: All children with special needs have a right to be part of a family, a community and society.
quotes.author: Angela Dare

quotes.quote: If society were more inclusive in its structure and nature, there would be no need to have 'special needs' policies or even to label children as having 'special needs.'
quotes.author: Penny Tassoni

quotes.quote: A child with special educational needs should have their needs met.
quotes.author: Penny Tassoni

quotes.quote: Parents of children with autism and other disabilities often look to their faith in an effort to deal with what seems like a catastrophic event in their lives. This can lead them to a deepening of faith.
quotes.author: David Rizzo

quotes.quote: Having a child with severe disability can make you question whether you know anything about who God is and what he wants from you.
quotes.author: David Rizzo

quotes.quote: Often times we may become overwhelmed with the thoughts, responsibilities, and day to day grind that having a special needs child can bring to your life.
quotes.author: Patrick Baldwin

quotes.quote: Given the responsibility of parenting a child with special needs is not a form of discipline or punishment. Instead, God is saying, ' I have a special job for you because your heart's capacity to love and nurture us above and beyond what is normal.'
quotes.author: Patrick Baldwin

quotes.quote: Parenting a special-needs child is hard work. It is physically exhausting, mentally and emotionally draining, time-consuming, and often times, very, very lonely.
quotes.author: Patrick Baldwin

quotes.quote: Raising children with special needs to achieve their full potential is hard work.
quotes.author: Judy Winter

quotes.quote: Parenting a child with special needs will be the greatest challenge of your life, and if you make good choices, it may also prove one of the most rewarding.
quotes.author: Judy Winter

quotes.quote: Having a child with special needs demands that you take your parenting role seriously and become increasingly less selfish. Or pay the steep price.
quotes.author: Judy Winter

quotes.quote: I imagined I was God for a millisecond And became speechless for a long time.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: You don't speak / you no longer speak to yourself / even the she in the mirror has disappeared
quotes.author: Alejandra Pizarnik

quotes.quote: The Times is speechless, and takes three columns to express its speechlessness.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: There are three needs of the griever: To find the words for the loss, to say the words aloud and to know that the words have been heard.
quotes.author: Victoria Alexander

quotes.quote: After years as a civil rights lawyer, I rarely find myself speechless.
quotes.author: Michelle Alexander

quotes.quote: I've admired Anthony Hopkins for so long, and when I finally got to meet him in person, I became totally immobile and speechless! I stood there looking at him and couldn't say a word.
quotes.author: Byrce Dallas howard

quotes.quote: A strong work of art really leaves people speechless. They feel a little angry because they don't understand it.
quotes.author: Michael Heizer

quotes.quote: I've never been so star struck in my life as when I met President Obama and Bill Clinton... and at the same time, no less! I'm not one to be at a loss for words, and that was a moment when I really was speechless. It was a big, big night
quotes.author: Megan Hilty

quotes.quote: Everyone has their own ways of expression. I believe we all have a lot to say, but finding ways to say it is more than half the battle.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Happiness is speechless.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: Experience is a private, very largely speechless affair.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: If it were possible to talk to the unborn, one could never explain to them how it feels to be alive, for life is washed in the speechless real.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Words have power. The power to soothe. The power to skewer someone through the heart. The power to render someone speechless.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: Love itself describes its own perfection. Be speechless and listen.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If the word No was removed from the English language, Ian Paisley would be speechless.
quotes.author: John Hume

quotes.quote: Where words leave off, gesture begins. Don't we speak of a person being speechless with rage, dancing with impatience, setting his teeth? The final motions of the soul are speechless, animal, grotesque, or of an incomparable beauty.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: If our life is poured out in useless words, we will never hear anything, never become anything, and in the end, because we have said everything before we had anything to say, we shall be left speechless at the moment of our greatest decision.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: In this day the breeze of God is wafted, and His Spirit hath pervaded all things. Such is the outpouring of His grace that the pen is stilled and the tongue is speechless.
quotes.author: Baha'U'Llah

quotes.quote: The speed of time is one second per second.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Speed is irrelevant if you are going in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The speed is something dangerous but very exciting.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.quote: If everything seems under control, you're not going fast enough.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: You can speed up your life if you want to that's easy. Winding down is what's hard.
quotes.author: Jennifer James

quotes.quote: Nothing is as fast as the speed of trust.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: I'm going to focus on speed, doing little things like my turns and my starts just speed.
quotes.author: Ryan Lochte

quotes.quote: The speed of the human mind is remarkable. So is its inability to face the obvious.
quotes.author: Simon Mawer

quotes.quote: Speed is not always a constituent to great work, the process of creation should be given time and thought.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: When speed gets in the blood, one must drive to live.
quotes.author: Rudolf Caracciola

quotes.quote: Move fast. Speed is one of your main advantages over large companies.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: The speed of the leader determines the rate of the pack.
quotes.author: D. Wayne Lukas

quotes.quote: It is true that speed kills. In distance running, it kills anyone who does not have it.
quotes.author: Brooks Johnson

quotes.quote: Speed now illuminates reality whereas light once gave objects of the world their shape.
quotes.author: Paul Virilio

quotes.quote: My speed is natural and I have been training very hard.
quotes.author: Meseret Defar

quotes.quote: Speed is a great asset; but it's greater when it's combined with quickness and there's a big difference.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.quote: Speed is absolutely key to creativity. The more time it takes to create something, the less likely you are to create something.
quotes.author: Patrick Stump

quotes.quote: Speed is no advantage round a vicious circle.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Our speed and size were definitely big factors in this game, but it really came down to just coming out and playing with heart.
quotes.author: Levi Emerson

quotes.quote: There are no speed limits on the road to success.
quotes.author: David W. Johnson

quotes.quote: Speed is a way to escape consciousness and just act.
quotes.author: Michael Snow

quotes.quote: Speed is often confused with insight. When I start running earlier than the others, I appear faster.
quotes.author: Johan Cruyff

quotes.quote: The only thing faster than the speed of thought is the speed of forgetfulness. Good thing we have other people to help us remember.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Speed is relative. You have to live it. You can't just jump into it. You have to live it all the time.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: Just speed, raw speed, blinding speed, too much speed.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.quote: Speed has become an important element of strategy.
quotes.author: Regis McKenna

quotes.quote: In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The speed of change makes you wonder what will become of architecture.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.quote: Faster, faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: The future was getting here faster than I'd expected.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Cynicism is reality with an alternate spelling.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Spelling is difficult because there are too many rules. Silent letters only exist to make it harder for illegal immigrants to learn English.
quotes.author: Daniel Tosh

quotes.quote: Spellings are made by people. Dictionaries eventually reflect popular choices. And the Internet is allowing more people to influence spelling than ever before.
quotes.author: David Crystal

quotes.quote: You can't spell 'brothers' without at the same time spelling 'others.'
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Religion and philosophy, philosophy and religion - they're two words which are both... different. In spelling.
quotes.author: Eddie Izzard

quotes.quote: Languages never stand still. Modern spelling crystallises lost pronunciations: the visual never quite catches up with the aural.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Spelling is improved when reading is done.
quotes.author: Stephen D. Krashen

quotes.quote: Simplified spelling is all right, but, like chastity, you can carry it too far.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Thou shalt not use the 140 characters limit as an excuse for bad grammar and/or incorrect spelling
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A man occupied with public or other important business cannot, and need not, attend to spelling.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: There is no alternative. Every possible reason that could ever be offered for altering the spelling of words, still exists in full force; and if a gradual reform should not be made in our language, it will prove that we are less under the influence of reason than our ancestors.
quotes.author: Noah Webster

quotes.quote: God is so clear in spelling out His attributes in scripture in order that others would know what He is really like.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: The English alphabet is pure insanityâ€¦, It can hardly spell any word in the language with any degree of certainty.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You can't help respecting anybody who can spell TUESDAY, even if he doesn't spell it right; but spelling isn't everything. There are days when spelling Tuesday simply doesn't count.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Correct spelling, indeed, is one of the arts that are far more esteemed by school ma'ams than by practical men, neck-deep in the heat and agony of the world.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Spelling mistakes in a letter is like a bug on a white shirt.
quotes.author: Faina Ranevskaya

quotes.quote: As to spelling the very frequent word though with six letters instead of two, it is impossible to discuss it, as it is outside the range of common sanity. In comparison such a monstrosity as phlegm for flem is merely disgusting.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The story of English spelling is the story of thousands of people - some well-known, most totally unknown - who left a permanent linguistic fingerprint on our orthography.
quotes.author: David Crystal

quotes.quote: It is a damned poor mind indeed that can't think of at least two ways of spelling any word.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: Spelling is a way to make words safe, at least for now, until another technology appears to soften attacks launched from the mouth.
quotes.author: Ben Marcus

quotes.quote: The wise man is but a clever infant spelling letters from a hierographical prophetic book, the lexicon of which lies in eternity.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: When our spelling is perfect, it's invisible. But when it's flawed, it prompts strong negative associations.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Spelling is the clothing of words, their outward visible sign, and even those who favour sweatpants in everyday life like to make a bella figura, as the Italians say â€“ a good impression â€“ in their prose.
quotes.author: Mary Norris

quotes.quote: A kiss can be a comma, a question mark or an exclamation point. That's basic spelling that every woman ought to know.
quotes.author: Mistinguett

quotes.quote: Let grammar, punctuation, and spelling into your life! Even the most energetic and wonderful mess has to be turned into sentences.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Some people take the spelling bee very seriously. These people are called "parents of children in the spelling bee." They're trying to make up for their own childhood of crushed dreams and misspelled words.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: Language is more fashion than science, and matters of usage, spelling and pronunciation tend to wander around like hemlines.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: When a schoolboy has original ideas, they are usually confined to spelling.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: To learn to read is to light a fire; every syllable that is spelled out is a spark.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: They spell it Vinci and pronounce it Vinchy; foreigners always spell better than they pronounce.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A wolf spider is a fast-moving ground spider known for running after and jumping on its prey.
quotes.author: Boze Hadleigh

quotes.quote: A crab apple is small and sour, and a crab spider has long front legs that move sideways.
quotes.author: Boze Hadleigh

quotes.quote: Two spidery expressions are 'to blow the cobwebs away,' meaning to void one's mind of old-fashioned ideas, and 'to be at the center of the spider's web' —to control a complex group or operation.
quotes.author: Boze Hadleigh

quotes.quote: In giving spiders their ability to weave webs and to sail through the air, God showed concern 'for the pleasure and recreation of all sorts of creatures, even the insects.'
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: In Ananu, or spider, is the subject of many superstitions. Injuring the children that sleep in the same room with it.
quotes.author: Sir Richard Francis Burton

quotes.quote: When the spider would attack thee, it extends its web to entangle thee.
quotes.author: Sir Richard Francis Burton

quotes.quote: The spider taketh hold with her hands, and is in King's palaces.
quotes.author: Proverbs 30:28

quotes.quote: Experience is...a kind of huge spider-web of the finest silken threads suspended in the chamber of consciousness, and catching every airborne particle in its tissue.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: The soul dwells in the body like a spider in its web.
quotes.author: Anon Greek Philosopher

quotes.quote: So mean he would steal a dead fly from a blind spider.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Written laws are like spider's webs; they will catch, it is true, the weak and poor, but would be torn in pieces by the rich and powerful.
quotes.author: Anacharsis

quotes.quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: All things are interrelated and interdependent; nothing exists in isolation. The entire universe is one ecosystem, similar to a spider web— if one part is touched, the entire net shimmers.
quotes.author: Matthew Flickstein

quotes.quote: The fact that the spider helps to control the spread of fies made it a valued insect, and this was underlined in a folklore by a story that it had hidden Christ from his enemies by covering him with its web.
quotes.author: Laurence Flanagan

quotes.quote: You don't have to look far to see a spider's web— in the corner of the window, on a fence, or in a bush— spiders make their home everywhere
quotes.author: Laura Marsh

quotes.quote: What has eight legs, fangs, and hair all over? Is it a monster? No, it's a spider!
quotes.author: Laura Marsh

quotes.quote: Spider silk is thirty times thinner than a human hair and very light, but do not let this fool you. It is the strongest fiber found in nature.
quotes.author: Kay De Silva

quotes.quote: Spiders are born to spin; they do not need to be taught. A spider's web is its home. Some spiders use a web to catch their prey, while others prefer to hunt.
quotes.author: Kay De Silva

quotes.quote: Fiction is like a spider's web, attached ever so lightly perhaps, but still attached to life at all four corners. Often the attachment is scarcely perceptible.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Laws, like the spider's web catch the fly and let the hawk go free.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote:
Dear little not-so-innocents, beware of
Old Grandmother Spider: rump her endearments –
She’s not quite as nice as She looks, nor you quite
as tough as you think.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: I have lived eighty years of life and know nothing for it, but to be resigned and tell myself that flies are born to be eaten by spiders and man to be devoured by sorrow.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Spiders so large they appear to be wearing the pelts of small mammals.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: It is with eight lengthy legs we use to catch food, balance and knit a beautiful silk bed, but as babies we had lost our bones and skin, and hence our legs we had shed.
quotes.author: Jasmine Jean

quotes.quote: It's like the spiders are sharing an ancient secret with me, and that's why I'm going to spend the rest of my life studying spider silk.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hayashi

quotes.quote: Everything that the spider needs to make a spider-web is not found in the housefly it's right there in the spider! Whatever you need to make impacts is in you! Discover yourself and make a difference!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Laws are spider webs through which the big flies pass and the little ones get caught.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Spiders are anti-social, keep pests under control, and mostly mind their own business, but they somehow summon fear in humans who are far more dangerous, deceitful and have hurt more people. Of the two I'm more suspicious about the latter.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: When spider webs unite, they can tie up a lion.
quotes.author: Ethiopian

quotes.quote: Total relaxation is the secret to enjoying sitting meditation. I sit with my spine upright, but not rigid; and I relax all the muscles in my body.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: My body is damaged from music in two ways. I have a red irritation in my stomach. It's psychosomatic, caused by all the anger and the screaming. I have scoliosis, where the curvature of your spine is bent, and the weight of my guitar has made it worse. I'm always in pain, and that adds to the anger in our music.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: While you're in space, you grow in height! Without the constant force of gravity on your spine, it stretches out, and you're actually taller when you land. It doesn't last long though.
quotes.author: Christina Koch

quotes.quote: I was born with Spina bifida. That's where you have a hole in your spine, and your nerve endings come out.
quotes.author: John Mellencamp

quotes.quote: I use an electric wheelchair because I have no sense of balance, and muscle spasticity has arched my spine like a cat's, while my legs are really just for show.
quotes.author: Zach Anner

quotes.quote: Your core supports your spine and your torso. Everything you do depends on it.
quotes.author: Jaime Pressly

quotes.quote: My spine healed incorrectly. There were long periods when I'd be perfectly all right, and then there were many other times when I wasn't, when my back would give out and throw me down to the floor amid waves of nauseating pain.
quotes.author: Dick York

quotes.quote: The spine is the lifeline. A lot of people should go to a chiropractor but they don't know it.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: You only really discover the strength of your spine when your back is against the wall.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: A man is as old as his spine is flexible.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: If something goes wrong, don’t whine about it. Have a spine about it. Adjust, adapt, and move forward.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Get knowledge of the spine, for this is the requisite for many diseases.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: If you would seek health, look first to the spine.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: I have a bad back partially from playing the drums and singing. I used to have to hold my body in such a position that my spine got out of alignment.
quotes.author: Don Henley

quotes.quote: Without the accurate spine movement, one can't exist dynamically.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Many a man has failed because he had his wishbone where his backbone should have been.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of spine and stomach to make yourself into something when no one gives you a foundation.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: The spine as a whole operates as a functional unit. Each vertabra can affect its neighbor and one portion of the spine may affect or damage other areas of the body.
quotes.author: Don Davis

quotes.quote: TAIL, n. The part of an animal's spine that has transcended its natural limitations to set up an independent existence in a world of its own.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: To understand others you should get behind their eyes and walk down their spines.
quotes.author: Rod McKuen

quotes.quote: We take each week as it comes; we're juggling just like everybody else. It's all about spinning plates.
quotes.author: Katherine Kelly

quotes.quote: Reality had no gears, and you never knew what surprises would come spinning out of its chaos.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: It is the peculiar nature of the world to go on spinning no matter what sort of heartbreak is happening.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: Fortune's not content with knocking a man down; she sends him spinning head over heels, crash upon crash.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Abruptness is an eloquence in parting, when spinning out the time is but the weaving of new sorrow.
quotes.author: John Suckling

quotes.quote: Whatever may happen to you, it was prepared for you from all eternity; and the implication of causes was from eternity spinning the thread of your being, and of that which is incident to it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Great is the man who can overcome the world, but greater still is the man who can overcome himself, for he will have the world spinning on the palm of his hand.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The world turns on a dime, the same now as it always has — which is to say, money makes the world go 'round. It's also what makes the world go spinning out of control.
quotes.author: John Murray

quotes.quote: Your dreams may not be happening, and things aren't turning out the way you expected, but that doesn't mean your life is spinning out of control. It just means you're not in control.
quotes.author: Pete Wilson

quotes.quote: One small changed family doesn't calculate into a world that has been spinning for a billion years. But one small change makes the world spin differently in a billion ways for one family.
quotes.author: Mary E. Pearson

quotes.quote: Wonder and despair are two sides of a spinning coin. When you open yourself to one, you open yourself to the other. You discover a capacity for joy that wasn't in you before. Wonder is the promise of restoration: as deeply as you dive, so may you rise.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: I don't think balance is ever achieved in the full sense of the word. Life is more like a juggling act, spinning plates in the air, allowing some to drop, and picking them back up or adding new ones when the timing is right.
quotes.author: Candace Cameron

quotes.quote: We come spinning out of nothingness, scattering stars like dust.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: My head's a carousel of pictures and the spinning never stops.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.quote: You live long enough in a world spinning on its axis, you learn to spin in the same direction.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: If something bothers you, focus on the solution or the desired outcome, not the part that has you spinning out in the middle of the night.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.quote: We are spinning our own fates, good or evil, never to be undone.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: As long as the world is turning and spinning, we're gonna be dizzy and we're gonna make mistakes.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: As fast as I can tell there are only two emotions that keep the world spinning year after year...One is fear. The other is desire.
quotes.author: Deborah Harkness

quotes.quote: All work, even cotton spinning, is noble; work is alone noble... A life of ease is not for any man, nor for any god.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The essence of being human is that, in the brief moment we exist on this spinning planet, we can love some persons and some things, in spite of the fact that time and death will ultimately claim us all.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: We are reinventing the world. We've set the ball spinning with little concern for where and how it's going to stop.
quotes.author: Daniel Keys Moran

quotes.quote: A spinning coin, still balanced on its rim, may fall in either direction.
quotes.author: Annie Proulx

quotes.quote: Nobody can survive alone, in this world. People have bonds, and sometimes those bonds are broken. And then, that person goes spinning off and connects with someone else.
quotes.author: Glen Mazzara

quotes.quote: In my better sense of mind, I know that Im far from alone and far from the worst, and the earth keeps spinning. Everything keeps moving, with or without me.
quotes.author: Phil Anselmo

quotes.quote: Modern man must descend the spiral of his own absurdity to the lowest point; only then can he look beyond it. It is obviously impossible to get around it, jump over it, or simply avoid it.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: When you’re stuck in a spiral, to change all aspects of the spin you need only to change one thing.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: The spiral is a spiritualized circle. In the spiral form, the circle, uncoiled, has ceased to be vicious; it has been set free.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: A circle is the reflection of eternity. It has no beginning and it has no end - and if you put several circles over each other, then you get a spiral.
quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

quotes.quote: You can make bad choices and find yourself in a downward spiral or you can find something that gets you out of it.
quotes.author: Ray LaMontagne

quotes.quote: When someone is denying what they are, then that's when things start to spiral down.
quotes.author: Will.I.Am

quotes.quote: Silence is the root of everything. If you spiral into its void a hundred voices will thunder messages you long to hear.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Success is not arriving at the summit of a mountain as a final destination. It is a continuing upward spiral of progress. It is perpetual growth.
quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.quote: By admitting a mistake, it is easier to get yourself out of a spiral.
quotes.author: Toto Wolff

quotes.quote: The farther we get from God, the more the world spirals out of control.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: If you ever take your foot off the gas pedal, things will spiral out of control, snowball downwards.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: If we focus on the minuses, we go down the spiral. But if we are able to focus on the pluses, we can become stronger and put more meaning into our life.
quotes.author: Petra Nemcova

quotes.quote: Progress has not followed a straight ascending line, but a spiral with rhythms of progress and retrogression, of evolution and dissolution.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: This seems to be the law of progress in everything we do; it moves along a spiral rather than a perpendicular; we seem to be actually going out of the way, and yet it turns out that we were really moving upward all the time.
quotes.author: Frances E. Willard

quotes.quote: The human mind always makes progress, but it is a progress in spirals.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: The ultimate weakness of violence is that it is a descending spiral, begetting the very thing that it seeks to destroy
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Inner peace doesn't come from getting what we want, but from remembering who we are.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: We undertake certain spiritual exercises to achieve alignment with the creative energy of the universe.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: In order to experience everyday spirituality, we need to remember that we are spiritual beings spending some time in a human body.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: The spiritual path is simply the journey of living our lives. Everyone is on a spiritual path; most people just don't know it.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: We have always been involved in spiritual evolution. We are spiritual beings, we have always been spiritual beings and we will always be spiritual beings.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Spiritual relationship is far more precious than physical. Physical relationship divorced from spiritual is body without soul.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: When we grow in spiritual consciousness, we identify with all that is in the world there is no exploitation. It is ourselves we're helping, ourselves we're healing.
quotes.author: Govindappa Venkataswamy

quotes.quote: The new spirituality is that it will produce an experience in human encounters in which we become a living demonstration of the basic spiritual teaching 'We are all one.'
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Humility is the most important quality in the spiritual life. When it is lacking spiritual growth stops.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: It isn't until you come to a spiritual understanding of who you are - not necessarily a religious feeling, but deep down, the spirit within - that you can begin to take control.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Attachment to spiritual things is... just as much an attachment as inordinate love of anything else.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The spiritual journey is individual, highly personal. It can't be organized or regulated. It isn't true that everyone should follow one path. Listen to your own truth.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Learning to celebrate joy is one of the great practices of the spiritual life.
quotes.author: Joan D. Chittister

quotes.quote: Your spiritual journey and your spiritual welfare are really dependent on two primary factors: One, your ability to meditate and two, your ability to give of yourself.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Spiritual life and secure life do not go together; to save oneself on must struggle and take risks.
quotes.author: Ignazio Silone

quotes.quote: The spiritual journey is the unlearning of fear and the acceptance of love.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: When there's nothing but humility, there's nothing but spiritual oneness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The inward journey is about finding your own fullness, something that no one else can take away.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Spiritual knowledge is fruitful only when it is applied.
quotes.author: Shri Radhe Maa

quotes.quote: The more light you allow within you, the brighter the world you live in will be.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Problems are spiritual lessons from God-spiritual lessons to be learned.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: There are no planes in the spiritual life; we are either going uphill or coming down.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: The first act of awe, when man was struck with the beauty or wonder of Nature, was the first spiritual experience.
quotes.author: Henryk Skolimowski

quotes.quote: Spiritual stagnation ensues when man's environment becomes unpredictable or when his inner life is made wholly predictable.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: In the spiritual life, as in all organic processes, everyone has their optimum and it is just as harmful to go beyond it as not to attain it.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: Each of us is here to discover our true selves; that essentially we are spiritual beings who have taken manifestation in physical form; that we're not human beings that have occasional spiritual experiences, that we're spiritual beings that have occasional human experiences.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Spiritual education is not a distinct and separate discipline; it is part and parcel of all types and levels of education, In fact, it is the very foundation on which a lasting edifice can be built.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: We don't sit in meditation to become good meditators. We sit in meditation so that we'll become more awake in our lives.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Impart as much as you can of your spiritual being to those who are on the road with you, and accept as something precious what comes back to you from them.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The spiritual journey is the unlearning of fear and the acceptance of love.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The spiritual is inclusive. It is the deepest sense of belonging and participation.We all participate in the spiritual at all times, whether we know it or not.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: Every night, when I go to sleep, I die. Every morning, when I wake up, I am reborn.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Awakening begins when a man realizes that he is going nowhere and does not know where to go.
quotes.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

quotes.quote: The awakening of the soul to its bondage and its effort to stand up and assert itself - this is called life.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: A global awakening can only happen from a spiritual awakening that is of global dimensions.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.quote: Awakening your spiritual side is really what artists do. When you hit a groove, it's not you; it's the spirit world.
quotes.author: Tommy Chong

quotes.quote: The real spiritual progress of the aspirant is measured by the extent to which he achieves inner tranquility.
quotes.author: Sivananda

quotes.quote: Our essential nature is one of pure potentiality.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The great awareness comes slowly, piece by piece. The path of spiritual growth is a path of lifelong learning. The experience of spiritual power is basically a joyful one.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: The awakening is finally realizing that you are a part of God, like a single cell that finally sees it is a part of you
quotes.author: L.J. Vanier

quotes.quote: The spiritual journey is individual, highly personal. It can't be organized or regulated. It isn't true that everyone should follow one path. Listen to your own truth.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: When we quit thinking primarily about ourselves and our own self-preservation, we undergo a truly heroic transformation of consciousness.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: You learn who you are by unlearning who they taught you to be.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: No great spiritual awakening has begun anywhere in the world apart from united prayer.
quotes.author: J. Edwin Orr

quotes.quote: It's exhilarating to be alive in a time of awakening consciousness; it can also be confusing, disorienting, and painful.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: Spiritual knowledge is fruitful only when it is applied
quotes.author: Shri Radhe Maa

quotes.quote: The greatest privilege of a human life is to become a midwife to the awakening of the Soul in another person.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: You can have a spiritual awakening and discover a new side of you at any age. And best of all, love can happen at any age. Life can just start to get exciting when you're in your 40s and 50s. You have to believe that.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: Awakening is about liberating yourself from the prison that is the world of the mind and daring to be here as all that you are.
quotes.author: Leonard Jacobson

quotes.quote: Right now we're in a special and powerful position, because the world is having a spiritual awakening.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.quote: Your greatest awakening comes, when you are aware about your infinite nature.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Spiritual Awakening is awakening from the dream of thought.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Spiritual awakening is the most essential thing in man's life, and it is the sole purpose of being. Is not civilization, in all its tragic forms, a supreme motive for spiritual awakening?
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Spiritually, the Holy Land really stirs you up and starts awakening many things in your life.
quotes.author: Ken Duncan

quotes.quote: The solution to the problem of the day is the awakening of the consciousness of humanity to the divinity within.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Spiritual awakening - is becoming awake to the aliveness of this moment.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: There has never been a spiritual awakening in any country or locality that did not begin in united prayer.
quotes.author: Arthur Tappan Pierson

quotes.quote: The more light you allow within you, the brighter the world you live in will be.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: It is the darkness that makes the light visible, and not the other way around.
quotes.author: Nancy Venable Raine

quotes.quote: Accept your dark side, understanding it will help you to move with the light. Knowing both sides of our souls, helps us all to move forward in life and to understand that, perfection doesn't exist.
quotes.author: Martin R. Lemieux

quotes.quote: No one enjoys being cross-examined, or accused of having something wrong in their lives. But as we grow as Christians we come to the painful recognition that we have an almost unlimited capacity for self-deception. We slowly learn that we need to be stopped in our tracks by God. He uses Scripture to do this... We cannot reach our destination if we are travelling in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Sinclair B. Ferguson

quotes.quote: With God, there's always an appointed time for things, and when you put Him first, trust in His timing, and keep the faith, miracles happen!
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Spiritual maturity is measured in terms of persevering faith, not perfect behavior.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Jesus calls us to his rest, and meekness is His method. The meek man cares not at all who is greater than he, for he has long ago decided that the esteem of the world is not worth the effort.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: If a man does not exercise his arm he develops no biceps muscle; and if a man does not exercise his soul, he acquires no muscle in his soul, no strength of character, no vigor of moral fiber, nor beauty of Spiritual growth.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.quote: Spiritual development is not an accomplishment but a way of life. It is an orientation that brings its own rewards, and what is important is the direction of one's motives.
quotes.author: David R. Hawkins

quotes.quote: The stiff and wooden quality about our religious lives is a result of our lack of holy desire. Complacency is a deadly foe of all spiritual growth. Acute desire must be present or there will be no manifestation of Christ to His people.
quotes.author: A. W. Tozer

quotes.quote: It is not the number of books you read, nor the variety of sermons you hear, nor the amount of religious conversation in which you mix, but it is the frequency and earnestness with which you meditate on these things till the truth in them becomes your own and part of your being, that ensures your growth.
quotes.author: Frederick William Robertson

quotes.quote: When you are spiritually connected, you are not looking for occasions to be offended, and you are not judging and labeling others. You are in a state of grace in which you know you are connected to God and thus free from the effects of anyone or anything external to yourself.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: A misleading perception or false belief is increasingly being perpetuated that the unconscious or the intuitive is all that really matters in any spiritual endeavor, and that the conscious, rational, logical, analytical mind is the mortal enemy of spiritual awareness and soul growth.
quotes.author: Anthon St. Maarten

quotes.quote: When you plant a seed of love, it is you that blossoms.
quotes.author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

quotes.quote: Convince yourself everyday that you are worthy of a good life. Let go of stress, breathe. Stay positive, all is well.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: We stand before a burning bush whenever other human beings share with us something of their relationship with God or something of the movements of their hearts. In such moments may we always realize that we stand on holy ground.
quotes.author: Margaret Silf

quotes.quote: Spiritual growth depends on two things: first a willingness to live according to the Word of God; second, a willingness to take whatever consequences emerge as a result.
quotes.author: Sinclair B. Ferguson

quotes.quote: The path of spiritual growth is a path of lifelong learning.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Spiritual opening is not a withdrawal to some imagined realm or safe cave. It is not a pulling away, but a touching of all the experience of life with wisdom and with a heart of kindness, without any separation.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: Too often we fail to appreciate that (the) apprehension of God is not only the test of our worship, but also the test of our spiritual growth. A Christian's real development in spiritual life will always be revealed by how he or she thinks about God - how much he thinks about Him, and how highly he thinks about Him.
quotes.author: Sinclair B. Ferguson

quotes.quote: The Bible is the divine means of developing spiritual maturity. There is no other way.
quotes.author: Howard G. Hendricks

quotes.quote: What makes one strong is not the ability to confront adversity and cruelty, but rather the ability to love in spite of it.
quotes.author: Christopher Earle

quotes.quote: We all have the same root, and are connectedâ€¦ To tap into this connectedness we must go within.
quotes.author: Summerlyn Guthrie

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to ever do is to reveal the naked soul to the world. However, in doing so brings healing, growth, strength, and powerful inspiration!
quotes.author: H.E. Olsen

quotes.quote: Give yourself permission to see and feel the extraordinary events in your own life. In internalizing them, you also will find your perspective about life and its meaning will change, resulting in growth and expansion of your soul.
quotes.author: Susan Barbara Apollon

quotes.quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ encompasses much more than avoiding, overcoming, and being cleansed from sin and the bad influences in our lives; it also essentially entails doing good, being good, and becoming better. Repenting of our sins and seeking forgiveness are spiritually necessary, and we must always do so.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote: When I release my weaknesses and blind spots to God, He uses them to help me grow up spiritually.
quotes.author: Crystal McDowell

quotes.quote: For every spirit who is learning: you heal yourself.
quotes.author: Thaiia Senquetta

quotes.quote: The path is paved with consistent, conscious mental and spiritual alertness and the gradual growth of goodness in our heart and clarity in our mind. We are awake. If we keep trying to understand, we will understand. If we keep telling ourselves that we are loved by Life and if we keep looking for evidence of that love, we will find it.
quotes.author: Donna Goddard

quotes.quote: Adversity is not simply a tool. It is God's most effective tool for the advancement of our spiritual lives. The circumstances and events that we see as setbacks are oftentimes the very things that launch us into periods of intense spiritual growth. Once we begin to understand this, and accept it as a spiritual fact of life, adversity becomes easier to bear.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: God has such gladness every time he sees from heaven that a sinner is praying to Him with all his heart, as a mother has when she sees the first smile on her baby's face.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Love is the offspring of spiritual affinity and unless that affinity is created in a moment, it will not be created for years or even generations.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: The spiritual meaning of love is measured by what it can do. Love is meant to heal. Love is meant to renew. Love is meant to bring us closer to God.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: For some people, the point of no return begins at the very moment their souls become aware of each others existence.
quotes.author: JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Beauty is certainly a soft, smooth, slippery thing, and therefore of a nature which easily slips in and permeates our souls.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: What is planted in each person's soul will sprout.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Wherever you are lacking, your obedience in working on that before your mate comes is vital.
quotes.author: Angelo M. Swinso

quotes.quote: To see the universal and all pervading Spirit of Truth face to face, one must be able to love the meanest of all creation as oneself.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Your giving and searching for ways to give is love in action. This is the evidence of Spirit at work.
quotes.author: Marshall Vian Summers

quotes.quote: Don't ever think you are nothing. Somewhere along the line, there is going to be someone who thinks you are everything.
quotes.author: M.H.S. Pourr

quotes.quote: He who is filled with love is filled with God himself.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: If you want the moon, do not hide at night. If you want a rose, do not run from the thorns. If you want love, do not hide from yourself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Spiritual love is a position of standing with one hand extended into the universe and one hand extended into the world, letting ourselves be a conduit for passing energy.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: The spiritual journey is the unlearning of fear and the acceptance of love.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Divine love glorifies heart & shines soul it makes one pure from body, mind, and soul.
quotes.author: Mamta Rajshree

quotes.quote: Whenever your foundation is laid in God, there will be nothing that can shake it, no matter how strong the storm is.
quotes.author: Angelo M. Swinson

quotes.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Love is the most satisfying way to control the mind. Bhakti makes us single-minded when it awakens our innate spirit of love.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: You can never love another person unless you are equally involved in the beautiful but difficult spiritual work of learning to love yourself.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The human soul is on its journey from the law to love, from discipline to liberation, from the moral plane to the spiritual.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: A sacrifice to be real must cost, must hurt, and must empty ourselves. Give yourself fully to God. He will use you to accomplish great things on the condition that you believe much more in his love than in your weakness.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Each of us are angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.
quotes.author: Luciano De Cescenzo

quotes.quote: To love another person is to see the face of God.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Being with God is an intense experience of love, calling and purpose. The more you focus on this, the more it melts aware the icy cold of separation, like the sun melting the ice off of the mountain.
quotes.author: Marshall Vian Summers

quotes.quote: Spiritual love, derived from love intelligence, is nonconditional, nonpersonal benevolence. It is the love of being loving, with no strings attached, just for the sake of being what God wants us to be.
quotes.author: Thomas Hora

quotes.quote: Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone's soul heal. Walk out of your house like a shepherd.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: I ignored your aura but it grabbed me by the hand, like the moon pulled the tide, and the tide pulled the sand.
quotes.author: Talib Kweli

quotes.quote: Some people come and go and are forgotten. But there are other people who share a part in our destinies. They come, they go, but they are never forgotten. They come, they go, but even after they go they're still here. They never really went anywhere.
quotes.author: JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: The real meaning of detached love is to let others exist without forcing our will upon them. That is spiritual love.
quotes.author: Harold Klemp

quotes.quote: He loved constantly, instantly, spontaneously, without thought or words. That's what he taught me. Love is not something you think about, it is a state in which you dwell. That was his gift.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: Spirituality is indeed the master key of the Indian mind; the sense of the infinitive is native to it.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.quote: Most importantly, the meaning of spirituality lays the seeds for our destiny and the path we must follow.
quotes.author: Dennis Banks

quotes.quote: Saying thank you is more than good manners. It is good spirituality.
quotes.author: Alfred Painter

quotes.quote: In order to experience everyday spirituality, we need to remember that we are spiritual beings spending some time in a human body.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: It is the inner life that is to spark the change in consciousness that will permit us to advance.
quotes.author: Brother Wayne Teasdale

quotes.quote: I think we have to be careful about what we label as a prerequisite for spirituality. I don't think you have to know a lot to have a spiritual life, but knowing gives life richness.
quotes.author: Olympia Dukakis

quotes.quote: We can no more do without spirituality than we can do without food, shelter, or clothing.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: I have a much wider, freer view about spirituality. I feel that people need to pursue it on their own, personally. You know, let it be theirs - a personal relationship with their soul, or their God, or with their church.
quotes.author: Peter Jurasik

quotes.quote: Any spirituality can be enhanced with the practice or study of yoga.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.quote: Being spiritual has nothing to do with what you believe and everything to do with your state of consciousness.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: You have to grow from the inside out. None can teach you, none can make you spiritual. There is no other teacher but your own soul.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: A rebirth out of spiritual adversity causes us to become new creatures.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: I think a spiritual journey is not so much a journey of discovery. It's a journey of recovery. It's a journey of uncovering your own inner nature. It's already there.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.quote: The goal of spiritual practice is full recovery, and the only thing you need to recover from is a fractured sense of self.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Spirituality is meant to take us beyond our tribal identity into a domain of awareness that is more universal.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Before one accepts spirituality, astrology is very powerful, like a lion. Then when one enters into a deeper spiritual life, astrology becomes a tiny household cat.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: We should honor Mother Earth with gratitude; otherwise our spirituality may become hypocritical.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: The new spirituality is that it will produce an experience in human encounters in which we become a living demonstration of the basic spiritual teaching 'We are all one.'
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: The spiritual quest is not some added benefit to our life, something you embark on if you have the time and inclination. We are spiritual beings on an earthly journey. Our spirituality makes up our beingness.
quotes.author: John Bradshaw

quotes.quote: I'm touched by the idea that when we do things that are useful and helpful - collecting these shards of spirituality - that we may be helping to bring about a healing.
quotes.author: Leonard Nimoy

quotes.quote: Twelve-step promotes spirituality, not religion. It gives a practical, day-to-day spirituality that tells me what I can and cannot control. There is room to be imperfect and to be someone who struggles to find God.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Spirituality lies in what you do and how you do it and not what result you get.
quotes.author: Kapil Dev

quotes.quote: To be a light to others you will need a good dose of the spiritual life. Because as my mother used to say, if you are in a good place, then you can help others; but if you're not well, then go look for somebody who is in a good place who can help you.
quotes.author: Rigoberta Menchu

quotes.quote: Our spirituality is our opening to one another as whole human beings, each different and precious, and our exploring how we can truly learn to love.
quotes.author: Jean Grasso Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: Keeping the Sabbath day holy is much more than just physical rest. It involves spiritual renewal and worship.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: The most important thing that happens within Christian spirituality is when a person falls in love with Jesus.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: I think spirituality is a good thing but I dislike any sort of dogmatic organization.
quotes.author: Noah Taylor

quotes.quote: You probably have to split yourself in various ways just in order to survive, and to think of yourself as a multitude.
quotes.author: Vijay Seshadri

quotes.quote: Sometimes something catastrophic can occur in a split second that changes a person's life forever; other times one minor incident can lead to another and then another and another, eventually setting off just as big a change in a body's life.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: To split yourself in two is just the most radical thing you can do
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Without awareness of bodily feeling and attitude, a person becomes split into a disembodied spirit and a disenchanted body.
quotes.author: Alexander Lowen

quotes.quote: A split second is nothing compared to twenty-four hours. On God's clock you're in the middle of your millisecond. Compared to eternity, what is seventy, eighty, ninety years?
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Some split between the inner world and outer world is common to all behaviour, and the need to bridge the gap is the source of creative behaviour.
quotes.author: Anthony Storr

quotes.quote: Learn this great secret of life: What people call interruption or disturbance to their routine is just as much a part of living as the routine. To split life into two parts, one called routine and the other called interruption, is to be caught between them.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: The soul can split the sky in two and let the face of God shine through.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: The total possible consciousness may be split into parts which co-exist but mutually ignore each other.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The mightiest rivers lose their force when split up into several streams.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: There's moments when you have to make a split-second decision that will form you for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Dash Mihok

quotes.quote: The split second she ceases to care is the only time a woman ceases to be attractive.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Life would split apart without letters.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: A split second can ruin or boost the sequence.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: The great thing about irony is that it splits things apart, gets up above them so we can see the flaws and hypocrisies and duplicates.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: You don't need everyone to help you. You just need one touch of favor, and you will accomplish in a split second what could have taken your whole lifetime.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: You cannot separate the composition from the life of the moment. It is all one thing, to be decided in a split second while you're living through it.
quotes.author: Edwin Land

quotes.quote: The world is split into two halves: the bacon, and the bacon eaters.
quotes.author: Nick Offerman

quotes.quote: Every great mistake has a halfway moment, a split second when it can be recalled and perhaps remedied.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: The future is a split second away.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: To avoid a split between what men consciously know because they are aware of having learned it by a specific job of learning, and what they unconsciously know because they have absorbed it in the formation of their characters by intercourse with others, becomes an increasingly delicate task with every development of special schooling.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Badness is only spoiled goodness.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: We shouldn’t always have what we want: it spoils the best of us, doesn’t it?
quotes.author: Anne Brontë

quotes.quote: Mother would not like him to be too rude to this girl, even if she was the spoiled little monster for whose entertainment his life had been ruined.
quotes.author: Noor Al-Shanti

quotes.quote: Never fear spoiling children by making them too happy. Happiness is the atmosphere in which all good affections grow
quotes.author: Thomas Bray

quotes.quote: A happy childhood has spoiled many a promising life.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: All charming people, I fancy, are spoiled. It is the secret of their attraction.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is not the young people that degenerate; they are not spoiled till those of mature age are already sunk into corruption.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: I realize I am very privileged. But there's a difference between being spoiled and privileged.
quotes.author: Petra Stunt

quotes.quote: Perhaps people, and kids especially, are spoiled today, because all the kids today have cars, it seems. When I was young you were lucky to have a bike.
quotes.author: James Cagney

quotes.quote: But then I had long mistaken being spoiled for being strong, being defiant for being independent, being reckless for being brave.
quotes.author: Tami Hoag

quotes.quote: A spoiled child who's grown up in ease and luxury.. who's always had her own way... and who's misdirected energies are so childish that they hardly deserve the comment.
quotes.author: Morrie Ryskind

quotes.quote: I'm going to a five-star spa to be pampered and spoiled, which, come to think of it, is sorta my life anyway.
quotes.author: Russel Marcus

quotes.quote: I'm what you'd call a spoiled child of the rich.
quotes.author: Frank Fenton

quotes.quote: Maybe the problem here is your daughter and that she's a spoiled.
quotes.author: Gigi Levangie

quotes.quote: A spoiled child is a nuisance, and that's unfortunate, because the child, of course, had no choice in the matter.
quotes.author: John Rosemond

quotes.quote: People who are spoiled are accustomed to having their own way.
quotes.author: Robert Riskin

quotes.quote: But all I remember of you is a spoiled bully who used to burn my hair as a child.
quotes.author: Pen Densham

quotes.quote: Right. A gun-happy farm girl, an ugly dog, a wet-behind-the-ears cop and a spoiled brat. What a team!
quotes.author: Luc Besson

quotes.quote: Everybody spoils me. Nobody loves me.
quotes.author: Agnès Varda

quotes.quote: An ignorant, spoiled and anxious wretch makes a rotten clergyman.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: A child becomes 'spoiled' when his craving forf the parent's sincere interest, attention, respect, and devotion.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berger

quotes.quote: For many children, Grandma's house is the place where you get spoiled.
quotes.author: Rae Simons

quotes.quote: In every neighborhood, on every block, a spoiled child can be found.
quotes.author: Donna Jones

quotes.quote: Our children will never break out of the 'it's all about me' perspective as long as we allow life to be all about them.
quotes.author: Donna Jones

quotes.quote: When we give in to the whims of our children, bribe our children to behave with the promise of the latest toys and gadgets, or overindulge our children, we contribute to an 'I'm entitled' mentality.
quotes.author: Donna Jones

quotes.quote: Real love is the kind of love that helps a child break out of the chains of self-centered living into the freedom of unselfishness.
quotes.author: Donna Jones

quotes.quote: Last borns can be rebellious, critical, temperamental, spoiled, impatient, and impetuous.
quotes.author: Kevin Leman

quotes.quote: Because they're often spoiled, last borns are typically self-centered.
quotes.author: Kevin Leman

quotes.quote: Truth is, kids don't arrive in this world selfish. Research shows that our children are born with the marvelous gift to care and be concerned about others.
quotes.author: Michele Borba

quotes.quote: Selfish, spoiled kids are found to be less happy and satisfied about life.
quotes.author: Michele Borba

quotes.quote: The spoken word community was significant in making me want to write accessible and urgent poems. Bob Holman, in particular, was an impressive figure.
quotes.author: Denise Duhamel

quotes.quote: Our spoken word first hammers a thing desired into shape. Our continued spoken word brings this shaped substance forth and clothes it with a visible body.
quotes.author: H. Emilie Cady

quotes.quote: No poet will ever take the written word as a substitute for the spoken word; he knows that it is on the spoken word, and the spoken word only, that his art is founded.
quotes.author: Lascelles Abercrombie

quotes.quote: Spoken word poetry is the art of performance poetry. I tell people it involves creating poetry that doesn't just want to sit on paper, that something about it demands it be heard out loud or witnessed in person.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: Spoken word teaches that if you have the ability to express yourself and the courage to present those stories and opinions, you could be rewarded with a room full of your peers or your community who will listen.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: The written word endures, the spoken word disappears.
quotes.author: Neil Postman

quotes.quote: Every spoken word arouses our self-will.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The real meaning of the spoken word has to be demonstrated by practical deeds.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The spoken word vanished with the wind. Likewise, the unrecorded life disappears as if it never existed.
quotes.author: Iris Chang

quotes.quote: When the written and spoken word is censored, the urban landscape becomes a nation's only physical link to the past.
quotes.author: Ma Jian

quotes.quote: Between thought and spoken word is a gap where intention can enter, the symbol be twisted aside, and the lie come to be.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: To me, presentations are the most powerful device. You can't really name a movement that didn't start with the spoken word.
quotes.author: Nancy Duarte

quotes.quote: The spoken word was the first technology by which man was able to let go of his environment in order to grasp it in a new way.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: While the spoken word can travel faster, you cant take it home in your hand. Only the written word can be absorbed wholly at the convenience of the reader.
quotes.author: Kingman Brewster

quotes.quote: The fact that we do not speak it but sing it only expresses the fact that our spoken words are inadequate to express what we want to say, that the burden of our song goes far beyond all human words.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: There is an intelligence factor that works with the spoken word. With words, you have to understand meaning and nuances and things like that. You have to be able to relate…but with music it’s just music.
quotes.author: Tommy Chong

quotes.quote: Written words differ from spoken words in being material structures. A spoken word is a process in the physical world, having an essential time-order; a written word is a series of pieces of matter, having an essential space-order.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Insight into character comes from listening intently to the spoken word. The physical person, their charisma, charm and dramatic flair is more often used to persuade audiences, as they use these stealth tools of disguise and deception.
quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

quotes.quote: Rap and spoken word have reawakened the country to poetry in itself. Texting and Twitter encourage creative uses of casual language, in ways I have celebrated widely. But we've fallen behind on savoring the formal layer of our language.
quotes.author: John McWhorter

quotes.quote: Many a spoken word is more piercing than an attack.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: Through his spoken word, man is continually making laws for himself.
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.quote: Fifty years ago, the spoken word reigned, but during the last fifty years, the power has gone over to pictures.
quotes.author: Pipilotti Rist

quotes.quote: The spoken word is never really effective unless it is backed up by a life, but it is also true that the living deed is never adequate without the support the spoken word can provide.
quotes.author: D. Elton Trueblood

quotes.quote: Human beings do not relate to written words in the same way that they will relate to spoken words. They do not relate to music in the same way that they do to pictures. It's all different parts of our head, different parts of our minds processing this.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Of the modes of persuasion furnished by the spoken word there are three kinds. The first kind depends on the personal character of the speaker; the second on putting the audience into a certain frame of mind; the third on the proof, provided by the words of the speech itself.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Spontaneity is a meticulously prepared art
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Through spontaneity we are re-formed into ourselves.
quotes.author: Viola Spolin

quotes.quote: The moment you exchange spontaneity with rules you've lost the edge of romance
quotes.author: François Du Toit

quotes.quote: If you follow a recipe for life, spontaneity will be cooked.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: Plan to be spontaneous tomorrow.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: To be spontaneous means not to act out of the past, because out of the past is all cunningness, cleverness, calculation, arithmetic.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Charity should be spontaneous. Calculated altruism is an affront.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Poetry is the spontaneous overflow of powerful feelings: it takes its origin from emotion recollected in tranquility.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The true enjoyments must be spontaneous and compulsive and look to no remoter end.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Romance should be spontaneous, but in my career I'm totally in control.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: Be spontaneous, be creative, go out and have fun, let things happen naturally.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: Be spontaneous, be truthful, be free, and thus be individuals!
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: Being spontaneous at times is a must. Being spontaneous all the time is a crazy person.
quotes.author: Ryan Hansen

quotes.quote: Spontaneity, left to itself, can begin by excusing bad behavior and end by congratulating vice.
quotes.author: N. T. Wright

quotes.quote: Spontaneous people are capable of as much love as well-organized people -- they're just messier.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Spontaneity is the province of youth.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: Analysis kills spontaneity. The grain once ground into flour springs and germinates no more.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Spontaneity is one of the joys of existence, especially if you prepare for it in advance.
quotes.author: Alan Dean Foster

quotes.quote: If the mind is calm, your spontaneity and honest thoughts appear. You become more spontaneous.
quotes.author: Chade Meng Tan

quotes.quote: Spontaneity is such an entertaining facet of show business.
quotes.author: Chuck Barris

quotes.quote: One of our principal virtue is spontaneity. This is our ability to act naturally, without being overly rational or self-conscious about every move we make.
quotes.author: Conrad Spainhower

quotes.quote: Spontaneity will tend to lower our defenses and show our true attitude about life.
quotes.author: Conrad Spainhower

quotes.quote: The essence of pleasure is spontaneity.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: Analysis kills spontaneity. The grain once ground into flour springs and germinates no more.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Only in spontaneity can we be who we truly are.
quotes.author: HJohn McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Dance as though no one is watching you. Love as though you have never been hurt before. Sing as though no one can hear you. Live as though heaven is on earth.
quotes.author: Souza

quotes.quote: Our spontaneous action is always the best . You cannot, with your best deliberation and heed, come so close to any question as your spontaneous glance shall bring you.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Through spontaniety we are re-formed into ourselves. It creates an explosion that for the moment frees us from the handed-down frames from reference, memory choked with old facts and information and undigested theories and techniques of other people's findings.
quotes.author: Viola Spolin

quotes.quote: Spontaniety is the moment of personal freedom. When we are faced with reality, and see it, explore it and act accordingly. In this reality the bits and pieces of ourselves function as an organic whole. It is the time of discovery, of experiencing, of creative expression.
quotes.author: Viola Spolin

quotes.quote: Being spontaneous often means not letting your rational mind say 'no' to your desires.
quotes.author: Conrad Spainhower

quotes.quote: All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous unpremeditated act without benefit of experience.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: We are spontaneous when we are at our genuine best.
quotes.author: Hilary Thayer Hamann

quotes.quote: Spontaneity is being present in the present.
quotes.author: Wei Wu Wei

quotes.quote: The spontaneous is the most beautiful thing that can appear in a picture, but nothing in art appears less spontaneously than that.
quotes.author: Jeff Wall

quotes.quote: Intent is a tool, not an obstacle, to seek spontaneity.
quotes.author: Kelly Borsheim
