quotes.quote: Our spontaneous action is always the best. You cannot, with your best deliberation and heed, come so close to any question as your spontaneous glance shall bring you.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No matter how many plans you make or how much in control you are, life is always winging it.
quotes.author: Carroll Bryant

quotes.quote: Better to be spontaneous and wrong than be cautious and right every single time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be spontaneous, be creative, go out and have fun, let things happen naturally.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: If you are always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Plans are invitation to disappointment.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.quote: Being spontaneous is being able to respond with confidence; calmly trusting that, whatever the outcome, you will have a positive if challenging experience that will lead to greater self-awareness and success.
quotes.author: Sylvia Clare

quotes.quote: Unplanned moments are always better than planned ones.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Through spontaneity we are re-formed into ourselves.
quotes.author: Viola Spolin

quotes.quote: Spontaneous kindness is to hipsters as high beams are to deer.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: If everything was planned, it would be dreadful. If everything was unplanned, it would be equally dreadful.
quotes.author: Errol Morris

quotes.quote: You can't be spontaneous within reason.
quotes.author: Brittany DeLaBarrera

quotes.quote: Being spontaneous at times is a must. Being spontaneous all the time is a crazy person.
quotes.author: Ryan Hansen

quotes.quote: Spontaneous actions of individuals, aiming at nothing else than at the improvement of their own state of satisfaction, undermined the prestige of the coercive status system step by step.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Spontaneity is a meticulously prepared art.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Success isn't the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.author: Reggie Leach

quotes.quote: The fact of spontaneity had thus far escaped reflection by its profundity and its intimacy; and, nevertheless, remark well that spontaneity is precisely the basis of reflection.
quotes.author: Victor Cousin

quotes.quote: You're never going to create all the happiness you deserve if you don't have spontaneity in your life.
quotes.author: Kenny Felderstein

quotes.quote: Being a spontaneous person doesn't mean you're a flake. You just can't have a life where everything is structured, organized and controlled.
quotes.author: Kenny Felderstein

quotes.quote: While most people pride themselves on being spontaneous, almost no one is.
quotes.author: Jenny Lyn

quotes.quote: A spontaneous person is the one who is up for whatever contingency may arise all of a sudden.
quotes.author: Jenny Lyn

quotes.quote: The nature of spontaneous attention tells us whether a person is frivolous, vulgar, narrow, open, or deep.
quotes.author: Boston Medical Library Association

quotes.quote: Spontaneous attention is the only existing form until education has come into play.
quotes.author: Boston Medical Library Association

quotes.quote: Humor is a spontaneous, wonderful bit of an outburst that just comes. It's unbridled, its unplanned, it's full of surprises.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Everything becomes magnified at night. Sounds travel in a different way, it's dark, and everything seems far more spooky.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.quote: There is something haunting in the light of the moon; it has all the dispassionateness of a disembodied soul, and something of its inconceivable mystery.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: You're spooky, he said, You knew what I was thinking. That's not spooky, she said, That's married.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: The whole idea of being mesmerized and not in control of your own actions is fascinating and a little spooky. I remember hearing about someone who'd gone to a magic act, and a person in the audience had become hypnotized by observing too closely what magician was doing on stage, and thought it was spooky to lose your consciousness that way.
quotes.author: Chris Van Allsburg

quotes.quote: I think about the characters I've created and then I sit down and start typing and see what they will do. There's a lot of subconscious thought that goes on. It amazes me to find out, a few chapters later, why I put someone in a certain place when I did. It's spooky.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Where there is no imagination there is no horror.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: There are nights when the wolves are silent and only the moon howls.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: I discovered that what most people call creepy, scary, and spooky, I call comfy, cozy, and home.
quotes.author: Zak Bagans

quotes.quote: It's a big spooky place when you're in it alone. It's like you can hear all the whispers of all the voices of all the actors who ever played here. Kind of creepy. Like a church can be creepy when it's empty. You ever been in a church after hours?
quotes.author: Benjamin R. Smith

quotes.quote: Fear of anything is like a creepy unseen ghost, an omnipresent force that turns you into it's puppet, strangles, weakens you. Fight your biggest fear, face it and stab it to death and watch it disappear around the corner forever.
quotes.author: Suyasha Subedi

quotes.quote: I love Halloween, and I love that feeling: the cold air, the spooky dangers lurking around the corner.
quotes.author: Evan Peters

quotes.quote: Shadows mutter, mist replies; darkness purrs as midnight sighs.
quotes.author: Rusty Fischer

quotes.quote: The moon has awoken with the sleep of the sun, the light has been broken; the spell has begun.
quotes.author: Midgard Morningstar

quotes.quote: 'Tis the night — the night of the graves delight and the warlocks are at their play; Ye think that without the wild winds shout, but no, it is they — it is they.
quotes.author: Cleveland Coxe

quotes.quote: Men say that in this midnight hour, the disembodied have power.
quotes.author: William Motherwell

quotes.quote: I've made up stuff that's turned out to be real, that's the spooky part.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Listing and counting have a spooky, magical power, and the holiday season is a spooky, magical time.
quotes.author: Elif Batuman

quotes.quote: I'm always interested in the spooky repurposing of everyday things.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: On Halloween, witches come true; wild ghosts escape from dreams. Each monster dances in the park.
quotes.author: Nicholas Gordon

quotes.quote: It's spooky how we'll never know how many people have died while trying to mail a chain letter.
quotes.author: Alex Bosworth

quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: To me, it doesn't matter how good you are. Sport is all about playing and competing.
quotes.author: Ian Botham

quotes.quote: You can't win unless you learn how to lose.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score?
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Serious sport has nothing to do with fair play. It is bound up with hatred, jealousy, boastfulness, disregard of all rules and sadistic pleasure in witnessing violence. In other words, it is war minus the shooting.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Just be patient. Let the game come to you. Don't rush. Be quick, but don't hurry.
quotes.author: Earl Monroe

quotes.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.
quotes.author: Mike Singletary

quotes.quote: Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better. It's hard to stay on top.
quotes.author: Paul Coffey

quotes.quote: The only way to prove that you're a good sport is to lose.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible
quotes.author: Frank L. Gaines

quotes.quote: I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability.
quotes.author: Bruce Jenner

quotes.quote: A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: The five Ss of sports training are: stamina, speed, strength, skill, and spirit, but the greatest of these is spirit.
quotes.author: Ken Doherty

quotes.quote: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

quotes.quote: Never give up, never give in, and when the upper hand is ours, may we have the ability to handle the win with the dignity that we absorbed the loss.
quotes.author: Doug Williams

quotes.quote: I've learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: If you can't outplay them, outwork them.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, you are running about average.
quotes.author: M.H. Alderson

quotes.quote: Continuous effort, not strength or intelligence, is the key to unlocking our potential.
quotes.author: Liane Cardes

quotes.quote: Pain is only temporary but victory is forever.
quotes.author: Jeremy H.

quotes.quote: Winning means you're willing to go longer, work harder, and give more than anyone else.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: I think sportsmanship is knowing that it is a game, that we are only as a good as our opponents, and whether you win or lose, to always give 100 percent.
quotes.author: Sue Wicks

quotes.quote: I can accept failure. Everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Sportsmanship for me is when a guy walks off the court and you really can't tell whether he won or lost, when he carries himself with pride either way.
quotes.author: Jim Courier

quotes.quote: If you spend a lot of time on sportsmanship, you're going to spend a lot of time losing.
quotes.author: Glenn Dobbs

quotes.quote: I would prefer even to lose with honor than to win by cheating.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: True sportsmanship is excellence in motion!
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: It's good sportsmanship to not pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Sometimes I think sportsmanship is a little bit forgotten in place of the individual attention.
quotes.author: Cal Ripken, Jr.

quotes.quote: You are never really playing an opponent. You are playing yourself, your own highest standards, and when you reach your limits, that is real joy.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: It does not matter how many times you get knocked down, but how many times you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: To play is in the mind. To win is in the heart.
quotes.author: Jennifer McCombs

quotes.quote: Victory is in the quality of the competition, not just the final score.
quotes.author: Mike Marshall

quotes.quote: Be more concerned with your character than with your reputation.Your character is what you really are while your reputation is merely what others think you are.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: I never thought about losing, but now that it's happened, the only thing is to do it right.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Every game, you have so many people watching you. You can show good sportsmanship by helping other players up, and not talking back to coaches and referees.
quotes.author: Kelly Fry

quotes.quote: Sportsmanship is not just about being nice. It is much more important than that. It's about realizing that you could not compete without an opponent and that she has the same goals as you.
quotes.author: Stephanie Deibler

quotes.quote: When you win, say nothing. When you lose, say less.
quotes.author: Paul Brown

quotes.quote: Never let a win get to your head, or a loss to your heart.
quotes.author: Chuck D

quotes.quote: Win as if you were used to it, lose as if you enjoyed it for a change.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sportsmanship, next to the Church, is the greatest teacher of morals.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Sportsmanship is making sure you have respect for the guy you're playing across from.
quotes.author: Warren Moon

quotes.quote: There is value in any experience that exercises those ethical restraints collectively called sportsmanship.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Don't praise your own good shots. Leave that function to your partner who, if a good sport, will not be slow in performing it.
quotes.author: Harry Vardon

quotes.quote: No matter if you win or lose, the most important thing in life is to enjoy what you have.
quotes.author: Dong Dong

quotes.quote: What winning is to me is not giving up, is no matter what's thrown at me, I can take it. And I can keep going.
quotes.author: Patrick Swayze

quotes.quote: Losing is no disgrace if you've given your best.
quotes.author: Jim Palmer

quotes.quote: Spouse: someone who'll stand by you through all the trouble you wouldn't have had if you'd stayed single.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A spouse is not a destination but a fellow traveler.
quotes.author: Sadghuru

quotes.quote: Spouses are great impediments to great enterprises.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A good husband makes a good wife.
quotes.author: John Florio

quotes.quote: Spouses in healthy relationships cherish each other's space and are champions of each other's causes.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: A deaf husband and a blind wife are always a happy couple.
quotes.author: John Florio

quotes.quote: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: The ideal husband understands every word his wife doesn't say.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Spouses should spend at least one full hour each day talking together about subjects that have nothing to do with their work or business. Children need at least ten minutes of face-to-face contact with their parents each day.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: A spouse is someone you can live with; a soulmate is someone you can't live without.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Your spouse is not a possession you attain, but a friend in which you trust & adore.
quotes.author: Robert Vanleeuwen

quotes.quote: Spouses have each other, and even when one eventually dies, they have memories of a time when they existed before that other person and can more readily imagine a life without them. Likewise, parents may have other children to be concerned with--a future to protect for them. To lose a sibling is to lose the one person with whom one shares a lifelong bond that is meant to continue on into the future.
quotes.author: John Corey Whaley

quotes.quote: A good spouse and health is a person's best wealth.
quotes.author: Ben Franklin

quotes.quote: The husband who decides to surprise his wife is often very much surprised himself.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: A man's wife has more power over him than the state has.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Your spouse's interest in your collection gives you permission to collect.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: When you bring in a new object into your house, your spouse may say, 'You didn't pay money for that?' When you sell it, your spouse will say, 'You're not going to sell that, are you?'
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: Tho' fortune change, his constant spouse remains, / Augments his joys, or mitigates his pains
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The joys of marriage are the heaven on earth, / Life's paradise, great princess, the soul's quiet, / Sinews of concord, earthy immortality, / Eternity of pleasures.
quotes.author: John Ford

quotes.quote: You must marry, or your life will be wasted. You can transmute love, ignore it, muddle it, but you can never pull it out of you...When I think what life is, and how seldom love is answered by love— Marry him; it is one of the moments for which the world was made.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: Marriage is the only known example of the happy meeting of the immovable object and the irresistible force.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Marriages are made in heaven, but they are lived on earth.
quotes.author: Nathan H. Gist

quotes.quote: A married man forms married habits and becomes dependent on marriage just as a sailor becomes dependent on the sea.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: We;— / They;— / Small words but mighty / In their span / Are bound the life and hopes of man / For them, life's best is centered around their love; / Till younger lives come all their love to prove.
quotes.author: John Oxenham

quotes.quote: The goal of our life should not be to find joy in marriage but to bring more love and truth into the world. We marry to assist each other in this task.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: There is no such cozy combination as man and wife.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Come, let's be a comfortable couple and take care of each other! How glad we shall be, that we have somebody we are fond of always, to talk go and sit with. Let's be a comfortable couple. Now, do, my dear!
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There is no more lovely, friendly, and charming relationship, communion, or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A person without a spouse is like a vase without flowers.
quotes.author: Cape Verde Islands

quotes.quote: For you are the one, / And I will keep my vow, / I'll love you until the end, / And I'll look around the bend, / To see our future in hand, / To see the one in a gown, / And the rest is to come, / Fore it is not the end.
quotes.author: Joshua Stone

quotes.quote: Springtime is the land awakening. The March winds are the morning yawn.
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.quote: Spring makes its own statement, so loud and clear that the gardener seems to be only one of the instruments, not the composer.
quotes.author: Geoffrey B. Charlesworth

quotes.quote: Everything is blooming most recklessly; if it were voices instead of colors, there would be an unbelievable shrieking into the heart of the night.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Spring is nature's way of saying, 'Let's party!'
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Behold, my friends, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embraces of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love!
quotes.author: Sitting Bull

quotes.quote: Spring is when you feel like whistling even with a shoe full of slush.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: The day the Lord created hope was probably the same day he created Spring.
quotes.author: Bern Williams

quotes.quote: Spring is when life's alive in everything.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Spring unlocks the flowers to paint the laughing soil.
quotes.author: Bishop Reginald Heber

quotes.quote: When there's new growth bursting out all over, everything fresh, green, and flourishing, the plants are little rockets of success going off every time you look at them.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Heriteau

quotes.quote: In the Spring a livelier iris changes on the burnish'd dove; In the Spring a young man's fancy lightly turns to thoughts of love.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Spring is sooner recognized by plants than by men.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Every spring is the only spring - a perpetual astonishment.
quotes.author: Ellis Peters

quotes.quote: But each spring a gardening instinct, sure as the sap rising in the trees, stirs within us. We look about and decide to tame another little bit of ground.
quotes.author: Lewis Gantt

quotes.quote: The sun was warm but the wind was chill. You know how it is with an April day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Now every field is clothed with grass, and every tree with leaves; now the woods put forth their blossoms, and the year assumes its gay attire.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Spring has returned. The Earth is like a child that knows poems.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Science has never drummed up quite as effective a tranquilizing agent as a sunny spring day.
quotes.author: W. Earl Hall

quotes.quote: You can cut all the flowers but you cannot keep Spring from coming.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: It's spring fever. That is what the name of it is. And when you've got it, you want-oh, you don't quite know what it is you do want, but it just fairly makes your heart ache, you want it so!
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Spring shows what God can do with a drab and dirty world.
quotes.author: Virgil Kraft

quotes.quote: The beautiful spring came; and when Nature resumes her loveliness, the human soul is apt to revive also.
quotes.author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quotes.quote: The first day of spring is one thing, and the first spring day is another. The difference between them is sometimes as great as a month.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: When spring comes the grass grows by itself.
quotes.author: Tao Te Ching

quotes.quote: Never yet was a springtime, when the buds forgot to bloom.
quotes.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quotes.quote: April hath put a spirit of youth in everything.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Spring's greatest joy beyond a doubt is when it brings the children out.
quotes.author: Edgar Guest

quotes.quote: It was one of those March days when the sun shines hot and the wind blows cold: when it is summer in the light, and winter in the shade.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Now Nature hangs her mantle green On every blooming tree, And spreads her sheets o' daisies white Out o'er the grassy lea.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: Spring hangs her infant blossoms on the trees, Rock'd in the cradle of the western breeze.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Spring is nature's way of saying, 'Let's party!'
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Spring won't let me stay in this house any longer! I must get out and breathe the air deeply again.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: Spring has returned. The Earth is like a child that knows poems.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: With the coming of spring, I am calm again.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: Spring is when life's alive in everything.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Behold, my friends, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embraces of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love!
quotes.author: Sitting Bull

quotes.quote: The beautiful spring came; and when Nature resumes her loveliness, the human soul is apt to revive also.
quotes.author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quotes.quote: In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: It's spring fever. That is what the name of it is. And when you've got it, you want oh, you don't quite know what it is you do want, but it just fairly makes your heart ache, you want it so!
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: On vacation, I totally unplug. I don't bring a laptop with me.
quotes.author: Will Wright

quotes.quote: A vacation from school should not mean hunger for our children.
quotes.author: Dina Titus

quotes.quote: I'm going to go away on vacation, I'm going to try to get away from the phone, away from scripts. I think it's important to sit back and think about what you want.
quotes.author: Parker Stevenson

quotes.quote: Oh, Spring! I want to go out and feel you and get inspiration. My old things seem dead. I want fresh contacts, more vital searching.
quotes.author: Emily Carr

quotes.quote: I think in spring, we don't want to wear makeup, we don't want to wear a ton of clothes, we just want everything to be easier.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: Spring is very energising to me.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: Hoe while it is spring, and enjoy the best anticipations. It is not much matter if things do not turn out well.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Holidays are all different depending on the company and time of your life.
quotes.author: Dominic Monaghan

quotes.quote: It was spring break, so the theater was always packed with high schools students. It was an animal house. I wanted to burn the place down.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Spring is a time to find out where you are, who you are, and move toward where you are going.
quotes.author: Penelope Trunk

quotes.quote: Holy cow, in the course of one week I feel like I've lived about a year!
quotes.author: Karlie Kloss

quotes.quote: Spring shows what God can do with a drab and dirty world.
quotes.author: Virgil A. Kraft

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Spring makes everything look filthy.
quotes.author: Katherine Whitehorn

quotes.quote: It's not Spring Break until somebody dies!
quotes.author: Daniel Tosh

quotes.quote: Poor, dear, silly Spring, preparing her annual surprise!
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: The world's favorite season is the spring. All things seem possible in May.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: April hath put a spirit of youth in everything.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Spring an experience in immortality.
quotes.author: Henry D. Thoreau

quotes.quote: Indoors or out, no one relaxes in March, that month of wind and taxes, the wind will presently disappear, the taxes last us all the year.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Spring's greatest joy beyond a doubt is when it brings the children out.
quotes.author: Edgar Guest

quotes.quote: Cleaning with children in the house really is like brushing your teeth while eating Oreos.
quotes.author: Joleigh Little

quotes.quote: Spring is when you feel like whistling even with a shoe full of slush.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: We are used to cleaning the outside house, but the most important house to clean is yourself your own house which we never do.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: And of course, cleaning the reservoir is a vital aspect to us all refuse will be cleaned away and the central government has imposed strict standards on this.
quotes.author: Zhang Shuguang

quotes.quote: Cleaning up with children around is like shoveling during a blizzard.
quotes.author: Margaret Culkin Banning

quotes.quote: The objective of cleaning is not just to clean, but to feel happiness living within that environment.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: Have nothing in your house that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: It's time for a spring cleaning of your thoughts, it's time to stop to just existing it's time to start living.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: From time to time, one must release the grime built up inside them to to free their emotions like the ocean.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: They will be cleaning cages and changing towels and newspapers. They will do laundry and prepare diets by mixing foods and chopping fruits.
quotes.author: Cathie Donohoe

quotes.quote: Your mind is like a sponge, in the sense that it would come in handy when cleaning off a countertop or something like that.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Cleaning your house while your kids are still growing up is like shoveling the walk before it stops snowing.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: You have got to clean your own house first before you tell other people that they aren't doing it right.
quotes.author: Dan Webster

quotes.quote: They're cleaning everything up inside this consent order.
quotes.author: Chuck Johnston

quotes.quote: Spring cleaning doesn't have to be a dreaded list of chores. It can be a rewarding experience that helps provide some structure and organization in your life.
quotes.author: Peter Walsh

quotes.quote: Cleansing and clearing are two words which suit the essence of Imbolc, as this is February, the Roman month of purification. This can be a cleansing of the self, in undertaking a good â€˜detox', or a clearing and cleansing of the home, in keeping with the tradition of spring-cleaning.
quotes.author: Carole Carlton

quotes.quote: Spring is the usual period for house-cleaning and removing the dust and dirt which, notwithstanding all precautions, will accumulate during the winter months from dust, smoke, gas, etc.
quotes.author: Isabella Beeton

quotes.quote: The key to spring cleaning is to be ruthless! Throw out anything and everything you never use. (Or that may be incriminating. Burn, if necessary, but remember if using gasoline, those fires should be contained in a non-flammable container.)
quotes.author: Josie Brown

quotes.quote: A man has every season while a woman only has the right to spring.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: People are going to be getting ready for spring cleaning soon.
quotes.author: Michelle Maxia

quotes.quote: Spring cleaning the house is easy. Spring cleaning life is tough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cleaning, shopping, transportation we need to find new ways to support those kind of tasks that don't require a skilled work force.
quotes.author: Neal Lane

quotes.quote: Cleaning anything involves making something else dirty, but anything can get dirty without something else getting clean.
quotes.author: Laurence J Peter

quotes.quote: We're cleaning up trash and debris and preparing the playground equipment for painting.
quotes.author: Brenda Johnson

quotes.quote: Housework can't kill you, but why take a chance?
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Forgive and set your self free. When we forgive, we heal our own anger and hurt and are able to let love lead again. It's like spring cleaning for our heart.
quotes.author: Angie karan

quotes.quote: The best time to plan a book is while you're doing the dishes.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Fasting is like spring cleaning for your body.
quotes.author: Jentezen Franklin

quotes.quote: In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: If you want to get rid of stuff, you can always do a good spring-cleaning. Or you can do what I do. Move.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: The strongest man in the world is he who stands alone.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: It is on the strength of observation and reflection that one finds a way. So we must dig and delve unceasingly.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: When stability becomes a habit, maturity and clarity follow.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Stability and a prosperous life cannot be set off against a set of political rights and freedoms.
quotes.author: Dmitry Medvedev

quotes.quote: No man is infinitely strong; for every creature that runs, flies, hops or crawls there is a terminal nemesis which he will not circumvent, which will finally do him in.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: No social stability without individual stability.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Valor is stability, not of legs and arms, but of courage and the soul.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Stability is why society has an interest in marriage.
quotes.author: Gene Robinson

quotes.quote: There is a pleasant firmness of tone when one is in harmony with oneself. Even when it's a weak ethic one is resonating with.
quotes.author: Peter Høeg

quotes.quote: Stability and peace in our land will not come from the barrel of a gun, because peace without justice is an impossibility.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Stability can only be attained by inactive matter.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The price of stability is unpreparedness.
quotes.author: Anthony Ryan

quotes.quote: Real strength never impairs beauty of harmony, but it often bestows it; and in everything imposingly beautiful, strength has much to do with the magic.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Strength is a matter of a made up mind.
quotes.author: John Beecher

quotes.quote: The cost of stability is often diminished opportunities for growth.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: The greatest firmness is the greatest mercy.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Stability means respecting precedents.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.quote: Stability is necessary for our future economic success.
quotes.author: Gordon Brown

quotes.quote: The quality of strength lined with tenderness is an unbeatable combination.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The process of philosophic and scientific enlightenment has shaken the stability of beliefs held explicitly as articles of faith.
quotes.author: Michael Polanyi

quotes.quote: Real firmness is good for anything; strut is good for nothing.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Alliances and partnerships produce stability when they reflect realities and interests.
quotes.author: Stephen Kinzer

quotes.quote: There will be no stability of world-peace till the educated lack moral conscience.
quotes.author: Md. Mujib Ullah

quotes.quote: True stability results when presumed order and presumed disorder are balanced.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Strength comes from solitude, a waiting, a communion with the best in us, which is at one with the divine spark.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The more stable you remain the more stability you bring. Quiet the noise and find some joy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: With firmness in the right, as God gives us to see the right.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There is a growing strength in women, but it is in the forehead, not in the forearm.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: The essence of the stage is concentration and penetration. Of the screen action, movement, sweep.
quotes.author: Elia Kazan

quotes.quote: On the stage, you have to find truth, even if you have to lose the audience.
quotes.author: Anthony Quinn

quotes.quote: The presentÂ stageÂ redefines the possibilities of man and nature in accordance with the new means available for their realization.
quotes.author: Herbert Marcuse

quotes.quote: OnÂ stage, you can use your emotions. It's the place where you can channel them. They have a purpose.
quotes.author: Florence Welch

quotes.quote: TheÂ stageÂ is a training ground and it's where you learn what's funny and what's successful.
quotes.author: Matthew Lillard

quotes.quote: When you're onÂ stageÂ you have a very strange knowledge of what the audience is. It isn't exactly a sound - it's a hum, like the streets.
quotes.author: Keith Jarrett

quotes.quote: On stage you need to emphasize every emotion. But on screen you need to tone everything down and make it believable.
quotes.author: Tom Holland

quotes.quote: The stage is like a cage of light. People are no longer afraid of you - they are the ones out there in the dark, watching.
quotes.author: Gerard Depardieu

quotes.quote: The stage is suspension of disbelief.Â Film is a literal medium.
quotes.author: Joseph Bologna

quotes.quote: AÂ stageÂ setting is not a background; it is an environment.
quotes.author: Robert Edmond Jones

quotes.quote: Stage is about imperfections and working with them, whether it be from you or the audience
quotes.author: Katherine Moennig

quotes.quote: For theÂ stageÂ displays the first vigorous expression, as the natural thing and without conspicuous restraint, of private individuality.
quotes.author: Lascelles Abercrombie

quotes.quote: The stage is not merely the meeting place of all the arts,Â but is also the return of art to life.Â
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When you are onÂ stageÂ you are having an affair with three thousand people.
quotes.author: Gelsey Kirkland

quotes.quote: AÂ stageÂ space has two rules: (1) Anything can happen and (2) Something must happen.
quotes.author: Peter Brook

quotes.quote: There is but one stage for the peasant and the actor.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: On theÂ stageÂ one must not confuse the nature of a personality with the naturalness of a person.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: They say faith is taking the first step when you can’t see the whole staircase. Actually, wisdom is seeing the elevator behind it that would have taken you to the top floor.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: You need mountains, long staircases don't make good hikers.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: You can’t move up in the staircase of leadership unless you are emotionally intelligent.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Our actions in the present build the staircase to the future. The question is whether that staircase is going up or down.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: You shall find out how salt is the taste of another man's bread, and how hard is the way up and down another man's stairs.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: The world is like a grand staircase, some are going up and some are going down.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It's like climbing a staircase. I'm on the top of the staircase, I look behind me and I see the steps. That's where I was.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: To me, a staircase looks like a series of dark and light horizontal stripes, which is exactly how you'd draw a staircase. So I know how the image is going to look on the page.
quotes.author: G. Willow Wilson

quotes.quote: My soul can find no staircase to Heaven unless it be through Earth's loveliness.
quotes.author: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quotes.quote: Those stairs won't know which way they're going... take drastic steps, kick it to the curb.
quotes.author: William Steig

quotes.quote: We walk through the world, we walk / Up the stairs to the landing
quotes.author: John Michael Stipe

quotes.quote: And all my cares are laid by / I'll lay down my soul, my battles are won / I'll walk dem golden stairs when I die when I die
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Halfway down the stairs is a stair where I sit. / There isn't any other stair quite like it. / I'm not at the bottom, I'm not at the top. / So this is the stair where I always stop.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Somewhere up the stairs, / Into the fire / May your strength give us strength / May your faith give us faith
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: I'm on my way to God don't know or even care / My brain's the weak heart, and my heart's the long stairs / My heart's the long stairs, my heart's the long stairs
quotes.author: Eric Judy

quotes.quote: Those are his footprints, right there / Elvis has just left the building / To climb up that heavenly stair
quotes.author: Frank Vincent Zappa

quotes.quote: Story to story / Building to building / Street to street / We pass each other on the stairs
quotes.author: Michael Hutchence

quotes.quote: She said the lift doesn't work / Run up the stairs and come
quotes.author: Paul Donald Love

quotes.quote: I declare this tower is my symbol; I declare / This winding, gyring, spiring treadmill of a stair is my ancestral stair
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: From time to time, in singles, pairs, / By hand or post went up those stairs!
quotes.author: Edwin James Brady

quotes.quote: And through that fellowship may ne'er, / As then it was, re-climb the Stair / Its voices echo down the years / The voices of the pioneers!
quotes.author: Edwin James Brady

quotes.quote: That stairway grand of marbled might, / The most majestic in the land, / In statured splendour, flight on flight
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: T is a stairway, not a street, / That ascends the deep ravine, / Where the torrent leaps between / Rocky walls that almost meet.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Climbing, climbing, higher and higher / The branches blow and I see a spire / The gleam of a turret, the glint of a dome / All sparkling and bright, like white sea foam.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: High up in the apple tree climbing I go, / With the sky above me, the earth below. / Each branch is the step of a wonderful stair / Which leads to the town I see shining up there.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: Today to the end of the marvelous stair, / Where those glittering pinacles flash in the air! / Climbing, climbing, higher I go, / With the sky close above me, the earth far below.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: Is it the music of a larger place? It makes our room too small: it is like a stair, / A calling stair that climbs up to a smile you scarcely see, / Dim, but so waited for; and you know what a smile is, how it calls
quotes.author: Charlotte Mary Mew

quotes.quote: Half in the unvesselled sea, we climbed the stair / And climbed so long, I thought the last steps were / Hung from the morning star; when these mild words / Fanned the delighted air like wings of birds:
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Stairs, ladders, and ramps entered thesaurus of building components in prehistoric times. Yet even the earliest known and simplest demonstrations are still constructed today.
quotes.author: John Templer

quotes.quote: Generosity is often the stalking horse of control.
quotes.author: Anne Truitt

quotes.quote: Are you stalking me, Mr. Fulton? The idea both amused and horrified Jazz.
quotes.author: Barry Lyga

quotes.quote: I was just about to ask you the same thing. I know you followed me. Don't look so surprised. It's called a rear-view mirror. Are you stalking me for a specific reason?
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: For the first time all day I felt safe. Except that Patch had cornered me in a dark tunnel and was possibly stalking me. Maybe not so safe.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: Until you stalk and overrun, you cannot devour anyone.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Is this one of those days where we all stalk out in fury? Because I simply haven't got the energy for it.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: All successful employers of labor are stalking men who will do the unusual, men who think, men who attract attention by performing more than is expected of them.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schwab

quotes.quote: He who searches for evil, must first look at his own reflection.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: That boy needs a hobby. Stalking is a hobby. So is serial killing.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.quote: It's a fine line between love and stalking.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: As fleeting emotions stalk it, a face can leak fear or the guilt of a forming lie.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: Sketchy black van? Weird stalking of my house? What are you going to do next, offer me some candy?
quotes.author: Hannah Harrington

quotes.quote: All I need is a badly mangled, irate sentence stalking me.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Value, therefore, does not stalk about with a label describing what it is.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: You know, if you're going to stalk someone, you should be less obvious. For starters, try not to standing in the middle of a field, gawking at your prey.
quotes.author: Kristin Walker

quotes.quote: It’s not stalking if you don't follow them home, right?
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: She thinks you're stalking me. Why the hell would I do that? I see too much of your ugly mug as it is.
quotes.author: Margaret Watson

quotes.quote: I think the very word stalking implies that you're not supposed to like it. Otherwise, it would be called fluffy harmless observation time.
quotes.author: Molly Harper

quotes.quote: Tell me again how you're not stalking me?
quotes.author: Molly Ringle

quotes.quote: I don't think you can call it stalking when it's just phone calls and letters and emails and knocking on the door.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: Don't play his game. Play yours.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine

quotes.quote: Maybe instead of stalking her, you should go out with someone else. He sighed. You don't think I've tried? How can anyone compare? You might not believe this, but there is no one like her at this school.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: Are you stalking me? Because that would be super.
quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

quotes.quote: Intemperance is a hydra with a hundred heads. She never stalks abroad unaccompanied with impurity, anger, and the most infamous profligacy.
quotes.author: St. Chrysostom

quotes.quote: Often you don't know whether you're the hero of a romantic comedy or the villain on a Lifetime special until the restraining order arrives.
quotes.author: Tim Kreider

quotes.quote: You cannot make someone love you, all you can do is stalk them and hope they panic and give in.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The best protection against rape, stalking, and domestic violence is to raise men who both understand that women are different, and would never dare take advantage of this difference.
quotes.author: Wendy Shalit

quotes.quote: Be leery of silence. It doesn't mean you won the argument. Often, people are just busy reloading their guns.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: When someone is stalking you because they think you are stalking them, it makes you wonder who really is the true stalker?
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Women never stalk men; they just research them intensely.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: If you don't stand for something, you stand for nothing.
quotes.author: Mel Thompson

quotes.quote: If you don't stand for something, you will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: If you don't stand for something, how can anyone respect what you do?
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.quote: It's not enough to be in the majority, you have to stand for something.
quotes.author: Russ Feingold

quotes.quote: Let how you live your life stand for something, no matter how small and incidental it may seem.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: Stand for something. Don't quest for popularity at the expense of morality and ethics and honesty.
quotes.author: Howard Cosell

quotes.quote: Be a good ancestor. Stand for something bigger than yourself. Add value to the Earth during your sojourn.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: In order to be truly happy, you must live along with, and you must stand for something larger than yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Stand for something or you will fall for anything. Today's mighty oak is yesterday's nut that held its ground.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: You must stand for something! It does not have to be grand, but it must be a positive that brings light to someone else's darkness.
quotes.author: Anthony Carmona

quotes.quote: In every generation, the world is changed by a few people, who stand for something, do not fear unpopularity and dare to make a difference.
quotes.author: Nicky Gumbel

quotes.quote: We've been blessed with the opportunity to stand for something - for liberty and freedom and fairness. And these are things worth fighting for, worth devoting our lives to.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The problem with most leaders today is they don't stand for anything. Leadership implies movement toward something, and convictions provide that direction. If you don't stand for something, you'll fall for anything
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.quote: The best way to be missed when you're gone is to stand for something when you're here.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: You have to stand for something bigger than yourself.
quotes.author: Jose Antonio Vargas

quotes.quote: It's good to stand for something, to believe in something and base your business on values.
quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

quotes.quote: Give to us clear vision that we may know where to stand and what to stand for - because unless we stand for something, we shall fall for anything.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: If you stand for something, you will always find some people for you and some against you. If you stand for nothing, you will find nobody against you, and nobody for you.
quotes.author: Bill Bernbach

quotes.quote: People have the idea that an image must stand for something else, that the real meaning needs to be described with language. Instead it is the image itself that is the meaning.
quotes.author: Mark Ryden

quotes.quote: Take a stand; go for the right choice. Don't just sit for anything; stand for something. Be specific because sometimes, when the meaning is not clear, there us absolutely no meaning!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: When you stand for something, you've got to stand for it all the way, not half way.
quotes.author: Kevin Gates

quotes.quote: Don't believe that winning is really everything. It's more important to stand for something. If you don't stand for something, what do you win?
quotes.author: Lane Kirkland

quotes.quote: A man dies when he refuses to stand up for that which is right. A man dies when he refuses to stand up for justice. A man dies when he refuses to take a stand for that which is true.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Everything is a learning process: any time you fall over, it's just teaching you to stand up the next time.
quotes.author: Joel Edgerton

quotes.quote: If we don't stand up for children, then we don't stand for much.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You will find that they haven't half the strength you think they have.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: A boy who won't stand up for himself becomes a man who can't stand up to anything.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Because if you don't stand up for the stuff you don't like, when they come for the stuff you do like, you've already lost.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Every single time you help somebody stand up you are helping humanity rise.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Each time a woman stands up for herself, without knowing it possibly, without claiming it, she stands up for all women.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: If you stand up to be counted, someone will take your seat.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: There are always a few who stand up in times of communal madness and have the courage to say that what unites us is greater than what divides us.
quotes.author: Geraldine Brooks

quotes.quote: When the people stand up, imperialism trembles.
quotes.author: Thomas Sankara

quotes.quote: Stand up for what is right even if you stand alone.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Every time you stand up for an ideal, you send forth a tiny ripple of hope.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.quote: Stand up, be bold, be strong. Take the whole responsibility on your own shoulders, and know that you are the creator of your own destiny. All the strength and succor you want is within yourself. Therefore make your own future.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: If you stand up and be counted, from time to time you may get yourself knocked down. But remember this: A man flattened by an opponent can get up again. A man flattened by conformity stays down for good.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: I not only have the right to stand up for myself, but I have the responsibility. I can't ask somebody else to stand up for me if I won't stand up for myself. And once you stand up for yourself, you'd be surprised that people say, "Can I be of help?".
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Standing up for yourself doesn't always involve verbal confrontation. Sometimes it's about not wasting energy on people who are negative.
quotes.author: Sherry Argov

quotes.quote: You have two choices. you can keep running and hiding and blaming the world for your problems, or you can stand up for yourself and decide to be somebody important.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.quote: That’s what we were told—stand up for yourself. But that’s hard to do if you don’t know who you are.
quotes.author: Shane Koyczan

quotes.quote: Sometimes it just feels so amazing to finally stand up for yourself. I highly recommend it. Life is too short to be taken for granted.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Whenever one person stands up and says, ‘Wait a minute, this is wrong,’ it helps other people do the same.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Life's too short. If you're passionate - stand up.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: You've got to stand up and do your own battles. My daddy taught me that a long time ago, that you fight your own battles. The only way to shut everybody up is to win.
quotes.author: Terry Bradshaw

quotes.quote: It’s really important to stand up for yourself and not always agree with what people say if indeed you don’t feel that that’s true.
quotes.author: Lily Collins

quotes.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Stand-up comedy is an art form and it dies unless you expand it.
quotes.author: Sam Kinison

quotes.quote: You would never do stand-up without an audience. I mean, no one would even consider it. It’s like they’re the instrument you’re playing.”
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote: Without standards, there can be no improvement.
quotes.author: Taiichi Ohno

quotes.quote: Every next level of your life will demand a different you.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: When you're out of quality, you're out of business.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It is quality rather than quantity that matters.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If you want to change your life you have to raise your standards.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: People who live according to the world's standard are confused, and therefore get into all kinds of trouble that leads to destruction.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: We're all in the same game, just different levels. Dealing with the same hell, just different devils.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Quality has to be caused, not controlled.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: Standards only move in one direction. At the beginning of the world, standards were established and they've been slipping ever since.
quotes.author: Edward Stevenson

quotes.quote: Fast is fine, but accuracy is everything.
quotes.author: Wyatt Earp

quotes.quote: We classify too much and enjoy too little.
quotes.author: Okakura Kakuzō

quotes.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You have set standards for how you want to be treated and what you expect from yourself and for yourself.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: Never apologize for having high standards. People who really want to be in your life will rise up to meet them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The standards have sunk so low throughout our culture that who really knows.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: Don't shrink your standards, link yourself with those who think and ink like you.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: A superior man in dealing with the world is not for anything or against anything. He follows righteousness as the standard.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Quality in a service or product is not what you put into it. It is what the client or customer gets out of it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Acceptance of prevailing standards often means we have no standards of our own.
quotes.author: Jean Toomer

quotes.quote: There is a certain standard of grace and beauty which consists in a certain relation between our nature and the thing which pleases us.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Standards should not be forced down from above but rather set by the production workers themselves.
quotes.author: Taiichi Ohno

quotes.quote: The standards of this new time are forcing us to put our lives in order before God.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: If you don't set a baseline standard for what you'll accept in life, you'll find it's easy to slip into behaviors and attitudes or a quality of life that's far below what you deserve.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Set the standard! Stop expecting others to show you love, acceptance, commitment, & respect when you don't even show that to yourself.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Standards are always out of date. That's what makes them standards.
quotes.author: Alan Bennett

quotes.quote: The standard business model for corporations is to lie, confuse and deny anything that may threaten their profitability.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: When it comes to Starbucks, I take every threat very personally.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: When we began Starbucks, what I wanted to try to do was to create a set of values, guiding principles, and culture.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Starbucks is rekindling America's love affair with coffee, bringing romance and fresh flavor back to the brew.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Starbucks and their ilk are for meeting with people you don't care to meet with and finishing term papers.
quotes.author: Lauren Leto

quotes.quote: I like to go to Starbucks and watch the intellectuals. I observe them and their intellectualness. They in turn observe me drinking coffee and being a creeper.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: Starbucks has a role and a meaningful relationship with people that is not only about the coffee.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: We think of Starbucks not as a coffee company but a media company.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: If the Starbucks secret is a smile when you get your latte... ours is that the Web site adapts to the individual's taste.
quotes.author: Reed Hastings

quotes.quote: Starbucks represents something beyond a cup of coffee.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Starbucks is committed to evolving and enhancing our customer experience with innovative and wholesome food offerings.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Starbucks is not an advertiser; people think we are a great marketing company, but in fact we spend very little money on marketing and more money on training our people than advertising.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Starbucks is in my blood. It is such a part of me that letting it unravel simply was not an option.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Starbucks has changed the rules of engagement for the music industry.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: The success of the Starbucks has been based on this balance between profitability and a social conscience. Everywhere we're doing business, were trying to manage the business through the lens of humanity.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Starbucks trying to build a different kind of company around the balance of profitably and benevolence. A social conscience. And that isn't a program it has to be a way of life.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Starbuck's is going to start selling instant coffee. This is for people who want the quality of Sanka, but want to pay the high Starbuck's price.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: If you cut the starfish in half, you'll be in for a surprise: the animal won't die and pretty soon you'll have two starfish to deal with.
quotes.author: Ori Brafman

quotes.quote: Because the arms of a starfish have relative freedom, they can go in a multitude of directions.
quotes.author: Ori Brafman

quotes.quote: They walk along on all these tube feet. But the weird thing is, they have no brains at all. Not surprising for a democracy.
quotes.author: Peter Watts

quotes.quote: A multi colored starfish, beautifully twisted, stitched together from leftovers. It lies folded back against itself, two arms facing upward; a few remaining tube feet wave feebly in the current. Cottony fungus thrives in a jagged patchwork of seams.
quotes.author: Peter Watts

quotes.quote: I mean, the starfish is still pretty much a mystery even to the people who know most about it.
quotes.author: Madeleine L’Engle

quotes.quote: Starfish can be different colors. Some starfish use camouflage. They blend in with their surroundings.
quotes.author: Emma Bassier

quotes.quote: We are nothing but starfish, abandoned on the beach, waiting for the sun to rise, hoping, praying that someone might pick us up and throw us back into the waves where we can survive another day.
quotes.author: Robert Steiginga

quotes.quote: There are a lot of starfish to be picked up and we can make a difference.
quotes.author: Robert Steiginga

quotes.quote: These children are like those starfish. Each day that we bring them a step forward, they are further away from being lost on the beach. And although a little step isn't a big thing today, or tomorrow, or the next day, if you keep taking little steps, you will see one day that you have walked a great distance with your child.
quotes.author: Anne Addison

quotes.quote: When she takes too long, the tide flows back without her. And the Sea Star became easy prey for a seagull. But she is built to survive and returns to the sea, although with one less ray.
quotes.author: Janette Halfmann

quotes.quote: She inches along, twisting her body flat like a pretzel. Her mouth is on her underside, and she doesn't have a head or tail end. Tiny red eyespots at the tips of her rays tell her light from dark. She leads first with one ray, then another, heading for the mussels growing halfway up the shore.
quotes.author: Janette Halfmann

quotes.quote: Each morning the minus tide- / weeds flowed it like hair swimming / The starfish gripped rock, pastel, rough / Fish bones lay in sun.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: All our lives, we had fun. / We had seasons in the sun, / But the stars that we reached / Were just starfish on the beach.
quotes.author: Jacques Brel

quotes.quote: My heart is like starfish. Break into pieces, it will grow again.
quotes.author: Anurag R. Jaiswar

quotes.quote: When whales want to make a wish, they wish upon a starfish.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: In the vast oceanic universe starfishes are the stars in the sky of the shore.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: She was the last star, burning bright in a sea of limitless black.
quotes.author: Rick Yancey

quotes.quote: Sunset and evening star, And one clear call for me! And may there be no moaning of the bar When I put out to sea.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Her fingers moved among barnacles and mussels, blue-black, sharp-edged. Neon red starfish were limp Dalis on the rocks, surrounded by bouquets of stinging anemones and purple bursts of spiny sea urchins.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: I am not an attractive man. These clothes are the only thing holding me together; when I'm nude, my body shoots off in all directions. I'm like a starfish.
quotes.author: Jeremy Hotz

quotes.quote: Like a starfish, the heart endures its amputation.
quotes.author: Gail Caldwell

quotes.quote: But it is just two lovers, holding hands and in a hurry to reach their car, their locked hands a starfish leaping through the dark.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Never ask a starfish for directions.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Her fingers moved among barnacles and mussels, blue-black, sharp-edged. Neon red starfish were limp Dalis on the rocks, surrounded by bouquets of stinging anemones and purple bursts of spiny sea urchins.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Starfish. Every life form seems to reach out to its own kind in order to, not just survive but to flourish.
quotes.author: Linda Maxwell

quotes.quote: They seemed to be staring at the dark, but their eyes were watching God.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: You can know who a person is simply by staring into their eyes.
quotes.author: Shiloh Walker

quotes.quote: It was like staring at a whitewashed wall, but without all the emotion.
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie

quotes.quote: The gaze that sees is the gaze that dominates.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault

quotes.quote: There are times when those eyes inside your brain stare back at you.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: A stare is really nothing more than what you're thinking inside.
quotes.author: Ray Liotta

quotes.quote: Staring at the blue sky causes insomnia to occur in the human.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Life is becoming no more than staring at the screen.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: You are an artist. The canvas is your life. Make something worth staring at.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: The ears that gape after secrets retain not faithfully what is entrusted to them.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Who is staring at the sea is already sailing a little.
quotes.author: Paul Carvel

quotes.quote: People will stare. Make it worth their while.
quotes.author: Harry Winston

quotes.quote: Sometimes facing opportunity is like staring at the knees of a giraffe.
quotes.author: Laurie Beth Jones

quotes.quote: It's best not to stare at the sun during an eclipse.
quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

quotes.quote: Staring down hard truth takes guts.
quotes.author: Joan Bauer

quotes.quote: People who stare deserve the looks they get.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: If you stare into the Abyss long enough the Abyss stares back at you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Stare, pry, listen, eavesdrop. Die knowing something. You are not here long.
quotes.author: Walker Evans

quotes.quote: No matter how much you keep encouraging someone who is blindfolded to stare through the cloth, he still won’t see a thing.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: I like intelligent women. When you go out, it shouldn't be a staring contest.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Human beings cling to their delicious tyrannies and to their exquisite nonsense, till death stares them in the face.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: It is not enough to stare up the steps, we must step up the stairs.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: The writer should never be ashamed of staring. There is nothing that does not require his attention.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: Sometimes we stare so long at a door that is closing that we see too late the one that is open.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Staring at the blank page before you, Open up the dirty window, Let the sun illuminate the words that you could not find.
quotes.author: Natasha Bedingfield

quotes.quote: Concentration is not staring hard at something. It is not trying to concentrate.
quotes.author: Timothy Gallwey

quotes.quote: because we are always staring at the stars, we learn the shortness of our arms.
quotes.author: Mary Roberts Rinehart

quotes.quote: That little white ball is always staring back at you, daring you to make a mistake.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: The end of a gun looks very big and very back when it's staring you in the face.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: The stars are the land-marks of the universe.
quotes.author: Sir John Frederick William Herschel

quotes.quote: New stars offer to the mind a phenomenon more surprising, and less explicable, than almost any other in the science of astronomy.
quotes.author: George Adams

quotes.quote: It shows you exactly how a star is formed; nothing else can be so pretty! A cluster of vapor, the cream of the milky way, a sort of celestial cheese, churned into light.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: For my part I know nothing with any certainty but the sight of the stars makes me dream.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: When I consider how, after sunset, the stars come out gradually in troops from behind the hills and woods, I confess that I could not have contrived a more curious and inspiring sight.
quotes.author: Henry Thoreau

quotes.quote: It is reasonable to hope that in the not too distant future we shall be competent to understand so simple a thing as a star.
quotes.author: Arthur Eddington

quotes.quote: There wouldn't be a sky full of stars if we were all meant to wish on the same one.
quotes.author: Frances Clark

quotes.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The stars are the jewels of the night, and perchance surpass anything which day has to show.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When it is darkest, men see the stars.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: God's promises are like the stars; the darker the night the brighter they shine.
quotes.author: David Nicholas

quotes.quote: The stars are the street lights of eternity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: If the stars should appear but one night every thousand years how man would marvel and stare.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Look at the stars! Look, look up at the skies! Oh look at all the fire-folk sitting in the air! The bright boroughs, the circle-citadels there!
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: Beyond the stars there are fields of wildflowers where Gods eternal presence inspires the hungry spirit as it nourishes the soul.
quotes.author: Micheal Teal

quotes.quote: The moon is quite a show off given the chance. The stars make a sound when they shine so bright. Water so blue and so black.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: He counts the number of the stars; He gives names to all of them. Great is our Lord and abundant in strength; His understanding is infinite.
quotes.author: Psalms 147:4-5

quotes.quote: There are too many stars in some places and not enough in others.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: How is it that the sky feeds the stars?
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: The Sun, the stars and the seasons as they pass, some can gaze upon these with no strain of fear.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Never judge the moon by gazing the stars.
quotes.author: Lalitha Narayanan

quotes.quote: The sun is but a morning star.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The stars are the apexes of what triangles!
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There are so many stars shining in the sky, so many beautiful things winking at you, but when Venus comes out, all the others are waned, they are pushed to the background.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: You can feel the stars and the infinity of the sky since life, in spite of everything, is like a dream.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The sky is filled with stars, invisible by day.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The sky was clear - remarkably clear - and the twinkling of all the stars seemed to be but throbs of one body, timed by a common pulse.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: I've loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: That last page turned is a perfect excuse to write a whole new book.
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Don't worry about being worried. You're heading out on an adventure and you can always change your mind along the way and try something else.
quotes.author: Tracy Kidder

quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us. The old skin has to be shed before the new one can come.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Oh, my friend, it's not what they take away from you that counts. It's what you do with what you have left.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: It's humbling to start fresh. It takes a lot of courage. But it can be reinvigorating. You just have to put your ego on a shelf & tell it to be quiet.
quotes.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

quotes.quote: It isn't always a change of scenery needed to make life better. Sometimes it simply requires opening your eyes.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: There are some things one can only achieve by a deliberate leap in the opposite direction.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: If I must start somewhere, right here and now is the best place imaginable.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: If God closes a door AND a window, consider the fact that it might be time to build a whole new house.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Recreate your life, always, always. Remove the stones, plant rose bushes and make sweets. Begin again.
quotes.author: Cora Coralina

quotes.quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: For last year's words belong to last year's language And next year's words await another voice. And to make an end is to make a beginning.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Celebrate endings, for they precede new beginnings.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Although no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.author: Carl Bard

quotes.quote: Never forget, Today, you have 100% of your life left.
quotes.author: Tom Hopkins

quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary: then do what's possible: and suddenly you're doing the impossible.
quotes.author: St Francis Of Assisi

quotes.quote: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestly

quotes.quote: The secret to living the life of your dreams is to start living the life of your dreams today, in every little way you possibly can.
quotes.author: Mike Dooley

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If all you can do is crawl, start crawling.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: A Sunrise is God's way of saying, "Let's start again.
quotes.author: Todd Stocker

quotes.quote: Every day is a new beginning. Treat it that way. Stay away from what might have been, and look at what can be.
quotes.author: Marsha Petrie Sue

quotes.quote: The secret to change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The best Startups don't create noise. They create a gravitational pull.
quotes.author: Wayne Chang

quotes.quote: Most startups actually start down and only go up if they catch the winds of market demand.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly
