quotes.quote: Startups are based in faith, and the ones that succeed have no fear.
quotes.author: Micah Baldwin

quotes.quote: Startups live at the intersection of existential crisis and everything going perfectly great.
quotes.author: Aaron Levie

quotes.quote: When you're in a startup, the first ten people will determine whether the company succeeds or not.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: A startup is a temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.
quotes.author: Steve Blank

quotes.quote: In the startup work environment, you get to have a relationship with your boss, the investors, and the key members of the team. Startups are like families - you see the good, the bad and the ugly, but in the end, you've got each other's back.
quotes.author: Clay Clark

quotes.quote: Most startup failures result from entrepreneurs who are better at making excuses than products.
quotes.author: Jay Samit

quotes.quote: In a startup, both the problem and solution are unknown.
quotes.author: Eric Ries

quotes.quote: In a startup no facts exist inside the building, only opinions.
quotes.author: Steve Blank

quotes.quote: A startup can focus on only one metric. So you have to decide what that is and ignore everything else.
quotes.author: Noah Kagan

quotes.quote: For a startup, you need to stay small so the others don't attack, or you aim to be one of the big guys. If you don't do it right, you might lose everything.
quotes.author: Hamdi Ulukaya

quotes.quote: Every startup has a chance to change the world, by bringing not just a new product, but an entirely new institution into existence.
quotes.author: Eric Ries

quotes.quote: Startups, by their nature, are entrepreneurial - testing new things, launching new products, and disrupting themselves. That's why you join a startup in the first place - to create, to stretch beyond your current capabilities, and to make an outsized impact.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hyman

quotes.quote: Building a startup community is not a zero-sum game in which there are winners and losers: if everyone engages, they and the entire community can all be winners.
quotes.author: Brad Feld

quotes.quote: By definition, startups are not constrained by the limits of established company culture. And so they push boundaries and develop new technologies and ways of doing things.
quotes.author: J. B. Pritzker

quotes.quote: A startup is the largest endeavor over which you can have definite mastery. You can have agency not just over your own life, but over a small and important part of the world. It begins by rejecting the unjust tyranny of Chance. You are not a lottery ticket.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: Starting a startup is a process of trial and error. What guided the founders through this process was their empathy for the users. They never lost sight of making things that people would want.
quotes.author: Jessica Livingston

quotes.quote: Working on a startup is a balancing act: being crazy enough to believe your idea can take off but not crazy enough to miss the signs when it's clearly not going to.
quotes.author: Mike Krieger

quotes.quote: Founding a successful startup is no different than forming a rock band.
quotes.author: Jay Samit

quotes.quote: A startup is literally just a series of unfortunate events where you failed, failed, failed, and failed until you succeed.
quotes.author: Adam Draper

quotes.quote: Startups often have to do dubious things.
quotes.author: Paul Graham

quotes.quote: Good startups usually take 10 years.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: Doing startups is all about making mistakes.
quotes.author: Biz Stone

quotes.quote: The only way to train for a startup is by starting.
quotes.author: Chris Campbell

quotes.quote: The lean startup method is not about cost, it is about speed.
quotes.author: Eric Ries

quotes.quote: In a startup, absolutely nothing happens unless you make it happen.
quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

quotes.quote: The best startups generally come from somebody needing to scratch an itch.
quotes.author: Michael Arrington

quotes.quote: We can never have enough startups that are pursuing unique solutions to important problems.
quotes.author: Chris Yeh

quotes.quote: Startups are not the best choice for work-life balance, and that's sort of just the sad reality.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: The people areÂ hungryÂ for the bread of life. Do not offer them a stone.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: A starving army is actually worse than none.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The spiritually starving hesitate to partake of the spirit like a child's reaction to new and strange food. They must be offered a tiny bite on a spoon.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: What hunger is in relation to food, zest is in relation to life.Â
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: WhenÂ youÂ areÂ not physically starving,Â you haveÂ theÂ luxuryÂ toÂ realize psychicÂ andÂ emotional starvation.
quotes.author: Cherrie Moraga

quotes.quote: If you're out, and starving, and need a bite to eat, then you need fast food.
quotes.author: Nicholas Hoult

quotes.quote: StayÂ hungry, stay foolish.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: A hungry dog hunts best. A hungrier dog hunts even better.
quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quotes.quote: We are all children starving to experience and know the heart of reality.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: AÂ hungryÂ wolf at all the herd will run, In hopes, through many, to make sure of one.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: A hungry people listens not to reason,Â not cares for justice,Â nor is bent by any prayers.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: HungryÂ people cannot be good at learning or producing anything, except perhaps violence.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: AÂ hungryÂ stomach makes a short prayer.
quotes.author: Native American Proverb

quotes.quote: A hungry mob is an angry mob.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: A starving child is a frightful sight. A starving vampire, even worse.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: It has been well said that aÂ hungryÂ man is more interested in four sandwiches than four freedoms.
quotes.author: Henry Cabot Lodge, Jr.

quotes.quote: AÂ hungryÂ man is not a free man.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson Ii

quotes.quote: By starving our children of men, we have made them more vulnerable to the very abuse we are trying to prevent.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: Always remember, everyone is hungry for praise and starving for honest appreciation.
quotes.author: David Brandt Berg

quotes.quote: It is fatal to lookÂ hungry. It makes people want to kick you.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Starving the future to feed the present is a mistake. It leads to obsolescence and stagnation. Sometimes, it is hard to make this understood.
quotes.author: Burton Richter

quotes.quote: The hunger of the spirit for eternity, as fierce as a starving man's for bread, is much less a craving to go on living than a craving for redemption. Oh, and a protest against absurdity.
quotes.author: Storm Jameson

quotes.quote: There are people in the world soÂ hungry, that God cannot appear to them except in the form of bread.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: HungryÂ man, reach for the book: it is a weapon.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: It has to be admitted that starving nations never seem to be quite so starving that they cannot afford to have far more expensive armaments than anybody else.
quotes.author: T.H. White

quotes.quote: The hunger for love is much more difficultÂ to remove than the hunger for bread.Â
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: AÂ starvingÂ man will eat with the wolf.
quotes.author: American Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: Half the world's starving, the other half is trying to lose weight.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Do not hold grain waiting for higher prices when people areÂ hungry.
quotes.author: Zoroaster

quotes.quote: Two starving men cannot be twice asÂ hungryÂ as one; but two rascals can be ten times as vicious as one.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: All statistics have outliers.
quotes.author: Nenia Campbell

quotes.quote: Statistics is the grammar of science.
quotes.author: Karl Pearson

quotes.quote: Statistics real contribution to society is primarily moral, not technical.
quotes.author: Max Morris

quotes.quote: Statistics in the hands of activists have power.
quotes.author: Ela Bhatt

quotes.quote: Facts are stubborn things, but statistics are pliable.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Do not put your faith in what statistics say until you have carefully considered what they do not say.
quotes.author: William W. Watt

quotes.quote: Statisticians, like artists, have the bad habit of falling in love with their models.
quotes.author: George Box

quotes.quote: Statistical thinking will one day be as necessary a qualification for efficient citizenship as the ability to read and write.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Most people use statistics the way a drunkard uses a lamp post, more for support than illumination.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Statistics are like bikinis. What they reveal is suggestive, but what they conceal is vital.
quotes.author: Aaron Levenstein

quotes.quote: One more fagot of these adamantine bandages is the new science of Statistics.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Statistics are human beings with the tears wiped off.
quotes.author: Paul Brodeur

quotes.quote: In statistics, what disappears behind rows of numbers is death.
quotes.author: Gunter Grass

quotes.quote: Statistics, likelihoods, and probabilities mean everything to men, nothing to God.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of statistics, the kind you look up and the kind you make up.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: Statistics are used much like a drunk uses a lamppost: for support, not illumination.
quotes.author: Vin Scully

quotes.quote: Statistics are the triumph of the quantitative method, and the quantitative method is the victory of sterility and death.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: Statistics have shown that mortality increases perceptibly in the military during wartime.
quotes.author: Alphonse Allais

quotes.quote: Statistics are no substitute for judgment.
quotes.author: Henry Clay

quotes.quote: Definition of Statistics: The science of producing unreliable facts from reliable figures.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Absence of evidence is not evidence of absence.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: A single death is a tragedy; a million deaths is a statistic.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: Statistics are like women; mirrors of purest virtue and truth, or like whores to use as one pleases.
quotes.author: Theodor Billroth

quotes.quote: The essential feature of statistics is a prudent and systematic ignoring of details.
quotes.author: Erwin Schrodinger

quotes.quote: Those who ignore Statistics are condemned to reinvent it.
quotes.author: Brad Efron

quotes.quote: The greatest value of a picture is when it forces us to notice what we never expected to see.
quotes.author: John Tukey

quotes.quote: Like dreams, statistics are a form of wish fulfillment.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Statistics can be made to prove anything - even the truth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Statistics are just a way for the mathematician to evangelize his faith.
quotes.author: Hunter Brinkmeier

quotes.quote: If your experiment needs statistics, you ought to have done a better experiment.
quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

quotes.quote: Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it.
quotes.author: Michaelangelo

quotes.quote: The apathy of the people is enough to make every statue leap from its pedestal and hasten the resurrection of the dead.
quotes.author: William Lloyd Garrison

quotes.quote: Dear God! how beauty varies in nature and art. In a woman the flesh must be like marble; in a statue the marble must be like flesh.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Pay no attention to what the critics say. A statue has never been erected in honor of a critic.
quotes.author: Jean Sibelius

quotes.quote: In building a statue, a sculptor doesn't keep adding clay to his subject. Actually, he keeps chiseling away at the nonessentials until the truth of his creation is revealed without obstruction.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Education without courage is like a wax statue - beautiful to look at but bound to melt at the first touch of a hot stuff.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A garden without its statue is like a sentence without its verb.
quotes.author: Joseph Beach

quotes.quote: What can you learn from a statue? You can learn to stay calm whatever happens!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When respecting the statue of a venerable person, don't forget to respect the artist too who made that statue!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Every human being has within him an ideal man, just as every piece of marble contains in a rough state a statue as beautiful as the one that Praxiteles the Greek made of the god Apollo.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: In judging of a beautiful statue, the aesthetic faculty is absolutely and completely gratified by the splendid curves of those marble lips that are dumb to our complaint, the noble modelling of those limbs that are powerless to help us.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Society is one vast conspiracy for carving one into the kind of statue likes, and then placing it in the most convenient niche it has.
quotes.author: Randolph Bourne

quotes.quote: Into the statue that breathes, the soul of the sculptor is bidden.
quotes.author: Richard Realf

quotes.quote: Inanimate objects sometimes appear endowed with a strange power of sight. A statue notices, a tower watches, the face of an edifice contemplates.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: When the wise man opens his mouth, the beauties of his soul present themselves to the view, like the statues in a temple.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: A fixed idea is like the iron rod which sculptors put in their statues. It impales and sustains.
quotes.author: Hippolyte Taine

quotes.quote: When I was a boy, we had forty five statues of saints in my house. Ever have ninety eyes looking at you every time you have to go to the bathroom?
quotes.author: Pat Cooper

quotes.quote: Loosen up. Being masculine doesn't mean being a statue. Wrists were made to bend.
quotes.author: Kenneth Hanes

quotes.quote: The artist stands on the human being as a statue does on a pedestal.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: One day you're the statue. One day you're the pigeon.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: They showed you a statue and told you to pray / They built you a temple and locked you away / But they never told you the price that you pay / For things that you might have done.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: As a sculptor sculpts a statue, an educator educates our future generation. Beauty depends on the creator.
quotes.author: Debashis Mridha

quotes.quote: The relationship between critic and writer is similar to the one between the pigeon and the statue.
quotes.author: Ashwin Sanghi

quotes.quote: In times to resist, do not step aside; stay solid like a statue! In times to step aside, do not resist; be flexible like a snake!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Anybody who tries to change society without examining the family is trying to push a shadow without moving a statue.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

quotes.quote: The status quo is presented as something to aspire to, whereas for us, the status quo was something we wanted to shatter in order to create the space for people to choose for themselves.
quotes.author: Genesis P-Orridge

quotes.quote: The need to challenge the status quo is just more obvious when you're failing than when you're succeeding. But it's no less urgent.
quotes.author: Edwin Catmull

quotes.quote: Question the status quo at all times, especially when things are going well.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: The defenders of the status quo often masquerade as the preservers of harmony.
quotes.author: Mark Sheppard

quotes.quote: Challenging the status quo takes commitment, courage, imagination, and, above all, dedication to learning.
quotes.author: Marshall Ganz

quotes.quote: There's nothing more fundamentally disruptive to the status quo than a new reality.
quotes.author: Umair Haque

quotes.quote: In spite of warnings, nothing much happens until the status quo becomes more painful than change.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Organizations that destroy the status quo win. Whatever the status quo is, changing it gives you the opportunity to be remarkable.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: The status quo is persistent and resistant. It exists because everyone wants it to. Everyone believes that what they've got is probably better than the risk and fear that come with change.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: When there's a status quo, usually what shakes everybody up is some sort of military confrontation, at which point we all come running and screaming to pick up the pieces.
quotes.author: Abdullah II of Jordan

quotes.quote: Status quo just means that everyone's doing it. It doesn't mean that this was divinely ordained, and of course this is the right decision.
quotes.author: Alexis Ohanian

quotes.quote: The status quo is never happy when things become a meritocracy.
quotes.author: Marti Noxon

quotes.quote: The status quo is never news, only challenges to it.
quotes.author: Malorie Blackman

quotes.quote: Status quo, you know, is Latin for 'the mess we're in'.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The status quo is the only solution that cannot be vetoed.
quotes.author: Clark Kerr

quotes.quote: Either you defend the status quo, or you invent the future.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Every threat to the status quo is an opportunity in disguise.
quotes.author: Jay Samit

quotes.quote: Discontent with the status quo is a great catalyst for vision.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: If you can't change the status quo, make the status quo, change.
quotes.author: Royce White

quotes.quote: Being satisfied with the status quo means you are not making progress.
quotes.author: Katsuaki Watanabe

quotes.quote: If you're changing the status quo, whatever move you make is disrupting something else.
quotes.author: James Wolfensohn

quotes.quote: You can change any status quo, stand out, walk by faith and not by sight and things will definitely go well with you.
quotes.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quotes.quote: Challenge your own status quo - before someone else does.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: If you can't change the status quo, make the status quo, change.
quotes.author: Royce White

quotes.quote: Our politicians may fail us, but Status Quo always delivers on the promise.
quotes.author: Ian Anderson

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the magnitude of the power of the forces that reinforce the status quo.
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: Managers maintain an efficient status quo while leaders attack the status quo to create something new.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Nothing could be easier than disturbing a status quo instituted by others; the real work of the sinister current is to break the rules we rigidly establish for ourselves.
quotes.author: Zeena Schreck

quotes.quote: Questioning the status quo can result in banishment, imprisonment, ridicule or being burned at the stake, depending on your era, your locale, and the sacred cows you wish to butcher.
quotes.author: Gene Spafford

quotes.quote: If we want to change that status quo, we might have to work outside of those rules because the legal pathways available to us have been structured precisely to make sure we don't make any substantial change.
quotes.author: Tim DeChristopher

quotes.quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Instead of focusing on how much you can accomplish, focus on how much you can absolutely love what you're doing.
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: It was better to focus on the good and what we had than to focus on what we had lost and were losing.
quotes.author: Paul And Tracey Mcmanus

quotes.quote: Take five minutes to center yourself in the morning set your intention every day.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When you stay focused and keep a commitment you create momentum, and momentum creates momentum.
quotes.author: Rich Fettke

quotes.quote: The sun's energy warms the world. But when you focus it through a magnifying glass, it can start a fire. Focus is powerful.
quotes.author: Alan Pariser

quotes.quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: My success, part of it certainly, is that I have focused in on a few things.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Being selective doing less is the path of the productive. Focus on the important few and ignore the rest.
quotes.author: Timothy Ferriss

quotes.quote: Focusing is about saying No.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Focus is the key to accomplish what is necessary easy word to spell, it contains only five letters but it is probably one of the most powerful words there are in order to move forward with confidence and with the expected results.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Always focus on the front windshield and not the review mirror.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: You don't get results by focusing on results. You get results by focusing on the actions that produce results.
quotes.author: Mike Hawkins

quotes.quote: You must stay focused on the end result to achieve your goals.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The ego is nothing other than the focus of conscious attention.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Since you need to push yourself to follow a new set of habits, you need to keep your focus on your objectives. You need to remind your mind of your main reason to adopt these new habits.
quotes.author: Kenneth J. Hutchins

quotes.quote: Focus 90% of your time on solutions and only 10% of your time on problems.
quotes.author: Anthony J. DeAngelo

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most; you should change your priorities over time.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses. Focus on your character, not your reputation. Focus on your blessings, not your misfortunes.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: One of the secrets of a successful life is to be able to hold all of our energies upon one point, to focus all of the scattered rays of the mind upon one place or thing.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: It's important to focus on what we do best and master one craft at a time.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: Keep your thoughts positive, because your thoughts become your words. Keep your words positive, because your words become your behavior. Keep your behavior positive, because your behavior become your habits. Keep your habits positive, because your habits
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Stay positive, all other choices are pointless punishments to your psyche.
quotes.author: Joe Peterson

quotes.quote: If you are positive, you'll see opportunities instead of obstacles.
quotes.author: Widad Akrawi

quotes.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel and it may seem hard to get to it but you can do it and just keep working towards it and you'll find the positive side of things.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: People deal too much with the negative, with what is wrong. Why not try and see positive things, to just touch those things and make them bloom?
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: A lot of times people look at the negative side of what they feel they can't do. I always look on the positive side of what I can do.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: You cannot change reality, but you can control the manner in which you look at things. Your attitude is under your own control. Weed out the negative and focus on the positive!
quotes.author: Helen Steiner Rice

quotes.quote: When it rains, it pours? but soon, the sun shines again. Stay positive. Better days are on their way.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Stay positive in every situation and everything you do, never stop trying, have faith don't stop due to failure.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Positive thinking is empowering, positive action is achieving.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia.

quotes.quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Negative people need drama like oxygen. Stay positive, it'll take their breath away.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No matter what you face, don't forget if you're positive, positivity will find you and embrace you.
quotes.author: Widad Akrawi

quotes.quote: I try and stay positive; being negative isn't good for my personality. I don't just bring myself down, I bring everyone around me down. It's like a dark cloud, 'Uh oh, here we go,' and have to snap out of it.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.quote: Be positive with every idea surrounding your dreams. Think about the possibility of what you plan to do and approach it with an optimistic action. Stay positively.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I have the ability to build myself up or break myself down. I stay positive. Strength comes from within.
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You will never succeed if you do not believe that you deserve what you want. Visualize your goal. Make an effort to go for it and always stay positive that it can be yours.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: Positivity will block the negative thoughts that overwhelm you during tough times. Stay positive and you'll achieve more than what you set yourself for.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: The positivity in our life is a function of our thinking. So think positive, stay positive!
quotes.author: Simi Ngr

quotes.quote: Be fanatically positive and militantly optimistic. If something is not to your liking, change your liking.
quotes.author: Rick Steves

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
quotes.author: John F Kennedy

quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
quotes.author: Cayla Mills

quotes.quote: Be strong, believe in who you are; be strong, believe in what you feel.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: If you feel lost, disappointed, hesitant, or weak, return to yourself, to who you are, here and now and when you get there, you will discover yourself, like a lotus flower in full bloom, even in a muddy pond, beautiful and strong.
quotes.author: Masaru Emoto

quotes.quote: Flexibility makes buildings to be stronger, imagine what it can do to your soul.
quotes.author: Carlos Barrios

quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Never give in.. never, never, never, never, in nothing great or small, large or petty, never give in except to convictions of honor and good sense. Never yield to force.. never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Life is, at times, tough. And all we need to do is to prove that we are tougher than it.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: When the world says, "Give up," Hope whispers, "Try it one more time."
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H Schuller

quotes.quote: Being strong doesn't mean that you can handle every difficult situation on your own, it means that you have the sense to ask God and others for help.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Inside of a ring or out, ain't nothing wrong with going down. It's staying down that's wrong.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: For a tree to become tall it must grow tough roots among the rocks.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: When you're not sure if you're following the right path, when you've been knocked down a few too many times, it's completely fine to get discouraged, hell even defeated. What's not okay is to stop.
quotes.author: Gary John Bishop

quotes.quote: We do not have to remain stuck in our trials! We go through them and as daughters of the King, we can rise in the midst of dark, shaking moments.
quotes.author: Holly Wagner

quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that's what makes you strong.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Stay strong, be brave, love hard and true, and you will have nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: You've got to stay strong to be strong in tough times.
quotes.author: Tilman J. Fertitta

quotes.quote: There's so many things that life is, and no matter how many breakthroughs, trials will exist and we're going to get through it. Just be strong.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: Always be courageous and strong, and don't fear.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.quote: Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: With a firm and steadfast mind one should hold under all conditions, that everywhere the Earth is below and the sky above, and to the energetic man, every region is his fatherland.
quotes.author: Tych Brahe

quotes.quote: Slow and steady wins the race, only and only if the rabbit, competent, sleeps a while. But, fast and consistency always win it, even if rabbit is awaken.
quotes.author: Syed Ather

quotes.quote: To a resolute mind, wishing to do is the first step toward doing. But if we do not wish to do a thing it becomes impossible.
quotes.author: Robert Southney

quotes.quote: The worth of every conviction consists precisely in the steadfastness with which it is held.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: Success awaits those who steadfastly commit to any requisite sacrifice
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: Change your opinions, keep to your principles; change your leaves, keep intact your roots.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Doubts and mistrust are the mere panic of timid imagination, which the steadfast heart will conquer, and the large mind transcend.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Perhaps there is no more important component of character than steadfast resolution.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Only in winter can you tell which trees are truly green. Only when the winds of adversity blow can you tell whether an individual or a country has steadfastness.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Attain utmost emptiness. Abide in steadfast stillness.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Always remain steadfast on your journey to greatness!
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Be like the cliff against which the waves continually break; but it stands firm and tames the fury of the water around it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Steadfastness is a noble quality, but unguided by knowledge or humility, it becomes rashness, or obstinacy.
quotes.author: Aaron Swartz

quotes.quote: Everyone will not favor you or respect your beliefs, passion and purpose--so be it. But do not allow the views of others to hinder your quest. Remain steadfast.
quotes.author: Terry A O'Neal

quotes.quote: In matters of principles stand firm as a mountain, in matters of empathy alway project kindness.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: Only with steadfast memories can we now be strong so as to undo the mistakes of the past, to begin anew and build from the rubble of their betrayal.
quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

quotes.quote: This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Ay, to the proof, as mountains are for winds, that shakes not, though they blow perpetually.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Be steadfast as a tower that doth not bend its stately summit to the tempest's shock.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Rewards await you if you stay steadfast in your faith.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote:
The foolish rush to end their lives.
Only the steadfast soul survives.
quotes.author: Christine de Pizan

quotes.quote: Unless commitment is made, there are only promises and hope... But no plans.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Most of us serve our ideals by fits and starts. The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
quotes.author: Cecil B. DeMille

quotes.quote: Above our life we love a steadfast friend.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.quote: Exemplary persons are steadfast in the face of adversity, while petty persons are engulfed by it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A steadfast heart does not stray from the path.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: If you stand for a reason, be prepared to stand alone like a tree, and if you fall on ground, fall like a seed that grows back to fight again.
quotes.author: DrAnil Kumar Sinha

quotes.quote:
Dreams are there to be realized, not to be dreamed.
To realize a dream, you have to stay steadfast in your strong will.
quotes.author: Gackt

quotes.quote: Effort will release it's reward only after you refuse to quit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: There is only one right way to eat a steak - with greed in your heart and a smile on your face.
quotes.author: Soumeet Lanka

quotes.quote: Just knock off the horns and hair, and toss it on the coals for about thirty seconds on each side. I like mine still kicking and quivering!
quotes.author: Ray Palla

quotes.quote: I think steak is the ultimate comfort food, and if you're going out for one, that isn't the time to scrimp on calories or quality.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.quote: To eat steak rare... represents both a nature and a morality.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: I eat steak primarily. That's pretty much what my diet consists of. Sometimes I supplement that with other steaks.
quotes.author: Jocko Willink

quotes.quote: I take a vitamin every day; it's called a steak.
quotes.author: Robert Duvall

quotes.quote: I used to be shy about ordering a steak after I had eaten a steak sandwich, but I got used to it.
quotes.author: A.J. Liebling

quotes.quote: If you're dining with someone who wants the same cut, it's always better to get a 16-ounce steak and split it than to order two eight-ounce steaks. The longer something cooks, the more flavor it develops, so you'll get a better taste with a bigger piece of meat.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.quote: The only time to eat diet food is while you are waiting for the steak to cook.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: My favorite animal is steak.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: I'll stop eating steak when you stop killing spiders.
quotes.author: Davey Havok

quotes.quote: After you have witnessed the reality, you can no longer look at a piece of steak, and simply think "yum".
quotes.author: Mango Wodzak

quotes.quote: Screw chocolate. A good steak is where it’s at.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: The only thing he likes better than a nice juicy homicide is a sirloin steak smothered with onions.
quotes.author: Richard Brautigan

quotes.quote: She is just drunk and horny, and skinny, so skinny, as thin as a steak.
quotes.author: Alain Bremond-Torrent,

quotes.quote: When something's well done, it's usually the steak.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: I hate reality but it's still the best place to get a good steak.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: If you want to sell a steak, you can't just have the sizzle, you gotta have sauce.
quotes.author: Don King

quotes.quote: A steak needs fat to taste great.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.quote: I don't eat red meat, but sometimes a man needs a steak.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: We all mourn in our own way. I mourn with a great steak.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: I usually eat a pretty big steak the night before I compete.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Steak is delicious.
quotes.author: Joe

quotes.quote: To eat steak rare represents both a nature and a morality.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: Throw em a bone and they want a steak.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Steak on the plate went up. Steak on the hoof went down.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The best way to make a steak is grilled over an open flame or pan sauteed in a cast iron skillet.
quotes.author: Roy Yamaguchi

quotes.quote: Flatheads!' 'Ham!' 'Beef!' 'Where's the mustard?' 'Steak and onions!' 'Shut the door!' here sits bandicoot, the broker, eating in a desparate.
quotes.author: Marcus Clarke

quotes.quote: Over the steak and onions not a word was said of his deep days and nights as a dynamiter.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Don't worry about people stealing an idea, If it's original, you will have to ram it down their throats.
quotes.author: Howard Aiken

quotes.quote: The one who conceals is as bad as the one who steals.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Who steals chicken in the daytime will steal cows at night.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Who steals needles when young will steal gold when old.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Years steal fire from the mind as vigour from the limb; And life's enchanted cup but sparkles near the brim.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: The politician who steals is worse than a thief. He is a fool. With the grand opportunities all around for a man with a political pull, there's no excuse for stealing' a cent.
quotes.author: George Washington Plunkitt

quotes.quote: A lawyer with his briefcase can steal more than a hundred men with guns.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Immature poets imitate, mature poets steal.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Fraud can be explained as stealing by use of deceptive means.
quotes.author: K.A. Farner

quotes.quote: If you steal something small you are a petty thief, but if you steal millions you are a gentleman of society.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Steal a little and they'll put you in jail, steal a lot and they'll make you king.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: You shall not steal, nor deal falsely, nor lie to one another.
quotes.author: Moses

quotes.quote: It's not stealing, it's retrieving.
quotes.author: Mora Early

quotes.quote: If you don't get caught, you deserve everything you steal.
quotes.author: Daniel Nayeri

quotes.quote: Stealing is always wrong, but stealing paintings in an elaborate way is a little like stealing bread to feed your family. It's stealing bread to feed the world's daydreams about becoming an art thief.
quotes.author: Ben Mathis-Lilley

quotes.quote: Stealing isn't so easy, often it's hard work, otherwise we'd all be doing it.
quotes.author: Elfriede Jelinek

quotes.quote: Stealing has always been a way of redistributing wealth.
quotes.author: John Conyers

quotes.quote: Stealing things is a glorious occupations, particularly in the art world.
quotes.author: Malcolm McLaren

quotes.quote: He who steals a little steals with the same wish as he who steals much, but with less power.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: One can steal ideas, but no one can steal execution or passion.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Thou shalt not steal; an empty feat. when it's so lucrative to cheat.
quotes.author: Arthur Hugh Clough

quotes.quote: We live in an upside-down world. People hate when they should love, quarrel when they should be friendly, fight when they should be peaceful, wound when they should heal, steal when they should share, do wrong when they should do right.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: It is Satan's purpose to steal the seed of truth from your heart by sending distracting thoughts. The difference between a Christian and non-Christian is: though they both may have good and evil thoughts, Christ gives His followers strength to select the right rather than the wrong.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Progress always involves risks. You can't steal second base without taking your foot off first.
quotes.author: Frederick B. Wilcox

quotes.quote: My father worked for the railroad, and whenever a train crashed, we would go as a family and steal food from the boxcars. One year, we stole a case of butterscotch pudding that was for export to Israel. It took us years to get through.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If a man or a woman steal, cut off their hands.
quotes.author: The Koran 5:38

quotes.quote: I've always been fascinated with the stealing of innocence. It's the most heinous crime, and certainly a capital crime if there ever was one.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: A thief has three characteristics: first, a thief is not recognized by you as being a thief; second, he robs you of what you have without your realizing it at the time; and third, a thief leaves you feeling very foolish after you have been robbed.
quotes.author: N. Ravichandran

quotes.quote: The robb'd that smiles, steals something from the thief; He robs himself that spends a bootless grief.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The hands and fingers have a good deal to do with stealing; and the history of many a man's life is written by his ten fingers.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Any man can be a father but it takes someone special to be a dad.
quotes.author: Anne Geddes

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter who my father was; it matters who I remember he was.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: The heart of a father is the masterpiece of nature.
quotes.author: Antoine François Prévost

quotes.quote: Stepparents are not around to replace a biological parent, rather to augment a child's life experience.
quotes.author: Azriel Johnson

quotes.quote: That doesn't make you a father. It's the courage to raise a child that makes you a father.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Looking' back all I can say about all the things he did for me is, I hope I'm at least half the dad that he didn't have to be.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: Family isn’t defined only by last names or by blood; it’s defined by commitment and by love.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: And just as an aside, if you are a stepparent, rush right out and get yourself a dog. Because it’s very nice to have someone in the house that loves you.
quotes.author: Delia Ephron

quotes.quote: My father used to play with my brother and me in the yard. Mother would come out and say, 'You're tearing up the grass'; 'We're not raising grass,' Dad would reply. 'We're raising boys.
quotes.author: Harmon Killebrew

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood but the heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Johann Schiller

quotes.quote: The power of a dad in a child’s life is unmatched.
quotes.author: Justin Ricklefs

quotes.quote: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: Family isn’t something that’s supposed to be static or set. People marry in, divorce out. They're born, they die. It’s always evolving, turning into something else.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: And like my dad always said, the first step is always the hardest.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Fly you crows. My father was not a spectacle. He was the greatest man I ever knew. He was my everything.
quotes.author: Stacey Lee

quotes.quote: Adopted a role called being a father so that his child would have something mythical and infinitely important: a Protector.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: A dad is someone who wants to catch you before you fall but instead picks you up, brushes you off, and lets you try again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A stepparent is so much more than just a parent: they made the choice to love when they didn't have to.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Anyone can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad, and that's why I call you dad, because you are so special to me. You taught me the game and you taught me how to play it right.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.quote: A Step Father means so many things... an understanding heart, a source of strength and of support, right from the very start.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My mom is my heart. But my step dad was my role model, the hardest working man I ever knew.
quotes.author: Brian Urlacher

quotes.quote: My Stepdad may not have given me life, but he sure has made my life better.
quotes.author: Gerardo Campbell

quotes.quote: It takes a strong man to accept somebody else's children and step up to the plate another man left on the table.
quotes.author: Ray Johnson

quotes.quote: Stepfathers are no less than those of blood: The spirit is more comely than the flesh. Fathers are defined by how they love and not by how they multiply or breed.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The new-come stepmother hates the children born to a first wife.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: We aren't "step", we aren't "half", we're just family.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Stepparents can be awesome. Because their love is a choice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
Step-parenting and being a step-sibling presents a lot of
exciting opportunities. When families break up and re-form,
there may be less order, less certainty, and a bit more trauma
involved, but kids can end up having half-a-dozen parent
figures.
quotes.author: Morris Gleitzman

quotes.quote:
For better or worse, step-parenting is self-conscious
parenting. You're damned if you do, and damned if you don't.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Stepparenting is like working at a late-night convenience store...all of the responsibility and none of the authority.
quotes.author: Valerie J Lewis Coleman

quotes.quote: A step parent is so much more than just a parent; they made the choice to love when they didn't have to.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
Anyone can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a
step dad.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Step parents are not around to replace a biological parent, rather to augment a childs life experience.
quotes.author: Azriel Johnson

quotes.quote: Being a stepmom means they grew inside of my heart instead of my tummy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Better a sepent than a stepmother!
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Being a step parent is a rough job. But going to bed every night knowing that you are loved by kids who aren't biologically yours is a great feeling.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A step parent is a truly amazing person. They made a choice to love another's child as their own.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To be sure a stepmother to a girl is a different thing to a second wife to a man!
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quotes.quote: A stepparent doesn't just marry a spouse: they marry their spouse's entire situation. They have to find a balance between supporting and defending without overstepping visible and invisible boundaries.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you are a stepparent, rush right out and get yourself a dog. Because it's very nice to have someone in the house that loves you.
quotes.author: Delia Ephron

quotes.quote: Parenthood requires love, not DNA.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Intimacy between stepchildren and stepparents is indeed proverbially difficult.
quotes.author: Murasaki Shikibu

quotes.quote: Families don't have to match. You don't have to look like someone else to love them.
quotes.author: Leigh Anne Tuohy

quotes.quote:
It takes a strong man to accept somebody else's children and
step up to the plate another man left on the table.
quotes.author: Ray Johnson

quotes.quote: When it feels as if you can't do right by the other parent, do right by your step-child instead. You'll never fail with best interest at heart.
quotes.author: Jessica James

quotes.quote: A dad is someone who wants to catch you before you fall but instead picks you up, brushes you off, and lets you try again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My mom is my heart. But my stepdad was my role model, the hardest working man I ever knew.
quotes.author: Brian Urlacher

quotes.quote: Anyone can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad, and that's why I call you dad, because you are so special to me. You taught me the game and you taught me how to play it right.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.quote: He adopted a role called being a father so that his child would have something mythical and infinitely important: a protector.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: The power of a dad in a child’s life is unmatched.
quotes.author: Justin Ricklefs

quotes.quote: It’s only when you grow up and step back from your father, or leave him for your own career and your own home it’s only then that you can measure his greatness and fully appreciate it. Pride reinforces love.
quotes.author: Margaret Truman

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood but the heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Johann Schiller

quotes.quote: Family isn’t defined only by last names or by blood it’s defined by commitment and by love.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Any fool can have a child. That doesn't make you a father. It's the courage to raise a child that makes you a father.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: A man's second wife is treated like an equal.
quotes.author: Mexican Proverb

quotes.quote: The second wife always sits on the right knee.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Biology is the least of what makes someone a mother.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Nature, more a stepmother than a mother in several ways, has sown a seed of evil in the hearts of mortals, especially in the more thoughtful men, which makes them dissatisfied with their own lot and envious of another's.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: A good stepmom is not made - she is built. She is built by the hardships of her role, the tears she cries in secret, and by the lessons she learns through trial and error.
quotes.author: Michelle Zunter

quotes.quote: There's no clear road map to being a stepmother.
quotes.author: Laura Brimberry

quotes.quote: Disney has been lying to little girls. Stepmothers are not scary, nannies are not magical, and dwarfs do not let you spend the night at their house without expecting something.
quotes.author: Xanthippe Voorhees

quotes.quote: In my experience, if you're a good girl and suffer yourself to be led you will find your stepmother the sweetest creature imaginable. I never managed it but you might.
quotes.author: Lady Harriet Cumnor

quotes.quote: Understand that your role is transitional. ... Some days you're going to be the leading lady. Some days you're just going to be a stagehand. And some days you're not going to be in the scene at all. The quicker you realize that, the better off you'll be.
quotes.author: Naja Hall

quotes.quote: All of a sudden you're thrown into doing motherly duties. And I call that the stepmom vortex. You just get pulled in. You're making lunches. You're making dinners. You're going to practices. ... Nobody tells you.
quotes.author: Kendall Rose

quotes.quote: You're second in line to your husband's kids because the kids should come first, right? ... Logically speaking, that sounds fantastic. Of course! Always put the kids first! But your heart … feels like, oh, like, I'm not significant and I don't matter. ... You have hurt feelings, and you don’t really understand how to say that.
quotes.author: Jasjit Sangha

quotes.quote: Stepmothers are more self-critical and blame themselves more than any other members of a remarried family. They tend to experience difficulty with a stepchild as ongoing, unremitting and overwhelming.
quotes.author: Wednesday Martin

quotes.quote: I've heard all the things that they've called me / It's just so many arrows and slings / Leave the glory to the stepmother, and to the son / I'm the woman who rejected the king.
quotes.author: Frank Turner

quotes.quote: Just a little boy who was learning how the world works / I learned to hideaway from my stepmom and self worth / I’m sorry dad wish you knew how bad it hurt / So I tried to scream through a fever dream / As my stomach starts to burn.
quotes.author: Dylan Scott

quotes.quote: First she come to our house, / Tommy run and hid; / And Emily and Bob and me / We cried jus' like we did / When Mother died,--and we all said / 'At we all wisht 'at we was dead! / And Nurse she couldn't stop us, / And Pa he tried and tried,-- / We sobbed and shook and wouldn't look, / But only cried and cried; / And nen someone--we couldn't jus' / Tell who--was cryin' same as us! / Our Stepmother! Yes, it was her, / Her arms around us all-- / 'Cause Tom slid down the bannister / And peeked in from the hall.-- / And we all love her, too, because / She's purt nigh good as Mother was!
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: Woe for Lir's sweet children whom their vile stepmother / Glamoured with her witch-spells for a thousand years; / Died their father raving, on his throne another, / Blind before the end came from the burning tears. / Long the swans have wandered over lake and river; / Gone is all the glory of the race of Lir: / Gone and long forgotten like a dream of fever: / But the swans remember the sweet days that were.
quotes.author: Katharine Tynan

quotes.quote: A day is sometimes our mother, sometimes our stepmother.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: The child who gets a stepmother also gets a stepfather.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Nature makes us buy her presents at the price of so many sufferings that it is doubtful whether she deserves most the name of parent or stepmother.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: Stepparenting is like working at a late-night convenience store all of the responsibility and none of the authority.
quotes.author: Valerie J. Lewis Coleman

quotes.quote: A stepmother has a hard hand.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Nature is the mother and the habitat of man, even if sometimes a stepmother and an unfriendly home.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: The new-come stepmother hates the children born to a first wife.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: To be sure a stepmother to a girl is a different thing to a second wife to a man!
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quotes.quote: Better a serpent than a stepmother!
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Stepmothers in books usually behave very spitefully towards the children entrusted to them. But he was now learning by his own experience that in real life this does not always happen.
quotes.author: Murasaki Shikibu

quotes.quote: There was no convincing me that a stepmother could be anything but a wicked ogre, and I acted accordingly.
quotes.author: John Garfield

quotes.quote: Use pain as a stepping stone, not a camp ground.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Scorn is your second stepping stone to success; first is failure.
quotes.author: Junaid e Mustafa

quotes.quote: No experience is wasted. It is the stepping stones for a great success.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Successful people see adversity as a stepping stone rather than a stumbling block.
quotes.author: Shawn Achor

quotes.quote: Forgiving ourselves and learning from our inevitable mistakes transforms failure from a stumbling block into a stepping stone.
quotes.author: L.R. Knost

quotes.quote: Are you going to let the obstacles in your life be stumbling blocks or stepping stones? Choose the positive. You are the master of your attitude.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Very often, what is meant to be a stepping stone turns out to be a slab of wet cement that will harden around your foot if you do not take the next step soon enough.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy, or any of your time, or any of your space.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Empathy is the stepping stone to respect.
quotes.author: Vusi JCK Maseko

quotes.quote: A mistake is a stepping stone to success.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Love is the stepping stone to new beginnings.
quotes.author: Thomas Kinkade

quotes.quote: It is better to be a stepping stone than a stumbling block.
quotes.author: Mark Samraj

quotes.quote: Constant effort and frequent mistakes are the stepping stones to genius.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Success is not the final destination but the stepping stone for the next.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Never treat anything you do as a stepping stone. Do it fully, and follow it completely.
quotes.author: Mira Nair

quotes.quote: If you make an error, use it as a stepping stone to a new idea you might not have otherwise discovered.
quotes.author: Roger Von Oech

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as failure; everything is just a stepping stone to a greater lesson or achievement.
quotes.author: Idara Victor

quotes.quote: Mistakes are the stepping stones to wisdom, we learn from trial & error, we become wise by understanding problems.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: Often, you'll fail. But, as my mother also taught me, failure isn't the opposite of success - it's a stepping stone to success.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to fail. Failure is only a stepping stone to improvement. Never be overconfident because that will block your improvement.
quotes.author: Tony Jaa

quotes.quote: Don't let the negatives of life control you. Rise above them. Use them as your stepping stones to go higher than you ever dreamed possible.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Mutual tolerance is the stepping stone to mutual respect. A hospitable mind is the key to a neighboring or an alien spirit, looked by dogma and guarded by tradition.
quotes.author: Ameen Rihani

quotes.quote: You have to use your failures as stepping stones to success. You have to maintain a fine balance between hope and despair. In the end it's all a question of balance.
quotes.author: Rohinton Mistry

quotes.quote: The tragedies of our past are the stepping stones for us to reach the happy endings of our tomorrows. Guilt is not going to help you become a better person. Acceptance will.
quotes.author: Yara Greathouse

quotes.quote: In every failure is the seed of success... Our failures are stepping stones in the mechanics of creation, bringing us even closer to our goals. In reality, there is no such thing as failure. What we call failure is just a mechanism through which we can learn to do things right.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A stepping-stone can be a stumbling block if we can't see it until after we have tripped over it.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: Failures to heroic minds are the stepping stones to success.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: God often uses our challenges as stepping stones to the higher purposes of God.
quotes.author: James Robison

quotes.quote: Every now and then one paints a picture that seems to have opened a door and serves as a stepping stone to other things.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The next great step of mankind is to step into the nature of his own mind.
quotes.author: Stanley Kauffmann

quotes.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: People seldom see the halting and painful steps by which the most insignificant success is achieved.
quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

quotes.quote: Even when you have doubts, take that step. Take chances. Mistakes are never a failure they can be turned into wisdom.
quotes.author: Cat Cora

quotes.quote: The first step in solving a problem is to recognize that it does exist.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The first step to achieving your goal, is to take a moment to respect your goal. Know what it means to you to achieve it.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: The first step in forgiveness is the willingness to forgive.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: A journey begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Ricky Maye

quotes.quote: The very first step towards success in any occupation is to become interested in it.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: The first step to getting what you want is to have the courage to get rid of what you don't.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: If you believe, then you have already taken the first step towards your achievement.
quotes.author: Rickson Gracie

quotes.quote: The first step is the best step in a journey towards a destination.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The first step in a person's salvation is knowledge of their sin.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
quotes.author: Mark Caine

quotes.quote: If you take each step, as if it was your last. You would appreciate the world in all its glory and bask in the glory of god for in his wisdom he created us and the universe all around us.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: One of the first steps to successful leadership is to always forget your age and remember your dream regularly.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The first step is the most important. It is the most crucial and the most effective as it will initiate the direction you have chosen.
quotes.author: Steve Backley

quotes.quote: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: Step into your track and begin your steps till you reach the end because life is a personal journey.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: In every step you take, keep your feet firmly on the ground.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You achieve long-term success step by step. Try to achieve your goals one at a time, like you do target practice.
quotes.author: Daniel Snyder

quotes.quote: Positive steps that will help the peace process.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You need to step out to build before God could bless what you are building.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The first step is learning to monitor your thoughts; to think about what you are thinking about.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: The 'Popeye Syndrome': in a training program, there is no easy solution. Eating spinach won't get you through. You need to slowly but surely get fitter one day at a time.
quotes.author: Jenny Hadfield

quotes.quote: An ant on the move does more than a dozing ox.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The miracle isn't that I finished. The miracle is that I had the courage to start.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: Stereotypes wouldn't be so bad if black people were nicer, in general.
quotes.author: Anthony Jeselnik

quotes.quote: The stereotypes really play into what kinds of companies women can get funded for.
quotes.author: Anita Borg

quotes.quote: Popular in our time, unpopular in his. So runs the stereotype of rejected genius.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The stereotype of the supercrip, in the eyes of its critics, represents a sort of overachieving, overdetermined self-enfreakment that distracts from the lived daily reality of most disabled people.
quotes.author: José Alaniz

quotes.quote: Stereotypes exist because there's always some truth to stereotypes. Not always, but often.
quotes.author: Maz Jobrani

quotes.quote: The stereotype of aging as a progressive loss of function is generally true only for people who stop functioning.
quotes.author: Joan Z. Borysenko

quotes.quote: Instead of being presented with stereotypes by age, sex, color, class, or religion, children must have the opportunity to learn that within each range, some people are loathsome and some are delightful.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: All stereotypes turn out to be true. This is a horrifying thing about life. All those things you fought against as a youth: you begin to realize they're stereotypes because they're true.
quotes.author: David Cronenberg

quotes.quote: In every community, some people will fit every stereotype, and some people will fit no stereotypes, and both are valid representations for that community.
quotes.author: Tyler Oakley

quotes.quote: You run into stereotypes so that the stereotype filters who you are and what you do, and having to deal with that was the most frustrating thing for me.
quotes.author: Pauline Oliveros

quotes.quote: Stereotypes, they're sensual, cultural weapons. That's the way that we attack people. At an artistic level, stereotypes are terrible writing.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: Stereotypes are ways of making extremely primitive and simple differentiations. Differentiations of gender, race, class, social status so ordinary social life is very much built upon a whole repertoire of stereotypes we carry around. And those are immediately laminated onto people, and it isn't just visual.
quotes.author: W. J. T. Mitchell

quotes.quote: The whole idea of a stereotype is to simplify. Instead of going through the problem of all this great diversity that it's this or maybe that you have just one large statement; it is this.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: There is no right way to live. You preclude a lot of life by trying to conform to that kind of ideal or stereotype. And it's a natural inclination in a world where it's so complex and so occasionally valueless, morally bankrupt, and chaotic that we want to reach back to something in our past.
quotes.author: Gary Ross

quotes.quote: Stereotypes work to help divide women from recognizing their common interests.
quotes.author: Melissa Harris-Perry

quotes.quote: There's a difference between being yourself and being your stereotype.
quotes.author: Iggy Azalea

quotes.quote: There are stereotypes that have been out there for a long time that tell girls that their main asset, the main thing that they are valued for, is their appearance and also that it's to the exclusion of anything else.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: Sometimes the stereotypes that a lot of people have are of black men in jail or who don't take care of their kids, so I think it's always important to have that.
quotes.author: Morris Chestnut

quotes.quote: Stereotypes should never influence policy or public opinion.
quotes.author: Janet Reno

quotes.quote: Out with stereotypes, feminism proclaims. But stereotypes are the west's stunning sexual personae, the vehicles of art's assault against nature. The moment there is imagination, there is myth.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Stereotypes are based on the idea that two heads are bigger than one.
quotes.author: Anthony Marais

quotes.quote: Stereotypes are fast and easy, but they are lies, and the truth takes its time.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Stereotypes fall in the face of humanity. We human beings are best understood one at a time.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: There are stereotypes it's like an invisible line, but somehow you have to find the energy to be strong, to be super-confident, no matter if you are in front of the president of the U.S. or anyone else.
quotes.author: Thalia

quotes.quote: Attempting to get at truth means rejecting stereotypes and cliches.
quotes.author: Harold Evans

quotes.quote: A stereotype may be negative or positive, but even positive stereotypes present two problems: They are cliches, and they present a human being as far more simple and uniform than any human being actually is.
quotes.author: Nancy Kress

quotes.quote: Stereotypes have their roots in truth.
quotes.author: Emma Walton Hamilton

quotes.quote: Stereotypes lose their power when the world is found to be more complex than the stereotype would suggest. When we learn that individuals do not fit the group stereotype, then it begins to fall apart.
quotes.author: Ed Koch

quotes.quote: Stereotypes are the mind's shorthand for dealing with complexities. They have two aspects: they are much blunter than reality; they are shaped to fit a man's preferences or prejudgments. Thus two principles are involved: differentiation or its lack, and biased preferential perception.
quotes.author: Robert E Lane

quotes.quote: A stereotype becomes a stereotype when a significant percentage of the population appears to conform to it.
quotes.author: Kelley Armstrong

quotes.quote: What doesn't kill you, make you stronger......That's why pain is the most natural steroid of all.
quotes.author: Arpon

quotes.quote: Steroids is now just a word that the lazy and ignorant use to describe any guy or girl that has more muscle or strength and dedicated than them.
quotes.author: Michael O'Hearn

quotes.quote: America is capitalism on steroids.
quotes.author: Lowkey

quotes.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work. Steroids beat hard work no matter how hard talent works.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Steroids are not really needed, â€¦ You can get nearly the same results through training.
quotes.author: Joe Adams

quotes.quote: Religion is peer pressure on steroids.
quotes.author: R. Elise Elrod

quotes.quote: There is a myth out there that somehow anabolic steroids can turn a cub into a bear. Steroids won't make you tough and competitive. What they will do is ruin your health. It's that simple.
quotes.author: Dick Butkus

quotes.quote: Steroids are for guys who want to cheat opponents.
quotes.author: Lawrence Taylor

quotes.quote: Physics is geometric proof on steroids
quotes.author: S.A. Sachs

quotes.quote: Maybe the one dangerous thing about reading a library's worth of books was the way your imagination got pumped up like a bodybuilder on steroids.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Even with the benefit of steroids most modern players still couldn't hit as many home runs as Babe Ruth hit on hotdogs.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: Conceit is pride and arrogance on steroids.
quotes.author: Michelle Singletary

quotes.quote: We're living in an era where word-of-mouth is on steroids.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: These days the temptation to use steroids in sports has become too great for many young athletes.
quotes.author: Jim Sensenbrenner

quotes.quote: To nobody's surprise, steroid use is common among gay men. When you combine a love for men with a love for drama, you end up with a guy on steroids.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: Fear is my mind painstakingly creating the worse-case scenario and then putting it on steroids.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The safety argument against steroids may be a good one, but let's be honest. It isn't the one that motivates most officials and fans to frown on steroids. Steroid use does not just seem risky or unnatural, it seems to disrupt the level playing field.
quotes.author: Alice Dreger

quotes.quote: Because tanning and steroids are only a problem if you plan to live a long time.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If you take steroids, you have to pay the price. They can kill you; there are no shortcuts. It's like going to bed with a rattlesnake, it's got to get you.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: Psychological fact: Science has shown that chocolate and shopping are more addictive than LSD and steroids.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Steroids do not guarantee you're going to have success. I think a lot of people think that they will, but they don't.
quotes.author: Tony Gwynn

quotes.quote: Steroids is cheating, and winning without honor is not winning.
quotes.author: Curt Schilling

quotes.quote: Steroids build your muscles, but they don't build your tendons or ligaments.
quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

quotes.quote: Steroids can seem necessary to compete at the highest levels, and the quick rewards can outweigh the long term consequences to the user's health.
quotes.author: Howard Berman

quotes.quote: The very best board members serve as fervent advocates for the organization while faithfully serving as good stewards for the public.
quotes.author: Jim Norvell

quotes.quote: As for him who voluntarily performs a good work, verily God is grateful and knowing.
quotes.author: The Koran Ch 2

quotes.quote: Any work done by a follower of Christ to the glory of God is 'gold, silver, precious stones.' But if any follower of Christ works with any self interest or personal ambition involved, it will be,'wood, hay, and stubble,' and will be burned.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Christians at work in the world are the only real spiritual light in the midst of great spiritual darkness. This places a tremendous responsibility on all of us.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Each man should give what he has decided in his heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver.
quotes.author: 2 Corinthians 9:7

quotes.quote: Friendship, like money, is a trust, a stewardship, a responsibility.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Reverence for nature is compatible with willingness to accept responsibility for a creative stewardship of the earth.
quotes.author: Rene Dubos
