quotes.quote: The principles of stewardship bring accountability into each act of governance, while partnership balances responsibility.
quotes.author: Peter Block

quotes.quote: One need ask only one question: 'What for?' What am I to unify my being for? The reply is: Not for my own sake.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: The alternative to leadership is stewardship.
quotes.author: Peter Block

quotes.quote: Stewardship asks us to be deeply accountable for the outcomes of an institution, without acting to define purpose for others, control others, or take care of others.
quotes.author: Peter Block

quotes.quote: Christian Stewardship involves doing God's will in all things.
quotes.author: Stephen F. Olford

quotes.quote: A steward understands that God has given instruction on how to care for his earth.
quotes.author: Daniel K. Lagat

quotes.quote: Stewardship is taking care of something that belongs to another.
quotes.author: Edward Brown

quotes.quote: The earth will not continue to offer its harvest, except with faithful stewardship. We cannot say we love the land and then take steps to destroy it for use by future generations.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: The care of the earth is our most ancient and most worthy and, after all, our most pleasing responsibility. To cherish what remains of it, and to foster its renewal, is our only legitimate hope.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: When a man becomes a Christian, he becomes industrious, trustworthy and prosperous. Now, if that man when he gets all he can and saves all he can, does not give all he can, I have more hope for Judas Iscariot than for that man!
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Simply because humankind have the power now to meddle or 'manage' or 'exercise stewardship' in every nook and cranny of the world does not mean that we have a right to do so. Even less, the obligation.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Leadership is stewardship, it's temporary and you're accountable!
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: I owe everything I have to them when I'm out there on the mound. But I owe the fans nothing and they owe me nothing when I am not pitching.
quotes.author: Christy Mathewson

quotes.quote: The way to thrive is to help others thrive; the way to flourish is to help others flourish; the way to fulfill yourself is to spend yourself.
quotes.author: Cornelius Plantinga

quotes.quote: The surplus wealth we have gained to some extent at least belongs to our fellow beings; we are only the temporary custodians of our fortunes, and let us be careful that no just complaint can be made against our stewardship.
quotes.author: Jacob Schiff

quotes.quote: God is looking for a faithful steward--someone He can trust to obey Him.
quotes.author: Laura W. Watts

quotes.quote: A leader must be a good listener. He must be willing to take counsel. He must show a genuine concern and love for those under his stewardship.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Finance is not merely about making money. It's about achieving our deep goals and protecting the fruits of our labor. It's about stewardship and, therefore, about achieving the good society.
quotes.author: Robert J. Schiller

quotes.quote: Further, Take heed that you faithfully perform the business you have to do in the world, from a regard to the commands of God; and not from an ambitious desire of being esteemed better than others.
quotes.author: David Brainerd

quotes.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Transparency, honesty, kindness, good stewardship, even humor, work in businesses at all times.
quotes.author: John Gerzema

quotes.quote: Giving frees us from the familiar territory of our own needs by opening our mind to the unexplained worlds occupied by the needs of others.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: You haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: I believe the biggest stigma right now, with mental health, is that a lot of men are not talking about it.
quotes.author: Mauro Ranallo

quotes.quote: I've found nothing but support and generosity from older comics. I think comedians are a lot nicer than the stigma is, at least from my experience.
quotes.author: Bo Burnham

quotes.quote: There's a mental health problem in the sense that people are so afraid of the stigma that they don't get help. But there's absolutely a gun control problem in the country.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: Blacks in America want to forget about slavery - the stigma, the shame. If you can't be who you are, who can you be? How can you know what to do? We have our history. We have our book, and that is the blues.
quotes.author: August Wilson

quotes.quote: There's a stigma to skating. People think of it as a kid's sport. People kept telling me I couldn't possibly make a living out of it. Then they said I couldn't keep it up in my 30s. And here I am in my 40s, and I'm still improving my skills.
quotes.author: Tony Hawk

quotes.quote: We bought the UFC when not only was it a bankrupt company that was going under, it had a horrible stigma attached to it. This thing was so bad it was not allowed on pay-per-view.
quotes.author: Dana White

quotes.quote: There's a stigma on the word 'therapy.' People relate it to big problems. That's something we have to change. Going to therapy can be very healthy. It can change the way you see things and treat others.
quotes.author: Juan Pablo Galavis

quotes.quote: The magnitude of discrimination and stigma faced by people with disability in Australia cannot be underestimated. People do not understand disability, and people fear what they don't understand.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: I think with the success of, like, every summer there has been a couple R-rated comedies that have done so well; I think it is so nice to see that people are turning out to see these movies, and it doesn't seem to be as big a stigma with the studios anymore.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: There are proven health benefits for both babies and mothers who breastfeed, and it's unfortunate that it still carries an unfair stigma in our society.
quotes.author: Rashida Tlaib

quotes.quote: HIV AIDS is a disease with stigma. And we have learned with experience, not just with HIV AIDS but with other diseases, countries for many reasons are sometimes hesitant to admit they have a problem.
quotes.author: Margaret Chan

quotes.quote: Usually, it's men who run these big monster companies, and girl companies are usually much smaller - it's like an unwritten tech-industry stigma.
quotes.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

quotes.quote: It's something my mother believed in: If you are in a position of privilege, if you can put your name to something that you genuinely believe in, you can smash any stigma you want, and you can encourage anybody to do anything.
quotes.author: Prince Harry

quotes.quote: The stigma of being an unmarried mother was something we can't comprehend today. It was not uncommon that you'd go off somewhere to have your child, then give it up for adoption.
quotes.author: Michael Ashcroft

quotes.quote: Today, certain people file for bankruptcy, businesses and individuals, and it no longer has the stigma it once had. Now it's almost considered wise, a way to regroup and come back again.
quotes.author: David Dinkins

quotes.quote: The stigma that used to exist many years ago, that actors from film don't do television, seems to have disappeared. That camera doesn't know it's a TV camera... or even a streaming camera. It's just a camera.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: I think the stigma surrounding mental illness and also the stigma surrounding self-esteem issues or insecurities or just even feeling different is something that doesn't really get enough attention. Everybody struggles with feeling alone or that they are going through something they don't quite understand.
quotes.author: Brittany Snow

quotes.quote: The only reason I've shared my story is to take that tiny baby step of breaking down the stigma attached to depression.
quotes.author: Clara Hughes

quotes.quote: Some people say I'm unique, that there aren't other people with schizophrenia like me. Well, there are people like me out there, but the stigma is so great that they don't come forward.
quotes.author: Elyn Saks

quotes.quote: There are many plant medicines that are available to us that have a lot of stigma around them that I hope, in the future, our medical community can look at, because I would absolutely go to those alternatives first before I went back to Western medicine.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: Typecasting is really rampant in Hollywood, and because I played a costumed character and did it successfully, it was a real stigma.
quotes.author: Adam West

quotes.quote: Every teenager deals in his or her own sexuality and has to face it and figure out how it can coincide with the rest of their lives in a healthy manner. And try to navigate it in our modern society, which is wrought with stigma and taboo and repression, and sort of as a result, these inner monsters that some teenagers really struggle with.
quotes.author: Ezra Miller

quotes.quote: You had a generation of women, of which I'm part, where it was a stigma to be associated with feminism; there was a backlash. Now you have a generation that is clearly embracing feminism because, at the end of the day, the definition of feminism is just equality.
quotes.author: Nancy Dubuc

quotes.quote: There has been a stigma around letting movies be seen on home screens on the same day as theatrical screens. Universal said they were going to do it with 'Tower Heist,' but they backed off when challenged by the theater owners. I understand where the theater owners are coming from on big studio movies.
quotes.author: Jay Chandrasekhar

quotes.quote: I fought a disease. I fought a disease called depression that a lot of people fight every single day. And unlike other diseases, there is a stigma surrounding it.
quotes.author: Ginger Zee

quotes.quote: Although there's a stigma that you learn only until a certain point, and then you just maintain, for me to learn the triple axel at 24 goes to show that anything's possible.
quotes.author: Mirai Nagasu

quotes.quote: There's a stigma about being vegan. Some people say it doesn't taste great. Don't knock it until you try it!
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.quote: The problem with the stigma around mental health is really about the stories that we tell ourselves as a society. What is normal? That's just a story that we tell ourselves.
quotes.author: Matthew Quick

quotes.quote: There's a stigma that guys hate romance and hate love, but that's not true. Look at 'Iron Man.' There's a whole through-line plot about his relationship with Pepper, and everybody loves it.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Rich people in poor places want to show off their wealth. And their less affluent counterparts feel pressure to fake it, at least in public. Nobody wants the stigma of being thought poor.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: Only in stillness does the imperceivable become discernible.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The stillness in stillness is not the real stillness; only when there is stillness in movement does the universal rhythm manifest.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: True intelligence operates silently. Stillness is where creativity and solutions to problems are found.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Stillness within one individual can affect society beyond measure.
quotes.author: Bede Griffiths

quotes.quote: Inner stillness is the key to outer strength.
quotes.author: Jared Brock

quotes.quote: In listening and stillness there is nobody who is still, and this stillness doesn't refer to any object; it is absolutely objectless; it is our real nature.
quotes.author: Jean Klein

quotes.quote: It is the stillness that will save and transform the world.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Choosing stillness in the midst of chaos is the path toward living in peace.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Be still. Stillness reveals the secrets of eternity.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Only in the stillness of detachment can the soul yield up her secrets.
quotes.author: Elsa Barker

quotes.quote: Stillness of person and steadiness of features are signal marks of good breeding.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Stillness is our most intense mode of action. It is in our moments of deep quiet that is born every idea, emotion, and drive which we eventually honor with the name of action. We reach highest in meditation, and farthest in prayer. In stillness every human being is great.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: Just come into stillness. Have your intention be to relax with the breath. That will begin to set in motion a habit that will start to train the mind.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: There was a sudden stillness like the gap between ticks on a clock, but the next tick never coming.
quotes.author: Sadie Jones

quotes.quote: With stillness comes the benediction of Peace.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: In the stillness of life, we find our higher self. Be still and God is with you. Be still, and you are never alone.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: The near stillness recalls what is forgotten, extinct angels.
quotes.author: Georg Trakl

quotes.quote: There is in stillness oft a magic power to calm the breast, when struggling passions lower; touch'd by its influence, in the soul arise diviner feelings, kindred with the skies
quotes.author: John Henry Newman

quotes.quote: Stillness is the only thing in this world that has no form. But then, it is not really a thing, and it is not of this world.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The stillness of the waters is only drowned out by the sound of your heartbeat.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Stillness as a technique is still really captivating to me.
quotes.author: Adam Baldwin

quotes.quote: Stillness is your essential nature. What is stillness? The inner space or awareness in which the words on this page are bieng perceived and become thoughts. Without that awareness, there would be no perception, no thoughts, no world. You are that awareness, disguised as a person.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: In stillness the muddied water returns to clarity.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: In the stillness of the quiet, if we listen, we can hear the whisper of the heart giving strength to weakness, courage to fear, hope to despair.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: Stillness is your essential nature.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: There is a stillness in all of us that is really the essence of who we are. A stillness and a silence that doesn't move, that doesn't go anywhere and our task is to experience that while being in time.
quotes.author: Roger Housden

quotes.quote: Stillness is where creativity and solutions are found.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Nothing but stillness can remain when hearts are full Of their own sweetness, bodies of their loveliness.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: In the stillness, a fly would not have dared clear it's throat.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: I'm not stingy. I'm just afraid of being an easy mark. People wouldn't have money long if they didn't ask how much things cost.
quotes.author: Doris Duke

quotes.quote: Life is short and often stingy; feast the heart with what it craves, short of cruelty, and let the world wonder.
quotes.author: Reynolds Price

quotes.quote: Beware of those who are stingy, for they would rather sting you than give you anything.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: If you're raised with a poverty mentality, nothing is going to change it. I do know some really stingy billionaires. I come from such a generation of hand-to-mouthers.
quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.quote: Why are you stingy with yourselves? Why are you holding back? What are you saving for - for another time? There are no other times. There is only now. Right now.
quotes.author: George Balanchine

quotes.quote: Feelings about money -- saving and spending, holding back and letting go -- start very early in our lives. Stingy people have often been forced to give when they were very, very young, when they weren't ready. And generous people have often been really appreciated when they were very young.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: I just think it's silly to be stingy with compliments. If you see someone and they strike you as beautiful in any way, why not let them know?
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.quote: The stingy are always in need.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Because I was an only, I had more things, and I remember early on the kick I got from giving stuff away. Despite all the myths about only children not being able to share, actually I've never knowingly met a stingy one.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.quote: When you realize there's so much you can't control, you get pretty stingy with what you can.
quotes.author: Amy Harmon

quotes.quote: Stay away from stingy people. They are trapped in small souls.
quotes.author: Anne Fortier

quotes.quote: I'm not saying he's stingy. But sometimes when you're too careful it just turns into a different kind of carelessness. It's not that either. He's from a generation that never expected to get midway up the ladder so when he got there he was too stunned to dare to climb higher.
quotes.author: Marlon James

quotes.quote: Founders are usually very stingy with equity to employees and very generous with equity to investors. I think this is totally backwards.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: The United States is not stingy. We are the greatest contributor to international relief efforts in the world.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: If the money is raised by taxation, then the burden will fall where it ought to fall, . . . and the rich and stingy will no longer be able to evade the duties of citizenship and of humanity.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: It costs a lot to be authentic. And one can't be stingy with these things because you are more authentic the more you resemble what you've dreamed of being.
quotes.author: Pedro

quotes.quote: Conquer the angry one by not getting angry; conquer the wicked by goodness; conquer the stingy by generosity, and the liar by speaking the truth.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Books are not greedy, they want nothing from us than to be read. Books are not stingy, they withhold nothing from us.
quotes.author: Paul Bamikole

quotes.quote: The motto of west African cooking is that if the food doesn't set fire to the tablecloth the cook is being stingy with the pepper.
quotes.author: Ben Aaronovitch

quotes.quote: In a little while you will have forgotten everything; in a little while everything will have forgotten you.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Sometimes in life we must fight not only without fear, but also without hope.
quotes.author: Alessandro Pertini

quotes.quote: Feeling too much is a hell of a lot better than feeling nothing.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Death remembered should be like a mirror, Who tells us life's but breath, to trust it error.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: It is more necessary for the soul to be cured than the body; for it is better to die than to live badly.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: If it is not right, do not do it, if it is not true, do not say it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The stoicism that comes of endurance has something of death in it.
quotes.author: Mary Catherwood

quotes.quote: Progress daily in your own uncertainty. Live in awareness of the questions.
quotes.author: Bremer Acosta

quotes.quote: The average man is a conformist, accepting miseries and disasters with the stoicism of a cow standing in the rain.
quotes.author: Colin Wilson

quotes.quote: What's the good of being stoical if nobody notices?
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Choose not to be harmed and you won't feel harmed. Don't feel harmed and you haven't been.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Some of the best things that have ever happened to us wouldn't have happened to us, if it weren't for some of the worst things that have ever happened to us.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The critics could never mortify me out of heart, because I love poetry for its own sake, and, tho' with no stoicism and some ambition, care more for my poems than for my poetic reputation.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Stoicism and silence does not serve us nor our communities, only the forces of things as they are.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: The things you think about determine the quality of your mind.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It is not the man who has too little that is poor, but the one who hankers after more.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The basic philosophy of stoicism is that you have nothing real external to your own consciousness, that the only thing real is in fact your consciousness.
quotes.author: Roger Avary

quotes.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When you give your items away, don't keep the excess of your pride.
quotes.author: Bremer Acosta

quotes.quote: Whoever has nothing to hope, let him despair of nothing.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Stoicism is the wisdom of madness and cynicism the madness of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bergen Evans

quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Warriors should suffer their pain silently.
quotes.author: Erin Hunter

quotes.quote: What man actually needs is not a tensionless state but rather the striving and struggling for some goal worthy of him.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: Until we have begun to go without them, we fail to realize how unnecessary many things are. We've been using them not because we needed them but because we had them.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Stoicism is about the domestication of emotions, not their elimination.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Whatever lies in the soul, can never be stolen.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Ordinary riches can be stolen; real riches cannot. In your soul are infinitely precious things that cannot be taken from you.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I asked a man in prison once how he happened to be there and he said he had stolen a pair of shoes. I told him if he had stolen a railroad he would be a United States Senator.
quotes.author: Mother Jones

quotes.quote: To live every day as if it had been stolen from death, that is how I would like to live.
quotes.author: Garth Stein

quotes.quote: Wisdom cannot be stolen- it can only be shared.
quotes.author: Jefferson Smith

quotes.quote: Of course, your ideas can be stolen... I used to think it was immoral; now I think of it as a compliment... Ultimately, an idea isn't yours; it's only your take on something.
quotes.author: Peter Wolf

quotes.quote: Age is a peculiar kind of thief. It slips up on you and steps inside your skin and is so quiet and methodical in its work that you never realize it has stolen your youth until you look into the mirror one morning and see a man you don't recognize.
quotes.author: James Lee Burke

quotes.quote: Words have life and must be cared for. If they are stolen for ugly uses or careless slang or false promotion work, they need to be brought back to their original meaning - back to their roots.
quotes.author: Corita Kent

quotes.quote: She'd stolen my car. She'd stolen my dog. She'd stolen all my money. But if she had only asked, I would have given her it all, because when I first met her, she'd stolen my heart.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: Morality comes from humanism and is stolen by religion for its own purposes.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: I have a faithful joy and a joy that is lost. One is like a rose, the other, a thorn. The one that was stolen I have not lost.
quotes.author: Gabriela Mistral

quotes.quote: My mind is the only sanctuary that has not been stolen from me.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: A lawful kiss is never worth as much as a stolen one.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: Love can't be stolen without willing participants.
quotes.author: Jon Jones

quotes.quote: He that is robbed, not wanting what is stolen, let him not know it, and he's not robbed at all.
quotes.author: William Shakspeare

quotes.quote: What is plucked will grow again, what is slain lives on, what is stolen will remain- what is gone is gone.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: What you have stolen can never be yours.
quotes.author: Halldor Laxness

quotes.quote: If what I do prove well, it won't advance. They'll say it's stolen, or else it was by chance.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: I've always found it strange that a director can hire any designer he wants from any country. But if he hires a foreign actor, it's like he's stolen the crown jewels and run across the river with them.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: Plagiarists are always suspicious of being stolen from.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: We are stone enemies when the bell rings.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Get stoned and abandon all constructive activity.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: Stones have been known to move and trees to speak.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Even stone can be worn down with enough rain.
quotes.author: Arthur Golden

quotes.quote: The stones of a river start out rough, but with the current continually bumping and polishing them, they end up being beautiful.
quotes.author: Swami Satchidananda

quotes.quote: You cannot expect stone to be as pliable as clay.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: Throwing stones is the birthright and duty of anyone subject to foreign rule. Throwing stones is an action as well as a metaphor of resistance.
quotes.author: Amira Hass

quotes.quote: Take the stones that failure throws at you and build legacies the world will always remember you for.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Even stones have a love, a love that seeks the ground.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: A rolling stone can gather no moss.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Under that heart of stone beat muscles of pure flint.
quotes.author: Sid Waddell

quotes.quote: A rugged stone growes smooth from hand to hand.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: A rolling stone gathers no moss, but it gains a certain polish.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: Under every stone lurks a politician.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: A stone is ingrained with geological and historical memories.
quotes.author: Andy Goldsworthy

quotes.quote: Nothing is built on stone; all is built on sand, but we must build as if the sand were stone.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: The stone often recoils on the head of the thrower.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.quote: Never throw stones if you think they're going to come back and hit you.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Without stones there is no arch.
quotes.author: Marco Polo

quotes.quote: Leave no stone unturned.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The truth is not in the touch of a stone, but in what the stone tells you.
quotes.author: Rene Denfeld

quotes.quote: Stone tools are fossilized human behavior.
quotes.author: Louis Leakey

quotes.quote: Stone walls confine a tinker; cold iron binds a witch; but a musician's music can never be fettered, for it lives first in her heart and mind.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: The stone that the builder refused shall be the head corner stone.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: There will always be rocks in the road ahead of us. They will be stumbling blocks or stepping stones; it all depends on how you use them.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: With the stones we cast at them, geniuses build new roads for us.
quotes.author: Paul Eldridge

quotes.quote: We can choose to throw stones, to stumble on them, to climb over them, or to build with them.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: A stone that looks satisfied with its position reflects the sense of ease the waller felt when placing it there.
quotes.author: Dan Snow

quotes.quote: It is better to be a stepping stone than a stumbling block.
quotes.author: Mark Samraj

quotes.quote: Avoid all needle drugs, the only dope worth shooting is Richard Nixon.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: If we could sniff or swallow something that would, for five or six hours each day, abolish our solitude as individuals, atone us with our fellows in a glowing exaltation of affection and make life in all its aspects seem not only worth living, but divinely beautiful and significant, and if this heavenly, world-transfiguring drug were of such a kind that we could wake up next morning with a clear head and an undamaged constitution then, it seems to me, all our problems (and not merely the one small problem of discovering a novel pleasure) would be wholly solved and earth would become paradise.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: I think pot should be legal. I don't smoke it, but I like the smell of it.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Of course drugs were fun. And that’s what’s so stupid about anti-drug campaigns, they don't admit that. I can't say I feel particularly scarred or lessened by my experimentation with drugs. They've gotten a very bad name.
quotes.author: Anjelica Huston

quotes.quote: That is not a drug, it’s a leaf.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: When I was a kid I inhaled frequently. That was the point.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: I don't think it's more dangerous than alcohol.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Let us burn one from end to end, and pass it over to me my friend.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: I tried marijuana once. I did not inhale.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: Why is marijuana against the law? It grows naturally upon our planet. Doesn't the idea of making nature against the law seem to you a bit unnatural?
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.quote: To make marijuana against the law is like saying God made a big mistake.
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.quote: It’s hard to be mean when you're stoned.
quotes.author: Bill Lee

quotes.quote: New Rule: Stop putting psychedelic screensavers on computers. I sit down to check my email, and the next thing I know it’s three days later, I'm in the desert, I'm banging on a drum, I'm naked, and somebody’s pierced my dick.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: When you smoke herb, it reveals you to yourself.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The illegality of cannabis is outrageous, an impediment to full utilization of a drug which helps produce the serenity and insight, sensitivity and fellowship, so desperately needed in this increasingly mad and dangerous world.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Hashish will be, indeed, for the impressions and familiar thoughts of the man, a mirror which magnifies, yet no more than a mirror.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: The best pitch I ever heard about cocaine was back in the early eighties when a street dealer followed me down the sidewalk going: I got some great blow man. I got the stuff that killed Belushi.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: [Marijuana] It doesn't have a high potential for abuse, and there are very legitimate medical applications. In fact, sometimes marijuana is the only thing that works.
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Gupta

quotes.quote: I have absolutely no pleasure in the stimulants in which I sometimes so madly indulge. It has not been in the pursuit of pleasure that I have periled life and reputation and reason. It has been the desperate attempt to escape from torturing memories, from a sense of insupportable loneliness and a dread of some strange impending doom.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: So when he asked about getting high, I didn't think, I agreed. We smoked some good California green. Took three tries to put me in the place he said I should be.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: Fuck the drug war. Dropping acid was a profound turning point for me, a seminal experience. I make no apologies for it. More people should do acid. It should be sold over the counter.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: All right, brain, I don't like you and you don't like me. So let’s just do this and I'll get back to killing you with beer.
quotes.author: Homer Simpson

quotes.quote: Ignore that nightmare in the bathroom. Just another ugly refugee from the Love Generation, some doom-struck gimp who couldn't handle the pressure. My attorney has never been able to accept the notion often espoused by reformed drug abusers. And especially popular among those on probation that you can get a lot higher without drugs than with them. And neither have I, for that matter.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: I have always loved marijuana. It has been a source of joy and comfort to me for many years. And I still think of it as a basic staple of life, along with beer and ice and grapefruits.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Many artists and writers have used cannabis for creative stimulation from the writers of the world’s religious masterpieces to our most irreverent satirists.
quotes.author: Jack Herer

quotes.quote: I don't consider weed to be any worse than having a beer.
quotes.author: James Franco

quotes.quote: Nobody stopped thinking about those psychedelic experiences. Once you've been to some of those places, you think, ”How can I get back there again but make it a little easier on myself?
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.quote: The criminalization of cannabis did not prevent cannabis from becoming the most widely used illegal substance in the United States and many other countries. But it did result in extensive costs and negative consequences.
quotes.author: Jerry Spiegel

quotes.quote: People say you can abuse marijuana. Well shit, you can abuse cheeseburgers too, you know? You don't go around closing Burger King because you can abuse something.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: If somebody gives me a joint, I might smoke it, but I don't go after it.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Sensuality is a woman's prerogative and a man's pleasure.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The day you stop worrying will be the first day of your new life; anxiety takes you in circles, trust in yourself and become free.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work. Never give up. Never stop believing. Never stop fighting.
quotes.author: Hope Hicks

quotes.quote: Never stop testing, and your advertising will never stop improving.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else - means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
quotes.author: E.E Cummings

quotes.quote: Stop watering things that were never meant to grow in your life. Water what works, what's good, what's right. Stop playing around with those dead bones and stuff you can't fix, its over...leave it alone! You're coming into a season of greatness. If you water what's alive and divine, you will see harvest like you've never seen before. Stop wasting water on dead issues, dead relationships, dead people, a dead past. No matter how much you water concrete, you can't grow a garden.
quotes.author: T.D Jakes

quotes.quote: Stop looking outside for scraps of pleasure or fulfillment, for validation, security, or love - you have a treasure within that is infinitely greater than anything the world can offer.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning; curiosity has its own reason for existing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You are likely to fall when you stop paddling your bicycle. Such is life. As long as you don’t give up, you will never end up failing
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote:
Don't stop believing,
Don't be afraid of change,
Don't underestimate yourself,
Don't make excuses,
Don't cheat yourself,
Don't ever ever STOP!
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to stop worrying, wondering and doubting. Have faith that things will work out, maybe not how you planned but just how its meant to be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Live a life full of humility, gratitude, intellectual curiosity, and never stop learning.
quotes.author: Gza

quotes.quote: Never stop taking risks. Just keep reaching.
quotes.author: Ryan Eggold

quotes.quote: Never stop because you are afraid - you are never so likely to be wrong.
quotes.author: Fridtjof Nansen

quotes.quote: Never stop listening to your audience.
quotes.author: David Copperfield

quotes.quote: Never stop moving, or you'll stop moving.
quotes.author: Liza Minnelli

quotes.quote: Never stop paying attention to things. Never make your mind up finally. Do not hold on beliefs.
quotes.author: A. S. Byatt

quotes.quote: Stop. Revive. Survive.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: Never stop acquiring commosense, it is as good as the knowledge.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Never stop investing. Nevre stop improving.
quotes.author: Bob Parsons

quotes.quote: Never stop dreaming, and never stop working hard for your dreams. You never know what you can become. Life is unpredictable. You will never know as to which road can leads you to which destination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't wait for the storms of your life to pass. Learn to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Steve Rizzo

quotes.quote: Every storm runs out of rain, just like every dark night turns into day.
quotes.author: Gary Allan

quotes.quote: Storms draw something out of us that calm seas don't.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: A great storm is like a sunny day to a person of great faith. A gentle wind is like a great storm to a person of great fear.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: When you are in the middle of a storm cloud it's hard to think outside of it, but the only way out of the storm is to ride through it and things will be a lot clearer on the other side
quotes.author: Jodi Ann Bickley

quotes.quote: Sometimes the greatest storms bring out the greatest beauty...Life can be a storm, but your hope is a rainbow and your friends and family are the gold.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: It is only in sorrow bad weather masters us; in joy we face the storm and defy it.
quotes.author: Amelia Barr

quotes.quote: Storms don't come to teach us painful lessons, rather they were meant to wash us clean.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: I don't just wish you rain, Beloved - I wish you the beauty of storms.
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: When you are in the eye of the storm, you are often not aware of the whiplash around you.
quotes.author: Hugh Bonneville

quotes.quote: No storm can last forever. It will never rain 365 days consecutively. Keep in mind that trouble comes to pass, not to stay. Don't worry! No storm, not even the one in your life, can last forever.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: You can find peace amidst the storms that threaten you.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: You can be in the storm, but don't let the storm get in you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty the more glory in surmounting it. Skillful pilots gain their reputation from storms and tempests.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The storm is an artist; the rainbow is its masterpiece.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: All day long, one storm then another and I take your hands like gentle flowers that blossom into awareness
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: When the storm has passed, put your energy into rebuilding your life, don't waste time looking back.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: Be patient. Like storms, the challenges will pass. Know too, that like the sun, your true soul self is constantly radiating.
quotes.author: John Morton

quotes.quote: Even in the midst of the storm the sun is still shining.
quotes.author: Dayna Lovely

quotes.quote: Dignity of human nature requires that we must face the storms of life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You are not controlling the storm, and you are not lost in it. You are the storm.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.
quotes.author: Morris West

quotes.quote: The heart of man is very much like the sea, it has its storms, it has its tides and in its depths it has its pearls too.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: I know well that the greater and more beautiful the work is, the more terrible will be the storms that rage against it.
quotes.author: Mary Faustina Kowalska

quotes.quote: Even paradise sees its share of storms, but in the end, it's still paradise.
quotes.author: Trevor Driggers

quotes.quote: A positive attitude, can turn a storm into a sprinkle.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.quote: You can look at my palm and see the storm coming. Read the book of my life and see I've overcome it.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're in the storm, it's harder and maybe when it's over, then you can look back on it.
quotes.author: Brad Gilbert

quotes.quote: If only a horrible storm can demolish the castle of the devil, then let the storm be victorious! It is not uncommon that heaven comes after hell!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Never tell a story because it is true: tell it because it is a good story.
quotes.author: John Pentland Mahaffy

quotes.quote: If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Stories can conquer fear, you know. They can make the heart bigger.
quotes.author: Ben Okri

quotes.quote: Whether this tale be true or false, none can tell, for none were there to witness it themselves.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.quote: A story should have a beginning, a middle and an end, but not necessarily in that order.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard

quotes.quote: The basic quality that any great story must have is a story that illustrates the human condition.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: News is the first draft of history.
quotes.author: Ben Bradlee

quotes.quote: Telling stories is not just a way of passing time. It is the way the wisdom gets passed along. The stuff that helps us to live a life worth remembering.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: When you have a problem, if you tell the truth, the problem becomes part of your past. If you lie, it becomes part of your future.
quotes.author: Rick Pitino

quotes.quote: When someone is mean to me, I just make them a victim in my next book.
quotes.author: Mary Higgins Clark

quotes.quote: What writer wants to make compromises with story? Story is the only reason you're in it.
quotes.author: David Simon

quotes.quote: When one side only of a story is heard and often repeated, the human mind becomes impressed with it insensibly.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The secret is to start a story near the ending.
quotes.author: Chris Offutt

quotes.quote: The one thing that you have that nobody else has is you. Your voice, your mind, your story, your vision. So write and draw and build and play and dance and live as only you can.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: There is no doubt fiction makes a better job of the truth.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: The story begins only when the book closes.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Life is too short for a long story.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Live your life as if you are writing your biography.
quotes.author: Keshia Chante

quotes.quote: There is no real ending. It's just the place where you stop the story.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: I wanted a perfect ending. Now I've learned, the hard way, that some poems don't rhyme, and some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle, and end.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Each of us has been designed for one of two immortal functions, as either a storyteller or as a cross-legged listener to tales of wonder, love, and daring. When we cease to tell or listen, then we no longer exist as a people.
quotes.author: Bryce Courtenay

quotes.quote: The most important things to remember about back story are that (a) everyone has a history and (b) most of it isn't very interesting.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The best time to write a story is yesterday. The next best time is today.
quotes.author: R. A. Lafferty

quotes.quote: Every great love starts with a great story.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: A story can sing the truth and not just tell it.
quotes.author: Robert Barron

quotes.quote: We cannot think without language, we cannot process experience without story.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: Stories make us more alive, more human, more courageous, more loving.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: A story is how we construct our experiences.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: In life, every ending is just the start of another story.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.quote: It's like everyone tells a story about themselves inside their own head. Always. All the time. That story makes you what you are. We build ourselves out of that story.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: The purpose of a storyteller is not to tell you how to think, but to give you questions to think upon.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Stories have to be told or they die, and when they die, we can't remember who we are or why we're here.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: Storytelling wasn't about making things up. It was more like inviting the stories to come through her, let themselves be told.
quotes.author: Jennifer McMahon

quotes.quote: Storytelling is among the oldest forms of communication. Storytelling is the commonality of all human beings, in all places, in all times.
quotes.author: Rives Collins

quotes.quote: Storytelling is ultimately the only way that we know besides song, dance, painting, and music to share with our tribesmen what it means to be human, express the indefinable feelings that unite humankind.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: Storytelling creates a healing serum. The thematic unguent of our personal story represents a fusion of the ineffable truths that each of us must discover within ourselves.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: Storytelling is not something we do. Storytelling is who we are.
quotes.author: Carmine Gallo

quotes.quote: Storytelling is the very soul of humankind made plain for all to experience.
quotes.author: John Appius Quill

quotes.quote: Storytelling is the distinctly human implement designed to synthesize our purposeful interaction with reality.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: Storytelling is the most powerful way to put ideas into the world.
quotes.author: Robert McKee

quotes.quote: The art of storytelling is reaching its end because the epic slice of truth, wisdom, is dying out.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: Storytelling reveals meaning without committing the error of defining it.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Storytelling is based on the word, being an honorable person of integrity is based on your word.
quotes.author: Jesse Williams

quotes.quote: Storytelling is the essential human activity. The harder the situation, the more essential it is.
quotes.author: Tim O'Brien

quotes.quote: Storytelling is ultimately a creative act of pattern recognition. Through characters, plot and setting, a writer creates places where previously invisible truths become visible. Or the storyteller posits a series of dots that the reader can connect.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Storytelling is about two things; it's about character and plot.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: The history of storytelling isn't one of simply entertaining the masses but of also advising, instructing, challenging the status quo.
quotes.author: Therese Fowler

quotes.quote: Storytelling is about patience, about making sense of the moments of pathos and beauty that you find, and about carrying these moments back into your own life.
quotes.author: Michael Paterniti

quotes.quote: Storytelling is fine as long as you can encourage people to act on the stories.
quotes.author: Karen Armstrong

quotes.quote: Storytelling comes naturally to humans, but since we live in an unnatural world, we sometimes need a little help doing what we'd naturally do.
quotes.author: Dan Harmon

quotes.quote: The telling and hearing of stories is a bonding ritual that breaks through illusions of separateness and activates a deep sense of our collective interdependence.
quotes.author: Annette Simmons

quotes.quote: Because there is a natural storytelling urge and ability in all human beings, even just a little nurturing of this impulse can bring about astonishing and delightful results.
quotes.author: Nancy Mellon

quotes.quote: Storytelling is a vaccine against war.
quotes.author: Annette Simmons

quotes.quote: In the tale, in the telling, we are all one blood. Take the tale in your teeth, then, and bite till the blood runs, hoping it's not poison; and we will all come to the end together, and even to the beginning: living, as we do, in the middle.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Storytelling is our oldest form of remembering the promises we have made to one another and to our various gods, and the promises given in return; it is a way of recording our human emotions and desires and taboos.
quotes.author: Jane Yolen

quotes.quote: Storytelling is by far the most underrated skill in business.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Good storytelling is humanity's great connector, and it just might keep the world from eating itself.
quotes.author: James Genn

quotes.quote: The storytelling gift is innate: one has it or one doesn't. But style is at least partly a learned thing: one refines it by looking and listening and reading and practice by work
quotes.author: Donna Tartt

quotes.quote: Storytelling has driven faith and religious practice, keeping them alive for millennia. Just as every hymn, icon, and stained-glass window in a church links to a story, brands have the potential to build holistic identities.
quotes.author: Martin Lindstrom

quotes.quote: Tis strange,-but true; for truth is always strange; Stranger than fiction: if it could be told, How much would novels gain by the exchange! How differently the world would men behold!
quotes.author: George Gordon Byron

quotes.quote: It's strange how time can make a place shrink, make its strangeness ordinary.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: The Beautiful is always strange.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Strange enlightenments are vouchsafed to those who seek the higher places.
quotes.author: Flann O'Brien

quotes.quote: All things are strange which are worth knowing.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: Among the strange things of this world, nothing seems more strange than that men pursuing happiness should knowingly quit the right and take a wrong road, and frequently do what their judgments neither approve nor prefer.
quotes.author: John Jay

quotes.quote: What a strange thing it is to recognize a sound like the shriek of a wounded animal, when you've never heard the shriek of a wounded animal.
quotes.author: John L'Heureux

quotes.quote: Life is stranger than biology textbooks.
quotes.author: David Rains Wallace

quotes.quote: Some are born weird, some achieve it, others have weirdness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: Dick Francis

quotes.quote: Looking in the mirror is very strange; we see only what we choose to see, good or bad.
quotes.author: Bonnie Langford

quotes.quote: Truth is stranger than fiction, but it is because Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities; Truth isn't.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Black and white creates a strange dreamscape that color never can.
quotes.author: Jack Antonoff

quotes.quote: What a strange illusion it is to suppose that beauty is goodness.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The strangest thing about strange things is that they're only strange when you hear about them or think about them later, but never when you're living them.
quotes.author: Lori Lansens

quotes.quote: It's a strange lesson to learn in life that your differences, the things that make you feel uncomfortable about yourself are what will help you to grow into who you are. Those are your gifts.
quotes.author: Cyndi Lauper

quotes.quote: At first people refuse to believe that a strange new thing can be done, then they begin to hope it can be done, then they see it can be done--then it is done and all the world wonders why it was not done centuries ago.
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: The road to wisdom is paved with excess. The mark of a true writer is their ability to mystify the familiar and familiarize the strange.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Recounting the strange is like telling one's dreams: one can communicate the events of a dream, but not the emotional content, the way that a dream can colour one's entire day.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Strange how love coexists with hate, how they render eachother mute, how the swilling of them together makes a new and softer, sympathetic thing.
quotes.author: Sonya Hartnett

quotes.quote: It's a strange thought that sometimes God trusts us more than we trust Him. God trusts you - can you trust Him?
quotes.author: Beth Moore

quotes.quote: If you haven't found something strange during the day, it hasn't been much of a day.
quotes.author: John Archibald Wheeler

quotes.quote: It is very strange that the years teach us patience - that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Strange how complicated we can make things just to avoid showing what we feel!
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: If we are alone, we become more alone. Life is strange
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The truth was stranger than the official fiction.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Aren't most wonderful things a little bit strange?
quotes.author: Katie Henry

quotes.quote: It's amazing how easy the truth is to accept...No matter how strange.
quotes.author: KC Randall

quotes.quote: Strange dreams are better than no dreams at all
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Solitude has its own very strange beauty to it.
quotes.author: Liv Tyler

quotes.quote: People fear death even more than pain. It's strange that they fear death. Life hurts a lot more than death. At the point of death, the pain is over.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: What a world this will be when human possibilities are freed, when we discover each other, when the stranger is no longer the potential criminal and the certain inferior!
quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: No single event can awaken within us a stranger totally unknown to us. To live is to be slowly born. It would be a bit too easy if we could go about borrowing ready-made souls.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: For, to be a stranger is naturally a very positive relation; it is a specific form of interaction.
quotes.author: Georg Simmel

quotes.quote: You don't have to sort of enhance reality. There is nothing stranger than truth.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.quote: Nothing is stranger to man than his own image.
quotes.author: Karel Capek

quotes.quote: Love is always a stranger in the house of avarice.
quotes.author: Andreas Capellanus

quotes.quote: Today, give a stranger one of your smiles. It might be the only sunshine he sees all day.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Don't think of organ donations as giving up part of yourself to keep a total stranger alive. It's really a total stranger giving up almost all of themselves to keep part of you alive.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Strangers are just friends waiting to happen.
quotes.author: Rod McKuen

quotes.quote: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: If I answer the stranger at my gate while my own cry within, — perhaps my own is at the gate, and the strangers are within.
quotes.author: Muriel Strode

quotes.quote: Advice is like a stranger--if welcome, he stays the night; if not welcome, he returns home that day.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Old age makes you a stranger in your own country.
quotes.author: Ken Alstad

quotes.quote: If a man be gracious and courteous to strangers, it shows he is a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Truth, as ever, avoids the stranger.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: A friend may be waiting behind a stranger's face.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Strangers are just family you have yet to come to know.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Life is infinitely stranger than anything which the mind of man could invent.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Not only is the Universe stranger than we think, it is stranger than we can think.
quotes.author: Werner Heisenberg

quotes.quote: We are bemused and crazed creatures, strangers to our true selves, to one another, and to the spiritual and material world -- mad, even, from an ideal standpoint we can glimpse but not adopt.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: Don't borrow money from a neighbor or a friend, but of a stranger where, paying for it you shall hear of it no more.
quotes.author: Lord Burleigh

quotes.quote: Life is a warfare and a stranger's sojourn, and after fame is oblivion.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Each time you say hello to a stranger, your heart acknowledges over and over again that we are all family.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: What a strange thing man is; and what a stranger thing woman.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Everybody is just a stranger, but that's the danger in going my own way.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Many the wonders but nothing walks stranger than man.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The more clever and cunning people are, the stranger the events will be.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: When one is a stranger to oneself, then one is estranged from others, too.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: It's no wonder that truth is stranger than fiction. Fiction has to make sense.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Every time a man unburdens his heart to a stranger he reaffirms the love that unites humanity.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: This strategy represents our policy for all time. Until it's changed.
quotes.author: Marlin Fitzwater

quotes.quote: Strategy is a pattern in a stream of decisions
quotes.author: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.quote: Strategy and culture should have breakfast together.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: The entrance strategy is actually more important than the exit strategy.
quotes.author: Edward Lampert

quotes.quote: Strategy and timing are the Himalayas of marketing. Everything else is the Catskills.
quotes.author: Al Ries

quotes.quote: Strategy is a steps which makes you spammer or genius.
quotes.author: Ram Gopal Singh

quotes.quote: Strategy will compensate the talent. The talent will never compensate the strategy.
quotes.author: Marco Pierre White

quotes.quote: No matter how brilliant your mind or strategy, if you're playing a solo game, you'll always lose out to a team.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: Strategy is choosing to perform activities differently, or to perform distinctly different activities than rivals.
quotes.author: Debbie Millman

quotes.quote: A strategy delineates a territory in which a company seeks to be unique.
quotes.author: Michael Porter

quotes.quote: Our strategy in going after this army is very simple. First we are going to cut it off, and then we are going to kill it.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Strategy is about stretching limited resources to fit ambitious aspirations.
quotes.author: C. K. Prahalad

quotes.quote: Strategy is a commodity, execution is an art.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: A bad strategy will fail no matter how good your information is and lame execution will stymie a good strategy. If you do enough things poorly, you will go out of business.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Strategy is worthless unless you can act on it.
quotes.author: Nathan Shedroff

quotes.quote: Strategy is about making choices, trade-offs; it's about deliberately choosing to be different.
quotes.author: Michael Porter

quotes.quote: Strategy is not the consequence of planning, but the opposite: its starting point.
quotes.author: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.quote: Strategy is all very well, but it pays to give thought from time to time to the results.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Strategy is buying a bottle of fine wine when you take a lady out for dinner. Tactics is getting her to drink it.
quotes.author: Frank Muir

quotes.quote: That strategy of racing for the top five and racing for the win is where everybody wants to be.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.quote: Strategy requires thought, tactics require observation
quotes.author: Max Euwe

quotes.quote: Strategy means making clear-cut choices about how to compete.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The transition strategies are more important than understanding what the outcome state will be.
quotes.author: Sean Parker

quotes.quote: Alter strategies and tactics, but never your principles.
quotes.author: John Kessel

quotes.quote: Strategy is important, but trust is the hidden variable. On paper you can have clarity around your objectives, but in a low-trust environment, your strategy won't be executed.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Strategy is just a winning value proposition, that is, a product or service that customers simply want more than the other options out there.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Strategy should evolve out of the mud of the marketplace, not in the antiseptic environment of an ivory tower.
quotes.author: Al Ries

quotes.quote: The essence of strategy is choosing what not to do.
quotes.author: Michael Porter

quotes.quote: Strategy is about shaping the future.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The water in the stream may have changed many times, but the reflection of the moon and the stars remains the same.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The stream is as good as at first; the little rubbish it collects in the turnings is easily moved away.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: A tremendous stream is flowing toward the ocean, carrying us all along with it; and though like straws and scraps of paper we may at times float aimlessly about, in the long run we are sure to join the ocean of life and bliss.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The water of the valley stream never shouts at the tainted world: Purify yourself! But naturally, as it is, shows how it is done.
quotes.author: Ryokan

quotes.quote: The movement of the stream is distinct from the river bed, although it must adopt its winding course.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: And though all streams flow from a single course to cleanse the blood from polluted hand, they hasten on their course in vain.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: A stream where alike the elephant may swim, and the lamb may wade.
quotes.author: Pope Gregory I

quotes.quote: The stream is always purer at its source.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: If it weren't for the rocks in its bed, the stream would have no song.
quotes.author: Carl Perkins

quotes.quote: The streams, rejoiced that winter's work is done, Talk of to-morrow's cowslips as they run.
quotes.author: Ebenezer Elliott

quotes.quote: The golden moments in the stream of life rush past us, and we see nothing but sand; the angels come to visit us, and we only know them when they are gone.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A river or stream is a cycle of energy from sun to plants to insects to fish. It is a continuum broken only by humans.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: All the streams carry the wisdom of the forest to the lake, and over there, silence replaces the noise!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Once you get into this great stream of history, you can't get out.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Just as a stream flows smoothly on as long as it encounters no obstruction, so the nature of man and animal is such that we never really notice or become conscious of what is agreeable to our will; if we are to notice something, our will has to have been thwarted, has to have experienced a shock of some kind.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: All streams flow to the sea because it is lower than they are. Humility gives it its power.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Those waters which leave the main stream either cannot reach the sea and disappear in inland or find a better place, a beautiful lake.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A little stream came tumbling from the height, And struggling into ocean as it might. Its bounding crystal frolick'd in the ray, And gush'd from cliff to crag with saltless spray.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: A stream is music and motion: smooth glides, fast, turbulent riffles and deep pools, each posing a special challenge.
quotes.author: Nelson Bryant

quotes.quote: Never forget that only dead fish swim with the stream.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: Streams may spring from one source and yet some may be clear and some be foul.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: We two have paddled in the stream, / from morning sun till dine; / But seas between us broad have roared / since days of long ago.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: A dead thing can go with the stream, but only a living thing can go against it.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: One must be a sea, to receive a polluted stream without becoming impure.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Don't swap horses in crossing a stream.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Any waste stream in our society can be turned into a revenue stream. It's turning the lemons in our society into lemonade.
quotes.author: Billy Parish

quotes.quote: In the confrontation between the stream and the rock, the stream always wins--not through strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Study how water flows in a valley stream, smoothly and freely between the rocks. Also learn from holy books and wise people. Everything - even mountains, rivers, plants and trees - should be your teacher.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Easy street is a blind alley.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: The street finds its own uses for things.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: The street is full of humiliations to the proud.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The magic of the street is the mingling of the errand and the epiphany.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: If you can smell the street by looking at the photo, it's a street photograph.
quotes.author: Bruce Gilden

quotes.quote: It sounded as if the streets were running, And then the streets stood still.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: On the streets, unrequited love and death go together almost as often as in Shakespeare.
quotes.author: Scott Turow

quotes.quote: This is Sesame Street. A place where people, birds, monsters all live in perfect harmony.
quotes.author: Phil Donahue

quotes.quote: A dead end can never be a one way street; you can always turn around and take another road.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: If a street has a spirit, no matter how narrow it is, we can breathe comfortably over there.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you’re going down the street and you’re going the wrong way, remember – God permits U-turns.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: What is a street? It is where the living weep, where the dead go off in silence to their peace.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: A street full of shadows will teach you what life is much better than the street full of lights!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The street is the river of life of the city, the place where we come together, the pathway to the center.
quotes.author: William H. Whyte

quotes.quote: Even the poorest street is rich with people on it and even the richest street is poor without people on it!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When the night comes, streets welcome the lonely souls because they alone can fully understand the lonely streets!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Sometimes a gloomy street is all a sad person needs! A magical relief may arise from the meeting of the two sad things!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The streets have two spirits: One is its own spirit and the other spirit is all the living creatures living in the street!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The street is no place to race.
quotes.author: Mick Doohan

quotes.quote: Silent streets have many things to say.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The streets of hell are paved with good intentions.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.quote: Respect is a one way street, it goes from bottom to top.
quotes.author: Kamran Niazi

quotes.quote: Standing on a street corner waiting for no one is power.
quotes.author: Gregory Corso

quotes.quote: In the street, the gaze of desire is furtive or menacing.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The roaring street is hung for miles With fierce electric fire.
quotes.author: William Vaughn Moody

quotes.quote: Every path, every street in the world is your walking meditation path.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Streets moderate the form and structure and comfort of urban communities.
quotes.author: Allan Jacobs

quotes.quote: The streets are full of admirable craftsmen, but so few practical dreamers.
quotes.author: Man Ray

quotes.quote: At any street corner the feeling of absurdity can strike any man in the face.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: When you work at street level you never know who's going to walk through your door.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: Easy street is a blind alley.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: The language of the street is always strong.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The streets were dark with something more than night.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: The street is full of humiliations to the proud.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In the street, the gaze of desire is furtive or menacing.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The roaring street is hung for miles With fierce electric fire.
quotes.author: William Vaughn Moody

quotes.quote: By the streets of 'by and by,' one arrives at the house of 'never'.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: The magic of the street is the mingling of the errand and the epiphany.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: The streets are full of admirable craftsmen, but so few practical dreamers.
quotes.author: Man Ray

quotes.quote: In the street, your mouth's a beak, big like a bird, and your future's bleak.
quotes.author: Kool Moe Dee

quotes.quote: In the streets the children screamed. The lovers cried, and the poets dreamed
quotes.author: Don McLean

quotes.quote: The streets of Vienna are paved with culture, the streets of other cities with asphalt.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: On the streets, unrequited love and death go together almost as often as in Shakespeare.
quotes.author: Scott Turow

quotes.quote: What is a street? It is where the living weep, where the dead go off in silence to their peace.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: A street that you have never visited is a book that you have never read! You never know what you are missing!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The street is the river of life of the city, the place where we come together, the pathway to the center.
quotes.author: William H. Whyte

quotes.quote: An empty street sucks your fullness; a full street fills your emptiness!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Go into the street, and give one man a lecture on morality, and another a shilling, and see which will respect you most.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The streets of London have their map, but our passions are uncharted. What are you going to meet if you turn this corner?
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: In violent streets and broken homes, the cry of anguished souls is not for more laws but for more conscience and character.
quotes.author: Cal Thomas

quotes.quote: Walking the streets of Charleston in the late afternoons of August was like walking through gauze or inhaling damaged silk.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: The street is a room by agreement.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.quote: The street has its own use for things.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: The streets of hell are paved with good intentions.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.quote: Every path, every street in the world is your walking meditation path.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: A street in Constantinople is a picture which one ought to see once-not oftener.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A dead end street is a good place to turn around.
quotes.author: Naomi Judd

quotes.quote: On the streets, hanging out with the fellows, there are things you learn that no book can teach you.
quotes.author: Ramon Rodriguez

quotes.quote: There are streets to enjoy, there are streets to wander aimlessly and also there are streets to contemplate!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A street full of shadows will teach you what life is much better than the street full of lights!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A single arrow is easily broken; a bundle of ten is not.
quotes.author: Japanese (on strength and weakness)

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: We gain strength, and courage, and confidence by each experience in which we really stop to look fear in the face... we must do that which we think we cannot.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: We may get knocked down on the outside, but the key to living in victory is to learn how to get up on the inside.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
quotes.author: Susan Gale

quotes.quote: You gotta stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Few men during their lifetime come anywhere near exhausting the resources dwelling within them. There are deep wells of strength that are never used.
quotes.author: Richard E. Byrd

quotes.quote: A chain is no stronger than its weakest link.
quotes.author: Sir Leslie Stephen

quotes.quote: A firm tree does not fear the storm.
quotes.author: Dayak (Indonesian) (on strength and weakness)

quotes.quote: Control your emotions or they will control you.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: He that cannot endure the bad will not live to see the good.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Little strokes fell great oaks.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Our handicaps exist only in our minds.
