quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone else would understand if you fell apart, that's true strength.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Fall down seven times, get up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: The most beautiful people I've known are those who have known trials, have known struggles, have known loss, and have found their way out of the depths.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Strong people don't put people down. They lift them up!
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world right in the eye.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.author: J.F. Clarke

quotes.quote: You were given this life, because you are strong enough to live it.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Life will break you. Nobody can protect you from that, and living alone won't either, for solitude will also break you with its yearning. You have to love. You have to feel. It is the reason you are here on earth. You are here to risk your heart. You are here to be swallowed up. And when it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. Tell yourself you tasted as many as you could.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: Don't let your mind bully your body into believing it must carry the burden of its worries.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Stress is not what happens to us. It's our response TO what happens. And RESPONSE is something we can choose.
quotes.author: Maureen Killoran

quotes.quote: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Stress is the trash of modern life—we all generate it but if you don't dispose of it properly, it will pile up and overtake your life.
quotes.author: Danzae Pace

quotes.quote: When I look back on all these worries, I remember the story of the old man who said on his deathbed that he had had a lot of trouble in his life, most of which had never happened.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When we commit to action, to actually doing something rather than feeling trapped by events, the stress in our life becomes manageable.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: Much of the stress that people feel doesn't come from having too much to do. It comes from not finishing what they've started.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Stress is like spice - in the right proportion it enhances the flavor of a dish. Too little produces a bland, dull meal; too much may choke you.
quotes.author: Donald Tubesing

quotes.quote: One of the symptoms of an approaching nervous breakdown is the belief that one's work is terribly important.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: When you find yourself stressed, ask yourself one question: Will this matter in 5 years from now? If yes, then do something about the situation. If no, then let it go.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: An hour of anxiety cannot change my circumstances, but a minute of prayer can alter everything.
quotes.author: Al Byrant

quotes.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself but to your own estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Stress should be a powerful driving force, not an obstacle.
quotes.author: Bill Phillips

quotes.quote: Stress is nothing more than a socially acceptable form of mental illness.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Everyday brings a choice: to practice stress or to practice peace.
quotes.author: Joan Borysenko

quotes.quote: Being in control of your life and having realistic expectations about your day-to-day challenges are the keys to stress management, which is perhaps the most important ingredient to living a happy, healthy and rewarding life.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.quote: Stress is an ignorant state. It believes that everything is an emergency.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: Resistance creates suffering. Stress happens when your mind resists what is. The only problem in your life is your mind's resistance to life as it unfolds.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Say NO to the demands of the world. Say YES to the longings of your own heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Stress is an admission of weakness, a cry of defeat to the world.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: Pressure and stress is the common cold of the psyche.
quotes.author: Andrew Denton

quotes.quote: No good comes from hurrying.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Some of the secret joys of living are not found by rushing from point A to point B, but by inventing some imaginary letters along the way.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: It isn't the mountain ahead that wears you out; it's the grain of sand in your shoe.
quotes.author: Robert W. Service

quotes.quote: When you feel the need to hurry, remember that everything in life is a CHOICE.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: They made fun of her Stretch marks on her belly She smiled, 'It's what my baby drew And not everybody get a chance'.
quotes.author: Kashyapi

quotes.quote: A woman must look perfect, Stretch marks are yikes! But they don't know, You're just a tigress who earned her golden stripes.
quotes.author: Tanvi Verma

quotes.quote: The beauty of those stretch marks depict how Selflessly she nurtured an unseen creation within herself.
quotes.author: Anjali

quotes.quote: Her son suggested 'Mom you should get a tattoo of my name'. She replied I have already done that after your birth. 'My Stretch Marks'.
quotes.author: Debasmita

quotes.quote: My stretch marks are my baby's first painting.
quotes.author: Nesha K

quotes.quote: Having stretch marks in pregnancy is not just a sign of givng birth to a baby. It's a reflection of palm lines of the baby. Which is being created by his mother for his bright future from today.
quotes.author: Bhagirath Maurya

quotes.quote: Women shouldn't be forced for fertility and pleasures. Embracing stretch marks is not her responsibility. It's just her choice.
quotes.author: Rachi

quotes.quote: Only a mother knows how beautiful her baby's first drawing was.
quotes.author: Sri Harshitha

quotes.quote: Stretch marks are just marks that disturb your confidence whenever you wear anything. Confidence removes every scar and every mark.
quotes.author: Ushmil Rimjha

quotes.quote: Mistakes are like stretch marks, don't hate them, they are the sign that you're growing.
quotes.author: Kabira

quotes.quote: Stretch marks are the badge of a real woman.
quotes.author: Tim Kazurinsky

quotes.quote: These marks show that, that you are alive, that you survive.
quotes.author: Willy Russel

quotes.quote: I expect men get very excited about sharing the joy of nausea, heartburn, and stretch marks.
quotes.author: Tracy Tormé

quotes.quote: Looks like this kid thing is really working out for you: all of the shopping, none of the stretch marks.
quotes.author: David Shore

quotes.quote: I spent my whole childhood trying to get a single thank you from my mom, and all I got was sarcasm. 'Thanks for the stretch marks, thanks for sitting in front of the TV with that big head. Thanks for scaring off all my dates by asking 'are you my new daddy?'.
quotes.author: Bruce Helford

quotes.quote: Daisy Dukes with stretch marks, her hair back in a bun / Cooking pork and beans, some stale franks in the sun.
quotes.author: Matlin Thornton

quotes.quote: Even if you got stretch marks and even two children / I can't blame you girl (no no no no no) / Love you for who you are, I want you for who you are
quotes.author: Dequantes Devontay Lamar

quotes.quote: I call them stretch marks designer and I do appreciate some cellulite
quotes.author: Ricky Banton

quotes.quote: Stretch marks on your hips is just bungie cords bringing you back when you dip.
quotes.author: Aliaune Thiam

quotes.quote: I love the stretch marks / On your thighs / I love the wrinkles / Around your eyes / I take you out darling / We dance all night
quotes.author: Ayse Yolander Hassan

quotes.quote: That ain't stretch marks, that's tiger stripes.
quotes.author: Jonathan Kweku Awotwe-Mensah

quotes.quote: Can you love my imperfections? / Stretch marks any part, any section
quotes.author: Ras Haile Emmanuel Yakine Alexander

quotes.quote: Stretch Marks helps mothers by inspiring, entertaining, and laying out how to create more time, more peace, and more joy in their lives.
quotes.author: Amber Trueblood

quotes.quote: Stretch marks aren't only physical. We have psychological and emotional stretch marks too.
quotes.author: Amber Trueblood

quotes.quote: Men are raised to worry about their legacies, not their upper arm and thigh fat, stretch marks
quotes.author: Jessica Knoll

quotes.quote: To me, the mountains are Mother's stretch marks, the rivers are both her tears and nourishment.
quotes.author: T. Jackson King

quotes.quote: Women often teased me and said I was lucky to not have stretch marks. I usually looked unwaveringly in their eyes and said, 'Maybe not on my stomach, but most certainly on my heart'.
quotes.author: Niki Breeser Tschirgi

quotes.quote: As women, we really need to start taking back ownership over our bodies and stop allowing others to dictate what we should look like.
quotes.author: Tova Leigh

quotes.quote: Women's bodies go through massive changes and that's part of life and nature.
quotes.author: Tova Leigh

quotes.quote: We live in a world where we are told to hide what are considered our flaws when actually whose are imperfections-scars, stretch marks and other flappy bits.
quotes.author: Tova Leigh

quotes.quote: Stretching your body and mind is essential to avoid rigidity.
quotes.author: Haresh Sippy

quotes.quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: The passion for stretching yourself and sticking to it, even (or especially) when it's not going well, is the hallmark of the growth mindset.
quotes.author: Carol S. Dweck

quotes.quote: By stretching yourself beyond your perceived level of confidence you accelerate your development of competence.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: Stretching his hand up to reach the stars, too often man forgets the flowers at his feet.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: It is not about proving anything to the world. It is all about proving your capabilities to yourself and stretching your own boundaries.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: When you stretch your mind, you stretch the world around you.
quotes.author: Gustavo Razzetti

quotes.quote: If there isn't a struggle, there's no stretch, and therefore no growth. Easy doesn’t change you and comfort won’t challenge you. Coasting isn't a strategy.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: You have to stretch your soul to find your potential strength.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Dare to stretch hard and make it a point to do the hard thing others are afraid to try.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Anyone that does not wish or desire to stretch himself will get nowhere in this life. That is just the way life is.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The human spirit is like an elastic band. The more you stretch, the greater your capacity.
quotes.author: Bidemi Mark-Mordi

quotes.quote: Practice makes comfort. Expand your experiences regularly so every stretch won’t feel like your first.
quotes.author: Gina Greenlee

quotes.quote: It's when you stretch the truth that you end up with lies.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: Life demands for us to stretch ourselves.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Stretch your mind and you will reach beyond your current reality.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: It is by stretching our limits that we move beyond boundaries. Keep improving!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Give a try; give a shot. Sometimes, you must not only expect the way to be too clear; strike when you can!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If you want to strike, strike now. No matter how skillfully a footballer strikes beyond the 90 minutes' regulated time, he makes no influence. Strike now before it becomes too late!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Strike against war, for without you no battles can be fought!
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You must be strong enough to strike and strike and strike again without tiring. The first lesson is to make yourself that strong.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: Never strike out of anger if at all possible, this will give your enemy the advantage and strengthen his resolve and psyche
quotes.author: Soke behzad Ahmadi

quotes.quote: Don't say you won't strike now. 'Not now' is what brings forth "never done". Strike it early, strike it now. But remember to strike it hard! Go and make the strike!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Strike hard and fast and do not separate.
quotes.author: Heinz Guderian

quotes.quote: Not only strike while the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

quotes.quote: You have to know when to strike and when to retreat.
quotes.author: John Oates

quotes.quote: Let nature take its course and your tools will strike at the right moment.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Strike fast, strike hard, strike often.
quotes.author: William Halsey

quotes.quote: Strike while the iron is hot.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: Strike, if you will, but listen.
quotes.author: Themistocles

quotes.quote: With luck, you have other things to do than wait for lightning to strike.
quotes.author: Paul Lauterbur

quotes.quote: When something horrible is done to you, the natural impulse is to strike back.
quotes.author: Laurence Yep

quotes.quote: That which is striking and beautiful is not always good, but that which is good is always beautiful.
quotes.author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quotes.quote: It is striking to see the magnitude of impact mentorship and tutoring can have on student performance and young lives.
quotes.author: Lynn Schusterman

quotes.quote: Always mystify, mislead, and surprise the enemy, if possible; and when you strike and overcome him, never let up in the pursuit...
quotes.author: Stonewall Jackson

quotes.quote: Someone 'pulls strings' to obtain employment for another within the same department, and the formerly unemployed person succeeds in getting his/her benefactor fired in order to take the benefactor's place.
quotes.author: Jamaican Sayings

quotes.quote: Friends are like fiddle-strings, they must not be screwed too tight.
quotes.author: John Ray's proverb

quotes.quote: Hands...which projected like strings upon the finger-board of a violin, and armed with claws like those on the terminations of bats' wings.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: Felt like marionette, as though something outside her were jerking the strings that forced her to scream and strike.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: We're all drawn by wires by puppets, and the strongest wire pulls us in the direction in which we are meant to go.
quotes.author: Ellen Glasgow

quotes.quote: Stopped laughing as suddenly as if a string had been broken.
quotes.author: Loren D. Estleman

quotes.quote: Explicitness makes matters clear; it takes 300 strings to string 600; unless one explains it, no one understands.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverbs

quotes.quote: One dog does not string decorative beads all around one's waist.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: A person who is like the divining string: unless you throw him down, he will not talk sense.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: You reveler do things in moderation; if the string of life is cut, there is no retrying it.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: But bacon's not the only thing,/ That's cured by hanging from a string.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: There are strings in the human heart that had better not be vibrated.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Or bid the soul of Orpheus sing / Such notes are warbled to the string / Drew iron tears down Pluto's cheek.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Evolution is nothing but a long string of false steps; and it may happened that a severed head will sing.
quotes.author: Miroslav Holub

quotes.quote: One Christmas, things were so bad in our house that I asked Santa for a yo-yo and all I got was a piece of string. My father told me it was a yo.
quotes.author: Brendan O'Carroll

quotes.quote: It could be said of me that in this book I have only made up a bunch of other men's flowers, providing of my own only the string that ties them together.
quotes.author: Montaigne

quotes.quote: The fibers of all things have their tension and are strained like the strings of an instrument.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The world is all gates, all opportunities, strings of tension waiting to be struck.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It's true; once you are a father, there's no turning back. Your heart strings as well as your purse strings are never again the same.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: There is geometry in the humming of the strings, there is music in the spacing of the spheres.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Sitting makes us think of standing / Our current stance keeps on demanding / We wish to fly without the wings / Puppets move before pulling the strings.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: We reflect God's character the most when we give freely of ourselves with no strings attached, no secret motives, no hidden agenda.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: As I stare at it,I can feel little invisible strings,silently tugging me toward it. I have to touch it. I have to wear it. It's the most beautiful thing I've ever seen.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: If our lives are made up of a string of a thousand moments, at some of those moments we look a lot more spiritually evolved than at others.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is everything. It must be taut and vibrating like a guitar string.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: When you cut the strings holding us, you must have been wounded.
quotes.author: Arvyn Cerézo

quotes.quote: Recreate life's strings to weave your own path.
quotes.author: Diana Matoso

quotes.quote: When you cut the strings holding us. You must have been wounded.
quotes.author: Arvyn Cerézo

quotes.quote: If a string has one end, it has another.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Two touch the string, The harp is dumb.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Strive for that greatness of spirit that measures life not by its disappointments but by its possibilities.
quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: The important thing is to strive towards a goal which is not immediately visible. That goal is not the concern of the mind, but of the spirit.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Strive to be first: first to nod, first to smile, first to compliment, and first to forgive.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In this life we get only those things for which we hunt, for which we strive, and for which we are willing to sacrifice.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: Strive for perfection. Nobody's going to be perfect on this earth. But strive for perfection.
quotes.author: Judith Jamison

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We strive for error-free medicine in a world that is sometimes all too human.
quotes.author: Michael Burgess

quotes.quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.
quotes.author: Usher

quotes.quote: Don't waste your time striving for perfection; instead, strive for excellence - doing your best.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.quote: Strive with all your might to bring your interior activity into accord with God, and you will overcome exterior passions.
quotes.author: Arsenius the Great

quotes.quote: All men should strive to learn before they die, what they are running from, and to, and why.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Strive to be authentic, not perfect.
quotes.author: Amy Chan

quotes.quote: If you aim at nothing, you will hit it every time.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.quote: Only the insecure strive for security.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: To strive with difficulties, and to conquer them, is the highest human felicity.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: In this world, one thing you should definitely strive for is originality. Just be who you are, and be your own person. That's what will make you stand out.
quotes.author: Nolan Gould

quotes.quote: Strive to make something of yourself, then strive to make the most of yourself.
quotes.author: Alexander Crummell

quotes.quote: Striving for excellence motivates you; striving for perfection is demoralizing.
quotes.author: Harriet B. Braiker

quotes.quote: Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
quotes.author: Victoria Principal

quotes.quote: Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.quote: The problem with striving for the best, is that there will be always better than the best.
quotes.author: Rafaa Khiari

quotes.quote: Don't strive to be perfect. Strive for excellence.
quotes.author: Victoria Principal

quotes.quote: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
quotes.author: Ronald E. Osborn

quotes.quote: Strive to be authentic all the time. That's sort of my philosophy on life, which applies to acting.
quotes.author: Paul Guilfoyle

quotes.quote: The young do not know enough to be prudent, and therefore they attempt the impossible â€” and achieve it, generation after generation.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Excitement is the more practical synonym for happiness, and it is precisely what you should strive to chase. It is the cure-all.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: A man should not strive to eliminate his complexes but to get into accord with them: they are legitimately what directs his conduct in the world.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: A weak mind sinks under prosperity as well as under adversity. A strong and deep one has two highest tides, â€” when the moon is at the full, and when there is no moon.
quotes.author: Augustus Hare

quotes.quote: If he were a man of strong mind, it only gave him fits; but a person of mere average intellect it usually sent mad.
quotes.author: Jerome K Jerome

quotes.quote: We must have strong minds, ready to accept facts as they are.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Mind over matter. Weak minded people are easily influenced. Strong minded people you can't break their will.
quotes.author: Lee Boyd Malvo

quotes.quote: Have a strong mind and a soft heart.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Strong minds suffer without complaining; weak minds complain without suffering.
quotes.author: Lettie Cowman

quotes.quote: Insubordination may only be the evidence of a strong mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: If you have a strong mind and plant in it a firm resolve, you can change your destiny.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: True hope is based on energy of character. A strong mind always hopes!
quotes.author: Karl Ludwig von Knebel

quotes.quote: The truly strong and sound mind is the mind that can embrace equally great things and small. I would have a man great in great things, and elegant in little things.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Ridicule is a weak weapon when pointed at a strong mind; but common people are cowards and dread an empty laugh.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: A strong body is a good asset. A strong mind is a very good asset.
quotes.author: Rickson Gracie

quotes.quote: We observe with confidence that the truly strong mind, view it as intellect or morality, or under any other aspect, is nowise the mind acquainted with its strength; that here the sign of health is unconsciousness.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: In the big leagues everyone has ability. It always comes down to mind games. Who ever is more mentally strong-wins.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Keep expecting and believing that your due season is coming. Declare that the good you have harvested in your life will manifest.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Be strong minded, and always believe that the impossible is possible.
quotes.author: Selena

quotes.quote: A strong mind always hopes, and has always cause to hope.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: A mind is as strong as its weakest think.
quotes.author: Thomas Lansing Masson

quotes.quote: Every time you lose, you think that life's unfair. You think of the bad breaks. But when you're winning and playing well, you still get those bad breaks, only you overcome them. It just depends on how strong your mind is.
quotes.author: Greg Norman

quotes.quote: A weak mind is ambitious of envy, a strong one of respect.
quotes.author: Edward Wigglesworth

quotes.quote: A strong mind is one of the key components that separates the great from the good.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Strong minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, weak minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: It is cheerful mind that is persevering. It is the strong mind that hews its way through a thousand difficulties.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: It requires a strong mind to bear up against several languages. Some persons have learnt so many, that they have ceased to think in any one.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: Weak minds sink under prosperity as well as adversity; but strong and deep ones have two high tides.
quotes.author: David Hare

quotes.quote: It's when the discomfort strikes that they realize a strong mind is the most powerful weapon of all.
quotes.author: Chrissie Wellington

quotes.quote: Intelligence entails a strong mind, but genius entails a heart of a lion in tune with a strong mind.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: With the spread of conformity and image-driven superficiality, the allure of an individuated woman in full possession of herself and her powers will prove irresistible. We were born for plenitude and inner fulfillment.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Prioleau

quotes.quote: No woman who had been intimate with a god was easily disturbed.
quotes.author: Michael Cadnum

quotes.quote: A strong woman builds her own world. She is one who is wise enough to know that it will attract the man she will gladly share it with.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: The king may rule the kingdom, but it's the queen who moves the board.
quotes.author: D.M. Timney

quotes.quote: Strong women need not declare they can carry all the burdens in life. They just quietly do it and survive with a smile.
quotes.author: Princess Maleiha Bajunaid Candao

quotes.quote: Women have got to make the world safe for men since men have made it so darned unsafe for women.
quotes.author: Nancy Astor the Viscountess Astor

quotes.quote: She does not flinch from the caress, because she feels very strong. She walks everywhere she goes but is never tired.
quotes.author: Anna Keesey

quotes.quote: A really strong woman accepts the war she went through and is ennobled by her scars.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.quote: A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understanding the problems of running a country.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A strong woman understands that the gifts such as logic, decisiveness, and strength are just as feminine as intuition and emotional connection. She values and uses all of her gifts.
quotes.author: Nancy Rathburn

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: The best protection any woman can have is courage.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: If you don't like being a doormat then get off the floor.
quotes.author: Al Anon

quotes.quote: Everyone has inside of her a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: I do not wish women to have power over men; but over themselves.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: No pressure, no diamonds.
quotes.author: Mary Case

quotes.quote: I think beauty comes from within. If you're happy and look at life in the best way you can, even when there are problems, it can make you beautiful on the outside.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.quote: Somebody who's really comfortable with who she is and doesn't care what other people think. I like women who are really strong and were brought up to be comfortable with themselves and respect themselves.
quotes.author: Brian Austin Green

quotes.quote: Women's strong qualities have become despised because of their weakness. The obvious remedy is to create a feminine character with all the strength of Superman plus all the allure of a good and beautiful woman.
quotes.author: William Moulton Marston

quotes.quote: Whatever women do they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: Man endures pain as an undeserved punishment; woman accepts it as a natural heritage.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Women are never stronger than when they arm themselves with their weakness.
quotes.author: Marie de Vichy-Chamrond

quotes.quote: The test for whether or not you can hold a job should not be the arrangement of your chromosomes.
quotes.author: Bella Abzug

quotes.quote: To tell a woman everything she may not do is to tell her what she can do.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Woman must not accept; she must challenge.She must not be awed by that which has been built up around her; she must reverence that woman in her which struggles for expression.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.quote: A woman with a voice is by definition a strong woman. But the search to find that voice can be remarkably difficult.
quotes.author: Melinda Gates

quotes.quote: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow. Don't give up.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Strength comes from struggle. When you learn to see your struggles as opportunities to become stronger, better, wiser, then your thinking shifts from 'I can't do this' to 'I must do this.'
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: Sometimes, struggles are exactly what we need in our life. If we were to go through our life without any obstacles, we would be crippled. We would not be as strong as what we could have been. Give every opportunity a chance, leave no room for regrets.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph. Self-realization demands very great struggle.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: The struggle of life is one of our greatest blessings. It makes us patient, sensitive, and Godlike.It teaches us that although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Don't compare your struggles to anyone else's. Don't get discouraged by the success of others. Make your own path and never give up.
quotes.author: MJ Korvan

quotes.quote: We grow because we struggle, we learn and overcome.
quotes.author: R. C. Allen

quotes.quote: If there is no Struggle, there is no progress.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: The struggle alone pleases us, not the victory.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Whatever the struggle, continue the climb. It may be only one step to the summit.
quotes.author: Diane Westlake

quotes.quote: Every struggle in your life has shaped you into the person you are today. Be thankful for the hard times, they can only make you stronger.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The struggle of my life created empathy - I could relate to pain, being abandoned, having people not love me.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The important thing in life is not the triumph but the struggle.
quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

quotes.quote: Struggle is strengthening. Battling with evil gives us the power to battle evil even more.
quotes.author: Ossie Davis

quotes.quote: I'm thankful for my struggle because without it I wouldn't have stumbled across my strength.
quotes.author: Alex Elle

quotes.quote: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.quote: Once all struggle is grasped, miracles are possible.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Believe me, the reward is not so great without the struggle.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: Struggle is the food from which change is made, and the best time to make the most of a struggle is when it's right in front of your face.
quotes.author: Danny Dreyer

quotes.quote: I disagree. I look at struggle as an opportunity to grow. True struggle happens when you can sense what is not working for you and you're willing to take the appropriate action to correct the situation. Those who accomplish change are willing to engage the struggle.
quotes.author: Danny Dreyer

quotes.quote: We all struggle with something, and need help. Whatever it is that you can't conquer on your own, I encourage you to give it to the Lord; He can fix anything! Your struggle is no more because VICTORY has taken it's place!! Have a VICTORIOUS day!
quotes.author: Anita R. Sneed-Carter

quotes.quote: The more you've struggled to heal and love yourself, the more inspiring your story will be to others when you come out the other side full of triumph, awareness, and honour. Don't give up. Your struggle today is the source of your wisdom tomorrow.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: In everyday struggle maintain your cool and emotion. To heal a wound you need to stop touching it. Keeping yourself calm in times of stress will not only have immediate smoothing effects; it can also, over time, help you lead a healthier, happier life.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: Unfortunately this earth is not. a fairy-land, but a struggle for life, perfectly natural and therefore extremely harsh.
quotes.author: Martin Bormann

quotes.quote: The way I see things, the way I see life, I see it as a struggle. And there's a great deal of reward I have gained coming to that understanding -- that existence is a struggle.
quotes.author: Harvey Keitel

quotes.quote: To have striven, to have made the effort, to have been true to certain ideals - this alone is worth the struggle.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: The life of man is a struggle on earth. But without a cross, without a struggle, we get nowhere. The victory will be ours if we continue our efforts courageously, even when at times they appear futile.
quotes.author: Boniface Wimmer

quotes.quote: Sometimes, struggles are exactly what we need in our life. If we were to go through our life without any obstacles, we would be crippled. We would not be as strong as what we could have been. Give every opportunity a chance, leave no room for regrets.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No matter what struggles I come across, I will keep going, because I have the will and strength to overcome it all. All my greatest accomplishments, I once thought I would never achieve, but I keep on succeeding every challenge that faces me. No matter what is beyond my control, nothing will ever make me less than a woman. I am and will always be a powerful woman.
quotes.author: Victoria Enriquez

quotes.quote: Never lose hope, be persistent and stubborn and never give up. There are many instances in history where apparent losers suddenly turn out to be winners unexpectedly, so you should never conclude all hope is lost.
quotes.author: Theodore Kaczynski

quotes.quote: Being stubborn has helped, being selfish is not a bad thing.
quotes.author: Herbie Mann

quotes.quote: A man will do more for his stubbornness than for his religion or his country.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: Obstinacy is a fault of temperament. Stubbornness and intolerance of contradiction result from a special kind of egotism, which elevates above everything else the pleasure of its autonomous intellect, to which others must bow.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: Be stubborn and persist, and trust yourself on what you love. You have to trust what you love.
quotes.author: Carolee Schneemann

quotes.quote: Smallness of mind is the cause of stubbornness, and we do not credit readily what is beyond our view.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Those who never retract their opinions love themselves more than they love truth.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: There's none so blind as those who will not listen.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Stubbornness is the strength of the weak.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: We must have the stubbornness to accept our gladness in the ruthless furnace of this world.
quotes.author: Jack Gilbert

quotes.quote: Being stubborn can be a good thing. Being stubborn can be a bad thing. It just depends on how you use it.
quotes.author: Willie Aames

quotes.quote: Stubbornness and ignorance and determination are a very fine line from each other. I'm a very stubborn person, but not so stubborn that I can't learn new things and meet new people, but I have a one-track mind.
quotes.author: Joe Nichols

quotes.quote: Ironically, some of our most stubborn habits and disorders are products of our plasticity.
quotes.author: Norman Doidge

quotes.quote: Obstinacy is ever most positive when it is most in the wrong.
quotes.author: Suzanne Curchod Necker

quotes.quote: If men were stubborn just in proportion as they were right, stubbornness would take her seat among the virtues; but men are generally stubborn just in proportion as they are ignorant and wrong.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Stubbornly persist, and you will find that the limits of your stubbornness go well beyond the stubbornness of your limits.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: You can hate a person with your whole body, but love is a stubborn thing, it clings on in your heart.
quotes.author: Anna Maxted

quotes.quote: Stubbornness is a positive quality of presidential leadership - if you're right about what you're stubborn about.
quotes.author: Douglas Brinkley

quotes.quote: A stubborn mind conduces as little to wisdom or even to knowledge, as a stubborn temper to happiness.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Pettiness of mind, ignorance and presumption are the cause of stubbornness, because stubborn people only want to believe what they themselves can imagine, and they can imagine very few things.
quotes.author: Madeleine de Souvre

quotes.quote: You need a stubborn belief in an idea in order to see it realised.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.quote: It takes a special kind of stubbornness to succeed as an entrepreneur.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: The stubbornness of a weak man should never be underestimated. The weak tend to be very stubborn when they've decided on something.
quotes.author: Frederick Forsyth

quotes.quote: Stubborn people get themselves in a lot of trouble, but they also get things done.
quotes.author: Anna Paquin

quotes.quote: Stubbornness is a virtue if you are right.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: The only person you are fighting is yourself and your stubbornness to engage in new circumstances.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote: Obstinacy is the sister of constancy, at least in vigor and stability.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: There. But there is a fine line between determination and stubbornness.
quotes.author: Ed Adamson

quotes.quote: I was going to say we have an enormous amount of willpower, but stubborn works too.
quotes.author: Adam Beechen

quotes.quote: Most people would leave. Not us. We're Vikings. We... have stubbornness issues.
quotes.author: William Davies

quotes.quote: We are stuck-up about love and we are stuck-up in the idea of being in-love.
quotes.author: Ann Marie Aguilar

quotes.quote: When you are stuck in the same routine for months, you stop seeing new opportunities.
quotes.author: Dhaval Gajera

quotes.quote: When we are stuck in a rut we are being invited to grow and expand.
quotes.author: Dana Arcuri

quotes.quote: We're all stuck between the realm of our desires, their possibilities and the realities of life.
quotes.author: Huseyn Raza

quotes.quote: You can't get stuck on what should have happened. That doesn't help you.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Don't be stuck in a life that's not yours just because of a bad habit
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: People are really stuck on their ideas about themselves.
quotes.author: Joshuah Bearman

quotes.quote: We are stuck with not knowing what our actions will actually lead to.
quotes.author: Andre Alexis

quotes.quote: You must have stuck a finger up your arse at least once.
quotes.author: Noel Fielding

quotes.quote: The way to get unstuck is to start down the wrong path, right now.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Don't get stuck on a business plan just because it was your business plan.
quotes.author: Ryan Kavanaugh

quotes.quote: When we feel stuck, going nowhere-even starting to slip backward-we may actually be backing up to get a running start.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Don't get so stuck in your ways that you can't change.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Being stuck is a position few of us like. We want something new but cannot let go of the old - old ideas, beliefs, habits, even thoughts. We are out of contact with our own genius. Sometimes we know we are stuck; sometimes we don't. In both cases we have to DO something.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: Don't get stuck in old ideas. Keep recognizing that reality is changing and that your ideas have to change.
quotes.author: Grace Lee Boggs

quotes.quote: You have to get to the next level, or you're gonna get stuck where you are for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Corey Taylor

quotes.quote: Don't get stuck on the level of words. A word is no more than a means to an end. It's an abstraction. Not unlike a signpost, it points beyond itself
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: If you get stuck, draw with a different pen. Change your tools; it may free your thinking.
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: Being stuck in airports, you always end up buying perfume and sunglasses.
quotes.author: Lexa Doig

quotes.quote: A good leader doesn't get stuck behind a desk.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Whatever you are pushing against, you are stuck to.
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: If you stand still long enough, you'll get stuck.
quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

quotes.quote: Every choice in life either moves you forward or keeps you stuck.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When you feel stuck in reverse, take a breath and let go.
quotes.author: Judith Orloff

quotes.quote: It's hard to be stuck with people that you love, when nobody trusts.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: You are not stuck where you are unless you decide to be.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: We are stuck with technology when what we really want is just stuff that works.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: If you're going to be stuck somewhere forever, you might as well be around good people!
quotes.author: Valerie June

quotes.quote: If you find yourself stuck in the middle there is only one way to go, forward.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: When you're stuck on something creatively, you can't solve a problem, you go to a coffee shop.
quotes.author: Eric Weiner

quotes.quote: The only jewel which will not decay is knowledge.
quotes.author: John Alfred Langford

quotes.quote: Adversity is the diamond dust Heaven polishes its jewels with.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Sweet are the uses of adversity which, like the toad, ugly and venomous, wears yet a precious jewel in his head.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The most precious jewels are not made of stone, but of flesh.
quotes.author: Robert Ludlum

quotes.quote: Jewel of life, guiding light, heralding a joyous new dawn.
quotes.author: Jon Anderson

quotes.quote: What a wonderful phenomenon it is, carefully considered, when the human eye, that jewel of organic structures, concentrates its moist brilliance on another human creature!
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Their stud got hot and that hurt us.
quotes.author: Alex Estrada

quotes.quote: Sense shines with a double luster when it is set in humility. An able yet humble man is a jewel worth a kingdom.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Everlasting life is a jewel of too great a value to be purchased by the wealth of this world.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Consistency is a jewel, but too much jewelry is vulgar.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There is no jewel in the world so valuable as a chaste and virtuous woman.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Jewels five-words-long, That on the stretch'd forefinger of all Time Sparkle forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The brightest ornaments in the crown of the blessed in heaven are the sufferings which they have borne patiently on earth.
quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

quotes.quote: The diamond of character is revealed by the concussion of misfortune, as the splendor of the precious jewel of the mine is developed by the blows of the lapidary.
quotes.author: Francis Alexander Durivage

quotes.quote: Truth is a jewel which should not be painted over; but it may be set to advantage and shown in a good light.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: These gems have life in them: their colors speak, say what words fail of.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: If a guy's a stud, then he's a stud when he comes home, provided he has enough time to get himself back in shape.
quotes.author: Lance Reynolds

quotes.quote: Ornament is but the guiled shore to a most dangerous sea.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Its always nice to have a stud muffin at the table.
quotes.author: Janet Evanovich

quotes.quote: Jewelry maybe is more expensive than clothes, but clothes are more important than jewelry.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: A thoroughly honest man is a rare jewel in the shallow stream of meaningless pebbles.
quotes.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: The most expensive jewels are not found around our necks, but in our hearts.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Precious jewel, you glow, you shine, reflecting all the good things in the world. Just look at yourself.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The ornaments of our homes are the friends that visit it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Rings and jewels are not gifts, but apologies for gifts. The only true gift is a portion of thyself
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Your mind is a key, and whatever it unlocks, the greatest treasure of all.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Women should not be allowed on juries where the accused is a stud.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: The stud shaft was moving up and down and pumping the plaque into the tongue.
quotes.author: Ellis Neiburger

quotes.quote: Jewels! Today each twig is important, each ring, each infection, each form is all that the gods must have meant.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: That college is seen as a training ground for a job is perceived by professors as anathema to their mission of broadly educating students. Why are so many students failing to find good jobs after college?
quotes.author: Jeffrey J. Salingo

quotes.quote: As educators, we share one common goal— to see the growth and progress of our students. But one thing is for sure— there is no greater feeling than to see a student 'get it.'
quotes.author: Erin Gruwell

quotes.quote: Not all students pick up the same lessons at the same speed, learn through the same modalities, or grasp ideas by the same means and methods.
quotes.author: Erin Gruwell

quotes.quote: Every student can learn, just not on the same day, or the same way.
quotes.author: George Evans

quotes.quote: You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives.
quotes.author: Clay P. Bedford

quotes.quote: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: I have never in my life learned anything from any man who agreed with me.
quotes.author: Dudley Field Malone

quotes.quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning today is young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Don't try to fix the students, fix ourselves first. The good teacher makes the poor student good and the good student superior. When our students fail, we, as teachers, too, have failed.
quotes.author: Marva Collins

quotes.quote: If the teacher is not respected and the student not cared for, confusion will arise, however clever one is.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: It's not hard to learn more. What's hard is to unlearn when you discover yourself wrong.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: What students actually do is what matters, not what the teachers present...Students are not blank slates.
quotes.author: Edward Redish

quotes.quote: If I am given a formula, and I am ignorant of its meaning, it cannot teach me anything, but if I already know it, what does the formula teach me?
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him to find it for himself.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: We are usually convinced more easily by reasons we have found ourselves than by those which have occurred to others.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Students have as much responsibility as the educators in their schools.
quotes.author: Lee J. James

quotes.quote: I was always prepared for success but that means that I have to be prepared for failure, too'.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: Where there is an open mind there will always be a frontier.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: He then learns that in going down into the secrets of his own mind he has descended into the secrets of all minds.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.quote: I am still a learner, not a teacher, feeding somewhat omnivorously, browsing both stalk and leaves.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Students need to know why they are learning what they are learning.
quotes.author: Dale Lumpa

quotes.quote: Students are seldom late for classes when they feel they might miss something of value.
quotes.author: Todd Whitaker

quotes.quote: For many students, their teachers may be the only adult with whom they have a meaningful conversation all day.
quotes.author: Vicky Gill

quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Conrad Hall

quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A student must be humbled to trained by teacher.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant.
quotes.author: Al D'Amato

quotes.quote: I just consider myself a student, trying to learn more about it.
quotes.author: Roscoe Mitchel

quotes.quote: A mind of moderate capacity which closely pursues one study must infallibly arrive at great proficiency in that study.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: If you have only a day to live; fill it with study and sex.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: The authority of those who teach is often an obstacle to those who want to learn.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: One hour per day of study in your chosen field is all it takes. One hour per day of study will put you at the top of your field within three years. Within five years you'll be a national authority. In seven years, you can be one of the best people in the world at what you do.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Let us study things that are no more. It is necessary to understand them, if only to avoid them.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Successful and unsuccessful people do not vary greatly in their abilities. They vary in their desires to reach their potential.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: Assiduity, it means sit down until you do it. Commit yourself to your work and study.
quotes.author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quotes.quote: I guarantee the people who study are going to be successful. Nothing can replace hard work.
quotes.author: Freeman A. Hrabowski III

quotes.quote: The more you study, the more you subsequently know; naturally, the more you know, the nearer you get to perfection as a journalist.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Study hard, for the well is deep, and our brains are shallow.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: You can't study the darkness by flooding it with light.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: The study and knowledge of the universe would somehow be lame and defective were no practical results to follow.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: If you want the present to be different from the past, study the past.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: It does not matter where you go and what you study, what matters most is what you share with yourself and the world.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: The spirit of seeking understanding through personal contact with people of other nations and other cultures deserves the respect and support of all.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: The pursuit of illusion is not about studying for prizes, or for study's sake. There's no right or wrong, no pass or fail.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: You can never understand one language until you understand atleast two
quotes.author: Geoffrey Willans

quotes.quote: The fact is, with every friendship you make, and every bond of trust you establish, you are shaping the image of America projected to the rest of the world. That is so important. So when you study abroad, you're actually helping to make America stronger.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: No one who has lived through the second half of the 20th century could possibly be blind to the enormous impact of exchange programs on the future of countries.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: Study abroad is the single most effective way of changing the way we view the world.
quotes.author: Chantal Mitchell

quotes.quote: So we know that it's not enough for us to simply encourage more people to study abroad. We also need to make sure that they can actually afford it.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Travel early and travel often. Live abroad, if you can. Understand cultures other than your own. As your understanding of other cultures increases, your understanding of yourself and your own culture will increase exponentially.
quotes.author: Tom Freston

quotes.quote: The benefits of studying abroad are almost endless.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: And then I realized adventure was the best way to learn.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Why do you go away? So that you can come back. So that you can see the place you came from with new eyes and extra colors. And the people there see you differently, too. Coming back to where you started is not the same as never leaving.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: It's a big world out there, it would be a shame not to experience it.
quotes.author: Jo Andrews

quotes.quote: One of the most interesting, and eye-opening, parts of the study abroad experience is being able to view the United States from the lens of a different country.
quotes.author: Madison Voss

quotes.quote: Studying abroad is about experiencing a foreign county - and the most beautiful, important part of a country's culture is its people.
quotes.author: Alexander Kolker

quotes.quote: Travel and change of place impart new vigor to the mind.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Without stirring abroad, One can know the whole world; Without looking out of the window One can see the way of heaven. The further one goes The less one knows.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Cross-cultural learning and studying abroad can be transformative.
quotes.author: Amal Clooney

quotes.quote: When you are studying any matter or considering any philosophy, ask yourself only: what are the facts, and what is the truth that the facts bear out. Never let yourself be diverted by what you wish to believe, but look only and surely at what are the facts.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: It does not matter where you go and what you study, what matters most is what you share with yourself and the world.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: No student knows his subject: the most he knows is where and how to find out the things he does not know.
quotes.author: Woodrow T. Wilson

quotes.quote: I've been studying myself because I always want to improve.
quotes.author: Loni Love

quotes.quote: Prepare for the unknown by studying how others in the past have coped with the unforeseeable and the unpredictable.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Study the field that you want to get into and know everything about it.
quotes.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quotes.quote: How you spend your time when you are not working or studying says everything about who you are and what is motivating your life.
quotes.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quotes.quote: If education were the same as information, the encyclopedias would be the greatest sages in the world.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to study hard: knowledge never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: Reading improves you while studying approves you.
quotes.author: Chinedu Erinne

quotes.quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Studying whether there's life on Mars or studying how the universe began, there's something magical about pushing back the frontiers of knowledge. That's something that is almost part of being human, and I'm certain that will continue.
quotes.author: Sally Ride

quotes.quote: All that is necessary for a student is access to a library.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: About studying: I believe the word studying was made from two words students dying.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Education enables the humans to achieve their fullest mental and physical potential in both personal and social life.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Those who do not study are only cattle dressed up in men's clothes.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I would live to study, and not study to live.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: I believe the word studying was derived from the words students dying.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The effect of studying masterpieces is to make me admire and do otherwise.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.quote: The problem with studying is that it gets in the way of education.
quotes.author: Neel Burton

quotes.quote: The more we study the more we discover our ignorance.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: You can't just be reading books all the time and leave the writting of them to others.
quotes.author: Joseph Delaney

quotes.quote: What you learn is your personal treasure. No one can take it away from you.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: Acquiring knowledge is the most fruitful effort.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The joy of learning is as indispensable in study as breathing is in running.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: The superior man, extensively studying all learning, and keeping himself under the restraint of the rules of propriety, may thus likewise not overstep what is right.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The art of stunt-making is not about falling down; it's about getting the shot. Creating stunts is creating heroes.
quotes.author: Chad Stahelski

quotes.quote: A good stunt has to have both style and substance. It's a combination of impact and notoriety, the element of danger, technical execution, and the skill of the stunt performer.
quotes.author: Ace Frehley

quotes.quote: All of the stunt men - these are the unsung heroes. They really are. Nobody is giving them any credibility. They're risking their necks.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.quote: There's something that feels more organic about watching a stunt that's done by you. There's also a feeling of accomplishment doing it yourself.
quotes.author: Cobie Smulders

quotes.quote: In the stunt world, fights and vehicles are often two different disciplines.
quotes.author: David Leitch

quotes.quote: Preparing for a stunt is like training for a sporting event.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Belmondo

quotes.quote: When you're doing superhero stunts, the objective is to look as cool as humanly possible.
quotes.author: J. August Richards

quotes.quote: Repetition on things like that becomes quite painful. If you do a stunt sometimes it can look like a stunt.
quotes.author: Marton Csokas

quotes.quote: I'd rather stunt forever then stunt for the day .
quotes.author: Blanco Vandam

quotes.quote: When you're fighting with a stunt person, your intent is to miss.
quotes.author: Victoria Pratt

quotes.quote: The more you do a stunt, the more you increase the risk of something happening.
quotes.author: Ving Rhames

quotes.quote: Doing stunt work is risky, but it's something I enjoy.
quotes.author: Verne Troyer

quotes.quote: Like stunt performers, many stunt doubles are people who were athletic from a young age. Some stunt doubles may have done some acting before getting into stunt work.
quotes.author: Lissette Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Stunt doubles take the place of movie stars when a scene in a movie calls for their special skills. This is because most movie actors are not trained to use their bodies the way stunt doubles do.
quotes.author: Lissette Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Preparations for putting together a stunt begin long before the actual filming starts.
quotes.author: Tara Baukus Mello

quotes.quote: Stunt riders may compete in several different competitions.
quotes.author: Jason Glaser

quotes.quote: One wrong move and the stunt performer is sure to be badly injured.
quotes.author: Cherie Turner

quotes.quote: The pioneers of stunt work were pure daredevils. Some even lost their lives for fame.
quotes.author: Jessica Cohn

quotes.quote: Circuses have always featured stun people in their acts.
quotes.author: Jessica Cohn

quotes.quote: I thought about the many action-packed stunts I've performed over the years, escaping major injury or worse, meaning I had cheated death a time or two.
quotes.author: Angela Meryl

quotes.quote: The feeling in that moment reaffirmed what I already knew: Being a professional stunt woman is my dream job!
quotes.author: Angela Meryl

quotes.quote: He worked in the film and TV business in an era when stunts were real, and stuntmen ensure the safety of the big stars while no one worried enough about theirs
quotes.author: James May

quotes.quote: Stunt performing is not for the weak of heart. You will need to develop a 'thick skin' to make it in this business.
quotes.author: Mark Aisbett

quotes.quote: There is both an art and a science to performing a stunt safely and there is an infinite amount you can learn.
quotes.author: Mark Aisbett

quotes.quote: Early stuntmen often took pride in the punishment their bodies could withstand, but the smartest realized that by padding sensitive areas they could repeat stunts that day and the next while being paid accordingly.
quotes.author: Gene Scott Freese

quotes.quote: Stunt professionals have some of the most important and most often dangerous jobs in Hollywood, but they don't get the proper credit or light shined on their talents, hard work, and dedication.
quotes.author: Amy Johnston

quotes.quote: I don't do my own stunts, but I do my own fighting. I don't consider fighting to be a stunt.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.quote: All of the stunt men - these are the unsung heroes. They really are. Nobody is giving them any credibility. They're risking their necks.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.quote: One time they traded me for seven horses. Seven stunt horses.
quotes.author: James Stewart

quotes.quote: She was desperate to get away from him, desperate because she knew stunts like that were a Hell of a lot safer than being around him.
quotes.author: Kayla Krantz

quotes.quote: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: When a stupid man is doing something he is ashamed of, he always declares that it is his duty.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The problem with educating stupid people was that they didn't know they were stupid. The same went for curing crazy people.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Stupid people will mistake your confidence for arrogance.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: The problem with the world is that everyone does not have a brain, but everyone does have a tongue.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A brainiac notices everything, an ignoramus comments about everything.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Never argue with stupid people, they will drag you down to their level and then beat you with experience.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Genius may have its limitations, but stupidity is not thus handicapped.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Get all the fools on your side and you can be elected to anything.
quotes.author: Frank Dane

quotes.quote: He is not only dull himself, but the cause of dulness in others.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The biggest cause of trouble in the world today is that the stupid people are so sure about things and the intelligent folks are so full of doubts.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Stupid people always think they are right. Wise people listen to advice.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak and to remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Showing off is the fool's idea of glory.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The real war is not between the West and the East. The real war is between intelligent and stupid people.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.quote: If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldn't have a job if he was any smarter.
quotes.author: John Gotti

quotes.quote: It is so pleasant to come across people more stupid than ourselves.We love them at once for being so.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: Stupid people do make me lose my temper and most people are stupid, fortunately for me. It's made it easier for me to make a living.
quotes.author: Albert Gubay

quotes.quote: Most people would sooner die than start to think. In fact - they do so.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Unintelligent people always look for a scapegoat.
quotes.author: Ernest Bevin

quotes.quote: It costs to be stupid. The stupider you are, the more it costs.
quotes.author: Sherrill Brown

quotes.quote: An empty head is not really empty; it is stuffed with rubbish. Hence the difficulty of forcing anything into an empty head.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: I just hate stupid people. They should have to wear signs that say 'I'm Stupid.' That way you wouldn't rely on them, and you wouldn't ask them for nothing.
quotes.author: Bill Engvall

quotes.quote: Although it is not true that all conservatives are stupid people, it is true that most stupid people are conservative.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: If there are no stupid questions, then what kind of questions do stupid people ask? Do they get smart just in time to ask questions?
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: An instructed and intelligent people are always more decent and orderlythan an ignorant and stupid one.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Only stupid people don't change their minds.
quotes.author: Boutros Boutros-Ghali

quotes.quote: Wise men create proverbs and fools repeat them.
quotes.author: Samuel Palmer

quotes.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Nothing in all the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Stupidity is also a gift of God, but one mustn't misuse it.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: The trouble with the world is that the stupid are cocksure and the intelligent are full of doubt.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The two most common elements in the universe are Hydrogen and stupidity.
quotes.author: Harlan Ellison

quotes.quote: Against stupidity the gods themselves contend in vain.
quotes.author: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.quote: Insanity is just what we call stupidity when it doesn't make sense.
quotes.author: Josh Lieb

quotes.quote: Strange as it seems, no amount of learning can cure stupidity, and higher education positively fortifies it.
quotes.author: Stephen Vizinczey

quotes.quote: One should commit no stupidity twice, the variety of choice is, in the end, large enough.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Ignorance can be educated. Crazy can be medicated. But there is no cure for stupid.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Think of how stupid the average person is, and then realize half of them are stupider than that.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: It is only the wisest and the stupidest that cannot change.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It is better to keep your mouth shut and appear stupid than to open it and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: When a stupid man is doing something he is ashamed of, he always declares that it is his duty.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Obstinacy and vehemency in opinion are the surest proofs of stupidity.
quotes.author: Bernard Barton

quotes.quote: There is nothing worse than aggressive stupidity.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Man has made use of his intelligence; he invented stupidity.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: He may look like an idiot and talk like an idiot, but don't let that fool you. He really is an idiot.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: To be stupid and selfish and to have good health are the three requirements for happiness, though if stupidity is lacking, the others are useless.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Stupidity isn't punishable by death. If it was, there would be a hell of a population drop.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Stupidity is the same as evil if you judge by the results.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: The more stupid one is, the closer one is to reality. The more stupid one is, the clearer one is. Stupidity is brief and artless, while intelligence squirms and hides itself. Intelligence is unprincipled, but stupidity is honest and straightforward.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Stupidity combined with arrogance and a huge ego will get you a long way.
quotes.author: Chris Lowe

quotes.quote: The doctor sees all the weakness of mankind; the lawyer all the wickedness, the theologian all the stupidity.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: In politics stupidity is not a handicap.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of stupid people in large groups.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Whenever a man does a thoroughly stupid thing, it is always from the noblest motives.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Stupidity is much the same all the world over. A stupid person's notions and feelings may confidently be inferred from those which prevail in the circle by which the person is surrounded. Not so with those whose opinions and feelings are an emanation from their own nature and faculties.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: For at least two thirds of our miseries spring from human stupidity, human malice and those great motivators and justifiers of malice and stupidity, idealism, dogmatism and proselytizing zeal on behalf of religious or political idols
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Style is joyful if you allow yourself to have joy.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Fashion fades, only style remains the same.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Style of the future is the convergence of function and fashion.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore
