quotes.quote: A good style must, first of all, be clear. It must not be mean or above the dignity of the subject. It must be appropriate.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Style is something you can use, and you can be like a magpie, just taking what you want.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: Style ain't nothing but keeping the same idea from beginning to end. Everybody got it.
quotes.author: August Wilson

quotes.quote: Style is the gossamer on which the seeds of truth float through the world.
quotes.author: George Bancroft

quotes.quote: A good style must have an air of novelty, at the same time concealing its art.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Personal style is not something that is just in the air. It is something you have and that you apply to yourself.
quotes.author: Paloma Picasso

quotes.quote: Style means the right word. The rest matters little.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Style is only the frame to hold your thoughts. It is like the sash of a window; if heavy, it will obscure the light.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: Style comes from knowing who you are and who you want to be in the world; it does not come from wanting to be somebody else, or wanting to be thinner, shorter, taller, prettier.
quotes.author: Nina Garcia

quotes.quote: Style is made up of whatever an author can't avoid doing.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Style is an expression of your individuality. Who you are and what your mood is, is what you wear.
quotes.author: Sonam Kapoor

quotes.quote: Style is the most ephemeral thing I know. It's not about how effective you are it's about how you are effective.
quotes.author: Robert Benton

quotes.quote: Style is the instrument you can pick back up when you want to regain some of the confidence you've lost.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Style can change your look, certainly, but it can also change your life.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Style has always been in my mind the author's Self, the creative expression of that Self.
quotes.author: Whit Burnett

quotes.quote: My style of leadership is to lead with the lightest touch that I possibly can.
quotes.author: Steve Squyres

quotes.quote: The essence of style is a simple way of saying something complex.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: Style is when they're running you out of town and you make it look like you're leading the parade.
quotes.author: William Battie

quotes.quote: Style is the perfection of a point of view.
quotes.author: Richard Eberhart

quotes.quote: Style is primarily a matter of instinct.
quotes.author: Bill Blass

quotes.quote: Style is the dress of thoughts, and let them be ever so just.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Style is instinctive and few achieve it in a notable degree. Its development is not hastened by instruction. It comes or it doesn't. It will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Walter J. Phillips

quotes.quote: Style is very different from fashion. Once you find something that works, keep it.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.quote: Style is a celebratory expression of your life force. You must approach it with a sense of joie de vivre.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: Style is whatever you want to do, if you can do it with confidence.
quotes.author: George Clinton

quotes.quote: A man's subconscious self is not the ideal companion. It lurks for the greater part of his life in some dark den of its own, hidden away, and emerges only to taunt and deride and increase the misery of a miserable hour.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: As you sow in your subconscious mind, so shall you reap in your body and environment.
quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

quotes.quote: The subconscious mind has no sense of humor and people often joke themselves into unhappy experiences.
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.quote: The possibilities of creative effort connected with the subconscious mind are stupendous and imponderable. They inspire one with awe.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: There's a lot of power in putting it out in the universe. It's telling your subconscious mind, 'This is what's gonna happen.'
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: The conscious mind is the editor, and the subconscious mind is the writer. And the joy of writing, when you're writing from your subconscious, is beautiful - it's thrilling. When you're editing, which is your conscious mind, it's like torture.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Whatever goal you give to your subconscious mind, it will work night and day to achieve.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: If you do not run your subconscious mind yourself, someone else will run it for you.
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.quote: The story of the subconscious mind can be told in three words: there is none.
quotes.author: Hugo Munsterberg

quotes.quote: Your body is your subconscious mind and you can't heal it by talk alone.
quotes.author: Candace Pert

quotes.quote: The conscious mind is the editor, and the subconscious mind is the writer.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: The subconscious mind is the guiding force for your entire life.
quotes.author: Kevin Michel

quotes.quote: When the subconscious mind must chose between deeply rooted emotions and logic, emotions will almost always win.
quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

quotes.quote: Remember that the subconscious mind has determined the success and wonderful achievements of all great scientific workers.
quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

quotes.quote: A knowledge of the interaction of your conscious and subconscious minds will enable you to transform your whole life.
quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

quotes.quote: Your subconscious mind makes all your words and actions fit a pattern consistent with your self-concept and your innermost beliefs about yourself.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Act with purpose, courage, confidence, competence and intelligence until these qualities 'lock in' to your subconscious mind.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If we could get your subconscious mind to agree with your conscious mind about being happy, that's when your positive thoughts work.
quotes.author: Bruce Lipton

quotes.quote: More than ninety-five percent of your brain activity, as you consciously read this sentence, is being used by your subconscious mind.
quotes.author: Kevin Michel

quotes.quote: Only one thing registers on the subconscious mind: repetitive application - practice. What you practice is what you manifest.
quotes.author: Fay Weldon

quotes.quote: Use the power of your conscious & subconscious mind to create a vibrational match for the abundance you desire and deserve.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: The reason man may become the master of his own destiny is because he has the power to influence his own subconscious mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The subconscious mind is more susceptible to influence by impulses of thought mixed with 'feeling' or emotion, than by those originating solely in the reasoning portion of the mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Our subconscious minds have no sense of humor, play no jokes and cannot tell the difference between reality and an imagined thought or image. What we continually think about eventually will manifest in our lives.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Once the subconscious mind accepts an idea, it begins to execute it.
quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

quotes.quote: Subconscious minds are no less fallible than the objective mind.
quotes.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quotes.quote: The Subconscious mind can not tell the difference between what's real and what's imagined.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: The subconscious mind is shielding or showing numerous potential paths, based on what it determines would represent a consistent reality for you.
quotes.author: Kevin Michel

quotes.quote: Submission is the willingness to give up our right to ourselves, to freely surrender our insistence on having our own way all the time.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Submission to poverty is the unpardonable sin against the body. Submission to unhappiness is the unpardonable sin against the spirit.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Submission is the art of compensating for your weakness by playing to each other's strengths.
quotes.author: Mark Batterson

quotes.quote: The wife's submission is not a matter of superior versus inferior; rather, it is self-imposed as a matter of obedience to the Lord and of love for her husband.
quotes.author: Steve Pearce

quotes.quote: Submission is not about authority and it is not obedience; it is all about relationships of love and respect.
quotes.author: William P. Young

quotes.quote: Divine direction begins with unconditional submission.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Submission is not in the bowing of heads or knees but in the humbling of your whole being (spirit, soul and body).
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: The spirit of submission is choosing His way over ours for His sake.
quotes.author: K.P. Yohannan

quotes.quote: You would not make the act of submission which is the price of sanity.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: No woman wants to be in submission to a man who isn't in submission to God!
quotes.author: T.D. Jakes

quotes.quote: It is much easier and safer to scare someone into submission than to beat them into submission.
quotes.author: Rory Miller

quotes.quote: When grace changes the heart, submission out of fear changes to submission out of love, and true humility is born.
quotes.author: William Hendriksen

quotes.quote: Blind submission in women is considered a virtue, while submission to wrong is itself wrong, and resistance to wrong is virtue alike in women as in man.
quotes.author: Ernestine Rose

quotes.quote: This attitude of complete submission and complete trust is of course the key to working out our own salvation in fear and trembling and is the mark of a truly spiritual Christian.
quotes.author: John F. Walvoord

quotes.quote: Submission makes love easy and enjoyable. Love gives birth to willful and cheerful submission. Where there is love and submission is missing, and where there is submission and love is missing, the result is that the other becomes a burden and a uneasy yoke.
quotes.author: Paul Bamikole

quotes.quote: To submit one’s self to one’s gift is to submit oneself to education and self-development and to devote enough time to improve one’s gift.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: To submit to chance is to reveal the self and its obsessions.
quotes.author: Charles Simic

quotes.quote: If one has to submit, it is wasteful not to do so with the best grace possible.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It is right to submit to a higher authority whenever a command of God would be violated.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: Sometimes to submit is to know you have a life worth living for a higher purpose, worth seeing through.
quotes.author: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.quote: To submit isn’t to be forced. It’s to yield to a force greater than your own, in order to become part of the whole.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.quote: The truth is, if we don't learn to submit to authority, we won't ever learn to submit to God.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: You must submit to supreme suffering in order to discover the completion of joy.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Submit to the fate of your own free will.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Whoever submits himself to a super-discipline can expect great triumphs.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: We must...submit ourselves in adversity to the will of a merciful God as cheerfully as in prosperity.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Submit to love without thinking, as the sun rose this morning recklessly extinguishing our star-candle minds.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: When we submit to God's plans, we can trust our desires. Our assignment is found at the intersection of God's plan and our pleasures.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: When we submit our lives to what we read in scripture, we find that we are not being led to see God in our stories but our stories in God's. God is the larger context and plot in which our stories find themselves.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: This submission to the threshold of a cross is at the very root of our following Jesus; it changes the game completely.
quotes.author: Alan Hirsch

quotes.quote: People are submissive to power, and few of them can be influenced by doctrines of righteousness.
quotes.author: Han Fei

quotes.quote: Passive pleasure is no pleasure at all.
quotes.author: Arthur Adamov

quotes.quote: I thinkÂ passiveÂ beauties have their place in the world. It's hard for me to relate to that.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: A trueÂ submissiveÂ obeys in mind and body, whether or not Master is present.Â
quotes.author: Red Phoenix

quotes.quote: Being passive is not the same as being peaceful. If you aren't doing what you know, in your heart, you want to do, you are NOT going with the flow. You are going against the flow. Your reactions, emotions, desires, and talents are all part of the flow of life. Ignoring them is passive resistance. Let yourself go.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: BeingÂ submissiveÂ does not mean that we don't give honest feedback.
quotes.author: Neil T. Anderson

quotes.quote: Having a passive personality, is a soft way to live a dead life.
quotes.author: Omar EL KADMIRI

quotes.quote: All of us are subject to being passive to the social ills around us. It's a struggle not to become, by staying silent, an accomplice.
quotes.author: Mary Travers

quotes.quote: A passive mindset "manages" to live with mediocre, but an active mindset "leads" to change until excellence results.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Accept loss forever. Be submissive to everything.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Great souls are always loyally submissive, reverent to what is over them: only small mean souls are otherwise.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: It is never ideal to be passive by accepting whatever is personally unacceptable.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: A truly submissive woman is to be treasured, cherished and protected for it is only she who can give a man the gift of dominance.
quotes.author: Anne Desclos

quotes.quote: Cowardice is submissive surrender to circumstances.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Passive resistance is a sport for gentleman (and ladies)-just like the pursuit of war, a heroic enterprise for the ruling classes but a grievous burden on the rest.
quotes.author: Kenneth Kaunda

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of people in the world: Submissive and rebellious. The problem of the world is that majority is in the first category!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A goodÂ submissiveÂ does not surrender too easily. There would be no fun in that.
quotes.author: Veronica J. Dantes

quotes.quote: Passive resistance seeks to rejoin politics and religion and to test all our actions in the light of ethical principles.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Have there ever been moreÂ submissiveÂ slaves? Adoring, even in their irons, the God who punishes them.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: What you are is the most subtle delicacy of being.
quotes.author: John de Ruiter

quotes.quote: This is a subtle truth. Whatever you love, you are.
quotes.author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote: The subtlest beauties in our life are unseen and unheard.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The subtlest of subtleties, this is the gateway to all mysteries.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Train yourself to be in awe of the subtle, and you will live in a world of beauty and ease.
quotes.author: Rodney Yee

quotes.quote: The most subtle of our acts is to simulate blindness for snares that we know are set for us.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: In very subtle ways, how we regard ourselves and others continually changes us into something new.
quotes.author: Fred Alan Wolf

quotes.quote: Subtle impressions for which words are quite too coarse a medium
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The subtle are the causes, the gross the effects.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The subtle dance of the body joins us to the world.
quotes.author: George Leonard

quotes.quote: For the subtlest folly proceeds from the subtlest wisdom.
quotes.author: John Webster

quotes.quote: The subtler one's awareness, the more powerfully it can heal.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: So subtle is the atmosphere of opinion that it will make itself felt without words.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Without subtle ingenuity of mind, one cannot make certain of the truth of their reports.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: It is always safe to assume that people are more subtle and less sensitive than they seem.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: When values are contrasting, use subtle color. When values are subtle, use contrasting color.
quotes.author: Harvey Dunn

quotes.quote: The more subtle and elegant you are in hiding your plot points, the better you are as a writer.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: But nature is always more subtle, more intricate, more elegant than what we are able to imagine.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Nature is subtle and complex.
quotes.author: Marlene Van Niekerk

quotes.quote: Time is the subtle thief of youth.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Love is the subtlest force in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Affected simplicity is a subtle imposture.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Resistance is the subtlest form of attachment.
quotes.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quotes.quote: Love is the most subtle form of self-interest.
quotes.author: Holbrook Jackson

quotes.quote: A very subtle difference can make the picture or not.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.quote: Faith is the subtle chain which binds us to the infinite; the voice of a deep life within, that will remain until we crowd it thence.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Oakes Smith

quotes.quote: The lies we tell ourselves are the most subtle of all lies.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: Fear is the most subtle and destructive of all human diseases. Fear kills dreams!
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Art is the concrete representation of our most subtle feelings.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: The more refined and subtle our minds, the more vulnerable they are.
quotes.author: Paul Tournier

quotes.quote: Success is a consequence and must not be a goal.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you'll get the result.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Success is merely the process of fulfilling your own hopes and dreams— not by the standards set by society— but by the standards set by you.
quotes.author: George Pataki

quotes.quote: If you can conceive it and believe it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: The size of your success is determined by the size of your belief. Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

quotes.quote: Success is the space one occupies in the newspaper.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced everyday.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: It is the accumulative weight of our disciplines and our judgements that leads us to either fortune or failure.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Average people look forward to 'getting off.' Successful people look forward to 'getting on.'
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Success is not so much what we have as it is what we are.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Success is 20% skills and 80% strategy. You might know how to read, but more importantly, what's your plan to read?
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Don't worry about being successful but work toward being significant and the success will naturally follow.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Success will never be a big step in the future, success is a small step taken just now.
quotes.author: Jonatan Martensson

quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: There is only one success— to be able to spend your life in your own way.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: No success is worthy of the name unless it is won by honest industry and brave breasting of the waves of fortune.
quotes.author: Huxley

quotes.quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Success has a great tendency to conceal and throw a veil over the evil deeds of men.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Success serves men as a pedestal; it makes them look larger, if reflection does not measure them.
quotes.author: Joubert

quotes.quote: People have a seed to success within them. Most never find it and therefore fail to reach their potential. Occasionally, a leader discovers it and helps that individual develop it. For both, they now can fulfill the purpose for which they are born.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Success is not a destination; it's a daily thing.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: People are training for success when they should be training for failure.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The best leaders realize their success depends on their people.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Success comes to those who have an entire mountain of gold that they continually mine, not those who find one nugget and try to live on it for fifty years.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Success is the one unpardonable sin against our fellow.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Success is blocked by concentrating on it and planning for it...Success is shy— it won't come out while you're watching.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: I am doomed to an eternity of compulsive work. No set goal achieved satisfies. Success only breeds a new goal. It is endless.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life--think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I am thankful for all of those who said NO to me. It's because of them I'm doing it myself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Let him who would enjoy a good future waste none of his present.
quotes.author: Roger Babson

quotes.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Spend eighty percent of your time focusing on the opportunities of tomorrow rather than the problems of yesterday.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: So be sure when you step, Step with care and great tact. And remember that life's A Great Balancing Act. And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and Â¾ percent guaranteed) Kid, you'll move mountains.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: I have seen many successful people fail after they start fearing they might lose what they have built.
quotes.author: Guy Laliberte

quotes.quote: Successful people understand the value of time. Once they commit to doing something, they would never cancel.
quotes.author: Raymond Arroyo

quotes.quote: A great sense of commitment builds a hardworking spirit.
quotes.author: Wayne Chirisa

quotes.quote: The more you dream, the farther you get.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: I've found that most successful people do things because they get personal satisfaction from the work that they do.
quotes.author: John Rampton

quotes.quote: The most successful people I know are also the most reliable.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: It's often the case that successful people invite criticism.
quotes.author: Michael Gove

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Opportunity doesn't make appointments, you have to be ready when it arrives.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are always asking, What's in it for me?
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing about life, once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
quotes.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

quotes.quote: Never allow your reality to be influenced by another's listless view of you.
quotes.author: Julieanne O'Conner

quotes.quote: Though no one can backtrack and create a brand new start, Everyone is capable of taking their life in a brand new direction.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Everybody loves success, but they hate successful people.
quotes.author: John McEnroe

quotes.quote: Successful people are simply those with successful habits.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Success is about creating benefit for all and enjoying the process. If you focus on this & adopt this definition, success is yours.
quotes.author: Kelly Kim

quotes.quote: Most of the successful people I've known are the ones who do more listening than talking.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed, and the more they find a way to succeed. Similarly, when someone is failing, the tendency is to get on a downward spiral that can even become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: To be successful, you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can't just accept the ones you like.
quotes.author: Mike Gafka

quotes.quote: Successful people are not interesting. I feel for the losers. That's where my heart lies.
quotes.author: Karin Fossum

quotes.quote: As we look ahead into the next century, leaders will be those who empower others.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Successful people breed success.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: Even if everybody says it's impossible, with determination, there is always something you can do. The last thing is to give up without trying.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Successful women are not liked. I think the biggest danger for women in science is colleagues who are not as good as you are.
quotes.author: Christiane Nusslein-Volhard

quotes.quote: To all the little girls who are watching, never doubt that you are valuable and powerful and deserving of every chance and opportunity in the world to pursue and achieve your own dreams.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Whenever you see a successful woman, look out for three men who are going out of their way to try to block her.
quotes.author: Yulia Tymoshenko

quotes.quote: Courage is not not being afraid, its being afraid and doing it anyways.
quotes.author: Gina Bianchini

quotes.quote: Success as a woman has changed me. That's what I feel is the first thing. When I feel like a successful woman as a rounded human being, then it feeds my work in a broader way so it becomes more interesting.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
quotes.author: Estee Lauder

quotes.quote: Successful women have an aura that says i belong in this seat.
quotes.author: Cathie Black

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than you know; you are beautiful just as you are.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as you mind lets you. What you believe, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: I just love bossy women. I could be around them all day. To me, bossy is not a pejorative term at all. It means somebody's passionate and engaged and ambitious and doesn't mind leading.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.quote: Always concentrate on how far you have come, rather than how far you have left to go. The difference in how easy it seems will amaze you.
quotes.author: Heidi Johnson

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: I don't believe in guilt, I believe in living on impulse as long as you never intentionally hurt another person, and don't judge people in your life. I think you should live completely free.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Everything, and I mean everything, is about strong, powerful women.
quotes.author: Jesse Peyronel

quotes.quote: I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naÃ¯ve or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Success and like ability are positively correlated for men and negatively for women. When a man is successful, he is liked by both men and women. When a woman is successful, people of both genders like her less.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: I think a woman who is successful is critiqued more harshly than a man is critiqued.
quotes.author: Susan Stroman

quotes.quote: Courage allows the successful woman to fail and to learn powerful lessons from the failure so that in the end, she didn't fail at all.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: If you are successful, it is because somewhere, sometime, someone gave you a life or an idea that started you in the right direction. Remember also that you are indebted to life until you help some less fortunate person, just as you were helped.
quotes.author: Melinda Gates

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Herman Cain

quotes.quote: I know God will not give me anything I can't handle. I just wish that He didn't trust me so much.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: Define success on your own terms, achieve it by your own rules, and build a life you're proud to live.
quotes.author: Anne Sweeney

quotes.quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Suffering becomes beautiful when anyone bears great calamities with cheerfulness, not through insensibility but through greatness of mind.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The only antidote to mental suffering is physical pain.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: The reward of suffering is experience.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: A man who fears suffering is already suffering from what he fears.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Suffering by nature or chance never seems so painful as suffering inflicted on us by the arbitrary will of another.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Suffering is but another name for the teaching of experience, which is the parent of instruction and the schoolmaster of life.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Suffering is the substance of life and the root of personality, for it is only suffering that makes us persons.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Suffering is a corrective to point out a lesson which by other means we have failed to grasp, and never can it be eradicated until that lesson is learnt.
quotes.author: Edward Bach

quotes.quote: It is by suffering that human beings become angels.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Suffering is the positive element in this world, indeed it is the only link between this world and the positive.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: It's at the borders of pain and suffering that the men are separated from the boys.
quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

quotes.quote: When suffering comes, we yearn for some sign from God, forgetting we have just had one.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Suffering is one of life's great teachers.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbell Chapin

quotes.quote: When suffering knocks at your door and you say there is no seat for him, he tells you not to worry because he has brought his own stool.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: It isn't easy to accept that suffering can also be beautiful... it's difficult. It's something you can only understand if you dig deeply into yourself.
quotes.author: Rainer W. Fassbinder

quotes.quote: Suffering is one very long moment. We cannot divide it by seasons.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: One's suffering disappears when one lets oneself go, when one yields - even to sadness.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Suffering is part of the divine idea.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: It is not suffering as such that is most deeply feared but suffering that degrades.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: The suffering caused by the terrorists is the real torture.
quotes.author: Jean-Marie Le Pen

quotes.quote: There's nothing like suffering to remind us how not in control we actually are, how little power we ultimately have, and how much we ultimately need God.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: When suffering happens, it forces us to confront life in a different way than we normally do.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: The cause of suffering is that the unbounded Self is overshadowed by the world.
quotes.author: Patanjali

quotes.quote: The word 'suffering' is not in my vocabulary.
quotes.author: Judith Jamison

quotes.quote: Suffering does not necessarily ennoble you.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're suffering really intensely, you can't pray for yourself.
quotes.author: Anne Graham Lotz

quotes.quote: Suffering doesn't improve human beings, does it?
quotes.author: Herta Muller

quotes.quote: Suffering has been stronger than all other teaching, and has taught me to understand what your heart used to be. I have been bent and broken, but - I hope - into a better shape.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Suffering is part of the human condition, and it comes to us all. The key is how we react to it, either turning away from God in anger and bitterness or growing closer to Him in trust and confidence.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The world is filled to suffocating. Man has placed his token on every stone. Every word, every image, is leased and mortgaged. We know that a picture is but a space in which a variety of images, none of them original, blend and clash.
quotes.author: Sherrie Levine

quotes.quote: Attachment to the external always suffocates inner peace.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Isn't it suffocating to keep waiting for life to get better all the time?
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: A man can suffocate on courtesy.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Life should be touched, not strangled.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Precision can be suffocating
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Life without utopia is suffocating, for the multitude at least: threatened otherwise with petrifaction, the world must have a new madness.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Suffocating in silence. Beneath the weight of unspoken words.
quotes.author: Gunjan Arora

quotes.quote: Even paradise can be suffocating.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: Sometimes, when a person is truly lost in this world, suffocating inside her private bubble where all she can hear is her own droning heartbeat, a touch can be enough.
quotes.author: Walter Kirn

quotes.quote: In suffocating the voice of conscience, passion carries with itself a restlessness of the body and the senses: it is the restlessness of the 'external man.' When the internal man has been reduced to silence, then passion, once it has been given freedom of action, so to speak, exhibits itself as an insistent tendency to satisfy the senses and the body.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Truly unconditional love was suffocating, in that it took so little notice of who you actually were.
quotes.author: Garth Risk Hallberg

quotes.quote: Don't strangle a struggler
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Most pleasures embrace us but to strangle.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The world has never yet seen a truly great and virtuous nation because in the degradation of woman the very fountains of life are poisoned at their source.
quotes.author: Lucretia Mott

quotes.quote: Every man with a vote was considered a foe to woman suffrage unless he was prepared to be actively a friend.
quotes.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quotes.quote: In the adjustment of the new order of things, we women demand an equal voice; we shall accept nothing less.
quotes.author: Carrie Chapman Catt

quotes.quote: I'm not sure feminism should require an adjective. Believing in the full social, political, and economic quality of women, which is what the dictionary says â€œfeminismâ€ means, is enough to make a revolution in itself.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: The best protection any woman can have ... is courage.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: I think, with never-ending gratitude, that the young women of today do not and can never know at what price their right to free speech and to speak at all in public has been earned.
quotes.author: Lucy Burns

quotes.quote: The suffragettes realized the power of getting arrested and going to prison and harassing politicians and making a nuisance of themselves. It got them a lot of attention. What they never did was set out to endanger human life except for sacrificing themselves.
quotes.author: Sarah Gavron

quotes.quote: Bah! Suffragettes. I've no time for suffragettes. They made the biggest mistake in history. They went for equality. They should have gone for power!
quotes.author: Jennifer Worth

quotes.quote: We will have gone from men telling us condescendingly to not bother our pretty little heads about important things like politics, to not bothering our pretty little heads without even being told not to! The suffragettes struggled and suffered so much on our behalf; what a travesty of everything they stood for, if we simply look away as though we can't be bothered.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Trust in God: She will provide.
quotes.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quotes.quote: The subjection of women, if there be such a thing, will not now depend on any creation of the law, not can it be remedied by any action of the law. It will never again be possible to blame the soveriegn state for any position of inequality. Women will have, with us, the fullest rights. The ground and justification for the old agitation is gone, and gone for ever.
quotes.author: Stanley Baldwin

quotes.quote: If women want any rights more than they's got, why don't they just take them, and not be talking about it.
quotes.author: Sojourner Truth

quotes.quote: I know that women, once convinced that they are doing what is right, that their rebellion is just, will go on, no matter what the difficulties, no matter what the dangers, so long as there is a woman alive to hold up the flag of rebellion.
quotes.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quotes.quote: There never will be complete equality until women themselves help to make laws and elect lawmakers.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: Proof that they do not understand the republic is that in their fine promises for universal suffrage, they forgot women.
quotes.author: Delphine de Girardin

quotes.quote:
The rights we want:
We want to choose our husband
We want to own land
We want to go to school
We don't want to be cut anymore
We want to make decisions
We want respect in politics, to be leaders
We want to be equal.
quotes.author: Rebecca Lolosoli

quotes.quote: When a battle for suffrage is conducted, it should only be conducted according to socialist principles, and therefore with the demand of universal suffrage for women and men.
quotes.author: Clara Zetkin

quotes.quote: If Congress refuses to listen to and grant what women ask, there is but one course left then to pursue. What is there left for women to do but to become the mothers of the future government?
quotes.author: Victoria Claflin Woodhull

quotes.quote: Suffrage is a common right of citizenship. Women have the right of suffrage. Logically it cannot be escaped.
quotes.author: Victoria Woodhull

quotes.quote: The suffragettes were all about speaking up, screaming for their rights. You can't speak up for your right to be silent.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: If it is true that men are better than women because they are stronger, why aren't our sumo wrestlers in the government?
quotes.author: Kishida Toshiko

quotes.quote: Male and female represent the two sides of the great radical dualism. But in fact they are perpetually passing into one another. Fluid hardens to solid, solid rushes to fluid. There is no wholly masculine man, no purely feminine womanâ€¦ Nature provides exceptions to every rule.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: What is life without liberty; and what is liberty without equality of rights?
quotes.author: Ernestine L. Rose

quotes.quote: We have to free half of the human race, the women, so that they can help to free the other half.
quotes.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quotes.quote: To the wrongs that need resistance, To the right that needs assistance, To the future in the distance, Give yourselves.
quotes.author: Carrie Chapman Catt

quotes.quote: Woman is learning for herself that not self-sacrifice, but self development, is her first duty in life; and this, not primarily for the sake of others but that she may become fully herself.
quotes.author: Matilda Joslyn Gage

quotes.quote: It was we, the people; not we, the white male citizens; nor yet we, the male citizens; but we, the whole people, who formed the Union. ... Men, their rights and nothing more; women, their rights and nothing less.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: Trust me that as I ignore all law to help the slave, so will I ignore it all to protect an enslaved woman.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: You must make women count as much as men; you must have an equal standard of morals; and the only way to enforce that is through giving women political power so that you can get that equal moral standard registered in the laws of the country. It is the only way.
quotes.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quotes.quote: If particular care and attention is not paid to the ladies, we are determined to foment a rebellion, and will not hold ourselves bound by any laws in which we have no voice, or representation.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: The soul has been given its own ears to hear things the mind does not understand.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If you want something, release the wish, and let it light on its desire, completely free of the personal.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Stop, open up, surrender the beloved blind silence. Stay there until you see you're looking at the light with infinite eyes.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Lift the veil that obscures the heart, and there you will find what you are looking for.
quotes.author: KabirÂ

quotes.quote: There is a force within that gives you life. Seek that.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
quotes.author: Jalal ad-Din Rumi

quotes.quote: By God, when you see your beauty you will be the idol of yourself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: All loves are a bridge to divine love. Yet, those who have not had a taste of it do not know!
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Let yourselfÂ beÂ silently drawnÂ by theÂ strange pullÂ of whatÂ you really love. ItÂ will not lead you astray.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: At theÂ centerÂ ofÂ your being you haveÂ theÂ answer;Â you knowÂ whoÂ youÂ are andÂ you knowÂ whatÂ you want.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Be silent,Â onlyÂ the hand ofÂ God canÂ remove the burdens of your heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: When setting out on a journey, do not seek advice from those who have never left home.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Let love lead your soul.Â MakeÂ it aÂ placeÂ toÂ retireÂ to, aÂ kindÂ ofÂ monastery cave, aÂ retreatÂ for the deepest coreÂ ofÂ your being.
quotes.author: Farid al-Din Attar

quotes.quote: If words come out of the heart, they will enter the heart, but if they come from the tongue, they will not pass beyond the ears.
quotes.author: Al-Suhrawardi

quotes.quote: I have been a seeker and I still am, but I stopped asking the books and the stars. I started listening to the teaching of my Soul.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: God writes spiritual mysteries on our heart, where they wait silently for discovery.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The only real rest comes when you're alone withÂ God.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Why are you knocking at every other door? Go, knock at the door of your own heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Come insideÂ theÂ heart's house.Â There is peace and solace there.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The lover of God will cry and weep until he finds rest in the Beloved's embrace.
quotes.author: Rabia al-Basri

quotes.quote: Whatever purifies youÂ is theÂ right path, IÂ will not tryÂ toÂ defineÂ it.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: For a day, just for one day, talk about that which disturbs no one and bring some peace into your beautiful eyes.
quotes.author: Hafiz of Persia

quotes.quote: The universe is not outside of you.Â Look inside yourself;Â everything that you want,Â you already are.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Don't dismiss the heart, even if it's filled with sorrow. God's treasures are buried in broken hearts.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If light is in your heart, you will find your way home.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Your heart knows the way.Â Run in that direction.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: When your soul is looking for you,Â light a candle on its path.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The way of theÂ SufisÂ cannot be understood by means of the intellect or by ordinary book learning.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Every soul has a definite task, and the fulfillment of each individual purpose can alone lead man aright; illumination comes to him through the medium of his own talent.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Sugar candy tasted better than bitter truth.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Syntactic sugar causes cancer of the semicolon.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: Because sugar is not arsenic, many graves are full.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Sugar is responsible for a lot of deaths. Arguably more than crack cocaine.
quotes.author: Guy Ritchie

quotes.quote: Sugar is the next tobacco, without a doubt, and that industry should be scared. It should be taxed just like tobacco and anything else that can, frankly, destroy lives.
quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

quotes.quote: Seeing your glucose every minute on your phone, it really changes your lifestyle. You ask yourself, 'Do I really need that piece of cake? No, because I don't want to stress out my pancreas.'
quotes.author: Eric Topol

quotes.quote: Sugar and sand may be mixed together, but the ant rejects the sand and goes off with the sugar grain; so pious men lift the good from the bad.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: You can't dump one cup of sugar into the ocean and expect to get syrup. If everybody sweetened her own cup of water, then things would begin to change.
quotes.author: Florynce Kennedy

quotes.quote: Caramels are only a fad. Chocolate is a permanent thing.
quotes.author: Milton S. Hershey

quotes.quote: Sugar and chocolate, anything that boosts your serotonin levels, is something people, I think, crave.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.quote: You need a good, healthy diet - it's about finding out what your body needs. Sugar is a disaster for skin, as is white flour.
quotes.author: Thandie Newton

quotes.quote: Just a spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down.
quotes.author: Richard M. Sherman

quotes.quote: We don't need sugar to live, and we don't need it as a society.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: Sugar is not so sweet to the palate as sound to the healthy ear.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sugar is more present in America or England than it is in France. I think there is an addiction to sweetness.
quotes.author: Pierre Dukan

quotes.quote: If you're eating sugar throughout the day, you're spiking your blood sugar level and you're becoming a fat storing machine.
quotes.author: Jackie Warner

quotes.quote: Sugar is celebratory. Sugar is something that we used to enjoy. Now, it basically has coated our tongues. It's turned into a diet staple, and it's killing us.
quotes.author: Robert Lustig

quotes.quote: The optimum amount of sugar in a product became known as the 'bliss point.' Food inventors and scientists spend a huge amount of time formulating the perfect amount of sugar that will send us over the moon and send products flying off the shelves.
quotes.author: Michael Moss

quotes.quote: Suggestion is a literary strategy.
quotes.author: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.quote: Self-suggestion makes you master of yourself.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: If you do not act on a suggestion at first, you grow dull to its message.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: I think a dream is just a suggestion to start something out, do something.
quotes.author: Colonel Sanders

quotes.quote: Do not pay too much attention to the advice or suggestions of those around you.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: It is only too easy to make suggestions and later try to escape the consequences of what we say.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: A fine suggestion, a sketch with great feeling, can be as expressive as the most finished product.
quotes.author: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.quote: But when you're alone in the world, really alone, you have no choice but to be open to suggestions.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: The trouble with making intelligent suggestions is that you're apt to be appointed to carry them out.
quotes.author: Gene Brown

quotes.quote: Close your ears to all adverse suggestions. Never mind if people call you a fool and a dreamer. Dream on.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: We can make, to ourselves, very much stronger suggestions than anyone else can, whoever that person may be.
quotes.author: Emile Coue

quotes.quote: Once a suggestion has entered the general atmosphere of human thought, it is very difficult to neutralise it.
quotes.author: Patricia Wentworth

quotes.quote: Sometimes when people give you suggestions they are kind of making you nervous, you wonder whether you are doing something wrong.
quotes.author: Anupriya Goenka

quotes.quote: Be open to suggestions, but don't let anyone dictate how you should tell your story. Who can possibly tell your story better than you?
quotes.author: Giuseppe Bianco

quotes.quote: Advices, suggestions and opinions are good; better it would be to learn from them, then to follow them.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Reasoned arguments and suggestions which make allowance for the full difficulties of the state of war that exists may help, and will always be listened to with respect and sympathy.
quotes.author: Stafford Cripps

quotes.quote: The mere suggestion of fame and fortune casts a glamour all its own. It is rather alarming how quickly people will turn someone else's fiction into fact in order to support their own fictions of themselves.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: The mere suggestion that not speaking for a day can give you an appreciation of the social isolation that comes with the experience of disability, particularly those whose impairments prohibit them from communicating verbally, is insensitive at best.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: Unusual travel suggestions are dancing lessons from God.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: A man carries out suggestions the more wholeheartedly when he understands their aim.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: If you're going to knock down my suggestion, you'd better have one to replace it.
quotes.author: Alexandra Bracken

quotes.quote: Suicide is a form of murder - premeditated murder. It isn't something you do the first time you think of doing it. It takes getting used to. And you need the means, the opportunity, the motive. A successful suicide demands good organization and a cool head, both of which are usually incompatible with the suicidal state of mind.
quotes.author: Susanna Kaysen

quotes.quote: Suicide is a serious thing. And if you know anyone who is suicidal, you need to get them help. No one should be in pain. Everyone should love themselves.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: But in the end one needs more courage to live than to kill himself.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Did you really want to die? No one commits suicide because they want to die. Then why do they do it? Because they want to stop the pain.
quotes.author: Tiffanie DeBartolo

quotes.quote: Suicide creates a monstrous emotional upsurge of shame and guilt. Everyone participates in feeling responsible and even shamed at knowing the suicidal candidate. If these feelings are not healed the vampire of suicidal death can strike again and again.
quotes.author: Linda Lee Landon

quotes.quote: Suicide may also be regarded as an experiment -- a question which man puts to Nature, trying to force her to answer. The question is this: What change will death produce in a man's existence and in his insight into the nature of things? It is a clumsy experiment to make; for it involves the destruction of the very consciousness which puts the question and awaits the answer.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: From the perspective of the one committing suicide, his or her act can be one of the most perverse forms of moral manipulation, as it abandons those left behind to their shame, guilt, and grief. Suicide is something like a metaphysical "I gotcha!" It is often an attempt to kill or wound others.
quotes.author: Stanley Hauerwas

quotes.quote: Suicide sometimes proceeds from cowardice, but not always; for cowardice sometimes prevents it; since as many live because they are afraid to die, as die because they are afraid to live
quotes.author: Charles Caleb

quotes.quote: Anyone desperate enough for suicide...should be desperate enough to go to creative extremes to solve problems: elope at midnight, stow away on the boat to New Zealand and start over, do what they always wanted to do but were afraid to try.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: You think suicide is cowardly? I'll tell you what's cowardly. Hurting someone so much that they think ending their lives is the only way to make it better.
quotes.author: Ashley Purdy

quotes.quote: There are many who dare not kill themselves for fear of what the neighbors will say.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Sometimes I wonder if suicides aren't in fact sad guardians of the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: We couldn't imagine the emptiness of a creature who put a razor to her wrists and opened her veins, the emptiness and the calm.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: Suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem.
quotes.author: Phil Donahue

quotes.quote: I just couldn't live with myself knowing I had just killed myself.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: You have a choice. Live or die. Every breath is a choice. Every minute is a choice. To be or not to be.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: All healthy men have thought of their own suicide.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: We are all that girl on the bathroom floor. Rock bottom just means crisis. It is not the end. Life does not evict us from anything unless it's inviting us to something better.
quotes.author: Glennon Doyle Melton

quotes.quote: To anyone out there who's hurtingâ€”it's not a sign of weakness to ask for help. It's a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Take a shower, wash off the day. Drink a glass of water. Make the room dark. Lie down and close your eyes. Notice the silence. Notice your heart. Still beating. Still fighting. You made it, after all. You made it, another day. And you can make it one more. You're doing just fine.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Life is naturally unfair, if the troubles it brings are to be all acknowledged then we all should jump into the lagoon.
quotes.author: Michael Adegoke

quotes.quote: It is the way of weakened minds to see everything through a black cloud. The soul forms its own horizons; your soul is darkened, and consequently the sky of the future appears stormy and unpromising.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: Though I am often in the depths of misery, there is still calmness, pure harmony, and music inside me.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: You feel your strength in the experience of pain.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Mental pain is less dramatic than physical pain, but it is more common and also more hard to bear. The frequent attempt to conceal mental pain increases the burden: it is easier to say, "My tooth is aching" than to say, "My heart is broken."
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: All suicides of the insane are either devoid of any motive or determined by purely imaginary motives. Now, many voluntary deaths fall into neither category; the majority have motives, and motives not unfounded in reality. Not every suicide can therefore be considered insane, without doing violence to language.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: Life seems... a horrible fact. Sometimes I wonder how long I shall support it... I am not strong enough to live without happiness... I struggle through each new day working with suicidal thoughts early in the morning... Eight-and-twenty [years old], and living without hope.
quotes.author: Beatrice Webb

quotes.quote: I often thought of killing myself but then I wanted lunch.
quotes.author: Paula Fox

quotes.quote: I slipped a bullet into a chamber and, holding the revolver behind my back, spun the chambers [cylinders] round... I put the muzzle... into my right ear and pulled the trigger. There was a minute click, and looking down at the chamber I could see that the charge [the bullet] had moved into the firing position.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: To run away from trouble is a form of cowardice and, while it is true that the suicide braves death, he does it not for some noble object but to escape some ill.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: That's the thing about suicide. Try as you might to remember how a person lived his life, you always end up thinking about how he ended it.
quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

quotes.quote: Did you really want to die? No one commits suicide because they want to die. Then why do they do it? Because they want to stop the pain.
quotes.author: Tiffanie DeBartolo

quotes.quote: Nothing in my life has ever made me want to commit suicide more than people's reaction to my trying to commit suicide.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: When people kill themselves, they think they're ending the pain, but all they're doing is passing it on to those they leave behind.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: If you ever think about giving up, remember why you held on for so long.
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.quote: Suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem.
quotes.author: Phil Donahue

quotes.quote: The thought of suicide is a great consolation: by means of it one gets through many a dark night.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The only difference between a suicide and a martyrdom really is the amount of press coverage.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Suicide is man's way of telling God, 'You can't fire me - I quit.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: One said of suicide, As long as one has brains one should not blow them out. And another answered, But when one has ceased to have them, too often one cannot.
quotes.author: Francis H. Bradley

quotes.quote: There is but one truly serious philosophical problem, and that is suicide. Judging whether life is or is not worth living amounts to answering the fundamental question of philosophy. All the rest -- whether or not the world has three dimensions, whether the mind has nine or twelve categories -- comes afterward. These are games; one must first answer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: If suicide be supposed a crime, 'tis only cowardice can impel us to it. If it be no crime, both prudence and courage should engage us to rid ourselves at once of existence, when it becomes a burden.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: In most cases, suicide is a solitary event and yet it has often far-reaching repercussions for many others. It is rather like throwing a stone into a pond; the ripples spread and spread.
quotes.author: Alison Wertheimer

quotes.quote: Suicide is a fundamental human right. This does not mean that it is morally desirable. It only means that society does not have the moral right to interfere.
quotes.author: Thomas S Szasz

quotes.quote: The obsession with suicide is characteristic of the man who can neither live nor die, and whose attention never swerves from this double impossibility.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: Each victim of suicide gives his act a personal stamp which expresses his temperament, the special conditions in which he is involved, and which, consequently, cannot be explained by the social and general causes of the phenomenon.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: However great a man's fear of life, suicide remains the courageous act, the clear-headed act of a mathematician. The suicide has judged by the laws of chance -- so many odds against one that to live will be more miserable than to die. His sense of mathematics is greater than his sense of survival. But think how a sense of survival must clamor to be heard at the last moment, what excuses it must present of a totally unscientific nature.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: No one is promiscuous in his way of dying. A man who has decided to hang himself will never jump in front of a train.
quotes.author: A. Alvarez

quotes.quote: Suicide, moreover, was at the time in vogue in Paris: what more suitable key to the mystery of life for a skeptical society.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: There are many who dare not kill themselves for fear of what the neighbors will say.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Sometimes I wonder if suicides aren't in fact sad guardians of the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: If you are of the opinion that the contemplation of suicide is sufficient evidence of a poetic nature, do not forget that actions speak louder than words.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Razors pain you; rivers are damp; acids stain you; and drugs cause cramp. Guns aren't lawful; nooses give; gas smells awful; you might as well live.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: I decided that life rationally considered seemed pointless and futile, but it is still interesting in a variety of ways, including the study of science. So why not carry on, following the path of scientific hedonism? Besides, I did not have the courage for the more rational procedure of suicide.
quotes.author: Robert Sanderson Mulliken

quotes.quote: If you must commit suicide... always contrive to do it as decorously as possible; the decencies, whether of life or of death, should never be lost sight of.
quotes.author: George Borrow

quotes.quote: Just as when a man commits suicide he negates the body, this rational limit of subjectivity, so when he lapses into fantastic and trascendental practice he associates himself with embodied divine and ghostly appearances, namely, he negates in practice the difference between imagination and perception
quotes.author: Ludwig Andreas Feuerbach

quotes.quote: What difference is there between a smoker and a suicide, except that the one takes longer to kill himself than the other.
quotes.author: Jacob Balde

quotes.quote: Because if you kill yourself, you're also going to kill the people who love you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The first few days leading up to a teenager's suicide are usually very telling. Their behavior is transparent. There's multitude of indicators
quotes.author: Jeff Davis

quotes.quote: Gun suicides are usually committed with the dominant hand
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: The bravest thing I ever did was continuing my life when I wanted to die.
quotes.author: Juliette Lewis

quotes.quote: Place your hand over your heart, can you feel it? That is called purpose. You're alive for a reason so don't ever give up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Suicide doesn't end the chances of life getting worse, it eliminates the possibility of it ever getting any better.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The person who completes suicide, dies once. Those left behind die a thousand deaths, trying to relive those terrible moments and understand...Why?
quotes.author: Clark

quotes.quote: Your life is not over. Your life is important. Don't take your beauty fom the world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To anyone out there who's hurting—it's not a sign of weakness to ask for help. It's a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: There are far, far better things ahead than anything we leave behind.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: But in the end one needs more courage to live than to kill himself.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: When it is darkest, we can see the stars.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: All things are difficult before they are easy.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Grit your teeth and let it hurt. Don't deny it, don't be overwhelmed by it. It will not last forever.
quotes.author: Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Suicide is not a remedy.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.author: Carl Bard

quotes.quote: Suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem.
quotes.author: Phil Donahue

quotes.quote: If you want to show me that you really love me, don't say that you would die for me, instead stay alive for me.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: If someone listens, or stretches out a hand, or whispers a word of encouragement, or attempts to understand a lonely person, extraordinary things begin to happen.
quotes.author: Loretta Girzartis

quotes.quote: I hope you live a life you are proud of. If you find that you are not, I hope you have the strength to start all over again.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The world is a better place with you in it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If your heart is still beating, God is not done with you yet.
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: The pain passes, but the beauty remains.
quotes.author: Pierre August Renoir

quotes.quote: Sun is shining. Weather is sweet. Make you wanna move your dancing feet.

quotes.quote: It's a cruel season that makes you get ready for bed while it's light out.

quotes.quote: A perfect summer day is when the sun is shining, the breeze is blowing, the birds are singing, and the lawn mower is broken.

quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

The way the desert smells and the long, wistful sigh of wind rushing down from the mountains as the sun dips beneath the horizon.

quotes.quote: Summer set lip to earth's bosom bare, and left the flushed print in a poppy there.

quotes.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.

quotes.author: Peter Mayle

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Sunday brings along memories of childhood when I used to wake up to go to church. Then when I would return home there would be something special for breakfast. I miss those days.
quotes.author: Quincy Latte

quotes.quote: What does Sunday, the day of the Lord, mean for us? It is a day for rest and for family, but first of all a day for Him.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: On Sunday morning, I'm not nervous... I can't wait to tell what God wants me to say.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Start this Sunday morning with a clean heart. No doubt, no tears, no fear, no worry. Thank God for his priceless gifts & miracles throughout the world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sunday is a time when you sit back and reflect on all the blessings that you have received. Smile at all the good things that you are enjoying.
quotes.author: Sera Train

quotes.quote: Sunday is the core of our civilization, dedicated to thought and reverence.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A Sunday well-spent brings a week of content.
quotes.author: Traditional Proverb

quotes.quote: This is the day which the Lord hath made: Let us rejoice therein.
quotes.author: Psalms 118:24

quotes.quote: Palm Sunday's thought; Life is full of ups and downs. Glorify God during the ups and fully trust in Him during the downs.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sunday night I always cook if I can - if I'm home, I always cook.
quotes.author: John Key

quotes.quote: On Sunday night, my husband makes a five-course family dinner.
quotes.author: Soledad O'Brien

quotes.quote: A night of a Sunday can confuse the Monday morning, if Sunday's night dream is misinterpreted.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: On one Sunday Night remember your dreams that just stay behind.
quotes.author: Rubby 'N

quotes.quote: You're just like a Sunday morning feeling so comfortable and right. Be the wind, be the seas. Be whatever you please. But just be here on Sunday night.
quotes.author: Maureen McGovern

quotes.quote: Crazy on a Sunday night, you make me dance like a fool.
quotes.author: Uncle Kracker

quotes.quote: Sunday night's the night for loving and squeezing out the weekend's last drops. Sunday night's the night for forgiving. Maybe that's why they shut the shops.
quotes.author: Del Amitri

quotes.quote: It's Sunday nights and birds in flight. It's whistleing in the street. It's all you'll ever need.
quotes.author: Sandrine

quotes.quote: I don't mind Sunday night at all 'cause that's the night friends come to call and Monday to Friday go fast and another week is past.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Sunday night, you had a date, and from the looks of everything, it's clear that I don't rate.
quotes.author: Kay Starr

quotes.quote: Sunday is the golden clasp that binds together the volume of the week.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: We are on Sunday night because that is where they put us 30 odd years ago. I think we became a habit.
quotes.author: Morley Safer

quotes.quote: A Sunday well-spent brings a week of content.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sunday night was such a big night for television when I was growing up you know, The Wonderful World of Disney.
quotes.author: Scott Bakula

quotes.quote: Sunday evenings often feel like the weekend is over before it's even begun.
quotes.author: Catherine McCormack

quotes.quote: Sunday night and now I know how the night can pass slow.
quotes.author: Buffalo Tom

quotes.quote: I'm taking up praying on Sunday nights.
quotes.author: Jenny Lewis

quotes.quote: The road to freedom is bordered with sunflowers.
quotes.author: Martin Firrell

quotes.quote: Never look directly at the sun. Instead, look at the sunflower.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadow. It's what sunflowers do.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We're all golden sunflowers inside.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg
