quotes.quote: I faced the gaudy sunflower on her canvas bag -- it looked hand-painted and at last my eyes fell into hers. I said, 'Thanks for the card.' Her smile put the sunflower to shame. She walked off.
quotes.author: Jerry Spinelli

quotes.quote: Fame is the scentless sunflower, with gaudy crown of gold; But friendship is the breathing rose, with sweets in every fold.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: And the yellow sunflower by the brook, in autumn beauty stood.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: True friends are like bright sunflowers that never fade away, even over distance and time.
quotes.author: Marie Williams Johnstone

quotes.quote: Every friend is to the other a sun, and a sunflower also. He attracts and follows.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: The sunflower is a favorite emblem of constancy
quotes.author: Thomas Bulfinch

quotes.quote: Ah Sunflower, weary of time / Who countest the steps of the sun; / Seeking after that sweet golden clime / Where the traveller's journey is done
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Wherever the sun goes / The sunflower will follow / Through all of the pain / And all of the sorrow
quotes.author: Londrelle

quotes.quote: Sunflowers in spring, they're just like you / Sunflower wipe away your tears / All your doubts and fears / You were born to fly, so high
quotes.author: Alice Peacock

quotes.quote: Sunflower on the shoreline / Shining brightly underneath the moonlight / Caught me by surprise
quotes.author: Audio Medic

quotes.quote: Sunflowers growing / Through a crack in the sidewalk / Have what it takes to survive / Tough times pass / The things people do / Just to stay alive
quotes.author: Bob Crewe

quotes.quote: Sunflowers in the tall grass, / We were born to thrive but not born to last, and / I've been sleeping the rainy months away.
quotes.author: Andrew Capra

quotes.quote: The sunflowers / They lined her way that day / And smiled at the sky / As the birds flew on their way
quotes.author: Jetty Rae LLC

quotes.quote: Pick up a sunflower and count the florets running into its centre, or count the spiral scales of a pine cone or a pineapple, running from its bottom up its sides to the top, and you will find an extraordinary truth: recurring numbers, ratios and proportions.
quotes.author: Charles Jencks

quotes.quote: Someone was sitting in front of a sunflower, watching the sunflower, a cup of sun, and so I tried it too. It was wonderful; I felt the whole universe in the sunflower. That was my experience. Sunflower meditation. A wonderful confidence appeared. You can see the whole universe in a flower.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: When van Gogh paints sunflowers, he reveals, or achieves, the vivid relation between himself, as man, and the sunflower, as sunflower, at that quick moment of time. His painting does not represent the sunflower itself. We shall never know what the sunflower itself is. And the camera will visualize the sunflower far more perfectly than van Gogh can.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: You are a sunny garden, a very flowering place, where autumn's sun is stayed to tangle with your hair.
quotes.author: Peter Adams

quotes.quote: Petals ripening airy and fair / Sunny gates facing winds and sun / Swaying branches high and low / From the mellowed chestnut trees.
quotes.author: Dorian Petersen

quotes.quote: What we must mentally prepare ourselves for is to survive both sunny weather and stormy weather, even a typhoon.
quotes.author: Asad-Ul Iqbal Latif

quotes.quote: I cannot tell you how it was / But this I know: it came to pass / Upon a bright and sunny day / When May was young; ah, pleasant May.
quotes.author: Christina Rosetti

quotes.quote: When we were at a little distance from the church, the bells suddenly chimed out with a most cheerful sound, and sunny as the morning.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: It's a holiday weekend, and the refrigerator chills, the stove heats, the sink drains, the air conditioner cools, and the weather is sunny and clear.
quotes.author: Teresa Blooming

quotes.quote: Grab your coat, and get your hat / Leave your worry on the doorstep / Just direct your feet / To the sunny side of the street.
quotes.author: Dorothy Fields

quotes.quote: The sea of faith / Was once, too, at the full and round earth's shore / Lay like the folds of a bright girdle furled / But now I only hear / Its melancholy, long, withdrawing roar.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: She walks in beauty, like the night / Of cloudless climes and starry skies; / And all that's best of dark and bright / Meet in her aspect and her eyes.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: I feel a cool vein in the breeze, which braces my thought, and I pass with pleasure over sheltered and sunny portions of the sand where the summer's heat is undiminished, and I realized what a friend I am losing.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When we shift from the shady to the sunny side of the house, and sit there with an extra coat for warmth, our green and leafy and pulpy thoughts acquire color and flavor, and perchance a sweet nuttiness at last, worth your cracking.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: As fruits and leaves and the day itself acquire a bright tint just because they fall, so the year near its setting. October is it's sunset sky; November the later twilight.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Abundance is...a sunny day when you expected stormy weather.
quotes.author: Candy Paull

quotes.quote: Sunny days are warm in spring and summer. Sunny days are cool in fall and winter.
quotes.author: Martha Rustad

quotes.quote: When soft winds and sunny skies / With the green earth harmonize / And the young and dewy dawn / Bold as an unhunted fawn / Up the windless heaven is gone,-- / Laugh—for ambushed in the day,--/ Clouds and whirlwinds watch their prey.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: And there the goats, day after day, / Stray in sunny quietness, / Cropping here and cropping there, / As they pause and turn and pass, / Now a bit of heather spray, / Now a mouthful of the grass.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: My tale is told, the glad sunshine / Fell over its commencing line,— / It was a morn in June, the sun / Was blessing all it shone upon.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: I cannot endure to waste anything so precious as autumnal sunshine by staying in the house.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Ô, Sunlight! The most precious gold to be found on Earth.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: What makes your life rainy or sunny is your attitude towards life, not the attitude of life towards you!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Some friends are like sunny days, with false flames, oozing from afar, coming near without a dime.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Today, give a stranger one of your smiles. It might be the only sunshine he sees all day.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Who cares about the clouds when we're together? Just sing a song and bring the sunny weather.
quotes.author: Dale Evans

quotes.quote: A cloudy day is no match for a sunny disposition.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Staring up at the sky on a bright, sunny day makes me dream and gives me ideas.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: If you only walk on sunny days you'll never reach your destination.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Sunny days give us happiness; stormy days give us wisdom.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: After God perfected the sunrise, he created photographers, artists, and poets to ensure his feat remained immortal.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Give me odorous at sunrise a garden of beautiful flowers where I can walk undisturbed.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Next time a sunrise steals your breath or a meadow of flowers leave you speechless, remain that way. Say nothing, and listen as Heaven whispers, do you like it? I did it just for you.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: When I think about that sunrise that I woke up to that morning, I just feel like I got as close to nowhere as I could get, and found out that it was more of a place than anywhere I've been in a long time.
quotes.author: Hank Green

quotes.quote: God is now serving scoops of orange and raspberry sherbet on the horizon. What a beautiful sunrise!
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: We can only appreciate the miracle of a sunrise if we have waited in the darkness.
quotes.author: Sapna Reddy

quotes.quote: The grand show is eternal. It is always sunrise somewhere; the dew is never dried all at once; a shower is forever falling; vapor is ever rising. Eternal sunrise, eternal dawn and gloaming, on sea and continents and islands, each in its turn, as the round.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The sky is that beautiful old parchment in which the sun and the moon keep their diary.
quotes.author: Alfred Kreymborg

quotes.quote: As I watched the sun began its daily routine, casting golden hue and illuminating cities, I wondered, what an exemplary way to start my daily routine.
quotes.author: Val Uchendu

quotes.quote: We need to be reminded sometimes that a sunrise last but a few minutes. But its beauty can burn in our hearts eternally.
quotes.author: R. A. Salvatore

quotes.quote: Sunrise doesn't last all morning, a cloudburst doesn't last all day, seems my love is up and has left you with no warning. It's not always going to be this grey. All things must pass, all things must pass away.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: Every day a million miracles begin at sunrise!
quotes.author: Eric Jerome Dickey

quotes.quote: Sunrise paints the sky with pinks and the sunset with peaches. Cool to warm. So is the progression from childhood to old age.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Every sunset is also a sunrise. It all depends on where you stand.
quotes.author: Karl Schmidt

quotes.quote: It was harder to drown at sunrise than in darkness.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Get outside. Watch the sunrise. Watch the sunset. How does that make you feel? Does it make you feel big or tiny? Because there's something good about feeling both.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: With their backs to the sunrise they worship the night.
quotes.author: Robert Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Even if you cover the whole world with darkness, you can never stop the sun from rising.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: One of the things I associate with God is a sunrise. How many sunrises have you missed over the years, and God created that.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: At sunrise everything is luminous but not clear.
quotes.author: Norman Maclean

quotes.quote: Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Know where to find the sunrise and sunset times and note how the sky looks at those times, at least once.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: To stand by the beds at sunrise and see the flowers awake is a heavenly delight.
quotes.author: Celia Thaxter

quotes.quote: There is no sunrise so beautiful that it is worth waking me up to see it.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: I wouldn't be surprised if tomorrow was the Final Dawn, the last sunrise before the Earth and Sun are reshaped into computing elements.
quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quotes.quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.quote: If you want to be reminded of the love of the Lord, just watch the sunrise.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: May every sunrise hold more promise and every sunset hold more peace...
quotes.author: Umair Siddiqui

quotes.quote: There's a sunrise and a sunset every single day, and they're absolutely free. Don't miss so many of them.
quotes.author: Jo Walton

quotes.quote: Every sunrise gives you a new beginning and a new ending. Let this morning be a new beginning to a better relationship and a new ending to the bad memories. It's an opportunity to enjoy life, breathe freely, think and love. Be grateful for this beautiful day.
quotes.author: Norton Juster

quotes.quote: Sunsets, like childhood, are viewed with wonder not just because they are beautiful but because they are fleeting.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: Sunsets are so beautiful that they almost seem as if we were looking through the gates of Heaven.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Every sunset brings the promise of a new dawn.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sunset is a wonderful opportunity for us to appreciate all the great things the sun gives us!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Never waste any amount of time doing anything important when there is a sunset outside that you should be sitting under.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: It is almost impossible to watch a sunset and not dream.
quotes.author: Bern Williams

quotes.quote: To watch a sunset is to connect with the Divine.
quotes.author: Gina De Gorna

quotes.quote: Keep looking up! I learn from the past, dream about the future and look up. There's nothing like a beautiful sunset to end a healthy day.
quotes.author: Rachel Boston

quotes.quote: Twilight drops her curtain down, and pins it with a star.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: There's a special quality to the loneliness of dusk, a melancholy more brooding even than the night's.
quotes.author: Ed Gorman

quotes.quote: If I could lick the sunset, I'll bet it would taste like Neapolitan ice cream.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: The strange thing about the sunset is that we actually don't want the sun to set, we want it to stay right on the horizon, not below it, not above it, just right on it!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: At the end of the world the sunset is like a child smashing a pack of crayons into God's face.
quotes.author: Craig Stone

quotes.quote: The whisper of the dusk is night shedding its husk.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: The sunset caught me, turned the brush to copper, set the clouds to one great roof of flame above the earth.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Coatsworth

quotes.quote: Beyond the sundown is tomorrow's wisdom, today is going to be long, long ago.
quotes.author: Thomas Hornsby Ferril

quotes.quote: It was that hour of dusk when the streetlights and headlights come on but make little difference.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: Evening is a time of real experimentation. You never kind of want to look the same way.
quotes.author: Donna Karan

quotes.quote: Enjoy the beauty of a sunset nature's farewell kiss for the night.
quotes.author: Sharon Rene

quotes.quote: The sacred lamp of day / Now dipt in western clouds his parting ray.
quotes.author: Falconer

quotes.quote: Nature is painting for us, day after day, pictures of infinite beauty if only we have the eyes to see them.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Soon it got dusk, a grapy dusk, a purple dusk over tangerine groves and long melon fields; the sun the color of pressed grapes, slashed with burgundy red, the fields the color of love and Spanish mysteries.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: It seems there is more interest in sunsets than sunrises. Perhaps because innately we fear the dark.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Sunsets in themselves are generally superior to sunrises; but with the sunset we appreciate images drawn from departed peace and faded glory.
quotes.author: George Stillman Hillard

quotes.quote: People are just as wonderful as sunsets if you let them be. When I look at a sunset, I don't find myself saying, 'Soften the orange a bit on the right hand corner.' I don't try to control a sunset. I watch with awe as it unfolds.
quotes.author: Carl R. Rogers

quotes.quote: Don't forget:beautiful sunsets need cloudy skies.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Down sank the great red sun, and in golden, glimmering vapors Veiled the light of his face, like the Prophet descending from Sinai.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Bursts of gold on lavender melting into saffron. It's the time of day when the sky looks like it has been spray-painted by a graffiti artist.
quotes.author: Mia Kirshner

quotes.quote: One day, I watched the sun setting forty-four times......You know...when one is so terribly sad, one loves sunsets.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The redness has seeped from the day and night was arranging herself around us. Cooling things down, staining and dyeing the evening purple and blue black.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: Let the sun shine on me, for I care not for the moon
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't let the shadows of yesterday spoil the sunshine of tomorrow. Live for today.
quotes.author: Nandina Morris

quotes.quote: Most of the shadows of this life are caused by our standing in one's own sunshine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Today, give a stranger one of your smiles. It might be the only sunshine he sees all day.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Those who bring sunshine to the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.
quotes.author: Morris West

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you will never see the shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: It is the artist's business to create sunshine when the sun fails.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland

quotes.quote: Sunshine is a welcome thing. It brings a lot of brightness.
quotes.author: Jimmie Davis

quotes.quote: There is no investment you can make which will pay you so well as the effort to scatter sunshine and good cheer through your establishment.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Some people are so much sunshine to the square inch.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: He that will enjoy the brightness of sunshine, must quit the coolness of the shade.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Not in sorrow freely is never to open the bosom to the sweets of the sunshine.
quotes.author: William Gilmore Simms

quotes.quote: If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm.
quotes.author: Frank Lane

quotes.quote: The sun lay like a friendly arm across her shoulder.
quotes.author: Margorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: Sunshine all the time makes a desert.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: Before you let the sun in, mind it wipes its shoes.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: You've got to get out and pray to the sky to appreciate the sunshine; otherwise you're just a lizard standing there with the sun shining on you.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: Faith is the virtue of the storm, just as happiness is the virtue of sunshine.
quotes.author: Ruth Fulton Benedict

quotes.quote: It is eternity now. I am in the midst of it. It is about me and the sunshine.
quotes.author: Richard Jefferies

quotes.quote: Far away there in the sunshine are my brightest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them and try to follow where they lead.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcot

quotes.quote: Just living is not enough...one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Anderson

quotes.quote: A cloudy day is no match for a sunny disposition.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air's salubrity.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The sun does not shine for a few trees and flowers, but for the wide world's joy.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A light wind swept over the corn, and all nature laughed in the sunshine.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: The world goes up and the world goes down, the sunshine follows the rain; and yesterday's sneer and yesterday's frown can never come over again.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Make use of the sun while it shines.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: No one wins the Super Bowl accidentally. Be intentional, Be Passionate, Don't mail it in! You got this!
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Gambling, beer and football filled the horizons of their minds.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The super bowl is a Chinese noodle lover's dream.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: The easiest way to remember your future wife’s birthday is to marry her on Super Bowl Sunday.”
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: You may not win the Super Bowl. Your kids may not go on to be doctors and lawyers and everything may not go perfectly. That doesn't mean it was a bad plan or the wrong thing. It's just like a football season. Everything's not going to go perfect.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: Our goal was to win, to win a Super Bowl, but also to win in the right way, to be role models to our community, to represent Indianapolis, the state of Indiana and the National Football League.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: It's ridiculous for a country to get all worked up about a game—except the Super Bowl, of course. Now that's important.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: If you don't win a Super Bowl, you're not considered successful in the National Football League. I can remember, when we finally won that first one, feeling so good for the players and fans.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: I'm really happy and had such an amazing time performing at Super Bowl - wish I could relive it all over again.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: One of the reasons I connect to the Super Bowl is that I approach my shows like an athlete.
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.quote: Cancel the Super Bowl? That's like canceling Christmas!
quotes.author: Thomas Harris

quotes.quote: But a Super Bowl commercial is a game-changer, Lin and it'll be fun.
quotes.author: Loren Bouchard

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter if it was the Super Duper Bowl, it's still sports!!!
quotes.author: Phil Rosenthal

quotes.quote: I believe that a bad Super Bowl halftime show is still better than a soccer game.
quotes.author: Fax Bahr

quotes.quote: All night, life like a video / Prime time, something like a Super Bowl / But they don't really see me though
quotes.author: Christopher Gholson

quotes.quote: Super data stream, super squeaky clean / From the Super Bowl, what a supreme show / Super place to go, on board the super flow
quotes.author: Jonathan Howard Fugler

quotes.quote: Go for the touchdown. Yes, the touchdown! / Fourth down at the goal / Playing at a chance for the Super Bowl down
quotes.author: John Maus

quotes.quote: At the Super Bowl, but we in the dope game / Ten years strong in the same trap / Ten years blowing on that strong pack
quotes.author: Erik Ortiz

quotes.quote: Elevate your thoughts on the vibe that we brought / While we climbing we shine like a super bowl ring / You could do it too
quotes.author: Ali Shaheed Jones-Muhammad

quotes.quote: High rolling baby like I'm jumping on fire / Super Bowl pimp good Year on tire / Can I be a bird, I gotta be fly / Butterfly and spur, and I got a couple words
quotes.author: Kasseem Dean

quotes.quote: To love the Super Bowl, you only have to think what Januarys were like before it came along.
quotes.author: David N. Rosenthal

quotes.quote: This is like being in the super bowl. It's first down, you're on the one yard line, You either make a touchdown or you're hosed.
quotes.author: Joe Teti

quotes.quote: Football is, after all, a wonderful way to get rid of your aggressions without going to jail for it.
quotes.author: Heywood Hale Broun

quotes.quote: Going to the Super Bowl is not the reward. It's playing really well and winning.
quotes.author: Dan Quinn

quotes.quote: The Super Bowl is like a movie, and the quarterback is the leading man.
quotes.author: Leigh Steinberg

quotes.quote: In life, as in football, you won't go far unless you know where the goalposts are.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: You can go to the bank and borrow money, but you can't go to the bank and borrow a Super Bowl ring. The ring is like a crown.
quotes.author: Joe Greene

quotes.quote: The Super Bowl is Americana at its most kitsch and fun.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.quote: The chance of winning a Super Bowl in a city like New York, there's nothing like it. Once you win one, you get that bug to win another one, that edge.
quotes.author: Mark Sanchez

quotes.quote: Football is like life it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: We don’t get a chance to do that many things, and every one should be really excellent. Because this is our life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word―excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer.
quotes.author: Rick Pitino

quotes.quote: The mind is a superb instrument if used rightly. Used wrongly, however, it becomes very destructive. To put it more accurately... you usually don't use it at all. It uses you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: No matter where your lot may be cast, no power on earth can keep you from making a man of yourself, a superb character, a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: All things excellent are as difficult as they are rare.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: You become excellent, and when you become excellent, no-one can take that away from you.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing: It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The one excellent thing that can be learned from a lion is that whatever a man intends doing should be done by him with a whole-hearted and strenuous effort.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: One that desires to excel should endeavor in those things that are in themselves most excellent.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: An excellent man; he has no enemies; and none of his friends like him.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: No excellent soul is exempt from a mixture of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Not to be cheered by praise, not to be grieved by blame, but to know thoroughly one's own virtues or powers are the characteristics of an excellent man.
quotes.author: Saskya Pandita

quotes.quote: Men value things in three ways: as useful, as pleasant or sources of pleasure, and as excellent, or as intrinsically admirable or honorable.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.quote: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The pursuit of perfection is frustrating and a waste of time, because nothing is ever perfect. The pursuit of excellence is commendable and worthwhile. Therefore strive for excellence not perfection.
quotes.author: Alan Kulwicki

quotes.quote: Excellent memories are often coupled with feeble judgments.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Limitless like the ocean are your excellent qualities.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: If your attitude toward the world is good, you will obtain good results. If your attitude is excellent, excellent will your results.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: How we look - though it is superficial and immutable - has a huge impact on our lives.
quotes.author: Cameron Russell

quotes.quote: You will, in time, see and show others not just the superficial, but the details, the meanings, and the implications of all that you look at
quotes.author: Jay Maisel

quotes.quote: The exterior cannot do without the interior since it is from this, as from life, that it derives much of its inspiration and character.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.quote: While you are experimenting, do not remain content with the surface of things.
quotes.author: Ivan Pavlov

quotes.quote: On the surface, humans appear to hate conflict, but in reality, they seek it.
quotes.author: Nagaru Tanigawa

quotes.quote: Superficial goals lead to superficial results.
quotes.author: Attila the Hun

quotes.quote: If you can understand the inner life, then you can wear the uniform, the tattoos, or whatnot and realize that the things that are different about us become superficial.
quotes.author: Ethan Hawke

quotes.quote: Time and space are finite in extent, but they don't have any boundary or edge. They would be like the surface of the earth, but with two more dimensions.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: A long habit of not thinking a thing wrong gives it a superficial appearance of being right.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Superficial knowledge breeds arrogance; true knowledge induces humility.
quotes.author: Yasir Qadhi

quotes.quote: Superficial people find the extraordinary fascinating, and profound people find the ordinary riveting.
quotes.author: Julian Barbour

quotes.quote: Superficial observers have long criticized the United States for making a fetish of youth. This is unfair. Uniquely among modern organs of public and private administration, its national legislature rewards senility.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Pain is superficial, and therefore fear is. The torments of martyrdoms are probably most keenly felt by the by-standers
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is the nature of truth in general, as of some ores in particular, to be richest when most superficial.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: It is only the superficial qualities that last. Man's deeper nature is soon found out.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The difference between people and ideas is... only superficial.
quotes.author: Richard Rorty

quotes.quote: Only superficial minds approach an idea with delicacy.
quotes.author: Emile M Cioran

quotes.quote: Superficial similarities exist between Christianity and some ancient pagan religions. But careful study reveals that there are far more dissimilarities.
quotes.author: Carl E. Olson

quotes.quote: Don't buy into a superficial reality. It has an expiration date.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: Failures are like skinned knees, painful but superficial.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: All great expression, which on a superficial survey seems so easy as well as so simple, furnishes after a while, to the faithful observer, its own standard by which to appreciate it.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Image is powerful, but image is also superficial.
quotes.author: Cameron Russell

quotes.quote: When people rely on surface appearances and false racial stereotypes, rather than in-depth knowledge of others at the level of the heart, mind and spirit, their ability to assess and understand people accurately is compromised.
quotes.author: James A. Forbes

quotes.quote: As we get past our superficial material wants and instant gratification we connect to a deeper part of ourselves, as well as to others, and the universe.
quotes.author: Judith Wright

quotes.quote: The three great elemental sounds in nature are the sound of rain, the sound of wind in a primeval wood, and the sound of outer ocean on a beach.
quotes.author: Henry Beston

quotes.quote: External pressure seems to produce internal unity.
quotes.author: Kenneth Waltz

quotes.quote: Too many young folk have addiction to superficial things and not enough conviction for substantial things like justice, truth and love.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: Superficial religion consists of merely believing certain truths and doing certain things....such superficial religion is rampant in the world today.
quotes.author: David Platt

quotes.quote: External circumstances will not change until internal belief systems change.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: A hero can be anyone even a man doing something as simple and reassuring as putting a coat around a little boy's shoulder to let him know that the world hadn't ended.
quotes.author: Ben Affleck

quotes.quote: I want to be able to fly like a superhero. I won't be happy until I can fly across oceans and cities, saving people from being murdered.
quotes.author: Heather Graham

quotes.quote: This. This is what I am. This is who I am. Come hell or high water. If I deny it, I deny everything I've ever done. Everything I've ever fought for.
quotes.author: Oliver Green

quotes.quote: A hero can be anyone. Even a man doing something as simple and reassuring as putting a coat around a young boy's shoulders to let him know that the world hadn't ended.
quotes.author: Bruce Wayne

quotes.quote: You're going to make a difderence. A lot of times it won't be huge, it won't be visible even. But it will matter just the same.
quotes.author: James Gordon

quotes.quote: The fundament of a superhero is the guy in tights saving innocent people from bad things. It's amazing how infrequently that seems to happen in superhero comics these days.
quotes.author: Frank Miller

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: The door is more than it appears. It separates who you are from who you can be. You do not have to walk through it.
quotes.author: Franklin Richards

quotes.quote: Women are the real superheroes because they're not just working. They have a life and everything.
quotes.author: Vanessa Paradis

quotes.quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
quotes.author: Ben Parker

quotes.quote: A true hero isn't measured by the size of his strength, but by the size of his heart.
quotes.author: Zeus

quotes.quote: In a world of ordinary mortals, you are a wonder woman.
quotes.author: Queen Hippolyta

quotes.quote: We must be careful with our words â€“ we're like superheroes and words are like our super powers. Super powers should always be used to help others.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.quote: Superheroes were born in the minds of people desperate to be rescued.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Why do we fall, sir? So that we can learn to pick ourselves up.
quotes.author: Alfred Pennyworth

quotes.quote: The future is worth it. All the pain. All the tears. The future is worth the fight.
quotes.author: Martian Manhunter

quotes.quote: Any father can relate to feeling like a superhero when you put a Band-Aid on your kid.
quotes.author: Justin Hartley

quotes.quote: You can't relate to a superhero, to a superman, but you can identify with a real man who in times of crisis draws forth some extraordinary quality from within himself and triumphs but only after a struggle.
quotes.author: Timothy Dalton

quotes.quote: The measure of a superhero is always his nemesis.
quotes.author: David Lyons

quotes.quote: Especially in the world of fantasy and superheroes, it's great to have role models that aren't in skimpy little outfits, in impossible poses. That's so important for young women.
quotes.author: Kelley Armstrong

quotes.quote: We've always been ready for female superheroes. Because women want to be them and men want to do them.
quotes.author: Famke Janssen

quotes.quote: We've always known we'd eventually be called upon to open our shirts and save the day, and the superhero was a crude, hopeful attempt to talk about how we all might feel on that day of great power, and great responsibility.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: I believe there's a hero in all of us, that keeps us honest, gives us strength, makes us noble, and finally allows us to die with pride. Even though sometimes we have to be steady, and give up the thing we want most. Even our dreams.
quotes.author: Rosemary Harris

quotes.quote: We love our superheroes because they refuse to give up on us. We can analyze them out of existence, kill them, ban them, mock them, and still they return, patiently reminding us of who we are and what we wish we could be.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: Being a superhero is hard work. You have to save the world. But going to school is even harder. You have to save yourself.
quotes.author: Lenore Look

quotes.quote: You create superheroes to take care of problems that can't really be solved another way.
quotes.author: Robert Rodriguez

quotes.quote: I think a hero is any person really intent on making this a better place for all people.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I believe there's a hero in all of us, that keeps us honest, gives us strength, makes us noble, and finally allows us to die with pride, even though sometimes we have to be steady, and give up the thing we want the most. Even our dreams.
quotes.author: Tobey Maguire

quotes.quote: I wish I had a Kryptonite cross, because then you could keep both Dracula and Superman away.
quotes.author: Jack Handy

quotes.quote: What does it mean to be a superhero? We're all fighting for the better good. But, at the same time, I think what stands out is, as superheroes, you don't give up; you don't surrender. I think that's what makes a superhero.
quotes.author: Ellen Wong

quotes.quote: On a superhero show, you have to have people who are really human and who have the experience the audience is having.
quotes.author: Candice Patton

quotes.quote: Life is locomotion. If you're not moving you're not living. But there comes a time when you've got to stop running away from things and you've got to start running towards something. You've got to forge ahead. Keep moving even if your path isn't clear. Trust that you'll find your way.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Heroes are ordinary people who make themselves extraordinary.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Everything we have today that's cool comes from someone wanting more of something they loved in the past. Action figures, videogames, superhero movies, iPods: All are continuations of a love that wanted more.
quotes.author: Patton Oswalt

quotes.quote: A superhero is someone who, at some point or in some way, inspires hope or is the enemy of cynicism. Even if you bog it down with political allegory, or even if you're doing celebrity allegory. You still need to take the cynical out of it.
quotes.author: Mark Waid

quotes.quote: Every superhero has this superhero identity and a civilian identity. A lot of their lives are about code switching.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.quote: Superheroes were born in the minds of people desperate to be rescued.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: We like to think of our champions and idols as superheroes who were born different from us. We don't like to think of them as relatively ordinary people who made themselves extraordinary.
quotes.author: Carol S. Dweck

quotes.quote: Any superhero, regardless of how different they are from Superman, recalls Superman in some way. They're either pushing against Superman or reflecting Superman; there's something about them that comes from Superman.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.quote: The measure of a superhero is always his nemesis.
quotes.author: David Lyons

quotes.quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: There is a superhero inside all of us, we just need the courage to put on the cape.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Superheroes allow their capes to hang off their backs; but our Superwomen choose to wrap them around their heads.
quotes.author: Boonaa Mohammed

quotes.quote: A hero can be anyone. Even a man doing something as simple as putting a coat around a little boy's shoulders to let him know the world hadn't ended.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The fundament of a superhero is the guy in tights saving innocent people from bad things. It's amazing how infrequently that seems to happen in superhero comics these days.
quotes.author: Frank Miller

quotes.quote: A hero is a man who is afraid to run away.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
quotes.author: Ben Parker

quotes.quote: Heroes in motion tend to stay in motion, but villains in motion tend toward mass destruction.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: Being a superhero is a metaphor for a job that is overwhelming.
quotes.author: Laeta Kalogridis

quotes.quote: Most superheroes are painted with a specific moral objective that makes them who they are. And that moral objective influences everything they do, so there's an expectation for what you're going to see out of a certain character.
quotes.author: Josh Trank

quotes.quote: All health heroes are ordinary people who make themselves extraordinary.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: You create superheroes to take care of problems that can't really be solved another way.
quotes.author: Robert Rodriguez

quotes.quote: There's always a need for new superheroes. As society changes, the types of superheroes will probably change as well.
quotes.author: Matt Bomer

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a brother is even better than being a superhero.
quotes.author: Marc Brown

quotes.quote: A true hero isn't measured by the size of his strength, but by the strength of his heart.
quotes.author: Hercules

quotes.quote: A hero is somebody who is selfless, who is generous in spirit, who just tries to give back as much as possible and help people. A hero to me is someone who saves people and who really deeply cares.
quotes.author: Debi Mazar

quotes.quote: A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Being a superhero is hard work. You have to save the world. But going to school is even harder. You have to save yourself.
quotes.author: Lenore Look

quotes.quote: We must be careful with our words we're like superheroes and words are like our super powers. Super powers should always be used to help others.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.quote: Feelings of superiority always stem from an illusion.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The superiority of one mind over another depends on the rapidity with which experiences are thus organised.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.quote: Dominance is only for God.
quotes.author: Syed Islam

quotes.quote: The superior man is he who develops, in harmonious proportions, his moral, intellectual and physical nature.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: Permanent superiority has never been realized by any nation in history. After the rise comes the fall.
quotes.author: Paul Harris

quotes.quote: Many a superior brain is blockaded by inferior thoughts.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as human superiority.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: It is one mark of a superior mind to understand and be influenced by the superiority of others.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: The way of a superior man is threefold: virtuous, he is free from anxieties; wise, he is free from perplexities; bold, he is free from fear.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Whoever envies another confesses his superiority.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Continuously feeling superior is a characteristic of immaturity.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: The superiority of some men is merely local. They are great because their associates are little.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is always legitimate to wish to rise above one's self, never above others.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: Cool superiority as a mask for overflowing insecurity.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Tolerance is the assumption of superiority
quotes.author: Wendell Willkie

quotes.quote: In every society some men are born to rule, and some to advise.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The greatest threat to compassion is the temptation to succumb to fantasies of moral superiority.
quotes.author: Stephen Batchelor

quotes.quote: Whatever makes us feel superior to other people, whatever tempts us to convey a sense of superiority, that is the gravity of our sinful nature, not grace.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: It is not true that people are naturally equal for no two people can be together for even a half an hour without one acquiring an evident superiority over the other.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Most do violence to their natural aptitude, and thus attain superiority in nothing.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Racial superiority is a mere pigment of the imagination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There are a lot of people who are doing wonderful things, quietly, with no motive of greed, or hostility toward other people, or delusions of superiority.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: One of the easiest ways to dominate a man is to demand something he cannot supply.
quotes.author: Gene Wolf

quotes.quote: Superiority commits to protect those inferior.
quotes.author: Vincent Marc Hoherz

quotes.quote: Feelings of inferiority and superiority are the same. They both come from fear.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: The superior man is the providence of the inferior. He is eyes for the blind, strength for the weak, and a shield for the defenseless. He stands erect by bending above the fallen. He rises by lifting others.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: One must change one's tactics every ten years if one wishes to maintain one's superiority.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Superiority is always detested.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: The superior man thinks always of virtue; the common man thinks of comfort.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Superman don't need no seat belt.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: When Superman came out it galvanized the entire industry. It's just part of the American scene.
quotes.author: Jack Kirby

quotes.quote: 'Superman' has always been about Lois Lane, Superman and Clark Kent and this love triangle between these three people who really are only two people.Â
quotes.author: Bryan Singer

quotes.quote: The fact is that Superman isn't around because he is the oldest superhero. He's still around because he is a great superhero. He's the guy that spawned the entire genre, and that didn't happen because it was a mediocre idea.
quotes.author: Gary Frank

quotes.quote: What's special about Superman is that he will always make the right choice.
quotes.author: Max Landis

quotes.quote: Superman's original name was Kal-El, or Swift God. His father's name was Jor-El. Superman was clearly drawn as a modern-day god.
quotes.author: Bruce Feiler

quotes.quote: What makes Superman a hero is not that he has power, but that he has the wisdom and the maturity to use the power wisely.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Nobody beats Superman. Everybody else needs a costume - Superman needs a costume to be normal.
quotes.author: Big Show

quotes.quote: A man is a man to the extent that he is a superman. A man should be defined by the sum of those tendencies which impel him to surpass the human condition.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: Superman has always symbolized the good traits of humanity (ironically).
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: And the spirit of Superman is great to have around.Â
quotes.author: Brandon Routh

quotes.quote: You can't have a Superman that is battling cultural morality. You need a Superman that has built in sort of values
quotes.author: Zack Snyder

quotes.quote: Superman is such an old character. He's an old character with this huge legacy behind him. And one of the awesome things about the fact that he's been around for these decades is that he's gone through these different phases.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.quote: How come Superman could stop bullets with his chest, but always ducked when someone threw a gun at him
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Superman is precisely what we should be teaching our children. Superman inspires us to our best.
quotes.author: Greg Rucka

quotes.quote: The superman is a premature ideal, one that presupposes man.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Superman! Champion of the oppressed. The physical marvel who had sworn to devote his existence to helping those in need.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: For a lot of people, Superman is and has always been America's hero. He stands for what we believe is the best within us: limitless strength tempered by compassion, that can bear adversity and emerge stronger on the other side. He stands for what we all feel we would like to be able to stand for, when standing is hardest.
quotes.author: J Michael Straczynski

quotes.quote: Initially, kids are attracted to Superman as a hero because he can take care of problems and still appear as friendly as your dad.
quotes.author: Paul Dini

quotes.quote: Superman can fly high way up in the sky â€˜cause we believe he can. So what we choose to believe can always work out fine... It's all in the mind.
quotes.author: Luther Vandross

quotes.quote: Superman was created in the late 1930s, and humankind's idea of what the future would be was very different.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.quote: You wanted to be the Superman who was never Clark Kent.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Superman has been around for so long; he's been around for, what, eight decades now? And he goes through these different eras where different aspects of who he is get emphasized.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.quote: Superman is, after all, an alien life form. He is simply the acceptable face of invading realities.
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote: Superman when he goes after someone is essentially not trying to beat them, he is trying to save them from themselvesâ€¦
quotes.author: Max Landis

quotes.quote: The whole point of Superman, as originally created, was to be the ally of those who had no other allies. It put that magnitude of power, the most powerful guy in the world, in the service of those who had no hope, no chance.Â
quotes.author: J Michael Straczynski

quotes.quote: He turns all of his injuries into strengths, that which does not kill him makes him stronger, he is superman.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I teach you the superman. Man is something to be surpassed.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Unlike Batman and Spiderman, Superman stands alone. Superman was born Superman. When Superman wakes up in the morning, he is Superman.
quotes.author: David Carradaine

quotes.quote: Superman was a hero. / We saw him leaping high. / Now his noble spirit can teach us how to fly. / Superman was a savior. / We saw him rescue dames.
quotes.author: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.quote: If more people follow their superpowers - and everyone has one - then we're going to be better as a society.
quotes.author: Adam Neumann

quotes.quote: Not resisting is a superpower. Not resisting bad situations is a rare, but necessary quality. It's the other side of stress, anxiety, depression, fear. It is to find yourself in a beautiful natural state of being.
quotes.author: Alan Maiccon

quotes.quote: Your contagiousness is a superpower. With great power comes great response-ability.
quotes.author: Anese Cavanaugh

quotes.quote: I don't know why people are so keen to put the details of their private life in public; they forget that invisibility is a superpower.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: A shame really, because putting the right book in the right kid’s hands is kind of like giving that kid superpowers.
quotes.author: Cecil Castellucci

quotes.quote: Thus far, the only people who can grant you immortality are not scientists, but writers. By writing you into their books, they may not only immortalize you, but also grant you superpowers.
quotes.author: Charbel Tadros

quotes.quote: If I had a superpower, it would be to teleport. The idea of seeing the world in one day is exciting, but the thought of not checking bags almost moves me to tears.
quotes.author: Colton Underwood

quotes.quote: If I could have a superpower, I would choose the ability to make people's heart stop, if I just point at them.
quotes.author: Damon Wayans

quotes.quote: Under the stars,I tried to sleep,but for once in my life couldn't.My mutant super power-the ability to nod off at at the drop of a hat,any time,anywhere-had deserted me.
quotes.author: James Lovegrove

quotes.quote: I believe it's time that women truly owned their superpowers and used their beauty and strength to change the world around them.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.quote: Having a superpower has nothing to do with the ability to fly or jump, or superhuman strength. The truest superpowers are the ones we all possess: willpower, integrity, and most importantly, courage.
quotes.author: Jason Reynolds

quotes.quote: I think the power of persuasion would be the greatest superpower of all time.
quotes.author: Jenny Mollen

quotes.quote: What if, like Superman, everyone is born with powers to discover and grow into? And what if, like Batman, everyone has resources to uncover and utilize?
quotes.author: Jolene Stockman

quotes.quote: Invisibility can be good as a superpower. But psychiatry reveals people don't like it very much.
quotes.author: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.quote: The truth is that there’s something unique about each and every one of us. Everyone has a superpower of one kind or another.
quotes.author: Lizzie Velásquez

quotes.quote: I like to think I have a superpower called dyslexia. I am creative, intuitive, and empathetic. I am great with problem-solving, and I can think outside the box.
quotes.author: Lorin Morgan-Richards

quotes.quote: We can change the world if we change ourselves. We just need to get hold of the old patterns of thinking and dealing with things and start listening to our inner voices and trusting our own superpowers.
quotes.author: Nina Hagen

quotes.quote: You don't need superpowers to be someones hero.
quotes.author: Ricky Maye

quotes.quote: If I could have one superpower, I'd want to have the power of mind over matter. I'd want to be able to move things and people with my mind.
quotes.author: Shaun Alexander

quotes.quote: I discovered that my insecurities and my flaws were things that I actually need to embrace, and I let them become my superpowers.
quotes.author: Skylar Grey

quotes.quote: To win, you have to be clear about your superpower, and you make that differentiation clear to your customers. Otherwise, you remain part of the noise.
quotes.author: Steve Woodruff

quotes.quote: I am a superhero, and one of my superpowers is that I have the gift to see the potential in others that they don’t always see in themselves.
quotes.author: Tamara Paul

quotes.quote: If I have superpowers, I would eliminate all negative people and all negativity from this world.
quotes.author: Vivek Oberoi

quotes.quote: Superstars think like superstars long before the fans or the press anoint them.
quotes.author: John Eliot

quotes.quote: Every era that comes along has a superstar that emerges. Once we are out of the game, there will be a superstar who will emerge that everyone will notice.
quotes.author: Lennox Lewis

quotes.quote: Superstars perform so naturally and so instinctively that they seem to be able to enter a pressure-packed situation that would terrify or freeze most people as if nothing matters. They let it happen, let it go. They couldn't care less about the results.
quotes.author: John Eliot

quotes.quote: There is one common thing in superstars - enthusiasm and humility towards their work. Off sets, they are big stars for others, and they carry themselves the way they want to. When they are working, they are not stars.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.quote: You are your own superstar, and only you can shape the movie that you make.
quotes.author: Roger Hodgson

quotes.quote: The ones who become stars or superstars are the ones who have a head on their shoulders and know how to use it.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: I think what separates a superstar from the average ballplayer is that he concentrates just a little bit longer.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: Becoming a superstar takes about 10,000 hours of hard work.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: It's not a matter of becoming a superstar. Fame and money aren't the purpose of all this. No actor's going to say, 'I don't want to be famous.' But the main purpose for doing what I'm doing is the passion in the work.
quotes.author: Christopher Lambert

quotes.quote: Any artist that is even surviving right now is a dark horse because things change pretty fast. You're a superstar one day and wake up the next day and you're anonymous. To be successful in any way is beating the odds right now, I think.
quotes.author: Chad Kroeger

quotes.quote: Everyone is a superstar...But most people are too focused on other people's stars that they didn't see theirs.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The press frequently sneers at the hype devoted to a superstar, but the press itself is responsible for all the hype.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: The Beach Boys are not a superstar group. The music is the superstar of the group.
quotes.author: Dennis Wilson

quotes.quote: Timing is everything. It is not so much about who you know, especially now with the Internet, because anybody can become a superstar overnight.
quotes.author: Frankie Knuckles

quotes.quote: Even superstars like Beyonce depend on nervous energy to give a good show.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you've got a guitar and a lot of soul, just bang something out and mean it. You're the superstar.
quotes.author: Krist Novoselic

quotes.quote: Even the superstars need to be coached once in a while.
quotes.author: Adam Oates

quotes.quote: Superstition is the poetry of life.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Superstition is the spleen of the soul.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Superstition is only the fear of belief, while religion is the confidence.
quotes.author: Countess of Blessington

quotes.quote: Superstition is an enemy to civil liberty.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Superstition is an unreasoning fear of God.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Superstition is the only religion of which base souls are capable of.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Conscience without judgment is superstition.
quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The superstition of science scoffs at the superstition of faith.
quotes.author: James A. Froude

quotes.quote: A superstition is a premature explanation that overstays its time.
quotes.author: George Iles

quotes.quote: Superstitions are, for the most part, but the shadows of great truths.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Superstition sets the whole world in flames, but philosophy douses them.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Superstition, like true love, needs time to grow and reflect upon itself.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Superstition would seem to be simply cowardice in regard to the supernatural.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: Superstition is the need to view the world in terms of simple cause and effect.
quotes.author: Bernard Beckett

quotes.quote: Superstitions are man's way of trying to control things he has no control over.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: A new type of superstition has got hold of people's minds, the worship of the state.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: You'll find superstition a contagious thing. Some people let it get the better of them.
quotes.author: Curt Siodmak

quotes.quote: Superstition is to religion what astrology is to astronomy the mad daughter of a wise mother.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The general root of superstition is that men observe when things hit, and not when they miss, and commit to memory the one, and pass over the other.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The master of superstition is the people, and in all superstition wise men follow fools, and arguments are fitted to practice in a reversed order.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Superstition is not, as has been defined, an excess of religious feeling, but a misdirection of it, an exhausting of it on vanities of man's devising.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: A superstition which pretends to be scientific creates a much greater confusion of thought than one which contents itself with simple popular practices.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.quote: There is but one thing that can free a man from superstition, and that is belief. All history proves it. The most sceptical have ever been the most credulous.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: The way to deal with superstition is not to be polite to it, but to tackle it with all arms, and so rout it, cripple it, and make it forever infamous and ridiculous.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: The realm of superstitions, fortune-telling, presentiments, intuition, dreams, all this is the inner life of a human being, and all this is the hardest thing to film.
quotes.author: Krzysztof Kieslowski

quotes.quote: When superstition is allowed to perform the task of old age in dulling the human temperament, we can say goodbye to all excellence in poetry, in painting, and in music.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: The superstition that the hounds of truth will rout the vermin of error seems, like a fragment of Victorian lace, quaint, but too brittle to be lifted out of the showcase.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.quote: It is safe to say that no other superstition is so detrimental to growth, so enervating and paralyzing to the minds and hearts of the people, as the superstition of Morality.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Superstitions typically involve seeing order where in fact there is none, and denial amounts to rejecting evidence of regularities, sometimes even ones that are staring us in the face.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.quote: A manager must appreciate and understand the importance of every resource he has. There is a specific purpose for every resource. It is the duty of the manager to utilise the resources to the fullest in the most appropriate manner.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: A good leader is a person who takes a little more than his share of the blame and a little less than his share of the credit.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The true measure of the value of any business leader and manager is performance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Leaders are visionaries with a poorly developed sense of fear and no concept of the odds against them.
quotes.author: Robert Jarvik

quotes.quote: A good boss makes his men realize they have more ability than they think they have so that they consistently do better work than they thought they could.
quotes.author: Charles Erwin Wilson

quotes.quote: You can be your own boss.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: To be a manager, one must be able to manage her own relationship with the people around her, as well as the relationships among his subordinates. Just being perfect in paperwork and operations does not make one a good manager.
quotes.author: Sophie Rose

quotes.quote: As a manager, the more consistent you are, the better off you are. It's easy to be up when things go well. When things don't go well, the players will follow your lead. So you have to be consistent and upbeat, which takes some work sometimes.
quotes.author: Terry Francona

quotes.quote: The one word that makes a good manager - decisiveness.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: A manager is a guide. He takes a group of people and says, 'With you I can make us a success; I can show you the way.'
quotes.author: Arsene Wenger

quotes.quote: Being a leader is making the people you love hate you a little more each day.
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: A manager must always provide the employees opportunities to continuously improve their skills and reassure them that they have a promising future.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: A manager is an assistant to his men.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: A good manager is a man who isn't worried about his own career but rather the careers of those who work for him.
quotes.author: H. S. M. Burns

quotes.quote: A good manager will always have the big picture in mind and guide the employees through a series of small targets in order to achieve overall success.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: A smart manager will establish a culture of gratitude. Expand the appreciative attitude to suppliers, vendors, delivery people, and of course, customers.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: A leader is a dealer in hope.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A manager is not a person who can do the work better than his men; he is a person who can get his men to do the work better than he can.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Smith

quotes.quote: A manager is responsible for the application and performance of knowledge.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: A wise manager knows that it is sometimes more important to listen than to talk.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: When you hire people who are smarter than you are, you prove you are smarter than they are.
quotes.author: Richard Grant

quotes.quote: The big mistake people make is thinking it's a party when it's really a business affair. One should go with the recognition that the bosses and the human resources people are watching them.
quotes.author: John McKee

quotes.quote: People work for people, not for companies. A worker's regard for his supervisor will affect his opinion of his employer. Production is related to attitude, so much so that an organization which disregards this human equation will not achieve as much as it could achieve.
quotes.author: Gerard R. Griffin

quotes.quote: No employee should report to more than one supervisor so that the employee knows with absolute clarity what he or she is expected to do.
quotes.author: Fayol

quotes.quote: The rule of yin yang suggests that organizations succeed best when managers and staff regard each other as complementary, not as adversaries. Fairness and trust in relationships are essential if this is to be achieved.
quotes.author: Fayol

quotes.quote: A key element of management is encouraging subordinates to take responsibility and become better managers in their own right, using delegated power more effectively.
quotes.author: Fayol

quotes.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: Let's talk about vision and mission, roles, and goals. I want to make a meaningful contribution.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: A good leader is not the person who does things right, but the person who finds the right things to do.
quotes.author: Anthony S. Dadovano

quotes.quote: To lead the people, walk behind them.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Encourage, lift and strengthen one another. For the positive energy spread to one will be felt by us all. For we are connected, one and all.
quotes.author: Deborah Day

quotes.quote: If you want to support others you have to stay upright yourself.
quotes.author: Peter Heg

quotes.quote: It is an eternal obligation toward the human being not to let him suffer from hunger when one has a chance of coming to his assistance.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: He stands erect by bending over the fallen. He rises by lifting others.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: It is a kingly act to assist the fallen.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Never reach out your hand unless you're willing to extend an arm.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fuller

quotes.quote: To keep a lamp burning we have to keep putting oil in it.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Life's most urgent questions is: 'What are you doing for others?'
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: When a person is down in the world, an ounce of help is better than a pound of preaching.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: The truest help we can render an afflicted man is not to take his burden from him, but to call out his best energy, that he may be able to bear the burden.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: If you have much, give of your wealth; if you have little, give of your heart.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: Support the strong, give courage to the timid, remind the indifferent, and warn the opposed.
quotes.author: Whitney M. Young

quotes.quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only thing you could do for people was to be there.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Helping others isn't a chore; it is one of the greatest gifts there is.
quotes.author: Liya Kebede

quotes.quote: To give aid to every poor man is far beyond the reach and power of every man. Care of the poor is incumbent on society as a whole.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: To aid life, leaving it free, however, that is the basic task of the educator.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Helping people getting a great start in life, a great foundation, is an investment.
quotes.author: Gerry Schwartz

quotes.quote: Give, but give until it hurts.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Look up and not down. Look forward and not back. Look out and not in, and lend a hand.
quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

quotes.quote: Never look down on anybody unless you helping him up.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: When you cease to make a contribution, you begin to die.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Everybody can be great...because anybody can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something I can do.
quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

quotes.quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but reveal to them their own.
quotes.author: Disraeli

quotes.quote: Surfing is for life.
quotes.author: Bruce Jenkins

quotes.quote: The joy of surfing is so many things combined, from the physical exertion of it, to the challenge of it, to the mental side of the sport.
quotes.author: Kelly Slater

quotes.quote: The best surfer out there is the one having the most fun.
quotes.author: Duke Kahanamoku

quotes.quote: Surfing's one of the few sports that you look ahead to see what's behind.
quotes.author: Laird Hamilton

quotes.quote: You cannot stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: There are a million ways to surf, and as long as you're smiling you're doing it right.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My passion for surfing was more than my fear of sharks.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.quote: Life is a lot like surfing...When you get caugh in the impact zone, you've got to just get back up. because you never know what may be the next wave.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.quote: Surfing is attitude dancing.
quotes.author: Gerry Lopez

quotes.quote: We're all equal before a wave.
quotes.author: Laird Hamilton

quotes.quote: Your surfing can get better on every turn, on every wave you catch. Learn to read the ocean better. A big part of my success has been wave knowledge.
quotes.author: Kelly Slater

quotes.quote: If you're having a bad day, catch a wave.
quotes.author: Frosty Hesson

quotes.quote: One of the greatest things about the sport of surfing is that you need only three things: your body, a surf-board, and a wave.
quotes.author: Naima Green

quotes.quote: Surfing is such an amazing concept. You're taking on Nature with a little stick and saying, 'I'm gonna ride you!' And a lot of times Nature says, 'No you're not!' and crashes you to the bottom.
quotes.author: Jolene Blalock

quotes.quote: Surfing is not an organized sport, but it does have rules. The surfer closest to the curl has the right of way.
quotes.author: Matt Armstrong

quotes.quote: Surfing, alone among sports, generates laughter at its very suggestion, and this is because it turns not a skill into an art, but an inexplicable and useless urge into a vital way of life.
quotes.author: Matt Warshaw

quotes.quote: Surfing expresses ... a pure yearning for visceral, physical contact with the natural world.
quotes.author: Matt Warshaw

quotes.quote: The balance and patience factors are much more critical in surfing than they are in snowboarding ... if you're out surfing serious waves and you wipe out, you don't land on soft snow. It's usually either very sharp coral, or you get raked across the beach gravel and sand while you're tumbling underwater.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Surfing equates to living in the very moment of now'. When you ride a wave you leave behind all things important and unimportant, the purity of the moment is upon you.
quotes.author: Bill Hamilton

quotes.quote: Three most important things in life, surf, surf and surf.
quotes.author: Jack O'Neill

quotes.quote: Surf and feel your life be changed forever.
quotes.author: Nossa Company

quotes.quote: There's an independence to surfing, it's just you and the ocean. There aren't a bunch of rules.
quotes.author: Lee Clow

quotes.quote: One thing you learn from surfing is how to operate in the present. It's really what the surfing experience is all about.
quotes.author: Gerry Lopez

quotes.quote: There is wisdom in waves. Some surfers see it right away, others never do. To find success in surfing, we must learn to be in harmony with nature. This will bring a sense of peace. By sharing this peace, and contributing to other people's happiness, we can find the true meaning of life. Keep surfing . . .
quotes.author: Gerry Lopez

quotes.quote: Surfing is good for the soul, worries seems to drift away as you scan the horizon for the next wave.
quotes.author: Ed Daley

quotes.quote: Surfing is like life. Every wave and every day are different.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For a surfer, the fluidity of the ocean - of being in it - is what matters.
quotes.author: Alan 'Fuz' Bleakley

quotes.quote: I still feel like my best surfing is ahead of me.
quotes.author: Kelly Slater

quotes.quote: Surfing gets your soul, once you feel the wave lift you up and thrust you forward you begin to realise how powerful but beautiful mother nature is and how vast the universe really is, this cant help but smile on your face in absolute awe of how beautiful it is to have participated in life.
quotes.author: Fisher Cannon

quotes.quote: Surfing is like golf: You're always battling, and it keeps knocking you down. There are a lot of wipeouts. But when you stay with it and catch that wave, you really taste it. It's magic.
quotes.author: Dennis Quaid

quotes.quote:
Surgeons must be very careful when they take the knife!
Underneath their fine incisions stirs the Culprit - Life!
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Surgeons can cut out everything except cause.
quotes.author: Herbert M Shelton

quotes.quote: As a surgeon you have to have a controlled arrogance. If it's uncontrolled, you kill people, but you have to be pretty arrogant to saw through a person's chest, take out their heart and believe you can fix it. Then, when you succeed and the patient survives, you pray, because it's only by the grace of God that you get there.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: It is the surgeon's duty to tranquillize the temper, to beget cheerfulness, and to impart confidence of recovery.
quotes.author: Astley Cooper

quotes.quote: Every surgeon carries within himself a small cemetery, where from time to time he goes to pray.
quotes.author: Rene Leriche

quotes.quote: The surgeon may harden himself whilst performing an operation, for he knows that he is acting for the good of his patient; but if we were intentionally to neglect the weak and helpless, it could only be for a contingent benefit, with an overwhelming present evil.Â
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: A surgeon is surrounded by people who are sick, discouraged, afraid, embittered, dying - but also courageous, loving, wise, compassionate and alive.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote: Surgeon: A man who's always out for his cut.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A good surgeon doesn't just concentrate on technical ability, but also on the appropriateness of what you're doing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.quote: A good surgeon operates with his hand, not with his heart.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas
