quotes.quote: The surgeon should not love difficult cases and should not allow himself to be tempted to undertake those that are desperate. He should help the poor as far as he can, but he should not hesitate to ask for good fees from the rich.
quotes.author: Guido Lanfranchi

quotes.quote: A surgeon should give as little pain as possible while he is treating the patient, and no pain at all when he charges his fee.
quotes.author: Reginald Pound

quotes.quote: The surgeon is a man of action. By temperament and by training he prefers to serve the sick by operating on them, and he inwardly commiserates with a patient so unfortunate as to have a disease not suited to surgical treatment. Young surgeons, busy mastering the technicalities of the art, are particularly alert to seize every legitimate opportunity to practice technical maneuvers, the more complicated the better.Â
quotes.author: Stanley O. Hoerr

quotes.quote: The surgeon knows all the parts of the brain but he does not know his patient's dreams.
quotes.author: Richard Selzer

quotes.quote: To be great, a surgeon must have a fierce determination to be the leader in his field. He must have a driving ego, a hunger beyond money. He must have a passion for perfectionism. He is like the actor who wants his name in lights.Â
quotes.author: Donald B. Effler

quotes.quote: It's a beautiful day to save lives. Let's have some fun.
quotes.author: Derek Shepherd

quotes.quote: Technically, according to the notion of the will of God, there is no such a thing as a competent surgeon.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: And If the surgeon is like a poet, then the scars you have made on countless bodies are like verses into the fashioning of which you have poured your soul.
quotes.author: Richard Selzer

quotes.quote: True teaching cannot be learned from text-books any more than a surgeon can acquire his skill by reading about surgery.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: A successful surgeon should be a man who, when asked to name the three best surgeons in the world, would have difficulty deciding on the other two.
quotes.author: Denton Cooley

quotes.quote: A rich man's faults are covered with money, but a surgeon's faults are covered with earth.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: I was thinking that surgeons had to be the happiest people on earth. To cut people up and get paid for it-that's happiness, I told myself.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: He who wishes to be a surgeon should go to war.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Surgeon general's job is to protect, promote and advance the health, safety and security of the nation.
quotes.author: Richard Carmona

quotes.quote: To be a good surgeon, you need to commit to being a good surgeon. It's as simple as that. You need to be meticulous in the small things, not just in the operating room, but outside. A good surgeon would want to redo this knot.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: What made someone a real surgeon. I asked. Ghosh didn't hesitate: "Passion for his craft ... and skill, dexterity. His hands were always 'quiet'. I mean he had no wasted movements, no dramatic gestures.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: Small pieces of skin may be missing. Even the world's greatest plastic surgeon won't be able to prevent a scar.
quotes.author: Michael J. Collins

quotes.quote: I make it clear that when a surgeon who has been in practice for thirty years tries to make himself look good by making a medical student look bad it is the questioner not the questioned, who should be
quotes.author: Michael J. Collins

quotes.quote: I'm a surgeon now. I spend my days in quiet, sterile operating rooms replacing knees and repairing rotator cuffs. A hard day in the hole would kill me. I'm a surgeon now. I spend my days in quiet, sterile operating rooms replacing knees and repairing rotator cuffs. A hard day in the hole would kill me.
quotes.author: Michael J. Collins

quotes.quote: A trained surgeon is also a potential killer, and an important bit of the training lies in accepting the fact. Your intent is entirely benign - or at least you hope so - but your are laying violent hands on someone, and you must be ruthless in order to do it effectively. And sometimes the person under your hands will die, and knowing that . . . you do it anyway
quotes.author: Diana Gabaldon

quotes.quote: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Wait long enough, and people will surprise and impress you.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Do not know yourself. I want to continue to surprise me.
quotes.author: Arielle Dombasle

quotes.quote: Would you like to know your future? If your answer is yes, think again. Not knowing is the greatest life motivator. So enjoy, endure, survive each moment as it comes to you in its proper sequence, a surprise.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The moments of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: Expect nothing. Live frugally on surprise.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: To be prepared against surprise is to be trained. To be prepared for surprise is to be educated.
quotes.author: James P. Carse

quotes.quote: The most delightful surprise in life is to suddenly recognise your own worth.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: I try not to be surprised. Surprise is the public face of a mind that has been closed.
quotes.author: Bernard Beckett

quotes.quote: Where will I be five years from now? I delight in not knowing. That's one of the greatest things about life, its wonderful surprises.
quotes.author: Marlo Thomas

quotes.quote: In moments of surprise we catch at least a glimpse of the joy to which gratefulness opens the door.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: Our brightest blazes of gladness are commonly kindled by unexpected sparks.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Surprise comes from defying expectations.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: In life the only thing that you can expect is the unexpected; the only surprise is a day that has none.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: The only thing that should surprise us is that there are still some things that can surprise us.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The wiser you become, the lesser you will be surprised!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: Let us accept truth, even when it surprises us and alters our views.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Sometimes people surprise us. People we believe we know.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: Life is full of surprises.
quotes.author: John Major

quotes.quote: The thing I have always tried to do is surprise people: to present them with something they didn't expect.
quotes.author: Christopher Lee

quotes.quote: Whoever can surprise well must conquer.
quotes.author: John Paul Jones

quotes.quote: Planning is an unnatural process; it is much more fun to do something. The nicest thing about not planning is that failure comes as a complete surprise, rather than being preceded by a period of worry and depression.
quotes.author: John Harvey-Jones

quotes.quote: Mystery is at the heart of creativity. That, and surprise.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Art must take reality by surprise.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: Surprise yourself every day with your own courage.
quotes.author: Denholm Elliott

quotes.quote: It's that element of surprise. When you lose control, you discover new things.
quotes.author: Daniel Lanois

quotes.quote: Those who are easily shocked should be shocked more often.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: There is no sweeter pleasure than to surprise a man by giving him more than he hopes for.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: How ridiculous and how strange to be surprised at anything which happens in life.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Everything is always a little surreal.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: Surrealism almost always uses contrasting color tones to bring out the literary contrast between the clashing ideas of reality and hallucination. The narrative is interspersed with dream-like sequences that revel in Surrealism in all its glory.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life is surreal and beautiful.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: To be a surrealist means barring from your mind all remembrance of what you have seen, and being always on the lookout for what has never been.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: People find meaning and redemption in the most unusual human connections.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: The imaginary is what tends to become real.
quotes.author: Laura McElroy

quotes.quote: Surrealism is born of a consciousness of the derisory condition allotted to the individual and his thought, and a refusal to accommodate oneself to it.
quotes.author: Jean Louis Bedouin

quotes.quote: Surrealism, which fizzled as an autonomous doctrine, as a specific method, does not exist. But it remains an historical fact, a fire that illuminates the intellectual landscape of the horizon.
quotes.author: Paul Nouge

quotes.quote: Its always really surreal, being on a film set, but inside a beautiful, massive scene.
quotes.author: Holliday Grainger

quotes.quote: Surreal can be exciting and good, and it can be like living inside an alien landscape, and it can be completely interesting, or you can be alienated from your own life inside your own life, it doesn't feel familiar any more.
quotes.author: Feist

quotes.quote: You achieve the surreal jokes through the realism by making it elastic.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: Surrealism was a perception of reality over which reason was denied the opportunity to exercise confining restrictions.
quotes.author: John Herbert Matthews

quotes.quote: The one thing the world will never have enough of is the outrageous.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: Surrealism is based on the belief in the omnipotence of dreams, in the undirected play of thought.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: Surrealism is destructive, but it destroys only what it considers to be shackles limiting our vision.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: The key to surrealism is to create something apparently disparate and irrational that at the end has more sense than the objective world.
quotes.author: Cisco Jimenez

quotes.quote: The purest surrealist act is walking into a crowd with a loaded gun and firing into it randomly.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: It is as pleasant as it is unusual to see thoroughly good people getting their deserts.
quotes.author: Charles Williams

quotes.quote: It's definitely surreal to watch yourself in a movie.
quotes.author: Justin Long

quotes.quote: Instead of stubbornly attempting to use surrealism for purposes of subversion, it is necessary to try to make of surrealism something as solid, complete and classic as the works of museums.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Surrealism, if an artist has to be influenced by it, is best taken in operatic overdoses for a very short time.
quotes.author: T. J. Clark

quotes.quote: The surreal is but reality that has not been disconnected from its mystery.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: Surrealism is embedded in the everyday, in the daily experience.
quotes.author: Katharine Conley

quotes.quote: Desire suppressed finds its way into other more surreal settings, into dreams.
quotes.author: Susan Minot

quotes.quote: Surrealism is not really about blueprints. Surrealism is kind of being open to your psychology, being open to your unconscious and kind of just doing it.
quotes.author: Black Francis

quotes.quote: It's kind of surreal to see it actually come to fruition.
quotes.author: Floyd Bannister

quotes.quote: Just because someone is a loner, it doesn't mean they're alone. And just because someone is alone, it doesn't mean they're lonely.
quotes.author: Jason Daniel Chaplin

quotes.quote: The simplest act of surrealism is to walk out into the street, gun in hand, and shoot at random.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: Surrealism is not a movement. It is a latent state of mind perceivable through the powers of dream and nightmare.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: SurrealismÂ does not allow those who devote themselves to it to forsake it whenever they like. There is every reason to believe that it acts on the mind very much as drugs do; like drugs, it creates a certain state of need and can push man to frightful revolts.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: SurrealismÂ could not be made up. It was the very electricity of the real.
quotes.author: Lorrie Moore

quotes.quote: SurrealismÂ is merely the reflection of the death process. It is one of the manifestations of a life becoming extinct, a virus which quickens the inevitable end.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: SurrealismÂ is a bourgeois disaffection; that its militants thought it universal is only one of the signs that it is typically bourgeois.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: The overintellectualization of surrealism can be a bromide. A dream interpreted is a deflated dream.
quotes.author: Graham Joyce

quotes.quote: The key to surrealism is to create something apparently disparate and irrational that at the end has more sense than the objective world.
quotes.author: Cisco Jimenez

quotes.quote: Refusing to idealize, the Surrealists awakened a sensitivity to the arbitrary and the unusual.Â
quotes.author: Sidra Stich

quotes.quote: Surrealism is not a movement. It is a latent state of mind perceivable through the powers of dream and nightmare.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: SurrealismÂ will usher you into death, which is a secret society.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: The purest surrealist act is walking into a crowd with a loaded gun and firing into it randomly.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: Instead of stubbornly attempting to use surrealism for purposes of subversion, it is necessary to try to make of surrealism something as solid, complete and classic as the works of museums.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Surrealism is not a poetry but a poetics, and even more, and more decisively, a world vision.
quotes.author: Octavio Paz

quotes.quote: To be a surrealist means barring from your mind all remembrance of what you have seen, and being always on the lookout for what has never been.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: SurrealismÂ is based on the belief in the omnipotence of dreams, in the undirected play of thought.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: SurrealismÂ is not a school of poetry but a movement of liberation... A way of rediscovering the language of innocence, a renewal of the primordial pact, poetry is the basic text, the foundation of the human order.Â SurrealismÂ is revolutionary because it is a return to the beginning of all beginnings.
quotes.author: Octavio Paz

quotes.quote: SurrealismÂ is destructive, but it destroys only what it considers to be shackles limiting our vision.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: The objective of surrealism is to make use of the dream, which will open the way to the great mystery of life in the cause of his own art.
quotes.author: Nathalia Brodskaia

quotes.quote: Surrealism is the magical surprise of finding a lion in a wardrobe, where you were 'sure' of finding shirts.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Surrealism, then, neither aims to subvert realism, as does the fantastic, nor does it try to transcend it. It looks for different means by which to explore reality itself.
quotes.author: Michael Richardson

quotes.quote: Surrealism, which fizzled as an autonomous doctrine, as a specific method, does not exist. But it remains an historical fact, a fire that illuminates the intellectual landscape of the horizon.
quotes.author: Paul Nouge

quotes.quote: Surrealism: An archaic term. Formerly an art movement. No longer distinguishable from everyday life.
quotes.author: Brad Holland

quotes.quote: If surrealism ever comes to adopt a particular line of moral conduct, it has only to accept the discipline that Picasso has accepted and will continue to accept.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: Surrealism can only deliver a reactionary judgment; can make out of history only an accumulation of oddities, a joke, a death trip.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: It is a little bit surreal to know that you are in your own little spaceship, and a few inches from you is instant death.
quotes.author: Scott Kelly

quotes.quote: In an age of computer manipulation,Â surrealismÂ has become banal, a shadow of its former self.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote: The stress in surrealism is always upon life and thought, not on literature or technique. To a surrealist everything is dictated by the place which art has in life. Art would lose its function if it were separated from the problems of everyday living.
quotes.author: Silvano Levy

quotes.quote: Surrealism is born of a consciousness of the derisory condition allotted to the individual and his thought, and a refusal to accommodate oneself to it.
quotes.author: Jean-Louis Bedouin

quotes.quote: Surrealism sought to maintain its autonomy and the right to continue its own particular investigations into ways of changing consciousness, the role of the unconscious within the social body, and the current state of language both visual and verbal.
quotes.author: Dawn Ades

quotes.quote: Surrealism was a perception of reality over which reason was denied the opportunity to exercise confining restrictions.
quotes.author: John Herbert Matthews

quotes.quote: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: To all the other dreamers out there, don't ever stop or let the world's negativity disenchant you or your spirit. If you surround yourself with love and the right people, anything is possible.
quotes.author: Adam Green

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with the right people, and realize your own worth. Honestly, there are enough bad people out there in the world - you don't need to be your own worst enemy.
quotes.author: Lucy Hale

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with good people who encourage and love you. There are always ups and downs, no matter how successful you are.
quotes.author: Liana Liberato

quotes.quote: Sometimes I'll find myself getting a little bit wound up about something, and I'll just have to talk myself down. Try to surround yourself with strong, upbeat, positive friends and people, and realize that every day in life is a choice between creating your own happiness or creating your own unhappiness. And I don't want to be unhappy.
quotes.author: Hannah Aitchison

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with people who make you happy. People who make you laugh, who help you when you’re in need. People who genuinely care. They are the ones worth keeping in your life. Everyone else is just passing through.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with the dreamers and the doers, the believers and thinkers, but most of all, surround yourself with those who see the greatness within you, even when you don’t see it yourself.
quotes.author: Edmund Lee

quotes.quote: The value of surrounding yourself with positive people is not what you get from them, but how good a person you have become because of them.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Some say if you want success surround yourself with successful people. I say if you want true and lasting success surround yourself with people of integrity.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: To believe in yourself and to follow your dreams, to have goals in life and a drive to succeed, and to surround yourself with the things and the people that make you happy - this is success!
quotes.author: Sasha Azevedo

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with people who take their work seriously, but not themselves, those who work hard and play hard.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Invent your world. Surround yourself with people, color, sounds, and work that nourish you.
quotes.author: Sark

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with those who see greatness within you, even when you don't see it yourself!
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You should feel beautiful and you should feel safe. What you surround yourself with should bring you peace of mind and peace of spirit.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: Surrounding yourself with a lot of desert is a bit like sitting in quicksand: Sooner or later the water will find you and suck you under.
quotes.author: Karen White

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with those who won’t compete but will revel in your success and see your ascent as a reflection of their own possibilities.
quotes.author: T.D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Surrounding yourself with dwarfs doesn't make you a giant.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Make a conscious effort to surround yourself with positive, nourishing, and uplifting people -- people who believe in you, encourage you to go after your dreams, and applaud your victories.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: Negative people deplete your energy. Surround yourself with love and nourishment and do not allow the creation of negativity in your environment.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: You will rarely make wise decisions if you surround yourself with fools.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: It’s the presence of others who are smarter, kinder, wiser, and different from you that enables you to evolve. Those are the people to surround yourself with at all times.
quotes.author: Adam Braun

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with smart, dedicated people - to build something isn’t a one-man show. It’s more important to have smart people who really believe in what you’re doing than really experienced people who may not share your dream.
quotes.author: Joseph J. Thomson

quotes.quote: Don’t you dare, for one more second, surround yourself with people who are not aware of the greatness that you are.
quotes.author: Jo Blackwell-Preston

quotes.quote: Do not bring people in your life who weigh you down. And trust your instincts. Good relationships feel good. They feel right. They don’t hurt. They’re not painful. That’s not just with somebody you want to marry, but it’s with the friends that you choose. It’s with the people you surround yourselves with.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with people that push you to do and be better. No drama or negativity. Just higher goals and higher motivation. Good times and positive energy. No jealousy or hate. Simply bringing out the absolute best in each other.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: The more rarefied a life you live, the easier it is to think that those who don't share it could be demonised. To find the common humanity becomes more of a struggle the more you surround yourself with nice things.
quotes.author: Rory Kinnear

quotes.quote: The choices you make now, the people you surround yourself with, they all have the potential to affect your life, even who you are, forever.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with the best people you can find, delegate authority, and don't interfere.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Big Brother is Watching You.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: There will come a time when it isn't 'They're spying on me through my phone' anymore. Eventually, it will be 'My phone is spying on me'.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Study after study has show that human behavior changes when we know we’re being watched. Under observation, we act less free, which means we effectively *are* less free.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.quote: The way things are supposed to work is that we're supposed to know virtually everything about what they [the government] do: that's why they're called public servants. They're supposed to know virtually nothing about what we do: that's why we're called private individuals.
quotes.author: Glenn Greenwald

quotes.quote: Big Brother in the form of an increasingly powerful government and in an increasingly powerful private sector will pile the records high with reasons why privacy should give way to national security, to law and order [...] and the like.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas

quotes.quote: They watch through cameras, listen to phone calls, read e-mail, record conversations; they don’t even need a court order to do it and then they do it under the guise of patriotism.
quotes.author: Volker G. Fremuth

quotes.quote: The new surveillance theorists say there should be no more secrets and mean something quite interesting: that the era in which secrets counted, in which secrets could exercise their power over the lives of people, is over; not what is worth knowing cannot be uncovered within seconds and without great effort; private life is basically a thing of the past.
quotes.author: J.M. Coetzee

quotes.quote: No matter the specific techniques involved, historically mass surveillance has had several constant attributes. Initially, it is always the country’s dissidents and marginalized who bear the brunt of the surveillance, leading those who support the government or are merely apathetic to mistakenly believe they are immune. And history shows that the mere existence of a mass surveillance apparatus, regardless of how it is used, is in itself sufficient to stifle dissent. A citizenry that is aware of always being watched quickly becomes a compliant and fearful one.
quotes.author: Glenn Greenwald

quotes.quote: There are only two possible explanations for a sovereign nation to bankrupt its own citizens and its government in order to set up a huge international surveillance and military system, “the finest fighting force the world has ever seen” that they do not actually own or control. One, everyone is completely insane, or two, it has not been a sovereign nation for a long time. Now is the time to remember the definition of a terrorist.
quotes.author: Heather Marsh

quotes.quote: We're being subject to incredible amounts of surveillance, the police are taking on draconian powers and violating our rights. I think this attempt to protect ourselves is ultimately going to founder because people don't like living inside prisons.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: In the era of surveillance of the masses, I like to use phrases like terrorists, assassinate, bomb, explosions, attack, weapons of mass destruction, and so on in my on-line activities to screw up the automated government surveillance software.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Should surveillance be usable for petty crimes like jaywalking or minor drug possession? Or is there a higher threshold for certain information? Those aren't easy questions.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Your utility meters, smart televisions, cell phones, telephones, computers, credit cards, banks, and internet are all surveillance devices that are recording your activities and that information may be later used against you.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Surveillance cameras might reduce crime - even though the evidence here is mixed - but no studies show that they result in greater happiness of everyone involved.
quotes.author: Evgeny Morozov

quotes.quote: Taking privacy cues from the federal government is - to say the least - ironic, considering today's Orwellian level of surveillance. At virtually any given time outside of one's own home, an American citizen can reasonably assume his movements and actions are being monitored by something, by somebody, somewhere.
quotes.author: Bob Barr

quotes.quote: If you're doing nothing wrong, you have nothing to hide from the giant surveillance apparatus the government's been hiding.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: When you give up your privacy, you give up your power.
quotes.author: Thor Benson

quotes.quote: Police in Washington D.C. are now using cameras to catch drivers who go through red lights. Many congressmen this week opposed the use of the red light cameras incorrectly assuming they were being used for surveillance at local brothels.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: Drug offenses ... may be regarded as the prototypes of non-victim crimes today. The private nature of the sale and use of these drugs has led the police to resort to methods of detection and surveillance that intrude upon our privacy, including illegal search, eavesdropping, and entrapment. Indeed, the successful prosecution of such cases often requires police infringement of the constitutional protections that safeguard the privacy of individuals.
quotes.author: John Kaplan

quotes.quote: The U.S. Bill of Rights is being steadily eroded, with two million telephone calls tapped, 30 million workers under electronic surveillance, and, says the author, countless Americans harassed by a government that wages spurious wars against drugs and terrorism.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: The government doesn't want any system of transmitting information to remain unbroken, unless it's under its own control.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Spy planes, drone aircraft, satellites with cameras that can see from three hundred miles what you can see from a hundred feet. They see and they hear. Like ancient monks, you know, who recorded knowledge, wrote it painstakingly down. These systems collect and process. All the secret knowledge of the world.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: You have an always-expanding, omnipresent surveillance state that's constantly chipping away at the liberties and freedoms of law-abiding Americans.
quotes.author: Ron Wyden

quotes.quote: Complete and accurate surveillance as a means of control is probably a practical impossibility. What is much more likely is a loss of privacy and constant inconvenience as the wrong people gain access to information, as one wastes time convincing the inquisitors that one is in fact innocent, or as one struggles to untangle the errors of the errant machine.
quotes.author: Victor C. Ferkiss

quotes.quote: Surveillance shouldn't be the tradeoff for any goddamn service we get.
quotes.author: Dave Eggers

quotes.quote: Don't oppose mass surveillance for your own sake. Oppose it for the activists, lawyers, journalists and all of the other people our liberty relies on.
quotes.author: Thor Benson

quotes.quote: Do we want to live in a society where we live totally naked in front of government, and they are totally opaque to us?
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.quote: Everyone is now considered a potential terrorist, providing a rational for both the government and private corporations to spy on anybody, regardless of whether they have committed a crime. Surveillance is supplemented by a growing domestic army of baton-wielding police forces who are now being supplied with the latest military equipment.
quotes.author: Henry Giroux

quotes.quote: The combination of the growth of these digital technologies, the ability of the government to conjure up these secret interpretations, plus a very unusual and novel court make for this ever-expanding surveillance state. We so treasure our freedoms; we will regret it if our generation doesn't use this unique time to reform the surveillance laws and make it clear that security and liberty are not mutually exclusive. We can do both.
quotes.author: Ron Wyden

quotes.quote: There are people who are always going to try to engage in activity that is illegal and they're going to try to subvert surveillance. But everybody should not give up their liberties and rights to privacy because some people are going to [do that]. We shouldn't stop or limit our basic liberties because some people are going to engage in criminal activities.
quotes.author: Laura Poitras

quotes.quote: A man, as a general rule, owes very little to what he is born with, a man is what he makes himself.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Nobody is stronger, nobody is weaker than someone who came back. There is nothing you can do to such a person because whatever you could do is less than what has already been done to him. We have already paid the price.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: In spite of everything that was done to me and my race, in spite of the adversity and the bitter moments, again we rise.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: In a mad world, only the mad are sane.
quotes.author: Akiro Kurosawa

quotes.quote: Peace is the one condition of survival in this nuclear age.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: All I'm trying to do is not join my ancestral spirits just yet.
quotes.author: Joshua Nkomo

quotes.quote: Hunger, love, pain, fear are some of those inner forces which rule the individual's instinct for self preservation.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you live among wolves you have to act like a wolf.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: To survive it is often necessary to fight and to fight you have to dirty yourself.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Once one determines that he or she has a mission in life, that's it's not going to be accomplished without a great deal of pain, and that the rewards in the end may not outweigh the pain --if you recognize historically that always happens, then when it comes, you survive it.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Man can live about forty days without food, about three days without water, about eight minutes without air, but only for one second without hope.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Survival is nothing more than recovery.
quotes.author: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.quote: The ability to delude yourself may be an important survival tool.
quotes.author: Jane Wagner

quotes.quote: Through humor, you can soften some of the worst blows that life delivers. And once you find laughter, no matter how painful your situation might be, you can survive it.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: In a world where change is inevitable and continuous, the need to achieve that change without violence is essential for survival.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: For Harmony. A chance at life. To fight on other days.
quotes.author: Janet Morris

quotes.quote: The consciousness of being deemed dead, is next to the presumable unpleasantness of being so in reality. One feels like his own ghost unlawfully tenanting a defunct carcass.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Nature's stern discipline enjoins mutual help at least as often as warfare. The fittest may also be the gentlest.
quotes.author: Theodosius Dobzhansky

quotes.quote: The faster you can signal for rescue, the faster you get out of that situation.
quotes.author: Joseph Teti

quotes.quote: You don't know if you're going to be rescued in a day or a month; gotta prepare for the long haul; gotta make the place your home.
quotes.author: Matt Graham

quotes.quote: The man who goes afoot, prepared to camp anywhere and in any weather, is the most independent fellow on earth.
quotes.author: Horace Kephart

quotes.quote: Perhaps catastrophe is the natural human environment, and even though we spend a good deal of energy trying to get away from it, we are programmed for survival amid catastrophe.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: Tis the last rose of summer Left blooming alone; All her lovely companions Are faded and gone.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: Every day I run scared. That's the only way I can stay ahead.
quotes.author: John H. Johnson

quotes.quote: The condition of man... is a condition of war of everyone against everyone.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but rather the one most adaptable to change.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Resilience is the maintenance of high levels of positive affect and well-being in the face of adversity. It is not that resilient individuals never experience negative affect, but rather that the negative affect does not persist.
quotes.author: Richard J. Davidson

quotes.quote: Self-preservation is the first principle of our nature.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: In truth, we exist and survive, not because of the ego, but in spite of it.
quotes.author: David R. Hawkins

quotes.quote: Sushi rocks my world as no other food can!
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime. Unless he doesn't like sushi, then you also have to teach him to cook.
quotes.author: Auren Hoffman

quotes.quote: I want to take you away from this, "I say, motioning around the kitchen, spastic." From sushi and elves and stuff.
quotes.author: Bret Easton Ellis

quotes.quote: I was in a sushi bar over a year ago, and it was just one of those moments that it dawned on me. It hit me over the head, how could I just discriminate between a cow and a fish?
quotes.author: Carre Otis

quotes.quote: But eating a tuna roll at a sushi restaurant should be considered no more environmentally benign than driving a Hummer or harpooning a manatee.
quotes.author: Daniel Pauly

quotes.quote: Yes! Yes! There's the attitude. Where was that girl during the race? Off getting sushi?
quotes.author: Doug Solter

quotes.quote: Kids are now eating things like edamame and sushi. I didn't know what shiitake mushrooms were when I was 10 - most kids today do.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.quote: I never eat sushi. I have trouble eating things that are merely unconscious.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: A good rule to remember for life is that when it comes to plastic surgery and sushi, never be attracted by a bargain.
quotes.author: Graham Norton

quotes.quote: L.A., its nice, but I think of sunshine and people on roller blades eating sushi. New York, I think of nighttime, I think of Times Square and Broadway and nightlife and the city that never sleeps.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: There's always room for improvement.
quotes.author: Joey Logano

quotes.quote: Imagine being served a plate of sushi. But this plate also holds all of the animals that were killed for your serving of sushi. The plate might have to be five feet across.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Whether we're talking about fish species, pigs, or some other eaten animal, is such suffering the most important thing in the world? Obviously not. But that's not the question. Is it more important than sushi, bacon, or chicken nuggets? That's the question.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: I'm not making art, I'm making sushi.
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.quote: I don't speak Japanese, I don't know anything about Japanese business or Japanese culture. Apart from sushi. But I can't exactly go up to him and say "Sushi!" out of the blue. It would be like going up to a top American businessman and saying, "T-bone steak!
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: Sometimes sushi is just superb, and other times there's nothing like a great big steak. It depends where your taste buds are at the time.
quotes.author: Francesca Annis

quotes.quote: Sushi is something very exclusive. It is not like a McDonald's, not like a hot dog, not like a French fry. It's very high-class cooking in Japan.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.quote: Making sushi is an art, and experience is everything.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.quote: With sushi, it is all about balance. Sometimes they cut the fish too thick, sometimes too thin. Often the rice is overcooked or undercooked. Not enough rice vinegar or too much.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.quote: Sushi is not really about flavor as much as texture. Everything is usually made bite-size so you can eat it in one bite, which is more proper.
quotes.author: Tim Hoffman

quotes.quote: Suspense is worse than disappointment.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: There is no suspense in inevitability.
quotes.author: Damon Lindelof

quotes.quote: Suspense is irksome, disappointment bitter.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Anguish of suspense made men even desire the arrival of enemies.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: Suspense: the only literary tool that has any effect upon tyrants and savages.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: We all live in suspense from day to day; in other words, you are the hero of your own story.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Suspense arises naturally from good writing - it's not a spice to be added separately.
quotes.author: Leigh Michaels

quotes.quote: Suspense is like a woman. The more left to the imagination, the more the excitement.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: I think one of the appeals of suspense is to safely explore our innermost fears.
quotes.author: Lisa Gardner

quotes.quote: ...that horrible moment of suspense when the artist shows one of his creations to strange eyes for the first time.
quotes.author: Irving Stone

quotes.quote: Vaguely conscious of that great suspense in which we live, we find our escape from its sterile, annihilating reality in many dreams, in religion, passion, art.
quotes.author: Arthur Symons

quotes.quote: Surprise is when a prime minister is assassinated during his speech. Suspense is when an assassin lurks while the prime minister speaks. Balancing surprise and suspense is the job of the thriller writer.
quotes.author: Ashwin Sanghi

quotes.quote: Suspense left my life a long time ago, now it has returned. I do not care for it.
quotes.author: Ben Marcus

quotes.quote: Suspense is torture ... but delightful--or there'd be no gambling in the world.
quotes.author: Ada Leverson

quotes.quote: There is nothing like suspense and anxiety for barricading a human's mind against the Enemy. He wants men to be concerned with what they do; our business is to keep them thinking about what will happen to them.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: For me, suspense doesn't have any value if it's not balanced by humor.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Suspense combines curiosity with fear and pulls them up a rising slope.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: If you don't do the suspense correctly, then your jump scares are not going to work.
quotes.author: James Wan

quotes.quote: A lot of the best suspense operates on a careful withholding of information as opposed to the doling out of information.
quotes.author: Karyn Kusama

quotes.quote: Suspense films are often based on communication problems, and that affects all of the plot points. It almost gives it kind of a fable feeling.
quotes.author: Ira Sachs

quotes.quote: Suspense is a real tough beast in terms of the filmmaking.
quotes.author: David Slade

quotes.quote: Suspense is achieved by information control: What you know. What the reader knows. What the characters know.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: There's something nice and valuable and wonderful about the suspense and the classic horror that doesn't just crutch on blood and the almost pornographic view of fear.
quotes.author: Amber Heard

quotes.quote: There's always a bit of suspense about the particular way in which a given school year will get off to a bad start.
quotes.author: Frank Portman

quotes.quote: You have to go out of your way as a suspense novelist to find situations where the protagonists are somewhat helpless and in real danger.
quotes.author: Nelson DeMille

quotes.quote: Suspense is very important. Even though this is humor and they're short stories, that theory of building suspense is still there.
quotes.author: Sergio Aragones

quotes.quote: Real suspense comes with moral dilemma and the courage to make and act upon choices. False suspense comes from the accidental and meaningless occurrence of one damned thing after another.
quotes.author: John Gardner

quotes.quote: For me, suspense is always harder and better than going for the quick, outright scare.
quotes.author: Gillian Flynn

quotes.quote: What keeps readers turning pages is suspense, which you can create using a variety of techniques, including tension, pacing and foreshadowing.
quotes.author: Leigh Michaels

quotes.quote: I think good suspense and horror is really about creating situations that are relatable, and throwing a wrench in it and watching how people respond to it.
quotes.author: Jason Blum

quotes.quote: Sustainability is the key to our survival on this planet and will also determine success on all levels.
quotes.author: Shari Arison

quotes.quote: We cannot hope to create a sustainable culture with any but sustainable souls.
quotes.author: Derrick Jensen

quotes.quote: Sustainability is living on nature's income rather than living on its capital.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.quote: The ultimate test of man's conscience may be his willingness to sacrifice something today for future generations whose words of thanks will not be heard.
quotes.author: Gaylord Nelson

quotes.quote: We need to defend the interests of those whom we've never met and never will.
quotes.author: Jeffrey D. Sachs

quotes.quote: Engage the whole community with a common purpose to build an innovative and sustainable enterprise.
quotes.author: Miguel Reynolds Brandao

quotes.quote: Sustainability: It's the right thing to do, it's the smart thing to do, it's the profitable thing to do.
quotes.author: Hunter Lovins

quotes.quote: Sustainability requires maintaining life-supporting natural capital in order for our socioeconomic goals to be met.
quotes.author: Warren Flint

quotes.quote: Every profession bears the responsibility to understand the circumstances that enable its existence.
quotes.author: Robert Gutman

quotes.quote: Sustainability is treating ourselves and our environment as if we are to live on this earth forever.
quotes.author: Arron Wood

quotes.quote: Sustainability, ensuring the future of life on Earth, is an infinite game, the endless expression of generosity on behalf of all.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.quote: Sustainability is about ecology, economy and equity.
quotes.author: Ralph Bicknese

quotes.quote: A society is defined not only by what it creates but also by what it refuses to destroy.
quotes.author: John C. Sawhill

quotes.quote: We can create a more sustainable, cleaner and safer world by making wiser energy choices.
quotes.author: Robert Alan Silverstein

quotes.quote: No one person has to do it all but if each one of us follow our heart and our own inclinations we will find the small things that we can do to create a sustainable future and a healthy environment.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: The future is green energy, sustainability, renewable energy.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Sustainability is no longer about doing less harm. It's about doing more good.
quotes.author: Jochen Zeitz

quotes.quote: Sustainability is a set of conditions and trends in a given system that can continue indefinitely.
quotes.author: Alan AtKisson

quotes.quote: Since problems spill across borders, security anywhere depends on sustainable development everywhere.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: We cannot hope to create a sustainable culture with any but sustainable souls.
quotes.author: Derrick Jensen

quotes.quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: When you gaze long into the Abyss of Sustainability, the Abyss of Sustainability also gazes into you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Sustainability is a political choice, not a technical one. It's not a question of whether we can be sustainable, but whether we choose to be
quotes.author: Gary Lawrence

quotes.quote: Community leadership is the courage, creativity and capacity to inspire participation, development and sustainability for strong communities.
quotes.author: Gustav Nossal

quotes.quote: Resilience is all about being able to overcome the unexpected. Sustainability is about survival. The goal of resilience is to thrive.
quotes.author: Jamais Cascio

quotes.quote: Having a similar outlook on life is the central key for long-term sustainability in any love relationship.
quotes.author: John Friend

quotes.quote: Sustainability is no longer optional. Companies that fail to adopt such practices will perish. They will not only lose cost basis: they will also suffer in recruiting employees as well as attracting customers.
quotes.author: John Replogle

quotes.quote: Education is a human right with immense power to transform. On its foundation rest the cornerstones of freedom, democracy and sustainable human development.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Sustainability is another word for justice, for what is just is sustainable and what is unjust is not.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
quotes.author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

quotes.quote: Our biggest challenge in this new century is to take an idea that seems abstract - sustainable development - and turn it into a reality for all the world's people.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is not an option! It is the only path that allows all of humanity to share a decent life on this, one planet. Rio 20 gives our generation the opportunity to choose this path.
quotes.author: Sha Zukang

quotes.quote: All our efforts to defeat poverty and pursue sustainable development will be in vain if environmental degradation and natural resource depletion continue unabated.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Sustainable Development Requires Human Ingenuity. People Are The Most Important Resource.
quotes.author: Dan Shechtman

quotes.quote: Climate change is destroying our path to sustainability. Ours is a world of looming challenges and increasingly limited resources. Sustainable development offers the best chance to adjust our course.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is a fundamental break that's going to reshuffle the entire deck. There are companies today that are going to dominate in the future simply because they understand that.
quotes.author: Francois Henri Pinault

quotes.quote: Sustainable development and climate change are two sides of the same coin.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: Nevertheless, the concept of sustainable development is now known - even amongst those who haven't accepted it - and it's recognized, debated and followed by an increasing number of businesses.
quotes.author: Maurice Strong

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is the peace policy of the future.
quotes.author: Dr. Klaus Topfer

quotes.quote: Energy is essential for development, and sustainable energy is essential for sustainable development
quotes.author: Tim Wirth

quotes.quote: We know the problems, and we know the solution: sustainable development. The issue is the political will.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Investing in women's lives is an investment in sustainable development, in human rights, in future generations - and consequently in our own long-term national interests.
quotes.author: Liya Kebede

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is the pathway to the future we want for all. It offers a framework to generate economic growth, achieve social justice, exercise environmental stewardship and strengthen governance.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: Sustainable Development: Holding Our World In Trust For Our Children
quotes.author: Michael Meacher

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is a process which enables all people to realise their potential and to improve their quality of life in ways which protect and enhance the Earth's life support systems.
quotes.author: Sara Parkin

quotes.quote: Sustainable development: Meeting present needs without compromising the stock of natural resources remaining for future generations. In terms of buildings, it implies resource efficiency, minimum energy use, flexibility and long life.
quotes.author: Richard Rogers

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is the masterful balance of meeting our own needs without jeopardizing future generation's ability to do the same.
quotes.author: Light of Mine

quotes.quote: There can be no sustainable development without sustainable energy development
quotes.author: Margot Wallstrom

quotes.quote: Preservation of the environment, promotion of sustainable development and particular attention to climate change are matters of grave concern for the entire human family.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: swans ... always look as though they'd just been reading their own fan-mail.
quotes.author: Jan Struther

quotes.quote: When turkeys mate they think of swans.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Swans live wherever there is water, and leave the place where water dries up; let not a man act so - and comes and goes as he pleases.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Swans sing before they die - 'twere no bad thing should certain persons die before they sing.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Swan flocks of lilies shoreward lying, In sweetness, not in music, dying.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: The swan murmurs sweet strains with a flattering tongue, itself the singer of its own dirge.
quotes.author: Martial

quotes.quote: Even if you enter the dirty water, stay neat like a white swan!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote:
There's a double beauty whenever a swan
Swims on a lake with her double thereon.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: Those who awaken never rest in one place. Like swans, they rise and leave the lake. On the air they rise and fly an invisible course. Their food is knowledge. They live on emptiness. They have seen how to break free. Who can follow them?
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: The swan, like the soul of the poet, By the dull world is ill understood.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: It is best to live with honor for just a day than with dishonor for many decades; better a short lived celestial swan than a century-lived crow.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: If you're looking for monogamy, you'd better marry a swan.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: The swan who goes on living in its parents' tree will die; this is why those who are beautiful and talented bear the burden of finding their own way in the world.
quotes.author: Arthur Golden

quotes.quote: Being born in a duck yard does not matter, if only you are hatched from a swan's egg.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: His own image; no longer a dark, gray bird, ugly and disagreeable to look at, but a graceful and beautiful swan. To be born in a duck's nest, in a farmyard, is of no consequence to a bird, if it is hatched from a swan's egg.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: And swans seem whiter if swart crowes be by.
quotes.author: Guillaume De Salluste Du Bartas

quotes.quote: Swans are majestic, beautiful looking creatures. With really ugly temperaments.
quotes.author: Michael Gira

quotes.quote:
Swans in the winter air
A white perfection have
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: No amount of observations of white swans can allow the inference that all swans are white, but the observation of a single black swan is sufficient to refute that conclusion.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: But calm, white calm, was born into a swan.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Jane Coatsworth

quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The superior fighter has no emotional attachment to any one range of combat.
quotes.author: T. Blauer

quotes.quote: If you face just one opponent, and you doubt yourself, you're out-numbered
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to subordinate strategic considerations to tactical needs.
quotes.author: Ehud Barak

quotes.quote: Vulgarity is like a fine wine: it should only be uncorked on a special occasion, and then only shared with the right group of people.
quotes.author: James Rozoff

quotes.quote: I hate it when people say swearing isn't necessary. Things not being necessary is what makes life interesting, the little extras in life.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: Apparently profanity had a way of making men listen.
quotes.author: Megan Shepherd

quotes.quote: In general, there are usually two reasons to swear--to get someone's attention and because it's fun.
quotes.author: Aaron Burch

quotes.quote: Swearing is a currency the countryside spends well.
quotes.author: Michelle Franklin

quotes.quote: Swearing relieves the feelings - that is what swearing does. I explained this to my aunt on one occasion, but it didn't answer with her. She said I had no business to have such feelings.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: Swearing was invented as a compromise between running away and fighting.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: If you want to get rid of the perceived meaning of curse words, you’ll have to get rid of the feelings which bring their use, and that’s not going to happen.
quotes.author: Orlando Winters

quotes.quote: The foolish and wicked practice of profane cursing and swearing is a vice so mean and low that every person of sense and character detests and despises it.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Swearing's my release. It's the one weapon I have to defend myself against destiny when it elects to strike without pity.
quotes.author: Andrea Pirlo

quotes.quote: Using profanity in public. I can't recall the fine for that. Oh well, lets call it a night in jail.
quotes.author: Stephen J. Cannell

quotes.quote: You mean the profanity? That's simply the way they talk here. Nobody pays attention to you unless you swear every other word. You'll find it in all the literature of the period.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: I'm gonna resist the urge to express my anger by using profanity and I hope you appreciate that.
quotes.author: Dennis Klein

quotes.quote: Profanity is a brutal vice. He who uses it, is not a gentleman.
quotes.author: Michael Andrews

quotes.quote: Profanity is for the feeble-minded.
quotes.author: William Brent Bell

quotes.quote: He worked in profanity the way other artists might work in oils or clay. It was his true medium; a master.
quotes.author: Jean Shepherd

quotes.quote: I don't believe that profanity has anything to do with Christianity, thank you.
quotes.author: Jay Martel

quotes.quote: Profanity is an expression of loss of control. Not very reassuring for a team leader.
quotes.author: Mark Ellis

quotes.quote: You're cursing, that's what you're doing. The road to Hell is paved with profanity users!
quotes.author: Susan Harris

quotes.quote: You know, one of these days you're going to run out of fake profanity and start using real profanity, and you don't want to do that, because let's face it, I'm from New York and we pretty much invented it.
quotes.author: Greg Berlanti

quotes.quote: Profanity is the last refuge of the ignorant, the insensitive, and the illiterate
quotes.author: Wendell B. Harris Jr.

quotes.quote: I happen to have a healthy respect for profanity. They're just not happy words and they don't make me happy to hear them. To use something over and over until it has no meaning.
quotes.author: Andrew Witham

quotes.quote: The scattered profanity honored and written in stone / Conducted by vanity leading us more than you know
quotes.author: Saga

quotes.quote: Swearing is an art form. You can express yourself much more exactly, much more succinctly, with properly used curse words.
quotes.author: Coleman Young

quotes.quote: Must swear off from swearing. Bad habit.
quotes.author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quotes.quote: Swearing can be fun, but doing it all the time causes a lot of problems.
quotes.author: Kyle

quotes.quote: The agony of love destroyed often leaves us swearing never to love again.
quotes.author: Ruben Papian

quotes.quote: Swearing is industry language. For as long as we're alive it's not going to change. You've got to be boisterous to get results.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Profane swearing never did any man any good. No man in the richer or wiser or happier for it.
quotes.author: Robert Lowth

quotes.quote: Swearing makes an excellent relief mechanism.
quotes.author: David Crystal

quotes.quote: Trust me, Rainbow. Every little girl wants a sweet sixteen party.
quotes.author: Suzanne Bolch

quotes.quote: I can't lose my party. It's my Sweet sixteen. It's the only birthday that has its own adjective.
quotes.author: Eileen Heisler

quotes.quote: Looking back ? / Think I'm projecting here but / Sweet sixteen, you're really the sweetest / Looking back / You can look all you want but / Sweet sixteen won't fix all your problems
quotes.author: Matthew Maltese

quotes.quote: Sixteen years ago today, early one Sunday morn' / Just before the break of day a cute little girl was born / From that very moment on her life’s been gay and free / Laughing eyes and loving ways as sweet as she could be
quotes.author: Roy Orbison

quotes.quote: When the night is young / And we look twenty five but we're sweet sixteen / Can I be the one to turn your nightmare into a dream?
quotes.author: Emilie Haynie

quotes.quote: But knowing it won't last very long / A happy birthday / What away to spend your sweet sixteen
quotes.author: Adrienne Anderson

quotes.quote: In America / Sweet sixteen / Lean with a cup / Breathe, baby breathe / Momma like, please wake up
quotes.author: Jeremy Torres

quotes.quote: I had a dream that I was sweet sixteen / And could play in a rock & roll band / I saw some guys that played guitar / They said, 'Come on if you think you can.'
quotes.author: Pete Heilich

quotes.quote: Little sister by the record machine / I'm tired of dancing, said she's sweet sixteen/ She's going out she's gonna party tonight / She's gonna shake and make it last all night
quotes.author: Bradley Gillis

quotes.quote: And their thoughts turn to / Their own little girl / Well sweet sixteen ain't she peachy keen, / And it ain't so neat to admit defeat
quotes.author: Bob Geldof

quotes.quote: Today, I guess is a landmark, a sort of memorable reference point that says although you're still quite young, you're not a child no more. Your mother's shoes and make-up you're wearing now, instead of playing with.
quotes.author: Vernon Bobo

quotes.quote: A sweet sixteen party is one of the most important and exciting events in a teenage girl's life.
quotes.author: Rosa Rodriguez

quotes.quote: A sweet sixteen is, in many ways, a coming-out party that tells the world that you are no longer a little girl but a young woman.
quotes.author: Rosa Rodriguez

quotes.quote: The best time to start thinking about your sweet sixteen is while you are fourteen years old, especially if you plan to have a sweet sixteen that rivals a wedding.
quotes.author: Rosa Rodriguez

quotes.quote: In the American culture the sixteenth birthday is the most important: Sweet Sixteen.
quotes.author: Mary Clark Alvarez

quotes.quote: Girls may be finding fresh ways to celebrate their birthday--but the practice of going all out when you turn sixteen is anything but new.
quotes.author: Erin Brereton

quotes.quote: The party should be all about you, so do some celebration soul-searching.
quotes.author: Erin Brereton

quotes.quote: Your Sweet Sixteen Birthday is indeed a very special landmark in your life. By this time your strong character would have developed to a great degree.
quotes.author: Sharon S. Beepath

quotes.quote: For American girls, the sixteenth birthday is observed as a landmark of sorts and is referred to a 'Sweet sixteen.' In addition, birthdays that render the individual eligible for new privileges, such as driving, voting, and drinking carry added significance.
quotes.author: Linda S. Watts

quotes.quote: Sweet sixteen - a girl's special sixteenth birthday, which suggest she is a young lady and no longer a child.
quotes.author: Jack C. Richards

quotes.quote: Sweet sixteen today. She's looking like her momma a little more every day.
quotes.author: Bob Carlisle

quotes.quote: At 16 the world is yours to have. You can do, you can be, anything you put your mind to.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Today it is your birthday you're turning sweet 16 a long anticipated birthday that once was just a dream on your sixteenth birthday my birthday wish for you is that all your wildest hopes and dreams someday will come true.
quotes.author: Lauren

quotes.quote: Sixteen candles make a lovely light but not as bright as your eyes tonight.
quotes.author: Luther Dixon

quotes.quote: Sweet 16 is the moment of truth when girls mature from there childish youths
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best substitute for experience is being sixteen.
quotes.author: Raymond Duncan

quotes.quote: For all the girls out there, it’s totally possible to be a good girl. I’m going to try to make it cool
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: Being a good girl means suppressing a lot.
quotes.author: Jennifer Jason Leigh

quotes.quote: With yourself, I think you have to decide the kind of person that you really want to be, and for me, it's just a sweet girl.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.quote: All really nice girls wonder when men don't try to kiss them. They know they shouldn't want them to and they know they must act insulted if they do, but just the same, they wish the men would try.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: There's an expression in Persian, 'to play with the lion's tail.' I wasn't what Iranian society wanted me to be - a good girl. I played with the lion's tail.
quotes.author: Golshifteh Farahani

quotes.quote: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Nice girls are not supposed to be hungry. They are not supposed to feed themselves or care about their own food. They're definitely not supposed to take food out of a child's mouth.
quotes.author: Micah Perks

quotes.quote: What are little girls made of? / Sugar and spice / And everything nice / That's what little girls are made of
quotes.author: Nursery Rhyme

quotes.quote: Nice girls aren't always what they seem.
quotes.author: Taylor Cole

quotes.quote: The nice girl makes the mistake of being available all the time.
quotes.author: Sherry Argov

quotes.quote: You ask what a nice girl will do? She won't give an inch, but she won't say no.
quotes.author: Marcus Valerius Martial

quotes.quote: A good girl is supposed to be very quiet.
quotes.author: Ziauddin Yousafzai

quotes.quote: It's the good girls who keep the diaries; the bad girls never have time.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: Even good girls have secrets, ones even their best friends must guess.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: Good girls don't hurt other people's feelings. Good girls are not overly aggressive, competitive, or boastful. Good girls please others. But what good girls are good for is another question.
quotes.author: Susan Jane Gilman

quotes.quote: Good girls hold their heads high by daylight, / Their grace and their virtue soaring with kites, / While bad girls slink along in their shame- / Everyone stares at them, everyone blames. / But those bad girls sleep soundly at night, / Ne'er do their consciences wake them in a fright, / While our good girls toss and they turn- / They lay awake for those who will burn.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: So why do women stay in the place of girlhood long after it’s productive for them? One reason is because we’ve been taught that acting like a nice girl—even when we’re grown up—isn’t such a bad thing. Girls get taken care of in ways that boys don’t. Girls aren’t expected to fend for or take care of themselves—others do that for them....People like girls. Men want to protect you. Cuddly or sweet, tall or tan, girls don’t ask for much. They’re nice to be around and they’re nice to have around—sort of like pets.
quotes.author: Lois P Frankel

quotes.quote: This might be a good time to dispel the myth that overcoming nice girl syndrome means you have to be mean and nasty.
quotes.author: Lois P Frankel

quotes.quote: When I talk about being authentically nice, I’m describing a woman who is considerate, respectful, fair, collaborative, and generous.
quotes.author: Fran Hauser

quotes.quote: Being a nice girl from the Mid-West, my inclination is always to give in and say yes because I want people to like me.
quotes.author: Cindy Crawford

quotes.quote: I wish I was harder; I wish I didn't care so much about being the nice girl all the time because a lot of the time people can take kindness for weakness, so I wish I had a little bit more 'oomph' in me.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: Over time, I was surprised to find that owning my niceness actually made it easier for me to speak up, push back, and voice my opinions at work because I wasn’t so consumed by trying to be something I was not. Instead, my confidence soared along with my effectiveness because I was finally free to be my authentically nice and caring self.
quotes.author: Fran Hauser

quotes.quote: It is my contention that Nice Girl behavior sets women up to be misused and abused. This does not mean that women cause men to become abusive. It does not mean that women are masochists. What it does mean is that by being too nice, women send a strong message to those who already have a tendency to use and abuse. The message is: “My need to be seen as nice (or sweet or innocent) is more powerful than my instinct to protect myself.”
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: The aggressive side of me comes across in my music, but I'm just a sweet girl.
quotes.author: Pink

quotes.quote: It used to be the one or the other, right? You were the 'bad girl' or the 'good girl' or the 'bad mother' or 'the good mother,' 'the horrible businesswoman who eschewed her children' or 'the earth mother who was happy to be at home baking pies,' all of that stuff that we sort of knew was a lie.
quotes.author: Annette Bening

quotes.quote: As women, we get the message about how to be a good girl - how to be a good, pretty girl - from such an early age. Then, at the same time, we're told that well-behaved girls won't change the world or ever make a splash.
quotes.author: Phoebe Waller-Bridge

quotes.quote: Many girls aspire to a version of selfhood that puts a psychological glass ceiling on their potential to succeed. They suffer from what I call the Curse of the Good Girl: the pressure to be liked by everyone, generous to a fault, and flawless at everything you do.
quotes.author: Rachel Simmons

quotes.quote: Good girl doesn’t exist; you just have to choose between bad and worse.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Teach her to reject likeability. Her job is not to make herself likeable, her job is to be her full self, a self that is honest and aware of the equal humanity of other people.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: I love saying 'yes' and I love saying 'please.' Saying 'yes' doesn't mean I don't know how to say no, and saying 'please' doesn't mean I am waiting for permission. 'Yes please' sounds powerful and concise. It's a response and a request. It is not about being a good girl; it is about being a real woman.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: If you want to know how much I love and care for you, count the waves.
quotes.author: Kenneth Koch

quotes.quote: Sweet is true love that is given in vain, and sweet is death that takes away pain.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get — only with what you are expecting to give — which is everything.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: I love your feet because they have wandered over the earth and through the wind and water until they brought you to me.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: One day you will kiss a man you can't breathe without and find that breath is of little consequence.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Hear my soul speak. Of the very instant that I saw you, did my heart fly at your service.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: yours is the light by which my spirit's born: yours is the darkness of my soul's return —you are my sun, my moon, and all my stars
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: My heart smiled when you kissed my lips. What a sweet surprise.
quotes.author: Jan Arden

quotes.quote: I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with her in the years we were apart.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: For you see, each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rosemonde Gerard

quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: And now here is my secret, a very simple secret; it is only with the heart that one can see rightly, what is essential is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

quotes.quote: When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.
quotes.author: Arrigo Boito

quotes.quote: She was ready to deny the existence of space and time rather than admit that love might not be eternal.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: He's more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: You are the one girl that made me risk everything for a future worth having.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles

quotes.quote: I came here tonight because when you realize that you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Harry Burns

quotes.quote: But love has no uttermost, as the stars have no number and the sea no rest.
quotes.author: Eleanor Farjeon

quotes.quote: Since I can't be with you right now I will have to be content just dreaming about when we will be together again.
quotes.author: Susan Polis Schutz

quotes.quote: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: How sweet the words of Truth, breathed from the lips of Love.
quotes.author: James Beattie

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life it the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I know no ways to mince it in love, but directly to say — I love you.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love reminds you that nothing else matters.
quotes.author: Amy Bushell

quotes.quote: I've always got a sweet tooth. I have chocolate hidden in places that nobody knows about.
quotes.author: Tony McCoy

quotes.quote: I have a horrible sweet tooth. It's gotten to the point where if I throw a cookie in the garbage, I have to douse it in Cascade. Otherwise, why wouldn't I take it out and eat it?
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: I have the biggest sweet tooth! You name it, I will eat it. My all-time favorite is my mother's butter cake. Every time I go home, my mom will already have the cake made because I love it so much. This makes my siblings mad because they think she favors me. I don't care because she probably does!
quotes.author: Michael Strahan

quotes.quote: If you have a sweet tooth, you'll have a sweet mouth when you're done, because all your teeth are going to be sweet.
quotes.author: G. Garvin

quotes.quote: A man without a sweet tooth is not to be trusted.
quotes.author: Kristen Painter

quotes.quote: A good bachelor drinks his dessert (and sometimes the rest of his meals). A sweet tooth is a danger signal that you're getting too much exercise and not enough cocktails.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: I have the biggest sweet tooth. After the holidays, I gotta start working out.
quotes.author: Devon Werkheiser

quotes.quote: I’ve got a really sweet tooth and sometimes I just have to have some chocolate.
quotes.author: Kirsty Gallacher

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than cake but more cake.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: I have no will power when it comes to sweets. I have a sweet tooth.
quotes.author: Daniel Sunjata

quotes.quote: I was an infamously picky eater as a child but also had an infamous sweet tooth. All I wanted was dessert for every meal of the day.
quotes.author: Christina Tosi
