quotes.quote: Dad was a baker, and we lived above the bakery, so I was always popping down to have an apple pie or a doughnut or a custard or gypsy tart: I had a very sweet tooth, and I think that that was what got me into doing what I do now.
quotes.author: Paul Hollywood

quotes.quote: I have a bad sweet tooth. I'm pretty good when I have to eat well for work, but otherwise, I could eat a whole roll of raw cookie dough.
quotes.author: Jeremy Renner

quotes.quote: I have a sweet tooth. Milk chocolate with the caramel fillings — that’s my guilty pleasure right there. But I think that’s all right, we have to let ourselves indulge sometimes.
quotes.author: Caroline Wozniacki

quotes.quote: I don't have the biggest sweet tooth, but I do have one in the morning.
quotes.author: Antoni Porowski

quotes.quote: If a hug represented how much I loved you, I would hold you in my arms forever.
quotes.author: Mandy Hampton

quotes.quote: Sitting next to you doing absolutely nothing means absolutely everything to me.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: They say sweethearts and squabbles are like flowers and rain. Takes both to make it springtime.
quotes.author: Pamela Morsi

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: You have no idea how fast my heart beats when I see you!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: That's my sweetheart in there. Wherever she is, that's where my home is.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: You are my soul mate, my sweetheart, you are my dream come true, from now until the end of time I give my heart and soul to you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My sweetheart is to me more than a coined hemisphere.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: It's a long life, sweetheart, and time heals all wounds.
quotes.author: Cheryl Strayed

quotes.quote: Beauty without the beloved is a like a sword through the heart.
quotes.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quotes.quote: Dear sweetheart, without you my days are endless. Days seem like weeks. Weeks feel like months.Months like years. Years like centuries. Centuries like, you get the idea.
quotes.author: Charles M Schulz

quotes.quote: I've alway found that the most beautiful people, truly beautiful inside and out, are the ones who are quietly unaware of their effect.
quotes.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quotes.quote: You are the sunshine of my life, you take the clouds away and make me a rainbow every day. You're in my heart where you'll forever stay. I love you, sweetheart.
quotes.author: Stephanie

quotes.quote: I need you like a heart needs a beat.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: For you see, each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rosemonde Gerard

quotes.quote: The last of your kisses was ever the sweetest; the last smile the brightest; the last movement the gracefullest.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: I'd rather be an old man's sweetheart than a young man's fool.
quotes.author: Candi Staton

quotes.quote: All knots that lovers tie are tied to sever. Here shall your sweetheart lie, untrue for ever.
quotes.author: Neville Goddard

quotes.quote: You may hold my hand for a while, but you hold my heart forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A heart at peace gives life to the body, but envy rots the bones. So save your anger and jealousy sweetheart, don't allow your own emotion to hurt you!
quotes.author: Glen Rambharack

quotes.quote: A day without you is a day without sun. A night without you is a night without moon. A life without you is a life without life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My dear, if heaven is truly a place, then it is situated in your heart, that special place, that was reserved for me.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: It is easy to love friends and sweethearts. This is selfish love. Higher love embraces enemies and all ugly, bad people. The highest love doesn't see goodness or badness at all. One should even love warmongers, bad food producers and priests.
quotes.author: Michio Kushi

quotes.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: They talk of a man betraying his country, his friends, his sweetheart. There must be a moral bond first. All a man can betray is his conscience.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: A sweetheart is a bottle of wine, a wife is a wine bottle.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: A man's wife is his compromise with the illusion of his first sweetheart.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool, and the folly of the wise.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The cure love is marriage, and the cure for marriage is love again.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: I concentrate on preparing to swim my race and let the other swimmers think about me, not me about them.
quotes.author: Amanda Beard

quotes.quote: The water is your friend.....you don't have to fight with water, just share the same spirit as the water, and it will help you move
quotes.author: Alexandr Popov

quotes.quote: Enjoy swimming for swimmings sake. We have to spend far too much time in the water to not enjoy the process challenging yourself of moving through the water
quotes.author: Jeff Rouse

quotes.quote: If you want to learn to swim jump into the water. On dry land no frame of mind is ever going to help you.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it.
quotes.author: Woodrow T. Wilson

quotes.quote: It's a good idea to begin at the bottom in everything except in learning to swim.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Swimming is probably the ultimate of burnout sports.
quotes.author: Diana Nyad

quotes.quote: Most of us, swimming against the tides of trouble the world knows nothing about, need only a bit of praise or encouragement - and we will make the goal.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: If I were dropped out of a plane into the ocean and told the nearest land was a thousand miles away, I'd still swim. And I'd despise the one who gave up.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Swimming: From the outside looking in, you can t understand it. From the inside looking out, you can t explain it.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: It's been told that swimming is a wimp sport, but I don't see it. We don't get timeouts, in the middle of a race we can't stop and catch our breath, we can't roll on our stomachs and lie there, and we can't ask for a substitution.
quotes.author: Dusty Hicks

quotes.quote: No man drowns if he perseveres in praying to God, and can swim.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: Remember, a dead fish can float downstream, but it takes a live one to swim upstream.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Breaststroke is an athletic event; butterfly is a political statement.
quotes.author: Paul Tsongas

quotes.quote: She had a strange feeling in the pit of her stomach, like when you're swimming and you want to put your feet down on something solid, but the water's deeper than you think and there's nothing there
quotes.author: Julia Gregson

quotes.quote: The water doesn't know how old you are.
quotes.author: Dara Torres

quotes.quote: There's an old adage: the sensation of drowning reminds you of everything you ever knew about swimming.
quotes.author: Frederick Weisel

quotes.quote: Traveling to swimming meets took me beyond my small-town existence, gave me a hint of the exciting world outside of my own home.
quotes.author: Esther Williams

quotes.quote: Swimming - what real men do while boys play football.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Swimming is more than a once-every-four-years sport. My goal is to bring attention to swimming - to give it some personality.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is.
quotes.author: Dennis Rodman

quotes.quote: Swimming isn't everything, winning is.
quotes.author: Mark Spitz

quotes.quote: Nobody cared about swimming.You could draw a crowd for basketball.
quotes.author: Merlin Olsen

quotes.quote: I love to swim for miles; I could just go back and forth.
quotes.author: Jill Clayburgh

quotes.quote: If I swim in the ocean, I have a shark thought.Not a bad one, but just a little one.
quotes.author: Tea Leoni

quotes.quote: Never forget that only dead fish swim with the stream.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: If you should rear a duck in the heart of the Sahara, no doubt it would swim if you brought it to the Nile.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Remember, a dead fish can float downstream,but it takes a live one to swim upstream.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Let us swim together in the ocean of our being.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Life swings like a pendulum backward and forward between pain and boredom.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The empty swing set reminds us of this- that bad won't be bad forever, and what is good can sometimes last a long, long time.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Woodson

quotes.quote: Swing is extreme coordination. It's a maintaining balance, equilibrium. It's about executing very difficult rhythms with a panache and a feeling in the context of very strict time. So, everything about the swing is about some guideline and some grid and the elegant way that you negotiate your way through that grid.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: When you are on a down swing, do not feel bad. Know the swing will change and things will get better.There are good times coming.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Swing is so much more than a dance, it's a way of life. The music gets stuck in your mind and the dance is in your heart and the whole scene is engraved on your soul. You can fly.
quotes.author: Nicholas Hope

quotes.quote: The swing of art is circular, from form to formalism, from formalism to formlessness, from formlessness to form again.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: A golf swing is a collection of corrected mistakes.
quotes.author: Carol Mann

quotes.quote: Swing will never sound as good as it did in the 40s.
quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

quotes.quote: The doorway to success swings outward not inward.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Swing hard, in case they throw the ball where you're swinging.
quotes.author: Duke Snider

quotes.quote: Swing a bigger brush you don't know what you're missing.
quotes.author: Charles Webster Hawthorne

quotes.quote: You swing your best when you have the fewest things to think about.
quotes.author: Bobby Jones

quotes.quote: Everybody can see that my swing is homegrown. That means everybody has a chance to do it.
quotes.author: Bubba Watson

quotes.quote: The golf swing is like a suitcase into which we are trying to pack one too many things.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: My swing is so bad I look like a caveman killing his lunch.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.quote: Reverse every natural instinct and do the opposite of what you are inclined to do, and you will probably come very close to having a perfect golf swing.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: If your swing was good enough to win one out there, it's good enough to win again. Your problem isn't usually your swing. It's your heart.
quotes.author: Mark McCumber

quotes.quote: Don't swing the club, let the club swing you.
quotes.author: Leslie Nielsen

quotes.quote: Jolly boating weather, / And a hay harvest breeze, / Blade on the feather, / Shade off the trees / Swing, swing together / With your body between your knees.
quotes.author: William Cory

quotes.quote: The balloon of experience is in fact of course tied to the earth, and under that necessity we swing, thanks to a rope of remarkable length, in the more or less commodious car of the imagination; but it is by the rope we know where we are, and from the moment that cable is cut we are at large and unrelated.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: What still alive at twenty-two, / A clean upstanding chap like you? / Sure, if your throat 'tis hard to slit, / Slit your girl's, and swing for it.
quotes.author: Hugh Kingsmill

quotes.quote: It don't mean a thing / If it ain't got that swing.
quotes.author: Irving Mills

quotes.quote: If age earns you anything, it's the right to rock the boat like you would an old porch swing.
quotes.author: Joe Kita

quotes.quote: Your right to swing your fist ends where my nose begins.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: To fear is one thing. To let fear grab you by the tail and swing you around is another.
quotes.author: Katherine Paterson

quotes.quote: Like they say, it ain't over till the fat guy swings.
quotes.author: Phillies Catcher Darren Daulton

quotes.quote: I don't care if a dude is purple with green breath as long as he can swing.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: There is no place for doubt in the middle of a golf swing.
quotes.author: Ranal Currie

quotes.quote: You might want to step back. I think i’m getting ready to have a mood swing.
quotes.author: Susan Gale

quotes.quote: I call investing the greatest business in the world... Because you never have to swing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The first time I passed through the country (Switzerland) I had the impression it was swept down with a broom from one end to the other every morning by housewives who dumped all the dirt in Italy
quotes.author: Ernesto Sabato

quotes.quote: Switzerland is a place where they don't like to fight, so they get people to do their fighting for them while they ski and eat chocolate.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.quote: Switzerland’s hallucinatory landscapes demand immediate action – grab boots, leap on board, toot bike bell and let spirits rip.
quotes.author: Nicola Williams

quotes.quote: A U.N. study claims the happiest country in the world is Switzerland. When asked why they're so happy, Swiss people couldn't answer because their hands were counting money and their mouths were full of chocolate.
quotes.author: Conan O' Brien

quotes.quote: In Italy for thirty years under the Borgias they had warfare, terror, murder and bloodshed but they produced Michelangelo, Leonardo da Vinci and the Renaissance. In Switzerland, they had brotherly love; they had five hundred years of democracy and peace and what did that produce? The cuckoo clock.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: My rank is the highest known in Switzerland. I'm a free citizen.
quotes.author: Geroge Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: No one really likes Switzerland, except those who prefer cleanliness to life.
quotes.author: Trevanian

quotes.quote: If I go to someplace like Switzerland, I find a lot of uptight people because they're living amongst so much beauty; there's no urgency in trying to find the beauty within themselves. If you're stuck in New York, you have to somehow look within yourself - otherwise, you'd go crackers.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: Switzerland is a country where very few things begin, but many things end.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Switzerland is a small, steep country, much more up and down than sideways, and is all stuck over with large brown hotels built on the cuckoo clock style of architecture.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The Swiss have an interesting army. Five hundred years without a war. Pretty impressive. Also pretty lucky for them. Ever see that little Swiss Army knife they have to fight with? Not much of a weapon there. Corkscrews. Bottle openers. 'Come on, buddy, let's go. You get past me, the guy in back of me, he's got a spoon. Back off. I've got the toe clippers right here.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfield

quotes.quote: In a war everybody always knows all about Switzerland, in peace times it is just Switzerland but in war time it is the only country that everybody has confidence in, everybody.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: Switzerland is a curst, selfish, swinish country of brutes, placed in the most romantic region of the world.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Every country has its cocktail-party question. A simple one-sentence query, the answer to which unlocks a motherlode of information about the person you just met.... In Switzerland it is, Where are you from? That is all you need to know about someone.
quotes.author: Eric Weiner

quotes.quote: Switzerland is only bearable covered with snow...like some people are only bearable under a sheet.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: This is a strange, little, complacent country [Switzerland], in many ways a USA in miniature but of course nearer the center of disturbance!
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I am Switzerland. I refuse to be affected by territorial disputes between mythical creatures.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: Switzerland is the perfect place where you have volatility at a municipal level that nothing up top - small units competing with each other.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Everybody was upset that Vladimir Putin was missing. He was in Switzerland with his girlfriend. She had a baby in Switzerland because in Russia childbirth is not covered by Putin-care.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: It's the change of rhythm which I think is what keeps me alive. In Spain I hear so much noise from my window that I can't stand it. In Switzerland it's the lack of noise that drives me crazy.
quotes.author: Geraldine Chaplin

quotes.quote: I wouldn't burden any decent system of faith by participating in it... I'm not agnostic. Just nonpartisan. Theological switzerland, that's me.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: No mature style of art in any culture has ever been simple. In certain cultures, an overall symmetry may conceal the complexity of the work at first glance.
quotes.author: Rudolf Arnheim

quotes.quote: We take comfort in the symmetries we find in life because they suggest a design where there is none.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss

quotes.quote: Envy, like a false mirror, distorts the symmetry of the sweetest form.
quotes.author: Norman Macdonald

quotes.quote: Symmetry is a complexity-reducing concept (co-routines include subroutines); seek it everywhere.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: Man is all symmetry, Full of proportions, one limb to another.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: It is the harmony of the diverse parts, their symmetry, their happy balance; in a word it is all that introduces order, all that gives unity, that permits us to see clearly and to comprehend at once both the ensemble and the details.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: The biggest conceptual change over the last 100 years in the way physicists think about the world is symmetry.
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.quote: Nothing is so stifling as symmetry. Symmetry is boredom, the quintessence of mourning. Despair yawns. There is something more terrible than a hell of suffering -- a hell of boredom.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The universe is built on a plan the profound symmetry of which is somehow present in the inner structure of our intellect.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Symmetry is overrated. Overrated is symmetry.
quotes.author: Larry Wall

quotes.quote: The most general law in nature is equity-the principle of balance and symmetry which guides the growth of forms along the lines of the greatest structural efficiency.
quotes.author: Herbert Read

quotes.quote: There's poetry in nature. A symmetry.
quotes.author: Saffron A. Kent

quotes.quote: Beauty depends on size as well as symmetry. No very small animal can be beautiful, for looking at it takes so small a portion of time that the impression of it will be confused. Nor can any very large one, for a whole view of it cannot be had at once, and so there will be no unity and completeness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Symmetry is what we see at a glance; based on the fact that there is no reason for any difference.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: People with great gifts are easy to find, but symmetrical and balanced ones never.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Tidiness is a virtue, symmetry is often a constituent of beauty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Human behavior is messy and unpredictable and unconcerned with convenient symmetries.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Underlying vengeance is a very strong moral character, guided by a simple principle of justice, which stipulates that symmetry must be restored to what is perceived as an unbalanced situation.
quotes.author: Robert R. Friedmann

quotes.quote: Symmetry, as wide or as narrow as you may define its meaning, is one idea by which man through the ages has tried to comprehend and create order, beauty and perfection.
quotes.author: Hermann Weyl

quotes.quote: Symmetry may have its appeal but it is inherently stale. Some kind of imbalance is behind every transformation.
quotes.author: Marcelo Gleiser

quotes.quote: There's no symmetry in nature. One eye is never exactly the same as the other. There's always a difference. We all have a more or less crooked nose and an irregular mouth.
quotes.author: Edouard Manet

quotes.quote: Symmetry, by surrounding us, makes itself invisible.
quotes.author: Hugh Howey

quotes.quote: The symmetry of form attainable in pure fiction can not so readily be achieved in a narration essentially having less to do with fable than with fact. Truth uncompromisingly told will always have its ragged edges.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Our notion of symmetry is derived from the human face. Hence, we demand symmetry horizontally and in breath only, not vertically nor in depth.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Beauty is rather a light that plays over the symmetry of things than that symmetry itself.
quotes.author: Plotinus

quotes.quote: The more complex the symmetry, the more constraints. Emergence relies on constraints.
quotes.author: R.A. Delmonico

quotes.quote: The mathematical sciences particularly exhibit order, symmetry, and limitation; and these are the greatest forms of the beautiful.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Break a vase, and the love that reassembles the fragments is stronger than that love which took its symmetry for granted when it was whole.
quotes.author: Derek Walcott

quotes.quote: Symmetry is ennui, and ennui is the very essence of grief and melancholy. Despair yawns.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote:
When you look into a mirror rorrim a otni kool uoy nehW
it is not yourself you see ees uoy esruoy ton si ti
but a kind of apish error rorre hsipa fo dnik a tub
posed in fearful symmetry yrtemmys lufraef ni desop
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Creating a warm, caring, supportive, encouraging environment is probably the most important thing you can do for your family.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: I don't know why, but audiences are often sympathetic to thieves. Sometimes they are more sympathetic to thieves then they are to earnest people. What does that say about society?
quotes.author: Matt Dillon

quotes.quote: A good woman inspires a man; a brilliant woman interests him; a beautiful woman fascinates him; and a sympathetic woman gets him
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: If you don't have the gift of a loving supportive family, be that gift for someone else. It doesn't have to be a relative, just someone you know who is alone or hurting over the holiday.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: SympatheticÂ people often don't communicate well, they back reflected images which hide their own depths.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: AÂ sympatheticÂ person is placed in the dilemma of a swimmer among drowning men, who all catch at him, and if he gives so much as a leg or a finger, they will drown him.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A good, sympathetic review is always a wonderful surprise.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: When you're ambitious, it's really hard to be supportive of other people. But it's our job to try, even though one gets jealous.
quotes.author: Squeak Carnwath

quotes.quote: Developing ourÂ sympatheticÂ compassion is not only possible but the only reason for us to be here on earth.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: Having an environment that is supportive is really important for success.
quotes.author: Tory Burch

quotes.quote: A careful andÂ sympatheticÂ sense of humour can also be a great asset when there is need to get out of difficult situations gracefully.
quotes.author: John Allen Fraser

quotes.quote: Man's best possession is a sympathetic wife.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: There's nothing like your mother'sÂ sympatheticÂ voice to make you want to burst into tears.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: A sympathetic parent might see the spark of consciousness in a baby's large eyes and eagerly accept the popular claim that babies are wonderful learners, but it is hard to avoid the impression that they begin as ignorant as bread loaves.
quotes.author: Paul Bloom

quotes.quote: It's my experience that people are a lot more sympathetic if they can see you hurting.
quotes.author: Jennifer Niven

quotes.quote: The mostÂ sympatheticÂ of men never fully comprehend woman's concrete situation.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: A careful and sympathetic sense of humour can also be a great asset when there is need to get out of difficult situations gracefully.
quotes.author: John Allen Fraser

quotes.quote: To beÂ sympatheticÂ without discrimination is so very debilitating.
quotes.author: Ronald Firbank

quotes.quote: At times our need for a sympathetic gesture is so great that we care not what exactly it signifies or how much we may have to pay for it afterwards.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Friendship is like love at its best; not blind but sympathetically all-seeing; a support which does not wait for understanding; an act of faith which does not need, but always has, reason.
quotes.author: Louis Untermeyer

quotes.quote: There's nothing like having a sympathetic reader who asks the right questions, who understands what you're trying to achieve and only wants to make it better.
quotes.author: Donna Tratt

quotes.quote: A sympathetic look always makes me feel sorry for myself.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Sympathetic characters usually have a voice. They usually don't have any trouble being heard.
quotes.author: Steve Earle

quotes.quote: AÂ sympatheticÂ friend can be quite as dear as a brother.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Dread is a sympathetic antipathy and an antipathetic sympathy.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: At every crisis in one's life, it is absolute salvation to have some sympathetic friend to whom you can think aloud without restraint or misgiving.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with supportive people. All the negative people, man you have to push them aside.
quotes.author: Gabriel Iglesias

quotes.quote: Success in dealing with people depends on sympathetic grasp of the other person's viewpoint.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Even if you become sympathetic for somebody who has done something terrible, I don't think that necessarily makes what they did look cool.
quotes.author: Dane DeHaan

quotes.quote: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quote: I think loss of loved ones is the hardest blow in life.
quotes.author: Marlo Thomas

quotes.quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: A great soul serves everyone all the time. A great soul never dies. It brings us together again and again.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Perhaps they are not stars, but rather openings in Heaven where the love of our lost ones pours through and shines down upon us to let us know they are happy.
quotes.author: Eskimo Proverb

quotes.quote: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Those we love and lose are always connected by heartstrings into infinity.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: I know for certain that we never lose the people we love, even to death. They continue to participate in every act, thought and decision we make. Their love leaves an indelible imprint in our memories. We find comfort in knowing that our lives have been enriched by having shared their love.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Words seem inadequate to express the sadness we feel we for and your family. We are here to help, support, and do whatever you need done.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: If there was less sympathy in the world, there would be less trouble in the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We understand death only after it has placed its hands on someone we love.
quotes.author: Anne L. de Stael

quotes.quote: Though nothing can bring back the hour of splendor in the grass, of glory in the flower, We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Though sympathy alone can't alter facts, it can help to make them more bearable.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: Like a bird singing in the rain, let grateful memories survive in time of sorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: To Remember Is Painful, To Forget Is Impossible.
quotes.author: Maureen Connelly

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot _be seen or even touched._They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.quote: It is terribly rude to tell people that their troubles are boring.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Unable are the loved to die. For love is immortality.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr.Seuss

quotes.quote: While we are mourning the loss of our friend, others are rejoicing to meet him behind the veil.
quotes.author: John Taylor

quotes.quote: When the heart grieves over what is has lost, the spirit rejoices over what it has left.
quotes.author: Sufi Epigram

quotes.quote: However long the night, the dawn will break.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: He who has gone, so we but cherish his memory, abides with us, more potent, nay, more present than the living man.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Sadly missed along life's way,quietly remembered every day...No longer in our life to share,but in our hearts, you're always there.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: To play with a symphony today is just fabulous.
quotes.author: Glen Campbell

quotes.quote: God comes to us in theater in the way we communicate with each other, whether it be a symphony orchestra, or a wonderful ballet, or a beautiful painting, or a play. It's a way of expressing our humanity.
quotes.author: Julie Harris

quotes.quote: We must realize our own talents and, having realized, accept them; and play on them like a symphony in which all other instruments are harmonized to make a better universe.
quotes.author: Jeane Dixon

quotes.quote: When you hear a large symphony orchestra. for instance, in a concert hall, there's a big, sweeping sound that just doesn't get on to a record.
quotes.author: Teddy Wilson

quotes.quote: To practice your scales, so to speak, in order play the symphony, is what you have to do as a young poet.
quotes.author: Rita Dove

quotes.quote: Powerful words harmonize heart and mind as if a symphony.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The world is an orchestra, the universe is a symphony.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote:
When we feel, a kind of lyric is sung in our heart.
When we think, a kind of music is played in our mind.
In harmony, both create a beautiful symphony of life.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Our biological rhythms are the symphony of the cosmos, music embedded deep within us to which we dance, even when we can't name the tune.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Symphony starts when you walk together, feel the heart beats and understand the unspoken words.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: You can't play a symphony alone, it takes an orchestra to play it.
quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quotes.quote: A symphony must be like the world. It must contain everything.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: The man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.
quotes.author: James Crook

quotes.quote: A symphony is a stage play with the parts written for instruments instead of for actors.
quotes.author: Colin Wilson

quotes.quote: Each person in the world is different and has their own beautiful sound in the symphony of life.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: A man must pay the fiddler, in my case it so happened that a whole symphony orchestra often had to be subsidized.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: Life is a symphony, and the action of every person in this life is the playing of his particular part in the music.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: You are the music in the symphony of life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The Chicago Symphony is considered the greatest orchestra in the world.
quotes.author: Jane Byrne

quotes.quote: It is the tuning of the universe. It's as if at the beginning of the symphony God turns up the volume just a tiny bit.
quotes.author: Benjamin Zander

quotes.quote: The framework of a symphony must be so strong that it forces you to follow it, regardless of the environment and circumstances.
quotes.author: Jean Sibelius

quotes.quote: Harmony is a symphony, and symphony is an agreement; but an agreement of disagreements while they disagree there cannot be; you cannot harmonize that which disagrees.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The seasons are what a symphony ought to be: four perfect movements in harmony with each other.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quotes.quote: The human being holds a universe within, filled with overlapping frequencies, and the result is a symphony of cosmic proportions.
quotes.author: Masaru Emoto

quotes.quote: It is often the quiet gesture which carries the most significance the one which suddenly directs the symphony.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: The perfect orchestration of the symphony of life is one of the Creator's greatest and most beautiful miracles.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Symphonies begin with one note; fires with one flame; gardens with one flower; and masterpieces with one stroke.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: The sound of the orchestra is one of the most magnificent musical sounds that has ever existed.
quotes.author: Chick Corea

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It will be generally admitted that Beethoven's Fifth Symphony is the most sublime noise that has ever penetrated into the ear of man.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: When two brothers are busy fighting, an evil man can easily attack and rob their poor mother. Mankind should always stay united, standing shoulder to shoulder so evil can never cheat and divide them.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: A good team needs three things: the right people, the right spirit, and a couple inside jokes.
quotes.author: VanillaCreamPie8888

quotes.quote: Unity is strength. Synergy is might. Teamwork is power.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: SynergyÂ isÂ theÂ creationÂ ofÂ aÂ wholeÂ thatÂ isÂ greaterÂ thanÂ theÂ sumÂ ofÂ its parts.
quotes.author: RayÂ French

quotes.quote: No one can whistle a symphony. It takes a whole orchestra to play it.
quotes.author: H.E. Luccock

quotes.quote: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning.Â  Keeping together is progress.Â  Working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: On our own, we are marshmallows and dried spaghetti, but together we can become something bigger.
quotes.author: C.B. Cook

quotes.quote: The leaders who work most effectively, it seems to me, never says 'I'.Â  And that's not because they have trained themselves not to say 'I.'Â  They don't think 'I.'Â  They think 'we'; they think 'team.'Â  They understand their job is to make the team function.Â  They accept responsibility and don't sidestep it, but 'we' gets the credit....Â  This is what creates trust, what enables you to get the task done.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Your mind can be your enemy or friend. If you always follow your heart, your mind will feel neglected. If you follow only your mind, your heart will never forgive you. Never ignore your conscience, yet always be conscious of reason. Make your heart and mind friends and you will have peace of mind throughout life's seasons.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Nobody can achieve success alone.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Every successful start-up is built on four pillars. Team, Idea, Passion & Presentations.
quotes.author: Aayush Jain

quotes.quote: There is no need to tell someone how to do his job if you have properly trained your team.
quotes.author: Dick Winters

quotes.quote: The individual great spirit and great efforts create a great team.
quotes.author: Lailah Akita

quotes.quote: When mutual understanding and respect are present, the spirit of synergyÂ inevitableÂ starts to develop.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success.Â  You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: The secret to success in business is synergy.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
quotes.author: Chris Bradford

quotes.quote: Great teams do not hold back with one another.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: Synergy is better than my way or your way. It's our way.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Teamwork builds trust and the trust build growth.
quotes.author: Nazim Ambalath

quotes.quote: A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skill of the others.
quotes.author: Norman S. Hidle

quotes.quote: An army is greater than a warrior.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: â€œWeâ€ multiplies the power of â€œI.â€
quotes.author: Aniekee Ezekiel

quotes.quote: We = power.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Synergy is what happens when one plus one equals ten or a hundred or even a thousand! It's the profound result when two or more respectful human beings determine to go beyond their preconceived ideas to meet a great challenge.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Synergy - the bonus that is achieved when things work together harmoniously.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Teamwork is the secret that make common people achieve uncommon result.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: You are there and to their ears, being a Syrian sounds like you’re unclean, shameful, indecent; it’s like you owe the world an apology for your very existence.
quotes.author: Asaad Almohammad

quotes.quote: If Syria is to rise from the ashes it needs a united Arab world which has one thing on its agenda, not the falling of a dictator for we have seen many of those fall, but the reemergence of a prosperous Arab nation, one that is not reliant on foreign aid but is self-sustained and set on its way to become powerful once again.
quotes.author: Aysha Taryam

quotes.quote: For me he is the last Arab ruler, and Syria is the last Arab country. It is the fortress of the remaining dignity of the Arabs, and that's why I'm proud to be here.
quotes.author: Bashar Al-Assad

quotes.quote: Syria is a melting pot. It existed like this, like it is today because it is a melting pot with multifarious cultures for centuries, before Christianity and after Christianity, before Islam and after Islam. If you have any change, dramatic change, in the demographic and social fabric of the Syrian society, you're going to have a big problem in the future regarding the future of Syria.
quotes.author: President Bashar al-Assad

quotes.quote: Syria, using the term in its old, geographical sense, occupies a unique place in the annals of the world. Especially because of the inclusion of Palestine and Phoenicia within its ancient boundaries, it has made a more significant contribution to the moral and spiritual progress of mankind than any other comparable land. Small as it appears on a map or a globe, its historical importance is boundless, its influence universal.
quotes.author: Philip K. Hitti

quotes.quote: Syria should not belong to one family, to one coterie, or to one party. It belongs to all the people of Syria equally, in all their religious and ethnic diversity.
quotes.author: William Hague

quotes.quote: So from the broken smile to the sealed emotion, From the rising hope to the failed redemption, From the still mornings to the chaotic nights, From the fallen peace to the terror sights, From the cursed skies to the soil red stained, Hear the silent cries, I'm the Syrian pain.
quotes.author: Chauhan Saab

quotes.quote: We cannot look at Syria, and the evil that has arisen from the ashes of indecision, and think this is not the lowest point in the world's inability to protect and defend the innocent.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: I pray for the day when the children of Syria and Palestine wake up to the sound of birds and not bombs.
quotes.author: Dr.Bilal Philips

quotes.quote: As politicians weigh courses of action against their political agendas the death toll weighs heavy on the conscience of the world. The once vibrant Syrian streets are now haunted by the souls of the innocent and the historic monuments that told of an unrivalled Arab civilisation no longer stand tall.
quotes.author: Aysha Taryam

quotes.quote: We, in Syria, our point of view stems from our experience.
quotes.author: Bashar al-Assad

quotes.quote: It is time for all civilized nations to stop the horrors that are taking place in Syria and demand a political solution.
quotes.author: Nikki Haley

quotes.quote: So my judgment is that Syria will move; Syria will change, as it embraces a legitimate relationship with the United States and the West and economic opportunity that comes with it and the participation that comes with it.
quotes.author: John Kerry

quotes.quote: What we saw in Syria last week should shock the conscience of the world. It defies any code of morality. Make no mistake, President Obama believes there must be accountability for those who would use the world's most heinous weapons against the world's most vulnerable people.
quotes.author: John Kerry

quotes.quote: When progressives remain silent and don’t talk about why the war in Syria is illegal, then into the void step in neocons like Lindsey Graham. Any wonder that our nation remains mired in endless war. Let’s have the guts to stand for responsible withdrawal.
quotes.author: Ro Khanna

quotes.quote: Syria is an unfolding humanitarian catastrophe unmatched since World War II. I appeal to both sides to make the most of this moment — seize the opportunity for serious negotiations
quotes.author: John Kerry

quotes.quote: The courage of the Syrian protesters is remarkable, for they face prison, torture, or death every time they lift a banner.
quotes.author: Elliott Abrams

quotes.quote: I know something quite sure. We'll never have peace with this Syrian regime. They'll never give us relief, and we'll never forget that.
quotes.author: Walid Jumblatt

quotes.quote: The world has to save Syria. I mean, this has dramatic implications for the entire region, globally.
quotes.author: John F. Kerry

quotes.quote: Syria has become the great tragedy of this century - a disgraceful humanitarian calamity with suffering and displacement unparalleled in recent history.
quotes.author: Antonio Guterres

quotes.quote: If we dont support Syria today, every country will perish in 15 years and a lot sooner will humanity die. Be prepared or be the revolt.
quotes.author: Sagnik Chatterjee

quotes.quote: We are not wedded to anyone in Syria. We are not concerned with any personality. We are concerned with keeping Syria in one piece, territorially integral, sovereign, independent and secular, where the rights of all groups, ethnic and others, are fully respected.
quotes.author: Sergei Lavrov

quotes.quote: The population of Syria is so inharmonious a gathering of widely different races in blood, in creed, and in custom, that government is both difficult and dangerous.
quotes.author: Charles Glass

quotes.quote: Surely our inaction with respect to Syria is a poor precedent if we're fighting a war on terror.
quotes.author: Bill Kristol

quotes.quote: But for us, in Syria, we have principles. We'll do anything to prevent the region from another crazy war. It's not only Syria. Because it will start in Syria.
quotes.author: Bashar al-Assad

quotes.quote: Syria, for all its problems, at least has a constitution that guarantees equal protection of citizens. Around the world, we have seen that this is essential where Christians are a minority and are not protected.
quotes.author: Franklin Graham

quotes.quote: The transition from tyranny to democracy is very hard. The Syrian people have to handle this in a way that works in Syria. And the brutality of the Assad regime is unacceptable.
quotes.author: Jack Lew

quotes.quote: No one doubts that innocent men, women and children have been the victims of chemical weapons attacks in Syria. And there's no doubt who is responsible for this heinous use of chemical weapons in Syria: the Syrian regime.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: I'm so thankful a significant majority of Americans are saying no to military intervention. We've got to find a solution that will in the end be one that makes Syria a better country, a better people.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: I think Syria is in a particularly sensitive geopolitical position in terms of the politics of the Middle East.
quotes.author: Edward Luck
